A glacier cave is a cave formed within the ice of a glacier.
Glacier caves are often called ice caves, but this term is properly used to describe bedrock गुफाएं that contain year-round ice.
In physics, circular motion is a movement of an ऑब्जेक्ट along the circumference of a वृत्त or rotation along a circular path.
It can be uniform, with constant कोणीय rate of rotation ( and निरंतर speed ), or non-uniform with a changing rate of rotation.
The rotation around a fixed axis of a three-dimensional body involves circular motion of its parts.
The equations of motion describe the movement of the center of mass of a body.
Examples of circular motion include : an artificial satellite orbiting the Earth at constant height, a स्टोन which is tied to a rope and is being swung in circles, a car turning through a curve in a रेस track, an इलेक्ट्रॉन moving perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field, and a gear turning inside a यांत्रिकी.
Since the object 's velocity vector is constantly बदलना direction, the moving object is undergoing acceleration by a अभिकेन्द्रीय फ़ोर्स in the direction of the center of rotation.
Without this acceleration, the ऑब्जेक्ट would move in a straight line, according to Newton 's कानून of motion.
Apollo पंथ is a fictional character from the Rocky films, initially portrayed as the undisputed Heavyweight Champion of the संसार.
He was निभाई by Carl Weathers.
Creed था multiple nicknames, including the Master of Disaster, The King of Sting, The Dancing Destroyer, The Prince of Punch, The One and तभी and The Count of Monte Fisto.
Urban legend states that Apollo Creed 's name is a wordplay on the Apostles ' Creed, a बयान of belief प्रयुक्त in Christian churches.
सब of Apollo 's championship fights यहूद scheduled for the 15 round distance.
Championship fights did not convert from 15 rounds to 12 rounds until 1987.
Rocky Balboa is often wrongly credited with popularizing the red, white, and blue trunks ; Creed was the first man to wear them ( latterly worn by Rocky बाल्बोआ in the 3rd and 4th installments and finally by Tommy `` The Machine '' Gunn ( टॉमी Morrison ) in the 5th installment ) although normally he wore red and white, as seen in Rocky II.
Balboa 's signature colors were black and gold—colors he used in the latest movie.
In the संयुक्त States, the title of federal judge usually means a judge appointed by the President of the United States and confirmed by the United States Senate pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution.
In addition to the परम् Court of the United States, whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of Congress to alter, acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the संयुक्त States, and 94 United States ज़िला courts.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal न्यायधीश ; such positions include the Chief Justice and संबद्ध Justices of the Supreme Court, सर्किट Judges of the courts of appeals, and district judges of the United States district courts.
All of these judges described thus दूर are referred to sometimes as `` आलेख III judges '' because they कसरत the judicial power vested in the judicial branch of the federal government by Article III of the u.S. Constitution.
in addition, judges of the Court of International Trade exercise judicial power pursuant to Article III.
Other judges सेवारत in the federal courts, including magistrate judges और bankruptcy judges, are also sometimes referred to as `` संघीय judges '' ; however, they are neither appointed by the President nor confirmed by the Senate, and their power derives from Article I instead.
See Article I and Article III tribunals.
The Beretta 21A Bobcat is a small pocket-sized semi-automatic pistol designed by beretta in Italy.
उत्पादन began in late 1984, solely in the Beretta U.S.A. facility in Accokeek, Maryland.
It is a further development of the Beretta Model 20, whose production ended in 1985.
Variable Universal Life Insurance ( often shortened to VUL ) is a प्रकार of जीवन insurance that builds a cash मान.
In a VUL, the cash value can be invested in a wide variety of separate accounts, similar to mutual funds, and the choice of which of the उपलब्धियाँ separate खाते to use is entirely up to the contract owner.
The 'variable ' component in the name refers to this ability to invest in separate accounts whose values vary—they vary because they are invested in stock and/or bond markets.
The 'universal ' component in the name refers to the flexibility the owner has in making premium payments.
The premiums can vary from nothing in a given month up to maximums defined by the Internal Revenue Code for life insurance.
This flexibility is in contrast to whole life insurance that has fixed प्रीमियम payments that typically can नहीं be missed without lapsing the policy ( although one may exercise an Automatic Premium Loan feature, or surrender dividends to pay a Whole Life premium ).
Variable universal life is a type of permanent life insurance, because the death benefit will be paid if the insured dies any time as long as there is sufficient cash value to pay the costs of insurance in the policy.
With most if not all VULs, unlike whole life, वहीँ is no endowment age ( the age at which the cash value equals the death benefit amount, which for पूरे life is typically 100 ).
This is yet another key advantage of VUL over पूरे Life.
With a typical whole life policy, the मौत benefit is limited to the face amount specified in the policy, and at endowment आयु, the फेस amount is all that is paid out.
Thus with either death or endowment, the insurance company keeps any cash value built up over the years.
However, some participating whole life नीतियों प्रस्ताव riders which बताएँ that any dividends paid on the policy be used to purchase `` paid up additions '' to the नीति which increase both the cash value and the death benefit over time.
If investments made in the separate accounts out-perform the general account of the insurance कम्पनी, a higher rate-of-return can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical लिये whole life.
The संयोजन over the years of no endowment age, continually increasing मौत benefit, and if a high rate-of-return is earned in the separate accounts of a VUL policy, this could result in उच्चतर मान to the owner or beneficiary than that of a whole life policy with the same amounts of money paid in as प्रीमियम.
The outdoor wood boiler is a variant of the classic wood stove adapted for set-up outdoors while स्टिल transferring the heat to interior buildings.

Girl Scout Cookies are cookies sold by Girl Scouts of the यूएसए ( GSUSA ) as one of its major fundraisers for local Scout इकाई.
Members of the GSUSA have been selling cookies since 1917 to raise funds.
Girls who participate can earn prizes for their efforts.
There are also unit incentives if the ईकाई as a whole does well.
As of 2007, sales यहूद estimated at about 200 million boxes per year.
University Hall
Purdue University, located in West Lafayette, Indiana, is the flagship university of the six-campus Purdue University system.
Purdue was founded on May 6, 1869, as a land-grant university when the Indiana General Assembly, taking advantage of the morrill Act, accepted a donation of land and money from lafayette businessman John Purdue to establish a college of विज्ञान, technology, and agriculture in उसके name.
The first classes were आयोजित on सितंबर 16, 1874, with six instructors and 39 students.
आज, Purdue is a member of the Big Ten सम्मेलन, and is a well known world-class research institution.
purdue enrolls the second largest student body of any university in Indiana as well as the fourth largest international student population of any university in the संयुक्त States.
purdue offers both undergraduate and graduate programs in over 211 major areas of पढ़ाई, and is well known for its competitive engineering curricula.
The university has also महरूम highly influential in America 's इतिहास of aviation, having स्थापित the first college credit offered in उड़ान प्रशिक्षण, the first four-year bachelor 's degree in aviation, and the first university airport ( Purdue University Airport ).
Purdue 's aviation technology program remains one of the most competitive aviation-specific कार्यक्रम in the world.
In the mid-20th century, Purdue 's aviation program expanded to encompass advanced spaceflight प्रौद्योगिकी giving वृद्धि to Purdue 's nickname, Cradle of Astronauts.
twenty-three purdue graduates have gone on to become astronauts, including Gus Grissom ( one of the असली Mercury Seven astronauts ), Neil आर्मस्ट्रांग ( the first person to walk on the चंद्रमा ), और यूजीन Cernan ( the most recent person to walk on the moon ).
A sebaceous cyst ( ) is a term that loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( also known as epidermal cysts ; L72.0 ) or pilar cysts ( भी known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ).
Because an epidermoid cyst originates in the epidermis और a pilar cyst originates from बाल follicles, by definition, neither type of cyst is strictly a sebaceous cyst.
the name is regarded as a misnomer as the fatty, white, semi-solid material in both of these गाँठ entities is not sebum, but keratin.
Furthermore, under the microscope neither entity contains sebaceous glands.
In practice, however, the terms are often used interchangeably.
`` सच्चा '' sebaceous cysts are relatively rare and are known as steatocystomas or, if multiple, as steatocystoma multiplex.
Modern pointe shoes.
The edge of the toe pad, which is inserted between the foot and toe box for cushioning, can be seen on the right foot.
A pointe shoe is a type of shoe worn by ballet dancers when performing pointe work.
Pointe shoes developed from the desire for dancers to appear weightless और sylph -like and have विकसित to enable dancers to dance en pointe ( on the tips of their toes ) for extended periods of time.
They are normally worn by female dancers, though male नर्तक may wear them for unorthodox roles such as the ugly stepsisters in Cinderella, Bottom in A Midsummer Night 's Dream, or men performing as women in dance companies ऐसे as लेस Ballets Trockadero and Grandiva.
They are manufactured in a variety of colors, most commonly in shades of light गुलाबी.
This tablespoon has a capacity of about 15 mL.
Measuring Spoons
in the US and parts of Canada, a tablespoon is the largest type of spoon used for eating इससे a bowl.
In the UK, Europe and most Commonwealth countries, a tablespoon is a type of large spoon usually used for serving.
In countries where a tablespoon is a सेवारत चमचा, the nearest equivalent to the US tablespoon is either the dessert spoon or the soup spoon.
A tablespoonful, nominally the capacity of one tablespoon, is commonly used as a measure of volume in cooking.
It is abbreviated as T, tb, tbs, tbsp, tblsp, or tblspn.
The capacity of ordinary tablespoons is not regulated by विधि and is subject to considerable variation.
In the यूएसए one tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is approximately 15 mL ; the capacity of an actual tablespoon ( डाइनिंग utensil ) ranges from 7 mL to 14 mL.
In ऑस्ट्रेलिया one tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is 20 mL.
Harry कुम्हार is a series of seven fantasy novels written by the British author J. K. Rowling.
The किताबे chronicle the adventures of a wizard, Harry Potter, and his friends Ronald Weasley and Hermione Granger, all of जिसको are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
The main story arc concerns Harry 's quest to overcome the Dark wizard Lord Voldemort, whose aims are to become immortal, conquer the wizarding world, subjugate non-magical people, और destroy all those who stand in his way, especially Harry Potter.
Since the release of the first novel Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone on 30 June 1997, the books have gained immense popularity, critical acclaim और commercial कामयाबी worldwide.
The series has also had some share of criticism, including concern for the increasingly dark tone.
, the book श्रेणी has बेची about 450 million copies, बनाना it the best-selling किताब series in history, and has महरूम translated into 67 languages.
The last four books consecutively set records as the fastest-selling books in history.
A series of many genres, सहित fantasy and coming of age ( with elements of mystery, thriller, adventure, and romance ), it रै अनेक cultural meanings and references.
According to Rowling, the प्रमुख theme is death.
There are also many other themes in the series, ऐसे as prejudice and corruption.
The initial major publishers of the books यहूद Bloomsbury in the संयुक्त Kingdom और Scholastic दबायें in the United States.
The किताबे have since been published by many publishers worldwide.
The books, with the seventh book split into two parts, have been made into an eight-part film series by Warner Bros. Pictures, the highest-grossing film series of all time.
The series also originated much tie-in merchandise, making the Harry Potter brand worth in excess of $ 15 billion.
Also due to the success of the books and films, Harry Potter has been used for a theme park, The Wizarding World of Harry Potter in Universal Parks & Resorts 's Islands of Adventure.

Viking 5C rocket engine
A rocket engine, or simply `` rocket '', is a jet इंजन that uses only stored propellant द्रव्यमान for forming its high speed propulsive jet.
Rocket engines are reaction engines and obtain thrust in accordance with Newton 's third law.
Since they need no external material to form their jet, rocket engines can be used for spacecraft propulsion as well as terrestrial uses, ऐसे as missiles.
Most rocket engines are internal combustion engines, although non-combusting फ़ॉर्म also exist.
Rocket engines as a group have the highest exhaust velocities, are by far the lightest, but हैं the least propellant efficient of all types of jet engines.
``... Baby One More Time '' is a song by American recording artist Britney स्पीयर्स.
It served as Spears 's debut single and title track from her debut studio एल्बम,... Baby One More समय ( 1999 ).
Written by Max Martin and उत्पादित by Martin and Rami, ``... Baby One More Time '' was released on September 30, 1998, by Jive Records.
After recording and sending a demo tape with an unused song from Toni Braxton, Spears signed a multi-album deal with Jive.
``... Baby One More Time '' is a teen pop and dance-pop song that refers to a girl who regrets breaking up with her boyfriend.
The song received generally favorable reviews from आलोचकों, who praised its composition.
``... Baby One More Time '' attained global कामयाबी, reaching number one in every country it charted.
It also प्राप्त numerous certifications around the संसार, and is एक of the best-selling singles of all time, with over 10 million copies sold.
An accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो, directed by Nigel Dick, portrays Spears as a student from a Catholic high school, who starts to daydream कि she is singing and dancing around the school, while watching her love interest from अफ़ार.
The music video was later referenced in the music video of `` If U Seek Amy `` ( 2008 ), where Spears 's fictional daughter is dressed with a समान schoolgirl outfit while wearing pink ribbons in her hair.
In 2010, the music video for ``... Baby One अधिक Time '' was voted the तीसरा most influential video in the history of पॉप music, in a poll held by Jam !.
Spears has performed ``... Baby One More Time '' in a number of live appearances और in all of her concert tours.
It was the encore of the... baby One More Time Tour ( 1999 ) और Dream Within a Dream Tour ( 2001 ) ; स्पीयर्स भी performed remixed versions of the song दौरान the Oops !...
I Did It Again संसार Tour ( 2000 ), The Onyx Hotel Tour ( 2004 ), The M+M 's Tour ( 2007 ), The Circus Starring Britney Spears ( 2009 ), and the Femme Fatale Tour ( 2011 ).
``... baby एक अधिक Time '' was nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance, और has been included in lists by ब्लेंडर, Rolling Stone and vh1.
It has महरूम noted लिये redefining the ध्वनि of late 1990s music.
Spears has named ``... Baby One More Time '' as one of her favorite songs from उसके career.
It was also the final सोंग to be played on the बीबीसी 's म्यूज़िक programme Top of the Pops.
Cholera is an infection in the small intestine caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae.
The main symptoms are watery diarrhea and vomiting.
Transmission occurs primarily by drinking water or eating food that has been contaminated by the feces ( waste product ) of an infected person, including one with no apparent symptoms.
The severity of the diarrhea and vomiting can lead to रैपिड dehydration and electrolyte असंतुलन, and death in some cases.
The primary treatment is oral rehydration therapy, typically with oral rehydration solution, to replace water और electrolytes.
If इस is not tolerated or does not provide improvement fast enough, intravenous fluids can also be used.
Antibacterial drugs are beneficial in those with severe disease to shorten its duration and severity.
Worldwide, it affects 3–5 million people and कल्याणकारी 100,000–130,000 deaths a साल.
Cholera was एक of the earliest infections to be studied by epidemiological methods.
The Picture of Dorian Gray is the only published novel by Oscar Wilde, appearing as the lead story in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine on 20 June 1890, printed as the July 1890 issue of this magazine.
The magazine 's सम्पादक feared the story was indecent as submitted, so they censored roughly 500 words, without Wilde 's knowledge, before publication.
But even with that, the story was स्टिल greeted with outrage by अंग्रेजों reviewers, some of whom सुझाया कि Wilde should be prosecuted on moral grounds, leading Wilde to defend the novel aggressively in letters to the British press.
Wilde later revised the story for book publication, making substantial alterations, deleting controversial passages, adding new chapters and including an aphoristic Preface which has since become famous in its अपना right.
The amended version was published by वार्ड, Lock and कम्पनी in April 1891.
Some scholars believe that Wilde होता today have wanted us to पढ़ा the version he originally submitted to Lippincott 's.
The novel tells of a young man named Dorian Gray, the subject of a painting by artist Basil Hallward.
Basil is प्रभावित by Dorian 's beauty and becomes infatuated साथ him, believing his beauty is responsible for a new mode in his art.
Dorian meets Lord Henry Wotton, a friend of Basil 's, and becomes enthralled by Lord Henry 's world view.
Espousing a new hedonism, Lord Henry suggests the तभी things लायक pursuing in life are beauty and fulfilment of the senses.
Realizing that एक day his beauty will fade, Dorian ( whimsically ) expresses a desire to sell his soul to ensure the portrait Basil has painted would age rather than he.
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled, and when he subsequently pursues a life of debauchery, the portrait serves as a स्मरण of the effect प्रत्येक अधिनियम has upon his soul, with each sin displayed as a disfigurement of his form, or through a sign of aging.
The Picture of Dorian धूसर is considered a work of classic Gothic fiction with a strong Faustian theme.
Sári Gábor ( born 6 February 1917 ), known as Zsa Zsa Gabor ( ), is a हंगेरियाई -born American अभिनेत्री who acted in supporting roles in movies, on Broadway, and occasionally on television.
Gabor was also a socialite.
She began her stage career in वियना at age 15, और was crowned Miss Hungary in 1936.
She emigrated to the United States in 1941 and became a sought-after actress with `` European flair and style '', with a personality that `` exuded charm and grace ''.
Her first movie भूमिका was as supporting actress in Lovely to Look At.
She later acted in We 're नहीं Married !
and played एक of her few leading roles in Moulin Rouge ( 1952 ), directed by John Huston, who वर्णित her as a `` creditable '' actress.
Besides her film and television appearances, she is best known for having नौ husbands, including होटल magnate Conrad Hilton and actor George Sanders.
She once stated, `` Men have always liked me and I have always liked men.
But I like a mannish man, a man who knows how to talk to and treat a स्त्री – not just a man with muscles. ''
Bruce ली ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born Lee Jun-fan ; 27 November 1940 – 20 July 1973 ) was a Chinese American martial artist, actor, martial arts instructor, पारस, and filmmaker.
the founder of जीत Kune Do, Lee was the son of Cantonese opera star Lee Hoi-Chuen.
He is widely considered by commentators, critics, media and other martial artists to be one of the most influential martial artists of all time, and a pop culture icon of the 20th century.
He is often credited with helping to change the way Asians were presented in American films.
Lee was born in Chinatown, San Francisco on 27 November 1940 to parents from Hong Kong and was raised in Kowloon with his family until his late teens.
he was introduced to the film industry by his father and appeared in several films as a child actor.
Lee moved to the United States at the आयु of 18 to receive his higher education, and it was during this time that he began teaching martial arts.
His Hong Kong and Hollywood -produced films elevated the traditional Hong काँग martial arts film to a new level of popularity and acclaim, sparking a surge of interest in Chinese martial कला in the West in the 1970s.
The direction and tone of his films changed and influenced martial कला and martial arts films in Hong Kong and the rest of the world.
He is noted for his roles in five feature-length films : Lo वेई 's The Big Boss ( 1971 ) and Fist of Fury ( 1972 ) ; Way of the Dragon ( 1972 ), directed and written by Lee ; Warner Brothers ' Enter the ड्रैगन ( 1973 ) and The Game of मौत ( 1978 ), both directed by Robert clouse.
Lee became an iconic figure known throughout the world, particularly among the Chinese, as he portrayed चाइनीज nationalism in his films.
he initially trained in Wing Chun, but later rejected well-defined martial art styles, favouring बजाय the उपयोग of techniques इससे various sources, in the spirit of his personal martial arts philosophy, जिससे he dubbed Jeet Kune Do ( The Way of the intercepting Fist ).
Lee held dual citizenship of Hong Kong and the United States.
He died in कोलून Tong on 20 July 1973 at आयु 32.
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ), also known as chronic obstructive lung disease ( ठंडा ), दीर्घकालिक obstructive airway disease ( coad ), chronic airflow limitation ( CAL ) and chronic obstructive respiratory disease ( CORD ), is the occurrence of chronic bronchitis or emphysema, a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over time.
इस हद airflow to and इससे the lungs, causing shortness of breath ( dyspnea ).
In clinical practice, COPD is defined by its characteristically low airflow on फेफड़ों function tests.
In contrast to asthma, this limitation is poorly reversible and usually gets progressively worse over time.
COPD is caused by noxious particles or gas, most commonly from tobacco smoking, which triggers an abnormal inflammatory जवाब in the lung.
The diagnosis of COPD requires फेफड़ों function tests.
Important management strategies are smoking cessation, vaccinations, rehabilitation, and drug therapy ( often using inhalers ).
Some patients go on to require long-term oxygen therapy or lung transplantation.
Worldwide, COPD क्रमित as the sixth leading cause of death in 1990.
It is projected to become the fourth leading कारण of death विश्वव्यापी by 2030, due to an बढ़ाएँ in smoking rates और demographic changes in many देशों.
COPD is the third leading cause of death in the U.S., and the economic बोझ of COPD in the U.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 billion in health care costs and lost productivity.
Annelies `` Anne '' Marie Frank (, ?, ; 12 जून 1929early कूच 1945 ) is one of the most discussed Jewish victims of the Holocaust.
Her diary has been the basis for अनेक plays and films.
Born in the city of Frankfurt am Main in Weimar Germany, she lived most of her life in or near Amsterdam, in the Netherlands.
Born a German national, Frank lost her citizenship in 1941.
She gained international fame posthumously after her डायरी was प्रकाशित.
It documents her experiences hiding during the German occupation of the Netherlands in World War II.
the फ़्रैंक family स्थानांतरित from Germany to Amsterdam in 1933, the year the Nazis gained कंट्रोल over Germany.
by the beginning of 1940, they यहूद trapped in Amsterdam by the Nazi occupation of the Netherlands.
As persecutions of the Jewish population increased in July 1942, the परिवार went into hiding in the hidden rooms of Anne 's पिता, Otto Frank 's, office building.
After two years, the group was betrayed and transported to concentration camps.
Anne Frank and her sister, Margot, were eventually transferred to the Bergen-Belsen concentration camp, where they died of सन्निपात in March 1945.
ओटो Frank, the only survivor of the family, returned to Amsterdam after the war to find that Anne 's diary had been saved, and his efforts led to its publication in 1947.
It was translated from its original Dutch and first published in English in 1952 as The Diary of a Young Girl.
It has since been translated into अनेक languages.
The diary, which was given to Anne on her 13th birthday, chronicles her life from 12 June 1942 until 1 August 1944.
Kurt 's signature
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) was an American musician and artist, best known as the lead singer, guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
कोबेन formed Nirvana साथ Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, वॉशिंगटन in 1985 and स्थापित it as part of the Seattle music scene, having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989.
After signing with major label DGC Records, the band मिला भेदन success with `` Smells Like Teen Spirit `` from its second album Nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the success of Nevermind, निर्वाण थी labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X, और Cobain hailed as `` the प्रवक्ता of a पीढी ''.
Cobain, however, was often uncomfortable and frustrated, believing his message and artistic vision to have been misinterpreted by the पब्लिक, with his personal issues often subject to मीडिया attention.
He challenged निर्वाण 's audience with इसके final studio album in Utero ( 1993 ).
During the last years of his life, कोबेन struggled with heroin addiction, illness and depression.
He भी had difficulty coping साथ his fame and public image, and the professional और lifelong personal pressures surrounding himself and his बीवी, musician Courtney Love.
on April 8, 1994, Cobain was found dead at his home in सिएटल, the victim of what थी officially ruled a आत्महत्या by a self-inflicted shotgun घाव to the head.
The हालातों of his मौत at age 27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate.
Since their debut, Nirvana, with Cobain as a songwriter, has sold over 25 million albums in the U.S., and over 50 million worldwide.

The रेडियल engine is a reciprocating type internal combustion engine configuration in which the cylinders point outward from a central crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel.
It resembles a stylized star when viewed from the front, and is called a `` स्टार इंजन '' ( German sternmotor ) in कुछ भाषाएं.
The radial configuration was very commonly used in aircraft engines before turbine इंजन became predominant.
the Golden Girls is an American sitcom, निर्मित by Susan Harris, that originally aired on NBC इससे September 13, 1985, to May 9, 1992.
Starring Bea Arthur, Betty White, Rue McClanahan and Estelle Getty, the show centers on चार older women sharing a home in Miami, Florida.
It was produced by Witt/Thomas/Harris Productions, in association with Touchstone Television, and Paul Junger Witt, Tony Thomas, and Harris served as the original executive producers.
The Golden Girls received नाजुक acclaim throughout most of its run and won several awards, including the Primetime एमी Award for Outstanding कॉमेडी Series twice.
It also won three Golden Globe Awards लिये Best Television Series – Musical or Comedy.
All four stars each received an Emmy पुरस्कार throughout the series ' run और had अनेक nominations.
The series also ranked among the top ten highest-rated programs for six out of इसके सात seasons.
Deepwater drilling is the process of oil and gas exploration and production in depths of more than 500 फीट.
By इस definition, there are approximately 600 deepwater wells in the Gulf of Mexico.
It has been economically infeasible for many years, but with rising oil prices, more companies are निवेश in this area.
Major companies working in this sector include Diamond offshore, TransOcean, और बेकर Hughes.
There are basically two kinds of mobile deepwater drilling rigs : semi-submersible drilling rigs and drillships.
Drilling can also be performed from a fixed-position installation such as a floating spar ( platform ) or tension-leg platform.
हाल industry analysis has estimated कि the total expenditure in the global deepwater infrastructure मार्केट will reach $ 145bn in 2011.
“Not all oil is accessible on land or in shallow water.
You can find some आयल deposits buried deep under the ocean floor.”... Using sonic equipment, oil companies determine the drilling sites most likely to उपज आयल.
Then वे उपयोग a mobile offshore drilling unit ( MODU ) to dig the initial well.
Some units are converted into production rigs, meaning they switch from drilling for oil to capturing आयल once it 's found.
Most of the time, the oil company will बदलें the MODU with a more permanent oil production rig to capture oil.”... The MODU 's job is to drill down into the ocean 's मंजिल to find आयल deposits.
The part of the drill that extends below the deck and through the water is called the riser.
The riser allows for drilling fluids to move between the मंजिल and the rig.
Engineers lower a drill string -- a series of pipes designed to drill down to the oil deposit -- through the riser.”
“The expansion of deepwater drilling is happening despite accidents in offshore fields... ”
In 2010 a विशाल explosion occurred killing 11 workers and spilling millions of gallons of oil into the Gulf of Mexico while a BP oil rig was drilling in deep waters.
“... despite the risks, the deepwater drilling trend is spreading in the भूमध्यसागरीय and off the coast of East Africa after a string of huge discoveries of natural gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of such drilling, analyst say, is continuing high demand for उर्जा worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is almost necessary to face the high risks that आइये with deepwater drilling in order for Americans to continue to carry on their everyday lives.
“The Energy Department recently projected that gulf आयल production would expand इससे its 2011 level of 1.3 million barrels a day, still nearly a quarter of total domestic production, to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
Deepwater drilling affects the environment in both negative and positive ways.
Although Deepwater drilling rarely causes oil spills it is still a hazardous possible outcome.
Oil spills परिणाम in oil sinking to the bottom of the ocean smothering plant life leaving मछली without food and shelter to survive.
On the other hand deepwater drilling effects the environment in a positive ways too.
In time once the deepwater आयल well is not in use anymore plants will grow on and around the well making a cave or cavern like shelter ideal for animals to thrive in.
Deepwater drilling also lets us see the depths of the ocean floor that are hardly ever seen.
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the wells रिकार्ड footage and take photos of rare fish कि are in there natural habitat, giving scientist a look at animals they rarely seen” ( Chevron निगम ). ''
Monica Samille lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an American woman with whom United States President Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996.
the affair and its repercussions ( जिससे included Clinton 's impeachment ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal.
Francis Albert `` Frank '' Sinatra,, ( December 12, 1915 – May 14, 1998 ) was an American singer and film actor.
Beginning his musical career in the swing era with Harry James and Tommy Dorsey, Sinatra found unprecedented success as a solo artist from the early to mid-1940s after being signed to Columbia Records in 1943.
होने the idol of the `` bobby soxers ``, he released his first album, The आवाज़ of Frank Sinatra in 1946.
उसके professional करियर था stalled by the 1950s, लकिन it was reborn in 1953 after he won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to Eternity.
he signed with Capitol Records in 1953 and released several critically lauded albums ( ऐसे as In the Wee Small Hours, Songs for Swingin ' Lovers !, Come Fly with Me, Only the Lonely and Nice 'n ' Easy ).
Sinatra left Capitol to found उसके own रिकार्ड label, Reprise Records in 1961 ( finding success with albums such as Ring-a-Ding-Ding !, Sinatra at the Sands and Francis Albert Sinatra & Antonio कार्लोस jobim ), toured internationally, was a founding सदस्य of the Rat Pack and fraternized with celebrities and statesmen, सहित John F. Kennedy.
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965, recorded the retrospective September of My Years, starred in the Emmy -winning television special Frank Sinatra : a Man and His Music, और scored हिट्स with `` Strangers in the Night `` and `` my Way ``.
With sales of his music dwindling and after appearing in several poorly received films, Sinatra retired for the first time in 1971.
Two years later, however, he came out of retirement and in 1973 recorded several albums, scoring a Top 40 hit with `` ( Theme From ) New York, New York `` in 1980.
Using his Las Vegas shows as a home base, he toured both within the United States and internationally, until a short time before his death in 1998.
Sinatra also forged a अत्यधिक कामयाब career as a film कर्ता.
After winning Best Supporting Actor in 1953, he also garnered a nomination लिये Best Actor for the Man with the Golden Arm, and critical acclaim for his performance in The Manchurian Candidate.
He also starred in such musicals as ऊँची Society, Pal Joey, Guys और Dolls and On the Town.
सिनात्रा was honored at the Kennedy Center Honors in 1983 और was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by Ronald Reagan in 1985 and the Congressional Gold Medal in 1997.
He was the recipient of eleven Grammy Awards, including the Grammy Trustees Award, Grammy Legend Award and the Grammy Lifetime Achievement पुरस्कार.
Sinatra is also one of world’s best-selling artists of all time, having sold more than 150 million नक़ल worldwide.
Typical cornhole board
Cornhole, also known as bean bag toss, corn toss, baggo or bags, is a lawn game in which players take turns throwing corn hole bags at a raised platform with a hole in the far end.
A bag in the hole scores 3 points, जबकि one on the platform scores 1 point.
Play continues until a team or player reaches the score of 21.
The American Gold Eagle is an official gold bullion coin of the United States.
Authorized under the Gold Bullion Coin Act of 1985, it was first released by the United States Mint in 1986.
Bikram Yoga is a system of yoga that Bikram Choudhury synthesized from परंपरागत hatha yoga techniques and popularized beginning in the early 1970s.
All Bikram Yoga classes run for 90 minutes and consist of the same श्रेणी of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises.
Bikram Yoga is ideally practiced in a room heated to 105°F ( ≈ 40.6°C ) with a humidity of 40 %,.

A fern is any one or more of a group of about 12,000 species of plants belonging to the botanical group known as Pteridophyta.
नापसंद mosses, they have xylem and फ्लोएम ( making them vascular plants ).
They have stems, leaves, and roots like other vascular plants.
Ferns reproduce via spores and have neither seeds nor पुष्प.
By far the largest group of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns, but ferns as defined here ( भी called monilophytes ) include horsetails, whisk ferns, marattioid ferns, and ophioglossoid ferns.
The term pteridophyte also refers to ferns and a few other seedless vascular plants ( see classification section below ).
Ferns first appear in the fossil record 360 million years ago in the carboniferous but many of the current families और species did not appear until roughly 145 million years ago in the early cretaceous ( after flowering plants came to dominate many environments ).
Ferns are not of major economic importance, but some are grown or gathered for food, as ornamental plants, for remediating contaminated soils, and have been the subject of research for their ability to remove कुछ chemical pollutants from the air.
Some are significant weeds.
They also play a role in mythology, medicine, और art.
Flat roofs in Israel
Flat roof in Los Angeles
A flat roof is a प्रकार of covering for a building.
In contrast to the more sloped रूप of roof, a flat छत is horizontal or nearly horizontal.
The slope of a roof is properly known as its pitch : Roofs which हैं nearly flat are known as low-pitch roofs ( as the angle of slope increases, so the pitch is said to बढ़ाएँ ).
Any sheet of material used to कवर a flat or low-pitched छत is प्रायः known as a membrane and the प्राथमिक purpose of these झिल्लियों is to waterproof the roof क्षेत्रफल.
Materials that cover flat roofs typically allow the water to run बंद from a slight inclination or camber into a gutter system.
Water from some flat roofs such as on garden sheds sometimes flows freely बंद the edge of a roof, though gutter systems are of advantage in keeping दोनो walls and foundations dry.
Gutters on smaller roofs प्रायः lead water directly onto the मैदान, or better, into a specially made soakaway.
Gutters on larger roofs प्रायः सीसे water into the rainwater drainage system of any built up area.
Occasionally flat roofs though are designed to collect water in a पूल, usually लिये aesthetic purposes, or for rainwater buffering.
Flat roofs exist all over the संसार और each क्षेत्रफल has its own tradition or preference लिये materials used.
In warmer climes जहाँ rainfall is less and freezing is unlikely to occur, many flat roofs are simply built of masonry or concrete and this is good at keeping out the heat of the sun और cheap and easy to build where timber is नहीं readily available.
In areas जहाँ the roof could become saturated by rain and leak, or where water soaked into the brickwork could freeze to बर्फ and thus lead to 'blowing ' ( breaking up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the expansion of ice as it forms ) these roofs are not उपयुक्त.
Traditionally most flat roofs in the western world make use of tar or more usually tar paper applied over छत decking to keep a building watertight.
The tar or tarpaper is in turn covered in gravel to keep the sun 's heat, UV किरणें और weather off it and helps protect it from cracking or blistering and degradation.
छत decking is usually of plywood, chipboard or OSB boards ( OSB = Oriented Strand Board, also known as स्टर्लिंग board ) of around 18mm thickness.
The tar coating is applied in one or more coats as a hot liquid, heated in a तारकोल kettle, or as sheets of tar impregnated 'paper ' glued bas and sealed together at joints by hot tar - once it has cooled, the gravel is spread evenly over it.
A main कारण for failure of these traditional roofs is ignorance or lack of maintenance where people or events cause the gravel to be moved or removed from the tar or tarpaper waterproofing, thus exposing it to weather and सूर्य whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over time and eventually water gets in.
Tarpaper is usually a 'paper ' or fibre material soaked or impregnated in तारकोल.
As बजरी can not protect tarpaper surfaces where वे rise vertically from the roof such as on parapet walls or upstands, tarpaper variants are produced with fine gravel लागू to the hot tar during the process of manufacture such that a permanent layer of बजरी is stuck to it in अनुक्रम to give it ongoing सुरक्षा.
Tarpapers vary in quality as does the workmanship and training of those applying it to produce more or less successful results.
In some micro climates or shaded areas these rather 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can last well in संबंध to the cost of materials purchase and cost of laying them, however the cost of modern membranes such as EPDM has come down over recent सालो to make them more and more affordable.
There are now more firms supplying modern alternatives and there is generally a growing awareness of उनके performance and availability.
If a leak does occur on a flat roof तब damage often goes unnoticed for long periods of time दौरान which water penetrates and soaks the decking and any insulation and/or structure beneath it.
This can सीसे to expensive क्षति from the rot which often develops and if left can weaken the roof structure.
There are also various health risks to लोगों and animals श्वास the mould spores : the severity of this health risk remains a debated point.
One problem with maintaining flat roofs is that if water does penetrate the barrier covering ( be it traditional or a modern membrane ) it can travel a long way before causing visible damage or leaking into a building जहाँ it can be देखी.
Thus it is not easy to see जहाँ it is leaking in order to मरम्मत it.
Once underlying roof decking is soaked it often sags causing a further संग्रहण or puddling of जल in that area and the प्रॉब्लम worsens.
a CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed compact डिस्क which contains data.
the name is an acronym which stands for `` Compact डिस्क Read-only memory ``.
Computers can पढ़ा CD-ROMs, but can not write on them.
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute कंप्यूटर software, including वीडियो games and multimedia applications, though any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
कुछ CDs, called enhanced CDs, थाम both computer data and audio with the latter capable of being played on a CD player, while data ( ऐसे as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
The Yellow किताब is the technical standard that defines the format of cd-roms.
One of a set of color-bound books कि contain the technical specifications for all CD formats, the Yellow Book, created by Sony and Philips, was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio.
It adapted the format to hold any form of data.
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ), ( born 31 जुलाई 1965 ), pen नाम J. K. Rowling, is a British novelist, best known as the author of the Harry Potter fantasy series.
The Potter books have gained worldwide attention, won multiple awards, और sold more than 400 million copies.
They have become the best-selling book series in history, and been the basis for a series of films which has become the highest-grossing film series in history.
Rowling had overall approval on the scripts as well as maintaining creative control by serving as a producer on the final instalment.
Born in Yate, Gloucestershire, Rowling was working as a researcher and bilingual secretary for Amnesty अंतरराष्ट्रीय when she conceived the idea for the Harry Potter series on a delayed train from Manchester to London in 1990.
The seven-year period that followed entailed the death of her mother, divorce from her first husband and poverty until Rowling समाप्त the first novel in the series, Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone ( 1997 ).
रोलिंग subsequently published 6 sequels—the last, हैरी Potter and the Deathly hallows ( 2007 ) —as खूब as 3 supplements to the series.
In 2012, रोलिंग parted with her agency and resumed writing in the form of a tragicomedy novel aimed at adult readership, entitled The Casual Vacancy.
Rowling has said she is currently working on two books—one aimed for adults, the other for children younger than the Harry Potter audience, and she expects the latter to be published first.
रोलिंग has led a `` rags to riches `` life story, in which she progressed इससे living on state benefits to multi-millionaire status within five years.
She is the United Kingdom 's best-selling author since records began, with sales in excess of £238m.
The 2008 संडे Times Rich List estimated Rowling 's fortune at £560 million ( $ 798 million ), रैंकिंग उसके as the twelfth richest woman in the United Kingdom.
Forbes ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth most powerful celebrity of 2007, and TIME magazine named her as a runner-up for इसके 2007 Person of the Year, noting the social, moral, and political inspiration she has given her fans.
In October 2010, रोलिंग was named the `` Most Influential स्त्री in Britain '' by leading magazine editors.
She has become a notable philanthropist, supporting such charities as Comic Relief, One Parent Families, Multiple Sclerosis Society of Great Britain and Lumos ( formerly the Children 's High Level Group ).
Auburndale is a city in Polk County, Florida, United States.
The population was 11,032 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
