It is part of the Lakeland – Winter Haven Metropolitan Statistical क्षेत्रफल.
Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as seen from orbit दौरान Expedition 7 of the International स्पेस Station.
The eye, eyewall, and surrounding rainbands, characteristics of tropical cyclones, are clearly visible in this view इससे space.
A तीव्र cyclone is a storm system characterized by a low-pressure center surrounded by a spiral arrangement of thunderstorms that produce strong winds and heavy rain.
Tropical cyclones strengthen when जल evaporated from the ocean is released as the saturated एयर उदय, resulting in condensation of water वाष्प contained in the moist air.
They are fueled by a different heat mechanism than other cyclonic windstorms such as nor'easters, European windstorms, and polar lows.
The characteristic कि separates tropical cyclones from other cyclonic systems is that at any height in the atmosphere, the center of a tropical cyclone will be warmer than its surroundings ; a phenomenon called `` warm core `` storm systems.
The term `` tropical '' refers both to the geographical origin of these systems, which usually form in tropical regions of the globe, and to their formation in मेरीटाइम tropical air masses.
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such storms ' cyclonic nature, with counterclockwise wind flow in the उत्तरी Hemisphere and clockwise wind flow in the Southern गोलार्ध.
The opposite direction of the wind flow is a परिणाम of the Coriolis force.
Depending on its location and strength, a tropical cyclone is referred to by names such as hurricane (, ), typhoon ( ), tropical storm, cyclonic तूफ़ान, tropical depression, and simply cyclone.
While tropical cyclones can produce अत्यधिक शक्तिशाली winds and torrential rain, they are also able to produce high लहरें, damaging storm surge, and tornadoes.
They develop over large bodies of warm water, और lose their strength if they move over land due to increased surface friction and loss of the गरम समंदर as an energy source.
This is why coastal regions can receive significant damage from a tropical cyclone, while inland regions are relatively safe from receiving strong winds.
Heavy rains, however, can produce significant flooding inland, and storm surges can produce extensive coastal flooding up to from the coastline.
Although their effects on human populations can be विनाशकारी, tropical cyclones can relieve drought conditions.
They also carry heat उर्जा away इससे the tropics और transport it toward temperate latitudes, which makes them an important part of the global वायुमंडलीय circulation यांत्रिकी.
As a result, तीव्र cyclones help to maintain equilibrium in the Earth 's troposphere, and to maintain a relatively stable and warm temperature worldwide.
Many tropical cyclones develop when the atmospheric शर्तें around a weak disturbance in the atmosphere are favorable.
The background पर्यावरण is modulated by climatological cycles and patterns such as the Madden-Julian oscillation, El Niño-Southern Oscillation, and the Atlantic multidecadal oscillation.
Others form when other types of cyclones acquire तीव्र विशेषताएँ.
Tropical प्रणालियों are then moved by steering हवाएँ in the troposphere ; if the conditions remain favorable, the tropical disturbance intensifies, and can even develop an eye.
On the other end of the spectrum, if the शर्तें around the system deteriorate or the tropical cyclone makes landfall, the system weakens and eventually dissipates.
It is not possible to artificially induce the dissipation of these systems with current technology.
Kirk Douglas ( born issur Danielovitch, ; December 9, 1916 ) is an American stage and film कर्ता, film producer and author.
His popular films include आउट of the Past ( 1947 ), Champion ( 1949 ), Ace in the Hole ( 1951 ), The ख़राब and the Beautiful ( 1952 ), 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea ( 1954 ), Lust for Life ( 1956 ), Paths of Glory ( 1957 ), Gunfight at the O.K. Corral ( 1957 ), The Vikings ( 1958 ), Spartacus ( 1960 ), Lonely Are the वीर ( 1962 ), Seven Days in May ( 1964 ), The Heroes of telemark ( 1965 ) and Tough Guys ( 1986 ).
He is No.17 on the American फिल्मी Institute 's list of the greatest male American screen महापुरूष of सब time, making him the highest-ranked जीना person on the list.
In 1996, he received the Academy Honorary Award `` for 50 years as a creative and moral force in the motion picture community. ''
He is एक of the last surviving actors from Hollywood 's `` golden age ''.
Robert Clark `` Bob '' Seger ( born May 6, 1945 ) is an American rock and roll singer-songwriter, guitarist and pianist.
As a locally successful Detroit-area artist, he performed and recorded as bob Seger और the Last Heard and Bob Seger System throughout the 1960s.
By the early 1970s, he had dropped the `` System '' from उसके recordings and continued to strive for broader success with other various bands.
In 1973, he put साथ The Silver Bullet Band, a group of detroit-area musicians, with whom he became most successful on the national level with the album Live Bullet, अंकित live with the Silver गोली Band in 1975 at cobo Hall in डेट्रॉयट, Michigan.
In 1976, he achieved a national breakout with the studio album रात्रि चालें.
On his स्टुडियो albums, he also worked extensively with the Alabama-based Muscle Shoals Rhythm Section, which appeared on several of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums.
A roots rocker with a classic raspy, shouting voice, Seger wrote and recorded songs that dealt with love, women, blue-collar विषयवस्तु and was an exemplar of heartland rock.
Seger रै recorded many hits, including `` Night Moves, '' `` Turn the पेज, '' `` we 've मिला Tonight, '' `` विरूद्ध the Wind, '' and Shakedown that was written for Beverly Hills Cop II and `` Like a Rock, '' and also co-wrote the ईगल्स ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight. ''
His iconic recording of `` Old समय Rock and Roll `` was नामित one of the Songs of the Century in 2001.
साथ a career spanning five decades, Seger continues to perform and record today.
Seger was inducted into the Rock and Roll हॉल of Fame in 2004 and the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 2012.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States, serving from 1969 to 1974, when he became the only president to resign the office.
निक्सन had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and senator from California and as the 36th Vice President of the United राज्य from 1953 to 1961.
Nixon was born in Yorba Linda, California.
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 और Duke University School of Law in 1937, returning to California to practice law.
He and his बीवी, Pat Nixon, moved to Washington to work for the federal government in 1942.
He subsequently served in the United States Navy during World War II.
Nixon was elected in California to the House of Representatives in 1946 and to the सीनेट in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger hiss मामला established his प्रतिष्ठा as a leading anti-communist, and elevated him to national prominence.
He was the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower, the Republican Party presidential nominee in the 1952 election.
Nixon served for eight years as vice president.
He waged an unsuccessful presidential अभियान in 1960, narrowly losing to John F. कैनेडी, and lost a रेस for Governor of California in 1962.
In 1968, he ran again for the presidency and was elected.
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973.
Nixon 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 खोली diplomatic संबंध between the two nations, and he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic मिसाइल Treaty with the सोवियत संघ the same year.
Domestically, his administration generally embraced policies that transferred power from Washington to the राज्य.
Among other things, he launched initiatives to fight cancer and illegal drugs, imposed wage and price controls, enforced desegregation of some Southern schools, and established the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning with Apollo 11, he scaled back manned space exploration.
He was re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
Nixon 's second term saw an अरब oil embargo, the resignation of his vice president, Spiro Agnew, and a continuing series of खुलासे about the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by members of the administration.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of his political support, और on August 9, 1974, he resigned in the face of almost certain impeachment and removal from office.
After his resignation, he controversially received a pardon जारी by his successor, Gerald Ford.
In retirement, निक्सन 's work as an elder statesman, authoring several किताबे and undertaking many विदेशी trips, helped to rehabilitate his public image.
He suffered a debilitating stroke on अप्रैल 18, 1994, and died four days later at the age of 81.
{ { Infobox Senator
The Dominican Republic annexation treaty caused bitter contention between President Grant and Sen. Sumner.
Brady 1869 ] ]
Sen. Sumner, opposed to American imperialism in the Caribbean and fearful that annexation would lead to the conquest of the neighboring black republic of Haiti, became convinced that corruption lay behind the treaty, और that men close to the president shared in the corruption.
As chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, sen. Sumner initially withheld उसके opinion on the treaty on January 18, 1870.
Sen. Sumner had been leaked information from Assistant Secretary of State, Bancroft Davis, कि U.S. Naval ships were being used to protect President Báez.
Sen. Sumner 's committee voted against annexation and at Sen. Sumner’s suggestion and quite possibly to save the party from an ugly fight or the president from embarrassment, the Senate held its बहस of the treaty behind closed doors in executive session.
President Grant persisted and sent messages to Congress in favor of annexation on March 14, 1870, and May 31, 1870.
In closed session, Sen. Sumner spoke out against the treaty ; warnng that there would be difficulty with the foreign nationals, noting the chronic विद्रोह that took place on the द्वीप, and the risk that the independence of हैती, recognized by the United States in 1862, would be lost.
Sumner stated कि Grant 's use of the U.S. Navy as a protectorate was a violation of International law and unconstitutional.
Finally, on जून 30, 1870 the treaty was voted on by the Senate and failed to gain the required 2/3 majority for treaty passage.
The following day, President ग्रान्ट, feeling betrayed by Sen. Sumner, retaliated by ordering the dismissal of Sumner’s close friend J. lothrop Motley, Ambassador to Britain.
By autumn, Sumner 's personal hostility to the president was public knowledge, and he blamed the Secretary of State for failing to have resigned, rather than let Grant have his way.
The two मेन, friends until then, cooled into bitter enemies.
In December, 1870, still fearful that Grant meant to acquire Santo Domingo somehow, Sumner gave a fiercely critical speech accusing the president of usurpation and Babcock of unethical conduct.
Already, President Grant, supported by his सचिव of State Hamilton Fish, had initiated a अभियान to depose Sumner from the chairmanship of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee.
Although Sumner stated he was an `` Administration man '', in addition to having stopped Grant 's Dominican Republic treaty attempt, Sumner had defeated Grant 's full repeal of the Tenure of Office Act, अवरोधित Grant 's nomination of Alexander Stewart to U.S. Secretary of Treasury, and been a constant harassing force pushing Reconstruction policies faster than Grant had been willing to go.
Grant resented Sumner 's superiority of manner, as well.
Told once कि Sumner did not believe in the Bible, the president is supposed to have said that he was not surprised : `` he did n't write it. ''
As the rift between Grant and Sumner increased, sumner’s health began to decline.
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on March 4, 1871, सीनेटरों affiliated with President Grant, known as ‘’New Radicals’’ voted to oust Sen. Sumner from the Senate Foreign Relations Committee chairmanship.
Business ethics ( also corporate ethics ) is a form of applied ethics or professional ethics that examines ethical principles and moral or ethical problems that उठता in a business environment.
It applies to all aspects of business conduct and is relevant to the conduct of individuals and entire संगठन.
Business ethics has both normative and descriptive dimensions.
As a corporate practice and a career specialization, the field is primarily normative.
Academics attempting to समझे business behavior employ descriptive methods.
The दायरा and quantity of business ethical issues reflects the interaction of profit-maximizing behavior with non-economic concerns.
Interest in business ethics accelerated dramatically during the 1980s और 1990s, both within major corporations and within academia.
For उदाहरण, आज most major corporations promote उनके commitment to non-economic values under headings such as ethics codes and social responsibility charters.
Adam स्मिथ कहा, `` People of the same trade seldom meet together, even for merriment and diversion, but the conversation ends in a conspiracy against the public, or in some contrivance to raise prices. ''
Governments use laws and regulations to point कारोबार behavior in what they perceive to be beneficial दिशानिर्देश.
Ethics implicitly regulates areas और details of behavior that lie beyond governmental कंट्रोल.
The emergence of large corporations with limited relationships and sensitivity to the communities in which they operate accelerated the development of formal आचार regimes.
A burn is a type of injury to flesh or skin caused by heat, electricity, chemicals, friction, or radiation.
Most burns affect only the superficial skin ( known as superficial or first degree ) or extend into the deeper skin but do not involve the full thickness of the skin ( known as partial thickness or second उपाधि ).
Rarely all layers of the skin or deeper tissues, such as मांसपेशी or bone can be injured in which case the burn is either full thickness ( तीसरा degree ) or fourth degree.
the treatment required depends on the severity of the burn.
Superficial burns संभवतः managed with little more than सरल pain killers while major burns may require prolonged treatment in specialized burn centers.
Cooling साथ tap water may aid पीड़ा and decrease damage however if exposure is prolonged it may result in low देह temperature.
Partial मोटाई burns may require cleaning साथ साबुन and water followed by dressings.
Blisters should typically be बाएँ unbroken.
Full thickness burns usually आवश्यकता surgical treatments such as skin grafting and extensive burns often require large amount of intravenous fluids.
The सबसे common complications of burns are related to infection.
While large burns can be fatal, modern treatments developed in the last 50 years have significantly improved the outcomes, especially in children and young adults.
Globally about 11 million people seek medical treatment और 300,000 people die from burns.
In the United States, of those admitted to a burn center, approximately 4 % die from their injuries.
The long term निष्कर्ष is primarily related to the size of burn and the age of the person effected.
The Atlantic Ocean, not including Arctic and Antarctic regions
This video was taken by the crew of Expedition 29 on board the ISS.
The pass starts from just north-east of the Island of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड over the North Atlantic Ocean to सेंट्रल Africa, over South Sudan.
The Atlantic Ocean is the second-largest of the world 's oceanic divisions.
With a total area of about, it covers approximately 20 percent of the Earth 's surface और about 29 percent of its water surface area.
The first part of its name refers to Atlas of Greek mythology, making the Atlantic the `` Sea of Atlas ''.
the oldest known mention of `` Atlantic '' is in The histories of Herodotus around 450 bc ( Hdt. 1.202.4 ) : Atlantis thalassa ( Greek : Ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; English : Sea of Atlas ).
The term Ethiopic Ocean, derived from Ethiopia, was applied to the southern अटलांटिक as late as the mid-19th century.
Before Europeans discovered other oceans, the term `` ocean '' itself was synonymous with the waters beyond the Strait of Gibraltar that we अभी know as the Atlantic.
The early Greeks believed this समंदर to be a gigantic river encircling the world.
The Atlantic Ocean occupies an elongated, S-shaped basin extending longitudinally between Eurasia and Africa to the east, and the Americas to the west.
As one component of the interconnected global ocean, it is कनेक्ट in the north to the Arctic Ocean ( which is sometimes माना a sea of the Atlantic ), to the Pacific Ocean in the southwest, the Indian Ocean in the southeast, और the Southern Ocean in the south.
( Other definitions describe the Atlantic as extending southward to Antarctica. )
The equator subdivides it into the North Atlantic समंदर and South Atlantic Ocean.
Due to their long-term persistence, and the need for a unique identifier in issuing forecasts and चेतावनियाँ, tropical cyclones and subtropical cyclones are given names according to policy ( देखिए Tropical चक्रवात naming ).
The following are lists from which these तीव्र and subtropical cyclone names are derived.
White लाइट is dispersed by a prism into the colors of the optical spectrum.
The visible spectrum is the portion of the electromagnetic spectrum that is visible to ( can be detected by ) the human eye.
इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation in this दायरा of wavelengths is called visible लाइट or बस light.
A typical इंसान eye will respond to wavelengths from about 390 to 700 nm.
In शर्तें of frequency, this corresponds to a बैंड in the vicinity of 430–790 thz.
A light-adapted eye generally has इसके maximum sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 THz ), in the green region of the optical वर्णक्रम ( see : दीप्ति function ).
The वर्णक्रम does not, however, contain all the colors that the human eyes and brain can distinguish.
Unsaturated colors such as pink, or purple variations such as magenta, are अनुपस्थित, for example, because they can be made only by a mix of multiple wavelengths.
Colors containing तभी one wavelength are also called pure colors.
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` optical window ``, the region of the electromagnetic spectrum which allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere.
An example of this phenomenon is that clean air scatters blue light more than red wavelengths, और so the midday आसमान appears blue.
The optical खिड़की is also called the visible window because it overlaps the human visible response spectrum.
The near infrared ( NIR ) window lies just out of the human vision, as well as the मीडियम Wavelength IR ( MWIR ) window and the Long Wavelength or Far Infrared ( LWIR or FIR ) window though other animals may experience them.
अनेक species can see light with बारंबारता outside the `` visible spectrum, '' which is defined in terms of human vision.
Bees and many other insects can detect ultraviolet लाइट, which helps them find nectar in flowers.
Plant species कि depend on insect pollination may owe reproductive success to their appearance in ultraviolet लाइट, rather than how colorful they appear to humans.
Birds, too, can see into the ultraviolet ( 300–400 nm ), and कुछ have sex-dependent markings on their plumage that are visible only in the ultraviolet range.
Many animals that can see into the ultraviolet range, however, can not see red light or any other reddish wavelengths.
Bees ' visible spectrum ends at about 590nm, just before the नारंगी wavelengths start.
Birds, however, can see some red wavelengths, लकिन not as many as humans.
Zebras ( or ) are several species of African equids ( horse family ) united by their distinctive black and white stripes.
Their stripes come in different patterns, unique to each व्यक्तिगत.
They are generally social animals that live in छोटी harems to large herds.
Unlike their closest relatives, horses and asses, zebras have never been truly domesticated.
There are three species of zebras : the plains zebra, the Grévy 's zebra and the mountain zebra.
the plains zebra and the mountain zebra belong to the subgenus Hippotigris, but Grévy 's zebra is the एकमात्र species of subgenus Dolichohippus.
The latter resembles an ass, to which it is closely related, while the former two are more horse-like.
All three belong to the genus Equus, along with other living equids.
The unique stripes of zebras make them one of the animals most familiar to people.
They occur in a variety of habitats, such as grasslands, savannas, woodlands, thorny scrublands, mountains, और coastal hills.
However, various anthropogenic factors have had a severe impact on जेब्रा populations, in particular hunting for skins and habitat destruction.
Grévy 's zebra and the mountain जेब्रा are endangered.
While plains zebras are much more plentiful, एक subspecies, the quagga, became extinct in the late 19th century – though there is currently a योजना, called the Quagga Project, that aims to breed zebras that are phenotypically समान to the quagga in a process called breeding back.
बैरी White, born Barry Eugene Carter ( – ), was an अमरीकी composer and singer-songwriter.
a two-time Grammy Award -winner ज्ञात for उसके distinctive बास voice and romantic image, White 's greatest success came in the 1970s as a solo singer and with the Love Unlimited Orchestra, crafting many enduring soul, funk, and डिस्को गीतों such as his two biggest hits, `` You 're the First, the Last, My Everything `` and `` Ca n't Get Enough of Your Love, Babe. ''
Along with Isaac Hayes, White is considered by Allmusic.com as a पायोनियर of disco music in the early 1970s.
During the course of his करियर in the music business, White achieved 106 gold albums विश्वव्यापी, 41 of which also attained platinum status.
White had 20 gold and 10 platinum singles, with worldwide sales in excess of 100 million, according to critics Ed होगन and Wade Kergan.
His influences included Rev. James Cleveland, Ray Charles, Aretha Franklin प्लस Motown artists The supremes, The Four Tops and Marvin Gaye.
Angelina Jolie (, born Angelina Jolie Voight ; June 4, 1975 ) is an American actress, film director, and screenwriter.
She has received an Academy Award, two Screen Actors Guild Awards, and three सुनहरी ग्लोब Awards, and was named Hollywood 's highest-paid actress by Forbes in 2009 और 2011.
जोली promotes humanitarian causes, और is noted for her work with refugees as a Special Envoy and former Goodwill Ambassador for the United Nations ऊँची Commissioner for शरणार्थियों ( UNHCR ).
वो has प्रायः been cited as the world 's `` most खूबसूरत '' woman, a title for which she has received substantial media attention.
Jolie made her screen debut as a child alongside उसके father Jon Voight in Lookin ' to Get Out ( 1982 ), but her film career began in earnest a दशक later with the low-budget production Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ).
Her first leading role in a major film was in the cyber-thriller Hackers ( 1995 ).
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical television films George Wallace ( 1997 ) and Gia ( 1998 ), and won an अकादमी Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the drama Girl, बाधित ( 1999 ).
Jolie achieved wide कीर्ति after उसके portrayal of video game heroine Lara Croft in Lara Croft : Tomb Raider ( 2001 ), and established herself among the highest-paid actresses in Hollywood with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ).
She continued her action star career साथ Mr. & Mrs. Smith ( 2005 ) and Wanted ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated वाणिज्यिक successes to date—and received further critical acclaim for her प्रदर्शन in the dramas A Mighty Heart ( 2007 ) and Changeling ( 2008 ), which earned her a नामांकन for an Academy Award for Best Actress.
Jolie made her directorial debut with the wartime नाटक In the Land of रक्त and Honey ( 2011 ).
Divorced from actors जॉनी Lee Miller and Billy bob Thornton, Jolie now जीवनदान with कर्ता Brad Pitt, in a relationship notable for fervent media attention.
Jolie and pitt have three biological children and three adopted children.
A natural arch उत्पादित by the erosion of differentially weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz, Jordan
Erosion is the process by which soil and rock are removed from the Earth 's surface by exogenetic processes such as wind or water flow, and then transported and deposited in other locations.
While erosion is a natural process, human activities have increased by 10-40 times the rate at which erosion is occurring globally.
Excessive erosion causes problems such as मरुस्थलीकरण, decreases in agricultural productivity due to land degradation, sedimentation of waterways, and ecological collapse due to loss of the nutrient rich upper soil layers.
Water and wind erosion are now the दो primary causes of land degradation ; combined, they are responsible लिये 84 % of degraded acreage, making excessive erosion एक of the most significant global पर्यावरणीय समस्याएं.
Industrial agriculture, deforestation, roads, anthropogenic जलवायु change and शहरी sprawl are amongst the most significant human activities in regard to their effect on stimulating erosion.
However, वहीँ हैं many उपलब्धियाँ alternative land use practices that can curtail or सीमा erosion, such as terrace -building, no-till agriculture, and revegetation of denuded soils.
Jersey shore is an American reality television series which ran on MTV from December 3, 2009 to December 20, 2012 in the United States.
The series follows the lives of eight housemates spending उनके गर्मियाँ at the Jersey Shore in the U.S. state of New Jersey.
Season 2 followed the cast escaping the cold northeast winter to Miami Beach, with Season 3 returning to the Jersey Shore.
The fourth ऋतु, filmed in Italy, premiered on August 4, 2011.
The show returned for a पांचवां season, at Seaside Heights on January 5, 2012.
The fifth ऋतु finale aired on March 15, 2012.
On कूच 19, 2012, एमटीवी confirmed that the series would return for their sixth season.
On August 30, 2012, MTV announced that the series will end after the sixth season, जिससे premiered on October 4.
The series finale aired on December 20, 2012.
The दिखाएँ debuted amid large amounts of controversy regarding the use of the words `` Guido / Guidette, '' portrayals of Italian-American stereotypes, and scrutiny from locals because the cast members were not residents of the area.
The series garnered record ratings for MTV, making it the network 's most viewed series telecast ever.
the series ' डाल have also been credited with introducing unique lexicon and phrases into American popular culture.
The University of Chicago and the University of Oklahoma are among the educational institutions that have had classes or conferences about the show.
In 2010, the cast of जर्सी Shore was named on Barbara Walters ' 10 सबसे Fascinating People list, and the series has since been exported to dozens of countries worldwide.
There are several remakes of the show in अन्य countries, with दो set in the United Kingdom ; the well ज्ञात Geordie Shore, set in Newcastle upon Tyne, England.
The other is The Valleys, the Welsh equivalent, which is filmed and set in कार्डिफ.
The only अन्य official remake of the दिखाएँ is Gandía Shore, set in Gandía, Spain.
right
United States territory is any extent of region under the jurisdiction of the federal सरकारी of the United States, सहित सब waters ( around islands or continental tracts ) and all U.S. Naval vessels.
The United States has traditionally proclaimed the sovereign rights for exploring, exploiting, conserving, and managing इसके territory.
This extent of territory is all the area belonging to, and अंतर्गत the डोमिनियन of, the United States federal government ( जिससे includes tracts lying at a distance from the देश ) for administrative and अन्य purposes.
The United States total territory includes a subset of political divisions.
the U.S. government is a government with delegated शक्तियां under the United States Constitution.
`` The powers not delegated to the United States by the Constitution, nor prohibited by it to the States, हैं reserved to the States respectively, or to the people '' by the दसवाँ Amendment.
Terminator 3 : Rise of the Machines ( commonly abbreviated as T3 ) is a 2003 science fiction action film directed by Jonathan Mostow and starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken.
It is the second sequel to The Terminator ( 1984 ).
After Skynet fails to kill Sarah Connor before her son is born and to kill John himself as a child, it भेजना back another Terminator, the T-X, in an attempt to wipe out as many Resistance officers as possible.
This includes John 's भविष्य wife, but not John himself as his whereabouts are unknown to Skynet.
John 's life is placed in danger when the T-X accidentally finds him.
A cord of wood
The cord is a unit of measure of dry volume used in Canada और the United राज्य to measure firewood and pulpwood.
A cord is the amount of लकडी that, when `` ranked and खूब stowed '' ( arranged so pieces are aligned, समानांतर, touching and compact ), occupies a आवाज़ of.
This corresponds to a well stacked woodpile high, long, and deep ; or any other arrangement of linear measurements that yields the same volume.
The नाम cord probably comes from the use of a cord or string to measure it.
The, is an 8-bit handheld video खेल device विकसित and manufactured by Nintendo.
It was released in जापानी on, in North America in, and in Europe on.
It is the first handheld console in the Game Boy line, and was created by Gunpei Yokoi and Nintendo Research & विकास 1 —the same staff who had designed the Game & Watch series as well as several लोकप्रिय games for the Nintendo Entertainment System.
Redesigned versions were released in 1996 and 1998, in the form of खेल लड़के Pocket, and खेल Boy Light ( Japan only ), respectively.
The Game Boy is Nintendo 's second handheld system following the Game & Watch series introduced in, and it combined features from both the निन्टेंडो Entertainment System and Game & देखें.
It was originally bundled with the puzzle game Tetris.
As part of the चौथी generation of gaming, the Game लड़के competed with the Sega Game Gear, Atari लिंक्स, और the TurboExpress.
Despite these other technologically superior हैंडहेल्ड consoles, the Game Boy was a tremendous success.
The Game Boy and its successor, the Game Boy रंग, have both combined sold 118.69 million units worldwide.
Upon its release in the संयुक्त States, it sold its संपूर्ण shipment of one million units within weeks.
The World Trade Center is a complex of buildings under construction in Lower मैनहटन, New York City, United States, replacing an earlier complex of seven buildings with the same name on the same साईट.
The original World व्यापार बीच featured landmark twin मीनारें, which opened on April 4, 1973 and were नष्ट in the September 11 attacks of 2001, along with 7 World Trade बीच.
The अन्य buildings in the complex were damaged in the attacks, और their ruins यहूद eventually demolished.
the site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers and a memorial to those killed in the attacks.
, only one skyscraper has been completed ; the other four हैं expected to be completed पहले 2020.
One World Trade Center will be the lead building for the new complex, reaching more than 100 stories at its completion.
It became the tallest building in New York City on April 30, 2012, and is expected to be finished by 2013.
A sixth tower is awaiting confirmation.
At the time of their completion, the original 1 World Trade Center ( the North Tower ) and 2 World Trade Center ( the South Tower ), known collectively as the `` Twin Towers '', were the tallest buildings in the world.
The other buildings included 3 WTC ( the Marriott World Trade Center ), 4 WTC, 5 WTC, 6 WTC, and 7 WTC.
All of these buildings were built between 1975 and 1985.
The लागत for the construction was $ 400 million ( $ in dollars ).
The complex was located in the heart of New York City 's downtown financial district and contained 13.4 million square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office स्पेस.
The World Trade Center experienced a fire on, 1975, a bombing on, 1993 and a robbery on, 1998.
In 1998, the Port Authority decided to privatize the World व्यापार Center, leasing the buildings to a private company to मैनेज, and awarded the पट्टे to Silverstein Properties in.
On the morning of September 11, 2001, Al-Qaeda -affiliated hijackers flew two Boeing 767 jets into the complex, one into each tower, in a coordinated terrorist attack.
After burning for 56 minutes, the South मीनार ( 2 ) collapsed, followed a half-hour बाद by the North Tower ( 1 ), साथ the attacks on the World Trade Center resulting in 2,753 deaths.
गिरना debris from the towers, combined with fires कि the debris initiated in several surrounding buildings, led to the partial or complete collapse of all the other buildings in the complex and caused catastrophic damage to ten अन्य विशाल structures in the surrounding area.
The प्रक्रम of cleanup and recovery at the संसार Trade Center साईट took eight months.
Over the following years, plans for a rebuilt World Trade Center took form.
The first new building at the site was 7 World Trade Center, which opened in.
The Lower Manhattan Development Corporation ( LMDC ), established in to oversee the rebuilding process, organized competitions to select a साईट plan और memorial design.
Memory Foundations, designed by Daniel Libeskind, थी selected as the master plan, but this went through substantial changes in design.
The नई World Trade Center complex will include One World Trade बीच, three other high-rise office towers, and the National September 11 Memorial & Museum.
San Gabriel Mountains
San Bernardino Mountains, with Mt. San Gorgonio in the foreground and Big भालू झील in the background.
The Transverse Ranges are a group of mountain ranges of southern California, in the Pacific Coast Ranges physiographic region in North America.
The Transverse Ranges begin at the southern end of the California coast Ranges और lie between Santa बारबरा and San Diego काउंटी.
They derive the name Transverse सीमाएँ due to their East-West orientation, making them transverse to the general North-South orientation of most of California 's coastal mountains.
Periodic table with electron shells
An electron shell may be thought of as an orbit followed by electrons around an atom 's nucleus.
the closest shell to the nucleus is called the `` 1 shell '' ( also called `` K shell '' ), followed by the `` 2 shell '' ( or `` l shell '' ), then the `` 3 shell '' ( or `` M shell '' ), and so on farther and farther from the केंद्रक.
The shell letters K, L, M,..., used in the x-ray notation, हैं alphabetical.
प्रत्येक शेल can contain तभी a fixed number of electrons : the 1st shell can hold up to two electrons, the 2nd shell can hold up to eight electrons, the 3rd shell can hold up to 18, and 4th shell can hold up to 32 and so on.
चूंकि electrons are electrically attracted to the nucleus, an atom 's electrons will generally occupy outer shells only if the more inner shells have already been completely filled by अन्य electrons.
However, this is not a सख्त requirement : Atoms may have two or even three incomplete outer shells.
( See Madelung rule for more details. )
For an explanation of why electrons exist in these शेल see electron configuration.
The electrons in the outermost occupied shell ( or shells ) determine the chemical properties of the atom ; it is पुकारा the valence shell.
Each shell consists of one or more subshells, and each subshell consists of one or more परमाणु orbitals.
Vickie Lynn Marshall ( née Hogan ; November 28, 1967 – February 8, 2007 ), known by her moniker Anna निकोल Smith, was an American model, actress, and टेलीविज़न personality.
Smith first gained popularity in Playboy, becoming the 1993 Playmate of the Year.
She modeled for clothing companies, including Guess jeans and Lane Bryant.
Smith dropped out of high school and was married in 1985.
Her highly publicized second marriage to oil business mogul, J. Howard Marshall, 62 years her senior, resulted in speculation that she शादीशुदा the octogenarian for his money, which she denied.
following Marshall 's death, Smith began a lengthy विधिक battle over a share of his estate.
Her मामला, मार्शल v. Marshall, reached the U.S. Supreme Court on a सवाल of federal jurisdiction, and again on a question of bankruptcy court authority ( now called Stern v. Marshall ).
Smith died on February 8, 2007 in a Hollywood, Florida hotel room as a result of an overdose of prescription drugs.
भीतर the final six months of her life, Smith was the focus of a renewed press coverage surrounding the death of her son, डेनियल, and the paternity and custody battle over उसके newborn daughter, dannielynn.
The is one denomination of Japanese yen.
The current design was first minted in 1959 using Japanese characters known as the `` new script ``, and were also minted from 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' Japanese characters.
Five-yen सिक्के तिथि to 1870 ( when, due to the much higher value of the yen, they were minted in gold ).
The front of the coin depicts a rice plant growing out of the water, with `` five yen '' written in कांजी ; the back is stamped with `` Japan '' and the year of issue, भी in kanji, separated by sprouts of a पेड़.
The three graphic elements of the coin represent agriculture and fisheries, the key तत्व of the Japanese first-sector economy.
Around a hole, there is a gear that represents industry.
It is the only Japanese coin in circulation to lack Arabic numerals on either face.
TLC is an American girl group whose repertoire spanned R & B, hip hop, आत्मा, funk, and new jack swing.
originally consisting of singer Tionne `` T-Boz '' Watkins, rapper Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes and singer Rozonda `` Chilli '' Thomas, the group मिला unprecedented success in the 1990s जबकि also enduring a series of spats with the law, each other, and the group 's record label.
Initially, TLC achieved commercial success following the release of their debut album Ooooooohhh...
On the TLC टिप, which sold 6 million copies worldwide.
However, it was their second album, CrazySexyCool, that catapulted the group to superstar औकात.
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified diamond by the RIAA — a first for a female समूह, और eventually sold 23 लाख copies विश्वव्यापी.
Five years later, the group released their third album FanMail, which became the group 's first album to debut at number one and sold more than 11 million copies worldwide.
The subsequent दौरे following FanMails रिलीज became the highest grossing tour of all time by a female band.
In 2002, Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes died in a car accident in Honduras.
Seven months later, T-Boz and Chilli released the group 's fourth album 3D, which बेची 2 million नक़ल worldwide, it featured unreleased vocals from Left Eye.
Billboard magazine ranked TLC as one of the greatest musical trios.
Between 1992 and 2003, the band accumulated ten शीर्ष ten singles, four number one singles, four multi-platinum albums, and four Grammy Awards.
at the end of 1999, TLC was ranked as the seventh most कामयाब act of the 1990s by बिलबोर्ड.
In 2008, the group was inducted into the All Time Hot 100 Artist Hall of Fame by the same magazine, at 56th प्लेस.
That year it was also listed as the # 25 R & B/hip-hop artist of the preceding 25 years.
TLC has sold more than 65 million records worldwide and वे are ranked as the second best selling मादा group of सब time, and the best selling female R & B group of सब time.
In 2012, TLC ranked 12th on vh1 's 100 Greatest Women in म्यूज़िक, being ranked the number one all girl group on that list.
टार्ज़न is a 1999 American animated adventure film produced by Walt डिज़्नी Feature Animation and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
The 37th film in the Walt डिज़्नी Animated Classics, it is based on the story Tarzan of the Apes by Edgar राइस Burroughs, and is the only major motion चित्र version of the story Tarzan property to be animated.
Directed by Chris Buck and Kevin Lima with a screenplay by Tab Murphy, Bob Tzudiker, and Noni White, Tarzan features the voices of Tony Goldwyn, Minnie ड्राइवर, Glenn Close, and Rosie O'Donnell with Brian Blessed, Lance Henriksen, Wayne Knight, and Nigel Hawthorne.
It was the पिछला bona fide hit before the Disney slump of the early 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically and $ 448,191,819 worldwide, outgrossing its predecessors Hercules ( 1997 ) and mulan ( 1998 ).
at the time of इसके release, its production budget of $ 130 million बना it the सबसे expensive animated फिल्मी ever made, until topped by डिज़्नी 's own $ 140 लाख खजाना Planet in 2002.
It was also the first Disney animated feature to open at # 1 since Pocahontas.
This थी the last major box office success of the Disney Renaissance.
आयल Platform P-51 off the Brazilian coast is a semi-submersible platform.
Oil platform Mittelplate in the North sea
An oil platform, ( offshore platform or colloquially आयल rig ) is a large structure with facilities to ड्रिल wells, to extract and process आयल और natural gas, and to temporarily store product until it can be brought to shore for refining और marketing.
In many cases, the मंच contains facilities to house the workforce as well.
Depending on the circumstances, the platform may be fixed to the ocean floor, may consist of an artificial island, or may float.
Remote subsea wells may also be कनेक्ट to a platform by flow lines and by umbilical connections.
These subsea solutions may consist of one or more subsea कुएं, or of one or more manifold centres for multiple wells.
Slaughter is the हत्या of पशु, usually that of domestic livestock for food.
The animals most commonly slaughtered for food are cattle, water buffalo ( for beef and veal ), sheep, goats ( for lamb and mutton ), pigs ( for pork ), horses ( for horse meat ), and fowl, largely chickens, turkeys, और ducks and increasingly fish from the aquaculture industry ( fish farming ).
The White House, the president 's official residence and center of the administration
Under the United States Constitution, the अध्यक्ष of the United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States.
As chief of the executive branch and सिर of the federal government as a whole, the presidency is the highest political office in the United राज्य by influence and recognition.
the president is also the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त States Armed Forces.
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the हाउस of Representatives should the Electoral College fail to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ).
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United States Constitution in 1951, no person may be elected President more than twice, and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which किसी else was elected may be elected more than once.
Upon the मौत, resignation, or removal इससे office of an incumbent President, the Vice President assumes the office.
The President must be at least 35 years of age and a `` natural born '' citizen of the United States.
This list शामिल तभी those persons who were sworn into office as president following the ratification of the United States Constitution, which took effect on March 4, 1789.
For American leaders before इस ratification, see President of the Continental Congress.
The list does not include any Acting Presidents under the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the संयुक्त States Constitution.
There have महरूम 43 लोगों sworn into office, and 44 presidencies, as Grover Cleveland served two non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals elected as president, four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison, Zachary टेलर, Warren G. Harding, and Franklin D. Roosevelt ), four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln, James A. गारफ़ील्ड, William McKinley, और John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George Washington, the first अध्यक्ष, was inaugurated in 1789 after a unanimous vote of the चुनावी College.
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841, and Franklin D. Roosevelt spent the longest with over twelve years, लकिन died shortly into his fourth पद in 1945.
He is the only president to serve more than दो शर्तें, and a constitutional amendment, affecting presidents after Harry Truman, was passed to limit the क्रमांक of times an व्यक्तिगत can be elected president.
Andrew जैक्सन, the seventh president, was the first to be elected by men of all classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed.
वारेन Harding was the first elected after women gained voting rights in 1920.
History रिकॉर्ड four presidents – John Q Adams, Rutherford B. Hayes, Benjamin Harrison and George W. Bush – who lost the popular vote but assumed office.
जॉन F. Kennedy रै महरूम the only president of Roman Catholic faith, and the current president, Barack Obama, is the first president of African descent.
Several firearms साथ detachable suppressors, from top to bottom : an Uzi, An AR-15, A Heckler & Koch USP Tactical, A Beretta 92FS, and a SIG Mosquito.
Bolt action rimfire rifle with suppressor
AWM-F sniper rifle with attached suppressor.
A suppressor, sound suppressor, or sound moderator, is a device attached to or part of the barrel of a firearm which reduces the amount of noise, और usually the amount of muzzle flash, generated by firing the weapon.
A suppressor can be used both with a firearm and with compressed air gun.
Though it is sometimes referred to as a silencer, this term is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the sound of a projectile, especially one moving faster than the speed of sound, through the air can not be eliminated.
Using a suppressor in long अलहदा shooting ( i.e. greater than 300 meters ) can lessen, or retard, the report at the moment of impact, and create the छाप of silence निकट the target.
The noise heard near the muzzle as a projectile leaves the barrel, though subdued, is not silent at all.
A suppressor is प्रायः a metal cylinder साथ internal mechanisms to reduce the ध्वनि of firing by slowing the escaping propellant gas and sometimes by reducing the velocity of the bullet.
Early suppressors were created around the शुरूआत of the 20th century by अनेक inventors.
American inventor Hiram Percy Maxim ( not to be confused with Hiram Stevens Maxim, hiram Percy 's father, and the inventor of the Maxim Machine Gun ), is credited with inventing and selling the first commercially successful models circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ).
Maxim gave his device the trademarked name Maxim Silencer.
The muffler for internal combustion engines was developed in parallel with the firearm suppressor by Maxim in the जल्दी 20th century, using many of the same techniques to provide quieter-running engines ( in many European countries automobile mufflers are still पुकारा silencers ).
The word silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in widespread use, although it has since fallen out of favor with some, especially among the firearms industry, होने replaced with the more literally accurate term sound suppressor or just suppressor, because a `` sound suppressor '' does not `` silence '' any weapon, बल्कि it eliminates muzzle flash and reduces the सोनिक pressure of a firearm discharging.
Common usage and U.S. legislative language favor the historically earlier term, silencer.
In U.S. विधि, the terms `` firearm muffler '' and `` firearm silencer '' are synonymous.
Suppressors were regularly used by एजेंटों of the United States Office of रणनीतिक Services, who favored the newly designed ऊँची मानक HDM.22 long Rifle pistol during World War II.
OSS Director William जोसेफ `` Wild Bill '' Donovan demonstrated the pistol for President फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt at the White House.
According to OSS research chief Stanley Lovell, Donovan ( an old and trusted friend of the President ) was waved into the Oval Office, where Roosevelt was dictating a letter.
While रूज़वेल्ट finished his message, Donovan turned उसके back and fired ten shots into a sandbag he had brought with him, announced what he had done and handed the smoking gun to the astonished president.
The British SOE ( Special Operations Executive ) Welrod assassination pistol with an integral suppressor was also used by the American OSS on clandestine operations in Nazi occupied Europe during the Second World War.
Beatrice `` Bea '' Arthur ( May 13, 1922 – April 25, 2009 ) was an American actress, comedienne, and सिंगर whose career spanned seven decades.
Arthur achieved fame as the character Maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms All in the परिवार and Maude, and as Dorothy Zbornak on the 1980s sitcom the Golden Girls, winning एमी पुरस्कार for both roles.
A स्टेज actress both before and after her television success, she won the Tony Award for Best Featured Actress in a Musical for her performance as Vera Charles in the original डाल of Mame ( 1966 ).
is a 2011 Japanese 3D computer-animated film based on the tekken video game series, produced by Digital Frontier and वितरित by Asmik Ace Entertainment in association with बंदाई Entertainment.
The film premiered in North अमेरिका by Bandai Entertainment on July 26, 2011, and in ऑस्ट्रेलिया on July 27, 2011 in a खास exclusive one-off screening.
It थी released on September 3, 2011 in Japan.
The film was released on Blu-ray Disc on November 22, 2011 for USA, and December 1, 2011 for Japan.
इस film थी also released on DVD on November 22, 2011 ( 2D संस्करण only ).
The film was additionally included with the PlayStation 3 game, Tekken Hybrid, and the Nintendo 3DS title, Tekken 3D : Prime Edition.
For a discussion of nonprofit, voluntary neighborhood वकालत groups, see neighborhood association.
In the United States, a homeowner association is a corporation formed by a real estate developer for the purpose of विपणन, मैनेजिंग, और selling of homes and lots in a residential subdivision.
It grants the developer privileged voting rights in शासी the association, while allowing the developer to exit financial and legal responsibility of the organization, typically by transferring ownership of the association to the homeowners after selling बंद a predetermined number of lots.
Membership in the homeowners संघ by a residential buyer is typically a कंडीशन of purchase ; a buyer is n't given an option to reject it.
Most homeowner associations are incorporated, and are subject to state statutes that govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations.
State oversight of homeowner associations is minimal, and mainly takes the form of laws जिससे are inconsistent from state to state.
कुछ states, such as Florida and California, have a large body of homeowner association law, and some states, such as Massachusetts, have virtually no homeowner association law.
the fastest growing form of housing in the United States आज is common-interest developments ( CIDs ), a category that includes planned-unit developments of single-family homes, condominiums, and cooperative अपार्टमेंट.
Since 1964, homeowner associations have become increasingly common in the USA.
The Community Associations Institute trade association estimated that HOAs governed 24.8 million American homes and 62 million residents in 2010.
A prize-winning lilac-and-white Silkie
There are many breeds of Guinea pig which have been विकसित since its domestication ca. 5000 BC.
Breeds vary widely in appearance and purpose, ranging from दिखाएँ breeds with long, flowing hair to those in use as model organisms by science.
From ca. 1200 AD to the Spanish conquest of the Inca Empire in 1532, selective प्रजनन by indigenous South American peoples resulted in many varieties of domestic Guinea pigs, which रूप the आधार लिये some of the modern domestic breeds.
Early Andean breeds were primarily kept as agricultural stock for food, and efforts at improving the गिनी pig as a खाना source continue to the modern era.
With the export of Guinea pigs to यूरोपीय in the 15th century, the goal in breeding shifted to focus on the development of appealing pets.
To this end, various competitive प्रजनन organizations were founded by fanciers.
The American Cavy Breeders Association, an adjunct to the American Rabbit प्रजनक Association, is the governing body in the United States and Canada.
The British Cavy Council governs cavy clubs in the United Kingdom.
Similar organizations मौजूद in Australia ( Australian National Cavy परिषद ) and New Zealand ( New Zealand Cavy Club ).
Each club publishes its अपना Standard of Perfection and determines which breeds are eligible for showing.
New breeds continue to emerge in the 21st century.
Though there हैं many breeds of Guinea pig, only a few breeds are commonly found on the show table as pets.
Most Guinea pigs found as pets were either found undesirable by प्रजनक or were करवाया to be pleasant pets regardless of how well they मिलें the breed मानक of perfection.
The short hair, Abyssinian, Peruvian and Sheltie ( aka Silkie ) breeds are those most frequently देखी as pets, and the former three are the core breeds in the history of the competitive showing of Guinea pigs.
In जोड to their standard form, nearly all breeds come in a Satin variant.
Satins, due to their hollow hair shafts, possess coats of a special gloss and shine.
However, there is growing evidence that the genes responsible for the साटन coat also can cause severe bone समस्याएं, including Osteodystrophy and Paget 's disease.
प्रर्दशित Satin variations is prohibited by some cavy breeders ' एसोसिएशन because of animal welfare reasons.
All cavy breeds have some साझा general मानकों : the head प्रोफ़ाइल should be rounded, साथ large eyes and large, smooth ears.
The body should be strong and of compact build.
Coat colour should in all variations be clearly defined and thorough from root to tip.
These standards are best met by long established, commonly bred breeds, as उनके breeders have had enough time and animals to effectively breed for these qualities.
The coat colour आदर्श of good definition and thoroughness is rarely met by other than the smooth coated breeds, which have had खूब established, separate breeding lines for different colours.
State schools ( also known as पब्लिक schools or government schools ) generally refer to primary or द्वितीयक schools mandated for or offered to all children बगैर charge सशुल्क for, in whole or in part, by taxation.
the term may also refer to institutions of post-secondary education funded, in whole or in part, और overseen by government.
the ribosome assembles polymeric protein molecules whose sequence is controlled by the sequence of messenger RNA molecules.
This is required by all living cells और संबद्ध viruses.
The ribosome ( from ribonucleic acid और the Greek soma, meaning `` body '' ) is a large and complex molecular machine, found within all living cells, that serves as the प्राथमिक site of biological protein synthesis ( translation ).
Ribosomes link amino acids together in the अनुक्रम specified by messenger RNA ( mrna ) molecules.
Ribosomes consist of two major subunits—the छोटी ribosomal subunit पढ़े the mRNA, while the विशाल subunit joins amino acids to form a polypeptide कड़ी.
Each subunit is composed of one or more ribosomal RNA ( rRNA ) molecules and a variety of proteins.
The sequence of DNA एन्कोडिंग for a protein may be copied many times into messenger RNA ( mRNA ) chains of a समान sequence.
ribosomes can bind to an mRNA कड़ी and use it as a template for determining the correct अनुक्रम of amino acids in a particular protein.
Amino acids are selected, collected and carried to the ribosome by transfer RNA ( tRNA molecules ), which enter one part of the ribosome and bind to the messenger RNA chain.
The attached अमीनो acids are then linked together by another part of the ribosome.
Once the protein is produced, it can then 'fold ' to produce a specific functional three-dimensional ढांचा.
A राइबोसोम is made from complexes of RNAs and proteins and is इसलिए a ribonucleoprotein.
Each ribosome is divided into two subunits : the smaller subunit binds to the mRNA pattern, while the larger subunit binds to the tRNA and the amino acids.
When a ribosome finishes reading an mRNA अणु, these two subunits split apart.
Ribosomes are ribozymes, because the catalytic peptidyl transferase activity that links amino acids साथ is performed by the ribosomal RNA.
ribosomes from जीवाणु, archaea and eukaryotes ( the three domains of life on Earth ) differ in their size, sequence, structure, and the ratio of protein to RNA.
The differences in structure allow some एंटीबायोटिक to मार bacteria by inhibiting their ribosomes, while leaving human ribosomes unaffected.
In bacteria and archaea, more than one राइबोसोम may मूव along a single mRNA chain at one time, each `` reading '' its sequence and producing a corresponding protein molecule.
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic कोशिकाएं functionally resemble many features of those in bacteria, reflecting the likely evolutionary origin of mitochondria.
अल्बर्ट Claude, Christian de Duve, and George Emil Palade were jointly awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, in 1974, for the discovery of the ribosomes.
The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2009 was awarded to Venkatraman Ramakrishnan, Thomas A. Steitz and Ada E. Yonath for determining the detailed structure and mechanism of the ribosome.

Overview of the Calvin cycle and carbon fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are chemical reactions that convert carbon dioxide and other compounds into ग्लूकोज.
These प्रतिक्रियाएँ occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled area of a chloroplast outside of the thylakoid झिल्लियों.
These reactions take the light-dependent reactions and perform further chemical processes on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the calvin cycle : carbon fixation, reduction reactions, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its name, इस प्रक्रम occurs only जब light is available.
Plants do not carry out the Calvin cycle by night.
They, instead, release sucrose into the फ्लोएम from their starch reserves.
इस process happens when लाइट is उपलब्धियाँ independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation, C4 carbon fixation, और Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in उनके vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work.
In mathematics, a square number or perfect square is an integer that is the square of an integer ; in other words, it is the product of some integer with itself.
लिये example, 9 is a square number, since it can be written as.
the usual notation for the formula for the square of a number is not the product, but the equivalent exponentiation, usually pronounced as `` squared ''.
The name वर्गाकार number आता from the name of the shape ; see below.
Square numbers are non-negative.
Another way of saying that a ( non-negative ) number is a square number, is that इसके square roots are again integers.
For example, = ±3, so 9 is a square number.
A positive पूर्णांक that has no perfect square divisors except 1 is called square-free.
For a non-negative integer, the th square number is, with being the zeroth square.
The concept of square can be extended to some other number systems.
If rational numbers are included, then a square is the ratio of two square integers, and, conversely, the ratio of two square integers is a वर्गाकार ( e.g., 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ).
Starting with 1, there are square numbers up to and including, where the expression represents the floor of the number.
the Era of Good Feelings marked a period in the political history of the United States that reflected a भाव of national purpose and a desire for unity among Americans in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars.
The era saw the पतन of the Federalist Party and an end to the bitter partisan विवादों between it and the dominant Democratic-Republican party during the First Party System.
President James Monroe endeavored to downplay partisan affiliation in बनाना his nominations, with the ultimate goal of national unity और eliminating parties altogether from national politics.
The period is so closely associated with Monroe 's presidency ( 1817–1825 ) and his administrative goals that his name और the era are virtually synonymous.
The Era of Good जज्बात marked a transition in अमरीकी politics with the end of the Federalist Party as America began to develop after the War of 1812.
While America थी experiencing growth और prosperity after the war with Britain, इस era also marks the first instance of economic troubles in the growing United States.
Mirroring the American System proposed by हेनरी Clay, protective tariffs and the chartering of the Second Bank of the United States complicated the tension between the North and South with the coming of the first financial crisis.
While the term “Era of Good Feelings” is usually viewed with irony because of the political turmoil, economic factors caused animosity between the North and South.
The designation of the period by historians as एक of “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony or skepticism, as the history of the era was one in which the political atmosphere was strained and divisive, विशेषकर among factions within the Monroe administration and the Republican Party.
The phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell, in the Boston Federalist newspaper, Columbian Centinel, on July 12, 1817, following Monroe 's विज़िट to Boston, Massachusetts as part of his good will tour of America.
Mariel Margaret `` Mia '' Hamm ( born March 17, 1972 ) is a retired American पेशेवर soccer player.
hamm played many सालो as a forward लिये the United States women 's national soccer team और was a founding member of the Washington Freedom.
Hamm scored 158 international goals, more than any other player, पुरूष or female, in the history of soccer and is the third most capped female player in soccer history behind Kristine Lilly and Christie Rampone, appearing in 275 international matches.
Hamm was नामित the women 's FIFA World Player of the Year the first दो times that award was given ( in 2001 and 2002 ), and is listed as one of FIFA 's 125 best living players ( as chosen by Pelé ).
She was inducted into the National Soccer Hall of Fame as well as the Alabama Sports Hall of कीर्ति and Texas Sports Hall of Fame.
She is the author of Go For the Goal : A चैंपियन 's मार्गदर्शिका to Winning in Soccer and Life and appeared in the एचबीओ documentary Dare to Dream : The Story of the u.S. महिलाओं 's Soccer Team.
Washington Post columnist Michael Wilbon called hamm, `` शायद the most important athlete of the last 15 years. ''
