The New York Red Bulls is an अमरीकी professional soccer team based in Harrison, New Jersey, representing the New यॉर्क metropolitan area.
The team competes in the Eastern Conference of Major League Soccer ( MLS ).
It is one of the ten charter clubs of MLS, having competed in the league since its inception.
The team थी a founding सदस्य of MLS ( 1996 ), but has gone through several name changes.
the टोली was originally known as the New York/New जर्सी metrostars through 1997.
From the 1998 season through the 2005 season, the team was ज्ञात as the MetroStars.
On March 9, 2006, the team was sold to Red सांड GmbH, leading to the team 's current नाम.
They are the तभी original MLS मताधिकार not to have won any significant trophy ( including regular season, playoffs, and knockout competition ) since inception.
The team 's best result in the MLS थी the MLS Cup final in 2008.
In the us Open Cup, the MetroStars reached three semifinals ( 1997, 1998, 2000 ), before reaching their first final in 2003, losing 1–0 to the शिकागो Fire.
On August 26, 2000, the Metros ' Clint Mathis नियत an MLS record by स्कोरिंग five goals in a game against the डलास Burn.
कुछ well-known players that have played for the team include Giovanni Savarese, Tim Howard, Tony Meola, Tab ramos, Alexi Lalas, Clint Mathis, Jozy Altidore, Michael Bradley, क्लाउडियो Reyna, Eddie Pope, Roberto donadoni, Lothar Matthäus, Adolfo Valencia, Youri Djorkaeff, Amado Guevara, Juan Pablo Ángel, Thierry Henry, Juninho Pernambucano, Jan Gunnar Solli, Rafael Márquez, and Tim Cahill.
The team has also had well-known coaches, including Carlos Queiroz, Carlos Alberto Parreira, Bora milutinović, Bob Bradley, mo Johnston, Bruce Arena and Hans Backe.
Confucianism, Taoism, और Buddhism are one, a painting in the litang style portraying three men laughing by a river stream, 12th century, Song Dynasty.
Estimating the number of Buddhists in the world, or in many countries, is difficult due to definitional issues as well as practical problems of enumeration.
To शुरू with, the religious beliefs, practices, and identities of East Asians ( who comprise the majority of the world 's Buddhists by कोई measure ) often blend Buddhism with other traditions including Confucianism, the Chinese folk religion, Daoism, Shinto, and Korean shamanism.
Most followers of Buddhism do not belong to structured congregations, or observe a definite ritual of adherence ऐसे as taking Refuge, making it difficult to accurately estimate the number of practitioners.
An additional challenge is the दुश्मनी of several नेशनल सरकारें ( often Communist ones such as China or North Korea ) to religion generally or to Buddhism specifically.
Government policies in these countries may encourage the under-reporting or non-reporting of religious adherence, resulting in official totals that may drastically underestimate the number of religious practitioners in these countries.
Estimate of the विश्वव्यापी Buddhist population range from 350 million to over one billion, but cluster nearer to the first figure.
adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a figure of 397 million.
By प्रमुख branches, the संख्याएँ are as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana Buddhism, including ईस्ट एशियाई Buddhism, with no कम than 185 million adherents, and possibly several times that many ( again, depending on definitional issues ).
This is the predominant form of Buddhism practiced in China, South Korea, Japan, Taiwan, Singapore, and Vietnam.
( 2 ) Theravada Buddhism, with no fewer than 125 million adherents.
This is the predominant form of buddhism practiced in Cambodia, Thailand, Laos, Sri लंका, and Burma.
( 3 ) Vajrayana Buddhism, with approximately 20 million adherents.
This form predominates in the greater Tibetan and Mongolian regions, as well as in the Himalayas.
Besides the स्वतंत्र countries of Mongolia and भूटान, and various territories within what is now western China, वज्रयान is traditional to certain regions of Russia ( e.g. Kalmykia, बुर्यातिया ), India ( e.g. Ladakh, Sikkim ), and Nepal ( e.g. Khumbu ).
Vajrayana, also known as तिब्बती Buddhism, is प्रायः conflated with Tantric Buddhism, but this is imprecise, as Shingon और अन्य फ़ॉर्म of East एशियाई Buddhism also अभ्यास tantra.
At least 7 countries ( Sri लंका, Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, Burma, Bhutan, and Mongolia ) have unambiguous Buddhist majorities.
Depending on how one calculates चाइनीज and other East Asian adherents, this figure might विस्तार to include several more countries.
In addition, Buddhism is the state religion of Cambodia and Bhutan, and receives prominent mention in the constitutions of Thailand और Sri Lanka.
In उत्तरी India and Nepal, the land where Buddhism was born, the religion severely declined during the first millennium.
Whether इस decline was due to the इस्लामी conquest of northern India, or to other factors, remains controversial.
See the article Decline of Buddhism in India.
James Butler Hickok ( May 27, 1837 – August 2, 1876 ), better known as Wild Bill Hickok, was a folk hero of the American Old West.
His skills as a gunfighter and scout, along with his reputation as a lawman, provided the basis for his fame, although some of his reported exploits are fictionalized.
Born and raised on a farm in rural इलिनोइस, Hickok went west at age 18 as a fugitive from justice, पहला working as a stagecoach driver, before he became a lawman in the frontier territories of Kansas and Nebraska.
He fought for the Union Army during the American Civil War, and gained publicity after the war as a scout, marksman, actor, and professional gambler.
Between उसके law-enforcement duties and gambling, which easily overlapped, Hickok was involved in several notable shootouts.
He was shot and killed while playing poker in the Nuttal & मन 's Saloon in Deadwood, Dakota Territory ( now South डकोटा ).
Artist 's conception of the Curiosity rover vaporizing rock on Mars.
The rover landed on Mars in August 2012.
A Mars rover is an automated motor vehicle which propels itself across the surface of the planet Mars after landing.
Rovers have several लाभ over stationary landers : they examine more territory, they can be directed to interesting features, they can प्लेस themselves in sunny positions to weather winter months and they can advance the knowledge of how to perform very remote robotic vehicle control.
There have been four successful robotically operated Mars rovers.
The Jet Propulsion Laboratory managed the Mars Pathfinder mission and its now inactive Sojourner rover.
It currently manages the Mars Exploration रोवर mission 's active Opportunity rover and inactive Spirit, and, as भाग of the Mars Science Laboratory mission, the Curiosity rover.
A financial audit, or more accurately, an audit of financial statements, is the verification of the financial statements of a legal entity, with a view to express an audit opinion.
the audit opinion is intended to provide reasonable assurance, but not absolute assurance, that the financial statements हैं presented fairly, in all material respects, and/or give a true और fair view in accordance with the financial reporting framework.
The purpose of an audit is provide and objective independent examination of the financial statements, which increases the value and credibility of the financial statements produced by प्रबन्धन, thus increase उपयोक्ता confidence in the financial statement, reduce investor risk and consequently reduce the cost of capital of the preparer of the financial statements.
Financial audits are typically performed by firms of practicing accountants who are experts in financial reporting.
The financial audit is one of many परख functions provided by accounting firms.
Many organizations separately employ or hire internal auditors, who do not attest to financial reports but focus mainly on the internal नियंत्रण of the organization.
External auditors may चुनें to place limited reliance on the work of internal auditors.
Auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in the financial disclosures made by an organization, therefore would likely to reduce of such corporations to conceal unscrupulous dealings.
Internationally, the International Standards on Auditing ( ISA ) issued by the International Auditing और Assurance Standards Board ( IAASB ) is considered as the benchmark लिये audit process.
Almost all jurisdictions require auditors to follow the isa or a local variation of the ISA.
Dollar coins have been minted in the United States in gold, silver, and base metal versions.
the term silver dollar is often used for any large white metal coin issued by the United States with a face value of one dollar, although purists insist that a डालर is not silver unless it contains some of that metal.
Silver डॉलर, the first dollar coin issue, were minted beginning in 1794.
Gold dollars and gold-colored dollars have also been produced by the United States.
The Sacagawea and Presidential dollars are often referred to as `` golden dollars ''.
In modern टाइम्स, dollar coins have not been very लोकप्रिय in the United States.
Despite efforts by the government to promote their use, most Americans currently use the one dollar bill rather than dollar coins.
In straight और स्तर flight lift ( L ) equals weight ( W ).
In a banked turn of 60°, lift equals double the weight ( L=2W ).
The pilot experiences 2g and a doubled weight.
The steeper the bank, the greater the g-forces.
इस top-fuel dragster can accelerate from zero to in 0.86 seconds.
इस is a horizontal acceleration of 5.3 g. Combined with the vertical g-force in the stationary मामला the pythagorean theorem yields a g force of 5.4 g.
g-force ( with g इससे gravitational ) is a term for accelerations लगा as weight and measurable by accelerometers.
It is not a force, per se, but a force per unit mass.
Since such a force is perceived as a weight, any g-force can be described as a `` weight per unit mass '' ( see the synonym specific weight ).
The g-force त्वरण acts as a multiplier of weight-like forces for every unit of an object 's mass, and ( save for certain electromagnetic force influences ) is the cause of an object 's acceleration in संबंध to free-fall.
This acceleration experienced by an object is due to the vector sum of non-gravitational forces acting on an object free to move.
The accelerations कि are not produced by gravity are termed proper accelerations, and it is only these that are measured in g-force इकाई.
They cause stresses and strains on objects.
Because of these strains, विशाल g-forces may be destructive.
Gravitation acting alone does not produce a g-force, even though g-forces are expressed in multiples of the acceleration of a standard gravity.
Thus, the standard gravitational acceleration at the Earth 's surface produces g-force only indirectly, as a result of resistance to it by mechanical forces.
The 1 g-force on an object sitting on the Earth 's surface is caused by mechanical force exerted in the upward direction by the ground, keeping the object इससे going into free-fall.
the upward force from the ground ensures that an object at rest on the Earth 's surface is accelerating relative to the free-fall condition, which is the path that the object would follow when falling freely toward the Earth 's center.
Objects allowed to free-fall in an inertial trajectory under the influence of gravitation-only, महसूस no g-force.
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' शर्तें inside a freely falling elevator falling toward the Earth 's center ( in vacuum ), or ( to good approximation ) conditions inside a spacecraft in Earth orbit.
These are उदाहरण of निर्देशांक acceleration ( a change in velocity ) without a sensation of weight.
The experience of no g-force ( zero-g ), however it is produced, is synonymous with weightlessness.
In the absence of gravitational fields, or in directions at right angles to them, proper and coordinate accelerations हैं the same, and any coordinate acceleration must be produced by a सम्बन्धित g-force acceleration.
An example here is a rocket in free space, in which simple changes in velocity are produced by the engines, and produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers.
an augur holding a lituus, the curved wand often प्रयुक्त as a symbol of augury on Roman coins
The augur was a priest and official in the classical world, especially ancient Rome and Etruria.
His main role was to interpret the will of the gods by studying the flight of birds : whether they are flying in समूह or alone, what noises they make as they fly, direction of flight and what kind of birds वे are.
This was known as `` taking the auspices. ''
The ceremony and function of the augur was central to any major undertaking in Roman society—public or private—including matters of war, commerce, and religion.
the Roman historian Livy stresses the importance of the augurs : `` Who does not know कि this city was founded only बाद taking the auspices, that everything in war and in peace, at home और abroad, was किया only after taking the auspices ? ''
farmington Hills is an affluent community in southeastern Michigan.
It is the second largest city in Oakland County in the U.S. state of Michigan.
Its population was 79,740 at the 2010 census.
It is part of the upscale northwestern suburbs of Metropolitan Detroit and is also northeast of downtown Ann Arbor.
Farmington Hills consistently ranks as one of the safest शहरों in the United States, as well as in the state of Michigan.
In 2010, the area ranked as the 30th safest city in America.
हालांकि the two cities have separate services and addresses, Farmington and Farmington Hills are often thought of as the same community.
Features of the community include a recently renovated downtown, boutiques, a विंटेज cinema, numerous restaurants, exotic car dealerships, art galleries, and public parks including Heritage Park.
There are अनेक historical साइट including the longacre House and the Governor Warner Mansion.
Both cities are served by Farmington Public Schools.
Farmington Hills serves as a major business center for the greater Detroit area.
Present-day impression of a Late Bronze Age मुहर
Town seal ( matrix ) of Náchod from 1570
A seal is a device for making an impression in wax, clay, paper, or some other medium, including an embossment on paper, and is also the impression thus बना.
The original purpose was to authenticate a document, a wrapper for एक such as a modern envelope, or the कवर of a container or package holding valuables or other objects.
The sealing process is essentially that of a mould, with the final image represented on the device for making the impression by a mirror-image design, incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio.
The seal-making device is also referred to as the seal matrix or die ; the imprint it creates as the seal impression ( or, more rarely, the sealing ).
If the छाप is made purely as a relief resulting from the greater pressure on the paper where the high parts of the मेट्रिक्स touch, the seal is known as a dry seal ; in all other cases a liquid or liquified medium ( such as ink or wax ) is प्रयुक्त, usually in another color than the paper.
For विधिक purposes, the definition of a seal may be extended to include rubber stamps, or writing specified शब्द ( `` seal '' or `` L.S. `` ).
In the United States, the word `` seal '' is sometimes assigned to a facsimile of the seal design ( in monochrome or color ), which may be used in a variety of contexts सहित architectural settings, on flags, or on आधिकारिक letterheads.
Thus, for example, the Great Seal of the United States, among other uses, appears on the reverse of the one-dollar bill ; और several of the seals of the U.S. states appear on their respective state flags.
In Europe, although coats of arms and heraldic badges may well feature in such contexts as खूब as on seals, the मुहर design in its entirety rarely appears as an emblem.
The पढ़ाई of seals is known as sigillography or sphragistics.
Groundhog Day ( Pennsylvania German : Grundsaudaag, murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated on February 2.
According to folklore, if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges from its burrow on इस day, then spring होगा come early ; if it is sunny, the groundhog will माना see इसके छाया and रिट्रीट back into its burrow, and the winter weather will continue for six more weeks.
Modern customs of the holiday involve जश्न where early morning festivals are held to watch the groundhog emerging from its burrow.
In southeastern Pennsylvania, groundhog Lodges ( Grundsow Lodges ) celebrate the holiday साथ fersommlinge, social events in which food is served, speeches are made, and one or more g'spiel ( plays or skits ) are performed for entertainment.
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the only language spoken at the event, and those who speak English pay a दंड, usually in the form of a nickel, dime, or quarter प्रति शब्द बोला, with the money put into a bowl in the center of the table.
The largest Groundhog दिन celebration is held in Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania.
Groundhog Day, already a widely recognized and popular tradition, received widespread attention as a result of the 1993 फिल्मी Groundhog Day, which was set in Punxsutawney, PA ( though फिल्माया primarily in Woodstock, IL ) और portrayed Punxsutawney Phil.
High resolution image of tampa Bay region
The Tampa Bay area रै a humid subtropical climate ( Koppen cfa ), with गरम and humid summers with frequent thunderstorms and drier winters with जमने temperatures occurring every 2–3 years.
the area experiences a significant summer wet season, as nearly two-thirds of the annual precipitation falls in the months of June through September.
The area is listed by the United States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ) as being in hardiness zone 10, which is about the northern सीमा of where coconut palms और royal palms can be grown.
Highs usually range between 65 and 95 °F ( 18 and 35 °C ) year round.
Though known for hot summers, Tampa 's official high has never reached 100 °F ( 38 °C ) – the नगर 's all-time record temperature is 99 °F ( 37 °C ).
St. Petersburg 's all-time record high is exactly 100 °F ( 38 °C ).
Pinellas County lies on a peninsula between Tampa Bay and the गल्फ of Mexico, and much of the city of Tampa lies on a smaller peninsula jutting out into Tampa Bay.
This proximity to large bodies of water both moderates temperatures and introduces large amounts of humidity into the atmosphere.
In general, the लोकल communities farthest from the coast have larger temperature ranges, दोनो during a single day and throughout the seasons of the year.
A diagram of the electromagnetic spectrum, showing various properties across the range of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range of all संभावित frequencies of electromagnetic radiation.
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a different meaning, and is instead the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular ऑब्जेक्ट.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern radio communication to gamma विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end, thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a भिन्न of the size of an atom.
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself, while it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the Planck length, although in principle the वर्णक्रम is infinite and continuous.
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic and other probing interactions, as ways to study and characterize matter.
In addition, radiation from various parts of the spectrum has found many other uses for communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ).
Legend
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), also known by his initials, FDR, was the 32nd President of the United States ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century, leading the United States during a time of worldwide आर्थिक depression and कुल युद्ध.
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to अधिक than two terms, he निर्मित a New Deal Coalition that realigned American politics after 1932, as his domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy popular सोंग `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as his अभियान theme, FDR defeated incumbent Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932, at the depth of the Great Depression.
Energized by his personal victory over पोलियो, FDR 's unfailing optimism and सक्रियता contributed to a नवीकरण of the national spirit.
He worked closely साथ British Prime Minister Winston Churchill और Soviet General Secretary Joseph Stalin in leading the Allies against Germany and Japan in World War II, और restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy.
In his first hundred days in office, which began March 4, 1933, Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce relief ( government jobs for the बेरोजगार ), recovery ( economic growth ), and reform ( through विनियमन of Wall Street, banks and transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, but then relapsed into a deep recession.
the bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme अदालत or passing कोई considerable legislation ; it abolished many of the relief programs जब बेरोजगारी diminished during World War II.
सबसे of the regulations on कारोबार were ended about 1975–85, except for the विनियमन of वॉल Street by the Securities and Exchange Commission, which still exists.
Along with several smaller कार्यक्रम, major surviving programs include the संघीय Deposit Insurance Corporation, which was created in 1933, and Social Security, which Congress passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, साथ the Japanese invasion of चीन and the aggression of Nazi Germany, FDR दिया strong diplomatic and financial support to China and Great Britain, while remaining officially neutral.
His goal was to make America the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` which would supply munitions to the Allies.
In March 1941, Roosevelt, with Congressional approval, provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain.
With very strong national support, he made war on Japan and Germany after the Japanese attack on पर्ल Harbor on December 7, 1941, calling it a `` date which will live in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied war प्रयत्न.
As an क्रियाशील सैन्य leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts that ended in the defeat of the Axis शक्तियां and the development of the संसार 's first atom bomb.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese American नागरिकों.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, relief कार्यक्रम largely ended, and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new heights as millions of people स्थानांतरित to new कार्य in war centers, and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service.
Roosevelt वर्चस्व the American political scene not only during the twelve years of his presidency, but also for दशकों afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of voters that created the Fifth Party System.
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor unions, big city machines, white ethnics, African Americans और rural white Southerners.
He also influenced the later creation of the United Nations and bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by विद्वानों as one of the top three U.S. Presidents, along with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington.
A liberal Democrat, Roosevelt पारिभाषित his ideological position as `` a little left of center. ''
A Joint कमेटी is a term in politics that is used to refer to a committee made up of members of both कक्षों of a bicameral legislature.
In other contexts, it refers to a committee with सदस्यों from more than one organization.
The regulation of वेश्यावृति in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal सरकारी ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, it is therefore exclusively the domain of the states to परमिट, prohibit, or otherwise regulate commercial sex, except insofar as कॉंग्रेस may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act.
In most states, prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the category of public order crime, a crime that disrupts the order of a जातियाँ.
It was at one time considered to be a vagrancy crime.
फिलहाल, Nevada is the तभी state to allow brothel prostitution, the terms of जिससे are stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes.
Only 8 counties currently contain active brothels.
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area ), Washoe County ( which contains रेनो ), Carson City, Douglas County, and Lincoln County.
The other counties theoretically allow brothel prostitution, but some of ये counties currently have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living off of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal under नेवाडा law, as elsewhere in the country.
As with other countries, prostitution in the United States can be divided into three broad categories : street वेश्यावृति, brothel prostitution, and escort prostitution.
The national flag of the संयुक्त States of America, often simply referred to as the American flag, consists of thirteen equal horizontal stripes of रेड ( top and bottom ) alternating with white, with a blue rectangle in the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty small, white, five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars ( top and bottom ) alternating साथ rows of five stars.
the 50 stars on the ध्वज represent the 50 states of the United राज्य of अमेरिका and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen British colonies that declared independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain and became the पहला states in the Union.
Nicknames for the flag शामिल the `` Stars and Stripes '', `` Old Glory ``, और `` The Star-Spangled Banner. ''
India is a federal union of states comprising twenty-eight states and seven union territories.
The states and territories are further subdivided into जिले and so on.
Congressional districts for the 113th United States Congress
2010 Census change:
बदलें in apportionment of congressional districts, starting in 2013, as a परिणाम of the 2010 census.
2000 Census change:
Change in apportionment of congressional districts, from 2003 to 2013, as a परिणाम of the 2000 census.
This is a complete list of congressional districts for representation in the United States House of Representatives.
The quantity ( apportionment ) and boundaries ( redistricting ) of districts are determined after each census, although in some cases states have changed the boundaries अधिक than once per census.
इस list includes the 435 current and over 200 obsolete districts.
For example, चूंकि the 2000 census, Nebraska has had three जिले, but it used to have as many as six.
In the first decade of the twenty-first century, Texas had 32 districts, लकिन has since added four due to reapportionment as a परिणाम of the 2010 census.
Other states have lost districts since the number of congressional seats has been set at 435 by statute.
Also included here are non-voting delegations : six वर्तमान and four obsolete.
The boundaries of districts often shift with each redistricting.
Over time, the region and demographics represented in a district can change substantially.
Furthermore, districts sometimes retain the same boundaries while changing their district numbers.
Mariah Carey ( born कूच 27, 1970 ) is an American singer, songwriter, रिकार्ड producer, actress, and philanthropist.
Under the guidance of Columbia रिकॉर्ड executive Tommy Mottola, Carey released her self-titled debut studio album Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart.
following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit records Emotions ( 1991 ), Music Box ( 1993 ), and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ), Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) made म्यूज़िक history जब its second single `` One Sweet Day ``, a duet with Boyz II Men, spent a record sixteen weeks on top of the Billboard hot 100, and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history.
During the recording of the album, कैरी began to deviate from उसके R & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop.
इस musical change became evident साथ the release of Butterfly ( 1997 ), at which time Carey था separated from Mottola.
Carey left Columbia in 2000, और signed a record-breaking $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records.
Before the release of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001 ), वो suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion.
Following the film 's poor reception, she थी bought out of her recording contract for $ 50 million, which led to a मनाही in her career.
वो signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002, and after an unsuccessful period, returned to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
Its second single `` We Belong Together `` became उसके most कामयाब single of the 2000s, and was later नामित `` Song of the दशक '' by Billboard.
कैरी once again ventured into film with a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; वो was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance Award '' at the Palm स्रोतों International Film Festival, and Black Reel और naacp Image Award nominations.
In a career spanning over दो decades, Carey has sold more than 200 million records worldwide, making उसके one of the best-selling music artists of all time.
In 1998, she was honored as the world 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards.
Carey was also named the best-selling female कलाकार of the millennium in 2000.
According to the Recording Industry Association of America, she is the third best-selling female कलाकार in the United States, with 63.5 million certified albums.
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ), कैरी gained her eighteenth number one single in the संयुक्त राज्य, more than any other solo artist.
In 2012, Carey was ranked second on VH1 's list of the `` 100 महानतम Women in Music ''.
Aside from her commercial accomplishments, Carey has won five Grammy Awards, 17 World म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, 11 American Music Awards, and 31 Billboard Music Awards.
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness World Records, she is famed for her five-octave vocal range, power, melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register.
Stratocumulus stratiformis cumulogenitus
In meteorology, a बादल is a visible mass of liquid droplets or frozen crystals made of water or various chemicals suspended in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body.
These suspended particles are also known as aerosols.
Clouds in Earth 's atmosphere are studied in the बादल physics branch of meteorology.
दो processes, possibly acting together, can lead to air becoming saturated ; cooling the air or adding water वाष्प to the air.
In general, वर्षण will पतन to the surface ; an exception is virga, which evaporates पहले reaching the surface.
The international cloud classification system is based on the फैक्ट clouds in their most basic फ़ॉर्म can show free-convective upward growth like cumulus, appear in non-convective layered sheets such as stratus, or take the form of thin fibrous wisps, as in the case of cirrus.
prefixes are प्रयुक्त in connection with clouds to express variations or complexities in these basic फ़ॉर्म or to specify middle or high altitude ranges.
These include strato- for low clouds with limited convection that form mostly in uneven layers, cumulo- for complex highly-convective तूफ़ान clouds, nimbo- for thick layered clouds of some complexity that can produce moderate to heavy precipitation, alto- for middle clouds, and cirro- for high clouds ; the latter दो of which may be of simple or moderately complex structure.
Whether or not a cloud is low, middle, or high level depends on how far above the ground इसके base forms.
Cloud प्रकार with significant vertical extent can form in the low or middle altitude ranges depending on the moisture content of the air.
बादल in the troposphere have Latin names due to the popular adaptation of Luke Howard 's cloud categorization system, which began to spread in popularity दौरान December 1802.
Synoptic surface weather observations use code numbers to record and report the types of tropospheric cloud visible at each scheduled observation time based on the height and physical appearance of the clouds.
While a majority of clouds form in Earth 's क्षोभमण्डल, there are occasions when बादल in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed.
These three main layers of the atmosphere where clouds may be seen are collectively known as the homosphere.
Above this lies the thermosphere and exosphere, which together मेक up the heterosphere that marks the transition to बाहरी space.
Clouds have been observed on other ग्रह and moons within the Solar System, but, due to their different temperature characteristics, they are composed of other substances such as methane, ammonia, और sulfuric acid.
Galveston County is a county located in the U.S. state of Texas within the Houston–Sugar Land–Baytown metropolitan area.
As of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, the population was 291,309.
Its county seat is Galveston.
League City is the largest city in Galveston County in terms of population ; URL_http between 2000 and 2005 it surpassed Galveston as the काउंटी 's largest city.
Galveston County was founded in 1838.

The Big Ten Conference, formerly Western Conference and Big Nine Conference, is the oldest Division I college athletic conference in the United States.
इसके बारह member institutions ( which are primarily फ्लैगशिप research universities in their संबंधित states, well-regarded academically, and with relatively large student enrollment ) are located primarily in the Midwest, stretching from Nebraska in the वेस्ट to penn State in the east.
The conference competes in the NCAA 's Division I ; its फ़ुटबॉल टीमों compete in the फ़ुटबॉल Bowl Subdivision ( FBS ), formerly known as Division I-A, the highest level of NCAA competition in that sport.
Member schools of the Big Ten ( or, in two cases, उनके parent university systems ) also are members of the Committee on Institutional Cooperation, a leading educational and research consortium.
Despite the conference 's name, the Big Ten actually consists of 12 स्कूलों, following the जोड of The Pennsylvania State University in 1993 and the University of Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011.
In 2014, the conference होगा expand to 14 members with the additions of the University of Maryland, College पार्क and Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey.
It is not to be confused साथ the Big 12 Conference, which has only ten schools and represents a different region of the country.
सिंगल Malt Scotch is सिंगल malt whisky made in Scotland using a pot still आसवन process at a single distillery, with malted barley as the only grain ingredient.
As साथ any Scotch whisky, a single malt Scotch must be distilled in Scotland and matured in oak casks in Scotland for at least three years ( most single malts are matured longer ).
`` Malt '' indicates कि the whisky is distilled from a `` malted '' grain.
Several types of grains can be malted ( लिये example, barley, rye and wheat हैं all grains which can be malted ) ; however, in the case of single malt Scotch, barley is always the only grain used.
`` Single '' indicates that all the malts in the bottle come from a single distillery.
bottlings containing malt whisky from multiple distilleries are called `` blended malt ``.
Until the Scotch Whisky Regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ), the word `` blended '' only appeared ( in the context of Scotch whisky ) on bottles of whisky that contained a mixture of both barley and non-barley grain whisky, लकिन this is no longer the case.
Under the terminology established by the SWR 2009, a `` blended malt Scotch whisky '' is a mixture of single malt Scotch whiskies, नहीं a mixture of malted barley whisky and non-barley whisky ; those हैं called `` blended Scotch whisky '', without the word `` malt ''.
The term `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted malt '' used under the prior labelling conventions.
The age statement on a बोतल of single malt Scotch is the number of सालो the whisky spent maturing in cask.
As very few whiskies are bottled from a सिंगल cask the age statement reflects the age of the youngest malt in the मिक्सर.
A बनावट may be arranged so as to, `` closely approach the single-object status of fused-ensemble timbres, लिये example, the beautiful 'northern lights ' chord..., in a very interesting distribution of pitches, produces a fused sound supported by a suspended cymbal roll `` ( Erickson ( 1975 ), p.166 & 168 ).
in कंट्रास्ट to अधिक traditional musical बनावट, sound mass composition `` minimizes the importance of individual pitches in preference for texture, timbre, and dynamics as primary shapers of gesture and impact. ''
Developed from the modernist tone clusters and spread to orchestral writing by the late 1950s and 1960s, sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between sound and noise `` ( Edwards 2001, pp. 326–27 ).
Techniques which may create or be used with sound mass include extended techniques such as muted brass or strings, flutter tonguing, wide vibrato, extreme ranges, and glissandos.
composers and works include Barbara Kolb, Pauline Oliveros ' Sound Patterns for chorus ( 1961 ), Norma Beecroft 's From Dreams of Brass for chorus ( 1963–1964 ), and Nancy Van de Vate.
Beecroft `` blurs individual pitches in favor of a collective timbre through the use of vocal and instrumental clusters, choral speech, narrator, and a wash of sounds from an electronic टेप. ''
( ibid )
a very early उदाहरण is the opening of Jean-Féry Rebel 's ballet Les Elémens ( 1737–38 ), where chaos is represented by a gradually cumulating orchestral cluster of all seven notes of the D minor scale ( Henck 2004, pp. 52–54 ).
A later example is the third movement of Ruth Crawford Seeger 's String Quartet 1931 ( nonesuch h-71280 ) while more recently Phill Niblock 's multiple drone based music serves as an example.
The use of `` मदारी approaching timbres '' begins with Debussy and Edgard Varèse often carefully scored individual instrumental parts so that they would fuse into one ensemble timbre or sound mass ( Erickson 1975, pp. 18 and 21 ).
Other examples include European `` textural '' compositions of the fifties and sixties ऐसे as Krzysztof Penderecki 's Threnody to the पीड़ितों of हिरोशिमा ( 1959 ) and György Ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works like Atmosphères ( 1961 ) and his Requiem ( 1963-65 ).
Other composers with works using this technique include Henryk Górecki, Karel Husa, Witold Lutosławski, Kazimierz Serocki, and Steven Stucky.
Sound mass techniques भी appear in the music of George Crumb ( Anon. n.d. ).
Students उपस्थित a lecture on linear algebra at the Helsinki University of Technology
Pupils in rural Sudan, 2002
A student is a learner, or someone who attends an educational institution.
in some nations, the अंग्रेज़ी term ( or its cognate in another language ) is reserved for those who attend विश्वविद्यालयों, while a schoolchild under the age of eighteen is called a pupil in English ( or an equivalent in other languages ), although in the United States a person enrolled in grades K–12 is often called a student.
In its widest use, student is used for anyone who is learning.
Australia is a continent comprising mainland Australia, Tasmania, New Guinea, Seram, possibly Timor, and neighbouring islands.
The continent is sometimes known in technical contexts by the names Sahul, Australinea or Meganesia, to distinguish it from the Australian mainland.
It is the smallest of the seven traditional महाद्वीपों in the English conception.
New Zealand is not part of the continent of Australia, लकिन of the separate, submerged continent of Zealandia.
Zealandia and Australia are दोनो भाग of the wider regions ज्ञात as Australasia and Oceania.
the महाद्वीप of Australia lies on a continental shelf overlain by shallow seas which divide it into several landmasses — the Arafura Sea and Torres Strait between mainland Australia and New Guinea, and Bass Strait between mainland ऑस्ट्रेलिया and Tasmania.
When sea levels were lower during the Pleistocene ice age, including the last glacial maximum about 18,000 BC, they were कनेक्ट by dry land.
During the past ten thousand सालो, rising sea levels overflowed the lowlands और separated the महाद्वीप into today 's low-lying arid to semi-arid mainland and the two mountainous islands of New Guinea और Tasmania.
Geologically, a continent extends to the edge of इसके continental shelf, so the now-separate islands are माना part of the continent.
Due to the spread of animals, fungi and plants across the single pleistocene landmass the separate lands have a related biota.
Central Park is nearly twice as big as the world 's second-smallest country, Monaco.
Historically its reservoirs were important components of the city 's water supply.
Environmental issues in New York City हैं affected by the city 's size, density, abundant public transportation infrastructure, and location at the mouth of the हडसन River.
New York 's population density has पर्यावरणीय फायदे and cons.
It facilitates the highest mass transit use in the United States, but भी concentrates pollution.
Gasoline consumption in the city is at the rate the national average was in the 1920s, and ग्रीनहाउस gas emissions are a fraction of the national औसत, at 7.1 मीट्रिक tons per person per year, below San Francisco, at 11.2 metric tons, and the national average, at 24.5 metric tons.
New York नगर accounts लिये only 1 % of United States greenhouse गैस emissions while housing 2.7 % of इसके population.
in सितंबर 2012, New York was named the # 1 `` America 's Dirtiest City, '' by a Travel+Leisure readership survey that rated the पर्यावरणीय quality of 35 prominent cities in the United States.
अटलांटा (, stressed, locally ) is the capital of and the most populous city in the U.S. राज्य of Georgia, with an estimated 2011 population of 432,427.
Atlanta is the सांस्कृतिक and economic center of the Atlanta metropolitan area, home to 5,457,831 people and the ninth largest metropolitan area in the United States.
Atlanta is the county seat of Fulton County, and a small portion of the city extends eastward into DeKalb County.
Atlanta was established in 1837 at the intersection of two railroad lines, and the city rose from the ashes of the Civil युद्ध to become a national center of commerce.
In the decades following the सिविल Rights Movement, during which the city earned a reputation as `` too busy to hate '' for the progressive views of its citizens and leaders, Atlanta attained international prominence.
Atlanta is the primary परिवहन hub of the Southeastern United States, via राजमार्ग, railroad, and air, with Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta International Airport being the world 's busiest airport since 1998.
Atlanta is considered an `` alpha ( - ) world city, '' and, with a gross domestic product of US $ 270 billion, Atlanta’s economy ranks 15th among world cities and छठे in the nation.
हालांकि Atlanta’s economy is considered diverse, dominant sectors include logistics, professional and business services, media operations, government प्रशासन, and उच्चतर education.
Topographically, Atlanta is marked by रोलिंग hills and dense tree coverage.
पुनरोद्धार of Atlanta 's neighborhoods, initially spurred by the 1996 Olympics, रै intensified in the 21st century, altering the city 's demographics, politics, and culture.

McCarthyism is the practice of making accusations of disloyalty, subversion, or treason without proper regard लिये प्रमाण.
It भी means `` the practice of making unfair allegations or using unfair investigative techniques, especially in order to restrict dissent or राजनैतिक criticism. ''
The पद has इसके origins in the period in the United States known as the Second Red scare, lasting roughly from 1950 to 1956 and characterized by heightened fears of communist influence on American institutions and espionage by Soviet agents.
originally coined to criticize the anti-communist pursuits of Republican U.S. Senator Joseph McCarthy of Wisconsin, `` McCarthyism '' soon took on a broader meaning, describing the excesses of similar efforts.
the पद is also now used more generally to describe reckless, unsubstantiated accusations, as well as demagogic attacks on the character or patriotism of political adversaries.
During the मैकार्थी era, thousands of Americans यहूद accused of being Communists or communist sympathizers and became the subject of aggressive investigations and questioning before government or private-industry panels, committees and एजेंसियों.
The primary targets of ऐसे suspicions were government कर्मचारी, those in the entertainment industry, educators and union activists.
Suspicions were often given credence despite inconclusive or questionable evidence, और the स्तर of threat posed by a person 's real or supposed leftist associations or मान्यताओं was often greatly exaggerated.
अनेक people suffered loss of employment and/or विनाश of their careers ; some even suffered imprisonment.
सबसे of these punishments came about through trial verdicts later overturned, laws that would be declared unconstitutional, dismissals for reasons later declared illegal or actionable, or extra-legal procedures that would come into general disrepute.
The most famous examples of McCarthyism शामिल the speeches, investigations, and hearings of Senator McCarthy himself ; the Hollywood blacklist, associated with hearings conducted by the हाउस Un-American Activities कमेटी ( HUAC ) ; and the various anti-communist activities of the संघीय Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) under Director J. Edgar Hoover.
McCarthyism थी a widespread social और cultural phenomenon that प्रभावित all levels of समाज and was the सोर्स of a great deal of debate and conflict in the United States.

While he is at first a common farm pig, he gets rid of Snowball, another pig जिससे shares the power.
He then takes लाभ of the animals ' uprising against their masters to eventually become the tyrannical `` President of Animal Farm, '' which he turns into a dictatorship.

the वरुण Canada project is the world’s first regional-scale underwater ocean वेधशाला that plugs directly into the Internet.
Since दिसम्बर 2009, it has allowed people to `` surf '' the seafloor while ocean scientists run deep-water experiments इससे लैब्स and universities around the world.
Along with its sister project, VENUS, NEPTUNE offers a unique approach to समंदर science.
Traditionally, ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to carry आउट their research, while the NEPTUNE project uses a remotely संचालित crawler.

In the 1960s, the name was transferred to Dodge 's mid-size entry.

Commonwealth is a traditional English term for a political community founded for the common good.
Historically, it has sometimes been synonymous with `` republic ``.
More recently it has been used लिये fraternal associations of some sovereign nations.
Most notably, the Commonwealth of Nations, an association primarily of former members of the British Empire, is often referred to as simply `` the Commonwealth ''.
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as September 11, September 11th, or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated terrorist हमले launched by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda upon the United States in नई York City and the Washington, D.C. area on September 11, 2001.
Four passenger airliners were hijacked by 19 al-Qaeda terrorists so they could be flown into buildings in suicide attacks.
Two of those planes, American Airlines उड़ान 11 and United Airlines Flight 175, were crashed into the North and South towers, क्रमशः, of the World व्यापार Center complex in New यॉर्क City.
Within two hours, both towers collapsed with debris and the resulting fires causing partial or complete collapse of all other buildings in the WTC complex, as well as major क्षति to ten other large surrounding structures.
A third plane, American Airlines Flight 77, was क्रैश into the Pentagon ( the headquarters of the United States Department of Defense ), leading to a partial collapse in its western side.
The fourth plane, United Airlines Flight 93, was targeted at the United States Capitol in Washington, D.C., but crashed into a field near Shanksville, Pennsylvania, after its passengers tried to overcome the hijackers.
In total, almost 3,000 people died in the attacks, including the 227 नागरिकों and 19 hijackers aboard the four planes.
Suspicion quickly fell on al-Qaeda.
Although the group 's leader, Osama bin Laden, initially denied any involvement, in 2004 he claimed responsibility लिये the attacks.
Al-Qaeda and bin Laden cited U.S. support of Israel, the presence of U.S. troops in सऊदी Arabia, and sanctions विरूद्ध Iraq as motives for the attacks.
The United States responded to the attacks by शुभारंभ the War on Terror और invading Afghanistan to depose the Taliban, which had harbored al-Qaeda.
Many countries strengthened their anti-terrorism legislation and expanded law enforcement powers.
having evaded कैप्चर for years, bin Laden was located and killed by U.S. forces in May 2011.
The destruction of the Twin Towers and अन्य properties caused serious damage to the economy of Lower Manhattan and था a significant effect on global markets.
Cleanup of the World Trade Center site थी समाप्त in May 2002, and the Pentagon was repaired within a year.
Numerous memorials have been constructed, including the नेशनल September 11 Memorial & Museum in नई York, the Pentagon Memorial, and the Flight 93 National Memorial in पेन्सिलवेनिया.
After a lengthy delay, the One World Trade Center is expected to be completed at Ground Zero in New York City in 2013.
crater Lake National पार्क is a United राज्य National Park located in दक्षिणी ऑरेगॉन.
स्थापित in 1902, Crater Lake नेशनल Park is the fifth oldest national park in the United States and the only one in the state of ऑरेगॉन.
The park encompasses the caldera of crater झील, a remnant of a destroyed volcano, Mount Mazama, and the surrounding hills and forests.
The lake is deep at its deepest point, which makes it the deepest lake in the United States, the second deepest in North America और the ninth deepest in the world.
Crater Lake is often referred to as the seventh deepest lake in the world, but this former listing excludes the approximately depth of subglacial Lake Vostok in Antarctica, which resides under nearly of ice, and the recent report of a maximum depth for Lake O'Higgins /San Martin, located on the border of Chile and Argentina.
however, जब comparing its औसत depth of to the average depth of other deep lakes, Crater Lake becomes the deepest in the Western Hemisphere and the तीसरा deepest in the world.
The impressive average depth of this volcanic lake is due to the nearly symmetrical deep caldera formed 7,700 years ago during the violent climactic eruptions and subsequent collapse of Mount Mazama और the relatively moist climate that is typical of the crest of the Cascade Range.
The caldera rim ranges in elevation from.
The United States Geological सर्वेक्षण benchmarked elevation of the lake surface itself is.
This National Park encompasses.
Crater Lake has no streams flowing into or out of it.
All water that enters the lake is eventually lost from वाष्पीकरण or subsurface seepage.
The lake 's water commonly has a striking ब्लू hue, and the lake is re-filled entirely from सीधा precipitation in the form of snow and rain.
The Supreme Court of the United States is the highest court in the United States.
It has ultimate ( and largely discretionary ) appellate jurisdiction over all federal courts and over state court cases involving issues of federal law, और original jurisdiction over a small दायरा of cases.
The Court, which meets in the United States Supreme Court भवन in Washington, D.C., consists of a मुख्य justice and eight associate justices who हैं nominated by the President and confirmed by the United States Senate.
Once appointed, justices have life tenure जबतक they resign, retire, or are removed after impeachment.

it is स्तिथ about north of Houston.
As of July 2011, the city population थी 58,973, up from 36,811 in 2000.
The Book of Mormon is a sacred टेक्स्ट of the Latter Day Saint movement, which adherents believe contains कृतियाँ of ancient prophets who जिया on the अमरीकी continent from approximately 2200 BC to AD 421.
It was first published in March 1830 by Joseph Smith as The किताब of Mormon : An Account Written by the Hand of Mormon upon Plates Taken from the Plates of Nephi.
according to Smith 's account, and also according to the book 's narrative, the Book of mormon was originally written in otherwise unknown characters referred to as `` reformed Egyptian `` engraved on golden plates.
Smith claimed that the पिछला prophet to contribute to the किताब, a man named Moroni, buried it in a hill in present-day New York and then returned to earth in 1827 as an angel, revealing the location of the book to स्मिथ and instructing उसे to translate and disseminate it as evidence of the restoration of Christ 's true church in the latter days.
The Book of mormon has a number of original and distinctive doctrinal discussions on विषय such as the fall of आदम and Eve, the nature of the Atonement, eschatology, redemption from physical and spiritual मौत, और the organization of the latter-day church.
The pivotal इवेंट of the book is an appearance of Jesus Christ to the Americas shortly after his resurrection.
The Book of Mormon is the earliest of the unique writings of the latter Day Saint movement, the denominations of which typically regard the text not only as scripture but also as a ऐतिहासिक record of God 's dealings with the ancient inhabitants of the Americas.
The Book of Mormon is divided into smaller books, titled after the individuals named as primary authors and, in most versions, divided into chapters and verses.
It is written in English, very similar to the Early Modern English linguistic style of the King James Version of the Bible, and has since been fully or partially translated into 108 languages.
An enlisted rank ( also known as an enlisted grade or enlisted rate ) is, in most militaries, any rank below that of a commissioned officer or warrant officer.
The term can also be inclusive of non-commissioned officers.
In most cases, enlisted service personnel perform jobs विशिष्ट to उनके own occupational specialty, as opposed to the more generalized command responsibilities of commissioned officers.
`` What a Wonderful World '' is a song written by Bob thiele ( as `` George Douglas '' ) and George David Weiss.
It was पहला recorded by Louis Armstrong and released as a single in 1967.
Thiele and वेइस were both prominent in the music world ( Thiele as a producer and Weiss as a composer/performer ).
Armstrong 's रिकॉर्डिंग was inducted in the Grammy हॉल of Fame in 1999.
The publishing for this song is controlled by Memory Lane Music Group, Carlin Music Corp., and Bug म्यूज़िक, Inc.
1908 poster advertising Gaumont 's sound films.
The Chronomégaphone, designed for large halls, employed compressed air to amplify the अंकित sound.
A sound film is a motion picture with synchronized sound, or sound technologically coupled to image, as opposed to a silent film.
the first known public exhibition of projected sound films took place in Paris in 1900, but decades would pass पहले ध्वनि motion pictures were made commercially practical.
Reliable synchronization was difficult to achieve साथ the जल्दी sound-on-disc systems, and amplification and recording quality were भी inadequate.
Innovations in sound-on-film led to the first commercial screening of short motion pictures using the technology, which took place in 1923.
The primary steps in the commercialization of sound cinema were taken in the mid- to late 1920s.
At first, the sound films incorporating synchronized dialogue—known as `` talking pictures '', or `` talkies '' —were exclusively shorts ; the earliest feature-length movies साथ recorded ध्वनि included only music and effects.
The first feature film originally प्रस्तुत as a talkie was the Jazz Singer, released in October 1927.
A major hit, it was made with Vitaphone, the leading brand of sound-on-disc technology.
Sound-on-film, however, would soon become the standard for talking pictures.
By the early 1930s, the talkies यहूद a global phenomenon.
in the United States, they helped secure Hollywood 's position as one of the world 's most powerful cultural/commercial systems ( see Cinema of the United States ).
In Europe ( and, to a lesser degree, elsewhere ) the नई development was treated साथ suspicion by अनेक filmmakers and critics, who worried that a focus on संवाद would subvert the unique aesthetic virtues of soundless cinema.
In Japan, where the popular film tradition integrated silent movie and live vocal performance, talking pictures were slow to लो root.
In India, sound was the transformative element that led to the rapid expansion of the nation 's film industry—the most productive ऐसे industry in the world since the early 1960s.
अफ़्रीकी people are natives or inhabitants of Africa and people of African descent.
The Australian Recording Industry Association Music Awards ( commonly known as ARIA Music पुरस्कार or aria Awards ) is an annual series of awards nights celebrating the Australian music industry, put on by the Australian Recording Industry Association ( aria ).
The event has been held annually since 1987 and encompasses the general genre-specific and popular awards ( these are what is usually being referred to as `` the ARIA awards '' ) as well as Fine Arts Awards and Artisan Awards ( held separately from 2004 ), Lifetime Achievement Awards and ARIA Hall of Fame – held separately from 2005 to 2010 but returned to the general ceremony in 2011.
For 2010, ARIA introduced पब्लिक voted पुरस्कार for the first time.
Winning, or even being nominated for, an ARIA award results in a lot of media attention on an artist, and usually increases recording sales several-fold – in 2005, for example, after Ben Lee won three awards, his एल्बम Awake Is the New नींद jumped from No. 31 to No. 5 in the ARIA Charts, its highest position.
For-profit education ( also known as the education services industry or proprietary education ) refers to educational institutions operated by private, profit -seeking businesses.
There are three types of for-profit schools.
One प्रकार is known as an educational management organization ( EMO ), and ये are primary and secondary educational institutions.
EMOs कार्य with school districts or charter स्कूलों, using public funds to finance operations.
The बहुमत of for-profit schools in the k–12 sector in America function as EMOs, and have grown in number in the mid-2000s.
The other major category of for-profit schools are post-secondary institutions which operate as businesses, receiving fees from each student they enroll.
A third type of for-profit schools, जिससे is less prevalent in the United States, are K–12 schools which operate as businesses.
EMOs function differently from charter schools created in order to carry out a particular teaching pedagogy ; most charter schools are mission-oriented, while EMOs and other for-profit institutions are market-oriented.
जबकि supporters argue that the profit motive encourages efficiency, this arrangement has also drawn controversy and criticism.
Kevin Carey, director of the education policy कार्यक्रम of the New American Foundation कहा in a 2010 column in The वृत्तान्त of Higher Education that `` For-profits exist in large part to fix educational market failures left by traditional institutions, and they profit by serving students that public and private nonprofit institutions too often ignore. ''
He भी noted that `` There 's no doubt that the worst for-profits are ruthlessly exploiting the commodified college degree.
But they did n't commodify it in the first place. ''

The Twenty-second Amendment of the संयुक्त States Constitution sets a term limit for election to the office of अध्यक्ष of the United States.
Congress passed the amendment on March 21, 1947.
It was ratified by the requisite number of states on February 27, 1951.

This list encompasses every episode, शुरूआत with the original Japanese-language title as they aired on TV Asahi, followed by the title used in the English dubbed version airing in the United States on Cartoon संजाल.
A छोटी summary will follow, introducing the episode and referring to some of the gags, लकिन not giving the complete summaries to the episodes.
