A भाप engine is a heat engine that performs mechanical work using भाप as its working fluid.
Using boiling water to produce mechanical motion goes back about 2,000 years, but early devices were not practical.
Since the late 1700s steam engines have become a major source of mechanical power.
The first अनुप्रयोग were removing जल इससे mines.
in 1781 James Watt patented a भाप इंजन that produced continuous rotative motion.
These 10 hp engines enabled a wide range of manufacturing machinery to be powered.
The engines could be sited anywhere that water and coal or wood ईंधन could be obtained.
By 1883, engines that could provide 10,000 hp had become feasible.
Steam engines could also be applied to vehicles such as traction इंजन and the railway locomotives which are commonly just called steam engines outside America.
the stationary steam इंजन was a key component of the Industrial Revolution, allowing factories to locate where water power was unavailable.
आज steam turbines generate about 90 % of the इलेक्ट्रिक power in the United States using a किस्में of heat sources.
Steam engines are external combustion engines, जहाँ the working द्रव is separate इससे the combustion products.
Non-combustion heat sources ऐसे as solar power, nuclear power or geothermal energy may be used.
the ideal thermodynamic cycle used to analyze this process is called the Rankine cycle.
In the साईकिल, water is heated into भाप in a boiler until it reaches a high pressure.
जब expanded through pistons or turbines, mechanical work is done.
The reduced-pressure steam is then condensed and pumped back into the boiler.
In general usage, the term steam engine can refer to either the integrated steam plants ( including boilers etc. ) such as रेल steam इंजनों and portable engines, or may refer to the piston or turbine machinery alone, as in the beam engine and stationary steam engine.
Specialized devices such as steam hammers and भाप pile drivers are dependent on steam supplied from a separate boiler.
A mill engine from Stott Park Bobbin Mill, Cumbria, England
A भाप locomotive in Germany.this class of engine was built in 1942 – 1950 and operated commercially until 1988.
`` Move Bitch '' ( संपादित version titled `` Move B***h '' or simply `` Move '' ) is the third official सिंगल from rapper Ludacris ' एल्बम Word of Mouf.
The single features Mystikal and I-20.
The single reached # 10 on the Billboard Hot 100 making it Ludacris 's first top ten hit on the chart, it also reached # 3 on Hot Rap Tracks and # 3 on hot R & B/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks.
Puerto Rican reggaeton duo Maicol & Manuel sampled the song on `` Hoy Me Levanté '' on their 2002 release yakaleo.
The song is also featured in episode 2, Series One of British teen comedy/drama खालें.
The song was also used by World Wrestling Entertainment superstar montel vontavious Porter during his short stint in Ring of Honor.
It was also used for April Hunter in various Independent circuits.
It was featured in the movie atl starring T.I., and ' Hancock, ' although in the latter, the clean version was used.
A snippet of the song is played during traffic reports on many radio stations, usually carrying an urban/hip-hop स्वरूप.
Retired NBA star and now ESPN analyst jalen Rose is featured in the music video.
The song has been covered by rock band Start ट्रबल, on their album Every Solution Has Its Problem.
It was featured on British sitcom The inbetweeners when the characters Jay and Neil took Will on a 'pussy patrol ' in jay 's red Nissan Micra.
It was sampled by Girl Talk on the first track of his album सब Day, `` oh No ''.
Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 अप्रैल 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign राज्य, known as the Commonwealth realms, and their territories and dependencies, और head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
वो is Supreme Governor of the Church of England and, in कुछ of her realms, carries the शीर्षक of Defender of the Faith as part of her पूरा title.
On उसके accession on 6 February 1952, Elizabeth became सिर of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven independent Commonwealth countries : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, Pakistan and Ceylon.
इससे 1956 to 1992, the number of her realms varied as territories gained independence and some realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the first चार aforementioned countries, Elizabeth is महारानी of Jamaica, Barbados, the Bahamas, हरा, पापुआ New Guinea, the Solomon Islands, Tuvalu, Saint लूसिया, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
उसके reign of सालो is currently the second longest for a British monarch ; only Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years.
Elizabeth was born in London and educated privately at home.
उसके father acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his brother Edward VIII, from which time she was the heir presumptive.
She began to undertake public duties during the Second World War, in which she served in the Auxiliary Territorial Service.
In 1947, she married Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, with whom she has four children : Charles, ऐनी, Andrew, and Edward.
Her coronation service took place in 1953 and was the first to be televised.
The Queen 's many historic visits and meetings include a state विज़िट to the Republic of आयरलैंड and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope.
The Queen has seen प्रमुख constitutional changes in her realms, such as devolution in the United Kingdom and the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
टाइम्स of personal significance have included the births और marriages of her children, the births of her grandchildren, the प्रतिष्ठापन of the Prince of Wales, and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver, Golden, and डायमंड Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, respectively.
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the परेशानियों in Northern Ireland, the Falklands War, wars with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56, the assassination of Prince Philip 's ताऊ, Lord Mountbatten, the breakdown of her children 's marriages in 1992 ( a साल deemed her annus horribilis ), the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law, Diana, Princess of Wales, and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002.
The Queen has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the royal family and रिपब्लिकन sentiments, लकिन support for the monarchy और her personal popularity remain high.
Christianity is the largest religion listed by australians in the national census.
In the 2011 जनसांख्यिकी, 61.1 % of Australians were listed as Christian.
Australia has no official state religion and the Australian संविधान protects freedom of religion.
The presence of Christianity in Australia began साथ the arrival of the पहला Fleet of British convicts in 1788.
The religion grew to account for 96.1 % of the national population at the time of the Federation of Australia in 1901.
The Anglican Church of Australia ( formerly known as the Church of England in Australia ) remained the largest denomination until 1986, when it was surpassed by the Roman Catholic Church in Australia.
Post-war multiculturalism और a decline in धार्मिक observance among some sections of the जनसांख्यिकी have diversified the जनसांख्यिकी of religion in ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as Christian in 2011, the largest denominations were either रोमन Catholic ( 25 % ) or Anglican ( 17 % ), with the third largest denomination being the 5 % affiliated with the Uniting Church in Australia.
Post-war immigration रै grown the संख्याएँ belonging to churches like the Greek Orthodox Archdiocese of ऑस्ट्रेलिया and there are large and growing पेंटेकोस्टल groups, such as Sydney 's Hillsong Church.
The festivals of Easter and Christmas are public holidays in Australia.
Around a quarter of students attend church schools and Christian organisations are leading non-government providers of health and welfare services through organisations like Catholic Health ऑस्ट्रेलिया, Anglicare, unitingcare Australia, the मोक्ष Army and St Vincent de Paul Society.
Historically significant Australian Christians have included Rev Dr John Dunmore लैंग, Saint Mary MacKillop, कैथरीन Helen Spence, Pastor David Unaipon, the Reverend John Flynn and Pastor सर Doug Nicholls.
High profile contemporary Australian Christians include : Tim Costello Baptist minister and current CEO of World Vision Australia, Frank Brennan, Jesuit human rights वकील, Cardinal George Pell, Catholic Archbishop of Sydney, Phillip aspinall the current anglican Primate and Archbishop of Brisbane, Kevin Rudd, former Labor Prime Minister, and Tony Abbott, leader for the Federal Opposition उदार Party.
Charter creating Collegiate स्कूल, which became Yale कॉलेज, October 9, 1701
Yale University is a private Ivy League research university located in New Haven, Connecticut.
Founded in 1701 in the उपनिवेश of Connecticut, the university is the third-oldest institution of higher education in the United States.
Originally chartered as the `` Collegiate School '', the institution traces its roots to 17th-century clergymen who sought to स्थापित a कॉलेज to train clergy and राजनैतिक leaders लिये the colony.
In 1718, the College was renamed `` Yale College '' to honor a तोहफा from Elihu Yale, a governor of the British East India Company.
In 1861, the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences became the first u.S. institution to award the PhD. Yale became a founding member of the Association of American Universities in 1900.
Yale College was transformed, beginning in the 1930s, through the establishment of residential colleges : 12 now मौजूद and two अधिक are planned.
Yale employs over 1,100 faculty to teach and advise about 5,300 undergraduate and 6,100 graduate and पेशेवर students.
Almost all tenured professors teach undergraduate courses, more than 2,000 of जिससे are offered annually.
The विश्वविद्यालयों 's एसेट include an endowment valued at $ 19.4 billion, the second-largest of any अकादमिक संस्था in the world.
Yale 's system of more than two dozen पुस्तकालयों holds 12.5 million volumes.
49 Nobel Laureates have been affiliated with the University as students, faculty, and staff.
Yale has produced many notable alumni, including five U.S. Presidents, 19 U.S. Supreme Court Justices, and several foreign heads of राज्य.
At the graduate level, Yale Law स्कूल, Yale School of Art, and Yale School of Drama हैं consistently ranked the top programs in their फ़ील्ड.
Yale Law School is the most selective law school in the संयुक्त States.
yale students compete intercollegiately as the yale Bulldogs in the NCAA Division I Ivy League.
The oldest intercollegiate athletic event in the United States is the Yale-Harvard regatta.
Artemisia tridentata ( `` big sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an aromatic shrub from the family Asteraceae, which grows in arid and semi-arid conditions, throughout a range of cold desert, steppe, and mountain habitats in the Intermountain West of North America.
The देशी नाम `` sagebrush '' is also used for several related members of the genus Artemisia, such as कैलिफ़ोर्निया Sagebrush ( Artemisia californica ).
Big Sagebrush and other artemisia species are the dominant plants across large portions of the Great Basin, covering some 422,000 square miles in 11 पश्चिमी U.S. & Canadian states.
It is the state flower of Nevada.
sagebrush provides food और habitat for a variety of species, such as sage grouse, pronghorn antelope, gray vireo, pygmy rabbit, and mule deer.
Big sagebrush was used as an herbal medicine by देशी Americans throughout the Intermountain West of North America—especially for preventing infection in wounds, stopping internal bleeding, and treating headaches and colds.
Chemically, the active medicinal constituents include camphor, terpenoids, और tannins.
Several major threats exist to sage brush ecosystems, including human settlements, conversion to agricultural land, livestock grazing, invasive plant species, wildfires, and जलवायु change.
Yahoo ! Mail is a free email service offered by the American search engine company Yahoo !
It was launched in 1997, और, according to comScore, Yahoo ! मेल is the third-largest web-based email service with 281 million users as of December 2012.
Currently, Yahoo ! offers three versions of Yahoo ! Mail.
The traditional `` Yahoo ! Mail Classic '' continues the उपलब्धता of the original interface introduced in 1997.
A version introduced in 2005 included a new Ajax interface, drag-and-drop features, improved search functionality, keyboard shortcuts, पता auto-complete, tabs, and other updated features.
In October 2010, Yahoo ! released a beta version of Yahoo ! मेल, which included improvements to the design, performance, search functionality, and Facebook integration.
In May 2011, beta testing for the new version stopped, and it became the डिफॉल्ट इंटरफ़ेस for Yahoo ! Mail.
In early 2008, Yahoo ! began offering unlimited mail storage to its users in response to heated competition in the free web-mail market segment.
On June 27, 2009, Yahoo ! Messenger was integrated with Yahoo ! Mail.
Tacoma (, ) is a mid-sized urban port city and the county seat of Pierce County, Washington, United States.
The city is on Washington 's Puget Sound, southwest of Seattle, northeast of the state capital, Olympia, and northwest of Mount Rainier National Park.
the population was 198,397, according to the 2010 census.
Tacoma is the second-largest city in the Puget Sound area and the third largest in the state.
Tacoma भी serves as the बीच of business activity for the South Sound region, which has a population of around 1 million people.
टकोमा adopted its name after the nearby Mount Rainier, originally called Mount Tahoma.
It is known as the `` City of Destiny '' because the क्षेत्रफल was chosen to be the western terminus of the Northern Pacific Railroad in the late 19th century.
the निर्णय of the railroad was influenced by Tacoma 's neighboring deep-water harbor, शुरुआत Bay.
By connecting the bay with the railroad Tacoma 's motto became `` जब rails meet sails. ''
Today Commencement Bay serves the Port of टकोमा, a center of international trade on the Pacific Coast and Washington state 's largest बंदरगाहों.
जैसे most central cities, Tacoma suffered a prolonged decline in the mid-20th century as a result of suburbanization and divestment.
Since the 1990s, developments in the downtown core include the University of Washington Tacoma ; Tacoma Link, the first modern electric light rail service in the state ; the state 's highest density of art and history museums ; और a restored urban waterfront, the Thea Foss Waterway.
With a long history of blue-collar labor politics — from the railroad workers of the 19th century, to the longshoremen of the 20th century, to the Labor Ready workers of आज — Tacoma रै long been known for its rough, किरकिरी image.
A सोंग about Tacoma, `` Thrice All American '', by American singer-songwriter and former resident Neko Case, describes it as `` a dusty old jewel in the South Puget Sound / where the factories निकले / and the timber 's all cut down ''.
Tacoma-Pierce County has been named one of the most livable areas in the country.
टकोमा was also recently listed as the 19th most walkable city in the country.
In contrast, the city is also ranked as the most stressed-out city in the country in a 2004 survey.
In 2006, women 's magazine Self named Tacoma the `` Most Sexually Healthy City '' in the United States.
In 2012, The Advocate gave Tacoma the title of `` Gayest City in America '', in part because of the large diversity of पब्लिक कार्यालयों held, and Washington State passing a bill in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to marry.
Tacoma is famous for the 1940 collapse of the Tacoma narrows सेतु.
Chula विस्टा ( ; ) is the second largest city in the San Diego metropolitan क्षेत्रफल, the seventh largest city in Southern California, the fourteenth largest city in the राज्य of California, and the 77th-largest city in the United States.
The population was 243,916 as of the 2010 census.
Located just from downtown San Diego and from the Mexican border in the South Bay region of the metropolitan area, the city is at the center of one of the richest economic and culturally diverse zones in the United States.
Chula Vista is so named because of its scenic location between the सैन Diego Bay and coastal mountain foothills.
Founded in the early 19th century, fast population growth has recently been observed in the city.
As the second largest नगर in San Diego County, Chula Vista has quickly become a destination popular to many tourists.
स्तिथ in the city is one of America 's few year-round United States Olympic Training centers and popular tourist destinations include Cricket Wireless Amphitheater, the Chula विस्टा marina, and the Chula Vista Nature बीच.
Metes और bounds is a system or method of describing land, real property ( in contrast to निजी property ) or real estate.
The system has been used in इंग्लैण्ड for many centuries, and is still used there in the definition of general boundaries.
By custom, it was applied in the original Thirteen Colonies that became the United States, and in many अन्य land jurisdictions based on English आम law.
Typically the system uses physical features of the local भूगोल, साथ with directions and distances, to define and describe the सीमाएँ of a parcel of land.
The boundaries are described in a running prose style, working around the parcel in sequence, from a point of beginning, returning back to the same point ; compare साथ the मौखिक ritual of beating the bounds.
It may include references to other adjoining parcels ( and their owners ), and it, in turn, could also be referred to in later surveys.
At the time the description is compiled, it may have been marked on the ground with permanent monuments placed where वहीँ were no suitable natural monuments.
The term `` metes '' refers to a boundary defined by the measurement of each straight run, specified by a अलहदा between the terminal points, and an अभिविन्यास or direction.
A direction may be a simple compass bearing, or a precise orientation determined by accurate सर्वेक्षण methods.
The term `` bounds '' refers to a more general boundary description, such as along a certain watercourse, a stone wall, an adjoining public road रास्ता, or an existing building.
The system is often used to define larger pieces of property ( e.g. farms ), और political subdivisions ( e.g. town boundaries ) where precise definition is not required or would be far too expensive, or previously designated boundaries can be incorporated into the description.
Sir Isaac Newton ( 25 December 164220 March 1727 ) was an English physicist and mathematician who is widely regarded as one of the most influential scientists of all time and as a कुंजी figure in the scientific revolution.
His book Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` Mathematical Principles of Natural Philosophy '' ), first published in 1687, laid the foundations for most of classical mechanics.
Newton also made seminal contributions to optics and shares credit with Gottfried Leibniz for the invention of the infinitesimal calculus.
Newton 's Principia formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation that dominated scientists ' view of the physical universe for the next three centuries.
It also demonstrated that the motion of वस्तुएँ on the Earth and that of celestial bodies could be described by the same principles.
By deriving Kepler 's laws of planetary motion from his mathematical description of gravity, Newton removed the last doubts about the वैध of the heliocentric model of the ब्रह्मांड.
Newton built the first व्यावहारिक reflecting telescope and developed a theory of colour based on the observation that a prism decomposes white light into the many colours of the visible spectrum.
He भी formulated an empirical law of cooling and studied the speed of sound.
In addition to his work on the calculus, as a mathematician Newton contributed to the पढ़ाई of power series, generalised the binomial theorem to non-integer exponents, and developed Newton 's method for approximating the roots of a function.
न्यूटन was a fellow of Trinity College and the second Lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the University of कैम्ब्रिज.
He was a devout but unorthodox Christian and, unusually for a member of the Cambridge faculty, he refused to take holy orders in the Church of England, perhaps because he privately rejected the doctrine of trinitarianism.
In जोड to उसके work on the mathematical sciences, Newton also dedicated much of his समय to the study of alchemy and biblical chronology, but most of his work in those areas remained unpublished until long after his death.
In his बाद life, Newton became president of the Royal Society.
He also served the British government as Warden and Master of the Royal Mint.
Prof. Walter lewin explains Newton 's law of gravitation in MIT course 8.01
Satellites and projectiles all obey Newton 's law of gravitation
Newton 's law of universal gravitation states that every point mass in the universe attracts प्रत्येक other point mass with a force that is directly proportional to the product of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them.
( Separately it was shown that large spherically symmetrical masses attract and are attracted as if all their mass were concentrated at their centers. )
This is a general physical law derived from अनुभवजन्य observations by what Newton called induction.
It is a part of classical mechanics and was formulated in Newton 's work Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` the Principia '' ), first published on 5 July 1687.
( When Newton 's book was presented in 1686 to the Royal समाज, रॉबर्ट Hooke made a अर्जी कि Newton had obtained the inverse square law from him – see History section below. )
In modern भाषा, the law states the following:
Assuming si units, F is measured in newtons ( n ), m1 and m2 in kilograms ( kg ), r in meters ( m ), and the constant g is approximately equal to.
The value of the constant G थी first accurately determined from the results of the Cavendish experiment conducted by the British scientist Henry Cavendish in 1798, although Cavendish did not himself गणना a numerical मान for G.
This experiment was also the first test of Newton 's theory of gravitation between masses in the laboratory.
it took प्लेस 111 years after the publication of Newton 's प्रिन्सिपिया and 71 years after Newton 's death, so none of Newton 's calculations could use the value of G ; instead he could only calculate a force relative to another force.
Newton 's law of gravitation resembles Coulomb 's law of विद्युत forces, which is used to calculate the magnitude of electrical force between दो charged bodies.
Both are inverse-square laws, in which force is inversely proportional to the square of the distance between the bodies.
Coulomb 's Law has the product of two charges in place of the product of the masses, and the electrostatic constant in प्लेस of the gravitational constant.
Newton 's law has since महरूम superseded by Einstein 's theory of general relativity, but it continues to be used as an excellent approximation of the प्रभाव of gravity.
Relativity is जरूरी only when there is a need for extreme precision, or when dealing with gravitation for extremely massive and dense objects.
White and red flags, representing Iraqi and अमरीकी deaths, बैठना in the grass quadrangle of The Valley Library on the Corvallis, Oregon, कैम्पस of Oregon State University.
As part of the traveling Iraq Body Count exhibit from 2008 to 2009 ( not related to इराकी Body Count project ), the flags aim to `` raise awareness of the human cost of the Iraq War. ''
( May 2008 )
Casualties of the विरोध in Iraq since 2003 ( beginning with the 2003 invasion of इराकी, and continuing with the ensuing occupation of Iraq, as well as the क्रियाएँ of the various armed groups ऑपरेटिंग in the country ) have come in many फ़ॉर्म, and the accuracy of the information available on different types of Iraq War casualties varies greatly.
The table below summarizes various estimates of the इराकी casualty figures.
For troops in the U.S.-led multinational coalition, the death toll is carefully tracked और updated daily, and the names and photographs of those killed in action as well as in दुर्घटनाओं have महरूम published widely.
A total of 4,486 U.S. soldiers were killed in Iraq between 2003 and 2012.
Regarding the Iraqis, however, information on दोनो military and civilian casualties is दोनो less precise and less consistent.
Estimates of casualty levels are available from reporters on the scene, from officials of शामिल organizations, and from groups that summarize information on incidents reported in the news media.
The शब्द `` casualties `` in its most general sense शामिल the injured as well as the dead.
Accounts of the number of गठबन्धन wounded vary widely, partly because it is not स्पष्ट what should be counted : should only those injuries serious enough to put a soldier out of commission be included ?
Do बीमारियों or injuries caused by accidents count, or should the फ़ोकस be restricted to wounds caused by hostile engagement ?
Sources using different definitions may arrive at very different numbers, and sometimes the precise definition is not clearly specified.
Asalto al coche ( Robbery of the कोच ), by Francisco de Goya
A highwayman was a thief and brigand who preyed on travellers.
This प्रकार of outlaw usually travelled and robbed by horse, as compared to a footpad who travelled and robbed on foot.
Mounted robbers यहूद widely considered to be socially superior to footpads.
Such robbers operated in Great ब्रिटेन and Ireland from the Elizabethan era until the जल्दी 19th century.
the word highwayman is पहला known to be used in the year 1617 ; other euphemisms included `` knights of the road '' and `` gentlemen of the road. ''
दो terms applied to 19th-century उत्तर अमरीकी highwaymen were road agents in some instances for mountain bandits while in other cases the term is Rlallaala for mountain-based ruffians.
In the वही time period in Australia, वे were ज्ञात as bushrangers.
Earvin `` Magic '' Johnson, Jr. ( born अगस्त 14, 1959 ) is a retired American professional basketball खिलाड़ी who played पाइंट guard for the Los Angeles Lakers of the नेशनल Basketball Association ( NBA ).
After जीतना championships in high school and college, Johnson was selected first overall in the 1979 NBA Draft by the Lakers.
He won a championship and an NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award in his rookie season, and जीती four more championships with the Lakers during the 1980s.
Johnson retired abruptly in 1991 after announcing that he had contracted HIV, but returned to play in the 1992 All-Star Game, winning the All-Star MVP Award.
After protests from his fellow players, he retired again for four years, but returned in 1996, at age 36, to खेल 32 games for the Lakers before retiring for the third and final समय.
Johnson 's career उपलब्धियाँ include three NBA MVP Awards, nine NBA Finals appearances, twelve All-Star games, and ten All-NBA First and Second Team nominations.
He led the league in regular-season assists four times, and is the NBA 's all-time leader in average assists per game, at 11.2.
Johnson was a member of the `` Dream टोली ``, the U.S. basketball team that won the Olympic gold medal in 1992.
After leaving the NBA in 1992, Johnson formed the Magic जॉनसन All-Stars, a barnstorming team that travelled around the world playing exhibition games.
जॉनसन was honored as one of the 50 Greatest Players in NBA History in 1996, and enshrined in the बास्केट Hall of Fame in 2002.
He was रेटेड the greatest NBA point guard of सब time by ESPN in 2007.
His friendship and rivalry with Boston Celtics star Larry Bird, whom he faced in the 1979 NCAA finals and three NBA championship श्रेणी, were well documented.
Since his retirement, Johnson has been an advocate for HIV/ AIDS prevention और safe sex, as well as an entrepreneur, philanthropist, broadcaster and motivational स्पीकर.
Johnson was a part-owner of the Lakers for अनेक years, and was part of a group that purchased the Los एंजिल्स Dodgers in 2012.
Allium cells in different phases of the cell cycle
The cells of eukaryotes ( left ) and prokaryotes ( right )
The cell is the basic structural, functional and biological unit of all known living organisms.
It is the smallest unit of life that is classified as a living thing ( except virus, which consists only from DNA/RNA covered by protein and lipids ), and is often called the भवन block of life.
It consists of a protoplasm enclosed within a membrane, which contains many biomolecules such as proteins and nucleic acids.
Organisms can be classified as unicellular ( consisting of a single cell ; including सबसे bacteria ) or multicellular ( including plants and पशु ).
While the number of cells in plants and animals varies इससे species to species, Humans contain about 100 trillion ( 1014 ) cells.
Most plant and animal cells are between 1 and 100 micrometres and therefore are visible only under the microscope.
The cell was discovered by Robert Hooke in 1665.
The cell theory, first developed in 1839 by Matthias Jakob Schleiden और theodor Schwann, states that all organisms are composed of one or more cells, कि सब cells आइये from preexisting cells, that vital functions of an organism occur भीतर cells, and that all cells contain the hereditary information necessary for regulating cell functions और लिये transmitting information to the अगला generation of cells.
Cells emerged on planet Earth at least 4.0–4.3 billion years ago.
The word cell comes from the Latin cella, meaning `` small room ''.
The descriptive term for the smallest living biological structure was coined by रॉबर्ट Hooke in a book he published in 1665 जब he compared the cork cells he saw through his microscope to the small rooms भिक्षुओं जिया in.
Grecian Formula is a men 's hair coloring product in the United States.
Canada and Europe previously बैन the product because of its use of lead acetate.
A motor scooter 's front with an impractical number and variety of headlamps, added for decorative उद्देश्य
A headlamp is a lamp attached to the front of a vehicle to light the सड़क ahead.
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile age, spurred by the great disparity between daytime and nighttime traffic fatalities : the u.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration states that nearly half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the dark, despite only 25 % of ट्रैफ़िक travelling during darkness.
While it is common for the term headlight to be used interchangeably in informal discussion, headlamp is the term for the यंत्र itself, while headlight properly refers to the beam of light produced and distributed by the device.
Other vehicles, such as trains and aircraft, are जरूरी to have headlamps.
Bicycle headlamps are often used on साइकिल, and are required in some jurisdictions.
They can be powered by a battery or a small electrical generator on the wheel.
Additionally automotive night vision systems कार्य to supplement headlamps.
Women 's rights are the rights and entitlements claimed for women and girls of many societies worldwide.
In some स्थान these rights are institutionalized or supported by law, local custom, and behaviour, whereas in अन्य वे may be ignored or suppressed.
They differ from broader notions of human rights through claims of an inherent historical and traditional पूर्वाग्रह विरूद्ध the कसरत of अधिकारों by women and girls in favour of men and boys.
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's rights include, though are not limited to, the right : to bodily integrity and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold public office ; to कार्य ; to fair wages or equal pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital, parental and religious rights.
Caryn ऐलेन जॉनसन, best known as whoopi Goldberg (, ( born November 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, actress, singer-songwriter, political activist, author and talk show host.
Goldberg बना her film डेब्यू in The Color Purple ( 1985 ), playing Celie, a mistreated black woman in the Deep South.
She received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best अभिनेत्री और won her first Golden Globe Award for her role in the film.
In 1990, she played Oda Mae Brown, a wacky psychic helping a slain man ( Patrick Swayze ) save his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost.
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; इस made Goldberg only the second black woman in the history of the Academy Awards to win an acting Oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who जीती for Gone With the Wind in 1939.
Notable बाद films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2, The Player, बना in America, How Stella Got Her Groove Back, Girl, Interrupted and चूहा रेस.
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation, as Terry Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack Flash, and as Carmen Tibideaux in Glee, as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
Goldberg has been nominated for 13 Emmy Awards for her work in television.
She was co-producer of the popular game show Hollywood Squares from 1998 to 2004.
She has been the moderator of the daytime talk दिखाएँ The दृश्य चूंकि 2007.
Goldberg has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, two सुनहरी Globes, a Tony ( for production, not acting ), and an Oscar.
In addition, Goldberg has a British Academy Film पुरस्कार, चार People 's Choice Awards, and has been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
वो is one of the few entertainers who have won an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and टोनी Award.
The National Hockey League ( एनएचएल ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' which operates a major professional ice hockey league of 30 franchised member clubs, of which seven are currently स्तिथ in Canada and 23 in the United States.
Headquartered in New York City, the NHL is widely considered to be the premier professional ice हॉकी league in the world, and one of the प्रमुख professional sports leagues in the United States और कनाडा.
The Stanley Cup, the oldest professional खेल trophy in North America, is awarded annually to the league playoff चैंपियन at the end of each season.
the league was organized on November 26, 1917, in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, after the suspension of operations of its पूर्ववर्ती organization, the नेशनल Hockey Association ( NHA ), which had been founded in 1909.
It started with four teams and, through a series of expansions, contractions, और relocations, the league is now composed of 30 active franchises.
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred was Canada, although the league has अभी been binational since 1924 when it expanded into the संयुक्त राज्य.
बाद a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 season, the league resumed play under a new collective bargaining अनुबंध that included a सैलरी cap.
In 2009, the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of sponsorships, attendance, and television audiences.
The NHL draws many highly skilled players from all over the संसार and currently has players from परिचय 20 different देशों.
Although Canadians have historically गठित the majority of the players in the NHL, over the पास्ट चार plus decades the percentages of US and European players have increased both क्युकी of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled यूरोपीय players.
Maggots feeding on carrion.
A maggot is the larva of a fly ( order Diptera ) ; it is applied in particular to the larvae of Brachyceran flies, such as houseflies, चीज flies, and blowflies, rather than larvae of the Nematocera, such as mosquitoes and क्रेन flies.
`` Maggot '' is not a technical term and should not be taken as ऐसे ; in many मानक textbooks of entomology it does not appear in the index at all.
In अनेक non-technical texts the term is used for insect larvae in general.
Other sources have coined their अपना definitions ; for example : ``...
The term applies to a grub जब all trace of limbs has disappeared... '' and ``... Applied to the footless larvae of Dipters. ''
Maggot-like fly larvae are of wide importance in पारिस्थितिकी and medicine ; among other roles, various species are prominent in रीसाइक्लिंग carrion and garbage, attacking crops and foodstuffs, spreading microbial infections, and causing myiasis.
Herod (, Hordos, Greek :, Hērōdēs ), also ज्ञात as Herod the Great ( 73/74 BCE – 4 BCE in Jericho ), was a Roman client king of Judea.
His epithet of `` the Great '' is widely disputed as he is described as `` a madman who murdered his own family और a great many rabbis ``.
He is भी ज्ञात for his colossal building projects in Jerusalem and elsewhere, including his expansion of the Second Temple in Jerusalem ( sometimes referred to as Herod 's Temple ) and the construction of the port at Caesarea Maritima.
Important details of his biography are gleaned from the works of the 1st century CE Roman–Jewish historian Josephus Flavius.
The Romans made Herod 's son, Herod Archelaus, ethnarch of Judea, Samaria, and Idumea ( biblical Edom ) from 4 BCE to 6 ce, referred to as the tetrarchy of Judea.
archelaus was judged incompetent by the Roman emperor Augustus who then combined Samaria, judea proper and Idumea into Iudaea province under rule of a prefect until आयु 41.
Herod 's other son Herod Antipas was tetrarch of Galilee from 4 BCE–39 CE.
ABO blood group antigens present on red blood cells and IgM antibodies उपस्थित in the serum
The ABO blood group प्रणाली is the most important blood type system ( or blood group system ) in human blood transfusion.
The संबद्ध anti-a and anti-B antibodies are usually IgM antibodies, which are usually produced in the first years of life by sensitization to environmental substances such as food, bacteria, and viruses.
ABO blood types are also उपस्थित in कुछ other animals, for example apes such as chimpanzees, bonobos, and gorillas.

Northville is an affluent city स्तिथ in और divided by Oakland and Wayne counties in the U.S. state of Michigan.
The area is a suburb of Metropolitan Detroit.
The population was 5,970 at the 2010 census.
Most of the नगर is in Oakland County, and is surrounded by the city of novi.

Northville is served by northville Public Schools.
The city is स्तिथ northeast of Ann Arbor and northwest of Detroit.

Misfits is a British विज्ञान fiction comedy-drama television show about a group of young offenders sentenced to work in a community service programme, where they obtain अलौकिक powers after a strange electrical storm.
The series opened in 2009 and is currently ongoing.

Brett Lorenzo Favre ( born अक्तूबर 10, 1969 ) is a former American football quarterback who खर्च the majority of his career with the ग्रीन Bay Packers of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League ( NFL ).
He was a 20-year veteran of the NFL, having played quarterback for the Atlanta Falcons ( 1991 ), Green Bay Packers ( 1992 – 2007 ), New York Jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ).
Favre is the only quarterback in NFL history to throw for over 70,000 yards, over 500 touchdowns, over 300 interceptions, over 6,000 completions, and over 10,000 pass attempts.
Favre started at the quarterback स्थिति for the विश्वविद्यालयों of Southern Mississippi for four years before being selected in the second round of the 1991 NFL Draft by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ).
He was traded to Green Bay on February 10, 1992, for the 19th pick in the 1992 NFL Draft.
favre became the Packers ' starting quarterback in the fourth खेल of the 1992 season, stepping in for injured quarterback Don Majkowski, and started every game through the 2007 season.
He was traded to the New York Jets and started at क्वार्टरबैक for the 2008 season before signing with the वाइकिंग्स on August 18, 2009 as their starting quarterback.
He made an NFL record 297 consecutive starts ( 321 including playoffs ).
He is the only player to win the AP सबसे Valuable खिलाड़ी three consecutive times ( 1995–97 ).
He has led टीमों to eight division championships ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2007, 2009 ), पाँच NFC Championship Games ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2007, 2009 ), and two Super Bowl appearances ( सुपर Bowl XXXI, Super Bowl XXXII ), winning one ( सुपर Bowl XXXI ).
He holds many NFL records, including most career touchdown गुजरता, most career passing yards, most career pass completions, सबसे career pass attempts, most career interceptions thrown, most consecutive starts by a खिलाड़ी, most consecutive starts by a quarterback, most career victories as a starting quarterback, most sacked, and most fumbles.
He is also referred to by his nickname `` The Gunslinger ''.

The संसार Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3, commonly known as the web ), is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet.
With a web browser, one can view वेब pages that may contain टेक्स्ट, images, videos, and other multimedia, and navigate between them via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE, British इंजीनियर, computer scientist and at that time employee of the CERN, Sir टिम Berners-Lee, now Director of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ), wrote a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland, Berners-Lee and Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau proposed in 1990 to use hypertext `` to कड़ी and access सूचना of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can browse at will '', और वे सरेआम introduced the project in December of the same year.
Wayne Lyman Morse ( अक्तूबर 20, 1900July 22, 1974 ) थी a राजनेता and attorney from Oregon, United राज्य, known for his proclivity for opposing his parties ' leadership, and specifically for his opposition to the Vietnam War on constitutional grounds.
Born in Madison, Wisconsin, and educated at the University of wisconsin-madison and the University of Minnesota Law School, Morse moved to Oregon in 1930 and began teaching at the University of Oregon School of Law.
During World War II he थी elected to the United States Senate as a Republican ; he became an Independent after Dwight D. Eisenhower 's election to the presidency in 1952.
While an independent, he set a रिकार्ड for performing the second longest one-person filibuster in the history of the Senate.
Morse joined the Democratic Party in 1955, और थी reelected twice while a member of that party.
मोर्स made a brief run for the Democratic Party 's presidential nomination in 1960.
A few years later, Morse was one of only two Senators who opposed the Gulf of Tonkin रेज़ोल्यूशन, which authorized the president to take military action in Vietnam without a declaration of war.
He continued to speak out against the war in the ensuing years, and खोया his 1968 bid for reelection to Bob packwood, जो criticized his strong opposition to the war.
Morse made two more bids for reelection to the Senate before his death in 1974.
In parliamentary procedure, a motion to table has two different and contradictory meanings:
In the United States, to table usually means the to lay [ the topic ] on the तालिका or to move for postponement of consideration ; a proposal to suspend consideration of a pending motion.
Much less often, it means a motion to `` put on the table '' : a proposal to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ), a usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world.
In the rest of the English-speaking world such as the United Kingdom, to table अर्थात् to move to place [ the topic ] upon the table ( or to move to place on the table ) : a proposal to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ) of a proposal.
Both the American and the British dialects have the sense of `` to table '' as to lay [ the topic ] on the table or to कारण [ the topic ] to lie on the table.
The अंतर is the idea of कया the table is for, that of a shelf off to the side, or an क्रियाशील work बेंच.
The अंग्रेजों meaning has the sense of the table as being an active कार्य bench, with the topic being the center of attention, considered and discussed by all until it can be resolved, at which point it is taken off the 'table '.
The अमरीकी sense is that the table is जैसे that of a shelf, archive, or long-term storage यंत्र, where the topic has been disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' और leaving it there.
Toy Story 3 is a 2010 American 3d computer animated comedy-drama prison film, and the third installment in the Toy Story श्रेणी.
It was produced by Pixar Animation Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
Directed by Lee Unkrich, the film थी released worldwide from June through October in Disney Digital 3-D, RealD, and IMAX 3D.
Toy Story 3 थी also the first film to be released theatrically with Dolby Surround 7.1 sound.
The पटकथा was written by Michael arndt, while Unkrich लिखा the story along साथ John Lasseter and एंड्रयू Stanton, respectively director and co-writer of the two first films.
The plot focuses on the toys Woody, Buzz Lightyear, और their friends dealing with an uncertain भविष्य as their मालिक, Andy, prepares to leave for college.
Actors Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Don Rickles, Estelle Harris, John Ratzenberger, Wallace Shawn, Jeff Pidgeon, Jodi Benson, R. Lee Ermey, John मॉरिस, और लॉरी metcalf reprised their voice-over roles from the previous films.
Jim Varney, who played Slinky Dog in the पहला two films, and Joe Ranft, जो portrayed Lenny and Wheezy, both died before production began on खिलौना Story 3.
the role of Slinky Dog was taken over by Blake Clark ( a friend of Varney ), while Ranft 's characters and various others were written out of the story.
New characters include performances by Ned Beatty, टिमोथी Dalton, Kristen Schaal, Bonnie Hunt, Whoopi Goldberg, Jeff Garlin, Richard Kind, and Michael Keaton.
The feature broke Shrek the Thirds record as the biggest opening day North American gross for an animated film unadjusted for inflation, and a big opening with an unadjusted gross of $ 110,307,189.
It is also the highest-grossing opening weekend लिये a Pixar film, as well as the highest-grossing opening weekend for a फिल्मी to have opened in the month of June.
This is the highest-grossing film of 2010, both in the United States and कनाडा, and worldwide.
In जल्दी August, it became पिक्चर्स 's highest-grossing film at the North American box दफ्तर ( surpassing Finding Nemo ), and the highest-grossing animated film of all समय worldwide ( surpassing Shrek 2 ) ; later कि माह, Toy Story 3 became the first ever animated film in history to make over $ 1 billion worldwide.
It is currently the 10th-highest-grossing film of all समय.
Toy Story 3 was nominated लिये five Academy Awards, including Best Picture, Best adapted Screenplay, and Best Sound Editing.
It was the third एनिमेटेड film ( after सौंदर्य and the Beast and Up ) to be nominated for Academy Award for Best चित्र.
It won the awards for Best Animated Feature and Best Original Song.
John Levell Starks ( born August 10, 1965 ) is an American retired professional basketball shooting गार्ड.
Starks was listed at 6'5 '' and 190 pounds during his एनबीए playing करियर.
Although he was not drafted in the 1988 NBA Draft after attending four कॉलेजों in his native Oklahoma, including Oklahoma State University, he gained fame while playing for the नई York Knicks of the National Basketball Association in the 1990s.
सुरक्षित Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory card format for use in portable devices, such as mobile phones, digital cameras, GPS नेविगेशन devices, और tablet computers.
The Secure Digital standard is maintained by the SD Card Association ( SDA ).
SD technologies have महरूम implemented in more than 400 brands across dozens of उत्पाद categories और more than 8,000 models.
the Secure Digital format includes चार card परिवारों available in three different form factors.
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity ( SDSC ), the High-Capacity ( SDHC ), the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ), और the SDIO, जिससे combines input/output कृत्यों with आंकड़ा storage.
The three form factors are the original size, the `` mini '' size, and the `` micro '' size ( देखिए illustration ).
There are many combinations of form factors and device families.
Electrically passive adapters allow the use of a smaller card in a host device built to थाम a larger card.
Host डिवाइस that comply with नए versions of the specification provide backward compatibility and accept पुरानी SD cards, but this article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may offer greater capacity than the host device can handle.
A newer card may use a file system the host device can not navigate.
Use of an SDIO card requires the host device be designed for the input/output functions the card provides.
The organization of the card was changed starting with the SDHC family.
Some vendors produced SDSC cards above 1 GB before the SDA had मानकीकृत a method of doing so.
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce compliance with its specifications and assure users of compatibility.
ह्यूज John Mungo Grant ( born 9 September 1960 ) is a British actor और film producer.
He has received a Golden Globe, a BAFTA, and an Honorary César.
His films have earned more than US $ 2.4 billion from 25 theatrical releases worldwide.
Grant हासिल international stardom after appearing in Richard Curtis 's successful Four Weddings और a Funeral ( 1994 ).
He used this breakthrough role as a frequent cinematic persona during the 1990s, delivering comic performances in mainstream films जैसे Mickey ब्लू Eyes ( 1999 ) and Notting Hill ( 1999 ).
By the turn of the 21st सदी, he had established himself as a leading man skilled with a satirical comic talent.
Grant has expanded his oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a cad in Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ), About A Boy ( 2002 ), Love Actually ( 2003 ), and American Dreamz ( 2006 ).
He बाद played against type with multiple cameo roles in the epic drama film Cloud Atlas ( 2012 ).
भीतर the film industry, Grant is cited as an anti-film star who approaches his roles like a character actor, and attempts to make his acting appear spontaneous.
Hallmarks of उसके comic skills include a nonchalant touch of irony / sarcasm and studied physical mannerisms as well as his precisely-timed dialogue delivery and facial expressions.
The entertainment media 's coverage of Grant 's life off the big screen has often overshadowed his work as a thespian.
He has been vocal about his disrespect for the profession of acting, and in his disdain towards the culture of celebrity and hostility towards the media.
In a career spanning 30 years, Grant has repeatedly claimed that acting is not a true calling but just a job he fell into.
The Han Dynasty ( ; ) ( 206 BC – 220 ad ) was an इम्पीरियल dynasty of China, preceded by the Qin Dynasty ( 221–207 BC ) and succeeded by the Three Kingdoms ( 220–280 AD ).
It was founded by the rebel leader Liu Bang, known posthumously as Emperor Gaozu of Han.
It was briefly बाधित by the Xin Dynasty ( 9–23 AD ) of the former regent Wang Mang.
इस interregnum separates the Han into two periods : the Western Han ( 206 BC – 9 ad ) and Eastern Han ( 25–220 AD ).
Spanning over four centuries, the काल of the हान Dynasty is considered a golden age in Chinese history.
To this day, China 's majority ethnic group refers to itself as the `` Han लोगों '' and the Chinese script is referred to as `` Han characters ``.
The Han Empire was divided into areas directly controlled by the central government, known as commanderies, and a number of semi-autonomous kingdoms.
ये kingdoms धीरे lost all vestiges of their independence, विशेषकर following the Rebellion of the Seven States.
The Xiongnu, a nomadic confederation which dominated the eastern Eurasian Steppe, defeated the Han army in battle in 200 BC.
Following the defeat, a political marriage गठबंधन was negotiated in which the Han became the de facto अवर partner.
जब, despite the treaty, the Xiongnu continued to raid Han borders, सम्राट Wu of Han ( r. 141–87 BC ) launched several military campaigns against them.
The ultimate Han विजय in ये wars eventually forced the Xiongnu to accept vassal status as Han tributaries.
ये campaigns expanded Han sovereignty into the Tarim Basin of Central Asia and helped establish the vast trade network known as the Silk Road, which reached as दूर as the Mediterranean world.
Han forces managed to divide the Xiongnu into two competing nations, the Southern and Northern Xiongnu, and forced the उत्तरी Xiongnu across the Ili River.
despite these victories, the territories north of Han 's borders were जल्दी overrun by the nomadic Xianbei Confederation.
बाद 92 AD, the palace eunuchs increasingly involved themselves in court politics, engaging in violent power struggles between the various consort clans of the empresses and empress dowagers, causing the Han 's ultimate downfall.
Imperial प्राधिकार was also seriously challenged by large Daoist religious societies which instigated the Yellow Turban Rebellion and the Five Pecks of Rice Rebellion.
Following the death of Emperor Ling ( r. 168–189 AD ), the palace eunuchs suffered wholesale massacre by military officers, allowing members of the aristocracy और military राज्यपालों to become warlords and divide the empire.
When Cao Pi, King of Wei, usurped the throne from सम्राट Xian, the Han राजवंश ceased to मौजूद.
The Han Dynasty was an age of economic prosperity and saw a significant growth of the money economy first स्थापित दौरान the Zhou Dynasty ( c. 1050–256 BC ).
The coinage issued by the central government mint in 119 BC remained the standard coinage of China until the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907 ad ).
to pay लिये its military campaigns and the settlement of newly conquered frontier territories, the government nationalized the private salt and iron industries in 117 BC.
These government monopolies were repealed during the Eastern Han period, and the lost revenue was recouped through heavily taxing private उद्यमियों.
the emperor was at the pinnacle of Han society.
He presided over the Han government but shared power with both the nobility and नियुक्त ministers who came largely from the scholarly gentry class.
From the reign of Emperor wu onward, the Chinese court officially sponsored Confucianism in education and अदालत politics, synthesized with the cosmology of later scholars such as Dong Zhongshu.
This policy endured until the fall of the Qing Dynasty in 1911 AD.
Science and technology during the Han period saw significant अग्रिम, including papermaking, the nautical steering अरित्र, the use of negative numbers in mathematics, the raised-relief map, the hydraulic -powered armillary sphere for खगोलशास्त्र, and a भूकम्पमापी employing an inverted लोलक.
Tourette syndrome ( also called tourette 's syndrome, Tourette 's disorder, Gilles de la Tourette सिंड्रोम, GTS or, more commonly, simply Tourette 's or TS ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric disorder with onset in childhood, characterized by multiple physical ( motor ) tics and at तनिक one vocal ( phonic ) tic.
These tics characteristically wax and wane, can be suppressed temporarily, and are preceded by a premonitory urge.
Tourette 's is पारिभाषित as part of a spectrum of tic disorders, which includes transient and chronic tics.
Tourette 's was once considered a rare and bizarre syndrome, most often associated साथ the exclamation of obscene words or socially inappropriate and derogatory remarks ( coprolalia ), but this symptom is उपस्थित in तभी a small minority of people with tourette 's.
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare condition, लकिन it is not always correctly identified क्युकी सबसे cases are mild और the severity of tics decreases for most children as they pass through किशोरावस्था.
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 % of children ages 5 to 18 may have Tourette 's ; the व्यापकता of transient and chronic tics in school-age children is higher, with the more common tics of eye blinking, coughing, throat clearing, सूँघने, and facial movements.
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity, and Tourette 's does not adversely affect प्रज्ञा or life expectancy.
Genetic और environmental factors play a role in the etiology of Tourette 's, but the exact causes are unknown.
In most cases, medication is unnecessary.
There is no effective treatment for every case of tics, but certain medications and therapies can help when their use is warranted.
शिक्षा is an important part of any treatment plan, and explanation and reassurance alone are often sufficient treatment.
Comorbid शर्तें ( co-occurring diagnoses other than Tourette 's ) such as attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) and obsessive–compulsive disorder ( OCD ) are present in many patients देखी in tertiary specialty clinics.
These other conditions often कारण more functional impairment to the individual than the tics that are the hallmark of Tourette 's, hence it is important to correctly identify comorbid conditions and treat them.
The eponym was bestowed by jean-martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on निमित्त of उसके निवासी, Georges Albert Édouard Brutus Gilles de la Tourette ( 1859–1904 ), a French physician and neurologist, who प्रकाशित an account of nine patients with Tourette 's in 1885.
Sunbeam badge.
Sunbeam was a marque registered by जॉन Marston Co. Ltd of Wolverhampton, England, in 1888.
the company first made bicycles, then मोटरसाइकिल and cars from the late 19th century until about 1936, and applied the marque to all three forms of transportation.
the company also manufactured aero engines in the First World War and 647 aircraft during the Second संसार War.
A Sunbeam was the first British car to win a Grand Prix race, and set a क्रमांक of land speed records.
The company गई into receivership in 1935 and was purchased by the Rootes Group, which continued to use the Sunbeam marque.
फॉक्स News Channel ( FNC ), also known as Fox News, is a cable न्यूज channel owned by the Fox entertainment Group, a subsidiary of News Corporation.
as of April 2009, the चैनल was उपलब्धियाँ to 102 million households in the United States and to viewers internationally, broadcasting primarily from its New York studios.
The channel was created by Australian-American media mogul Rupert मर्डोक, who hired former NBC executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO.
It launched on October 7, 1996 to 17 million cable subscribers.
It grew during the लेट 1990s and 2000s to become the dominant cable news network in the United States.
Critics have stated that Fox News Channel promotes रूढ़िवादी political positions and biased reporting.
Commentators, news anchors, and reporters at Fox न्यूज Channel have responded that news reporting and political commentary operate independently of each other, and have denied any bias in news reporting.
The mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the tooth located distally ( away from the midline of the face ) from both the mandibular second premolars of the mouth but mesial ( toward the midline of the face ) from both mandibular दूसरी molars.
It is located on the mandibular ( lower ) arch of the mouth, and generally opposes the ऊर्ध्वहनु ( upper ) first molars और the maxillary 2nd premolar in normal क्लास I occlusion.
The function of this molar is similar to that of all molars in regard to grinding being the principal action during mastication, commonly known as chewing.
There are usually five well-developed cusps on mandibular first molars : दो on the buccal ( side nearest the cheek ), two lingual ( side nearest the जीभ ), and one distal.
There हैं great differences between the deciduous ( baby ) mandibular molars and those of the permanent mandibular molars, even though their function are similar.
The permanent mandibular molars हैं not considered to have any teeth कि precede it.
Despite being named molars, the deciduous molars are followed by permanent premolars.
In the universal system of notation, the पतझड़ी mandibular first molars are designated by a letter written in uppercase.
The सही deciduous mandibular first molar is known as `` S '', and the left one is known as `` L ''.
The international notation has a different प्रणाली of notation.
Thus, the right deciduous mandibular first molar is known as `` 84 '', and the बाएँ one is known as `` 74 ''.
In the universal system of notation, the permanent mandibular first molars are designated by a number.
The right permanent mandibular first molar is known as `` 30 '', and the बाएँ एक is known as `` 19 ''.
the पामर संकेतन uses a number in conjunction with a symbol designating in which quadrant the दाँत is found.
For इस tooth, the left and right first molars would have the same number, `` 6 '', but the सही one would have the symbol, `` ┐ '', over it, while the left one would have, `` ┌ ''.
The international notation has a different numbering system than the previous two, और the right permanent mandibular first molar is known as `` 46 '', and the left one is known as `` 36 ''.
Mandibular primary first molars usually have चार pulp horns.
The first molar is usually the पहला permanent tooth to erupt and has adult undertones.
Anatomy : the mandibular first molar रै पाँच पुलिन : the mesiobuccal ( MB, toward midline and cheek ), mesiolingual ( ML, toward midline and tongue ), distolingual ( DL, away इससे midline and towards tongue ), distobuccal ( DB, away इससे midline and toward cheek ), and distal ( D, away from midline ), listed in order of decreasing आकार.
Listed in order of decreasing ऊँचाई they are : ML, DL, DF, MF, and D. an eighth cusp was found in a primary दूसरी lower molar in an Argentinean child.
Viewed from the top of the tooth ( occlusal view ), the mandibular first molar is pentagonal ( five sided ) in shape and tapers toward the lingual, साथ the sides being the buccal surface, the mesial surface, the lingual surface, distal surface, and the distobuccal सतह.
The occlusal सतह has four grooves.
The central groove is not सीधा but runs down the center of the tooth mesially to distally and contains four pits ( mesial, सेंट्रल, central, and distal ).
The distobuccal groove runs इससे the distal pit in the central groove distobuccally separating the distal and distobuccal cusps.
The lingual groove रनों from the more distal of the central pits in the central groove toward the lingual surface between the mesiolingual and distolingual cusps.
The buccal groove runs from the अधिक mesial of the सेंट्रल pits in the central groove toward the buccal surface between the mesiobuccal और distobuccal cusps ending in the buccal pit.
The portion of the central groove between the central pits is termed the Lewis offset and is mandatory to खाता लिये the locations of the buccal and lingual डोले ( buccal groove being more mesial than the lingual groove जबकि they हैं parallel ).
From the buccal ( buccal view ), two roots are present.
The distal root is generally straighter, although both often have a slight distal curvature.
the heights of contour on the mesial and distal contact the adjacent teeth and are located at the junction of the occlusal and middle thirds of the crown.
The Florida Legislature is the two houses that act as the राज्य legislature of the U.S. state of Florida.
The Florida Constitution states that `` The विधान power of the state shall be vested in a legislature of the State of Florida, '' composed of a Senate और House of Representatives.
The legislature is seated at the Florida राज्य Capitol in Tallahassee.
Stained glass depiction of Daniel interceding with Arioch, the king 's guard.
Arioch had been charged with killing all the wise men after they were not able to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's dream.
Daniel 2 is the second chapter of the Book of Daniel in the Hebrew Bible.
The chapter 's सोर्स text is predominantly written in Aramaic.
According to the text, Nebuchadnezzar is the king of Babylon who is troubled by his सपनो.
He demands an interpretation for his dreams or will have his mystic interpreters executed.
Daniel seeks Divine Wisdom to interpret the king 's dreams and praises God साथ a छोटी psalm.
God gives Daniel a vision in the night to reveal the king 's dream.
समर्थ to satisfy the king, Daniel is promoted over the whole province of Babylon.
एक Comcast Center, the headquarters of Comcast in फिलाडेल्फिया, PA.
The old Comcast लोगो from 1969 to 1999, when it was replaced with the crescent logo.
The Comcast निगम is an American provider of entertainment, information and संचार products और services.
It is the largest cable operator, one of the biggest mass media, home अंतरजाल service provider, and third largest home telephone service provider in the United States, providing केबल television, broadband Internet, telephone सेवा और in some क्षेत्रों home security ( including burglar alarms, surveillance cameras, fire alarm प्रणालियों and home automation ) to both residential and commercial customers in 40 states and the ज़िला of Columbia.
The company is headquartered in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
In 2011, Comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake in media conglomerate NBCUniversal from GE in January 2011, and began the प्रक्रम of purchasing the remaining 49 % on फ़रवरी 12, 2013, at a cost of $ 16.7 billion.
it समाप्त the purchase on कूच 19, 2013.
Comcast also has significant holding in several केबल networks ( including E !
Entertainment Television, स्टाइल Network, G4, the Golf Channel and NBC Sports Network ), distribution ( ThePlatform ), and सम्बन्धित व्यवसायों.
Comcast has been the subject of criticism for activities including its stance on net neutrality, as well as poor results on customer satisfaction surveys.
Porcupines are rodents with a coat of शार्प spines, or quills, that defend and camouflage them from predators.
They are indigenous to the Americas, southern Asia, and Africa.
porcupines हैं the third largest of the rodents, behind the capybara और the beaver.
Most porcupines are about long, with an long tail.
Weighing, they are rounded, large and slow.
Porcupines come in various shades of brown, gray, and the unusual श्वेत.
porcupines ' spiny protection resembles that of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs and monotreme echidnas.
The common porcupine is a herbivore.
It eats leaves, herbs, twigs and green plants like skunk cabbage और clover and in the शीत it may eat bark.
The North अमरीकी porcupine often climbs trees to find food.
The African porcupine is not a climber and forages on the ground.
It is mostly nocturnal, but will sometimes forage for food in the दिन.
Porcupines have become a pest in Kenya and are eaten as a कोमलता.
The name porcupine comes from Middle French porc espin ( spined pig ).
A regional American name for the एनिमल is quill pig.

Elijah J. McCoy ( May 2, 1844 – October 10, 1929 ) was a black canadian-american आविष्कारक और engineer, who was notable for उसके 57 U.S. patents, most to do with lubrication of steam engines.
Born free in Canada, he returned as a five-year-old child with his family to the संयुक्त States in 1847, where he lived for the rest of his life and became a US citizen.
Honda FCX Clarity, a hydrogen fuel cell demonstration vehicle introduced in 2008
A hydrogen vehicle is a vehicle that uses hydrogen as its onboard fuel for motive power.
Hydrogen vehicles include hydrogen fueled space rockets, as well as automobiles and other transportation vehicles.
The शक्ति plants of such vehicles convert the रासायनिक energy of hydrogen to mechanical उर्जा either by burning hydrogen in an internal combustion engine, or by reacting hydrogen with oxygen in a fuel कोशिका to run electric motors.
Widespread use of hydrogen for fueling transportation is a key element of a proposed hydrogen economy.
Hydrogen fuel does not occur naturally on Earth and thus is not an energy source ; rather it is an energy carrier.
It is most frequently made इससे methane or other fossil fuels, but it can be उत्पादित using sources ( such as wind, solar, or nuclear ) that हैं intermittent, too diffuse or too cumbersome to directly propel vehicles.
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen पौधे, using electrolysis of water, are exploring technologies to deliver costs low enough, and quantities great enough, to compete with traditional उर्जा स्त्रोत.
Many companies are working to develop technologies कि might efficiently exploit the संभावित of hydrogen energy for mobile उपयोग.
The attraction of using hydrogen as an energy currency is that, if hydrogen is prepared without using fossil ईंधन inputs, vehicle propulsion would not contribute to carbon dioxide emissions.
The drawbacks of hydrogen use are high capital cost, low energy content per unit volume, high tankage weights, very high भंडार vessel pressures, the storage, परिवहन and filling of gaseous or liquid हाइड्रोजन in vehicles, the large investment in infrastructure that would be required to fuel vehicles, and the inefficiency of production processes.
Sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. state of कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the seat of government of Sacramento County.
it is located at the संगम of the Sacramento River और the American River in the northern portion of California 's expansive सेंट्रल Valley.
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest city in कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the 35th largest city in the United States.
sacramento is the core सांस्कृतिक and आर्थिक center of the Sacramento metropolitan area which includes seven काउंटी with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California after the Greater Los Angeles Area, San Francisco Bay Area, and the San Diego metropolitan area, as well as the 25th largest in the United States.
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as America 's most ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the Swiss immigrant John Sutter, Sr., उसके son John Sutter, Jr., and जेम्स W. मार्शल.
Sacramento grew जल्दी thanks to the protection of Sutter 's Fort, which was established by Sutter in 1839.
During the California Gold Rush, Sacramento was a major distribution point, a वाणिज्यिक and agricultural center, and a terminus for वैगन trains, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony Express, और the First Transcontinental Railroad.
California State University, Sacramento, more commonly known as Sacramento State or सैक राज्य, is the largest local university.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California State University system.
drexel University Sacramento is located in Downtown, Sacramento.
University of the Pacific 's McGeorge School of विधि is located in the Oak Park neighborhood.
in addition, the University of California, Davis is located in nearby Davis, west of the capital.
The UC Davis Medical Center, a world-renowned शोध hospital, is located in the city of Sacramento.
The Apple Store is a chain of retail stores owned and operated by Apple Inc., dealing in computers और consumer electronics.
The stores sell Macintosh personal computers, software, iPods, ipads, आईफ़ोन, third-party accessories, and other consumer electronics such as Apple TV.
Some ऊँची profile stores feature a Theatre for presentations and वर्कशॉप and a Studio for training with Apple products ; all stores offer a Genius Bar for technical support and repairs, as well as free workshops available to the public.
Under the नेतृत्व of Ron Johnson, the former Senior Vice अध्यक्ष of Retail Operations, the ठहराना Stores have, according to an article in the New York Times, been responsible लिये `` [ turning ] the boring computer sales floor into a sleek playroom filled with gadgets ''.
, ठहराना रै 405 stores worldwide, with global बिक्री of billion in merchandise in 2011, and they lead the United States retail market in terms of sales per unit area.
Steven Paul `` Steve '' Jobs ( ; February 24, 1955 – October 5, 2011 ) was an American entrepreneur and inventor, best known as the co-founder, chairman, और CEO of Apple Inc.
Through Apple, he was widely recognized as a charismatic pioneer of the personal computer revolution and for his influential career in the computer and उपभोक्ता electronics fields, transforming `` one उद्योग after another, from computers and smartphones to music and movies... ''
Jobs also co-founded and परोसा as chief कार्यपालिका of Pixar Animation Studios ; he became a member of the board of directors of The Walt Disney Company in 2006, when डिज़्नी acquired Pixar.
Jobs was among the first to देखिए the commercial संभावित of Xerox PARC 's चूहा -driven graphical user interface, which led to the creation of the Apple Lisa and, one year later, the Macintosh.
He also played a role in introducing the LaserWriter, one of the first widely available laser printers, to the market.
After a power संघर्ष साथ the board of निर्देशकों in 1985, Jobs बाएँ Apple and founded NeXT, a computer platform development company specializing in the higher-education and business markets.
In 1986, he acquired the computer graphics division of Lucasfilm, which was spun off as Pixar.
He was credited in Toy Story ( 1995 ) as an executive producer.
He served as CEO and majority shareholder जबतक Disney 's purchase of Pixar in 2006.
In 1996, after Apple had failed to deliver its operating system, Copland, Gil Amelio turned to NeXT Computer, and the NeXTSTEP platform became the foundation for the Mac OS X.
Jobs returned to Apple as an advisor, and took control of the company as an interim CEO.
Jobs brought Apple from near दिवालियापन to profitability by 1998.
As the new सीईओ of the company, Jobs oversaw the development of the iMac, iTunes, iPod, iPhone, and iPad, and on the services side, the company 's Apple Retail Stores, iTunes Store और the App Store.
The success of these products and services provided several years of stable financial returns, and propelled Apple to become the world 's most valuable publicly traded company in 2011.
The reinvigoration of the company is regarded by many commentators as one of the greatest turnarounds in business history.
in 2003, Jobs was diagnosed with a pancreas neuroendocrine tumor.
Though it was initially treated, he reported a hormone imbalance, underwent a liver transplant in 2009, and appeared progressively thinner as his health declined.
On medical leave for most of 2011, Jobs resigned in August कि year, and was elected अध्यक्ष of the Board.
he died of respiratory arrest related to his metastatic tumor on October 5, 2011.
Jobs received a number of honors and public recognition for his influence in the technology and music industries.
he has been referred to as `` legendary '', a `` futurist '' or simply `` visionary '', and has been described as the `` Father of the डिजिटल Revolution '', a `` निपुण of innovation '', और a `` design perfectionist ''.

Roman numerals, the numeric system in ancient Rome, uses combinations of letters from the Latin alphabet to signify values.
The numbers 1 to 10 can be expressed in Roman numerals as follows:
and.
The Roman numeral system is a cousin of Etruscan numerals.
Use of Roman numerals continued after the decline of the Roman Empire.
From the 14th century on, Roman numerals began to be replaced in most contexts by more convenient Hindu-Arabic numerals ; however this process थी gradual, and the उपयोग of Roman numerals in some minor अनुप्रयोग continues to this दिन.
Effective Nuclear Charge आरेख
The effective nuclear charge ( often symbolize as or Z* ) is the net positive charge experienced by an electron in a multi-electron atom.
The term `` effective '' is used because the shielding effect of negatively charged electrons prevents उच्चतर orbital electrons इससे experiencing the full nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons.
The effective nuclear charge experienced by the outer शेल electron is also called the core चार्ज.
It is possible to determine the strength of the nuclear चार्ज by looking at the ऑक्सीकरण number of the atom.
