Caviar, according to the Food and Agriculture Organization, is a product made from salt-cured fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae family.
The roe can be `` fresh '' ( non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized, with pasteurization reducing its culinary and economic value.
Traditionally the term caviar refers तभी to roe from wild sturgeon in the Caspian और Black Seas ( Beluga, Ossetra and Sevruga caviars ).
Depending on the country, caviar may also be used to describe the roe of other fish such as सामन, steelhead, trout, lumpfish, whitefish, and अन्य species of sturgeon.
Caviar is considered a लक्ज़री delicacy and is eaten as a garnish or a स्प्रेड.
In 2012, caviar बेची for $ 2,500 per pound, or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 per kilo.
The SEC Network is a television syndication network featuring live broadcasts of college football and basketball events इससे the Southeastern Conference.
It is owned and operated by ESPN Plus and is shown in more than 50 percent of households in the संयुक्त States, mostly southeastern United States markets.
The सेक Network typically airs in the noon eastern slot that was former home to the Raycom खेल SEC खेल of the week.
Games are shown locally on broadcast stations, regional sports networks, as well as on ESPN gameplan, ESPN Full अदालत, और ESPN3.com.
the SEC Network is also available in Canada via Atlanta 's WPCH-TV.
The SEC Network uses the वही on-screen graphics currently प्रयुक्त by ESPN on ABC, a version of ESPN 's graphics package.
SEC संजाल 's football programming still uses a title safe area because most of its affiliates do not Letterbox their Standard Definition feeds, while ESPN 's television networks have allowed their graphics to abandon the शीर्षक safe, but letterbox for SD viewers.
Starting with the SEC 2012 Basketball season, SEC Network 's ग्राफिक्स have been converted to a 16:9 Widescreen-only स्वरूप.
This is also being used for the 2013 Basketball season, but had still adapted the former 4:3-safe graphics format for the 2012 SEC football season.
The 1990s, pronounced and also known as `` the Nineteen-Nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the Nineties '' or `` the '90s '', was a decade that began on January 1, 1990, and ended on December 31, 1999.
It was the 10th and last दशक of the 20th century और the 100th and last decade of the 2nd millennium.
The decade is best known for the end of the ठंडा War at the beginning of the decade और the expansion and commercialization of the Internet during the second half of the decade.
In much of the West the 1990s is remembered as a period of unprecedented peace and prosperity, though many parts of the so-called Third World faced various problems including genocide, AIDS and नई or continuing ethnic tensions and civil wars.
Culturally speaking the decade was characterized by the वृद्धि of multiculturalism and alternative media.
Movements such as grunge, the rave scene and hip hop spread around the world to young people during the decade, aided by then-new technology such as cable television and the Internet.
A combination of कारकों, including the mass mobilization of capital markets through neoliberalism, the beginning of the फैली proliferation of new media such as the Internet, and the dissolution of the Soviet Union led to a realignment and reconsolidation of economic and political power आरपार the world, and within countries.
Income inequality among countries in the world rose sharply between the 1980s and the mid-1990s, before levelling off and then falling after 2000.
New ethnic conflicts emerged in Africa, the balkans and the काकेशस, the former two which led to the Rwandan genocide and बोस्नियाई genocide, क्रमशः.
The United राज्य began its current सैन्य occupation of the Middle ईस्ट during the summer of 1990 with Desert Shield बाद it cut off a large portion of the world 's petroleum supply.
Signs of any resolution of tensions between Israel and the Arab world remained elusive, though the Irish Troubles came to a standstill in 1998 with the Good Friday Agreement after 30 years of violence.
The gray wolf or grey wolf ( Canis lupus ) is a species of canid native to the wilderness and remote areas of उत्तर America, यूरेशिया, and North अफ़्रीकी.
It is the largest member of its family, with males averaging, and females.
It is similar in general appearance and proportions to a German shepherd, or sled dog, but has a larger head, narrower chest, longer legs, straighter tail and bigger paws.
Its winter fur is long and bushy, and predominantly a mottled gray in colour, although nearly pure white, red, or brown to black also occur.
Within the genus Canis, the gray भेड़िया represents a more specialised और progressive form than its smaller cousins ( the coyote and golden jackal ), as demonstrated by its morphological adaptations to hunting large prey, its more gregarious nature and its highly advanced expressive बर्ताव.
It is a social animal, यात्राएं in nuclear families consisting of a mated pair, accompanied by the जोड़ी 's adult offspring.
The gray wolf is typically an apex predator throughout its range, with only humans and tigers posing a serious threat to it.
It feeds primarily on large ungulates, though it also eats smaller animals, livestock, carrion, and garbage.
The gray wolf is one of the world 's most खूब researched animals, with probably अधिक किताबे written about it than any अन्य वन्यजीव species.
It रै a long history of association with इंसानो, having been despised and hunted in most agricultural communities due to its attacks on livestock, while conversely being respected by some Native American tribes.
It is the sole ancestor of the dog, which was first domesticated in the मध्य ईस्ट.
Although the भय of wolves is prevalent in many human societies, the majority of recorded attacks on people have been attributed to animals suffering from rabies.
Non-rabid wolves have attacked and killed people, mainly children, but this is unusual, as wolves हैं relatively few, live away from people, and have been taught to fear humans by hunters and shepherds.
Hunting and trapping has reduced the species ' दायरा to, though its still relatively widespread range and stable population means that the species is not threatened at a global स्तर, और is इसलिए classified by the IUCN as तनिक Concern.
the रोमन Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the प्राचीन Roman civilization, characterised by an autocratic form of government और large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in यूरोपीय, Africa, and Asia.
the 500-year-old Roman Republic, which preceded it, had been destabilized through a series of civil wars.
अनेक events marked the transition from Republic to साम्राज्य, including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of Actium ( 31 bc ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ).
The first two centuries of the Empire were a period of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as the Pax Romana ( `` रोमन Peace '' ).
It reached its greatest expanse during the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ).
In the 3rd century, the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened its existence, but was reunified and stabilized अंतर्गत the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian.
Christians rose to power in the 4th century, during which time a system of dual rule was developed in the Latin West and Greek East.
After the collapse of सेंट्रल government in the West in the 5th century, the eastern half continued as what होता later be ज्ञात as the Byzantine Empire.
Because of the साम्राज्य 's vast extent and long endurance, the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound and lasting influence on the development of language, religion, वास्तुकला, philosophy, law, and forms of government in the territory it governed, particularly Europe, and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world.
Education in the United States is mainly provided by the public सेक्टर, with control and funding coming from three levels : local, state, and federal, in that order.
चाइल्ड education is अनिवार्य, and there are भी a large number और wide variety of higher education institutions throughout the country that एक can choose to attend, both publicly and privately administered.
Public education is universally उपलब्धियाँ.
School curricula, funding, teaching, employment, and other policies are set through locally elected school फलक with jurisdiction over स्कूल districts with many directives from state legislatures.
School districts are usually separate from other local jurisdictions, with independent officials and budgets.
शैक्षणिक standards and standardized testing निर्णय are usually made by state governments.
The ages for compulsory education vary by state.
It begins from ages five to eight and ends from ages fourteen to अठारह.
Compulsory education requirements can generally be satisfied by educating children in public स्कूलों, state-certified private schools, or an approved home school program.
In सबसे public और private स्कूलों, education is divided into three levels : elementary school, middle school ( sometimes called junior high school ), and high school ( sometimes referred to as secondary education ).
In almost all schools at these levels, children are divided by age groups into grades, ranging from kindergarten ( followed by first grade ) for the youngest children in elementary school, up to twelfth grade, the final साल of high school.
The सटीक age range of students in these grade levels varies slightly from area to क्षेत्रफल.
Post-secondary education, better ज्ञात as `` college `` in the United States, is generally governed separately from the elementary and high school system, and is described in a separate section below.
Government supported, free पब्लिक schools for all started being established after the revolution, and expanded in the 19th century, as the results of efforts of men like Horace Mann और Booker T. Washington.
By 1870, all states had फ़्री elementary schools, albeit only in urban centers.
as the 20th century drew nearer, states started passing laws to make schooling compulsory, and by 1910, 72 percent of children attended स्कूल.
Private schools continued to spread during this time, as well as colleges and—in the rural centers— land grant colleges.
The year of 1910 also saw the first true ऊँची schools.
दौरान the rest of the 20th century, educational efforts centered on reducing the असमानता of the schooling system.
The landmark Supreme Court case Brown v. Board of Education बना the desegregation of elementary and high schools a national priority, while the pell Grant program helped poor minorities gain access to college.
Special education was made into federal law in 1975.
The elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 made standardized testing a requirement, and in 1983, a commission was established to evaluate their results और propose a course of action.
The resulting No Child बाएँ Behind Act of 2001 was controversial and its goals proved to be unrealistic.
A commission established in 2006 evaluated higher education, but its recommendations have yet to be fully implemented.
Paul Bragg ( फ़रवरी 6, 1895 – December 7, 1976 ), nutritionist, was a pioneer in America’s तंदुरुस्ती movement.
Health spending per capita, in $ US PPP-adjusted, with the US और Canada compared amongst other first world nations.
Comparison of the health care systems in Canada and the United States हैं प्रायः made by government, public health and public policy analysts.
The two देशों had समान health care systems before कनाडा reformed its system in the 1960s and 1970s.
The संयुक्त States spends much more money on health care than Canada, on both a per-capita basis and as a percentage of GDP.
In 2006, per-capita spending for health care in Canada was us $ 3,678 ; in the U.S., US $ 6,714.
The U.S. spent 15.3 % of GDP on health care in that year ; Canada spent 10.0 %.
In 2006, 70 % of health care spending in Canada was financed by government, versus 46 % in the संयुक्त States.
Total government spending per capita in the u.S. on health care was 23 % higher than Canadian government spending, and u.S. government expenditure on health care was बस under 83 % of total Canadian spending ( public and private ) though these statistics do n't लो into account population मतभेद.
Studies have come to different conclusions about the result of this disparity in spending.
A 2007 review of all studies comparing health outcomes in Canada and the US in a Canadian peer-reviewed medical journal found that `` health outcomes may be श्रेष्ठ in patients cared for in Canada versus the United States, but differences are not consistent. ''
Life expectancy is longer in Canada, and its infant mortality रेट is lower than that of the U.S., but there is debate about the underlying causes of these differences.
One commonly cited तुलना, the 2000 World Health Organization 's ratings of `` overall health service performance '', which used a `` composite measure of achievement in the level of health, the distribution of health, the level of responsiveness and fairness of financial contribution '', ranked Canada 30th और the US 37th among 191 member राष्ट्र.
इस study rated the US `` responsiveness '', or quality of सेवा for individuals receiving treatment, as 1st, compared with 7th for Canada.
While the average life expectancy for Canadians was 80.34 years compared with 78.6 years for residents of the US, simply comparing the life expectancy of two groups with different racial makeup and different obesity rates is likely not an effective way of determining which healthcare system is superior.
The जो 's study methods यहूद criticized by some analyses.
Although there is a measure of consensus that life-expectancy and infant mortality चिह्नित the most reliable ways to compare nation-wide health care, assuming the जनसांख्यिकी makeup is similar, a recent report by the Congressional Research Service carefully summarizes some recent data और notes the `` difficult research issues '' facing international comparisons.
The sound source has now broken through the sound speed barrier, and is traveling at 1.4 times the speed of ध्वनि, ( Mach 1.4 ).
Since the source is moving faster ( with a speed ) than the sound waves it creates, it actually leads the advancing wavefront.
The ध्वनि source will pass by a stationary observer ( with a speed ) before the observer actually hears the sound it creates.
As a result, an observer in front of the source will detect
and an observer behind the source.
a sonic बूम उत्पादित by an वायुयान moving at M=2.92, calculated इससे the cone angle of 20 डिग्री.
An observer hears the boom when the shock wave, on the edges of the cone, crosses his or her स्थान.
mach cone angle
A sonic boom is the sound associated with the shock waves created by an object traveling through the air faster than the speed of sound.
Sonic booms generate enormous amounts of sound energy, sounding much like an explosion.
The crack of a सुपरसोनिक bullet passing overhead is an example of a sonic boom in miniature.
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is an American late-night talk show hosted by Jay Leno कि initially aired from May 25, 1992 to May 29, 2009, and resumed production on March 1, 2010.
The fourth अवतार of the Tonight दिखाएँ franchise made its debut on May 25, 1992, three days following Johnny Carson 's retirement as मेजबान of the कार्यक्रम.
The program originates from एनबीसी Studios in Burbank, California, and is broadcast Monday through Friday at 11:35 PM in the Eastern and Pacific time zones ( 10:35 PM Central / Mountain time ).
Unlike Carson or his predecessor Jack Paar, Leno only once utilized a guest host, preferring to host the series by himself.
On April 26, 1999, the दिखाएँ began broadcasting in 1080i HDTV, becoming the first American nightly talk show to be shot in high definition.
The show is shot in 16:9 aspect ratio.
the श्रेणी, which followed the same basic format as that of उसके predecessors ( an opening monologue followed by comedy routines, interviews and performances ), ran until May 29, 2009, after which लीनो was succeeded by Conan o'brien.
NBC signed Leno to a new deal for a nightly talk show in the 10:00 pm ET timeslot.
The primetime श्रेणी, titled The Jay Leno Show, debuted on September 14, 2009, following a similar स्वरूप to the Leno incarnation of Tonight.
Neither O'Brien 's version of the program, which premiered June 1, 2009, nor The jay लीनो Show generated the ratings that NBC had expected.
The network decided to move a condensed 30-minute version of Leno 's show to o'brien 's time slot, and o'brien 's Tonight Show a half-hour later.
This decision met with opposition from O'Brien, whose stint on The tonight Show ended January 22, 2010, after which he began his own बात show on TBS.
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno then began its second and वर्तमान incarnation, the छठे of the franchise, on March 1, 2010.
RFID chip next to a grain of राइस.
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil that modulates an external magnetic field to transfer a coded identification number when queried by a reader device.
This small type is incorporated in consumer products, and implanted in pets, for identification purposes.
Radio-frequency identification ( rfid ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency electromagnetic फ़ील्ड to transfer data, for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking टैग attached to objects.
The tags contain electronically stored information.
कुछ tags are powered and read at short ranges ( a few meters ) via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic प्रेरण ).
अन्य use a लोकल power source ऐसे as a battery, or else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating EM field, and then act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e., electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ).
Battery powered tags may operate at hundreds of meters.
Unlike a bar code, the tag does not necessarily need to be within लकीर of sight of the reader, and may be embedded in the tracked object.
RFID टैग are used in many उद्योग.
An RFID tag attached to an automobile during उत्पादन can be used to track its प्रगति through the assembly line.
दवाएँ can be tracked through warehouses.
Livestock and pets may have tags injected, allowing positive identification of the animal.
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing, possessions, or भी implanted within लोगों, the सम्भावना of reading personally-linked information without consent has raised privacy चिंताएं.
Id, ego and super-ego are the three parts of the psychic apparatus defined in Sigmund Freud 's structural मॉडल of the psyche ; they are the three theoretical constructs in terms of whose activity and interaction mental life is described.
According to this model of the psyche, the id is the set of uncoordinated instinctual trends ; the super-ego plays the critical और moralizing भूमिका ; and the ego is the organized, realistic भाग that mediates between the desires of the id और the super-ego.
The super-ego can stop you from doing certain things कि your id may want you to do.
Even though the मॉडल is structural and makes reference to an apparatus, the id, ego and super-ego are functions of the mind rather than parts of the brain and do not correspond one-to-one with actual somatic structures of the दयालु dealt with by neuroscience.
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage in the development of Freud 's thought : the `` structural model '' ( जिससे succeeded उसके `` economic model '' and `` topographical model '' ) was पहला discussed in his 1920 essay `` Beyond the Pleasure Principle `` and थी formalized and elaborated upon three years later in his `` The Ego and the Id ``.
Freud 's proposal was influenced by the ambiguity of the term `` unconscious `` and its many conflicting uses.
Air Force ROTC emblem
The Air Force Reserve Officer प्रशिक्षण Corps ( AFROTC ) is one of the three primary commissioning sources for officers in the United राज्य Air Force, the other two being the United States Air Force Academy ( USAFA ) and Air Force Officer Training School ( OTS ).
A अधीनस्थ command of the Air University within the Air Education and Training Command ( AETC ), AFROTC is aligned under the Jeanne M. Holm Center for Officer Accessions and Citizen Development at Maxwell AFB, Alabama.
The Holm Center, formerly known as the Air Force अधिकारी Accession and Training Schools ( AFOATS ), retains direct जिम्मेदारी for both afrotc और OTS.
AFROTC is the largest and oldest source of commissioned अधिकारियों for the U.S. Air Force.
AFROTC 's stated mission is to produce विशेषता leaders लिये the U.S. Air Force.
AFROTC units are located on 144 college और university campuses with 984 additional institutions of higher learning participating in cross-town agreements that allow their विद्यार्थी to attend AFROTC classes at a nearby `` host '' college or university.
According to AFOATS HQ, in 2006, AFROTC commissioned 2,083 USAF Second lieutenants, with afrotc नामांकन ranging from 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993, and around 13,000 enrolled today.
AFROTC units at कॉलेजों and universities are called `` detachments, '' and are typically headed by an active ड्यूटी USAF officer in the rank of कर्नल or lieutenant colonel who functions as दोनो the detachment Commander लिये USAF purposes and with the nominal title of Professor of Aerospace Studies ( PAS ) within the institution 's academic community.
Most colleges and universities will designate the AFROTC detachment as the Department of Aerospace Studies.
The pas is assisted by three to four Assistant Professors of aerospace Studies ( APAS ), all active duty USAF officers in the ranks of major or captain.
Three यूएसएएफ non-commissioned officers and one senior non-commissioned officer will typically provide सैन्य administrative support and हैं often augmented by one to two civilian staff support employees of the अकादमिक institution.
Within afrotc detachments, the students ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) are व्यवस्थित into wings, groups, squadrons, and flights, mirroring the USAF functional wing structure.
The AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet group is separated into two divisions : the General Military Course ( GMC ) consisting of the first two years of training, and the Professional Officer Course ( poc ) consisting of the last two years of training.
The AFROTC program is also divided into two training functions : the Academic Classroom Program ( Aerospace Studies classes ) and Cadet Activities ( i.e., Leadership Laboratory, Physical Training, और other training ).
Paper density ( also known as basis weight and grammage ) is a term used in the गूदा and paper industry and also for कपड़ा industry to denote a माप of mass of the product per unit of area for a type of fabric, paper or paperboard.
The term `` density '' is not used in its traditional sense of mass per unit volume.
`` Paper density '', rather, is a measure of the area density.
Paper products that let little or no light pass through ( e.g. poster board ) are considered dense or heavy.
Paper products कि allow some light to pass through ( e.g. tissue paper ) are माना lightweight.
In the pulp and paper industry, it is common to set a commercial पेपर machine to produce paper to a target paper density.
Paper density can also be used to distinguish paper from paperboard as the latter usually has a grammage greater than 134 g/m2.
Two ways of expressing paper घनत्व are commonly उपयोगd:
Expressed in grams per square meter ( g/m2 ), paper density is also known as grammage.
This is the measure used in most parts of the world.
Expressed in terms of the mass ( expressed as वज़न ) per number of sheets, it is known as basis वज़न.
the convention used in the United States and a few other countries using US paper sizes is pounds of a ream of 500 ( or in some cases 1000 ) sheets of a given ( raw, still uncut ) basis size.
Japanese paper is expressed as the weight in kg of 1000 sheets.
Candace Nicole पार्कर ( born April 19, 1986 ) is an American basketball player for the WNBA 's Los Angeles Sparks and UMMC Ekaterinburg of Russia.
She is the younger sister of NBA player Anthony पार्कर.
She attended the University of टेनेसी and was drafted by the Sparks in 2008.
She may be best known for being the first woman to dunk in an NCAA टूर्नामेंट game and the पहला woman to dunk twice in a college game—she set both माइलस्टोन as a redshirt freshman on March 19, 2006.
She also became only the second player to dunk in a WNBA game on June 22, 2008.
A versatile player, she is mainly a forward, but was listed on Tennessee 's roster as a forward, center, and guard.
She was a starter on the Lady Vols basketball team, winners of the 2007 and 2008 NCAA championships.
Parker won the 2009 Nickelodeon Kids ' Choice award as the favorite female खिलाड़ी in the sports category.
And she was a guest star on Figure It Out.
a food मार्गदर्शिका pyramid is a pyramid shaped guide of healthy भोजन divided into sections to show the recommended intake for each food group.
The पहला food pyramid थी published in Sweden in 1974.
The most widely known food pyramid was introduced by the United States Department of Agriculture in the year 1992, was updated in 2005, and then replaced in 2011.
Over 25 other countries and organisations have also प्रकाशित food pyramids.
Hans Christian Andersen ( ; often referred to in Scandinavia as H. C. Andersen ; April 2, 1805august 4, 1875 ) was a Danish लेखक and poet.
हालांकि a prolific writer of plays, travelogues, novels, and poems, Andersen is बेहतरीन remembered for his fairy tales, a literary genre he so mastered कि he himself has become as mythical as the tales he wrote.
Andersen 's popularity is not limited to children ; उसके stories—called, or `` fantastic tales '' —express themes that transcend age and nationality.
दौरान his lifetime he was acclaimed for having delighted children worldwide and was feted by royalty.
Andersen 's fairy tales, which have been translated into more than 125 languages, have become culturally embedded in the West 's collective consciousness, readily accessible to children, but presenting lessons of virtue and resilience in the face of adversity for mature readers as well.
They have inspired motion pictures, plays, ballets, and animated films.
Two figures locking eyes in Caravaggio 's The Fortune Teller
Eye contact occurs when `` two people look at each other 's eyes at the वही time. ''
In human beings, eye contact is a form of अशाब्दिक communication and is thought to have a large influence on सोशल behavior.
Coined in the early to mid-1960s, the term has आइये in the West to often define the act as a meaningful and important sign of विश्वास and social communication.
The customs and significance of eye contact vary widely between cultures, with religious and social differences often altering its meaning greatly.
The study of eye contact is sometimes known as oculesics.
Bed बग are parasitic कीट of the cimicid family that feed exclusively on blood.
The term most commonly refers to members of the genus Cimex of जिससे Cimex lectularius, the common bed bug, is the बेहतरीन known as it prefers to feed on human blood although other Cimex प्रजाति हैं specialized to other animals, e.g., bat bugs, C. pipistrelli ( यूरोपीय ), C. pilosellus ( western US ), and C. adjunctus ( entire eastern US ).
The name of the `` bed bug '' is derived from the preferred habitat of Cimex lectularius : warm houses और especially nearby or inside of beds and bedding or other sleep areas.
Bed bugs are mainly active at night, but are not exclusively nocturnal.
They प्रायः feed on their hosts without होने noticed.
A number of प्रतिकूल health effects may result from bed bug bites, including skin rashes, psychological effects, and allergic symptoms.
Diagnosis involves both finding bed bugs and the occurrence of compatible symptoms.
Bed bugs have been known as human parasites for thousands of years.
At a point in the early 1940s, they यहूद mostly eradicated in the developed संसार, but have increased in prevalence चूंकि 1995.
Because infestation of human habitats रै been on the increase, bed कीड़ा bites and related conditions have been on the rise as खूब.
The Book of Isaiah ( ) is the first of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible, preceding Ezekiel, Jeremiah and the Book of the Twelve.
( The order of the subsequent किताबे differs somewhat in the Christian Old Testament ).
The first 39 अध्याय prophesy doom लिये a sinful Judah and for all the nations of the world that oppose परमेश्वर, while the पिछला 27 prophesy the restoration of the nation of Israel and a new सृष्टि in God 's गौरवशाली भविष्य kingdom ; this section includes the Songs of the Suffering Servant, four separate passages referring to the nation of इसराईल, interpreted by Christians as prefiguring the coming of Jesus Christ.
Tradition ascribes authorship of the book to Isaiah son of Amoz, but now scholars widely agree that the book is the work of three different authors - few scholars deny this view, and those that do, do so for theological reasons.
the first, termed Proto-Isaiah ( chapters 1–39 ), contains the words of the 8th-century BCE prophet with 7th-century BCE expansions ; the second, deutero-isaiah ( chapters 40–55 ), is the work of a 6th-century bce author writing near the end of the Babylonian captivity ; and the third, the poetic Trito-Isaiah ( अध्याय 56–66 ), was composed in Jerusalem shortly after the return from exile, probably by multiple authors.
Oregon State University ( OSU ) is a coeducational, public research university located in corvallis, ऑरेगॉन, संयुक्त States.
The university offers undergraduate, graduate and doctoral degrees and a multitude of research opportunities.
There are more than 200 academic degree programs offered through the विश्वविद्यालयों.
OSU 's कार्यक्रम in microbiology, nuclear engineering, ecology, forestry, public health, biochemistry, zoology, oceanography, food science and फार्मेसी are recognized nationally as top tier कार्यक्रम.
The OSU 's liberal arts programs have also grown significantly and the department is considered a `` cornerstone '' of the institution.
More than 200,000 लोगों have attended OSU चूंकि its founding.
The Carnegie Foundation classifies Oregon State विश्वविद्यालयों as part of its top tier of research institutions.
As of 2008, OSU is one of only seventy-three land-grant universities.
the स्कूल is also recognized as a sea-grant, space-grant and sun-grant institution, making it one of only two US institutions to retain all four designations and the तभी public university to do so ( Cornell is the only other with similar designations ).
As एक of the two flagship universities of the Oregon University प्रणाली, OSU receives more funding for research, annually, than all other public higher education institutions in Oregon combined.
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females from the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm.
It is also known colloquially as gushing or squirting, although ये are considered to be different phenomena in some research publications.
The exact सोर्स and nature of the द्रव continue to be a topic of debate among medical professionals, which is also related to doubts over the अस्तित्व of the G-Spot.
The Kanab ambersnail, वैज्ञानिक name Oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or Oxyloma kanabense, is a critically endangered subspecies or प्रजाति of small, air-breathing land snail, a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the family Succineidae, the amber snails.
The common name of the amber snails is based on the shell, which is पारदर्शी and when empty usually resembles amber in color.
This species is endemic to the United States, specifically the state of Arizona और Utah, where it was first collected in the early 20th century.
It has been listed as endangered on the United States Fish and Wildlife Service list of endangered species चूंकि 8 August 1991.
This snail lives in wetlands, स्रोतों, and seeps, and only two of its natural habitats are known to exist : Three Lakes, a meadow near Kanab, Utah, and Vasey 's Paradise, a spring साथ the Colorado River within Grand Canyon National Park.
In its natural habitat it is rather polyphagous, feeding मुख्यतः on bacteria, plants and fungi, and reproduces during the summer.
Now considered a Critically Endangered species on the आईयूसीएन Red List of Threatened Species due to a series of factors ( including influence ), the Kanab ambersnail रै been reintroduced to three स्रोतों above the historic high water level along the Colorado River.
The स्पेनी language is the second most प्रयुक्त language in the United States.
There are more Spanish speakers in the संयुक्त States than there हैं speakers of Chinese, French, German, Italian, Hawaiian, and the Native American languages combined.
According to the 2010 American Community Survey conducted by the U.S. जनसांख्यिकी Bureau, Spanish is the primary language spoken at home by almost 37 million people aged five or older, a figure more than double that of 1990.
There are 45 लाख Hispanophones who speak Spanish as a first or second language, as well as six million Spanish language students, composing the largest national Spanish-speaking community outside of मैक्सिको and making Spanish the Romance language and the indo-european language साथ largest क्रमांक of native speakers in the world.
Roughly half of all U.S. Spanish speakers भी speak English `` very well, '' based on the self-assessment जनसांख्यिकी question respondents.
the language came to the country चूंकि the 16th and 17th centuries with the arrival of Spanish colonists in areas that would later become the states of Florida, Texas, Colorado, New Mexico, एरिज़ोना, Nevada, Utah, and कैलिफ़ोर्निया and of the Spanish explorers - who explored areas of 42 states-.
Also west of Louisiana Territory was Spanish between 1763 - 1800 ( year of the French रिकवरी of territory ), after the French and Indian War.
After of the incorporation of these राज्य to the U.S. in first half of 19th century, the Spanish language was later reinforced by the acquisition of Puerto Rico in 1898 and by later waves of the Hispanic emigration, basically from Hispanic America, to the United States beginning in the second half of 19th सदी until today.

The Tokyo mew Mew manga and anime series features a cast of characters designed by Mia Ikumi.
The series takes place in Tokyo, Japan, where five adolescent लड़कियों, called Mew Mews, are infused with the DNA of endangered species to combat एलियंस attempting to take over the Earth.
The manga series is followed by a छोटी sequel series, Tokyo Mew Mew a la Mode, which introduces a new Mew mew and a new threat.
The Mew Mews are led by the main character, Ichigo Momomiya, whose first task is to gather the other four Mew Mews : Mint Aizawa, Lettuce Midorikawa, Pudding Fong, और Zakuro fujiwara.
As the series progresses, Ichigo goes from having a crush on Masaya Aoyama to becoming his girlfriend जबकि trying to hide उसके secret दोगुना life from him.
The series antagonists include three aliens, kish, Pie, and Tart, and their leader, Deep Blue.
Originally from Earth, the aliens were forced to leave long ago due to deadly environmental परिवर्तन.
They have returned to kill the humans, who they feel are destroying their ग्रह, and reclaim the planet.
In a la Mode, middle school student Berry Shirayuki is introduced as the sixth Mew Mew and, in the absence of Ichigo, the temporary leader of the Mew mews.
A la Mode also introduces new set of antagonists, the संत Rose Crusaders, a group of human teenagers with various psychic abilities with a desire to create their own utopia.
Led by Duke, they make अनेक attempts to kill Berry, eventually turning the local populace against the Mew Mews.
Ikumi 's आरंभिक vision for Tokyo Mew Mew was a story called Tokyo Black Cat Girl that featured a cat-girl battling alien invaders.
After the story was transitioned to a more upbeat story of five female superheroes, the character designs were redone to have a lighter, अधिक रंगीन feel.
The main series characters were praised for being a perfect fit for the overall story, as खूब as for their cute appearances.
The characters introduced in a la Mode were also praised for उनके visual दिखावे, लकिन criticized as होने दोहराव of the original series.
The character Duke was also criticized for having a design reminiscent of the white supremacy group, the Ku Klux Klan.

Sedimentary rocks are प्रकार of rock कि are formed by the deposition of material at the Earth 's सतह and within लाशें of जल.
Sedimentation is the collective name for processes that cause mineral and/or organic particles ( detritus ) to settle and accumulate or minerals to precipitate from a solution.
Particles that form a sedimentary rock by accumulating are called sediment.
Before being deposited, sediment थी formed by weathering and erosion in a source area, और then transported to the place of deposition by जल, wind, ice, mass movement or glaciers which are called agents of denudation.
The sedimentary rock कवर of the continents of the Earth 's crust is extensive, but the total contribution of sedimentary rocks is estimated to be only 8 % of the total volume of the crust.
Sedimentary rocks are only a thin veneer over a क्रस्ट consisting mainly of igneous and metamorphic rocks.
Sedimentary rocks are deposited in layers as strata, forming a structure called bedding.
The study of sedimentary rocks and rock strata provides information about the subsurface that is useful for civil engineering, for example in the construction of roads, houses, tunnels, canals or other constructions.
Sedimentary rocks are also important sources of natural resources जैसे coal, fossil fuels, drinking water or ores.
The study of the sequence of sedimentary rock strata is the main source for scientific knowledge about the धरती 's history, including palaeogeography, paleoclimatology and the history of life.
the scientific discipline that studies the properties and origin of sedimentary rocks is called sedimentology.
Sedimentology is दोनो part of geology and physical geography and overlaps partly with other disciplines in the धरती sciences, ऐसे as pedology, geomorphology, geochemistry or structural geology.
