The डायन 's उंगली in the Carlsbad caverns
A stalagmite ( or ; from the Greek σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês, from σταλαγμίας - stalagmias, `` dropping, trickling '' ) is a type of speleothem that rises from the floor of a limestone cave due to the dripping of mineralized solutions और the deposition of कैल्सियम carbonate.
This stalagmite formation occurs only under certain pH शर्तें within the underground cavern.
The corresponding formation on the ceiling of a cave is known as a stalactite.
If these formations grow together, the result is known as a column.
The हॉल of दिग्गज in the Carlsbad caverns
Stalagmites should normally नहीं be touched, since the rock buildup is formed by minerals precipitating out of the water समाधान onto the old surface ; skin oils can alter the सतह जहाँ the mineral water will cling, यूँ affecting the growth of the formation.
Oils and dirt from human contact can also दाग the formation and change its color permanently.
Similar structures can also form in lava tubes, संबद्ध with some types of lavacicles, although the mechanism of formation is very different.
Stalactites and stalagmites can also form on कंक्रीट ceilings and floors, although they form much more rapidly वहीँ than in the natural cave environment.
The largest stalagmite in the world is high and is located in the cave of Cueva Martin Infierno, Cuba.
In the ज़ाग्रोस Mountains of south Iran, approximately from the ancient city of Bishapur, in the Shapur cave on the fourth of five terraces stands the 3rd century CE statue of Shapur I, second ruler of the Sassanid Empire.
The statue, carved from one stalagmite, is nearly high.
How I Met Your Mother is an American sitcom that premiered on CBS on September 19, 2005.
The show was created by Craig Thomas and Carter Bays.
How I Met Your Mother is framed by the year 2030, when Ted mosby ( voiced by Bob Saget ) gathers his daughter ( Lyndsy Fonseca ) and son ( David Henrie ) to tell them the स्टोरी of how he met their mother.
We flashback to where it begins in 2005 with Ted Mosby ( Josh Radnor ) as a single, 27-year-old architect living with his two best friends from Wesleyan University, Marshall Eriksen ( Jason Segel ), a law student, and Lily Aldrin ( Alyson Hannigan ), a kindergarten teacher, who have been dating लिये almost nine years जब Marshall proposes.
Their engagement causes Ted to think about finding his अपना soul mate, much to the disgust of उसके friend Barney stinson ( Neil Patrick Harris ), a womanizer with an unnamed corporate job.
And thus, Ted begins his search for his perfect mate, and meets Robin Scherbatsky ( Cobie Smulders ), whom he also befriends.
The 100th episode of How I Met Your Mother aired on January 11, 2010.
On December 21, 2012, the series थी renewed for a ninth season.
on January 30, 2013, it was announced that Season 9 will be its final season.
Gringo (,, ) is a slang स्पेनी and Portuguese word used in Ibero-America, to denote foreigners, often from the United राज्य.
The term can be applied to किसी who is actually a foreigner, or it can denote a strong association or assimilation into foreign ( particularly US ) society and culture.
In Spanish it करता not have a negative connotation.
Roger Axtell, a travel etiquette expert, notes that `` [ t ] he word gringo is not necessarily a bad शब्द.
It is slang but is derogatory तभी in its use and context. ''
The word was used in स्पेन long before it crossed the Atlantic to denote foreign, non-native speakers of Spanish.
The great white shark, Carcharodon carcharias, also known as the great white, white pointer, white shark, or white death, is a species of विशाल lamniform शार्क which can be found in the coastal surface waters of all the major oceans.
The great white shark is मुख्यतः known for its size, with the largest individuals known to have approached or exceeded in length, and in वज़न.
This shark reaches its maturity around 15 years of age and can have a life span of over 30 years.
The great white shark is arguably the world 's largest known extant macropredatory मछली, and is एक of the primary predators of marine mammals.
It is also known to prey upon a variety of other marine animals, including fish and seabirds.
It is the only known surviving species of its genus Carcharodon, and is ranked first in having the सबसे attacks on humans.
the IUCN list the great white shark as a vulnerable species, while it is included in Appendix II of CITES.
The bestselling novel Jaws by Peter Benchley and the subsequent blockbuster film by Steven Spielberg depicted the great white shark as a `` ferocious man eater ``.
In reality, humans are not the preferred शिकार of the great white shark.
The United राज्य Armed Forces are the military forces of the संयुक्त States of America.
They consist of the Army, नेवी, Marine Corps, Air Force, and Coast Guard.
The u.S. has a strong tradition of civilian कंट्रोल of the सैन्य.
the President is the military 's overall head, and helps form military policy साथ the U.S. Department of Defense ( dod ), a federal कार्यपालिका department, acting as the principal organ by which military policy is carried out.
The DoD is headed by the Secretary of Defense, who is a civilian and Cabinet member.
The Defense Secretary is दूसरी in the military 's chain of कमांड, just below the President, and serves as the principal assistant to the President in सब DoD-related matters.
To निर्देशांक military action with diplomacy, the President has an advisory National Security परिषद headed by a National Security Advisor.
Both the President and Secretary of Defense are advised by a seven-member Joint chiefs of स्टाफ, which includes the head of each of the रक्षा Department 's service branches as well as the chief of the National Guard Bureau.
Leadership is provided by the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff and the Vice Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
the Commandant of the Coast Guard is not a member of the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
All of the branches work together during operations and joint missions, under the Unified combatant Commands, under the authority of the Secretary of Defense with the exception of the Coast Guard.
The Coast Guard falls under the प्रशासन of the Department of Homeland Security and receives its operational आदेश from the सचिव of मातृभूमि Security.
The Coast Guard may be transferred to the विभाग of the Navy by the President or Congress during a time of war.
All five armed services are among the seven uniformed services of the संयुक्त States ; the others are the U.S. Public Health Service Commissioned Corps and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Commissioned corps.
From the time of इसके inception, the military played a decisive role in the history of the United States.
A sense of नेशनल unity and identity थी forged as a result of victory in the First Barbary War and the दूसरी Barbary युद्ध.
Even so, the संस्थापकों were suspicious of a स्थाई military force और नहीं until the outbreak of World War II किया a large standing army become officially established.
the National Security Act of 1947, adopted following World War ii and during the Cold War 's onset, created the modern U.S. military framework ; the Act merged previously cabinet-level Department of War and the Department of the Navy into the National सैन्य स्थापना ( renamed the Department of Defense in 1949 ), headed by the Secretary of Defense ; and created the Department of the Air Force and National Security Council.
The U.S. military is एक of the largest militaries in terms of number of personnel.
It draws its manpower from a large pool of paid volunteers ; although conscription has been used in the past in various टाइम्स of both war और peace, it has not been used चूंकि 1972.
As of 2013, the U.S. spends about $ 554.2 billion annually to fund its सैन्य forces, and appropriates approximately $ 88.5 billion to fund Overseas Contingency Operations.
Put together, the U.S. constitutes roughly 43 percent of the world 's military expenditures.
The U.S. Armed Forces as a whole possess large quantities of advanced and powerful equipment, साथ साथ widespread placement of forces around the world, giving them significant capabilities in both defense and power projection.
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's opinions and ideas using one 's body and प्रॉपर्टी to anyone who is willing to receive them.
The term स्वतंत्रता of expression is sometimes used synonymously, but includes any act of seeking, receiving and imparting information or ideas, regardless of the medium used.
In practice, the right to freedom of speech is not absolute in any देश and the right is commonly subject to limitations, as with libel, slander, obscenity, sedition ( including, for example inciting ethnic द्वेष ), copyright violation, revelation of information that is classified or otherwise.
The right to freedom of expression is recognized as a human right under Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and recognized in international इंसान rights law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( iccpr ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this right shall include freedom to seek, प्राप्त and impart information and ideas of सब kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in print, in the form of art, or through any other media of his choice ''.
आलेख 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties और responsibilities `` and may `` इसलिए be subject to निश्चित प्रतिबंध '' when जरुरी `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of नेशनल security or of public order ( order public ), or of public health or morals ''.
Freedom of वाक may be legally curtailed in some religious legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious offense, ऐसे as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006.
The Big बंग Theory logo.
The Big बंग Theory is an American comedy television श्रेणी created and कार्यपालिका produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady.
Like the name of the श्रेणी itself, with the exception of the first episode— '' Pilot '' —episode titles of The Big Bang Theory always start साथ `` The '' and resemble the name of a scientific principle, theory or experiment, whimsically referencing a plot point or quirk.
, 133 episodes have aired.
The Big Bang Theory has been renewed for a seventh season.
ड्वाइट David `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( pronounced, ; October 14, 1890 – March 28, 1969 ) was the 34th President of the संयुक्त States from 1953 until 1961.
He had previously been a five-star general in the United States फौज during World युद्ध ii and served as Supreme Commander of the Allied Forces in Europe ; he had responsibility लिये planning and supervising the invasion of North Africa in Operation Torch in 1942–43 and the कामयाब invasion of France and Germany in 1944–45 from the Western Front.
In 1951, he became the first supreme commander of NATO.
Eisenhower was of Pennsylvania Dutch ancestry and was reared in a large family in Kansas by parents with a robust work ethic and religious background.
As one of six sons, he was conditioned by a competitive atmosphere which instilled self-reliance.
He attended और graduated from West Point and later शादीशुदा and had two sons.
After World War II, Eisenhower served as Army Chief of स्टाफ under President Harry S. Truman, then assumed the post of President at Columbia University.
आइज़नहावर entered the 1952 presidential race as a Republican to counter the non-interventionism of Senator Robert A. Taft and to crusade against `` Communism, Korea and भ्रष्टाचार ''.
He won by a landslide, defeating Democrat Adlai Stevenson and ending two decades of the New Deal Coalition.
In the first year of his presidency, Eisenhower deposed the नेता of Iran in the 1953 Iranian coup d'état and used nuclear threats to conclude the Korean War with China.
His नई Look policy of nuclear deterrence gave priority to inexpensive nuclear weapons जबकि reducing the funding for conventional military forces ; the goal was to keep pressure on the Soviet Union and reduce federal deficits.
In 1954, आइज़नहावर first articulated the domino theory in his description of the threat presented by the spread of communism.
The Congress agreed to his request in 1955 for the Formosa Resolution, which enabled him to prevent Chinese communist aggression against Chinese nationalists and established the U.S. policy of defending Taiwan.
जब the Soviets launched Sputnik in 1957, he had to play catch-up in the space race.
Eisenhower forced Israel, the UK, and France to end their invasion of Egypt during the स्वेज Crisis of 1956.
in 1958, he भेजा 15,000 US troops to Lebanon to prevent the pro-Western government from falling to a Nasser -inspired revolution.
Near the end of his term, his efforts to नियत up a summit meeting with the Soviets collapsed because of the u-2 incident.
On the domestic front, he covertly opposed Joseph McCarthy and contributed to the end of McCarthyism by openly invoking the modern expanded संस्करण of executive privilege.
He otherwise left most political activity to उसके वाइस President, Richard Nixon.
He was a moderate conservative who continued New Deal एजेंसियों and expanded Social Security.
among his enduring innovations, he launched the अंतरराज्यीय Highway System ; the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency ( DARPA ), which led to the internet, among many invaluable आउटपुट ; the National Aeronautics and Space Administration ( NASA ), driving शांतिपूर्ण discovery in space ; the establishment of strong science education via the National रक्षा Education Act ; and encouraging peaceful use of nuclear power via amendments to the परमाणु Energy अधिनियम.
In social policy, he sent federal troops to Little Rock, Arkansas, for the first समय since पुनर्निर्माण to enforce federal court orders to desegregate public schools.
He also signed civil rights legislation in 1957 and 1960 to protect the right to vote.
He implemented desegregation of the armed forces in two years and made five appointments to the Supreme Court.
He was the पहला term-limited president in accordance साथ the 22nd Amendment.
Eisenhower 's two terms were peaceful ones लिये the सबसे part and saw considerable economic prosperity except for a sharp recession in 1958–59.
आइज़नहावर is often क्रमित highly among the U.S. Presidents.
Air Force One is the आधिकारिक air ट्रैफ़िक control call sign of a United States Air Force aircraft carrying the President of the United States.
In common parlance the term refers to those Air Force aircraft specifically designed, निर्मित, and प्रयुक्त for the purpose of transporting the president.
The Presidential aircraft is a prominent symbol of the American presidency and its power.
The idea of designating specific military aircraft to transport the President arose in 1943, when officials of the United States फौज एयर Forces – the पूर्ववर्ती to the U.S. Air Force – became concerned with relying on commercial airlines to transport the President.
A C-87 Liberator Express was reconfigured for use as a presidential transport ; however, it थी rejected by the रहस्य Service amid चिंताएं over the वायुयान 's safety रिकार्ड.
A C-54 Skymaster was then converted लिये अध्यक्षीय उपयोग ; this aircraft, dubbed the Sacred Cow, transported President Franklin D. Roosevelt to the Yalta Conference in February 1945, and थी subsequently used for another two years by President Harry S. Truman.
The `` Air Force One '' call sign was created after a 1953 incident during which a flight carrying President Dwight D. Eisenhower entered the same airspace as a commercial airline flight using the same call sign.
अनेक aircraft have been प्रयुक्त as एयर Force One चूंकि the सृष्टि of the अध्यक्षीय fleet, including two Boeing 707s introduced in the 1960s and 1970s, respectively ; since 1990, the presidential fleet has consisted of two Boeing VC-25As – specifically configured, highly customized Boeing 747-200B series aircraft.
The एयर Force is looking into replacing the two VC-25 aircraft with three replacement aircraft beginning in 2017.
A wedding anniversary is the वर्षगांठ of the date a wedding took place.
Traditional names exist for most of उन्हें : for instance, 50 years of विवाह is called a `` golden wedding anniversary '' or simply a `` golden anniversary ''.
A स्कैनर with Duplexing Automatic Document Feeder.
In multifunction or all-in-one printers, फैक्स machines, photocopiers and scanners, an automatic document feeder or ADF is a feature which takes several पृष्ठों and feeds the paper one page at a time into a scanner or copier, allowing the user to scan, and thereby copy, print, or fax, multiple-page documents without having to manually replace each page.
Most copiers allow scanning on the flatbed or platen ( the `` कांच '' ) or through a document feeder.
The vast majority of fax मशीने have an adf, allowing the unattended sending of multi-page faxes.
Due to the ubiquity of ADF in fax machines, some fax machine owners use the fax machine as a scanner, faxing multi-page documents to themselves.
Document feeders are वर्णित by speed, in pages per minute or ppm, and क्षमता, usually in a range from 10 sheets to 200.
There are two kinds of document feeders capable of two-sided ( duplex ) scanning : a reversing automatic document feeder or RADF scans one side of a पेज, तब flips it and scans the other side.
A duplexing automatic document feeder or DADF scans both sides in one pass.
The advantage of the DADF is faster speed for two-sided originals.
RADFs and DADFs are rated in images per minute ( IPM ), the number of sides they can scan each minute.
Fair Park is a recreational and educational complex स्तिथ in Dallas, Texas ( USA ).
The complex is registered as a डलास Landmark, National Historic लैंडमार्क and is home to nine museums, six performance facilities, a lagoon, and the largest Ferris wheel in North America.
Many of the buildings on the complex were constructed for the टेक्सास Centennial Exposition in 1936 which drew over six million visitors.
Most of the buildings built for the exposition still survive and it is recognized as a significant example of आर्ट Deco architecture.
मेला Park has been designated a Great Place in America by the American Planning Association.
The American Planning Association ( APA ) “is an independent, not-for-profit educational organization that provides नेतृत्व in the development of vital communities.”
The Great Places in American program helps to celebrate areas with “exemplary अक्षर, quality, और planning.”
Being designated as a Great Place in America, Fair Park was one of only ten cities chosen in 2011.
San Jose ( ; Spanish : St. जोसेफ ) is the third-largest city in California, the tenth-largest in the U.S., and the county seat of Santa Clara County which is located at the southern end of San Francisco Bay.
San Jose is the largest city within Silicon Valley, which is a major component of the greater San Francisco Bay Area, a region of 8.4 million people and the fifth largest महानगर area ( CSA ) in the संयुक्त States.
it is the largest city in Northern कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
San जोस was founded on November 29, 1777, as El Pueblo de San José de Guadalupe, the पहला civilian town in the Spanish colony of Nueva California, which later became alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
The city served as a farming community to support Spanish military installations at San Francisco and Monterey.
When California gained statehood in 1850, San Jose served as its first capital.
After more than 150 years as a छोटी farming city, San Jose and the surrounding Santa Clara घाटी became the last ( and largest ) contiguous area of undeveloped land surrounding the San Francisco Bay.
San Jose experienced increased demand for housing from soldiers और veterans returning from World War II.
San Jose then continued its aggressive expansion during the 1950s and 1960s by annexing more land area.
The रैपिड विकास of the high-technology and electronics industries further accelerated the transition from an agricultural center, to an urbanized metropolitan area.
By the 1990s, San Jose 's location within the booming local technology industry earned the city its nickname, Capital of Silicon घाटी.
San Jose now maintains global नगर status and is the largest city in the San Francisco Bay Area in terms of population, land area, and औद्योगिक development.
The u.S. Census Bureau reported the population of the city to be 945,942 as of the 2010 Census.
As of April 2013, the estimated population of San Jose was 984,000.
San Jose, along with the सांता Clara Valley, experienced परिचय half a century of spectacular suburban sprawl, with characteristics of intense urbanization similar to the लॉस Angeles area of Southern California.
The city has taken definite steps to avoid बनने `` L.A. North ''.
However, the sprawl in San Jose is बदतर than in Los Angeles by measures such as population density and public transit safety, investment, and ridership.
Europe depicted by Antwerp cartographer Abraham Ortelius in 1595
The इतिहास of Europe covers the people inhabiting the European महाद्वीप since it थी first populated in prehistoric times to present, with the first Homo sapiens arriving between 45,000 and 25,000 BC.
The earliest settlers to Prehistoric Europe आए during the paleolithic era.
The arrival of agriculture around 7000 BC ushered in the neolithic age.
Neolithic Europe lasted for 4000 years, overlapping साथ metal-using cultures that gradually spread throughout the continent.
Technological advances during the प्रागैतिहासिक age tended to arrive from the Middle East, spreading gradually to the उत्तरपश्चिम.
Some of the best-known civilizations of prehistoric Europe यहूद Minoan and Mycenaean, which flourished during the Bronze आयु जबतक they collapsed in a short period of time around 1200 BC.
The काल known as classical antiquity began with the rise of the city-states of प्राचीन Greece.
Greek influence reached its zenith under the expansive empire of Alexander the Great, spreading throughout Asia.
Northern and western Europe were dominated by the La Tène culture, a precursor to the Celts.
Rome, a small city-state traditionally founded in 753 BC, would grow to become the Roman Republic in 509 BC and would succeed Greek culture as the dominant Mediterranean civilization.
the events of the rule of Julius Caesar led to reorganization of the Republic into the Roman Empire.
The empire was later divided by the emperor Diocletian into the Western and पूर्वी empires.
During the later years of the रोमन Empire, the Germanic peoples of northern Europe grew in strength and repeated attacks led to the Fall of the Western Roman Empire in AD 476, a date which traditionally marks the end of the classical period and the start of the Middle Ages.
During the मध्य Ages, the Eastern Roman साम्राज्य survived, though modern historians refer to this state as the Byzantine Empire.
In Western Europe, Germanic peoples moved into positions of power in the remnants of the former Western रोमन Empire and established kingdoms and empires of उनके own.
Of all of the Germanic peoples, the Franks would rise to a position of Hegemony over western Europe, the Frankish Empire reaching its peak under Charlemagne around AD 800.
Francia was divided into several parts ; West Francia would evolve into the Kingdom of फ़्रांस, while East Francia would evolve into the Holy Roman Empire, a precursor to modern Germany.
The British Isles were the site of several large-scale migrations.
Native Celtic peoples had been अधिकारहीन during the period of Roman Britain, and when the Romans abandoned the British Isles during the 400s, waves of Germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated to southern Britain and established a series of petty kingdoms in what would eventually develop into the किंगडम of England by ad 927.
During this period, the Kingdom of Poland and Kingdom of Hungary ( 1000–1945 ) were organized as well.
The Viking Age, a period of migrations of Scandinavian peoples, वर्चस्व the काल from the late 700s to the मध्य 1000s.
Chief among the Viking states थी the Empire of Cnut the Great, a Danish leader who would become king of England, डेनमार्क, and Norway.
The Normans, a Viking people who settled in Northern France and founded the Duchy of Normandy, would have a significant impact on many parts of Europe, from the Norman conquest of England to Southern Italy and Sicily.
Another Scandinavian people, the Rus ' people, would go on to found Kievan Rus ', an early state which was a precursor for the modern country of Russia.
As the Viking Age drew to a close, the period known as the Crusades, a series of religiously-motivated military रिझाने originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule, began.
Several Crusader states were founded in the eastern Mediterranean.
ये were all short-lived.
The Crusaders would have a profound प्रभाव on many parts of Europe.
Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204 brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire.
Extinct dog breeds is a compilation of dog breeds that have become extinct.
वी Speak is a microphone accessory for Nintendo 's वी video game console.
Connected to the console via USB, the device can be placed near the video display, allowing voice chat to be conducted with the entire room.

वी Speak was announced at Nintendo 's 2008 E3 media briefing.

The Wii Speak accessory is succeeded by the embedded microphone on the Wii U 's GamePad controller.

A smart key is an electronic access and authorization system which is available as an option or standard in several cars.

univisión ( ) is a Spanish-language टेलीविज़न network in the United States.
The network is primarily dedicated for Latin American families who reside in the United States.
It has the largest audience of spanish-language television viewers in the world according to Nielsen ratings.
Randy falco, ( सीईओ as of June 29, 2011 ) COO, has been in charge of the company since the departure of Univision Communications president and CEO Joe Uva in अप्रैल 2010.
In recent years the network has पहुँचे पैरिटी with the U.S. 's five major English-language टेलीविज़न networks, और is often a strong fifth, outranking The CW, with some fourth-place weekly placings, and as of 2012, even first place rankings for individual programs over all five English networks due to the network 's consistent schedule of new telenovelas all 52 weeks of the year.
Univisión is headquartered in New York, and has its major studios, production facilities, and operations in Doral, Florida, a suburb of Miami.
In 2009, another television studio was announced, univision Studios, to be built in Doral.
Univision is available on cable and satellite in most of the country, with local stations in over 50 markets with large Hispanic और Latino populations and a national cable संजाल feed वितरित in बाज़ार without either the availability or the demand for a locally-based station.
Most of these stations air full लोकल news और other local programming in addition to network shows, and in major markets such as Los एंजिल्स, New York, and Miami the local newscasts carried by the network 's owned-and-operated station ( o & O ) stations are बराबर competitive with their English-language counterparts ratings-wise.
Univisión was acquired on March 29, 2007 by a consortium led by Haim Saban 's Saban Capital Group ( who had previously स्वामित्व the एंटिटी Saban entertainment ), TPG Capital, L.P., Providence Equity Partners, Madison Dearborn Partners, and Thomas H. Lee Partners for $ 13.7 billion or $ 36.25 per share plus $ 1.4 अरब in acquired कर्ज़.
the buyout बाएँ the company साथ a कर्ज़ level of twelve टाइम्स its annual cash flow, which was twice the norm in buyouts done over the previous two years.
Artist 's conception of a protoplanetary disk
The formation और of the Solar System is अनुमानित to have begun 4.6 billion years ago with the gravitational पतन of a small part of a giant molecular cloud.
Most of the collapsing mass collected in the centre, forming the Sun, while the rest flattened into a protoplanetary disk out of which the planets, moons, asteroids, and other small Solar System bodies formed.
This widely accepted model, known as the nebular परिकल्पना, was first developed in the 18th century by Emanuel Swedenborg, Immanuel Kant, and Pierre-Simon Laplace.
Its subsequent development has interwoven a variety of वैज्ञानिक disciplines including astronomy, physics, geology, और planetary science.
Since the भोर of the space age in the 1950s and the discovery of extrasolar ग्रह in the 1990s, the model has been both challenged and परिष्कृत to account लिये new observations.
The Solar System has evolved considerably since its initial formation.
Many moons have formed from घूमना discs of gas and dust around their parent planets, while other moons are thought to have formed independently and later महरूम captured by their planets.
स्टिल others, as the Earth 's Moon, may be the result of giant collisions.
Collisions between bodies have occurred continually up to the present day and have been central to the evolution of the Solar System.
The positions of the ग्रह often shifted, and planets have switched places.
This planetary migration is now thought to have been जिम्मेदार for much of the Solar System 's early evolution.
In roughly 5 billion years, the Sun will cool and expand outward many times its current diameter ( becoming a रेड giant ), before casting off इसके बाहरी परतों as a planetary नीहारिका and leaving behind a stellar remnant known as a white dwarf.
in the far distant future, the gravity of गुजर stars will gradually reduce the Sun 's retinue of planets.
Some planets will be destroyed, others ejected into interstellar space.
Ultimately, over the course of tens of billions of सालो, it is likely that the Sun will be left with none of the असली bodies in orbit around it.
The Trial ( Kafka 's original German title :, later as, and ) is a novel written by फ्रांज Kafka in 1914 and 1915 but नहीं published until 1925.
One of Kafka 's best-known works, it tells the story of a man arrested and prosecuted by a remote, अभिगम्य authority, with the nature of his crime revealed to neither उसे nor the रीडर.
Like Kafka 's other novels, The Trial was never completed, हालांकि it does include a chapter which brings the story to an समाप्त.
Because of this वहीँ are certain inconsistencies which exist within the novel, such as disparities in timing in addition to other discontinuities in narration.
After Kafka 's death in 1924 his dost and literary executor Max Brod edited the text for publication by Verlag Die Schmiede.
the original manuscript is held at the Museum of Modern Literature, Marbach am Neckar, Germany.
In 1999, the book was listed in Le Mondes 100 Books of the Century and as No. 2 of the Best German Novels of the Twentieth Century.
Lisa Anne Loeb ( born March 11, 1968 ) is an American singer-songwriter and actress.
She launched her career in 1994 with the song, `` Stay ( I Missed You ) ``, which was included in the film Reality Bites.
She was the first कलाकार to have a number one single in the United States while not हस्ताक्षरित to a रिकॉर्डिंग contract.
Her five studio CDs include her major label debut, the gold-selling Tails and its follow-up, the Grammy-nominated, gold-selling Firecracker.
Loeb has also worked in film, टेलीविज़न, voice-over work and children’s recordings.
Loeb has appeared in two television series, Dweezil & लिसा, a weekly culinary adventure for the Food Network and Number 1 Single, a reality show on the E !
Network in 2006 focused on her quest for love, success, करियर, और family.
Her children 's music includes the albums Catch the Moon ( 2003 ), and शिविर Lisa ( 2008 ).
Her first joint children 's book and album Lisa Loeb 's Silly sing-along : The Disappointing Pancake and अन्य Zany Songs was published in 2011.
In 2010 she founded the Lisa Loeb Eyewear Collection, which is based on her own designs.
The Coat of arms of the State of New जर्सी includes:
A shield with three plows emblazoned, representative of New Jersey 's agricultural tradition.
A forward-facing knight 's helmet.
A horse 's head as the crest of the helmet.
the female figures Liberty and Ceres, representative of the state 's motto ( see next item ).
Liberty is holding a स्टाफ supporting a `` liberty cap `` ; Ceres is holding an overflowing cornucopia.
The streamer at the foot of the emblem contains the State Motto of New Jersey, `` Liberty and Prosperity '', and the year of statehood, 1776.
It was originally designed by Pierre Eugene du simitiere in 1777 and was modified slightly in 1928.
The seal is the central motif in the flag of New जर्सी and the Great Seal of the State of New Jersey.
The Coat of arms contains a horse 's head.
A हेल्मेट showing that New जर्सी governs itself accordingly and three plows on a shield referring to the State 's agriculture tradition, giving it the nickname `` Garden State ''.
The two Goddesses represent the State motto, `` Liberty and Prosperity ''.
Liberty is on the left.
She is पकड़कर a स्टाफ with a liberty cap on it, and the word स्वतंत्रता underneath her.
The goddess on the सही is Ceres, goddess of agriculture.
She is holding a cornucopia with prosperity written below her.
According to the minutes of the New Jersey General Assembly लिये March 11, 1896, the date in which the Assembly officially approved the flag as the state emblem, the buff color is due indirectly to George Washington, who had ordered on October 2, 1779, that the uniform coats of the New Jersey Continental Line be dark ( Jersey ) blue, with buff facings.
Buff-colored facings had until then been reserved only for his own uniform and those of other Continental generals and उनके aides.
Then, on फ़रवरी 28, 1780, the Continental War Officers in Philadelphia directed कि the uniform coat facings of all regiments were to be the same as the background color of the regiments ' state flag.

`` We Can Work It Out '' is a song by the Beatles, written by Paul McCartney and John Lennon.
It was released as a `` दोगुना A-sided `` single with `` दिन Tripper ``, the first time both पहलू of a single were so designated in an initial release.
Both songs were अंकित during the Rubber Soul सत्र.
The song is an example of Lennon–McCartney collaboration at a depth that happened only rarely after they wrote the hit singles of 1963.
This song, `` A Day in the जीवन ``, `` Baby, You 're a Rich Man `` and `` I 've Got a Feeling ``, are among the notable exceptions.
As a medical diagnosis, pedophilia or paedophilia is a psychiatric disorder in व्यक्तियों 16 years of age or older typically characterized by a primary or exclusive sexual interest toward prepubescent children ( generally age 11 years or younger, though specific diagnosis criteria लिये the disorder extends the cut-off point लिये prepubescence to age 13 ).
An adolescent who is 16 सालो of age or पुरानी जरूर be at least five years older than the prepubescent child before the आकर्षण can be diagnosed as pedophilia.
The term has a range of definitions, as found in psychiatry, psychology, the vernacular, and law enforcement.
The International Classification of Diseases ( ICD ) defines pedophilia as a `` disorder of adult personality and behaviour '' in जिससे there is a sexual preference for children of prepubertal or जल्दी pubertal age.
According to the Diagnostic and सांख्यिकीय Manual of Mental Disorders ( DSM ), it is a paraphilia in which adults or adolescents 16 years of age or older have intense and recurrent sexual urges towards and कल्पनाओं about prepubescent children that they have either acted on or which cause them तकलीफ or interpersonal difficulty.
In popular usage, pedophilia means any sexual interest in children or the act of child sexual abuse, often termed `` pedophilic बर्ताव ''.
For example, The American Heritage Stedman 's चिकित्सा Dictionary states, `` pedophilia is the act or काल्पनिक on the part of an वयस्क of engaging in sexual activity with a child or children. ''
This आम use application also extends to the sexual interest in and sexual contact with रोमिल or post-pubescent minors.
Researchers recommend that these imprecise uses be avoided because although people who commit child sexual abuse commonly प्रदर्शनी the disorder, some offenders do not meet the clinical diagnosis standards for pedophilia and these standards pertain to prepubescents.
Additionally, not all pedophiles actually commit such abuse.
Pedophilia थी first formally recognized and named in the late 19th century.
A significant amount of शोध in the area has लिया place since the 1980s.
Although mostly documented in मेन, there are also महिलाओं who exhibit the disorder, and researchers assume available estimates underrepresent the true number of female pedophiles.
No cure for pedophilia has been developed, but वहीँ are therapies that can reduce the incidence of a person committing child sexual abuse.
In the United States, following Kansas v. Hendricks, sex offenders who are diagnosed साथ certain mental disorders, particularly pedophilia, can be subject to indefinite civil commitment, under various state laws ( generically called SVP laws ) and the federal Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006.
At present, the exact causes of pedophilia have not been conclusively established.
Research suggests कि pedophilia may be correlated with several different neurological abnormalities, and often co-exists with other personality disorders and psychological pathologies.
In the contexts of forensic psychology and law प्रवर्तन, a variety of typologies have महरूम suggested to categorize pedophiles according to behavior and motivations.
जूलियो César Chávez ( born Julio César Chávez González on July 12, 1962 ) is a retired Mexican professional boxer.
Chávez is considered by many people for their खेल statistics the महानतम fighter ever to come out of Mexico.
He is a six-time world champion in three weight divisions, and for several years he was माना one of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the world.
In a career कि spanned over 25 years, Chávez won five world titles in three weight divisions : WBC Super Featherweight in 1984, WBA Lightweight in 1987, WBC Lightweight in 1988, WBC Light Welterweight in 1989, IBF Light Welterweight in 1990, and wbc लाइट Welterweight in 1994.
He holds records for most successful consecutive defenses of world titles ( 27 ), most title झगड़े ( 37 ), most title-fight victories ( 31 ) and he is after Joe Louis with ( 23 ) for most title defenses won by knockout ( 21 ).
Chávez also has the longest undefeated streak in boxing history, 13 सालो.
His record was 89-0-1 going into his first loss to Frankie Randall and had an 87 fight win streak until his `` draw '' with Whitaker.
Julio César Chávez was known लिये his outstanding पंचिंग power, devastating body attack, remarkably strong chin and the relentless stalking of his opponents.
he ranks # 24 on ESPN 's 50 Greatest Boxers Of All Time.
On December 7, 2010, he was inducted in the prestigious International Boxing Hall of Fame for the Class of 2011.
He is the father of prospect Omar Chávez and former WBC Middleweight Champion जूलियो césar Chávez, Jr.
`` Selektion `` on the Judenrampe, Auschwitz, may/june 1944.
To be sent to the right meant slave labor ; to the left, the gas chamber.
This चित्र shows the arrival of Hungarian Jews from Carpatho-Ruthenia, many of them from the Berehov ghetto.
The photographer was Ernst hofmann or Bernhard Walter of the SS. Image courtesy of Yad vashem
The Holocaust ( from the Greek ' : hólos, `` whole '' and kaustós, `` burnt '' ) also known as the Shoah ( Hebrew :, HaShoah, `` प्रलय '' ; Yiddish :, Churben or Hurban, from the Hebrew for `` destruction '' ), was the mass हत्या or genocide of approximately six million Jews during World War II, a programme of systematic state-sponsored murder by Nazi Germany, led by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party, throughout German-occupied territory.
Of the nine million Jews who had resided in Europe before the Holocaust, approximately two-thirds यहूद killed.
Over one million यहूदी children were killed in the Holocaust, as were approximately two लाख Jewish women and three million Jewish men.
A network of over 40,000 facilities in Germany and german-occupied territory were प्रयुक्त to concentrate, hold, and kill Jews and other पीड़ितों.
कुछ scholars argue that the mass murder of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included in the definition, and some use the common noun `` holocaust '' to describe other Nazi mass murders, including those of Soviet prisoners of war, Polish and Soviet civilians, और homosexuals.
Recent estimates based on figures obtained since the fall of the Soviet संघ indicates some ten to eleven million civilians and prisoners of war were intentionally murdered by the Nazi regime.
The persecution and genocide were carried out in stages.
विभिन्न laws to हटाएँ the Jews इससे civil society, सबसे prominently the Nuremberg Laws, were enacted in जर्मनी years before the outbreak of World War II.
Concentration camps were established in which inmates were subjected to slave labor until they died of थकावट or disease.
Where Germany conquered new territory in eastern Europe, specialized units called Einsatzgruppen murdered यहूदियों और political प्रतिद्वंद्वियों in mass shootings.
the occupiers required Jews और Romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos before being transported by भाड़ा train to extermination camps where, if they survived the journey, most were systematically killed in gas chambers.
Every arm of Germany 's bureaucracy was involved in the लोजिस्टिक्स that led to the genocides, turning the Third Reich into what one Holocaust scholar रै called `` a genocidal state ''.
4-h in the संयुक्त States is a youth organization administered by the नेशनल Institute of Food and कृषि of the United States Department of Agriculture ( USDA ), with the मिशन of `` engaging youth to reach their fullest potential while advancing the field of youth development. ''
The name represents four personal development areas of focus for the organization : head, heart, hands, and health.
The organization has over 6.5 million members in the United States, from ages पाँच to twenty-one, in approximately 90,000 clubs.
The लक्ष्य of 4-H is to develop citizenship, leadership, responsibility and life skills of youth through experiential learning programs and a positive youth विकास approach.
Though typically thought of as an agriculturally focused organization as a result of its इतिहास, 4-H today focuses on citizenship, healthy जीना, science, engineering, and technology programs.
Today, 4-H and सम्बन्धित programs exist in over eighty countries around the world ; the organization and administration varies from देश to country.
Each of these कार्यक्रम operates independently, but cooperatively through अंतरराष्ट्रीय exchanges, global education programs, and communications.
The 4-H motto is `` To make the best better '', while its slogan is `` Learn by doing '' ( sometimes written as `` Learn to do by doing '' ).
The national flag of Chile, consists of two unequal horizontal bands of श्वेत और red and a ब्लू square the same height as the white band in the canton, which bears a white five-pointed star in the बीच.
It was adopted on 18 October 1817.
The Chilean flag is also known in Spanish as La Estrella Solitaria ( The लोन Star ).
The star represents a guide to progress and honor ; blue symbolizes the sky और the Pacific Ocean, white is for the snow-covered Andes, and red stands for the blood spilled to achieve independence.
According to the epic poem La Araucana, the colors were derived from those from the flag flown by the Mapuche during the Arauco War.
`` Flag दिन '' is held each year on the ninth of July to commemorate the 77 soldiers who died in the 1882 Battle of La Concepción.
Generation Y, also known as the Millennial Generation, is the demographic cohort following Generation X.
There are no precise तिथियाँ for when Generation Y starts and ends.
Commentators उपयोग beginning birth dates from the latter 1970s, or इससे the early 1980s to the early 2000s.

Virginia ( ), officially the Commonwealth of Virginia, is a U.S. state located in the दक्षिण Atlantic region of the United States.
Virginia is nicknamed the `` Old Dominion '' and the `` Mother of राष्ट्रपतियों '' after the eight U.S. presidents born there.
The geography and climate of the Commonwealth are shaped by the Blue Ridge Mountains and the chesapeake Bay, which provide habitat for much of its flora and fauna.
The capital of the Commonwealth is Richmond ; and Virginia Beach is the most populous city.
Fairfax County is the most populous political subdivision.
The wealthiest is Loudoun County.
The राष्ट्रमंडल 's population is over eight million.
The area 's history begins with several indigenous groups, including the Powhatan.
In 1607 the London Company established the Colony of Virginia as the पहला permanent New संसार English colony.
Slave labor and the land acquired इससे displaced Native American tribes each played a significant role in the colony 's early politics and plantation economy.
Virginia was one of the 13 colonies in the American क्रान्ति and joined the confederacy in the American Civil War, during which Richmond was made the Confederate capital और Virginia 's northwestern काउंटी seceded to form the state of West Virginia.
Although the राष्ट्रमंडल was under conservative single-party rule for nearly a सदी following Reconstruction, both major national parties are competitive in modern Virginia.
The Virginia General Assembly is the oldest legislature in the Western Hemisphere.
The state government has been repeatedly ranked most effective by the Pew Center on the States.
It is unique in कैसा it treats cities and counties equally, manages local roads, and prohibits इसके governors from serving लगातार terms.
Virginia 's economy has many सेक्टर : agriculture in the Shenandoah Valley ; federal agencies in Northern Virginia, including the headquarters of the Department of Defense and CIA ; and military facilities in Hampton Roads, the site of the region 's main seaport.
Virginia 's public schools and many कॉलेजों and universities have contributed to growing media और technology sectors.
As a result, computer chips have become the state 's leading export.

It is a part of Windows अनिवार्य software suite and offers the ability to create and edit videos as well as to publish them on SkyDrive, Facebook, youtube, and Flickr.
`` Brenda 's Got A Baby '' is the solo debut single by Tupac Shakur, and tenth track from his debut album, 2Pacalypse Now.
The song, which features r & B सिंगर Dave Hollister, is about a twelve year-old girl named Brenda जो lives in a ghetto, has a baby, and is incapable of supporting it.
The song explores the issue of teen pregnancy और its effect on the young mothers and their families.
जैसे many of Shakur 's songs, `` Brenda 's Got a baby '' draws from the दुर्दशा of the impoverished.
Using Brenda to represent young mothers in general, Shakur criticises the low level of support from the baby 's father, the government, and society in general.
Shakur wrote the song when he read a newspaper article about a twelve-year-old girl who मिला pregnant from her cousin and, because she did not want her parents to know about the baby, threw it in a कचरा can.
The official लोगो of Pokémon for its international release ; `` Pokémon '' is short for the original Japanese title of `` Pocket Monsters ''.
is a media franchise प्रकाशित and owned by Japanese video game कम्पनी Nintendo और created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996.
Originally released as a pair of interlinkable Game लड़के role-playing video games developed by Game Freak, Pokémon has since become the second-most successful and lucrative video game-based media franchise in the world, behind only Nintendo 's own Mario franchise.
Pokémon properties have since been merchandised into anime, manga, trading cards, toys, किताबे, and other media.
The franchise celebrated in 2006, and, cumulative sales of the video games ( including home console versions, such as the `` Pikachu '' Nintendo 64 ) have reached more than 200 million copies.
In November 2005, 4Kids Entertainment, which had managed the non-game सम्बन्धित licensing of Pokémon, announced that it had agreed not to renew the Pokémon representation agreement.
Pokémon USA Inc. ( now The Pokémon Company International ), a subsidiary of Japan 's Pokémon Co., now oversees all Pokémon licensing outside of Asia.
the name Pokémon is the romanized contraction of the Japanese ब्रांड.
The term पोकीमॉन, in addition to referring to the Pokémon franchise itself, also collectively refers to the 649 fictional species that have made दिखावे in Pokémon media as of the release of the पांचवां generation titles Pokémon Black 2 and White 2 ; साथ the upcoming releases of Pokémon X and y, 6 new Pokémon have been featured in promotions for the games.
`` Pokémon '' is identical in both the singular and plural, as is each individual species name ; it is grammatically correct to say `` one Pokémon '' and `` many Pokémon '', as well as `` one Pikachu `` and `` अनेक Pikachu ''.
कवर of the first edition of the प्रकाशन Dada by Tristan Tzara ; Zurich, 1917
Dada ( ) or Dadaism was an art movement of the European avant-garde in the early 20th century.
Many claim Dada began in Zurich, Switzerland in 1916, spreading to Berlin shortly thereafter but the height of New York Dada was the year before in 1915.
To quote Dona budd 's The Language of Art Knowledge, Dada was born आउट of negative reaction to the horrors of World War I.
This international movement was begun by a group of artist and poets associated with the Cabaret Voltaire in Zurich.
Dada अस्वीकृत कारण and logic, prizing nonsense, irrationality and intuition.
The origin of the name दादा is unclear ; some believe that it is a nonsensical word.
Others maintain that it originates from the Romanian कलाकारों Tristan Tzara and Marcel Janco 's frequent use of the words da, da, meaning yes, yes in the Romanian language.
Another theory says that the नाम `` Dada '' आए during a meeting of the समूह जब a paper knife stuck into a French-German dictionary happened to point to 'dada ', a French word लिये 'hobbyhorse '.
The गति primarily involved visual arts, literature, poetry, art manifestoes, art theory, theatre, and graphic design, and concentrated its anti-war politics through a rejection of the prevailing standards in art through anti-art cultural works.
In addition to being anti-war, Dada was भी anti- बुर्जुआ and had political affinities with the radical left.
Dada activities included पब्लिक gatherings, demonstrations, and publication of art/literary journals ; passionate coverage of art, politics, and culture यहूद topics often discussed in a variety of media.
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball, Emmy Hennings, Hans Arp, Raoul Hausmann, हन्ना Höch, Johannes Baader, ट्रिस्टन Tzara, Francis Picabia, Richard Huelsenbeck, Georg Grosz, John Heartfield, Marcel Duchamp, Beatrice Wood, Kurt Schwitters, and Hans Richter, among others.
The movement influenced later styles like the avant-garde and शहर म्यूज़िक आंदोलनों, और groups सहित surrealism, Nouveau réalisme, pop art and Fluxus.
Dada is the groundwork to abstract art and ध्वनि poetry, a starting point for performance art, a prelude to postmodernism, an influence on pop art, a celebration of antiart to be later embraced for anarcho-political uses in the 1960s और the movement that lay the foundation for Surrealism.
पहला trophic level.
The plants in this image, and the algae and phytoplankton in the lake, are primary producers.
They take nutrients from the soil or the water, and manufacture their own food by photosynthesis, using energy from the सूर्य.
The trophic level of an organism is the position it occupies in a food chain.
The word trophic derives from the Greek τροφή ( trophē ) referring to food or feeding.
A food कड़ी represents a succession of organisms that eat another organism and are, in turn, eaten themselves.
The number of steps an organism is from the start of the chain is a measure of इसके trophic level.
Food chains start at trophic level 1 with primary producers ऐसे as plants, मूव to herbivores at level 2, predators at level 3 and typically finish with carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or 5.
The path along the chain can form either a one-way flow, or a food `` web. ''
Ecological communities with higher biodiversity form more complex trophic paths.

A silk-producing raspy cricket.
Silk is a natural protein fibre, some फ़ॉर्म of which can be woven into textiles.
The protein fibre of silk is composed mainly of fibroin and produced by certain insect larvae to रूप cocoons.
The best-known type of silk is obtained from the cocoons of the larvae of the mulberry silkworm Bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ).
The shimmering appearance of silk is due to the triangular prism -like structure of the silk fibre, जिससे allows silk cloth to refract incoming light at अलग कोण, thus producing different colors.
Silks are produced by several other insects, but generally only the silk of शलभ caterpillars has been used for textile manufacturing.
There has been some research into other silks, which differ at the molecular level.
Many silks are mainly produced by the लार्वे of insects undergoing complete metamorphosis, but some adult insects such as webspinners produce silk, and कुछ insects such as raspy crickets produce रेशा throughout their lives.
Silk production also occurs in Hymenoptera ( bees, wasps, and ants ), silverfish, mayflies, thrips, leafhoppers, beetles, lacewings, fleas, flies और midges.
Other types of arthropod उपज silk, सबसे notably various arachnids such as spiders ( देखिए spider silk ).
Late Show with David Letterman is an American late-night talk show hosted by David Letterman on सीबीएस.
The show debuted on August 30, 1993, और is उत्पादित by Letterman 's production company, Worldwide Pants Incorporated.
The show 's music director and band-leader of the house बैंड, the सीबीएस Orchestra, is Paul Shaffer.
The head writer is Matt रॉबर्ट्स and the उद्घोषक is Alan kalter.
Of the major U.S. late-night programs, लेट Show ranks दूसरी in cumulative average viewers over time and third in number of episodes over time.
The show leads other late night shows in ad आय with $ 271 million in 2009.
In most U.S. बाज़ार the show airs at 11:35 p.m. Eastern/Pacific time, but is recorded Monday through Wednesday at 4:30 p.m., and Thursdays at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m.
The second Thursday episode usually airs on Friday of that week.
In 2002, Late Show with दाउद Letterman was ranked No. 7 on TV Guide 's 50 Greatest TV Shows of All Time.
सीबीएस has a contract with Worldwide Pants to continue the show through 2014 ; by then, Letterman will surpass Johnny Carson as the longest tenured late-night talk show host.
The Real Housewives of Orange County is an American reality वृत्तचित्र television program on Bravo, set in Orange County, California.
It was the first The Real Housewives program in the series.
The श्रेणी is a voyeuristic look into the wealthy lives of these housewives, as they shop, get plastic सर्जरी, gossip, fight and live lavishly.
The financial संकट, the beginning of which coincided almost exactly with the first season 's broadcast, has since trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles with जॉब losses, evictions, mortgage defaults, foreclosures, and marital stress—all recorded in progressive seasons of the show.
Cyberstalking is the उपयोग of the Internet or other electronic अर्थात् to stalk or harass an individual, a group of individuals, or an organization.
It may शामिल the making of गलत accusations or statements of fact ( as in defamation ), monitoring, making threats, identity theft, damage to data or equipment, the solicitation of minors for sex, or gathering सूचना that may be used to harass.
The definition of `` harassment '' must meet the criterion that a reasonable person, in possession of the same information, would regard it as sufficient to cause another reasonable person distress.
Cyberstalking is different from स्थानिक or offline stalking in कि it occurs through the use of electronic communications technology such as the internet.
However, it sometimes leads to it, or is accompanied by it.
Both हैं criminal offenses.
Cyberstalking shares important characteristics with offline stalking.
Many stalkers – online or off – are motivated by a desire to control their victims.
A cyberstalker may be an online stranger or a person whom the target knows.
A cyberstalker may be anonymous and may solicit involvement of other लोगों ऑनलाइन who do not even जान the target.
Cyberstalking is a criminal offense that comes into play under state anti-stalking laws, slander laws, and harassment laws.
A cyberstalking conviction can result in a restraining order, probation, or even criminal दंड against the assailant, including कारावास.
A business letter is usually used when writing from एक company to another, or for correspondence between such organizations और their customers, clients and other external parties.
the overall style of letter will depend on the संबंध between the parties concerned.
There are many reasons to write a business letter.
It could be to request direct information or action इससे another party, to order supplies from a प्रदायक, to identify a mistake that was committed, to reply directly to a request, to apologize for a ग़लत or simply to convey goodwill.
Even today, the business letter is still very useful because it produces a permanent record, is confidential, formal and delivers persuasive, well-considered messages.
Tilapia ( ) is the common name for nearly a hundred species of cichlid fish from the tilapiine cichlid tribe.
Tilapia are mainly freshwater fish, inhabiting shallow streams, ponds, rivers and lakes, and less commonly found living in brackish water.
Historically, they have been of प्रमुख importance in artisan fishing in Africa और the levant, and are of increasing importance in aquaculture.
Tilapia can become problematic invasive species in new warm-water habitats, whether deliberately or accidentally introduced, but generally not in temperate climates due to their अक्षमता to survive in cooler waters below about.
Turner & Hooch is a 1989 कॉमेडी नाटक crime film अभिनीत Tom Hanks and Beasley the Dog as the eponymous characters, Turner and Hooch respectively.
The film also stars Mare Winningham, Craig T. Nelson, and Reginald veljohnson.
it was directed by Roger Spottiswoode ; the film was originally slated to be निर्देशित by Henry Winkler, but he was terminated due to `` creative differences ''.

Adolf Hitler ( ; 20 अप्रैल 1889 – 30 April 1945 ) was an Austrian -born German politician and the leader of the Nazi Party ( ( nsdap ) ; National समाजवादी German Workers Party ).
He was chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 and dictator of Nazi Germany ( as Führer und reichskanzler ) from 1934 to 1945.
Hitler was at the centre of Nazi Germany, World War II in Europe, and the Holocaust.
Hitler was a decorated veteran of World War I.
he joined the German Workers ' Party ( precursor of the NSDAP ) in 1919, and became leader of the nsdap in 1921.
In 1923, he attempted a coup d'état in Munich, known as the Beer Hall Putsch.
The failed coup resulted in Hitler 's imprisonment, during जिससे time he wrote his memoir, Mein Kampf ( my Struggle ).
After his release in 1924, हिटलर gained popular support by attacking the Treaty of Versailles and promoting Pan-Germanism, antisemitism, और anti-communism with charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda.
After उसके appointment as chancellor in 1933, he transformed the Weimar Republic into the Third Reich, a single-party तानाशाही based on the totalitarian and autocratic ideology of Nazism.
Hitler 's aim was to establish a New Order of absolute Nazi German hegemony in continental Europe.
to this end, his foreign and domestic policies had the aim of seizing Lebensraum ( `` living space '' ) for the Germanic people.
He directed the rearmament of Germany and the आक्रमण of Poland by the Wehrmacht in September 1939, resulting in the outbreak of World War II in Europe.
Under Hitler 's rule, in 1941 German forces and their European allies occupied most of Europe and उत्तर Africa.
in 1943, जर्मनी had महरूम forced onto the defensive and suffered a series of escalating defeats.
In the final days of the war, दौरान the Battle of Berlin in 1945, Hitler married his long-time partner, Eva Braun.
On 30 April 1945, less than two days later, the two committed suicide to avoid कैप्चर by the Red Army, और their corpses were burned.
Hitler 's aggressive foreign policy is considered the main cause of the outbreak of World War II in Europe.
His antisemitic policies and racially motivated ideology resulted in the deaths of at least 5.5 million Jews, and लाखो of other people deemed racially inferior.
thumb
A domain name is an identification string that defines a realm of administrative autonomy, authority, or control on the Internet.
Domain names are formed by the rules और procedures of the Domain नाम System ( DNS ).
Technically, any name registered in the DNS is a domain name.
Domain names are used in various networking contexts and application-specific naming and addressing purposes.
In general, a डोमेन name represents an Internet Protocol ( IP ) resource, such as a personal computer used to access the Internet, a server computer hosting a web site, or the web site itself or any other service communicated via the Internet.
Domain names are organized in subordinate levels ( subdomains ) of the DNS रूट domain, which is nameless.
The first-level नियत of domain names are the top-level domains ( TLDs ), including the generic top-level domains ( gTLDs ), such as the prominent domains com, सूचना, जाल and org, and the country code top-level domains ( ccTLDs ).
Below these top-level domains in the DNS hierarchy are the second-level and third-level domain names that are typically open for reservation by end-users जो wish to connect local क्षेत्रफल networks to the Internet, create other publicly accessible Internet resources or run web sites.
The registration of these domain names is usually administered by domain name registrars who sell their services to the पब्लिक.
A fully qualified domain name ( FQDN ) is a डोमेन name that is completely specified in the पदानुक्रम of the DNS, having no omitted parts.
Domain names are usually लिखा in lowercase, although labels in the Domain Name System are case-insensitive.
Nitrate is a polyatomic ion with the molecular formula NO3− और a molecular द्रव्यमान of 62.0049 g/mol. Nitrates also describe the organic कार्यात्मक group RONO2.
These nitrate esters are a specialized class of विस्फोटक.

Agriculture is a major industry in the United States and the country is a net exporter of food.
As of the last census of agriculture in 2007, there were 2.2 million farms, covering an area of, an average of per farm.
Although agricultural activity occurs in most states, it is particularly concentrated in the vast expanse of flat, arable land known as the Great Plains, which encompasses the central प्रदेश of the nation.
The Mpemba effect, named after Tanzanian छात्र Erasto Mpemba, is the assertion that warmer water can freeze faster than colder water.
Although there is anecdotal support for the effect, there is no अनुबंध on exactly what the effect is and under what circumstances it occurs.
There have been reports of similar phenomena since ancient times, although with insufficient detail for the claims to be replicated.
The phenomenon seems contrary to thermodynamics, but a number of possible explanations for the effect have been proposed.
Further investigations will need to decide on a precise definition of `` freezing '' and कंट्रोल a vast number of starting parameters in order to confirm or explain the effect.
The Siamese (, ) is one of the first distinctly पहचाना breeds of Oriental cat.
the breed originated in Thailand ( formerly known as Siam ), where वे are one of several native breeds and हैं called Wichian Mat ( วิเชียรมาศ, a name meaning `` moon डायमंड '' ).
In the 20th सदी the Siamese cat became एक of the most popular breeds in Europe and North America.
Quality Food Centers ( QFC ) is a supermarket chain based in Bellevue, Washington, with 64 stores in the Puget ध्वनि region of Washington state and in the Portland, ऑरेगॉन metropolitan area.
In economics, the money supply or money stock, is the total amount of monetary assets available in an economy at a specific time.
There are several ways to define `` धन, '' but standard measures प्रायः include currency in circulation and demand जमा ( जमाकर्ताओं ' easily accessed एसेट on the books of financial institutions ).
धन supply data are अंकित and प्रकाशित, प्रायः by the government or the central बैंको of the country.
Public and private sector विश्लेषकों have long monitored changes in money supply because of its effects on the price level, inflation, the exchange rate and the business cycle.
That relation between money and prices is historically associated with the quantity सिद्धान्त of money.
वहीँ is strong empirical evidence of a direct relation between money-supply growth and long-term price inflation, at least लिये rapid increases in the amount of money in the अर्थव्यवस्था.
That is, a country such as Zimbabwe जिससे देखी rapid increases in its money supply also saw rapid increases in prices ( hyperinflation ).
This is one reason for the reliance on monetary policy as a अर्थात् of controlling inflation.
The nature of this causal chain is the subject of contention.
Some heterodox economists argue that the money supply is endogenous ( संकल्पित by the workings of the economy, not by the central bank ) and that the sources of महंगाई must be found in the distributional structure of the economy.
In addition, those economists seeing the central bank 's control over the money supply as feeble say that there हैं two weak links between the growth of the money supply and the inflation rate.
First, in the aftermath of a recession, when many resources are underutilized, an increase in the money supply can cause a sustained increase in real production instead of inflation.
Second, if the velocity of money, i.e., the ratio between nominal जीडीपी and धन supply, परिवर्तन, an increase in the money supply could have either no effect, an exaggerated effect, or an unpredictable प्रभाव on the growth of नाममात्र GDP.
लोगो for IMAX.
Warren Theatre IMAX cinema, Wichita, Kansas, USA, 601 seats.

IMAX ( an abbreviation for Image Maximum ) is a motion picture film format and a set of सिनेमा projection standards created by the Canadian company IMAX Corporation.
IMAX has the capacity to record and display बिंब of far greater size and resolution than conventional फिल्मी systems.
Since 2002, some feature films have महरूम converted ( or upgraded ) into IMAX format for display in IMAX theatres और some have also been partially shot in IMAX.
imax is the most widely used system for special-venue film presentations.
, there are 697 IMAX theatres in 52 countries.
