Weather is the state of the atmosphere, to the degree that it is hot or cold, wet or dry, calm or stormy, clear or cloudy.
Most weather phenomena occur in the troposphere, just below the stratosphere.
Weather generally refers to day-to-day temperature and precipitation activity, whereas climate is the term for the average atmospheric conditions over longer periods of time.
When used without qualification, `` weather '' is understood to be the weather of Earth.
Weather is driven by एयर pressure ( temperature and moisture ) differences between one place and another.
These pressure and temperature differences can occur due to the sun angle at any particular spot, which varies by latitude from the tropics.
The strong temperature contrast between polar and tropical air gives rise to the jet स्ट्रीम.
Weather systems in the mid-latitudes, such as extratropical cyclones, are caused by instabilities of the जेट stream flow.
Because the Earth 's axis is tilted relative to its orbital plane, sunlight is incident at different angles at different times of the year.
On Earth 's surface, temperatures usually दायरा ±40 °C ( −40 °F to 100 °F ) annually.
Over thousands of years, changes in Earth 's orbit affect the amount and distribution of solar energy प्राप्त by the Earth and influence long-term climate and global climate change.
Surface temperature differences in turn cause pressure differences.
Higher altitudes are cooler than lower altitudes due to differences in compressional heating.
Weather forecasting is the application of science and technology to predict the state of the atmosphere for a future time and a given location.
The atmosphere is a chaotic system, so small changes to one part of the system can grow to have large effects on the प्रणाली as a whole.
Human attempts to control the weather have occurred throughout human history, and there is evidence that human activity such as agriculture और industry has inadvertently modified weather patterns.
Studying how the weather works on other planets has been helpful in understanding how मौसम works on Earth.
A famous लैंडमार्क in the Solar प्रणाली, Jupiter 's ग्रेट Red Spot, is an anticyclonic storm known to have existed for at least 300 years.
however, weather is not limited to planetary bodies.
A star 's corona is constantly being lost to space, creating what is essentially a very पतला atmosphere throughout the Solar System.
The movement of mass ejected from the Sun is known as the solar wind.
Katy Perry is an American singer-songwriter from Santa Barbara, California.
She signed with Capitol Records.
Perry has released three studio albums, including her debut Christian प्रयत्न Katy Hudson, One of the Boys, and Teenage Dream.
Perry 's mainstream career was kicked off with the massive chart success of her debut single `` I Kissed a Girl ``.
During her career, पेरी has been nominated लिये numerous major music awards, primarily for Teenage सपना and One of the Boys.
The following is a list of sovereign states and territories where English is an आधिकारिक language or language of सरकारी.
In 2012, there were 88 states in total ( 60 sovereign states और 28 non-sovereign states ).
In many countries English is the dominant language, but does not have official status.
In Australia, English is spoken by the vast majority of the population and is the only language used in government institutions, but Australia does not have an official language.
The case is the same in the United Kingdom and the United राज्य, though many states and regions within the U.S. do have English as an official language.
English is the dominant language of New जीलैंड और an official language of कनाडा ( along with French ), India ( along साथ Hindi and several other languages ), Ireland ( along with Irish ), and the Philippines ( along with Tagalog ).
English is the sole official language of the राष्ट्रमंडल of Nations and the Commonwealth Games.
English is one of the आधिकारिक languages of the United Nations, the European Union and the International Olympic Committee.
Many of these countries are current or former colonies or dependencies of the United Kingdom ( see also अंग्रेजों Empire ), or of the संयुक्त States, itself a former colony of the UK.
Notable exceptions include Rwanda, which was a former Belgian colony and Eritrea, which was an Italian colony where the British Empire spanned its control only in World War II and shortly after ( 1941-1952 ).
India 's linguistic picture is complex.
According to the Constitution of India, `` हिंदी in the देवनागरी script '' is the official language of the union ; and अंग्रेज़ी the 'subsidiary official language ' ; however, English is mandated for the authoritative texts of all federal laws and Supreme Court decisions and ( along with Hindi ) is one of the two languages of the Indian Parliament.
English is used almost exclusively for higher शिक्षा, business and विज्ञान.
Courses in majority of the schools are taught exclusively in English.
English is extensively used for administrative purposes in India.
India is the second-largest English-speaking देश in the world by number of speakers, after the संयुक्त States.
As such, many consider English to be the de facto official language of India.
See Official languages of India.
The linguistic makeup of Pakistan is similarly complex.
While the नेशनल language is Urdu, English is an official language and used in business, government and law.
English is a compulsory language in schools.
All school courses are taught in English.
Pakistan is the 9th largest english-speaking देश in the world by population.
Southern Cone (, ) is a भौगोलिक region composed of the southernmost areas of South America, south of the Tropic of मकर.
Although geographically this includes Southern and part of Southeast ( São Paulo ) of Brazil, in terms of political भूगोल the Southern cone रै traditionally comprised अर्जेंटीना, Chile, Paraguay, and उरुग्वे.
In the narrowest sense, it only covers Argentina, Chile and Uruguay, bounded on the north by the states of Brazil, Paraguay, Bolivia and Peru, on the west by the प्रशांत Ocean, and south to the junction between the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans, which it is the closest continental area of Antarctica ( 1000 km ).
High life expectancy, the highest Human Development Index of Latin America, high Standard of living, significant भागीदारी in the global markets and the उभरते economy of its members make the Southern Cone the most prosperous macro-region in South America.
For multi-event athletic competitions see Track and Field Competitions, खण्ड `` Meetings ''.
Meetings हैं sometimes held around conference tables.
In a meeting, two or more people come together to discuss one or more topics, often in a formal setting.
An आधिकारिक game in baseball, also sometimes called a regulation game, is a game that has progressed beyond the point at which it can be considered complete if necessary.
This is approximately the halfway point of the game.
In the case of inclement weather, any game which has पहुँचे this point may be रोका and shortened as needed, with the परिणाम being final, and all records and statistics counted.
a game which has not reached this point before being रोका is either considered a suspended game ( to be continued at a later date from the point of stoppage ), or is simply canceled और replayed इससे the start.
( This depends on the नियम of each individual league. )
In either case, no statistics are गिने until the game becomes आधिकारिक.
Since most professional baseball games are nine innings long, the fifth inning is used as the threshold for an official game.
If the visiting team is leading, or the game is tied, the end of the पांचवां inning marks this पाइंट.
If the home team ( which bats last ) is already ahead in the score, and theoretically would not need its half of the fifth inning, then 41⁄2 innings ( i.e., the middle of the fifth ) is considered an official game.
the खेल is also considered official if the home team scores to take the lead in the bottom of the fifth inning, since the game would end immediately if the same thing happened in the नवीं.
In nearly all cases, the `` official game '' औकात is used to determine whether a बरसात check will be honored for fans holding tickets.
If a game is started but does not reach the point of becoming official, fans हैं entitled to a new ticket for the make-up game or ( in सबसे cases ) any other available game of their choice.
If a game is halted after it becomes official, the game is simply shortened and no rain check is given.
The `` official game '' statistic received some attention during the 1995 season, when Cal Ripken, Jr. was approaching the record for consecutive games played, previously आयोजित by Lou Gehrig.
Large numbers were hung on the पक्ष of the B & O Warehouse at Oriole Park at Camden Yards to show the number of games in Ripken 's streak.
Each day, a new number was unfurled during the fifth inning after each game had become official ( since the statistic would नहीं have गिने if the game had been stopped before that point ).
A similar practice has been used to count bas toward the demolition of several stadiums ( including Veterans Stadium in Philadelphia in 2003, Busch Memorial Stadium in St. Louis in 2005, and the original Yankee Stadium and Shea Stadium in New York City in 2008 ) ; as प्रत्येक game became official, the team would unveil a नई ( lower ) number showing the number of games left to be निभाई in the stadium.
A telephone number or phone number is a sequence of digits used to call from one telephone line to another in a public switched telephone संजाल.
When telephone numbers were invented, वे यहूद short — as few as one, two or three digits — and were given orally to a switchboard operator.
As phone systems have grown and interconnected to encompass the world, telephone numbers have become longer.
In addition to telephones, they now access अन्य devices, ऐसे as computers and फैक्स machines.
The number contains the information necessary to identify uniquely the intended endpoint for the telephone call.
Each such endpoint must have a unique number within the public switched टेलीफोन संजाल.
Most countries use fixed length numbers ( लिये normal lines at least ) and इसलिए the number of endpoints determines the necessary length of the telephone number.
It is also possible for प्रत्येक subscriber to have a set of shorter numbers for the endpoints most often used.
These `` shorthand '' or `` speed कॉलिंग '' numbers are automatically translated to unique telephone numbers before the call can be connected.
Some special services have their own short numbers ( e.g., 1-1-9, 9-1-1, 0-0-0, 9-9-9, 1-1-1, and 1-1-2 being the Emergency Services numbers for China, जापानी, South Korea, Taiwan and Sri Lanka ; Canada और the United States ; Australia ; the United Kingdom, आयरलैंड, South Africa, Poland, Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, मोरक्को, Macao, Bahrain, Qatar, Bangladesh, बोत्सवाना, Ghana, Kenya, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Mauritius, सिंगापुर, Zimbabwe, Trinidad, Tobago ; New Zealand ; Kuwait and the European Union, respectively. )
Many systems also allow calls within a लोकल area to be made without dialing the local area कोड.
For example, a फोन number in North America will start with तीन numbers ( such as 661 ), which is the area code, followed by seven digits split into sections of three and four ( such as 550-1212 ), जिससे is the local क्रमांक.
Some areas now have mandatory ten-digit डायलिंग in place, even for local calls.
Most telephone networks today ( exceptions being private intercom and सुरक्षित phone networks ) are interconnected in the international telephone network, where the format of telephone numbers is standardized by ITU-T in the recommendation E.164.
This specifies that the संपूर्ण क्रमांक should be 15 digits or shorter, and begin with a देश prefix.
For most countries, this is followed by an area code or city code और the subscriber number, which might consist of the code for a particular telephone exchange.
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes how to represent an international telephone number in writing or print, starting with a plus sign ( `` + '' ) and the country code.
When calling an international number from a fixed line फोन, the + must be replaced with the international call prefix chosen by the country the call is being बना from.
Some mobile phones allow the + to be entered directly.
The format and allocation of local phone संख्याएँ are controlled by each nation 's respective government, either directly or by sponsored organizations ( such as nanpa overseen by NeuStar Inc. ).
Before a telephone call is connected, the टेलीफोन क्रमांक must be dialed by the calling party or Caller.
The called party might have equipment that presents caller ID before the call is answered.
A collection agency is a business that pursues भुगतान of debts owed by individuals or businesses.
Most collection agencies operate as agents of creditors and collect debts for a fee or percentage of the total amount owed.
There are many types of collection agencies.
First-party agencies are oftentimes subsidiaries of the असली company the debt is owed to.
Third-party agencies हैं separate companies contracted by a company to collect debts on their behalf for a fee.
कर्ज़ buyers purchase the debt at a percentage of its value, then attempt to collect it.
Each देश रै its own rules and regulations regarding them.

कैनबिस, also known as marijuana ( from the Mexican Spanish marihuana ), and by other names, is a preparation of the Cannabis plant intended for use as a psychoactive drug and as medicine.
Pharmacologically, the principal psychoactive constituent of cannabis is tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) ; it is one of 483 known compounds in the plant, including at least 84 other cannabinoids, such as cannabidiol ( CBD ), cannabinol ( CBN ), tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ).
and cannabigerol ( cbg ).

The वॉशिंगटन Redskins मताधिकार was originally founded in Boston, Massachusetts as the Boston Braves, named after the local baseball franchise.
The name was changed the following year to the Redskins.
In 1937, the franchise moved to Washington, d.c.
Of the 49 Redskins starting quarterbacks, two have been inducted into the प्रो Football हॉल of Fame : Sammy baugh and Sonny Jurgensen.

1st Special Forces Operational Detachment-Delta ( 1st SFOD-D ), popularly ज्ञात as Delta Force, is one of the United States ' four secretive tier-one counter-terrorism और Special Mission Units.
It was formerly सूचीबद्ध as the Combat Applications Group by the Department of Defense but has since been officially re-designated the Army Compartmented Elements ( ACE ).
While 1st SFOD-D is administratively supported by USASOC, it falls under the operational control of the Joint Special Operations Command.
Delta Force and इसके Navy counterpart, the Naval Special Warfare Development Group, are the United राज्य military 's primary counter-terrorism units.
Delta Force 's primary tasks हैं counter-terrorism, direct action, and national intervention operations, although it is an extremely versatile group capable of conducting many प्रकार of covert missions, including, but not limited to, hostage rescues and raids.
The Central Intelligence Agency 's highly secretive Special Activities Division ( SAD ) and more specifically its elite Special Operations Group ( sog ) often works with – and रंगरूटों – ऑपरेटर from Delta Force.
Alpha decay is one example type of radioactive decay, in which an परमाणु nucleus emits an alpha particle, and thereby transforms ( or 'decays ' ) into an अणु with a द्रव्यमान number 4 कम and atomic number 2 less.
Many other types of decays are possible.
Radioactive क्षय, also known as नाभिकीय decay or radioactivity, is the process by which a nucleus of an unstable atom loses energy by emitting particles of ionizing radiation.
A सामग्री that spontaneously emits this kind of radiation — which includes the emission of energetic अल्फा particles, beta particles, and gamma rays — is considered radioactive.
There are many different प्रकार of radioactive decay ( देखिए table below ).
A decay, or loss of energy, results when an atom with one प्रकार of nucleus, called the parent radionuclide, transforms to an atom साथ a nucleus in a different state, or to a अलग nucleus containing different numbers of protons and neutrons.
Either of these products is named the daughter nuclide.
In some decays the parent and daughter are different chemical elements, और thus the decay process results in nuclear transmutation ( creation of an atom of a new element ).
The first decay processes to be discovered यहूद alpha decay, beta decay, and gamma decay.
Alpha decay occurs when the nucleus ejects an alpha particle ( helium nucleus ).
This is the most common process of emitting nucleons, but in rarer types of decays, nuclei can eject protons, or specific nuclei of other तत्व ( in the process called क्लस्टर decay ).
Beta decay occurs when the nucleus emits an electron or positron and a type of न्यूट्रिनो, in a process कि changes a proton to a neutron or the other way around.
The nucleus may कैप्चर an orbiting electron, converting a proton into a neutron ( electron capture ).
All of these processes result in nuclear transmutation.
By contrast, there exist radioactive decay processes that do not result in transmutation.
The energy of an excited केंद्रक may be emitted as a gamma रे in gamma decay, or used to eject an कक्षीय electron by interaction with the excited nucleus in a process called internal conversion.
Radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons, and this results in a change in an element from one isotope to another.
One type of radioactive decay results in products which हैं नहीं defined, but appear in a range of `` टुकड़े '' of the original nucleus.
This decay is called spontaneous fission.
This decay happens when a large unstable nucleus spontaneously splits into two ( and occasionally three ) smaller बेटी nuclei, and usually emits gamma rays, neutrons, or other particles as a consequence.
Radioactive decay is a stochastic ( i.e., random ) process at the level of single atoms, in that, according to quantum theory, it is impossible to predict when a particular atom will decay.
However, the chance that a given atom will क्षय is constant over time.
For a विशाल क्रमांक of atoms, the decay rate for the collection is computable from the measured decay constants of the nuclides ( or equivalently from the half-lifes ).
Waxing is a form of semi-permanent hair removal which removes the hair from the root.
New hair will not grow back in the previously waxed area लिये two to eight weeks, although some people will start to देखिए regrowth in only a सप्ताह.
Almost any area of the body can be waxed, including eyebrows, face, bikini क्षेत्रफल, legs, arms, back, उदर and feet.
There are many types of waxing suitable for removing अनावश्यक hair.
Strip waxing is accomplished by spreading a wax thinly over the skin.
A cloth or paper strip is then pressed on the top and ripped off the direction of hair growth.
This removes the मोम along with the hair.
Strip wax can भी be made at home using lemon juice, water, sugar और मधु.
Hot waxing utilizes Hot wax ( as opposed to strip wax ).
In this case, the wax is applied somewhat thickly and with no cloth or paper strips.
the wax then hardens when it cools, यूँ allowing the easy removal by a therapist without the aid of cloths.
This waxing method is very beneficial to people who have sensitive स्किन.

प्राचीन Roman culture existed throughout the almost 1200-year history of the civilization of Ancient Rome.
The term refers to the culture of the Roman Republic, later the रोमन Empire, which, at its peak, covered an क्षेत्रफल from lowland स्कॉटलैंड and Morocco to the Euphrates.
Life in प्राचीन Rome revolved around the city of रोम, its famed seven hills, और its monumental structures such as the Flavian Amphitheatre ( अभी पुकारा the Colosseum ), the Forum of Trajan, और the Pantheon.
The city also had several theaters, gymnasiums, and many taverns, baths, and brothels.
Throughout the territory under प्राचीन Rome 's control, residential architecture ranged from very modest houses to country villas, and in the capital city of Rome, there were imperial residences on the सुरुचिपूर्ण Palatine Hill, from which the word palace is derived.
The vast majority of the population lived in the city center, packed into insulae ( अपार्टमेंट blocks ).
The city of Rome was the largest megalopolis of that time, with a population that may well have exceeded one million people, साथ a high end estimate of 3.6 million and a low end estimate of 450,000.
Historical estimates indicate that around 30 percent of the population under the नगर 's jurisdiction lived in innumerable urban centers, with जनसांख्यिकी of at least 10,000 and several military settlements, a बहुत high rate of urbanization by pre-industrial standards.
The most urbanized part of the Empire was Italy, which था an estimated rate of urbanization of 32 %, the same rate of urbanization of England in 1800.
Most रोमन towns and cities had a forum, temples and the same type of buildings, on a छोटी scale, as found in Rome.
The large urban population required an endless supply of food which was a जटिल logistical task, including acquiring, transporting, storing और distribution of food for Rome and other urban centers.
Italian farms supplied vegetables and फल, but fish और meat were luxuries.
Aqueducts were built to bring water to urban centers and wine and oil were imported from Hispania, Gaul and Africa.
There was a बहुत large amount of commerce between the provinces of the रोमन Empire, चूंकि its transportation technology was बहुत efficient.
The average costs of transport and the technology were comparable with 18th-century Europe.
The later नगर of Rome did not fill the space within its ancient Aurelian walls until after 1870.
Eighty प्रतिशत of the population under the jurisdiction of ancient Rome lived in the countryside in settlements with less than 10 thousand inhabitants.
Landlords generally resided in cities and their estates were left in the care of farm managers.
The plight of ग्रामीण slaves थी generally worse than their counterparts working in urban aristocratic households.
To stimulate a higher labor productivity most जमींदार freed a large number of स्लेव and अनेक received मजदूरी.
Some records indicate that `` as many as 42 people lived in एक small फार्म हट in Egypt, while six families owned a single olive tree. ''.
Such a rural environment continued to induce migration of population to urban centers until the early 2nd century, when the urban population stopped growing and started to decline.
Starting in the middle of the 2nd century BC, private Greek culture was increasingly in ascendancy, in spite of tirades against the `` softening '' effects of Hellenized संस्कृति इससे the रूढ़िवादी moralists.
By the time of Augustus, संस्कारी Greek household slaves taught the Roman young ( sometimes भी the लड़कियों ) ; chefs, decorators, secretaries, doctors, and hairdressers—all came from the Greek East.
यूनानी sculptures adorned Hellenistic landscape gardening on the Palatine or in the villas, or were imitated in Roman sculpture yards by यूनानी slaves.
The Roman cuisine preserved in the cookery books ascribed to Apicius is essentially Greek.
Roman writers disdained Latin for a cultured Greek style.
Only in law and governance was the Italic nature of Rome 's accretive संस्कृति supreme.
Against this human background, both the urban and rural setting, one of history 's most influential सभ्यताओं took shape, leaving behind a सांस्कृतिक legacy that survives in part today.
जेम्स Joseph `` Duffy '' Waldorf, Jr. ( born August 20, 1962 ) is an American professional मनःस्थिति.

a Soviet mayonnaise jar
A modern `` French kilner '' jar
Glass production involves दो main methods – the फ्लैश glass process, which produces sheet glass, and glassblowing which produces bottles and अन्य containers.
A season is a subdivision of the year, marked by changes in weather, ecology, and hours of daylight.
Seasons result from the yearly revolution of the धरती around the Sun and the tilt of the धरती 's अक्ष relative to the plane of revolution.
In temperate and polar regions, the seasons are marked by changes in the intensity of sunlight that पहुँच the Earth 's surface, विसंगतियाँ of which may cause पशु to go into hibernation or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During may, June and July, the northern hemisphere is exposed to more direct sunlight because the गोलार्ध faces the sun.
the same is true of the southern hemisphere in November, December and जनवरी.
It is the झुकाव of the Earth that causes the सूर्य to be higher in the sky during the summer months which increases the solar flux.
However, due to seasonal lag, June, July and August are the hottest months in the northern hemisphere and December, January and February are the hottest months in the southern hemisphere.
In शीतोष्ण and subpolar regions, generally four calendar -आधारd seasons ( with their adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly use a six season model for temperate जलवायु regions that includes pre-spring ( prevernal ) और late summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along साथ the traditional four.
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet, or monsoon ) season and the dry season, and in some tropical areas, a cool or mild season.
In some parts of the world, special `` सीज़न '' are loosely defined based on important events such as a hurricane season, tornado season or a wildfire season.
The six ecological seasons
The four calendar seasons, चित्रित in an ancient Roman mosaic from Tunisia
The Battle of Fort Sumter ( April 12–14, 1861 ) was the bombardment and surrender of Fort Sumter, near Charleston, South Carolina, that started the American Civil War.
Following declarations of secession by seven दक्षिणी राज्य, दक्षिण कैरोलिना demanded that the U.S. Army abandon its facilities in Charleston Harbor.
On December 26, 1860, U.S. Major Robert Anderson surreptitiously moved his small command from the indefensible फोर्ट Moultrie on Sullivan 's Island to Fort Sumter, a substantial fortress controlling the प्रवेश of Charleston हार्बर.
An attempt by U.S. President James Buchanan to reinforce and resupply Anderson, using the unarmed merchant ship Star of the West, failed when it was fired upon by shore batteries on January 9, 1861.
South Carolina authorities then seized all Federal property in the Charleston area, except for Fort sumter.
During the जल्दी months of 1861, the situation around Fort Sumter increasingly began to resemble a siege.
In March, Brig. Gen. P. G. T. beauregard, the पहला सामान्य अधिकारी of the newly formed Confederate States of America, was placed in command of Confederate शक्तियां in Charleston.
beauregard energetically directed the strengthening of batteries around Charleston harbor aimed at Fort Sumter.
Conditions in the fort grew dire as the Union soldiers rushed to complete the installation of additional बंदूकों.
Anderson was short of men, food, and supplies.
The resupply of Fort Sumter became the first crisis of the administration of President Abraham Lincoln.
He notified the Governor of South Carolina, Francis W. Pickens, कि he was sending supply ships, which resulted in an ultimatum from the Confederate सरकारी : evacuate Fort Sumter immediately.
प्रमुख Anderson refused to surrender.
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on April 12, the Confederates bombarded the fort from artillery batteries surrounding the harbor.
Although the Union garrison returned fire, they were significantly outgunned and, after 34 hours, Major Anderson agreed to evacuate.
There was no loss of life on either पक्ष as a direct result of this engagement, हालांकि a gun explosion during the surrender ceremonies on April 14 caused two Union deaths.
Following the battle, there was widespread support from both North और South for further military action.
Lincoln 's तात्कालिक call for 75,000 volunteers to suppress the rebellion resulted in an additional four southern slave states also declaring their secession और joining the Confederacy.
the Civil War था begun.
3G, short for third Generation, is the तीसरा generation of मोबाईल telecommunications technology.
3G telecommunication networks support services that provide an information transfer rate of at least 200 kbit/s.
However, many services advertised as 3G provide higher speed than the minimum technical requirements for a 3G service.
Recent 3G releases, often denoted 3.5G and 3.75G, also provide mobile broadband access of several Mbit/s to स्मार्टफ़ोन and mobile modems in laptop computers.
3G finds application in wireless आवाज़ telephony, mobile Internet access, fixed wireless Internet access, video calls and mobile TV.
`` Mazel Tov ! '' written on a wine glass tag
Traditionally, after the groom breaks the glass, the guests shout `` Mazel Tov ! ``.
A जन्मदिवस cake, iced with the words `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov ), as is often done in Israel.
Here the phrase is written in Hebrew cursive.
`` Mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( यहूदी / Yiddish : `` מזל טוב '', Hebrew : `` mazal tov '' ; Yiddish : `` mazel tov '' ; lit.
`` good luck '' ) is a phrase प्रयुक्त to express congratulations for a happy and significant अवसर or इवेंट.
hepatitis C is an infectious disease affecting primarily the liver, caused by the hepatitis C virus ( HCV ).
The infection is often asymptomatic, but chronic infection can lead to scarring of the liver and ultimately to cirrhosis, which is generally apparent after many years.
In some cases, those with cirrhosis will go on to develop liver failure, liver cancer or life-threatening esophageal and gastric varices.
hcv is spread primarily by blood-to-blood contact associated with intravenous drug use, poorly sterilized medical equipment and transfusions.
An estimated 130–200 million people worldwide are infected with.
The अस्तित्व of ( originally `` non- A non- B hepatitis '' ) was postulated in the 1970s and proven in 1989.
only infects humans and chimpanzees.
The virus persists in the liver in about 85 % of those infected.
This persistent infection can be treated with medication : the standard therapy is a संयोजन of peginterferon and ribavirin, with either boceprevir or telaprevir added in some cases.
Overall, 50–80 % of लोगों treated हैं cured.
Those who develop cirrhosis or liver cancer may require a liver प्रत्यारोपण.
is the leading cause of liver transplantation, though the virus usually recurs बाद transplantation.
No vaccine against is available.
A flexible spending account ( FSA ), also known as a flexible spending arrangement, is one of a क्रमांक of tax-advantaged financial accounts that can be set up through a cafeteria plan of an employer in the United States.
An FSA allows an employee to set aside a portion of आय to pay for qualified खर्च as established in the cafeteria योजना, most commonly for medical expenses but often for dependent care or other expenses.
Money deducted from an कर्मचारी 's pay into an FSA is नहीं subject to payroll taxes, resulting in substantial payroll कर बचत.
One significant disadvantage to using an FSA is that funds not प्रयुक्त by the समाप्त of the plan year are खोया to the employee, known as the `` use it or lose it '' rule.
The most common type of लचीली बिता account, the medical expense fsa ( also medical FSA or health FSA ), is similar to a health savings account ( hsa ) or a health reimbursement account ( HRA ).
However, while HSAs and HRAs are almost exclusively used as components of a consumer driven health care plan, medical FSAs are commonly offered साथ अधिक traditional health plans as well.
in जोड, funds in a health savings account are not lost when the plan year is over, unlike funds in an FSA.
Paper forms or an FSA debit कार्ड, भी known as a flexcard, may be used to access the खाता funds.
Tennessee ( ) ( ) is a U.S. state स्तिथ in the Southeastern United राज्य.
Tennessee is the 36th most extensive and the 17th most populous of the 50 United States.
Tennessee is bordered by Kentucky और वर्जिनिया to the north, North Carolina to the east, Georgia, Alabama, and Mississippi to the south, and Arkansas and Missouri to the west.
The Appalachian Mountains dominate the पूर्वी part of the state, and the Mississippi River forms the state 's western border.
Tennessee 's capital और second largest city is Nashville, which has a population of 609,644.
Memphis is the state 's largest city, with a population of 652,050.
The state of Tennessee is rooted in the Watauga Association, a 1772 frontier pact generally regarded as the पहला constitutional government west of the Appalachians.
What is now Tennessee was initially part of North Carolina, and later भाग of the Southwest Territory.
Tennessee was admitted to the संघ as the 16th state on June 1, 1796.
Tennessee was the last state to leave the Union and join the Confederacy at the outbreak of the U.S. Civil युद्ध in 1861, and the first state to be readmitted to the संघ at the end of the war.
Tennessee furnished more soldiers for the Confederate Army than any other state, and more soldiers for the Union Army than any other Southern state.
In the 20th century, Tennessee transitioned from an agrarian economy to a more diversified economy, aided at times by संघीय entities such as the Tennessee Valley Authority.
In the early 1940s, the नगर of ओक Ridge was established to house the मैनहटन Project 's uranium enrichment facilities, helping to build the world 's first atomic bomb.
Tennessee has played a critical role in the विकास of many forms of American popular music, including चट्टान and roll, blues, country, and rockabilly.
Beale Street in Memphis is considered by many to be the जन्मस्थान of the blues, with संगीतकारों such as W.C. सुलभ performing in its clubs as early as 1909.
Memphis was also home to सूर्य Records, where musicians such as एल्विस Presley, Isaac हेज़, Johnny Cash, Carl Perkins, Jerry Lee Lewis, Roy Orbison, और Charlie Rich began उनके recording careers, and where rock and roll took shape in the 1950s.
The 1927 Victor recording sessions in Bristol generally mark the beginning of the country music genre and the rise of the Grand ओले Opry in the 1930s helped make Nashville the center of the country music recording industry.
Three ईंटें and mortar museums recognize Tennessee 's role in nurturing various forms of popular music : the Memphis Rock N ' Soul Museum, the Country Music Hall of Fame और Museum in Nashville, and the International Rock-A-Billy Museum in Jackson.
In addition, the Rockabilly Hall of Fame, an online site recognizing the development of rockabilly in जिससे टेनेसी played a crucial role, is based in Nashville.
Tennessee 's major उद्योग include कृषि, manufacturing, and tourism.
Poultry, soybeans, and cattle are the state 's primary agricultural products, and major manufacturing निर्यात include chemicals, परिवहन उपकरण, and electrical equipment.
The Great smoky kyu National Park, the nation 's most visited national पार्क, is headquartered in the eastern part of the राज्य, and a section of the Appalachian Trail roughly follows the Tennessee-North Carolina border.
Other major tourist attractions शामिल the Tennessee Aquarium in Chattanooga, the Sunsphere in Knoxville, Dollywood in Pigeon Forge, the Parthenon, the Country Music Hall of Fame and संग्रहालय, and Ryman Auditorium in Nashville, and Elvis Presley 's Graceland निवास and tomb in Memphis.
One design variant of a cock ring.
a cock ring is a रिंग that can be placed around a man 's penis, usually at the base, primarily to slow the flow of blood from the erect penile tissue, thus maintaining an erection for a much longer period of time.
Cock rings can be worn around just the penis or both the penis and scrotum, or just the scrotum alone, हालांकि this is usually called a testicle cuff.
Rings can be made of a variety of अलग materials, most commonly leather, rubber, or silicone, though nylon and metal are also used either as the main component or part of the closure.
The term cock ring is sometimes used as a synonym for a Prince Albert piercing, a piercing of the penis that is usually, though नहीं always, a metal ring.
When used in cases of erectile dysfunction they are known by various names such as `` erection ring '' and `` टेंशन ring ''.
The headquarters of Major League Baseball at 245 Park Avenue, Midtown Manhattan, New York नगर, USA.
Major League Baseball ( MLB ) is a professional baseball लीग, consisting of teams कि play in the National लीग and the American लीग.
Dating to 1876 and 1901 respectively, the दो leagues merged in 2000 into a single organization led by the Commissioner of Baseball, after 100 years as separate legal entities.
MLB constitutes one of the major professional खेल leagues of the संयुक्त States and Canada.
It is composed of 30 teams — 29 in the संयुक्त States and one in Canada.
Teams in MLB play 162 खेल each season over six months ( April through September ).
Five टीमों in each league advance to a four-round postseason tournament that culminates in the World Series, a best-of-seven-games championship series between the two league champions जिससे dates to 1903.
The organization oversees many minor-league baseball leagues which operate about 240 teams affiliated with the major-league clubs.
With the International Baseball Federation, the league also manages the international World Baseball Classic tournament.
MLB has the highest season attendance of any sports league in the world with nearly 75 million spectators in 2012.
Delaware ( ) is a U.S. state located on the Atlantic Coast in the Mid-Atlantic region of the United States.
It is bordered to the south and west by Maryland, to the northeast by New जर्सी, and to the उत्तर by Pennsylvania.
the state takes its name इससे Thomas वेस्ट, 3rd Baron De La Warr, an English nobleman and Virginia 's first colonial governor, after whom what is now called Cape Henlopen was originally named.
Delaware is located in the northeastern portion of the Delmarva Peninsula and is the second smallest, the sixth least populous, but the छठे most densely आबादी of the fifty संयुक्त States.
Delaware is divided into three counties.
From north to south, these तीन counties are New Castle, Kent, and Sussex.
While the southern दो counties have historically been predominantly agricultural, New Castle County has been more industrialized.
Before इसके coastline was explored by Europeans in the 16th century, Delaware was inhabited by अनेक groups of Native Americans, including the Lenape in the north and Nanticoke in the south.
It was initially colonized by डच traders at Zwaanendael, स्तिथ near the present कस्बा of Lewes, in 1631.
Delaware was one of the 13 colonies participating in the American Revolution and on December 7, 1787, became the first state to ratify the Constitution of the United राज्य, thereby becoming known as The First State.
Energy Transformation in Energy Systems Language
Energy transformation or energy conversion is the process of changing one form of energy to another.
In physics, the term energy describes the capacity to produce certain changes within a system, without regard to limitations in transformation imposed by Entropy.
Changes in total उर्जा of systems can only be accomplished by adding or subtracting energy इससे them, as energy is a मात्रा which is conserved, according to the first law of thermodynamics.
According to special आपेक्षिकता, परिवर्तन in the energy of systems will also coincide with changes in the system 's द्रव्यमान, and the total amount of mass of a प्रणाली is a माप of its energy.
Energy in a system may be transformed so that it resides in a different state, or a different प्रकार of energy.
उर्जा in many states may be used to do many varieties of physical work.
Energy may be used in natural processes or मशीने, or else to provide some service to society ( such as heat, light, or गति ).
For example, an internal combustion engine converts the potential chemical energy in gasoline and oxygen into heat, which is then रूपांतरित into the propulsive energy ( kinetic energy that moves a vehicle ).
A solar cell converts solar radiation into विद्युत energy that can then be प्रयुक्त to light a bulb or power a computer.
the generic name for a device which converts energy from one form to another, is a transducer.
In general, most types of energy, save for thermal energy, may be converted efficiently to any other kind of energy.
Sometimes this occurs with an efficiency of essentially 100 %, such as when potential energy is converted to गतिज energy as an object falls in vacuum, or when it orbits nearer or farther from another object, in स्पेस.
Conversion of other types of energies to heat may also occurs with nearly perfect efficiency ( many types of friction do this ).
Exceptions for perfect conversion efficiency ( even for isolated systems ) occur when energy has already महरूम partly वितरित among अनेक available quantum states for a collection of particles, which are freely allowed to explore any राज्य of momentum and position ( phase space ).
In such circumstances, a measure called Entropy, or evening-out of energy distribution in such states, dictates that future states of the प्रणाली must be of at least equal evenness in energy distribution.
( There is no way, taking the universe as a whole, to collect energy into fewer states, once it has spread to them ).
A consequence of this requirement is that there are limitations to the efficiency साथ which thermal energy can be converted to other kinds of energy, चूंकि thermal energy in equilibrium at a given temperature already represents the maximal evening-out of energy between all possible states.
Such उर्जा is sometimes considered `` degraded उर्जा, '' because it is not entirely usable.
The second law of thermodynamics is a way of stating that, for this कारण, thermal energy in a system may be converted to other kinds of energy with efficiencies approaching 100 %, only if the entropy ( even-ness or disorder ) of the universe is increased by other means, to compensate for the decrease in entropy associated with the disappearance of the thermal उर्जा and its entropy content.
Otherwise, only a part of thermal energy may be converted to other kinds of energy ( and thus, useful कार्य ), since the remainder of the ऊष्मा must be reserved to be transferred to a थर्मल reservoir at a lower temperature, in such a way that the increase in Entropy for this process more than compensates for the एन्ट्रॉपी decrease संबद्ध with transformation of the rest of the heat into अन्य types of energy.
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' जिससे operates a major professional ice hockey league of 30 franchised member clubs, of which seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States.
Headquartered in नई York नगर, the NHL is widely considered to be the premier professional ice hockey league in the world, and one of the major professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada.
the स्टेनली कप, the oldest professional खेल trophy in North अमेरिका, is awarded annually to the league playoff champion at the end of each season.
The league was organized on November 26, 1917, in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, after the suspension of operations of its predecessor organization, the National Hockey Association ( नह ), which had been संस्थापित in 1909.
It started with four teams and, through a series of expansions, contractions, and relocations, the league is now composed of 30 active franchises.
The nation to which the name of the लीग originally referred was Canada, although the league has अभी been binational since 1924 when it expanded into the United States.
बाद a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 ऋतु, the league resumed play अंतर्गत a new collective bargaining agreement that included a salary cap.
In 2009, the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of sponsorships, attendance, and television audiences.
The NHL draws many अत्यधिक skilled players from all over the world and currently has players from about 20 different countries.
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the NHL, over the past four plus decades the percentages of US and European players have increased both because of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled European players.
This is the complete list of the ratified and unratified amendments to the United States Constitution which प्राप्त the approval of the United States Congress.
twenty-seven amendments have been ratified since the original signing of the Constitution, the first टेन of which are known collectively as the विधेयक of Rights.
The कार्यविधि for amending the United States Constitution is governed by Article V of the original टेक्स्ट.
There have been अनेक other proposals for amendments to the United States Constitution introduced in Congress, but not submitted to the states.
पहले an amendment can take effect, it must be proposed to the states by a two-thirds vote of both houses of Congress or by a convention ( known as an Article V सम्मेलन ) called by two-thirds of the states, and ratified by three-fourths of the states or by three-fourths of conventions thereof, the method of ratification being determined by Congress at the time of proposal.
To date, no सम्मेलन for proposing amendments has been called by the states, and only once—in 1933 for the ratification of the twenty-first amendment —has the convention विधि of ratification been employed.
FMR LLC ( Fidelity Management and Research ) or Fidelity Investments is an American multinational financial सेवाएं corporation.
It is one of the largest mutual fund and financial services groups in the world.
It was founded in 1946 and serves North American investors.
Fidelity Ventures is its venture पूंजी arm.
Fidelity International Limited ( FIL ), was an international affiliate founded in 1969, सेवारत most countries in the rest of the world.
In September 2011, FIL was rebranded as 'Fidelity Worldwide Investment '.
वफ़ादारी निवेश manages a large family of mutual निधि, provides fund वितरण and investment advice services, as well as providing discount brokerage सेवाएं, रिटायरमेंट सेवाएं, माल management, securities execution and clearance, life बीमे and a number of other services.

Sociology is the scientific study of human society and its origins, development, संगठन, और institutions.
It is a social विज्ञान which uses various विधि of empirical investigation and critical analysis to develop a देह of knowledge about human social activity, structures, and functions.
A लक्ष्य for many sociologists is to conduct शोध which may be applied directly to social policy and welfare, while others focus primarily on refining the theoretical understanding of social processes.
विषय matter ranges from the micro level of individual agency and interaction to the macro level of systems and the social structure.
The परंपरागत focuses of sociology include social स्तरीकरण, social class, culture, रेस and ethnicity, gender and sexuality, social गतिशीलता, religion, secularization, law, and deviance.
As all spheres of इंसान activity are affected by the interplay between social structure and individual agency, sociology has gradually विस्तारित its focus to further subjects, such as स्वास्थ्य, medical, military and penal institutions, the Internet, environmental sociology, political economy and the role of social activity in the development of scientific knowledge.
The range of social scientific methods has also expanded.
सोशल researchers draw upon a variety of qualitative and quantitative techniques.
the linguistic and cultural turns of the mid-twentieth century led to increasingly interpretative, hermeneutic, और philosophic approaches to the analysis of society.
Conversely, recent decades have seen the rise of new analytically, mathematically and computationally rigorous techniques, such as agent-based modelling and सोशल network analysis.
Sociology चाहिए not be confused with various general social studies courses which bear छोटी relation to sociological theory or social science research methodology.
Thunder is the sound caused by lightning.
depending on the प्रकृति of the lightning and distance of the listener, थंडर can range from a sharp, loud crack to a long, low rumble ( brontide ).
The अचानक increase in pressure and temperature from lightning produces rapid expansion of the air surrounding और within a bolt of lightning.
In turn, इस expansion of air creates a sonic shock wave, similar to a sonic boom, which produces the sound of thunder, often referred to as a clap, crack, or peal of thunder.
The distance of the lightning can be calculated by the listener based on the time interval from when the lightning is seen to when the ध्वनि is heard.
Palma (,, ), in full पालमा de Mallorca, is the major city and port on the island of Majorca ( Mallorca ) and capital city of the autonomous community of the Balearic Islands in Spain.
The names Ciutat de Mallorca ( City of Majorca ) and ciutat ( City ) were used before the War of the Spanish उत्तराधिकार और are स्टिल used by people in Majorca.
However, the official name was Mallorca, the same as the island.
It is situated on the south coast of the island on the Bay of Palma.
as of the 2009 census, the population of the city of Palma proper was 401,270, and the population of the entire urban area was 517,285, ranking as the twelfth largest urban area of Spain.
Almost half of the total जनसांख्यिकी of majorca live in Palma.
The Cabrera Archipelago, हालांकि widely separated from Palma proper, is administratively considered part of the municipality.
Its airport, Son सन्त Joan, serves over 22 million passengers each year.
The Marivent Palace was offered by the नगर to the then Prince Juan Carlos I of Spain.
The royals have since spent their गर्मियाँ holidays in Palma.
Luthor redirects here.
For other uses, see Luther ( disambiguation ).
Alexander Joseph `` लेक्स '' Luthor is a fictional अक्षर, a supervillain appearing in comic books प्रकाशित by DC Comics.
luthor is the archenemy of Superman, and as a high-status supervillain, has also come into conflict with Batman and other superheroes in the DC Universe.
Created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster, the character first appeared in कार्रवाई कॉमिक्स # 23 ( April 1940 ).
Luthor is described as `` a power-mad, evil scientist '' of high intelligence and incredible technological prowess.
Luthor 's goals typically center on killing Superman, the foremost obstacle to achieving the villain 's megalomaniacal goals.
Despite periodically wearing a powered exoskeleton, Luthor has traditionally lacked superpowers or a dual identity.
The character was originally depicted as a mad scientist who, in the vein of pulp novels, wreaks havoc on the world with his futuristic weaponry.
In his earliest appearances, luthor is shown with a full head of red hair.
despite this, the character later became hairless as the result of an artist 's mistake.
A 1960 story by Jerry Siegel expanded upon Luthor 's origin and motivations, revealing him to be a childhood friend of Superman 's जो lost his hair when a आग destroyed his laboratory ; Luthor vowed revenge.
Following the 1985 limited श्रेणी Crisis on Infinite Earths, the character was re-imagined as a Machiavellian उद्योगपति and white-collar criminal, even briefly serving as President of the United States.
in recent years, various writers have revived Luthor 's mad scientist persona from the 1940s.
The character was ranked as the 8th Greatest विलेन by Wizard on its 100 Greatest Villains of सब Time list.
IGN 's list of the Top 100 Comic किताब Villains of All Time ranked Luthor as # 4.
luthor is also described as a `` megavillain '' by comic किताब critic Peter Sanderson, one of a few genre-crossing villains whose adventures take place `` in a world in which the ordinary laws of nature हैं slightly suspended '' ; characters such as Professor Moriarty, Count Dracula, Hannibal Lecter, Doctor Doom, and Darth Vader, also fit इस description.
Martin Luther King, Jr. Day is a संयुक्त States federal holiday अंकन the birthday of Rev. Dr. Martin लूथर King, Jr.
It is observed on the तीसरा Monday of जनवरी प्रत्येक year, which is around the time of King 's birthday, January 15.
The floating holiday is समान to holidays set under the Uniform Monday Holiday Act, though the act predated the establishment of Martin Luther King, jr. Day by 15 years.
King थी the chief spokesman for nonviolent activism in the civil rights movement, which successfully protested racial discrimination in संघीय and state law.
The campaign for a federal holiday in किंग 's honor began soon after his assassination in 1968.
Ronald reagan signed the holiday into law in 1983, and it was पहला observed on जनवरी 20, 1986.
At first, some states resisted observing the holiday as such, giving it वैकल्पिक names or combining it with other holidays.
It was officially observed in all 50 states for the first time in 2000.
The कैमरा phone समाधान allows instant sharing of pictures.
As it 's automatic and instant, the user does not have to use a cable or removable media to connect to a personal computer.
A camera phone is a मोबाईल phone which is able to capture still photographs ( and प्रायः video ).
Since early in the 21st century the majority of mobile phones in use are camera phones.
Most camera phones are simpler than separate डिजिटल cameras.
Their usual fixed focus lenses और smaller sensors limit उनके performance in poor lighting.
Lacking a physical shutter, most have a long shutter lag.
Flash, जहाँ उपस्थित, is usually weak.
Optical zoom and तिपाई screws are rare.
Some also lack a USB connection, removable memory कार्ड, or other way of transferring their pictures more quickly than by the phone 's inherent communication feature.
Some of the अधिक expensive camera phones have only a few of these technical disadvantages, which लागू सबसे acutely in low light शर्तें and in any case have नहीं inhibited their widespread use.
Most model lines improve in these regards every साल or two.
Some, such as the Droid Incredible only have a menu choice to start an application program to activate the camera.
Others, such as the BlackBerry Storm 2, Droid X, Motorola V980 and Nokia 5800 also have a separate camera बटन for quickness and convenience.
Windows Phones can be configured to operate as a कैमरा even if the phone is asleep.
Some कैमरा phones are designed to resemble separate low-end डिजिटल compact cameras in appearance and to some extent in features and picture quality, and are branded as both mobile phones and कैमरे, including certain सोनी phones.
The principal advantages of camera phones are cost and compactness ; बेशक for a user who carries a mobile phone वैसे, the अतिरिक्त size and cost हैं negligible.
Smartphones that are camera phones may run mobile applications to add capabilities such as geotagging and image stitching.
A few high end फोन can use their touch screen to direct their camera to focus on a particular object in the field of view, giving even an inexperienced user a degree of focus control exceeded only by seasoned photographers using manual focus.
`` Whatever Happened to the Man of Tomorrow ? '' is a 1986 comic book story featuring the DC Comics character of सुपरमैन.
Written by Alan Moore with help from long-time, और soon to be retiring, Superman एडिटर, जूलियस Schwartz, the story was published in two parts, beginning in Superman # 423 and ending in Action कॉमिक्स # 583, both published in सितंबर 1986.
The story was drawn by long-time artist Curt swan, in his final major contribution to the सुपरमैन titles, और was inked by George Pérez in the issue of Superman and Kurt Schaffenberger in the issue of कार्रवाई Comics.
The story was an imaginary tale which told the फाइनल story of the Silver Age सुपरमैन and his long history, which was being rebooted following the events of Crisis on Infinite Earths, before his modern introduction in the John byrne series, The Man of Steel.
Moore wanted his plot to honor the long history of the अक्षर and to serve as a पूरा conclusion to his mythology.
The story is a frame story set ten years after Superman was last seen, where Lois Lane recounts the tale of the end of Superman 's career to a reporter from the रोज़ Planet.
Her story includes numerous violent attacks against Superman by his enemies, the public revelation of his secret identity of Clark Kent और a number of deaths of those closest to him.
The story has महरूम cited as one of the best stories of the character of Superman, and critics and audiences frequently choose it as one of the सबसे memorable comics ever published.
it is प्रयुक्त as an उदाहरण of कैसा to close the long-time निरंतरता of a comic book character.
the story 's legacy has endured with similar stories लिखा as tributes to it.
The title is a reference to one of the nicknames of Superman as the Man of Tomorrow, and was used in the title of another Superman.
The bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined ग्रैंड touring car, designed and developed by the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim, France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S.
The सुपर Sport version of the Veyron is the fastest street-legal production car in the world, with a top speed of.
the original version रै a top speed of.
it थी नामित Car of the Decade ( 2000–2009 ) by the BBC television programme Top Gear.

The संस्था of the Eucharist has been a key theme in the depictions of the Last Supper in Christian art, as in this 16th-century Juan de Juanes painting.
`` At the Last Supper, on the night he was betrayed, our Savior instituted the eucharistic sacrifice of his Body and Blood. ''
( catechism of the Catholic Church 1323 )
Eucharist in the Catholic Church refers to both the celebration of the Mass, that is, the Eucharist liturgy, and the bread and wine which बाद the consecration are transubstantiated ( changed in substance ) into the देह and blood of Jesus Christ, Lord and God, a declaration formulated by the Council of Trent with an anathema against anyone जो denied this.
Blessed sacrament is a devotional term used in the Roman कैथोलिक Church to refer to the Eucharistic प्रजाति ( the देह and Blood of Christ ).
