Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is an African-themed deluxe resort at the Walt Disney World Resort.
It opened on अप्रैल 16, 2001.
The resort is owned and operated by Walt डिज़्नी Parks and Resorts.
Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is located in the Animal किंगडम Resort Area, adjacent to Disney 's एनिमल Kingdom.
It gives guests the opportunity to view grazing wildlife outside their rooms and public areas in the resort within proximity of the animals, conveying the feeling of होने in an African savanna.
The People 's Party, also known as the `` populists '', was a short-lived राजनैतिक party in the United States established in 1891 during the Populist movement ( United States, 19th Century ).
it थी most important in 1892-96, and then rapidly धुंधली away.
Based among ग़रीब, white cotton farmers in the South ( especially North Carolina, Alabama, and Texas ) and hard-pressed wheat farmers in the plains states ( especially Kansas and Nebraska ), it represented a radical crusading form of agrarianism और hostility to banks, railroads, and elites generally.
It sometimes formed coalitions with labor unions, and in 1896 the Democrats endorsed their अध्यक्षीय nominee, William Jennings Bryan.
The terms `` populist '' and `` populism `` are commonly used for anti-elitist appeals in opposition to established interests and mainstream parties.
Linguistic map of Nigeria, Cameroon, and Benin.
Sign in English, outside the विश्वविद्यालयों of Lagos
There are hundreds of languages spoken in Nigeria.
The major languages are Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, Edo, Fulfulde, Kanuri, and ibb.
the official भाषा of Nigeria, English, the पूर्व colonial भाषा, was chosen to सुकर the cultural and linguistic unity of the country.
English, however, remains an exclusive preserve of the country 's urban elite, and is not widely spoken in rural areas, which comprise three quarters of the countries population.
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a whole, encompassing three major African languages families : Afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, and Niger–Congo.
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified languages, such as Cen Tuum, which may represent a relic of an even greater diversity prior to the spread of the current language families.
A series of events led to the attack on Pearl Harbor.
War between Japan and the United States had been a सम्भावना that each nation 's military forces planned for since the 1920s, हालांकि real टेंशन did नहीं begin until the 1931 invasion of Manchuria by Japan.
over the अगला decade, Japan expanded slowly into China, leading to all out war between the two in 1937.
In 1940 Japan invaded French Indochina in an प्रयत्न to embargo all imports into चीन, including युद्ध supplies खरीदा from the U.S.
This move prompted the संयुक्त States to embargo all आयल निर्यात, leading the Imperial Japanese Navy to estimate that it था less than two सालो of बंकर आयल remaining and to support the existing योजनाएँ to seize oil resources in the Dutch East Indies.
Planning had been underway for some time on an attack on the `` Southern Resource Area '' to add it to the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere that Japan envisioned in the Pacific.
The Philippine islands, at that time an American territory, were also a Japanese निशाना.
The Japanese military concluded that an invasion of the Philippines would provoke an American military response.
Rather than seize and fortify the islands, and wait for the inevitable us counterattack, Japan 's सैन्य leaders instead decided on the pre-emptive Pearl हार्बर attack, which they assumed would negate the American forces needed for the liberation and reconquest of the islands.
Planning for the attack had begun in very जल्दी 1941, by Admiral Isoroku Yamamoto.
He finally won assent from the Naval High Command by, among other things, threatening to resign.
The attack was approved in the summer at an Imperial Conference and again at a second Conference in the fall.
simultaneously over the year, pilots were trained, and ships prepared for its execution.
Authority लिये the attack was granted at the second इम्पीरियल Conference if a diplomatic result satisfactory to Japan was नहीं reached.
After final approval by सम्राट Hirohito the order to attack was issued at the beginning of December.
A common office stapler
A common school stapler
A stapler is a mechanical device that joins sheets of paper or similar material by ड्राइविंग a thin metal स्टेपल through the sheets and फोल्डिंग the ends.
Staplers are widely used in government, business, offices, homes and schools.
The word `` stapler '' can actually refer to a number of different devices of varying uses.
In जोड to joining paper sheets together, staplers can also be used in a surgical setting to join tissue together साथ surgical staples to close a surgical wound ( much in the same way as stitches or sutures ).
Typically, most staplers are प्रयुक्त to join multiple sheets of paper.
Paper staplers come in two distinct types : manual and electric.
Manual staplers are normally hand-held, although models that are used while set on a desk or other surface are not uncommon.
Electric staplers exist in a किस्में of different डिजाइन and models.
Their primary ऑपरेटिंग function is to join large numbers of paper sheets together in rapid succession.
Some electric staplers can join up to 20 sheets at a time.
Swallowing, known scientifically as deglutition, is the process in the human or animal body that makes something pass from the mouth, to the pharynx, and into the esophagus, जबकि shutting the epiglottis.
If this fails and the object goes through the trachea, then choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur.
In the human body it is controlled by the swallowing reflex.
Thaddeus Stevens ( अप्रैल 4, 1792 – August 11, 1868 ), of Pennsylvania, was a leader of the Radical Republican faction of the Republican Party and a fierce प्रतिद्वन्दी of slavery.
he was one of the most influential सदस्यों in the history of Congress.
as chairman of the powerful House तरीके and Means कमेटी, Stevens, a witty, sarcastic speaker and flamboyant party leader, dominated the House from 1861 until his death.
He wrote much of the financial विधान that सशुल्क for the American Civil War.
Stevens and Senator Charles Sumner were the prime नेताओ of the Radical Republicans दौरान the war and Reconstruction era.
Scholarly views of Stevens have swung sharply since his death as interpretations of Reconstruction have changed.
इतिहासकारों of the Dunning School ( 1890s–1940s ) आयोजित Stevens responsible for demanding harsh उपचार of the white South and violating अमरीकी परंपराओं of republicanism, depicting Stevens as a villain for his advocacy of harsh measures in the South such as disfranchising all ex-confederates.
This अत्यधिक negative characterization held sway into the 1950s.
The rise of the neo-abolitionist school in the 1950s led to a strong positive appreciation of Stevens ' work on सिविल rights for Freedmen.
A recent biographer characterizes उसे as, `` The Great Commoner, savior of free public शिक्षा in Pennsylvania, national Republican leader in the struggles against slavery in the United राज्य and intrepid mainstay of the attempt to secure racial justice लिये the Freedmen during Reconstruction, the तभी member of the House of Representatives ever to have महरूम known as the 'dictator ' of कॉंग्रेस. ''
Overview of the translation of eukaryotic मेसेंजर rna
Diagram showing the translation of mRNA and the synthesis of proteins by a ribosome
In molecular biology and genetics, translation is the process through which cellular ribosomes manufacture proteins.
It is part of the process of gene expression.
In translation, मेसेंजर RNA ( mRNA ) produced by transcription is decoded by the ribosome to produce a specific amino acid chain, or polypeptide, that will बाद fold into an active protein.
in bacteria, अनुवाद occurs in the cell 's cytoplasm, where the large and small subunits of the ribosome are located, और bind to the mRNA.
In eukaryotes, translation occurs across the membrane of the endoplasmic reticulum in a process called vectorial synthesis.
The ribosome facilitates डिकोडिंग by inducing the binding of tRNAs with complementary anticodon sequences to that of the mRNA.
The trnas carry specific amino acids that are chained together into a polypeptide as the mRNA passes through and is `` read '' by the ribosome in a fashion reminiscent to that of a stock ticker and ticker tape.
In many instances, the entire ribosome/mRNA complex binds to the outer membrane of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum and releases the nascent protein polypeptide inside लिये later vesicle transport and secretion outside of the cell.
Many types of transcribed RNA, such as transfer RNA, ribosomal RNA, and small नाभिकीय RNA, do not undergo translation into proteins.
Translation proceeds in four phases : initiation, elongation, translocation and termination ( all describing the growth of the amino acid chain, or polypeptide that is the उत्पाद of translation ).
Amino acids are brought to ribosomes and assembled into proteins.
In activation, the correct amino acid is covalently bonded to the correct transfer RNA ( tRNA ).
the अमीनो acid is joined by its carboxyl group to the 3 ' OH of the tRNA by an ester bond.
When the tRNA has an अमीनो acid linked to it, it is termed `` charged ''.
दीक्षा involves the small subunit of the ribosome binding to the 5 ' end of mRNA with the help of initiation factors ( IF ).
Termination of the polypeptide happens when the A site of the ribosome faces a stop codon ( UAA, UAG, or UGA ).
No trna can recognize or bind to this codon.
Instead, the stop codon induces the binding of a release factor प्रोटीन that prompts the disassembly of the entire ribosome/mRNA complex.
a number of antibiotics act by inhibiting translation ; these include anisomycin, cycloheximide, chloramphenicol, tetracycline, streptomycin, erythromycin, and puromycin, among others.
prokaryotic ribosomes have a different structure इससे that of eukaryotic ribosomes, और thus antibiotics can specifically target bacterial infections without any detriment to a eukaryotic host 's cells.
A multimedia message on a mobile phone.
Multimedia Messaging सेवा ( MMS ) is a मानक way to send messages that include मल्टीमीडिया content to and from mobile phones.
It extends the core SMS ( छोटी Message सेवा ) capability that अनुमत एक्सचेंज of text messages only up to 160 characters in लंबाई.
The most popular use is to send photographs from camera-equipped handsets, although it is also popular as a method of delivering news and entertainment content including videos, pictures, text pages and ringtones.
The standard is विकसित by the Open मोबाईल Alliance ( OMA ), although during development it was part of the 3gpp and WAP groups.
Smallpox was an infectious disease unique to humans, caused by either of two virus variants, Variola major and Variola minor.
The disease is also known by the Latin names Variola or Variola vera, derived from varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` pimple '' ).
The disease was originally known in English as the `` pox '' or `` red plague '' ; the term `` smallpox '' was first प्रयुक्त in Britain in the 15th century to distinguish variola इससे the `` great pox '' ( syphilis ).
The last naturally occurring case of smallpox ( variola minor ) was diagnosed on 26 October 1977.
Smallpox localized in small blood vessels of the skin and in the mouth and throat.
in the skin it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular rash and, later, raised fluid-filled blisters.
V. major produces a more serious disease and has an overall mortality rate of 30–35 %.
V. minor causes a milder form of disease ( also known as alastrim, cottonpox, milkpox, whitepox, and Cuban itch ) जिससे kills about 1 % of its victims.
long-term complications of V. major infection include characteristic scars, commonly on the face, which occur in 65–85 % of survivors.
Blindness resulting from corneal ulceration and scarring, and limb deformities due to arthritis and osteomyelitis are less common complications, seen in about 2–5 % of cases.
Smallpox is believed to have emerged in human populations about 10,000 BC.
The earliest शारीरिक evidence of it is probably the pustular rash on the mummified body of Pharaoh Ramses V of Egypt.
The disease killed an estimated 400,000 Europeans annually दौरान the closing years of the 18th सदी ( including five reigning monarchs ), and was responsible लिये a third of all blindness.
of all those infected, 20–60 % —and over 80 % of infected children—died from the disease.
Smallpox was responsible for an estimated 300–500 million मौतों during the 20th century.
As recently as 1967, the World Health Organization ( WHO ) estimated that 15 लाख people contracted the disease और that two million died in that year.
बाद टीकाकरण campaigns throughout the 19th and 20th centuries, the WHO certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979.
Smallpox is one of two infectious diseases to have been eradicated, the other होने rinderpest, which was declared eradicated in 2011.
`` I Want to Hold Your हाथ '' is a song by the English rock बैंड the Beatles.
Written by John Lennon and पॉल McCartney, and recorded in October 1963, it was the first Beatles record to be made using four-track equipment.
With advance orders exceeding one लाख copies in the United Kingdom, `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' would ordinarily have gone straight to the top of the British रिकार्ड charts on its day of release ( 29 November 1963 ) had it not been blocked by the group 's first million seller `` She Loves You ``, the Beatles ' previous UK सिंगल, which was having a resurgent spell in the top position following तीव्र media coverage of the group.
Taking two weeks to dislodge its predecessor, `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' stayed at number एक for five weeks and remained in the UK top fifty for twenty-one weeks in total.
It was भी the group 's first American number one, entering the Billboard Hot 100 chart on 18 January 1964 at number forty-five and starting the British invasion of the American music industry.
By 1 February it held the number one spot — for seven weeks — before being replaced by `` She loves You '', a reverse scenario of what था occurred in Britain, and remained in the US charts for a total of fifteen weeks.
`` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' became the Beatles ' best-selling single worldwide.
a gasser was a type of hot rod originating on the dragstrips of the United States in the late 1950s and continued until the जल्दी 1970s.
gassers were आधारित on उत्पादन models from the 1930s to mid-1960s, which have been stripped of extraneous weight and jacked up using a truck beam धुरी to provide better weight वितरण on acceleration ( Beam axles are also lighter than an independent front suspension ), though a raised stock front suspension is common as well.
Common weight reduction techniques include fiberglass body panels, stripped interiors और plexiglass windows ( sometimes color tinted ).
Because they were primarily built लिये रेसिंग, these cars typically had the engine swapped to a larger or more powerful one, the मौजूदा stock इंजन modified ( often heavily ) or both.
It थी very common to fit a जड़ें supercharger and mechanical fuel injection, such as one from Algon, Hilborn, or crower.
With form being dictated by function, their रूप is often very top भारी and ungainly, largely due to front ends being raised उच्चतर than stock, to assist in the weight ट्रांसफ़र during rapid acceleration ( racing ).
Having their exhaust pipes exit through the front fender well is a common characteristic of gassers, as is having bodies painted in flamboyant metalflakes, pearls, and candy finishes complemented by lettering in wild फ़ॉन्ट्स.
The name arose because they competed in a gasoline -fueled drag racing class, rather than one using methanol or nitromethane.
The gasser is the predecessor of the modern Funny Car.
Twelve-lead EKG of a 26-year-old male
Electrocardiography ( ECG or EKG from ) is a transthoracic ( across the thorax or chest ) interpretation of the electrical activity of the heart over a period of time, as detected by electrodes attached to the surface of the skin and recorded by a device external to the body.
The रिकॉर्डिंग produced by this noninvasive procedure is termed an electrocardiogram ( also ECG or EKG ).
An ECG is used to measure the rate and regularity of heartbeats, as well as the size and position of the chambers, the presence of any damage to the दिल, and the effects of drugs or devices used to regulate the heart, such as a pacemaker.
Most ECGs are performed लिये diagnostic or research purposes on human hearts, but may also be performed on animals, usually for diagnosis of दिल abnormalities or research.
Donald John Trump, Sr. ( born June 14, 1946 ) is an American business magnate, television personality and author.
He is the chairman and president of The Trump Organization and the founder of ट्रम्प Entertainment Resorts.
Trump 's extravagant जीवनशैली, outspoken manner, and role on the NBC reality show The Apprentice have made him a well-known celebrity who was No. 14 on the 2012 फोर्ब्स Celebrity 100 list.
Trump is the बेटे of Fred Trump, a wealthy New York City real-estate developer.
He worked for his father 's firm, Elizabeth Trump & Son, while attending the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania, और in 1968 officially joined the company.
He was given control of the company in 1971 and renamed it The Trump संगठन.
In 2010, Trump expressed an interest in becoming a candidate for president of the United States in the 2012 election, हालांकि in May 2011, he announced he would not be a candidate.
In December 2011, Trump was suggested as a possible vice presidential selection by मिशेल Bachmann, if she were to win the Republican nomination.
`` A Change Is Gon na Come '' is a 1964 single by R & B singer-songwriter Sam cooke, written and first recorded in 1963 and released under the RCA Victor label shortly बाद his death in लेट 1964.
Though तभी a modest hit for Cooke in comparison with his previous singles, the सोंग came to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights गति.
The song has gained in लोकप्रियता and critical acclaim in the decades since its release, and is # 12 on Rolling Stone 's 500 Greatest Songs of All Time.
Steam rising इससे the Nesjavellir Geothermal Power Station in Iceland.
Geothermal energy is thermal energy generated and stored in the धरती.
Thermal energy is the energy that determines the temperature of matter.
The Geothermal उर्जा of the Earth 's crust originates from the original गठन of the planet ( 20 % ) and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ).
The geothermal gradient, which is the difference in temperature between the core of the planet and its सतह, ड्राइव a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface.
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη ( ge ), meaning earth, और θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the core of the Earth, थर्मल energy is created by radioactive decay and temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts from the कोर to surrounding कूलर rock.
The high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt, creating magma convection upward since it is lighter than the solid rock.
The मैग्मा heats rock and जल in the crust, sometimes up to 370 °c ( 700 °F ).
From hot springs, geothermal उर्जा has been used for bathing since Paleolithic times and for space heating since ancient रोमन times, but it is now better known for electricity generation.
विश्वव्यापी, about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal power is online in 24 countries.
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity is installed for district heating, space heating, spas, industrial processes, desalination और agricultural applications.
Geothermal power is cost effective, reliable, चिरस्थायी, और environmentally friendly, but has historically been limited to areas near tectonic थाली boundaries.
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and size of viable resources, especially for applications such as home heating, opening a potential for widespread exploitation.
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the earth, but these emissions are much lower per energy unit than those of fossil fuels.
As a result, geothermal power has the संभावित to help mitigate वैश्विक warming if widely deployed in place of चट्टान fuels.
the Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more than पर्याप्त to supply humanity 's energy needs, लकिन only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited.
Drilling and exploration लिये गहन resources is very expensive.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power depend on assumptions about technology, energy prices, subsidies, and interest rates.
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in Green Power Program show that customers would be willing to pay a little more for a बेदर्दी energy source like geothermal.
But as a result of government assisted research and industry experience, the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the पास्ट two decades.
In 2001, geothermal energy cost between two और ten cents per kwh.
Ownership of property may be private, collective, or common और the property may be वस्तुएँ, land/real estate, or intellectual property.
Determining ownership in law involves determining who has certain rights and duties over the property.
These अधिकारों and duties, sometimes called a 'bundle of rights ', can be separated और held by different parties.
The question of स्वामित्व पहुँच back to the ancient philosophers, Plato and Aristotle, who held different opinions on the subject.
प्लेटो ( 428/427 BC – 348/347 BC ) विचार private property created divisive inequalities, while Aristotle ( 384 BC – 322 BC ) thought private प्रॉपर्टी enabled people to receive the full benefit of their labor.
Private property can circumvent what is now referred to as the “ tragedy of the commons ” problem, where people tend to degrade common property more than they do private property.
Given a short-sighted owner, however, a private property system can make these tragedies worse—for example, a private owner of a piece of oil-rich property, depending on his worldview, might be more interested in short-term financial gain than incremental use with an eye toward other 's concerns ( e.g., those of future generations, the disenfranchised, इत्यादि. ).
While Aristotle justified the existence of private ownership, he left open questions of ( 1 ) कैसा to allocate property between what is private and common and ( 2 ) how to allocate the private property within society.
Over the millennia, and across cultures कया can be property and how it is regarded culturally have varied widely.
Ownership is the basis लिये many other concepts that form the foundations of ancient and modern societies such as money, trade, debt, bankruptcy, the criminality of theft, and private vs. public प्रॉपर्टी.
Ownership is the key building block in the development of the capitalist socio-economic प्रणाली.
Adam Smith stated that one of the sacred कानून of इंसाफ was to guard a person 's property and possessions.
The process और mechanics of ownership are fairly complex : one can gain, transfer and खोना ownership of property in a number of ways.
To acquire property one can purchase it साथ money, trade it लिये other property, receive it as a gift, steal it, find it, make, it or homestead it.
One can transfer or lose ownership of property by selling it for money, exchanging it for other प्रॉपर्टी, giving it as a gift, being robbed of it, it, or having it stripped from एक 's ownership through legal means such as eviction, foreclosure, seizure, or taking.
Ownership is self-propagating in that the owner of any property will also own the economic लाभ of that property.
`` What 's My Name ? '' is a song recorded by Barbadian recording artist Rihanna, for her fifth studio album Loud ( 2010 ).
Featuring guest vocals from Canadian rapper Drake, the song was released as the second single from लाउड on October 29, 2010 through Def jam Recordings.
The R & B song थी produced by the Norwegian उत्पादन duo StarGate, और was written by the duo along with Ester Dean, Traci Hale, and Drake.
Lyrically, it incorporates themes of sexual intercourse and romance.
Music critics gave the song positive समीक्षाएँ, citing it some of Rihanna 's best vocal work to date ; there was a praise regarding its romantic nature, as well as its sexual tones.
`` What 's My Name ? '' was a commercial success and topped the US Billboard Hot 100 chart, giving Rihanna उसके third number-one single in 2010, as well as her eighth overall on the chart.
The song also topped the चार्ट in Hungary and the United Kingdom and reached the top five in कनाडा, Ireland, New Zealand, नार्वे and स्लोवाक.
The song received a नामांकन at the 54th Grammy Awards for Best Rap/Sung Collaboration.
An accompanying म्यूज़िक video, directed by फिलिप Andelman, portrays a रोमांटिक encounter between Rihanna और ड्रेक in a grocery store along साथ romantic scenes between the pair and Rihanna walking through Manhattan 's Lower East Side.
`` What 's My नाम ? '' was promoted with live performances across दोनो sides of the Atlantic, including Saturday Night Live in America और the series सात finale of the X Factor in the संयुक्त Kingdom.
The latter performance resulted in an investigation from the country 's media regulator, Ofcom, for the raunchy nature of Rihanna 's outfit.
A mathematical constant is a special number, usually a real number, that is `` significantly interesting in कुछ way ''.
Constants arise in many अलग areas of mathematics, with constants such as e ( mathematical constant ) | and pi| occurring in such विविध contexts as geometry, क्रमांक theory and calculus.
What it means लिये a constant to arise `` naturally '', and what makes a constant `` interesting '', is ultimately a matter of taste, और some mathematical constants are notable more for historical reasons than for their intrinsic mathematical interest.
the more popular constants have been पढ़ाई throughout the ages and computed to अनेक decimal स्थान.
All mathematical constants are definable numbers and usually are also computable numbers ( Chaitin 's constant being a significant exception ).
Elections to the United States Senate were held on November 2, 2010, for 37 of the United States सीनेट 's 100 seats.
( A special election on January 19, 2010 in Massachusetts was held earlier in the year. )
Thirty-four of the seats were for six-year शर्तें to the Senate 's `` class three '', and three were special चुनावों for shorter terms.
Of the 37 elections, 19 featured incumbent Democrats ( 7 of whom retired or were defeated in the primary ) और 18 प्रदर्शित लाज़िम Republicans ( आठ of whom retired or were defeated in the primary ).
बाद the previous elections ( in 2008 ), the United राज्य Senate was composed of 58 Democrats, 40 Republicans, and 2 independents who caucus with the Democrats.
Republicans won four seats held by retiring Democrats and republicans पराजित दो incumbent Democrats.
This was the largest number of Republicans gains since the 1994 elections और also the पहला time since that चुनाव that Republicans successfully defended all of their own seats.
This was the fourth consecutive election of `` class 3 '' senators where डेमोक्रेट have failed to gain seats और the third consecutive mid-term election आयोजित in a president 's first term where Republicans have picked-up seats.
Despite these Republican wins, however, the Democrats retained a majority of the Senate with 51 seats plus 2 independents who caucus with them, compared to the 47 Republicans.
A solstice is an astronomical event कि occurs twice each year as the सूर्य reaches its highest or lowest excursion relative to the celestial equator on the celestial sphere.
As a result, on the day of the solstice, the Sun appears to have reached its highest or lowest annual altitude in the आसमान above the horizon at local solar noon.
The word solstice is derived from the Latin sol ( sun ) and sistere ( to stand still ), because at the solstices, the Sun stands still in declination ; that is, the seasonal movement of the सूर्य 's path ( as seen from Earth ) comes to a stop before reversing direction.
The solstices, together with the equinoxes, are connected with the seasons.
In many cultures the solstices mark either the beginning or the midpoint of winter and summer.
The term solstice can also be used in a broader sense, as the date ( day ) when this occurs.
The day of the solstice is either the longest day of the year ( in summer ) or the shortest day of the year ( in शीत ) लिये any place outside of the tropics.
Jerry Lee Lewis ( born September 29, 1935 ) is an American rock and roll and country music singer-songwriter and pianist.
He is known by the nickname `` The कातिल '' and is often viewed as “rock & roll 's first great wild man”.
an early pioneer of rock and roll music, in 1956 Lewis made his first recordings at Sun Records.
`` Crazy Arms `` sold 300,000 copies in the South, but it was his 1957 hit `` पूरे Lotta shakin ' Going On `` that shot Lewis to fame worldwide.
Lewis followed this in that same year जब he अंकित songs such as `` Great Balls of Fire ``, `` Breathless `` और `` ऊँची School Confidential ``.
Lewis sold more records than Elvis प्रेस्ली at this time.
However, Lewis ' rock 'n ' roll career faltered in the वेक of his marriage to उसके young cousin.
He had little success in the charts following the scandal and his popularity quickly धुंधली.
His live प्रदर्शन fees plummeted from $ 10,000 per night to $ 250.
In the meantime he was determined to gain back some of his popularity.
During the early 60’s he did n't have much chart success with few exceptions such as `` What 'd I Say ``.
उसके live performances at this time were increasingly wild and energetic.
His album Live at the Star Club, Hamburg इससे 1964 is often regarded by many music journalists and fans as एक of the wildest और greatest rock and roll concert albums ever.
After recording songs such as `` I 'm on Fire '' for several सालो with little कामयाबी, in 1968 Lewis बना a transition into country music and had hits with songs such as `` Another Place, Another Time ''.
This reignited his करियर and throughout the late '60s and '70s he regularly topped the country-western charts.
His # 1 country hits included `` To Make Love Sweeter For You ``, `` There Must Be More to Love than This ``, `` Would You Take Another Chance on Me `` and `` Me And Bobby McGee ``.
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the decade and he embraced his rock 'n ' roll past with songs such as a cover of the Big Bopper 's `` Chantilly Lace `` and `` rockin ' My Life Away ``.
In the 21st century Lewis continues to tour to audiences around the world और still releases new albums.
One such album, titled Last Man Standing, is his best selling to तिथि at over a million copies sold worldwide.
This was followed by Mean Old Man which has received some of the best sales of Lewis’s career.
Lewis has had a dozen gold records in both rock and देश, won several Grammy awards, including a Lifetime Achievement Award.
Lewis was inducted into the Rock और Roll Hall of Fame in 1986, and his pioneering contribution to the genre रै been recognized by the Rockabilly Hall of Fame.
In 1989, his life was chronicled in the movie Great Balls of Fire, starring डेनिस quaid.
In 2003, Rolling Stone Magazine listed his box set सब कातिल, No Filler : The Anthology number 242 on their list of `` 500 greatest albums of all time ``.
In 2004, they ranked उसे number 24 on their list of the 100 Greatest Artists of All Time.
Lewis is the last surviving member of सूर्य Records ' Million Dollar Quartet and the Class of '55 album, which also included Johnny Cash, Carl Perkins, Roy Orbison and Elvis Presley.
Henry Louis Stephens, untitled watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man reading a newspaper with headline `` Presidential Proclamation / गुलामी ''.
The Emancipation Proclamation was an order issued to all segments of the Executive branch ( including the Army and Navy ) of the United States by President Abraham Lincoln on January 1, 1863, during the American Civil War.
it was आधारित on the president 's constitutional authority as commander in chief of the armed forces ; it was not a law passed by Congress.
It proclaimed all those enslaved in Confederate territory to be forever free, and ordered the Army ( and all segments of the Executive branch ) to दावत as free all those enslaved in ten राज्य that were still in rebellion, thus applying to 3.1 million of the 4 million slaves in the U.S.
The Proclamation could not be enforced in areas still under rebellion, but as the army took control of Confederate regions, the slaves in those regions were emancipated rather than returned to their masters.
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions where rebellion had already been subdued were immediately emancipated, and over 3 million more were emancipated as the Union फौज advanced.
The Proclamation did not apply to the five slave states that were नहीं in rebellion, nor to सबसे regions already controlled by the संघ army ; emancipation there would come after separate state actions and/or the December 1865 ratification of the Thirteenth Amendment, which made slavery illegal everywhere in the U.S.
The Proclamation did not compensate the owners, किया not itself outlaw slavery, and किया not make the ex-slaves ( called freedmen ) citizens.
It made the eradication of slavery an explicit war goal, in addition to the goal of reuniting the Union.
On September 22, 1862, Lincoln had issued a preliminary proclamation that he would order the emancipation of all slaves in any state of the Confederate States of America that did not return to Union control by जनवरी 1, 1863.
None returned, and the order, signed and issued January 1, 1863, took effect except in locations where the Union had already mostly regained control.
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners जो envisioned a रेस war, angered some Northern Democrats, energized anti-slavery forces, and weakened forces in Europe कि wanted to intervene to help the Confederacy.
It also lifted the spirits of अफ़्रीकी Americans both in the Southern and Northern States, and led to many slaves escaping their masters and running behind संघ lines in order to have उनके emancipation enforced.
Sucker पंच is a 2011 American fantasy action film directed by zack स्नाइडर and co-written by उसे and Steve Shibuya.
it is Snyder 's first film आधारित on an original script.
The film stars Emily Browning, Abbie cornish, Jena Malone, Vanessa Hudgens, Jamie Chung, and Carla Gugino.
The storyline follows the fantasies of a young woman who is committed to a mental institution, as she makes a plan to escape the hospital पहले suffering a lobotomy.
The film was released in both conventional और IMAX theatres in the United राज्य at midnight on March 25, 2011.
it received generally negative reviews from आलोचकों, but was a moderate box दफ्तर success.

A digital camera ( or digicam ) is a camera कि takes video or still photographs by recording images on an electronic image sensor.
Most cameras sold today are digital, and digital cameras are incorporated into many डिवाइस ranging इससे PDAs and mobile phones ( called camera phones ) to vehicles.
Digital and film कैमरे share an optical system, typically using a lens with a variable diaphragm to focus light onto an चित्र pickup device.
The diaphragm and shutter admit the correct amount of light to the imager, just as with film but the image pickup यंत्र is electronic rather than chemical.
However, unlike film cameras, digital कैमरे can display images on a screen immediately after being recorded, and store and delete images from memory.
Many digital cameras can also record moving video with sound.
Some डिजिटल कैमरे can crop और stitch pictures and perform other elementary image editing.

Web server can refer to either the hardware ( the computer ) or the software ( the कंप्यूटर application ) that helps to deliver web content that can be accessed through the Internet.
The most common उपयोग of web servers is to मेजबान websites, but there are other uses such as gaming, data storage or running enterprise applications.
The American Red Cross ( ARC ), also known as the American नेशनल Red Cross, is a humanitarian organization that provides emergency assistance, disaster relief and education inside the United States.
It is the designated U.S. affiliate of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies.
Today, in addition to domestic disaster relief, the American Red Cross offers सेवाएं in five other areas : community services कि help the needy ; communications services and comfort for military members and their family members ; the collection, processing and distribution of blood and blood products ; educational programs on preparedness, health, and safety ; and international राहत और development programs.
Issued a corporate charter by the United States Congress अंतर्गत Title 36 of the United States Code, खण्ड 3001, the American National Red Cross is governed by volunteers and supported by जातियाँ donations, income from health and safety training and products, and income from blood products.
The American Red क्रॉस is headquartered in Washington, D.C.
The Chairman of the Board of Governors, serving her second three-year term, is Bonnie McElveen-Hunter.
The current President and Chief Executive Officer is Gail J. McGovern.

A rooster ( also called a cockerel or cock ) is a male gallinaceous bird.
It usually refers to a male chicken ( Gallus gallus ).
Immature male chickens less than one year old are called cockerels.
The term `` rooster '' originates in the United States, and the term is widely used throughout North America, as well as ऑस्ट्रेलिया and New Zealand.
In the United Kingdom and Ireland the older term `` cockerel '' is more commonly used.
`` Cock '' is in general use as the name लिये a male of अन्य species of बर्ड, for example `` Cock sparrow ''.
`` Roosting '' is the action of perching aloft to sleep at night, and is done by both sexes.
The rooster is polygamous, लकिन can not guard several nests of eggs at once.
He गार्ड the general area where his hens are nesting, और will attack other roosters that enter his territory.
During the daytime, he usually sits on a high perch, usually 3–5 feet off the ground to serve as a lookout for his झुण्ड.
He होगा sound a distinctive सचेतक call if predators are nearby.
The पोकीमॉन व्यापार Card Game ( Pokémon TCG ) is a collectible card game based on the Pokémon वीडियो game श्रेणी, पहला published in October 1996 by मीडिया Factory in Japan.
in the US, it was initially published by Wizards of the Coast, the company that produces, in December 1998.
Nintendo took over publishing in June 2003.
It is one of Nintendo 's last remaining strong links to इसके heritage as a playing card company.
जमीन Rover is a British car manufacturer with its headquarters in Gaydon, Warwickshire, United Kingdom which specialises in four-wheel-drive vehicles.
it is part of the Jaguar Land Rover group, a subsidiary of tata Motors of India.
It is the second oldest four-wheel-drive car brand in the world ( after Jeep ).
The Land Rover name was originally used by the रोवर Company for one specific vehicle model, named simply the Land Rover, launched by Rover in 1948.
Over the following years it developed into a marque encompassing a range of four-wheel-drive models, including the Defender, Discovery, Freelander, Range Rover, Range Rover Sport and Range Rover Evoque.
Land Rovers are currently assembled in the company 's halewood and Solihull plants, with research and विकास taking place at JLR 's Gaydon and whitley engineering centres.
Land Rover sold 194,000 vehicles worldwide in 2009.
Although the brand originates from the original 1948 model, Land Rover as a company has only existed since 1978.
Prior to इस, it was a product line of the Rover Company which थी subsequently absorbed into the Rover-Triumph division of the British Leyland Motor Corporation ( BL ) following Leyland Motor Corporation ’s takeover of Rover in 1967.
The ongoing commercial success of the original जमीन Rover series models, and latterly the Range Rover in the 1970s in the midst of BL’s well documented business troubles prompted the establishment of a separate Land Rover company but still under the bl छतरियाँ, बाकी part of the subsequent Rover Group in 1988, under the ownership of British Aerospace after the remains of British Leyland were broken up and privatised.
in 1994 Rover समूह पीएलसी was acquired by BMW.
In 2000, Rover समूह was broken-up by BMW and Land Rover was sold to Ford Motor Company, becoming part of its Premier Automotive समूह.
In 2006 Ford purchased the Rover brand from BMW for around £6 लाख.
This reunited the Rover and Land Rover brands for the first time चूंकि 2000 when the रोवर group was broken up by BMW.
In June 2008, Ford बेची both Land Rover and Jaguar Cars to Tata Motors.
This sale also included the dormant Rover brand

the नवीं ऋतु of the ब्लीच दुश्मनी series is named.
The series is based on tite Kubo 's manga with वही name.

The season began airing on April 23, 2008 in Japan on tv Tokyo and ended on October 7, 2008.

Five DVD compilations, each containing four episodes of the season, have been released by aniplex ; the first dvd compilation was released on November 26, 2008 and the fifth on March 25, 2009.
a DVD box will be प्रकाशित by viz Media on December 13, 2011.
The एपीसोड use three pieces of theme म्यूज़िक : one opening theme and two closing themes.
the opening theme is `` chu-bura `` by Kelun.
The first closing theme is `` Orange '' by Lil'B, used for episodes 168 to 179, and the second closing theme is `` gallop '' by pe'zmoku, used for the remainder of the episodes.
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the संघीय government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, it is therefore exclusively the domain of the states to permit, prohibit, or otherwise regulate commercial sex, except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act.
In most states, prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the category of public order crime, a crime that disrupts the order of a community.
It was at one time considered to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, Nevada is the only state to allow brothel वेश्यावृति, the terms of which are stipulated in the नेवाडा Revised Statutes.
तभी 8 counties currently contain active brothels.
All forms of वेश्यावृति are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area ), Washoe County ( which contains Reno ), कार्सन City, Douglas County, and Lincoln County.
The अन्य counties theoretically allow brothel prostitution, but some of these counties currently have no क्रियाशील brothels.
गली prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living बंद of the proceeds of a prostitute remain illegal under Nevada law, as elsewhere in the country.
As with other countries, prostitution in the United States can be divided into तीन broad categories : street prostitution, brothel prostitution, and escort prostitution.
The East Coast of the United States, also known as the Eastern Seaboard or the Atlantic Seaboard and commonly shortened to East coast, refers to the easternmost coast of the United States along the Atlantic समंदर.
The states which have shoreline on the East Coast are, from north to south, the U.S. states of Maine, New Hampshire, Massachusetts, rhode द्वीप, Connecticut, New York, New Jersey, डेलावेयर, Maryland, Virginia, North Carolina, South Carolina, Georgia, and Florida.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) was the 37th President of the United States, serving from 1969 to 1974, when he became the only president to resign the office.
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and senator from California और as the 36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961.
निक्सन was born in Yorba Linda, California.
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 and Duke University School of विधि in 1937, returning to California to practice law.
He and his wife, Pat Nixon, moved to Washington to work लिये the federal government in 1942.
He subsequently served in the United States नेवी during World War ii.
निक्सन was निर्वाचित in California to the House of Representatives in 1946 and to the Senate in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger hiss case established his reputation as a leading anti-communist, and elevated him to national prominence.
He was the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower, the Republican Party presidential nominee in the 1952 election.
Nixon served for eight सालो as vice अध्यक्ष.
He waged an unsuccessful presidential campaign in 1960, narrowly खोने to John F. Kennedy, and lost a race for राज्यपाल of California in 1962.
in 1968, he ran again for the प्रेसिडेंसी and was elected.
Although Nixon initially escalated अमेरिका 's involvement in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973.
Nixon 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 opened diplomatic relations between the two nations, and he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty साथ the Soviet Union the same year.
Domestically, his administration generally embraced policies that transferred power from Washington to the states.
Among other things, he launched initiatives to fight cancer और illegal drugs, imposed wage and price controls, enforced desegregation of कुछ Southern schools, and established the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the lunar landings beginning with अपोलो 11, he scaled back manned space exploration.
He was re-elected by a landslide in 1972.
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo, the resignation of his vice president, Spiro Agnew, and a continuing series of revelations about the Watergate scandal and अन्य misconduct by members of the administration.
the scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of his political support, and on अगस्त 9, 1974, he resigned in the फेस of almost निश्चित impeachment and removal from office.
After his resignation, he controversially received a pardon issued by his successor, Gerald Ford.
In retirement, Nixon 's कार्य as an elder statesman, authoring several books और undertaking many विदेशी trips, helped to rehabilitate उसके public image.
He suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18, 1994, and died चार days later at the age of 81.
sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names Zoloft, Lustral ) is an antidepressant of the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class.
It थी introduced to the market by Pfizer in 1991.
Sertraline is primarily prescribed for major depressive disorder in adult outpatients as well as obsessive–compulsive, panic, और social anxiety disorders in both adults and children.
In 2011, it थी the second-most prescribed antidepressant on the U.S. retail market, with 37,208,000 prescriptions.
The efficacy of sertraline for depression is similar to that of older tricyclic antidepressants, but its side effects are much less pronounced.
Differences with newer antidepressants हैं subtler and also mostly confined to पक्ष effects.
Evidence suggests that sertraline may work better than fluoxetine ( Prozac ) for some subtypes of depression.
Treatment of panic disorder with sertraline results in a significant decrease of the number of panic attacks and in improved quality of life.
For obsessive-compulsive disorder, sertraline is not as effective as cognitive behavioral therapy ; the best results have been achieved by combining these two treatments.
Although approved for social phobia and posttraumatic stress विकार, sertraline leads to तभी modest सुधार in these conditions.
Sertraline also alleviates the symptoms of premenstrual dysphoric disorder and can be used in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for its treatment.
Sertraline shares the common side effects and contraindications of other SSRIs, with high दरों of मतली, diarrhea, insomnia, and sexual side effects ; however, it करता not cause weight gain, and its effects on both cognition and vigilance are relatively mild.
In गर्भवती women taking sertraline, the drug was present in significant concentrations in fetal blood, and was also associated with a उच्चतर rate of various birth defects.
Similarly to अन्य antidepressants, the use of sertraline लिये अवसाद may be associated with a higher rate of suicidality.
The Five Heartbeats is a 1991 musical drama film निर्देशित by Robert Townsend, जो co-wrote the script with Keenan Ivory Wayans.
Distributed by 20th Century Fox, the फिल्मी 's main cast includes टाउनसेंड, Michael Wright, लिओन Robinson, Harry J. lennix, Tico Wells, Harold Nicholas of the Nicholas Brothers, and Diahann Carroll.
The plot of the film ( which is loosely based on the lives of several artists : The Dells, The Temptations, Four Tops, Wilson Pickett, James Brown, Frankie Lymon, Sam Cooke and others ) follows the three decade career of the R & B vocal group The Five Heartbeats.
The फिल्मी depicts the rise and पतन of a motown inspired soul act through the eyes of the film 's main protagonist, Donald `` Duck '' Matthews ( portrayed by Townsend ), who serves as a narrator throughout the film.
However, a majority of the cinema is प्रस्तुत in a consecutive time line as opposed to traditional flash backs.
The film includes a significant amount of असली music conceived by various artists for the film 's soundtrack, सहित singles such as `` A Heart Is a House for Love ``, `` We Have n't Finished Yet '', and `` Nothing But Love ''.
The film was released to most North American audiences कूच 29, 1991 however it was not made available to audiences in other महाद्वीपों until 2002 when a DVD was released prior to another DVD release in 2006 for the film 's 15th anniversary.
the movie received mixed reviews from critics.
Secretariat ( March 30, 1970 – October 4, 1989 ) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the first U.S. Triple Crown champion in 25 years.
He नियत race records in सब three events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the Preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ), and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that स्टिल stand आज.
He is माना to be one of the greatest thoroughbreds of all time.
In 1999, ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th century, the highest ranking racehorse on the list URL_http.
He ranked second पीछे man o ' युद्ध in The Blood-Horse 's List of the Top 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century.
Secretariat was sired by Bold Ruler out of somethingroyal, by Princequillo.
he थी foaled at The Meadow in Caroline काउंटी, Virginia.
Like his famous पूर्ववर्ती Man o ' युद्ध, Secretariat was a large chestnut colt and was given the same nickname, `` बिग Red. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, Nasrullah, is also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner सिएटल slew.
Owned by Penny Chenery, he was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by Canadian jockey Ron Turcotte, along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two दौड़ ), and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ).
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue and white checkered colors और his groom was Eddie Sweat.
Secretariat stood approximately लम्बा, and weighed, with a 75-inch girth, in his racing prime.
A typical 12 V, 40 Ah Lead-acid car battery
An automotive battery is a type of rechargeable battery कि supplies electric energy to an automobile.
Usually this refers to an SLI battery ( starting, lighting, ignition ) to power the starter motor, the lights, and the ignition system of a vehicle’s engine.
Automotive SLI batteries are usually lead-acid type, and are made of six galvanic cells in series to provide a 12 volt system.
Each cell provides 2.1 volts for a total of 12.6 volt at full charge.
Heavy vehicles such as highway trucks or tractors, often equipped with diesel engines, may have two batteries in श्रेणी for a 24 वोल्ट system, or may have parallel स्ट्रिंग्स of batteries.
Lead-acid batteries are made up of plates of lead and separate plates of सीसे dioxide, which are submerged into an electrolyte solution of about 38 % sulfuric acid and 62 % water.
This causes a chemical reaction that releases electrons, allowing them to flow through conductors to produce electricity.
As the बैटरी discharges, the acid of the electrolyte प्रतिक्रियाएँ with the materials of the plates, changing their surface to सीसे sulfate.
When the battery is recharged, the chemical reaction is reversed : the lead sulfate reforms into lead dioxide and lead.
With the plates restored to their original कंडीशन, the process may now be repeated.
Battery recycling of automotive batteries reduces the need for resources required लिये manufacture of new batteries, diverts toxic lead from landfills, and prevents risk of improper disposal.
Full-time employment is employment in which a person works a minimum number of hours पारिभाषित as such by his/her employer.
Full-time employment प्रायः comes साथ benefits that are not typically offered to part-time, temporary, or flexible workers, such as annual leave, sickleave, and health बीमे.
Full-time jobs are often considered careers.
They generally अदा more than part-time jobs, and usually carry more hours per सप्ताह.
The Fair Labor Standards Act ( flsa ) does not define full-time employment or part-time employment.
This is a matter generally to be determined by the employer ( US Department of मजदूर ).
The definition by नियोक्ता can vary and is generally published in a company 's Employee Handbook.
Companies commonly require from 30–35 or 40 hours per week to be defined as full-time and therefore eligible for benefits.
Full-Time status varies between company and is often based on the शिफ़्ट the employee must work during each work week.
The `` मानक '' work week consists of five eight-hour days, commonly served between 9:00AM to 5:00PM totaling 40 hours.
While a four-day week generally consists of चार ten-hour days ; it may also consist of as little as नौ hours लिये a total of a 36 घंटा work week.
Twelve-hour shifts are often three days प्रति week, unless the company has the intention of paying out the employee overtime.
Overtime is legally paid out anytime an employee works more than 40 hours per week.
The विधिक minimum for overtime starts at Base Pay + One-Half.
The increased भुगतान is considered to compensate slightly for the increased fatigue which a person experiences on such long shifts.
Shifts can भी be very irregular, as in retail, but are स्टिल full-time if the required number of hours is पहुँचे.
There are कुछ situations where a person जो needs full-time work is dropped to part-time, जिससे is sometimes a form of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker.
Seahorse is the title given to 54 species of marine fish in the genus Hippocampus.
`` Hippocampus '' comes from the Ancient Greek hippos meaning `` horse '' and kampos meaning `` sea monster ''.
The Controlled Substances Act ( सीएसए ) थी enacted into law by the Congress of the United States as शीर्षक II of the Comprehensive ड्रग Abuse Prevention and कंट्रोल Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which the manufacture, importation, possession, use and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
The Act also served as the national implementing legislation for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ), with varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each.
Two संघीय agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed इससे the various schedules, though the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस created the आरंभिक listing, और Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the Hillory J. Farias and सामन्था Reid Date-Rape रोकथाम Act of 2000, which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
Maya numerals
माया numerals are a vigesimal ( base - twenty ) numeral system used by the Pre-Columbian Maya civilization.
The numerals are made up of three symbols ; zero ( shell shape ), one ( a dot ) and five ( a bar ).
लिये उदाहरण, thirteen is written as three dots in a horizontal row above two horizontal lines stacked above each other.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – January 22, 1973 ), often referred to as LBJ, was the 36th President of the United States ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed after उसके सेवा as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
He is one of only four people who served in all four elected federal offices of the United States : प्रतिनिधि, Senator, Vice President, and President.
Johnson, a Democrat इससे Texas, served as a United States Representative from 1937–1949 and as a Senator from 1949–1961, including six years as United States Senate Majority Leader, two as Senate Minority Leader और दो as Senate Majority Whip.
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic nomination in 1960, Johnson was asked by John F. Kennedy to be his कार्यशील mate for the 1960 presidential election.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of John F. कैनेडी on November 22, 1963, समाप्त Kennedy 's term and was elected President in his अपना right, winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election.
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President, he was responsible for designing the `` Great Society `` legislation that included laws that upheld civil अधिकारों, public broadcasting, Medicare, Medicaid, environmental protection, aid to education, and his `` War on Poverty. ''
Johnson was प्रसिद्ध for his domineering personality and the `` Johnson उपचार, '' उसके coercion of शक्तिशाली politicians in order to advance legislation.
Meanwhile, Johnson escalated American involvement in the Vietnam War, from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 combat troops in early 1968, as American casualties soared और the peace process bogged down.
the involvement stimulated a large एंग्री antiwar movement based especially on university campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer दंगे broke out in most major cities बाद 1965, and crime दरों soared, as his opponents raised demands for `` law and order '' policies.
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions, और after Johnson did poorly in the 1968 New Hampshire primary, he ended his bid for reelection.
Republican Richard Nixon was elected to succeed him.
Historians argue that Johnson 's presidency marked the शिखर of modern liberalism in the United States बाद the New Deal era.
Johnson is ranked favorably by कुछ historians because of his domestic policies.
Progesterone also known as P4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a C-21 steroid hormone शामिल in the female menstrual cycle, pregnancy ( supports gestation ) and embryogenesis of humans and other species.
Progesterone belongs to a class of hormones called progestogens, and is the major naturally occurring human progestogen.
Big Bird is a protagonist of the children 's television show Sesame Street.
Officially performed by Caroll Spinney since 1969, he is an eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm ) tall bright primrose-yellow bird.
He can roller skate, ice skate, dance, sing, write काव्य, draw and even ride a unicycle.
But despite this wide array of talents, he is prone to बारंबार misunderstandings, on एक occasion even गायन the alphabet as one big long word ( from the song called `` ABC-DEF-GHI, '' pronounced `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ), pondering what it could ever mean.
He lives in a large nest पीछे the 123 Sesame Street brownstone and has a teddy bear नामित Radar.
Webtrends is a private company headquartered in Portland, Oregon, United States.
It provides वेब, सोशल, and mobile analytics and other software solutions related to marketing intelligence.
The company was founded in 1993 and now serves more than 10,000 large and small firms. < ref name='Intelligent Enterprise 2007-05-21 ' >
The Second Crusade ( 1145–1149 ) was the second major crusade launched इससे Europe.
The Second Crusade was started in response to the fall of the County of Edessa the previous year to the forces of Zengi.
The county had been founded during the पहला Crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by Baldwin of Boulogne in 1098.
जबकि it was the पहला जेहादी state to be founded, it was also the first to fall.
the Second Crusade was announced by पोप Eugene iii, and थी the first of the crusades to be led by European kings, namely लुई VII of France and कोनराड III of Germany, with help from a number of other European nobles.
The armies of the two kings marched separately across Europe.
बाद crossing Byzantine territory into Anatolia, both armies were separately defeated by the Seljuq turks.
The main Western Christian source, Odo of Deuil, and Syriac Christian sources claim that the Byzantine emperor Manuel I Comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' progress, particularly in Anatolia where he is alleged to have deliberately ordered Turks to attack them.
Louis and Conrad and the remnants of उनके सेना reached Jerusalem and, in 1148, participated in an ill-advised आक्रमण on दमिश्क.
The crusade in the ईस्ट was a failure for the crusaders and a ग्रेट victory for the Muslims.
It would ultimately have a key influence on the fall of Jerusalem and दे वृद्धि to the Third Crusade at the end of the 12th century.
The only success of the Second Crusade came to a combined force of 13,000 Flemish, Frisian, Norman, अंग्रेज़ी, Scottish, and German crusaders in 1147.
Travelling इससे England, by ship, to the Holy Land, the army stopped and helped the छोटी ( 7,000 ) Portuguese army in the capture of Lisbon, expelling its Moorish occupants.
Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. ( ), branded as Walmart, is an American multinational retail corporation कि runs chains of large discount department stores and warehouse stores.
The company is the संसार 's third largest public corporation, according to the सौभाग्य Global 500 सूची in 2012, the biggest private employer in the world with over two million employees, and is the largest retailer in the world.
Walmart remains a family-owned business, as the company is controlled by the Walton family, who own a 48 percent stake in Walmart.
It is also one of the संसार 's most valuable companies.
The company was founded by Sam Walton in 1962, incorporated on October 31, 1969, and publicly traded on the New York Stock एक्सचेंज in 1972.
It is headquartered in Bentonville, Arkansas.
walmart is also the largest grocery retailer in the संयुक्त States.
In 2009, it generated 51 percent of its US $ 258 billion sales in the U.S. from grocery business.
It also owns and operates the Sam 's Club retail warehouses in North America.
By 1988, Wal-Mart was the most profitable retailer in the US, and by November 1990, it outsold K-mart.
By 1991 it outsold Sears in retail, making it America 's largest retailer, a भेद it still holds.
walmart has 8,500 स्टोर्स in 15 countries, under 55 different names.
The company operates under the Walmart name in the United States, including the 50 states and Puerto Rico.
It operates in Mexico as Walmex, in the United Kingdom as Asda, in Japan as Seiyu, and in India as Best Price.
It has wholly owned operations in Argentina, Brazil, and Canada.
Walmart 's investments outside उत्तर अमेरिका have had mixed results : its operations in the United Kingdom, South America, and चीन are अत्यधिक successful, whereas ventures in Germany and South Korea यहूद unsuccessful.
Robert विलियम Gary Moore ( 4 April 1952 – 6 February 2011 ), was a Northern आयरिश musician, most widely recognised as a singer and guitarist.
In a career dating back to the 1960s, Moore निभाई with artists including Phil Lynott and Brian Downey during उसके teens, leading him to memberships with the Irish bands Skid Row and Thin lizzy on three separate occasions.
Moore shared the stage with ऐसे blues and rock luminaries as b.b. किंग, Albert King, कोलोसियम II, George Harrison and Greg Lake, as well as having a successful solo career.
He guested on a number of albums recorded by high profile musicians, including a cameo रूप playing the lead guitar solo on `` She 's My Baby `` इससे Traveling Wilburys Vol. 3.
An example of rack mounted servers
A वेब hosting service is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals और संगठन to make their website accessible via the संसार Wide Web.
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased for use by क्लाइंट, as well as providing Internet connectivity, typically in a data center.
Web hosts can also provide data center स्पेस और connectivity to the Internet for other servers located in their आंकड़ा center, called colocation, also known as Housing in Latin America or France.
The scope of web hosting सेवाएं varies greatly.
The most basic is web page and small-scale file hosting, where files can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface.
The files are usually delivered to the Web `` as is '' or with minimal processing.
Many Internet service प्रदाताओं ( ISPs ) offer this service free to सदस्य.
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web पेज hosting from alternative service providers.
Personal web site hosting is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site hosting often has a higher expense depending upon the size and type of the website.
सिंगल page होस्टिंग is generally sufficient for personal web pages.
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package that provides database support and application विकास platforms ( e.g. पीएचपी, Java, Ruby on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
These facilities allow customers to write or स्थापना scripts for अनुप्रयोग like forums and content management.
Also, Secure Sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically used for e-commerce.
The host may also provide an interface or control panel for managing the वेब server and installing scripts, as well as other modules and service applications like e-mail.
Some hosts specialize in certain तन्त्र or services ( e.g. e-commerce ), which are commonly used by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure.
Obstetrics ( इससे the Latin obstare, `` to stand by '' ) is the medical specialty dealing with the care of all women 's reproductive tracts और their children during pregnancy ( prenatal काल ), प्रसव and the postnatal काल.
Many obstetricians are also gynecologists, meaning they perform in both specialties.
In the United States, these physicians are commonly referred to as OB/GYNs.
The Wright brothers, orville ( August 19, 1871 – January 30, 1948 ) and Wilbur ( April 16, 1867 – May 30, 1912 ), यहूद two American brothers, inventors, and aviation pioneers who were credited with inventing and building the world 's first successful airplane and making the पहला controlled, powered and sustained heavier-than-air human flight, on December 17, 1903.
From 1905 to 1907, the brothers विकसित their flying machine into the first practical fixed-wing aircraft.
हालांकि not the first to निर्माण and fly experimental aircraft, the Wright भाइयो were the पहला to invent aircraft controls that made fixed-wing powered flight possible.
The brothers ' fundamental breakthrough was their invention of three-axis control, which enabled the pilot to steer the aircraft effectively और to maintain इसके equilibrium.
इस method became standard and remains standard on fixed-wing aircraft of all kinds.
From the beginning of उनके aeronautical work, the Wright brothers focused on developing a reliable method of पायलट control as the key to solving `` the flying problem ''.
This approach differed significantly from other experimenters of the time who put more emphasis on developing powerful engines.
Using a छोटी homebuilt wind tunnel, the Wrights also collected more accurate data than कोई before, enabling them to design and build wings and propellers that were अधिक efficient than कोई पहले.
Their first u.S. patent, 821,393, did not claim invention of a flying machine, but बल्कि, the invention of a system of aerodynamic control कि manipulated a flying machine 's surfaces.
They gained the mechanical कौशल essential for उनके success by working for years in their shop with printing presses, bicycles, motors, and other machinery.
Their work with bicycles in particular influenced their belief कि an unstable vehicle जैसे a flying machine could be controlled and balanced with practice.
इससे 1900 until उनके first powered फ़्लाइट in late 1903, they conducted extensive glider tests that also developed their skills as pilots.
Their bicycle shop employee Charlie Taylor became an important part of the team, भवन their first aircraft engine in close सहयोग with the brothers.
the Wright brothers ' औकात as inventors of the airplane has been subject to counter-claims by विभिन्न parties.
Much controversy persists over the अनेक competing दावा of early aviators.

the cycle 's catch phrase is `` Get In The Fold. ''

The number of girls was reduced to 13, the first time since Cycle 9, after being maintained at 14 in the last two cycles.
