New England is a region in the northeastern corner of the United States consisting of the six states of Maine, New हैम्पशायर, Vermont, Massachusetts, rhode Island, and Connecticut.
New England is bordered by New York state to the southwest, Quebec to the northwest, and New ब्रंसविक and the Atlantic Ocean to the east.
In one of the earliest English settlements in North America, Pilgrims from England first settled in New England in 1620, to form Plymouth Colony.
Ten years later, the Puritans settled north of Plymouth उपनिवेश in Boston, thus forming Massachusetts Bay Colony.
Over the next 130 years, New England fought in four French and Indian Wars, until the British defeated the French and उनके native allies in North America.
In the late 18th सदी, the New इंग्लैण्ड Colonies initiated the resistance to the British Parliament 's efforts to impose नई कर without the consent of the colonists.
The Boston Tea Party was a protest to which Great Britain responded with a series of punitive laws stripping Massachusetts of self-government, which were termed the `` Intolerable अधिनियमों `` by the colonists.
The confrontation led to open warfare in 1775, the expulsion of the British authorities इससे नई England in spring 1776, और the Declaration of Independence in July 1776.
Some of the first movements of अमरीकी साहित्य, philosophy, and education originated in New England.
The region played a prominent role in the movement to abolish slavery, and was the first region of the United States to be transformed by the औद्योगिक Revolution.
Today, New इंग्लैण्ड is a major world center of शिक्षा, high technology, insurance, and medicine.
Boston is its cultural, financial, educational, medical and transportation बीच.
Each राज्य is principally subdivided into small incorporated municipalities known as नई England towns, जिससे हैं often governed by town meeting.
The तभी unincorporated territory in New England exists in the sparse, northern regions of वर्मांट, New Hampshire, and Maine.
Since 1970, voters have more often supported उदार candidates at the state and federal level than those of any other region in the United States.
नई England is the only एक of the United राज्य Census Bureau 's nine regional विभाजन जिनकी name does not derive from its भूगोल, and it is the only multi-state region with clear, consistent boundaries.
It maintains a strong sense of cultural identity set apart from the rest of the country, although the terms of this identity हैं often contested, combining Puritanism with liberalism, agrarian life with industry, and isolation with immigration.
Emergency !
is an American television series that combines the चिकित्सा नाटक और action-adventure genres.
It was produced by Mark VII Limited and distributed by Universal Studios.
It debuted as a midseason replacement on January 15, 1972, on NBC, replacing the two short-lived series the Partners and The Good Life, and ran until September 3, 1977, with six अतिरिक्त two-hour टेलीविज़न films during the following two years.
Emergency !
was created and produced by Jack Webb and Robert A. Cinader, both of whom were also responsible for the police dramas Adam-12 and Dragnet.
The Eastern समय Zone ( ET ) encompasses 17 U.S. states in the eastern part of the contiguous United States, parts of Canada and three countries in दक्षिण अमेरिका.
Places that use Eastern Standard Time ( EST ) when observing standard time ( autumn/winter ) are 5 hours behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
पूर्वी Daylight Time ( EDT ), when observing daylight saving time ( spring/summer ) is 4 hours behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
In the northern parts of the समय zone, during the second Sunday in March, at 2:00 a.m. est, clocks हैं उन्नत to 3:00 a.m. EDT leaving a one hour `` gap. ''
During the first Sunday in November, at 2:00 a.m. EDT, clocks are स्थानांतरित back to 1:00 a.m. EST, thus `` duplicating '' one hour.
दक्षिणी parts of the मण्डल ( पनामा and the Caribbean ) do not observe daylight saving.
मानक form of the periodic table.
The colors represent अलग श्रेणी of elements explained below.
The periodic तालिका is a tabular display of the chemical elements, organized on the basis of their atomic numbers, electron configurations, and recurring chemical properties.
Elements are presented in order of increasing atomic number ( number of protons ).
The मानक form of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or main body of elements, positioned above a smaller double row of elements.
the table can also be deconstructed into four rectangular blocks : the s-block to the left, the p-block to the right, the d-block in the मध्य, and the f-block नीचे that.
The rows of the table are called periods ; the columns of the s-, d-, and p-blocks are called groups, with some of these having names such as the halogens or the noble gases.
Since, by definition, a periodic table incorporates पुनरावर्ती रुझान, any ऐसे table can be प्रयुक्त to derive relationships between the गुण of the elements and predict the properties of new, yet to be discovered or synthesized, elements.
As a परिणाम, a periodic table—whether in the standard form or some other variant—provides a useful फ्रेमवर्क for analyzing chemical behavior, and such tables are widely used in chemistry and other sciences.
Although precursors exist, Dmitri Mendeleev is generally credited with the publication, in 1869, of the first widely recognized आवधिक table.
He developed his table to illustrate periodic trends in the properties of the then-known elements.
Mendeleev also predicted some properties of then-unknown elements that would be expected to भरण gaps in this table.
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the elements in सवाल were subsequently discovered.
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since been expanded and refined with the discovery or synthesis of further new तत्व and the development of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior.
सब तत्व इससे atomic numbers 1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized.
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to exist naturally, हालांकि some are found only in trace amounts and were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories.
The elements after 98 have only been synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued, with the question of how the periodic table may need to be modified to accommodate any such additions being a matter of ongoing debate.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring elements have also been produced in laboratories.
Minecraft is a sandbox indie game originally created by Swedish programmer Markus `` Notch '' Persson and later developed और published by Mojang.
It was publicly released for the PC on May 17, 2009, as a developmental alpha version and, after gradual updates, was published as a full release version on November 18, 2011.
A version for Android was released a month earlier on October 7, and an iOS version थी released on November 17, 2011.
On May 9, 2012, the game was released on Xbox 360 as an Xbox Live Arcade game, co-developed by 4J Studios.
All versions of Minecraft receive periodic updates.
The creative और building पहलुओं of Minecraft allow players to निर्माण constructions आउट of textured cubes in a 3D procedurally generated world.
Other activities in the game include exploration, महफ़िल resources, crafting and combat.
Gameplay in its वाणिज्यिक release has दो principal modes : survival, which requires खिलाड़ी to acquire resources and maintain their health and hunger ; and creative, where players have an unlimited सप्लाई of resources, the ability to fly, and no health or hunger.
A third gameplay mode named hardcore is the same as अस्तित्व, differing only in difficulty ; it is set to hardest setting और respawning is disabled, forcing players to delete their worlds upon मौत.
Minecraft received five awards from the 2011 Game डेवलपर Conference : it was awarded the Innovation Award, Best Downloadable Game Award, and the Best Debut Game Award from the Game Developers Choice Awards ; and the दर्शक Award, as well as the Seumas McNally Grand Prize, from the Independent Games पर्व in 2011.
In 2012, minecraft was awarded a Golden Joystick Award in the category Best Downloadable खेल.
As of April 8, 2013, the game has sold over 10 million copies on pc and as of January 22, 2013, over 20 million copies across all platforms.
The Dark Knight is a 2008 British-American superhero film directed, produced, and co-written by Christopher Nolan.
Based on the dc Comics character Batman, the फिल्मी is the second part of Nolan 's Batman film series and a sequel to 2005 's Batman Begins.
ईसाई Bale reprises the lead role of Bruce Wayne/Batman, with a returning cast of Michael Caine as Alfred Pennyworth, Gary Oldman as James गॉर्डन और Morgan Freeman as Lucius Fox.
The film introduces the character of Harvey Dent ( Aaron Eckhart ), Gotham 's newly elected District Attorney and the consort of Bruce Wayne 's childhood friend Rachel Dawes ( Maggie Gyllenhaal ), who joins बैटमैन and the police in combating the नई rising threat of a criminal mastermind calling himself `` The Joker `` ( Heath Ledger ).
Nolan 's inspiration for the film थी the Joker 's comic book debut in 1940, the 1988 graphic novel, और the 1996 series, which retold Two-Face 's origin.
The nickname `` the Dark Knight '' was first applied to Batman in बैटमैन No. 1 ( 1940 ), in a story written by Bill Finger.
The Dark Knight was filmed primarily in Chicago, as खूब as in several other locations in the संयुक्त States, the United Kingdom, और Hong Kong.
Nolan used an IMAX camera to film some sequences, including the Joker 's first रूप in the film.
On January 22, 2008, some months after he had completed filming on The Dark Knight and six months before the film 's release, Heath Ledger died from a toxic combination of नुस्खा drugs, leading to intense attention from the press and movie-going public.
Warner Bros. had initially created a वाइरल marketing campaign for The Dark Knight, developing promotional websites and trailers highlighting screen shots of लेजर as the Joker, but after Ledger 's death, the studio refocused its promotional campaign.
The अंधेरा Knight was released on जुलाई 16, 2008 in Australia, on July 18, 2008 in North America, and on July 24, 2008 in the संयुक्त Kingdom.
Considered one of the best films of the 2000s and one of the best superhero films ever made, the film received highly positive reviews and नियत numerous records during its theatrical run.
With over $ 1 billion in revenue worldwide, it is the 14th-highest-grossing film of all time, unadjusted for inflation.
The film received eight Academy Award nominations ; it won the award for Best Sound Editing and Ledger was posthumously awarded Best Supporting Actor.
The अंधेरा Knight Rises, the final part of the trilogy, was released on July 20, 2012.
The timeline of radio lists within the history of radio, the technology and events that उत्पादित instruments that use radio waves and activities that people undertook.
Later, the history is वर्चस्व by programming and contents, which is closer to सामान्य history.
The Sydney ओपेरा House is a multi-venue performing arts centre in नई South Wales, Australia.
it थी conceived and largely built by Danish architect Jørn utzon, opening in 1973 after a long gestation that began with his competition-winning design in 1957.
Joseph काहिल 's New South Wales Government gave the go-ahead for work to begin in 1958.
The government 's bold decision to select Utzon 's design is often overshadowed by the scandal that followed.
It is on Bennelong पाइंट in Sydney Harbour, close to the Sydney Harbour Bridge.
It sits at the northeastern टिप of the Sydney सेंट्रल कारोबार district ( the सीबीडी ), surrounded on three sides by the harbour ( Sydney Cove and Farm कोव ) and inland by the Royal Botanic Gardens.
Contrary to its name, it houses अनेक performance venues.
It is among the busiest performing कला centres in the world, hosting over 1,500 प्रदर्शन each year attended by some 1.2 million लोगों.
it provides a venue लिये many performing-arts companies, including the four key resident companies ओपेरा Australia, The Australian बैले, the Sydney Theatre Company and the Sydney Symphony Orchestra, and presents a चौड़ी range of productions on its own account.
it is also one of the most popular visitor attractions in Australia, with more than seven million people visiting each year, 300,000 of whom take a guided tour.
It is administered by the Sydney Opera House Trust, under the New South Wales Ministry of the Arts.
On 28 June 2007, it was made a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
It is one of the 20th century 's most distinctive buildings and one of the most famous performing arts centres in the world.
A graph of body mass index as a function of body mass and body height is shown ऊपर.
The dashed lines represent subdivisions within a major class.
For instance the `` Underweight '' वर्गीकरण is further divided into `` severe '', `` moderate '', and `` mild '' subclasses.
The body mass index ( BMI ), or Quetelet index, is a measure for इंसान देह shape based on an individual 's weight और height.
It was devised between 1830 और 1850 by the Belgian polymath Adolphe Quetelet during the course of developing `` social physics ''.
देह द्रव्यमान index is defined as the individual 's body mass divided by the square of their height.
The formulae universally used in medicine produce a unit of measure of kg/m2.
BMI can also be संकल्पित using a बीएमआई chart, which displays BMI as a function of weight ( horizontal axis ) and height ( लंबवत axis ) using contour lines for different मान of BMI or colors for different BMI categories.
† The फ़ैक्टर for UK/US units is more precisely 703.06957964, but that level of precision is not meaningful for this गणना.
To work from stone and pounds first multiply the stone by 14 then add the pounds to give the पूरे mass in pounds ; to work from feet और इंच first multiply the feet by 12 तब add the inches to give the whole height in inches.
Thomas Paine ( January 29, 1737 ( NS February 9, 1737 ) – June 8, 1809 ) was an english-american political activist, author, political theorist and revolutionary.
As the author of two highly influential pamphlets at the start of the अमरीकी Revolution, he inspired the देशप्रेमी in 1776 to declare independence from Britain.
His ideas reflected Enlightenment era rhetoric of transnational human rights.
He has been called `` a corsetmaker by trade, a journalist by profession, and a propagandist by inclination. ''
Born in Thetford, इंग्लैण्ड, in the काउंटी of Norfolk, Paine emigrated to the British American colonies in 1774 with the सहायता of Benjamin Franklin और he arrived in time to participate in the American Revolution.
His principal contributions were the powerful, widely read pamphlet Common Sense ( 1776 ), the all-time best-selling American book कि advocated colonial America 's independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain, and The American Crisis ( 1776–83 ), a pro-revolutionary pamphlet series.
आम Sense was so influential that John Adams said, `` Without the pen of the author of Common Sense, the तलवार of Washington would have been raised in vain.”
Paine lived in France for सबसे of the 1790s, becoming deeply involved in the French Revolution.
He wrote the Rights of Man ( 1791 ), in part a defence of the French Revolution against its critics.
His attacks on British writer Edmund Burke led to a trial and conviction in absentia in 1792 for the crime of seditious libel.
In 1792, despite not being able to speak French, he was निर्वाचित to the French नेशनल Convention.
The Girondists regarded him as an ally.
Consequently, the Montagnards, especially Robespierre, regarded him as an enemy.
In दिसम्बर 1793, he was गिरफ्तार and imprisoned in Paris, then released in 1794.
He became बदनाम because of the Age of Reason ( 1793–94 ), his book that advocates deism, promotes reason और freethinking, and argues against institutionalized धर्म in general and Christian doctrine in particular.
He also wrote the pamphlet Agrarian Justice ( 1795 ), discussing the origins of property, and introduced the concept of a गारंटी minimum income.
In 1802, he returned to America where he died on June 8, 1809.
Only छह people attended his funeral as he had been ostracized लिये his ridicule of Christianity.
Clinical trials are sets of tests in medical research and drug development that generate सुरक्षा and efficacy data ( or more specifically, सूचना about adverse drug reactions and adverse effects of other treatments ) for health interventions ( e.g., drugs, diagnostics, डिवाइस, therapy protocols ).
वे are conducted only after satisfactory information has been gathered on the quality of the non clinical safety, and health authority/ethics कमेटी approval is granted in the country where approval of the ड्रग or device is sought.
Previously, many emerging countries did not require local trials for product approvals.
Now, though emerging countries still accept data from U.S./Europe, they also require some local ट्रायल.
Depending on the type of product and the stage of its development, जांचकर्ताओं initially enroll volunteers and/or patients into small pilot studies, and subsequently conduct larger scale studies in patients that प्रायः compare the new product with others already approved for the affliction of interest.
As धनात्मक सुरक्षा and efficacy data are gathered, the number of patients is typically increased.
Clinical trials can vary in size, and can involve a सिंगल research एंटिटी in one country or many such entities in multiple countries.
A पूरा series of trials may incur sizable costs, and the burden of paying for all the necessary people और services is usually borne by the प्रायोजक, जिससे may be a governmental organization or a pharmaceutical, biotechnology or medical यंत्र company.
When the diversity of required support roles exceeds the resources of the प्रायोजक, a clinical trial is managed by an outsourced संगी, such as a contract research organization or a clinical trials unit in the academic sector.
The ग्रीन Bay पैकर्स are an American football team based in Green Bay, विस्कॉन्सिन.
वे are members of the North Division of the National Football Conference ( NFC ) in the National Football League ( एनएफएल ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest franchise in the NFL, having been organized and playing in 1919.
The Packers are the only non-profit, community-owned major league पेशेवर sports team in the United States.
The Packers are the last vestige of `` छोटी कस्बा teams '' कि were once common in the NFL during the 1920s और 1930s.
संस्थापित in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and George Whitney Calhoun, the Green Bay Packers can trace their lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green खाड़ी dating back to 1896.
In 1919 और 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional football team against क्लब इससे around Wisconsin and the Midwest.
They joined the American पेशेवर Football Association ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to what is known today as the National Football League ( NFL ).
Although Green Bay is the last NFL `` small town '' team, its local fan base and media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( अधिक than any अन्य team in the NFL ), including nine NFL championships prior to the Super Bowl era and four Super कटोरी victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ), 1968 ( Super Bowl II ), 1997 ( Super कटोरी XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
The Packers have long-standing, bitter rivalries साथ their NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central ) opponents, the Chicago Bears, Minnesota Vikings and the डेट्रॉयट Lions.
The Bears-Packers फंसने is one of the oldest rivalries in NFL history, dating back to 1921.
Ethanol fuel is ethanol ( ethyl alcohol ), the same type of alcohol found in alcoholic beverages.
It is most often used as a motor fuel, mainly as a biofuel additive for gasoline.
World ethanol production for transport fuel tripled between 2000 and 2007 इससे 17 billion to more than 52 billion liters.
From 2007 to 2008, the share of ethanol in वैश्विक gasoline type fuel use increased from 3.7 % to 5.4 %.
In 2011 worldwide ethanol ईंधन production reached 22.36 billion U.S. liquid gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 billion liters ), with the United States as the top निर्माता with 13.9 bg ( 52.6 billion liters ), accounting for 62.2 % of वैश्विक production, followed by Brazil साथ 5.6 bg ( 21.1 अरब liters ).
Ethanol fuel रै a `` गैसोलीन गैलन equivalency `` ( GGE ) value of, which means 1.5 gallons of ethanol produce the energy of one gallon of gasoline.
Ethanol fuel is widely used in ब्राज़ील and in the United States, and together both countries were responsible लिये 87.1 % of the संसार 's इथेनॉल fuel production in 2011.
Most cars on the road today in the u.S. can चलाएं on blends of up to 10 % ethanol, and ethanol represented 10 % of the U.S. गैसोलीन fuel supply derived from domestic sources in 2011.
Since 1976 the Brazilian government रै made it mandatory to blend ethanol साथ gasoline, and चूंकि 2007 the legal blend is around 25 % ethanol and 75 % gasoline ( E25 ).
By December 2011 Brazil had a बेड़े of 14.8 million flex-fuel automobiles and light trucks and 1.5 million flex-fuel motorcycles that regularly use neat ethanol fuel ( known as E100 ).
Bioethanol is a form of बेदर्दी energy that can be produced from agricultural feedstocks.
It can be बना इससे very common crops such as sugar cane, potato, manioc and corn.
वहीँ has been considerable debate about how useful bioethanol will be in replacing gasoline.
चिंताएं about its production and use relate to increased food prices due to the large amount of arable land required for crops, as well as the उर्जा and pollution balance of the whole cycle of ethanol production, especially from corn.
Recent developments with cellulosic ethanol production and commercialization may allay some of these concerns.
Cellulosic ethanol offers promise because cellulose fibers, a major and universal घटक in plant cells walls, can be used to produce ethanol.
According to the International Energy Agency, cellulosic इथेनॉल could allow ethanol fuels to play a much bigger role in the future than previously thought.
Saab 9-3 SportCombi BioPower.
The second E85 flexifuel model introduced by Saab in the Swedish market.
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination और steps of Gavrilo princip ( image taken in 1987, before steps यहूद removed in 1992 and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, Archduke फ्रांज Ferdinand of ऑस्ट्रिया, heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian सिंहासन, and his wife, सोफी, Duchess of hohenberg, were shot dead in Sarajevo, by Gavrilo Princip, one of a group of six Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić.
The political objective of the assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-Slav provinces so they could be combined into a वृहद Serbia or a Yugoslavia.
The assassins ' motives were consistent with the movement that later became known as Young बोस्निया.
Serbian सैन्य officers stood behind the attack.
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military Intelligence Dragutin Dimitrijević, his righthand man प्रमुख Vojislav Tankosić, and Masterspy Rade Malobabić.
Major Tankosić armed the assassins with bombs and pistols and trained them.
The assassins were given access to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses and agents that Rade Malobabić used for the infiltration of weapons and operatives into austria-hungary.
The assassins, the key सदस्यों of the clandestine tunnel, and the कुंजी Serbian military षड्यंत्रकारियों who were still alive were arrested, tried, convicted and punished.
Those who were arrested in Bosnia were tried in Sarajevo in October 1914.
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges ; Serbia executed three of the top military conspirators.
Much of what is known about the assassinations comes from these two ट्रायल and related records.
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 June is highly controversial because the attack led to the outbreak of World War I one month later.
Renée Kathleen Zellweger ( born April 25, 1969 ) is an American अभिनेत्री and producer.
Zellweger first gained widespread attention for her role in the film Jerry Maguire ( 1996 ), और subsequently received two nominations for the Academy Award for Best Actress for her roles as Bridget Jones in the comedy ब्रिजेट Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ), and as Roxie Hart in the musical Chicago ( 2002 ).
She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the drama Cold Mountain ( 2003 ).
She has won an Academy Award, तीन Golden Globe Awards, three Screen Actors Guild Awards, and a BAFTA Award ; was named Hasty Pudding 's Woman of the Year in 2009 ; and established herself as one of the highest-paid Hollywood actresses as of 2007.
The ossicles ( also called auditory ossicles ) are the three smallest bones in the human body, the malleus, the incus and the stapes.
They are contained within the middle ear space and serve to transmit sounds from the air to the fluid-filled labyrinth ( cochlea ).
The absence of the auditory ossicles would constitute a moderate-to-severe hearing loss.
The term `` ossicles '' literally means `` tiny bones '' and commonly refers to the auditory ossicles, though the term may refer to any small bone throughout the body.
The New Covenant ( Hebrew • • — Greek • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical interpretation originally derived from a phrase in the Book of Jeremiah, in the Hebrew Scriptures.
it is often thought of as an eschatological Messianic Age or world to आइये and is सम्बन्धित to the biblical concept of the Kingdom of God.
Generally, Christians believe that the नई Covenant was instituted at the Last भोजन as part of the Eucharist, which in the Gospel of John शामिल the New Commandment.
There हैं several Christian eschatologies that further define the New Covenant, as an example an inaugurated eschatology defines and describes the New Covenant as an ongoing relationship between Christian believers and God that will be in full fruition after the Second Coming of Christ ; that is, it will not only be in full fruition in believing hearts, but in the future external world as well.
The connection between the रक्त of Christ and the New Covenant is seen in most modern English translations of the New Testament with the saying : `` this cup that is poured out for you is the new वचन in my blood ''.
Christians believe कि Jesus is the mediator of the New Covenant, and that the Blood of मसीह shed at his crucifixion is the required blood of the covenant.
As साथ all covenants between God and man described in the बाइबल, the New Covenant is considered `` a bond in blood sovereignly administered by God. ''
It has been theorized that the New Covenant is the Law of Christ as spoken दौरान his Sermon on the Mount.
The following List of people pardoned or granted clemency by the President of the United States documents the सबसे prominent cases of each presidency.
As granted by the Constitution ( Article II, Section 2, clause 1 ), Presidents have the power to grant clemency in one or more of the following ways : the ability to grant a full pardon, to commute a sentence, or to rescind a fine.
U.S. Presidents have no power to grant clemency for crimes prosecuted under state law.
as to the difference between a pardon and a commutation:
A pardon is an executive order vacating a conviction.
A commutation is the mitigation of the sentence of someone currently serving a sentence for a crime pursuant to a conviction, without vacating the conviction itself.
Approximately 20,000 pardons and clemencies were issued by u.S. presidents in the 20th century अलोन.
The records of acts of दया were public until 1934.
In 1981 the Office of the Pardon Attorney was निर्मित और records from President H. W. Bush forward are now सूचीबद्ध.
This list includes pardons and commutations.
Tampa ( ) is a city in the U.S. state of Florida.
It serves as the county seat for Hillsborough County and is located on the वेस्ट coast of Florida, on Tampa Bay near the Gulf of Mexico.
The population of Tampa in 2011 was 346,037.
The current स्थान of Tampa थी once inhabited by indigenous peoples of the Safety Harbor culture, most notably the Tocobaga and the pohoy, who lived along the shores of Tampa Bay.
It was briefly explored by स्पेनी explorers in the early 16th century, but there were no permanent American or European settlements within today 's city limits until after the संयुक्त States had acquired Florida from Spain in 1819.
In 1824, the United राज्य Army established a frontier चौकी called Fort Brooke at the mouth of the Hillsborough River, near the site of today 's tampa Convention Center.
The first civilian residents were pioneers who settled near the fort for protection from the nearby Seminole population.
The town grew slowly until the 1880s, when railroad links, the discovery of फास्फेट, and the arrival of the सिगार industry jump-started Tampa 's development and helped it to grow into an important city by the जल्दी 1900s.
Today, Tampa is a part of the metropolitan area सबसे commonly referred to as the Tampa Bay Area.
लिये U.S. Census purposes, Tampa is part of the tampa-st. Petersburg-Clearwater, Florida Metropolitan Statistical Area.
The four-county area is composed of roughly 2.7 million residents, बनाना it the second largest metropolitan statistical area ( MSA ) in the state, and the fourth largest in the Southeastern संयुक्त States, behind Miami, Washington, D.C., and Atlanta.
The Greater Tampa खाड़ी area has just over 4 million residents and generally includes the Tampa and Sarasota metro areas.
The Tampa Bay Partnership and U.S. Census data showed an average annual growth of 2.47 percent, or a gain of लगभग 97,000 residents per year.
Between 2000 and 2006, the Greater Tampa Bay मार्केट experienced a संयुक्त growth rate of 14.8 percent, growing from 3.4 million to 3.9 million and hitting the 4 million people mark on April 1, 2007.
A 2012 estimate shows the Tampa Bay area population to have 4,310,524 people and a 2017 projection of 4,536,854 people.
Tampa has a number of sports teams, such as the Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the National Football League, the Tampa Bay Lightning of the National Hockey लीग, and the Tampa Bay Storm of the Arena फ़ुटबॉल League.
The Tampa Bay Rays in Major League बेसबॉल and the Tampa Bay Rowdies of the North American Soccer League play their home games in neighboring st. Petersburg, Florida.
in 2008, Tampa was ranked as the 5th best outdoor city by Forbes.
A 2004 survey by the NYU newspaper वॉशिंगटन वर्गाकार News ranked Tampa as a top city for `` twenty-somethings. ''
Tampa is now ranked as a `` गामा '' world city by Loughborough University.
According to Loughborough, Tampa ranks alongside other world cities such as Phoenix, Santo Domingo, और Osaka.
In recent years Tampa has seen a notable upsurge in high-market demand from consumers, signaling more wealth concentrated in the area.
Tampa hosted the 2012 Republican नेशनल Convention.
The Chevrolet cavalier was a compact automobile produced from 1982 to 2005 by General मोटर्स.
Built on the company 's J platform, the Cavalier produced the highest sales in 1984.
AT & T Mobility LLC branded and referred to as AT & T ( formerly Cingular Wireless LLC ), is a wholly owned subsidiary of AT & T Inc. that provides wireless services to 107 million subscribers in the United States, including प्यूर्टो Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands.
at & T Mobility is the second largest wireless telecommunications provider in the United States and Puerto Rico, behind Verizon Wireless, which serves 115.78 million customers as of the fourth quarter of 2012.
AT & T Mobility is headquartered in the lenox Park area of DeKalb Co. Georgia, just outside Atlanta.
Originally Cingular Wireless LLC from 2000 to 2007, a joint venture between SBC Communications और BellSouth, the company acquired the बूढ़ा AT & T Wireless in 2004 ; SBC बाद acquired the असली AT & T and re-branded as `` AT & t ''.
Cingular became wholly owned by AT & T in December 2006 as a परिणाम of AT & T 's acquisition of BellSouth.
In January 2007, Cingular confirmed it would re-brand itself under the at & T name.
Although the legal corporate name change occurred immediately, for both regulatory and brand-awareness reasons दोनो brands were used in the company 's signage and advertising during a transition period.
The परिवर्तन concluded in late June, just prior to the rollout of the Apple iPhone.
On March 20, 2011, AT & T Mobility announced its intention to acquire T-Mobile USA from Deutsche telekom for $ 39 billion.
If it had received government and नियामक approval, AT & T would have had अधिक than 130 million subscribers.
However, the U.S. Department of Justice, the Federal Communications Commission, and AT & T Mobility 's competitors ( such as Sprint Nextel ) opposed the move on the grounds that it would reduce competition in the सेल्यूलर communications market.
In December 2011, in the face of both governmental और फैली उपभोक्ता opposition, AT & t withdrew their offer to complete the merger.
Martin Luther King, Jr. ( January 15, 1929 – April 4, 1968 ) was an अमरीकी clergyman, activist, and leader in the African-American Civil Rights Movement.
he is best known for his role in the उन्नति of सिविल rights using nonviolent civil disobedience.
King रै become a नेशनल icon in the history of American progressivism.
A Baptist minister, King became a civil rights activist early in his career.
He led the 1955 Montgomery Bus Boycott and helped found the Southern Christian Leadership Conference ( SCLC ) in 1957, serving as its first president.
With the SCLC, King led an unsuccessful struggle against segregation in Albany, Georgia, in 1962, and organized nonviolent protests in Birmingham, Alabama, कि attracted national ध्यान following television न्यूज coverage of the brutal police response.
King also helped to organize the 1963 March on Washington, where he delivered his `` I have a Dream `` speech.
There, he स्थापित his reputation as one of the greatest orators in American history.
He also स्थापित his प्रतिष्ठा as a radical, and became an object of the Federal Bureau of Investigation 's COINTELPRO for the rest of his life.
FBI agents investigated उसे for possible communist ties, recorded his extramarital liaisons and reported on them to government officials, and on one occasion, mailed King a threatening anonymous letter that he interpreted as an attempt to make him commit suicide.
on October 14, 1964, King received the Nobel Peace पुरस्कार for combating racial inequality through nonviolence.
In 1965, he and the SCLC helped to organize the Selma to Montgomery marches and the following year, he took the movement north to शिकागो.
In the final years of his life, King expanded his फ़ोकस to include poverty and the Vietnam War, alienating many of his उदार allies साथ a 1967 speech titled `` परे Vietnam ''.
King was नियोजन a national occupation of Washington, D.C., called the ग़रीब People 's Campaign.
King was assassinated on April 4, 1968, in Memphis, Tennessee.
His death was followed by riots in अनेक U.S. cities.
Allegations that James Earl Ray, the man convicted of killing King, had been framed or acted in concert साथ government agents persisted for decades after the shooting, and the jury of a 1999 civil trial found Loyd Jowers to be complicit in a conspiracy against King.
किंग was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom and the Congressional Gold पदक posthumously.
Martin Luther किंग, Jr. Day was established as a U.S. federal holiday in 1986.
Hundreds of streets in the U.S. have been renamed in उसके honor.
A मेमोरियल statue on the National Mall was खोली to the public in 2011.
The बाघ ( Panthera tigris ) is the largest cat प्रजाति, reaching a total body लंबाई of up to and weighing up to.
it is the third largest land carnivore ( behind only the polar भालू and the brown bear ).
Its most recognizable feature is a pattern of dark vertical stripes on reddish-orange fur with a lighter underside.
It has exceptionally stout teeth, and the canines are the longest among living felids with a crown height of as much as or even.
In zoos, टाइगर्स have lived for 20 to 26 years, which also seems to be their longevity in the wild.
They are territorial and generally एकान्त but social animals, often requiring large contiguous क्षेत्रों of आवास that support their prey requirements.
This, coupled with the fact that they are स्वदेशी to some of the more densely populated places on Earth, has caused significant conflicts with humans.
Tigers once ranged widely आरपार Asia, from Turkey in the west to the eastern coast of रूस.
over the पास्ट 100 years, they have lost 93 % of उनके historic range, and have been extirpated from southwest और central Asia, from the islands of Java and Bali, and from विशाल areas of Southeast and Eastern Asia.
Today, they range from the Siberian ताइगा to open grasslands and tropical mangrove swamps.
The remaining six tiger subspecies have been classified as endangered by IUCN.
The global population in the wild is estimated to number between 3,062 and 3,948 individuals, down from around 100,000 at the start of the 20th सदी, with most remaining populations occurring in small pockets isolated from each other.
Major reasons for population decline include habitat destruction, habitat fragmentation and poaching.
The extent of area occupied by tigers is estimated at less than, a 41 % decline from the area estimated in the mid-1990s.
Tigers are among the most recognisable and popular of the world 's charismatic megafauna.
They have featured prominently in ancient mythology and folklore, and continue to be चित्रित in modern films और साहित्य.
टाइगर्स appear on many flags, coats of arms, and as mascots for sporting teams.
The Bengal tiger is the national animal of दोनो India and Bangladesh.

Overview of the calvin cycle and carbon fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are chemical reactions कि convert carbon dioxide and other यौगिकों into glucose.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled area of a chloroplast outside of the thylakoid membranes.
These प्रतिक्रियाएँ take the light-dependent reactions and perform further chemical processes on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the Calvin cycle : carbon fixation, reduction reactions, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its name, this process occurs only when light is available.
Plants do not carry out the Calvin cycle by night.
They, instead, release sucrose into the phloem from their starch reserves.
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation, C4 carbon fixation, and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in their vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work.
A linen handkerchief with pulled thread embroidery around the edges
Linen cloth recovered from Qumran Cave 1 near the Dead Sea.
Linen ( ) is a textile made from the fibers of the flax plant, Linum usitatissimum.
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture, but when it is made into garments, it is valued for its exceptional coolness and freshness in hot weather.
The word `` linen '' is of West Germanic origin and cognates with the Latin name for the flax plant linum, and the earlier Greek λινόν ( linon ).
This शब्द history has given rise to a number of अन्य terms in English, the most notable of which is the English word line, derived इससे the use of a linen ( flax ) thread to determine a straight line.
Textiles in a linen weave texture, even when made of cotton, hemp and other non-flax मछली are also loosely referred to as `` linen ''.
Such fabrics generally have their own specific names other than linen ; for example, fine cotton yarn in a linen-style weave is पुकारा Madapolam.
The collective term `` linens `` is स्टिल often used generically to describe a class of woven and even knitted bed, bath, table and kitchen textiles.
The name linens is retained because traditionally, linen was used for अनेक of these items.
In the past, the word `` linens '' was also used to mean lightweight undergarments such as shirts, chemises, waistshirts, lingerie ( a word भी cognate with linen ), and detachable कमीज़ collars and cuffs, जिससे were historically made almost exclusively out of linen.
The inside cloth layer of fine composite clothing garments ( as लिये example jackets ) was traditionally बना of linen, and इस is the origin of the word lining.
Linen textiles appear to be some of the oldest in the world : their history goes back many हज़ारों of years.
fragments of स्ट्रॉ, seeds, fibers, yarns, and various types of fabrics which date back to about 8000 BC have been found in स्विस lake dwellings.
dyed flax fibers found in a prehistoric cave in Georgia suggest the use of woven linen fabrics from wild flax may तिथि back even पहले to 36,000 BP.
Linen was sometimes used as currency in ancient Egypt.
Egyptian mummies यहूद लपेटा in linen because it was seen as a symbol of लाइट and purity, and as a display of wealth.
Some of these fabrics, woven from hand spun yarns, were very fine for their day, but are coarse compared to modern linen.
Today, linen is usually an expensive textile, and is produced in relatively small quantities.
It has a long `` staple '' ( individual fiber length ) सापेक्ष to cotton and other natural fibers.
Many products are made of linen : aprons, bags, towels ( swimmers, bath, beach, body और wash तौलिये ), napkins, bed linens, linen tablecloths, runners, chair covers, और men 's & women 's wear.
The FIFA World Cup, often simply the World Cup, is an अंतरराष्ट्रीय association football competition contested by the senior men 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football संघ ( FIFA ), the sport 's वैश्विक governing body.
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural tournament in 1930, except in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World War.
The current champions are स्पेन, who won the 2010 tournament.
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues within the host nation ( s ) over a काल of about a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding three years, is used to determine जिससे टीमों qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ).
the 19 World Cup tournaments have been won by eight different national टीमों.
Brazil have won five times, and वे are the only team to have played in every tournament.
The other World Cup winners are Italy, with four titles ; जर्मनी, with three शीर्षक ; Argentina and inaugural winners उरुग्वे, with two titles each ; और England, फ़्रांस, और Spain, with one title each.
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an estimated 715.1 million people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
The next three World Cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014, Russia in 2018, and क़तर in 2022.
The is an expansion device for the Wii Remote video game controller for the Wii that allows it to अधिक accurately capture complex motion.
According to Nintendo, the sensor in the device supplements the accelerometer and Sensor बार capabilities of the Wii Remote to enable actions to be rendered identically on the screen in real time.
The वी 's successor console, the Wii U, supports the Wii MotionPlus and its peripherals in games where use of its touchscreen-built-in primary controller is not necessary.
Majulah Singapura ( Onward Singapore ) is the नेशनल anthem of Singapore.
Composed by Zubir Said in 1958 as a theme song लिये official functions of the City Council of Singapore, the song was selected in 1959 as the island 's anthem when it attained self-government.
Upon full independence in 1965, Majulah singapura was formally adopted as Singapore 's national anthem.
By law the anthem may तभी be sung with its original Malay lyrics, although वहीँ exist authorized translations of the lyrics of the anthem in Singapore 's three other official languages : अंग्रेज़ी, Mandarin and Tamil.
Originally रचित in the कुंजी of G major, in 2001 the नेशनल anthem was officially relaunched in the lower key of F major as इस was said to allow for a `` grander and more inspiring arrangement ''.
The national anthem is regularly performed or sung in schools and armed forces camps at ceremonies held at the शुरूआत and/or the end of each day, during which the national flag is also raised और lowered and the national pledge is taken.
Singaporeans हैं especially encouraged to sing the national anthem on occasions of नेशनल जश्न or national significance such as at the National Day Parade, at National Day observance ceremonies conducted by educational institutions और government departments, and at sporting events at which Singapore teams are participating.
An expedition 's shipwrights building a brigantine, 1541.
Shipbuilding is the construction of ships and floating vessels.
It normally takes place in a specialized facility known as a shipyard.
Shipbuilders, also called shipwrights, follow a specialized occupation कि traces its roots to पहले recorded history.
Shipbuilding and ship repairs, both वाणिज्यिक and military, are referred to as `` naval engineering ''.
The construction of boats is a similar activity called boat building.
The dismantling of ships is called जलयान breaking.
Wakonda is a town in Clay County, South Dakota, United States.
The population थी 321 at the 2010 census.
The following is a list of the most populous incorporated places of the United States of अमेरिका.
As defined by the संयुक्त States Census Bureau, an `` incorporated place `` includes a variety of designations, including city, town, village, borough, and municipality.
A few exceptional Census Designated Places ( CDPs ) are also included in the Census Bureau 's listing of incorporated places.
Consolidated city-counties represent a distinct type of government that includes the entire population of a county, or county equivalent.
Some consolidated city-counties, however, include multiple incorporated places.
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such consolidated city-counties कि हैं नहीं a part of another incorporated place.
नोट that this list refers only to the population of individual municipalities within their defined limits, which does not include other municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations.
A different ranking is evident when considering U.S. metropolitan area populations.

Nintendo DS storage devices are devices used to store a licensed developer 's work-in-progress बिंब, homebrew video games and downloaded commercial games ( since the निन्टेंडो DS is not sold with a rewritable storage medium ).
Licensed developers, however, can use a ब्लू Intelligent Systems Nitro Emulator box to flash cards.
ये devices are also known as `` flashcarts '' or `` flashcards ''.
There are two main classes of flashcarts : older devices which अनुरूप in Slot-2 ( the Game Boy Advance Game Pak slot ) and newer devices that fit in Slot-1 ( the DS Game Card स्लॉट ).
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) devices have महरूम historically cheaper due to economies of scale ( inherited from their use with खेल Boy Advance ), but require a booting tool in Slot-1 in order to use the touch screen and other DS features.
Second-generation डिवाइस ( those which only use Slot-1 ) do not work with GBA homebrew, but became less expensive and easier to use, rivaling many Slot-2 devices in price.
First-generation devices include GBA flash कारतूस, GBAMP CF, SuperCard, and M3.
Second-generation devices include R4 Revolution, CycloDS, G6 Real and ds-x.
The storage यंत्र either contains flash memory or a slot for a memory कार्ड to store homebrew.
Storage डिवाइस with a memory-card slot usually have more storage क्षमता than flash-memory devices.
Although flash-memory capacity is usually measured in megabits ( Mb ), memory-card capacity is usually measured in megabytes ( mb ) ( where 8 Mb is 1 MB ).
Storage-device brands differ in their support for homebrew ; DS and Game Boy Advance ROMs ; special features ( such as ability to play media files ) ; physical size and cost.
Strictly speaking, a storage device is नहीं necessary for ds with FlashMe installed because homebrew can be sent to the DS using WMB.
However, this is not an easily-portable method because the DS needs to be within range of a suitable Wi-Fi card.
are American people of Japanese heritage.
Japanese Americans have historically been among the तीन largest एशियाई American communities, but in recent decades, it has become the sixth largest group at roughly 1,304,286, including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity.
In the 2010 census, the largest Japanese American communities were found in California with 272,528, Hawaii with 185,502, New यॉर्क with 37,780, Washington with 35,008, and Illinois with 17,542.
Southern California has the largest Japanese-American population in North America.

This is a comprehensive listing which highlights significant उपलब्धियाँ and milestones आधारित upon Billboard magazine 's singles charts, most notably the Billboard Hot 100.
This list spans from the issue दिनाँक January 1, 1955 to present.
The Billboard Hot 100 began with the issue dated August 4, 1958, and is फिलहाल the standard popular music chart in the United States.
Prior to the सृष्टि of the Hot 100, Billboard published four singles charts : `` Best Sellers in Stores '', `` सबसे Played by Jockeys '', `` Most Played in Jukeboxes '' and `` The Top 100 ''.
These charts, which ranged from 20 to 100 slots, were phased out at different times between 1957 and 1958.
Though technically not part of the Hot 100 chart history, their data is included for computational purposes, and to avoid unenlightening or misleading characterizations.
All items listed below are इससे the hot 100 era, unless otherwise noted ( pre-Hot 100 charts ).
V is an American विज्ञान fiction television series that ran for दो सीज़न on ABC, from November 3, 2009 to March 15, 2011.
A remake of the 1983 miniseries created by Kenneth Johnson, the नई series chronicles the arrival on Earth of a technologically advanced alien species which ostensibly comes in peace, but actually has sinister motives.
V stars मुरैना Baccarin, Lourdes Benedicto, Morris Chestnut, Joel Gretsch, Logan Huffman, Charles Mesure, Elizabeth Mitchell, Laura Vandervoort and Scott Wolf, and was कार्यपालिका produced by Scott Rosenbaum, Yves Simoneau, स्कॉट Peters, and Jace Hall.
The series थी produced by The Scott Peters कम्पनी, HDFilms and Warner Bros. Television.
Geocaching is an outdoor recreational कार्यकलाप, in which the participants use a Global Positioning System ( gps ) receiver or mobile device and other navigational techniques to hide and seek containers, called `` geocaches '' or `` caches '', anywhere in the world.
A typical cache is a small waterproof container containing a logbook where the geocacher enters the date they found it और signs it with their established code नाम.
After signing into the log, the cache must be placed back exactly where the person found it.
Larger containers such as plastic storage containers ( Tupperware or similar ) or ammunition boxes can also contain items for trading, usually toys or trinkets of little value.
Geocaching shares many aspects with benchmarking, trigpointing, orienteering, treasure-hunting, letterboxing, and waymarking.
Boogie Down Productions थी a hip hop group that was originally composed of KRS-One, D-Nice, and DJ Scott La Rock.
DJ Scott La चट्टान was murdered on August 27, 1987, months after the release of BDP 's debut album, Criminal minded.
The name of the group, Boogie Down, derives from a nickname for the South Bronx section of the Bronx, one of the five boroughs of New York City.
The समूह pioneered the fusion of dancehall reggae and hip hop music and their debut LP Criminal Minded contained frank descriptions of life in the South Bronx of the लेट 1980s thus setting the stage for what would eventually become gangsta rap.
A municipal बंध is a bond issued by a लोकल government, or their agencies.
Potential issuers of municipal bonds include states, cities, counties, redevelopment agencies, special-purpose districts, school districts, पब्लिक utility districts, publicly owned airports and seaports, and any other governmental entity ( or group of सरकारें ) at or below the state level.
Municipal bonds may be सामान्य obligations of the issuer or secured by specified revenues.
In the United States, interest income received by holders of नगरपालिका bonds is often exempt from the federal आय tax and from the income tax of the state in which they are issued, although municipal bonds issued for certain purposes may not be tax exempt.
Unlike नई issue stocks that are brought to market with price restrictions until the सौदे is sold, municipal bonds are free to trade at any time once they are purchased by the investor.
Professional व्यापारियों regularly trade and retrade the same bonds several times a week.
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' is a song written by Steve Winwood, Spencer Davis and Muff Winwood, and originally performed by The Spencer Davis Group.
The मौलिक riff of the song was borrowed from the होमर Banks song `` ( Ai n't That ) a लॉट of प्रेम '', written by Banks and Willie Dean `` Deanie '' Parker.
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' was a UK # 2 in the Autumn of 1966 और a US # 7.
The song is क्रमित # 247 on the Rolling Stone magazine 's list of The 500 Greatest Songs of All Time.
the version issued in the uk ( and probably most of Europe ) is different from that issued in the us on the United कलाकारों label, being slower, and lacking the backing vocals and `` live sounding '' performance found on the US single.
( The US version has more often been used on reissue CDs, even those coming from Europe. )
The single features the sound of the Hammond b-3 organ.
The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an online database of information related to films, television programs, and video games.
This includes actors, production crew personnel, and fictional characters featured in these three visual entertainment media.
It is one of the सबसे popular online entertainment destinations, with over 100 million unique उपयोक्ता each month और a solid and rapidly growing mobile presence.
आईएमडीबी was launched on October 17, 1990, and in 1998 was acquired by Amazon.com.
As of April 27, 2013, IMDb had 2,503,783 titles ( includes episodes ) and 5,192,493 personalities in its database, as well as 43 million registered users.
The website has an Alexa rank of 48.
Fibre Channel Host Bus Adapter ( 64-bit PCI-X card )
SCSI Host Bus Adapter ( 16-bit ISA card )
In computer hardware, a host controller, host adapter, or host bus adapter ( HBA ) connects a मेजबान system ( the computer ) to अन्य network and storage devices.
The terms are primarily used to refer to devices for connecting SCSI, Fibre Channel and eSATA devices.
However, डिवाइस for connecting to IDE, Ethernet, firewire, usb and other systems may also be called मेजबान adapters.
Recently, the advent of iSCSI and Fibre Channel over Ethernet has brought about Ethernet HBAs, which are different from Ethernet nics in that they include टीसीपी Offload Engines.
There are also converged HBAs that support दोनो Ethernet and Fibre Channel called Converged Network Adapters ( CNAs ).
cashmere Scarves
Modern men 's cashmere sweaters for sale.
Cashmere wool, usually बस known as cashmere, is a fiber obtained from Cashmere goats and other types of बकरी.
The word cashmere derives from an old spelling of Kashmir.
Cashmere is fine in texture, strong, light, and soft.
Garments made from it provide excellent insulation.
In the United States, under the U.S. Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939, as amended, ( 15 Uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ), states that a wool or textile product may नहीं be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such ऊन product is the fine ( dehaired ) undercoat fibers produced by a cashmere goat ( Capra hircus laniger ) ;
the average diameter of the fiber of such wool product does not exceed 19 microns ; and
such wool product does not contain more than 3 percent ( by weight ) of cashmere fibers with average diameters that exceed 30 microns.
The average fiber diameter may be subject to a coefficient of variation around the mean that shall not exceed 24 percent.
Jennifer Convertibles Inc. is the owner और licensor of sofabed and leather specialty retail stores in the United States, with stores located throughout the Eastern seaboard, in the Midwest, on the West Coast और in the Southwest.
The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Woodbury, नई York.
On July 19, 2010, the company announced that it had filed for bankruptcy as a consequence of `` substantial losses ''.
According to Furniture Today the company was number 48 among furniture retailers साथ us $ 114 million in sales for the year ending August 29, 2009.
It subsequently emerged from Chapter 11 under the control of its major supplier, the Haining Mengnu Group.
Egg roll is a term प्रयुक्त for many अलग foods around the world.
2__Egg_roll __ Varieties of egg rolls हैं found in mainland China, many Chinese-speaking regions of Asia, and Chinese immigrant communities around the world.
Egg rolls as referred to in China.
in Guangdong and Hong Kong, egg roll usually refers to biscuit फेंकें.
इस is a type of बिस्किट.
The ingredient included egg, flour and sugar.
Egg roll also is a dish in कैण्टन and Hong Kong, this is usually made with vegetable.
Within China egg rolls are eaten predominantly in the southeast and are नहीं as commonly consumed in the north and पश्चिमी parts of China.
In American Chinese cuisine, an अंडा roll is a savory dish typically served as an appetizer.
It is usually stuffed with chicken, pork or झींगा, cabbage, carrots, tomatoes, bean sprouts and other vegetables, and then deep fried.
This variety of the egg roll is very common and popular, across even regional varieties of American Chinese food, and is often included as part of a `` combination platter ''.
In मॉन्ट्रियल, Canada, open-ended eggrolls are a Jewish-Chinese fusion dish.
They can be either kosher certified or merely kosher style.
Pain and suffering is the legal पद लिये the physical and emotional stress caused from an injury ( see also pain and suffering ).
Some damages कि might be under this श्रेणी would be : aches, temporary और स्थाई सीमाएं on activity, potential shortening of life, depression or scarring.
When filing a lawsuit as a result of an injury, it is common for किसी to seek money both in compensation for actual money that is lost और for the pain and stress associated with virtually any injury.
In a suit, पीड़ा and suffering is part of the `` सामान्य damages '' खण्ड of the claimant 's claim, or, alternatively, it is an element of `` compensatory '' non-economic damages that allows recovery for the mental anguish and/or physical pain endured by the claimant as a result of injury for which the plaintiff seeks redress.
Apart from money damages awarded in trial, money damages are also given informally outside the judicial system in mediations, arbitration ( both of which may be court annexed or non litigated claims ) as खूब as in routine insurance settlements.
Individual claimants or those represented by lawyers often present demands to insurers to settle for money.
These demand for bodily injury compensation monies often set out damages that are similarly used in the court litigated pleadings.
Demands are usually written summaries of a claimant 's चिकित्सा care and the facts which resulted in the चोट.
नमूना of a Medallion signature guarantee stampIn
the United States and Canada, a medallion signature guarantee is a special signature guarantee for the transfer of securities.
It is a guarantee by the transferring वित्तीय institution that the signature is वास्तविक and the financial संस्था accepts liability for any forgery.
Signature guarantees protect shareholders by preventing unauthorized transfers and possible investor losses.
They also limit the liability of the transfer agent who accepts the certificates.
Different institutions have different policies as to कया type of identification they require to provide the guarantee and whether they charge a fee लिये such service ( usually नाममात्र if कोई ).
Most institutions will नहीं guarantee a हस्ताक्षर of someone who has not already been their customer.
a medallion signature guarantee is not the वही as an acknowledgment by a notary पब्लिक, in the sense that a `` signature guarantee '' is a certification by the institution that the signature is authentic, and an acknowledgment is a certification by a notary public attesting that the signer signed a document voluntarily.
कुछ banks may no longer provide this service, however, many still do as well as other financial संस्थानों such as a Savings and Loans and Credit Unions.
At their sole discretion, these institutions may still decline to provide the Medallion Signature Guarantees.
When US citizens are abroad, some financial institutions may accept United States Embassy Seals, in place of the Medallion Signature Guarantee Stamp.
Pacific Electric रेल streetcars stacked at a junkyard on टर्मिनल Island, Los Angeles काउंटी, California, March 1956
The General Motors streetcar conspiracy ( also known as the Great American स्ट्रीटकार scandal ) refers to दोषारोपण and convictions in relation to a program by General Motors ( GM ) and other companies who purchased and then dismantled streetcar and electric train प्रणालियों in अनेक American cities.
Between 1936 and 1950, National City Lines and प्रशांत नगर Lines —with investment from GM, Firestone Tire, Standard Oil of California, Phillips Petroleum, Mack Trucks, and the Federal Engineering Corporation—bought over 100 electric surface-traction systems in 45 cities including Baltimore, Newark, Los Angeles, New York City, Oakland and San Diego and converted them into bus operation.
Several of the companies involved were convicted in 1949 of षड्यंत्र to monopolize interstate commerce but were acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the ownership of ये companies.
Some suggest that this कार्यक्रम निभाई a key role in the decline of public transit in cities आरपार the United States ; notably Edwin J. Quinby, जो first drew attention to the program in 1946, and then Bradford C. Snell, an anti-trust attorney for the United States Senate whose controversial 1974 testimony to a Senate inquiry brought the issue to नेशनल awareness.
Both Quinby and Snell argued that the deliberate destruction of streetcars was part of a larger strategy to push the United States into automobile dependency.
Others say that independent economic factors brought about परिवर्तन in the transit system, including the Great Depression, the Public Utility Holding Company अधिनियम of 1935, labor unrest, market forces, rapidly increasing traffic congestion, urban sprawl, taxation policies that favored private vehicle ownership, and general enthusiasm for the automobile.
One writer on the subject has suggested that Snell and others fell into simplistic षड्यंत्र theory thinking, bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` Clearly, GM waged a war on electric traction.
It was indeed an all out assault, but by no means the single reason for the विफलता of rapid पारगमन.
Also, it is just as clear that actions and inactions by government contributed significantly to the विलोपन of electric traction. ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving effective rail-based urban transport systems based on streetcars or trams, including Newark, Philadelphia, San Francisco, Pittsburgh, and Boston ; others are re-introducing them.
The स्टोरी has been explored several times in छपाई, film and other media, notably in Who Framed Roger Rabbit, Taken for a Ride and The End of Suburbia.
Corwin House, Salem, मैसाचुसेट्स, निर्मित ca. 1660, First Period English
American colonial architecture includes several building डिज़ाइन styles associated with the colonial period of the United States, including पहला Period English ( late-medieval ), French Colonial, Spanish Colonial, Dutch Colonial and Georgian.
These styles are associated with the houses, churches and सरकारी buildings of the period from about 1600 through the 19th century.
`` In the Mood '' is a big band era # 1 hit recorded by अमरीकी bandleader Glenn Miller.
It topped the charts in 1940 in the U.S. and one year later was featured in the movie Sun Valley Serenade.
in 1999, National Public Radio ( NPR ) included the 1939 Glenn मिलर recording on RCA Bluebird on the NPR 100, the list of `` The 100 most important American musical works of the 20th century ''.
NEPTUNE logo
The NEPTUNE Canada project is the world’s पहला regional-scale भाटे ocean observatory that plugs directly into the Internet.
Since December 2009, it has अनुमत people to `` surf '' the seafloor while ocean scientists चलाएं deep-water experiments from labs and universities around the world.
Along with its sister project, VENUS, NEPTUNE offers a unique approach to ocean science.
Traditionally, ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to carry out their research, while the NEPTUNE project uses a remotely operated crawler.
A gramophone record, commonly known as a phonograph record ( in American English ), vinyl record ( in reference to vinyl, the material most commonly used after about 1950 ), or colloquially, `` a record '', is an analog sound भंडार medium consisting of a flat disc with an inscribed, modulated spiral groove.
the groove usually starts near the periphery and ends near the center of the disc.
Phonograph records are generally described by their diameter in inches ( 12-inch, 10-inch, 7-inch, इत्यादि. ), the rotational speed at which वे are played ( `` 33 rpm ``, `` 78 '', `` 45 '', इत्यादि. ), their time capacity ( `` long playing '' ), उनके reproductive सटीकता, or `` वफ़ादारी `` ( `` high fidelity '', `` Orthophonic '', `` full-range '', etc. ), and the number of channels of audio provided ( `` mono ``, `` stereo ``, `` quadraphonic ``, etc. ).
Phonograph records यहूद the प्राथमिक medium used for music reproduction for most of the 20th सदी, replacing the phonograph cylinder, साथ which it had co-existed, by the 1920s.
By the late 1980s, digital media had gained a larger market share, and the vinyl record left the mainstream in 1991.
They continue to be manufactured and sold in the 21st century.
In 2008, nearly 2.9 million units shipped, the most in any year चूंकि 1998 and the format has continued to slowly regain popularity.
They are especially used by DJs and audiophiles for many types of music.
As of 2013, vinyl records continue to be used for distribution.

Grasslands are areas where the वनस्पति is dominated by grasses ( Poaceae ), however sedge ( Cyperaceae ) और rush ( Juncaceae ) परिवारों can also be found.
grasslands occur naturally on सब continents except अंटार्कटिक.
In शीतोष्ण latitudes, such as northwestern Europe and the Great Plains and California in North America, native grasslands are dominated by perennial bunch ग्रास species, whereas in warmer climates annual प्रजाति form a greater component of the vegetation.
Grasslands are found in most ecoregions of the Earth.
For example there are five terrestrial ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the temperate grasslands, savannas, and shrublands biome ( ' ecosystem ' ), जिससे is one of eight terrestrial ecozones of the Earth 's surface.
Henna ( Lawsonia inermis, also called henna tree ) or Hina is a flowering संयंत्र, the sole species in the genus Lawsonia in the family Lythraceae.
the English name `` henna '' comes from the Arabic ( ALA-LC : ḥinnāʾ / pronounced ) or colloquially, loosely pronounced.
The name is also प्रयुक्त for dye preparations derived from the plant, and for the art of temporary tattooing आधारित on those dyes.
Henna has been used चूंकि antiquity to dye skin, hair, and fingernails, as well as fabrics including Silk, wool and leather.
Additionally, the नाम is misused for other skin and hair dyes, such as black henna or neutral henna, which हैं not derived from the plant.
A thin film is a layer of सामग्री ranging from fractions of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to several micrometers in thickness.
Electronic semiconductor devices and optical coatings are the main applications benefiting from thin-film निर्माण.
A familiar अनुप्रयोग of thin films is the household mirror, which typically has a thin metal coating on the वापस of a sheet of glass to form a reflective interface.
The process of silvering was once commonly used to produce mirrors.
A very-thin-film coating ( less than a nanometer thick ) is used to produce two-way mirrors.
The performance of optical coatings ( e.g. antireflective, or AR, coatings ) हैं typically enhanced when the thin-film कोटिंग consists of multiple layers having varying thicknesses and refractive indices.
Similarly, a आवधिक structure of alternating thin films of different materials may collectively form a so-called superlattice which exploits the phenomenon of quantum confinement by restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions.
Work is being done with ferromagnetic and ferroelectric thin films for उपयोग as computer memory.
It is also being applied to pharmaceuticals, via thin-film drug delivery.
Thin-films are used to produce thin-film batteries.
Thin films are also प्रयुक्त in dye-sensitized solar कोशिकाएं.
Ceramic thin films are in wide use.
The relatively high hardness and inertness of ceramic materials make this type of thin कोटिंग of interest for सुरक्षा of substrate materials against corrosion, oxidation and wear.
In particular, the use of such coatings on cutting tools can extend the life of these items by several orders of magnitude.
Research is being done on a new class of thin-film inorganic oxide materials, called amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent oxides, which could be used to make transparent transistors that are inexpensive, stable, and environmentally benign.
Gears of War is a military science fiction third-person shooter video game developed by Epic Games and published by Microsoft Game Studios.
It was initially released as an exclusive title for the Xbox 360 in November 2005 in North अमेरिका, Australia, and most of Europe and included a `` Limited Collector 's संस्करण '' with added content and an art book titled Destroyed Beauty that detailed much of the game 's back-story.
Despite the initial कथन of Xbox 360 exclusivity, a Microsoft Windows version of the game was developed in संयोजन with People Can Fly और released a year later, featuring new सामग्री including additional campaign levels, a new multiplayer game विधि, and Games लिये Windows सजीव functionality.
The game focuses on the troops of Delta Squad as they wield a desperate, last-ditch attempt to save the remaining इंसान inhabitants of the fictional ग्रह Sera from a relentless and seemingly unstoppable subterranean enemy known as the Locust Horde.
The player assumes the role of Marcus Fenix ( लकिन can also play as Dominic सैंटियागो ), a former prisoner and war-hardened soldier.
The game is based on the use of cover and strategic fire for the खिलाड़ी to advance through the scenarios ; a दूसरी player can खेल cooperatively through the main campaign to assist.
The game also सुविधाएँ several online एकाधिक game modes for up to eight players.
Gears of War sold over three million copies in बस ten weeks and was the fastest-selling वीडियो game of 2005 as well as the second-most played game over एक्सबॉक्स Live during.
It currently स्टैंड as the 5th best selling Xbox 360 game of all time.
The game रै since बेची over five million copies by सितंबर 2008.
The game was well received by critics, who praised its gameplay and detailed visuals, and it won अनेक `` Game of the Year '' awards in 2006.
the कामयाबी of the game रै led to the development of the Gears of युद्ध franchise, including the 2008 sequel Gears of War 2 and its follow-up, Gears of War 3, which was released on September 20, 2011, after having initially महरूम नियत to have been released on April 5, 2011, the date upon which Epic Games ' चट्टान Bleszinski was a guest on Late Night with Jimmy Fallon.
Adaptations to books, comics, as well as a feature film are to be expected.
A Tree Grows in Brooklyn is a 1943 novel लिखा by Betty Smith.
The स्टोरी focuses on an Irish-American family in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, New York City.
The novel is set in the first and दूसरी decades of the 20th century.
The book was an immense success.
The main metaphor of the किताब is the hardy Tree of Heaven, देशी to China and Taiwan, अभी माना हृदयरोग, and common in the vacant lots of New York City.
World map with the intertropical zone highlighted in red.
Tropical climate zones of the Earth where all twelve months have mean temperatures above 18 °C ( 64 °F ).
the tropics is a region of the Earth surrounding the Equator.
It is limited in latitude by the Tropic of कर्कट in the northern hemisphere at approximately N and the Tropic of Capricorn in the southern hemisphere at S ; these latitudes correspond to the axial tilt of the Earth.
The tropics are also referred to as the tropical zone and the torrid zone ( see geographical zone ).
The tropics include all the areas on the Earth where the Sun reaches a point directly overhead at least once during the solar year.
The tropics are distinguished from the other climatic and biomatic regions of Earth, the middle latitudes and the polar regions on either side of the equatorial मण्डल.
