Sodium azide is the inorganic compound with the formula NaN3.
This colorless नमक is the gas-forming component in many car airbag systems.
it is used for the preparation of other azide compounds.
It is an ionic substance, is highly soluble in water, and is very acutely toxic.
Double rainbow and supernumerary rainbows on the inside of the primary arc.
The छाया of the photographer 's head on the bottom marks the केन्द्र of the rainbow circle ( antisolar point ).
A rainbow is an optical and meteorological घटना that is caused by reflection of light in जल droplets in the Earth 's atmosphere, resulting in a spectrum of light appearing in the sky.
it takes the form of a multicoloured चाप.
Rainbows caused by sunlight always appear in the section of sky directly opposite the sun.
in a `` primary rainbow '', the arc shows red on the outer part and violet on the inner side.
This rainbow is caused by light being refracted while प्रवेश a droplet of water, then reflected inside on the वापस of the droplet and refracted again when leaving it.
In a double रेनबो, a second arc is seen बाहर the primary arc, and has the अनुक्रम of its colours reversed, red facing toward the other one, in both rainbows.
इस second rainbow is caused by light reflecting twice inside water droplets.
The Conservative Party, officially the Conservative और Unionist Party and colloquially referred to as the Tory Party or the Tories, is a centre-right political party in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies of conservatism and British unionism.
it is the largest political party in the United Kingdom, होने the largest single party in the House of Commons with 303 MPs, the largest party in local government with 9,391 पार्षदों, and the largest British party in the European Parliament with 25 MEPs.
It governs in coalition with the Liberal Democrats, with party leader David Cameron as Prime मंत्री.
The Conservative Party was संस्थापित in 1834, and was one of two dominant parties in the 19th century, along with the Liberal Party.
It changed its name to the Conservative and Unionist Party in 1912 after merging साथ the Liberal Unionist Party, although that नाम is rarely used and it is generally referred to as simply the Conservative Party.
In the 1920s, the Liberal vote greatly diminished and the Labour Party became the Conservatives ' main rivals.
Conservative Prime Ministers led governments for 57 years of the 20th century, including Winston Churchill ( 1940–45, 1951–55 ) and Margaret Thatcher ( 1979–90 ).
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging economic liberalisation and saw the Conservatives become the most eurosceptic of the three major parties.
The party was returned to government in coalition, having failed to win a बहुमत, in 2010 under the more `` liberal '' leadership of David Cameron.
In the European Parliament, the conservatives are the largest British party with 25 MEPs, who sit with the soft eurosceptic European Conservatives and Reformists ( ECR ) parliamentary group, while the party itself is a member of the Alliance of European Conservatives and Reformists ( AECR ) Europarty.
They are the third-largest पार्टी in the स्कॉटिश Parliament और second-largest in the Welsh Assembly.
They were formally allied to the Ulster Unionist Party ( UUP ) as part of the ulster Conservatives and Unionists arrangement, with the UUP currently participating in the five-party Northern Ireland Executive.
Destiny 's Child was an American R & B girl group whose final, and perhaps most recognizable, line-up comprised Beyoncé Knowles, Kelly Rowland और Michelle Williams.
Formed in 1990 in Houston, Texas, Destiny 's Child members began their musical endeavors as लड़की 's Tyme comprising, among others, Knowles, rowland, LaTavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett.
After years of limited success, they were signed to Columbia Records as Destiny 's चाइल्ड.
Destiny 's Child was launched into mainstream मान्यता following the release of their best-selling दूसरी album, The Writing 's on the Wall, which contained the number-one singles `` Bills, Bills, Bills `` and `` कह My नाम ``.
Despite critical and commercial success, the group was plagued by internal विरोध and legal turmoil, as roberson and Luckett attempted to split इससे the समूह 's manager Mathew Knowles, citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland, his daughter and niece, respectively.
Both Roberson and Luckett were soon replaced with Williams and Farrah फ्रैंकलिन ; however, in 2000, Franklin थी बर्खास्त, leaving them as a trio.
Their third album, Survivor, जिससे contains themes the public interpreted as a channel to the group 's experience, contains the worldwide हिट्स `` स्वतंत्र Women ``, `` उत्तरजीवी `` and `` Bootylicious ``.
In 2002, they घोषित a hiatus and re-united two सालो later for the release of their fourth studio album, Destiny Fulfilled ( 2004 ).
Destiny 's Child has बेची more than 50 million records worldwide to तिथि.
Billboard magazine ranks the group as one of the महानतम musical trios of all time, the ninth most successful artist/band of the 2000s, और placed the group 68th in its All-Time Hot 100 Artists सूची in 2008.
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ( CDC ) is a United States federal agency under the Department of Health and Human Services headquartered in Druid Hills, unincorporated DeKalb County, Georgia, in Greater Atlanta.
It works to protect public स्वास्थ्य and safety by providing information to enhance health decisions, और it promotes health through partnerships with state health विभाग and other organizations.
The CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease prevention और control ( especially infectious diseases and foodborne pathogens and अन्य सूक्ष्मजैविक infections ), environmental health, occupational safety and health, health promotion, injury prevention and शिक्षा activities designed to improve the स्वास्थ्य of the people of the संयुक्त States.
The CDC is the United States ' national public health institute and is a founding सदस्य of the International Association of National पब्लिक Health Institutes.
Earthquake भविष्यवाणी `` is usually defined as the specification of the time, location, and परिमाण of a future earthquake within stated limits '', and विशेषकर of `` the next strong earthquake to occur in a region. ''
इस can be distinguished from earthquake forecasting, which is the probabilistic assessment of general earthquake hazard, including the frequency and magnitude of damaging earthquakes, in a given area over अवधि of years or decades.
This can be further distinguished from real-time earthquake warning systems, which, upon डिटेक्शन of a कठोर earthquake, can provide neighboring regions a few seconds चेतावनी of potentially significant shaking.
To be useful, an earthquake भविष्यवाणी must be precise enough to warrant the cost of increased precautions, including disruption of ordinary activities and commerce, and timely enough that तैयारी can be made.
Predictions must also be reliable, as false alarms and रद्द alarms are not only economically costly, but seriously undermine confidence in, and thereby the effectiveness of, any kind of warning.
With over 7,000 earthquakes around the world each year with a magnitude of 4.0 or greater, trivial कामयाबी in earthquake prediction is easily obtained using sufficiently व्यापक parameters of time, location, or परिमाण.
However, such trivial `` कामयाब predictions '' are नहीं उपयोगी.
Major earthquakes are often followed by reports that they were predicted, or at least anticipated, but no claim of a successful prediction of a major earthquake has survived close पूछताछ.
In the 1970s there was intense optimism amongst scientists कि some विधि of predicting earthquakes might be found, but by the 1990s continuing failure led many scientists to question whether it was even possible.
While many scientists still hold कि, given enough resources, भविष्यवाणी might be possible, अनेक others maintain that earthquake prediction is inherently impossible.

वो is also known for appearing in the 2008 feature film The Longshots as Edith.

Stührling Tourbillon Movement ( ).
In horology, a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an addition to the mechanics of a watch escapement.
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet इससे an earlier विचार by the English chronometer मेकर John Arnold, a tourbillon aims to counter the effects of gravity by mounting the escapement and balance wheel in a rotating पिंजरा, to negate the effect of gravity when the timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position.
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy, tourbillons are still included in some expensive modern watches as a novelty and demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity.
The mechanism is usually exposed on the watch 's face to show it off.
The Windows Installer ( previously known as Microsoft Installer ) is a software component used लिये the installation, maintenance, and removal of software on modern Microsoft Windows systems.
The installation information, and often the files themselves, are packaged in installation packages, loosely relational databases structured as COM Structured storages and commonly known as `` MSI files '', from their default file extension.
Windows Installer contains significant परिवर्तन from its predecessor, Setup API.
New features include a GUI framework और automatic generation of the uninstallation sequence.
Windows Installer is positioned as an alternative to stand-alone executable installer frameworks such as older versions of InstallShield and NSIS.
Microsoft encourages third parties to उपयोग Windows Installer as the basis for installation frameworks, so कि they synchronize correctly with अन्य installers और keep the internal database of installed products सतत.
Important features ऐसे as rollback and versioning depend on a consistent internal database for reliable operation.
Furthermore, Windows Installer facilitates the principle of least privilege by performing software installations by proxy for unprivileged users.
Four Loko is a line of alcoholic beverages, originally marketed as energy drinks, sold by Phusion Projects of Chicago, Illinois.
phusion operates as Drink Four Brewing Company.
Four Loko, the company 's most popular beverage, debuted in the United States market in 2005.
It is now sold in 48 states, and in Canada, The Bahamas, Bolivia, Honduras, and यूरोपीय.
The name `` चार '' is derived from the असली उर्जा drink 's four main ingredients : alcohol, caffeine, taurine, and guarana.
Four ब्रांडेड products have महरूम the object of legal, ethical, and health concerns related to the company allegedly marketing them to the underaged and the purported danger of combining alcohol and caffeine.
After the beverage was banned in several states, a product reintroduction in दिसम्बर 2010 removed caffeine, taurine, and guarana as ingredients, और the malt beverage is no longer marketed as an energy drink.
The neck of a guitar प्रर्दशित the nut ( in the पृष्ठभूमि, coloured white ) and first four metal frets.
A fret is a raised तत्व on the neck of a stringed instrument.
Frets usually extend across the full width of the neck.
On most modern western fretted instruments, frets are metal strips inserted into the fingerboard.
On कुछ historical instruments and non-european instruments, frets हैं made of pieces of string tied around the neck.
Frets divide the neck into फिक्स्ड खण्ड at intervals related to a musical framework.
On instruments such as guitars, each fret represents one semitone in the standard western system where one octave is विभाजित into twelve semitones.
Fret is often used as a verb, meaning simply `` to press bas the स्ट्रिंग behind a fret. ''
Fretting प्रायः refers to the frets and/or their system of placement.
There was consumption of दारू both during और after prohibition.
The 18th Amendment prohibited the production, distribution and sale of alcoholic beverages in the United States and was widely supported by the American public when it went into effect in 1920.
The temperance movement had popularized the belief that alcohol was the major cause of most निजी and सोशल problems and prohibition थी seen as the समाधान to the nation 's poverty, crime, violence, and other ills.
Upon ratification of the amendment, the famous evangelist Billy Sunday said that `` The slums will soon be only a memory.
We will turn our prisons into factories and our jails into storehouses and corncribs. ''
( Compare Christianity and alcohol. )
Since alcohol was to be banned and since it थी seen as the cause of most, if not all, crime, some communities sold their jails.
The nation was highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist in the United States Congress confidently asserted that `` There is as much chance of repealing the Eighteenth amendment as वहीँ is लिये a hummingbird to fly to the ग्रह Mars with the Washington Monument tied to its tail.”
The metre ( meter in American English ), ( SI unit symbol : m ; SI dimension symbol : L ), is the आधारभूत unit of length in the International System of Units ( SI ).
Originally intended to be one ten-millionth of the distance from the Earth 's equator to the North Pole ( at समुद्र level ), its definition रै been periodically refined to reflect growing knowledge of metrology.
Since 1983, it has महरूम defined as `` the length of the path travelled by light in vacuum during a time अंतराल of 1/299,792,458 of a second. ''
Geologists exploring Jurassic sedimentary rocks in Makhtesh gadol, Negev Desert, Israel
geologists explaining the importance of volcanic ash layers to students on field in Iceland
A geologist is a scientist who studies the solid and liquid matter that constitutes the Earth as well as the processes and history that has shaped it.
Geologists usually engage in studying geology.
Geologists, studying more of an applied science than a theoretical one, must approach Geology using physics, chemistry and जीवविज्ञान as खूब as अन्य sciences.
Geologists, compared to scientists engaged in अन्य fields, are generally more exposed to the outdoors than staying in laboratories ; although some geologists prefer to perform most of their studies in the lab.
Geologists are engaged in exploration for mining companies in search of metals, oils, and अन्य धरती resources.
They are also in the forefront of natural hazards and disasters warning and mitigation, studying earthquakes, volcanic activity, tsunamis, weather storms, and the like ; their अध्ययन are used to warn the सामान्य public of the occurrence of ये events.
Currently, geologists are also engaged in the discussion of climate बदलें, as वे study the history and evidence for this Earth process.

Modern vacuum tubes, ज़्यादातर miniature style
in electronics, a vacuum tube, electron tube ( in North America ), thermionic वाल्व, tube, or valve is a device controlling electric current through a vacuum in a sealed container.
The container is often thin transparent glass in a roughly cylindrical shape.
The simplest वैक्यूम ट्यूब, the diode, is essentially an incandescent light बल्ब with an added electrode inside.
When the bulb 's filament is heated white-hot, electrons are `` boiled '' off its surface and into the vacuum inside the bulb.
If the electrode -- called a `` plate '' or `` anode '' -- is made more positive than the hot filament, a direct current बहती through the vacuum to the electrode ( a demonstration of the Edison effect ).
As the current only flows in one direction, it makes it possible to convert an alternating current applied to the filament to direct current.
The परिचय of a third electrode, a ग्रिड between the filament and the plate, yields another function.
A voltage applied to the grid controls the current flowing from the filament to the plate.
Thus, it allows the device to be used as an electronic amplifier.
Vacuum tubes are thus प्रयुक्त for rectification, amplification, switching, or similar processing or creation of electrical signals.
The विशाल majority of modern day tubes consist of a sealed container with a vacuum inside, and essentially rely on thermionic emission of electrons from a hot filament or a cathode heated by the filament.
Some exceptions to this are dealt with in the section about gas-filled tubes below.
Vacuum tubes were critical to the development of electronic technology, which drove the expansion and commercialization of radio broadcasting, television, radar, sound reinforcement, sound रिकॉर्डिंग and reproduction, large telephone संजाल, analog and digital computers, and industrial process control.
Although some अनुप्रयोग had counterparts using earlier technologies ऐसे as the spark gap transmitter or mechanical computers, it was the invention of the vacuum tube with three electrodes ( called a triode ) and its capability of electronic amplification that made these technologies widespread and practical.
In most अनुप्रयोग, solid-state devices such as transistors और other सेमीकंडक्टर devices have replaced tubes.
solid-state devices last longer and are smaller, अधिक efficient, more reliable, और cheaper than tubes.
Tubes can be fragile, sometimes generate significant unwanted heat, and can take many seconds—many minutes in critical applications—after powering on to warm to a temperature where they perform within operational tolerance.
However, tubes still find उपयोग जहाँ solid-state devices have not been developed, are अव्यवहारिक, or where a tube रै superior performance, as with some devices in professional audio and high-power रेडियो ट्रांसमीटरों.
Tubes are still produced for such applications.
Tubes are less संभावित than semiconductor डिवाइस to be destroyed by the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक pulse produced by nuclear explosions और geomagnetic storms produced by giant solar flares.
Skittles is a brand of fruit-flavoured sweets, currently produced and marketed by the Wm. Wrigley Jr. Company, a division of Mars, Inc.
They have hard sugar shells which carry the letter S.
The inside is mainly शुगर, corn syrup, and hydrogenated palm kernel oil along with fruit रस, citric acid, and natural and artificial flavours.
The confectionery has been sold in a variety of flavour collections, such as Tropical and Wild Berry.
Sir Winston लियोनार्ड Spencer-Churchill, ( 30 November 1874 – 24 January 1965 ) was a British राजनेता who was the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955.
Widely regarded as one of the greatest wartime leaders of the 20th century, Churchill थी भी an अधिकारी in the British Army, a historian, a लेखक, and an artist.
He is the तभी British Prime Minister in इतिहास to have प्राप्त the Nobel पुरस्कार in Literature, and was also the पहला person to be made an Honorary Citizen of the United States.
Churchill was born into an aristocratic family as the grandson of the 7th Duke of Marlborough.
His father, Lord Randolph Churchill, was a charismatic politician जो served as Chancellor of the Exchequer ; his mother, Jennie Jerome, was an American socialite.
As a young army officer, he saw action in British India, The Sudan, and the Second Boer War.
He gained fame as a war correspondent and wrote किताबे about his campaigns.
At the forefront of politics for fifty years, he held many political and cabinet positions.
Before the First World War, he served as President of the Board of Trade, Home Secretary, and First Lord of the Admiralty as part of the Asquith Liberal government.
During the war, he जारी as First Lord of the admiralty until the विनाशकारी Gallipoli Campaign caused his departure from government.
He then briefly resumed active army service on the Western Front as commander of the 6th Battalion of the Royal स्कॉट्स Fusiliers.
He returned to government as Minister of Munitions, Secretary of State for War, and Secretary of State for Air.
After the War, Churchill served as Chancellor of the Exchequer in the Conservative ( Baldwin ) government of 1924–29, controversially returning the पाउंड स्टर्लिंग in 1925 to the gold standard at its pre-war parity, a move widely seen as creating deflationary pressure on the UK economy.
Also विवादास्पद was his opposition to increased home rule for India and his प्रतिरोध to the 1936 abdication of Edward VIII.
Out of office and politically `` in the wilderness '' during the 1930s, Churchill took the lead in warning about Nazi Germany and in campaigning for rearmament.
On the outbreak of the Second World War, he was again appointed First Lord of the Admiralty.
Following the resignation of Neville Chamberlain on 10 May 1940, Churchill became Prime Minister.
His steadfast refusal to consider defeat, surrender, or a compromise peace helped inspire British resistance, especially during the difficult early days of the War when Britain stood alone among यूरोपीय देशों in its active opposition to एडोल्फ Hitler.
Churchill was particularly noted for his speeches and radio broadcasts, which helped inspire the British people.
He led Britain as Prime Minister until victory over Nazi Germany had been secured.
After the Conservative Party lost the 1945 election, he became नेता of the Opposition to the Labour ( Attlee ) government.
After winning the 1951 election, he again became Prime Minister, before retiring in 1955.
Upon his death, Elizabeth ii granted him the honour of a state funeral, which देखी one of the largest assemblies of world statesmen in इतिहास.
Named the Greatest Briton of all time in a 2002 poll, Churchill is widely regarded as being among the most influential people in British history.

The घाट Focus is a compact car ( C-segment in Europe ) manufactured by the Ford Motor Company since 1998.
Ford began sales of the Focus to Europe in July 1998 and in North America during 1999 for the 2000 model year.
In यूरोपीय, South अमेरिका, उत्तर America and South Africa, the Focus replaced the various versions of the घाट Escort sold in those markets.
In Asia and Australasia, it replaced the Ford Laser.
As of the first half of 2012, the Focus surpassed the Toyota Corolla to become the world 's बेहतरीन selling automobile nameplate.
The Focus has been considered one of the 50 greatest cars of the पास्ट पचास years by British magazine car.
An agar plate -- an example of a bacterial विकास medium.
specifically, it is a streak plate ; the orange lines and dots are formed by bacterial colonies.
A growth medium or culture medium is a liquid or gel designed to support the growth of microorganisms or cells, or small plants जैसे the moss Physcomitrella patens.
There are different types of media for growing different types of cells.
वहीँ are two major types of growth मीडिया : those used for cell culture, which use specific cell types derived from plants or पशु, and microbiological culture, जिससे are used for growing microorganisms, such as bacteria or yeast.
the most common growth media for microorganisms are nutrient broths and agar plates ; specialized media are sometimes required for microorganism and cell culture growth.
Some organisms, termed fastidious organisms, require specialized environments due to complex nutritional requirements.
Viruses, for उदाहरण, are obligate intracellular परजीवी and require a growth medium containing living cells.
A talent agent, or बुकिंग agent, is a person who finds jobs for actors, authors, film directors, musicians, models, producers, professional athletes, writers and other people in various entertainment businesses.
An एजेंट also defends, supports और promotes the interest of his/her clients.
Agents can not produce their own shows due to विरोध of ब्याज.
A talent agent must be familiar with their clients.
An agent has to know what kind of work the client can and can not do in order to मैच them साथ various jobs.
Having an agent is not required, but does सहायता the artist in getting jobs.
In many cases casting निर्देशकों, or other businesses, go to talent agencies to find artists वे हैं looking for.
The agent is paid a percentage of the star 's आय ( typically 10 % ).
Agents sometimes will be referred to as `` 10 percenters. ''
There are different regulations that govern different प्रकार of एजेंटों that are established by artist 's unions और the legal jurisdiction in जिससे the agent operates.
There are also professional organizations that license talent agencies.
Since the decline in viewership in theaters, from the 1950s to 1960s, this caused a स्मारकीय shift in how studios would produce films and thus reducing the cost of exclusive and expensive actors.
Actors and actresses were working for the studios but were not owned by one major studio entity and so यहूद able to कार्य on within their time and with other studios.
क्युकी of this, agents यहूद now seen as a necessity instead of an option.
Agents now became third parties that negotiated between studios and clients, this making their services imperative between each party.
Since talent agencies हैं working with lucrative contracts, all talent agencies must be licensed under खास sections of the California Labor कोड, which calls an agent a `` person or corporation जो engages in the occupation of procuring, offering, होनहार, or attempting to procure employment for artist or कलाकारों. ''
Mars has two known moons, Phobos and Deimos, जिससे are thought to be captured asteroids.
Both satellites were discovered in 1877 by Asaph Hall and are named after the characters Phobos ( panic/fear ) and Deimos ( terror/dread ) who, in Greek mythology, accompanied their father Ares, god of war, into battle.
Ares was known as Mars to the Romans.
It is possible that Mars may have moons छोटी than 50 - 100 meters and a dust ring between Phobos and Deimos may be present but none have been discovered.
In law enforcement parlance, the term murder book refers to the case संचिका of a हत्या investigation.
Typically, murder books include crime scene photographs and sketches, autopsy and forensic reports, transcripts of investigators ' notes and witness interviews.
The murder book encapsulates the पूरा paper trail of a murder investigation, from the time the murder is first reported through the arrest of a suspect.
Law enforcement agencies typically guard हत्या books carefully, and it is unusual for civilians to be given unfettered access to these kinds of records, especially for unsolved cases.

Melon balls are balls of melon made using a melon baller that varies from around 1 centimeter to 3 सेंटीमीटर ( about 3/8 inch to 1 inch ).
They are generally used in fruit salad.
A KSA, or Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities, is a series of narrative statements that are required when applying to संयुक्त States Federal government job openings.
KSAs are used to determine, along with resumes, who the best applicants हैं when several candidates qualify for a job.
the knowledge, skills and abilities ( KSAs ) necessary for the successful performance of a position are contained on each job vacancy announcement.
In 2009 the Office of Personal Management asked संघीय agencies to stop requiring job आवेदकों to fill out the questionnaires, to be phased out within a year.
KSAs are brief and focused essays परिचय एक 's career and शैक्षणिक background that presumably qualify one to perform the कर्तव्य of the position being applied for.
A knowledge, skills, and abilities ( KSA ) is a concise essay about one 's talent and expertise and related experiences ( work, education, volunteer ) and accomplishments.
A series of KSA statements हैं usually required when applying लिये most federal government and some state and city government jobs.
KSAs are used as a गज to assess the capabilities of a prospective applicant in terms of likely ability to perform the duties of the job.
Most government hiring officials look for a short, कुरकुरे and clear KSA that emphasizes results or accomplishments obtained in previous कार्य.
KSA statements are also known as Evaluation Factors.
Other agencies sometimes call उन्हें `` Rating Factors '', `` Quality Ranking Factors '', `` Knowledge, Abilities, skills और Other Characteristics '', or `` Job Elements ''.
The name can be just a name लकिन often it influences content and length of the essay.
Every agency has its own regulations but most of the time the each KSA factor चाहिए be 1/2 to 11⁄2 pages long.
The below परिभाषाएं are defined by the U.S. Office of Personnel Management :
Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities ( KSAs ) - The attributes required to perform a job and are generally demonstrated through qualifying service, education, or training.
Knowledge - Is a body of information applied सीधे to the performance of a function.
Skill - Is an observable competence to perform a learned psychomotor act.
Ability - Is competence to perform an observable बर्ताव or a behavior that results in an observable product.
The scoring of KSA essays is based on a स्केल of from एक to 100.
Job applicants must score above 70 to be considered for the position.
High scores are derived through answering the KSA question as specifically as संभावित, providing examples from पिछला employment or training that clearly demonstrate you meet the योग्यता.
When applying to federal government positions, a Federal Resume is usually required in addition to KSA statements.

Love Always is the debut album of American R & B duo K-Ci & JoJo, released on जून 17, 1997, by MCA Records.
It was recorded at various studios in New यॉर्क and the Los Angeles area in 1996 and 1997.
It was produced by JoJo and several others, including DeVante Swing, James Mtume, और Jeff Redd.
The duo were originally a part of Jodeci before this एल्बम.
the album peaked at sixth on the US Billboard 200 and also appeared on international charts.
the single `` All My Life `` charted number एक in अनेक countries, and all four of the album 's singles peaked above the top 25 in the us Hot R & B/Hip-Hop Songs and the नई Zealand Top 40 Singles.
Love Always was received favorably by आलोचकों, who praised the brothers ' singing ability and the production.
The album has महरूम certified three times platinum by the Recording Industry Association of अमेरिका ( RIAA ) और gold by Music Canada and IFPI Sweden.
As of June 1999 it था sold 2.9 million copies in the United States.
A variable-rate mortgage, adjustable-rate mortgage ( ARM ), or tracker mortgage is a mortgage loan with the interest rate on the note periodically adjusted based on an index which reflects the cost to the lender of borrowing on the credit markets.
The loan may be offered at the lender 's standard variable rate/ base rate.
There may be a direct and legally-defined link to the underlying index, but where the lender offers no specific link to the underlying market or index the rate can be changed at the lender 's discretion.
The term `` variable-rate mortgage '' is most common outside the United States, whilst in the United States, `` adjustable-rate mortgage '' is most common, and implies a mortgage regulated by the Federal government, with caps on charges.
In many countries, adjustable rate mortgages are the norm, and in such places, may simply be referred to as mortgages.
Among the most आम indices are the rates on 1-year constant-maturity Treasury ( CMT ) securities, the Cost of Funds Index ( COFI ), and the लंदन Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ).
A few lenders use their own cost of funds as an index, rather than using अन्य indices.
इस is done to ensure a steady हाशिया लिये the lender, whose own cost of funding will usually be related to the index.
नतीजतन, payments बना by the borrower may change over time with the changing interest rate ( alternatively, the term of the loan may change ).
This is distinct from the graduated payment mortgage, which offers changing भुगतान amounts लकिन a fixed interest rate.
Other फ़ॉर्म of mortgage loan include the interest only mortgage, the fixed rate mortgage, the negative amortization mortgage, and the balloon payment mortgage.
Adjustable rates transfer part of the interest rate risk इससे the lender to the borrower.
They can be used where मनमौजी interest rates make fixed rate loans मुश्किल to obtain.
The borrower benefits if the interest rate falls but loses if the interest rate increases.
The borrower benefits इससे reduced margins to the underlying cost of borrowing compared to fixed or capped rate mortgages.
The assassination of Robert Francis `` Bobby '' Kennedy, a United States सीनेटर and brother of assassinated President John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy, took place shortly after मध्यरात्रि on June 5, 1968, in Los Angeles, California, during the campaign season for the United States अध्यक्षीय election, 1968.
After winning the California and South Dakota primary elections for the Democratic nomination for President of the United States, Kennedy was shot as he walked through the kitchen of the Ambassador Hotel and died in the Good Samaritan Hospital twenty-six hours later.
Sirhan Sirhan, a 24-year-old Palestinian / Jordanian immigrant, was convicted of Kennedy 's murder and is सेवारत a life sentence for the crime.
Sirhan 's lawyers have released statements claiming evidence that he was framed.
The shooting was recorded on ऑडियो tape by a freelance newspaper reporter, and the aftermath was captured on film.
Kennedy 's body lay in repose at St. Patrick 's गिरजाघर in New York for two days before a funeral mass was held on June 8.
His body was interred निकट his brother John at Arlington National Cemetery.
His death prompted the protection of अध्यक्षीय candidates by the United States Secret Service.
Hubert Humphrey went on to win the Democratic nomination for the presidency, लकिन ultimately narrowly lost the election to Richard निक्सन.
As with his brother Jack 's death, Bobby 's assassination and the circumstances surrounding it have spawned a variety of conspiracy theories.
As of 2013 Kennedy remains one of only two sitting United States Senators to be assassinated ( the other being Huey Long ).
The Modern Age of Comic Books is an informal name for the काल in the history of mainstream अमरीकी comic books generally considered to last इससे the mid-1980s until present day.
In this period, comic book characters generally became darker and more psychologically complex, creators became better-known and active in changing the industry, independent comics flourished, and larger प्रकाशन houses became more commercialized.
An alternate name for this period is the Dark Age of Comic Books, due to the popularity and artistic influence of grim titles, such as and Watchmen.
When Harry Met Sally... is a 1989 American romantic comedy film लिखा by Nora Ephron and directed by Rob Reiner.
It सितारों Billy Crystal as Harry and Meg Ryan as Sally.
The story follows the title characters from the समय they meet just पहले sharing a cross-country drive, through twelve years or so of chance encounters in New York City.
The film raises the question `` Can men and women ever just be मित्रों ? '' and advances many ideas about relationships that became household concepts, such as those of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person ''.
The origins of the film came from Reiner 's वापसी to single life बाद a तलाक.
An interview Ephron conducted with reiner provided the basis for Harry.
Sally was based on Ephron and कुछ of her friends.
Crystal came on फलक and made his own contributions to the screenplay, making Harry funnier.
Ephron supplied the structure of the film with much of the dialogue based on the real-life friendship between Reiner and Crystal.
The soundtrack consists of standards performed by Harry Connick, Jr., with a big band and ऑर्केस्ट्रा arranged by Marc shaiman.
Connick won his first Grammy Award for Best Jazz Male Vocal Performance.
Columbia तस्वीरें released the film using the `` platform '' technique, which involved opening it in a few select cities, letting positive word of mouth generate interest, and then gradually expanding distribution over subsequent सप्ताह.
When Harry Met Sally... grossed a total of US $ 92.8 million in North America.
Ephron received a British Academy Film Award, an Oscar नामांकन, and a Writers Guild of America Award nomination for her screenplay.
The film is ranked 23rd on AFI 's 100 Years... 100 Laughs list of the top comedy films in American cinema and number 60 on Bravo 's `` 100 Funniest फिल्मों ''.
In early 2004, the film was adapted for the stage in a production starring Luke Perry and Alyson Hannigan.

Hamburger Helper is a line of packaged खाना products primarily consisting of boxed pasta bundled with a packet or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings.
The contents of each box are combined with browned ground beef, water and milk to create a complete डिश.
The product line also features products साथ other starches such as rice or potatoes instead of pasta.
It is made by General Mills.
Although the classic boxed Hamburger Helper products only supply the starch item and the sauce packets, some varieties of the product include ground बीफ.
ये include a frozen food line, which features some of the brand 's classic varieties in a complete meal kit form, with frozen ground beef and frozen sauce packaged separately from the noodles in the same bag.
There is also an `` तत्काल '' version of हैमबर्गर Helper containing निर्जलित meat, noodles and seasonings in a small pouch, requiring only जल to be added.
The Hamburger Helper mascot is the `` helping Hand '', an anthropomorphic animated, four fingered left-hand दस्ताने, which appears in the product 's टेलीविज़न commercials और on the पैकेज.

a dwarf planet is a planetary-mass object that is neither a ग्रह nor a उपग्रह.
More explicitly, the International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) defines a dwarf ग्रह as a celestial body in direct orbit of the Sun that is massive enough for its आकार to be controlled by gravitation, लकिन that unlike a planet has not cleared its orbital region of अन्य objects.
The term dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as part of a three-way categorization of bodies orbiting the Sun, brought about by an increase in discoveries of trans-Neptunian objects कि rivaled Pluto in size, and finally precipitated by the discovery of an even more massive object, Eris.
This classification states that bodies large enough to have cleared the neighbourhood of their orbit are defined as ग्रह, while those कि are not massive enough to be rounded by their own gravity are defined as छोटी Solar System bodies.
Dwarf planets come in between.
The exclusion of dwarf planets from the roster of planets by the IAU has been both praised and criticized ; it was said to be the `` right निर्णय '' by Mike Brown, who discovered and other new dwarf planets, but has been rejected by Alan Stern, who था coined the पद dwarf planet in 1990.
The IAU currently recognizes five बौना planets in the Solar System :, Pluto,,, and.
However, only two of these bodies, Ceres and Pluto, have been observed in enough detail to demonstrate that वे fit the definition.
eris रै been स्वीकृत as a dwarf planet because it is more massive than Pluto.
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed trans-Neptunian objects with an निरपेक्ष magnitude brighter than +1 ( and hence a diameter of ≥838 km assuming a geometric ऐल्बीडो of ≤1 ) are to be named under the assumption that they हैं dwarf ग्रह.
The only two such वस्तुएँ ज्ञात at the time, Makemake and Haumea, went through this naming कार्यविधि और were declared to be dwarf ग्रह.
It is suspected that another hundred or so known objects in the Solar प्रणाली are dwarf planets.
Estimates are that up to 200 dwarf planets may be मिला when the entire region known as the Kuiper belt is explored, and that the number may exceed 10,000 when objects बिखरे outside the kuiper belt are considered.
Individual astronomers recognize several of these, and in August 2011 Mike Brown published a list of 390 candidate objects, ranging from `` nearly certain '' to `` possible '' dwarf planets. '
Brown identifies nine known objects – the five accepted by the IAU plus,,, and – as `` virtually निश्चित '', with another two dozen highly likely, and there are probably a hundred or so such objects in total.
The classification of bodies in other planetary systems with the characteristics of dwarf planets has नहीं been addressed.
A debit card ( also known as a बैंको card or जाँच card ) is a plastic payment card that provides the cardholder इलेक्ट्रॉनिक access to his or her bank account ( s ) at a financial institution.
Some cards have a stored value with which a payment is made, while most relay a message to the cardholder 's bank to withdraw funds इससे a payee 's designated bank account.
The card, where accepted, can be used instead of नकदी when making purchases.
In some cases, the primary account number is assigned exclusively for use on the Internet and there is no physical card.
In many देशों, the use of debit cards has become so फैली that their आवाज़ has overtaken or entirely replaced cheques and, in कुछ instances, cash transactions.
The development of debit ताश, unlike credit ताश and charge cards, रै generally महरूम country विशिष्ट resulting in a number of different systems around the world, which were often असंगत.
Since the mid-2000s, a number of initiatives have allowed debit cards issued in one country to be प्रयुक्त in other countries and allowed their use for अंतरजाल और फोन purchases.
Unlike credit और charge ताश, भुगतान using a debit card are तत्काल transferred from the cardholder 's designated bank account, instead of them paying the धन वापस at a later date.
Debit cards usually also allow for instant withdrawal of cash, acting as the ATM card for withdrawing cash.
Merchants may also offer cashback facilities to ग्राहक, where a customer can withdraw cash साथ with their purchase.
Francois Henri `` Jack '' LaLanne ( September 26, 1914 - January 23, 2011 ) was an American fitness, exercise, and nutritional expert and motivational speaker जो is sometimes called `` the godfather of fitness '' and the `` first fitness superhero. ''
He described himself as being a `` sugarholic '' and a `` junk food junkie '' until he was 15.
He also had behavioral problems, but `` turned his life around '' after listening to a public lecture by Paul Bragg, a well-known nutrition speaker.
During his career, he came to believe that the country 's overall health depended on the health of its population, writing कि `` शारीरिक culture and nutrition — is the salvation of America. ''
Decades before health and fitness began being promoted by celebrities like Jane Fonda and Richard Simmons, LaLanne थी already widely recognized लिये publicly preaching the health benefits of regular exercise and a good diet.
He published numerous books on फ़िटनेस और hosted a fitness television show between 1953 and 1985.
As जल्दी as 1936, at age 21, he opened one of the nation 's first फ़िटनेस gyms in Oakland, California, which became a prototype for dozens of similar gyms using his name.
One of his 1950s television कसरत programs was aimed toward women, whom he also encouraged to join his health clubs.
He invented a number of exercise machines, including leg-extension and pulley devices.
Besides producing his own series of videos, he coached the elderly और disabled नहीं to forgo exercise, believing it would enable them to enhance their strength.
LaLanne also gained recognition for his success as a bodybuilder, as well as for his prodigious feats of strength.
Arnold Schwarzenegger once stated, `` That Jack LaLanne 's an animal !, '' after LaLanne, at 54, beat a 21-year-old Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an informal contest.
On the occasion of LaLanne 's death, Schwarzenegger credited LaLanne for being `` an apostle for fitness '' by inspiring `` अरबों all over the world to सजीव healthier lives, '' and, as governor of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, had earlier placed him on his राज्यपाल 's Council on Physical Fitness.
Steve Reeves credited LaLanne as his inspiration to build his muscular physique while keeping a slim कमर.
He was inducted to the California Hall of Fame and has a star on the Hollywood Walk of कीर्ति.
Air शक्तियां of most of the countries use system similar to Armies.
However, the RAF and the एयर forces of many Commonwealth countries, or those formerly under a British influence, use a different set of ranks loosely based on naval equivalents ; Lieutenant, Commander, Captain and Commodore are prefixed for air force use with Flight, Wing, Group and Air, respectively ( the first तीन being the units that they used to कमांड ).
Penélope Cruz Sánchez ( ; born April 28, 1974 ) is a स्पेनी actress.
Signed by an agent at age 15, she made her एक्टिंग debut at 16 on television और her feature film debut the following year in Jamón, jamón ( 1992 ), to critical acclaim.
Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included Open Your Eyes ( 1997 ), The hi-lo Country ( 1999 ), The Girl of Your Dreams ( 2000 ) and Woman on Top ( 2000 ).
Cruz achieved recognition for her सीसे roles in the 2001 films Vanilla आसमान and उड़ा.
She has since built a successful career, appearing in films from a wide range of genres, including the comedy Waking Up in Reno ( 2002 ), the thriller Gothika ( 2003 ), the Christmas फिल्म Noel ( 2004 ), and the action adventure Sahara ( 2005 ).
She has received नाजुक acclaim for her roles in Volver ( 2006 ) and नौ ( 2009 ) receiving Golden Globe and Academy Award nominations for each.
She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2008 for Vicky Cristina Barcelona.
She was the first Spanish अभिनेत्री in history to receive an Academy Award and the first Spanish actress to receive a star at the Hollywood चलना of कीर्ति.
Cruz has modeled for companies such as Mango, Ralph Lauren and L'Oréal.
Penélope and her younger sister Mónica Cruz have designed items for Mango.
She has donated both her time and money to charities.
क्रूज़ has volunteered in Uganda and India, where she spent one week working for Mother टेरेसा ; she दान her salary from ' to help निधि the late nun 's mission.
A wax sculpture of Cruz will be placed in a premier spot in the Grevin Wax संग्रहालय in Paris.
File Explorer, previously known as Windows Explorer, is a file manager application and also a navigation tool that is included with releases of the Microsoft Windows operating system from Windows 95 onwards.
It provides a graphical user interface for accessing the file systems.
It is also the component of the operating system that presents many user interface items on the monitor ऐसे as the taskbar and desktop.
Controlling the computer is possible without Windows एक्सप्लोरर running ( for example, the File | Run command in Task Manager on NT-derived versions of खिड़कियाँ will function बगैर it, as होगा commands typed in a command prompt window ).
Located in the C : \Windows directory, it is sometimes referred to as the Windows shell, explorer.exe, or बस “Explorer”.
The Care Bears हैं characters created by American बधाई in 1981 for use on greeting cards.
The original artwork for the cards was painted by artist Elena Kucharik.
In 1983, Kenner turned the Care Bears into plush teddy bears.
The Care bears appeared in their own TV specials called The Care Bears in the Land Without Feelings ( 1983 ) and The Care Bears Battle the Freeze Machine ( 1984 ).
वे also had their own television series from 1985 to 1988, in addition to three feature films : The Care Bears Movie ( 1985 ), Care Bears Movie II : A New Generation ( 1986 ), and The Care Bears Adventure in Wonderland ( 1987 ).
Each Care Bear comes in a different color and has a specialized insignia on its पेट that represents its ड्यूटी और personality.
इस तमगा was ज्ञात as their `` tummy symbol. ''
However, the movie Care Bears : Oopsy Does It ! renamed them `` पेट badges ''.
Adding to the Care Bear family are the `` Care Bear Cousins '', which feature a lion, rabbit, penguin, raccoon, and other such पशु created in the same style as the teddy bears.
In 2002, the bears were reintroduced with new toys.
बना by Play-Along Toys, the new toys offered features such as illuminated bellies upon touch, aerobic bears, and glow-in-the-dark bears.
As part of this comeback, the Bears have appeared in two computer-animated movies : Care Bears : Journey to Joke-a-lot ( 2004 ) और The परवाह Bears ' Big Wish Movie ( 2005 ).
In 2007, the franchise celebrated its 25th anniversary ; another relaunch took place, as well as the release of Care Bears : Oopsy Does It !.

The premiere of the series utilizes `` 30 years of देखभाल ''.

As of 2013, Care Bears merchandise is still होने marketed.
During 2008 and 2009, Canada 's कुकी Jar Group and France 's MoonScoop Group attempted to acquire the franchise from AGC, with no apparent success.
Interstate 70 ( I-70 ) is an Interstate Highway in the United States that runs from Interstate 15 near Cove Fort, Utah, to a Park and सवारी निकट Baltimore, Maryland.
It थी the first Interstate Highway project in the संयुक्त States.
I-70 approximately traces the path of U.S. Route 40 ( and also the old National Road ) east of the Rocky Mountains.
West of the Rockies, the route of I-70 was derived from multiple sources.
I-70 is the fifth longest Interstate Highway, after I-90, I-80, i-40, and I-10.
the construction of I-70 in Colorado and Utah is considered an अभियान्त्रिकी marvel as the route passes through the Eisenhower Tunnel, Glenwood Canyon, और the सैन राफेल Swell.
The Eisenhower Tunnel is the highest point along the Interstate Highway system साथ an elevation of.
the भाग of the interstate in Missouri and Kansas have रखी claim to be the first interstate in the United States.
Though विवादित, the संघीय Highway Administration has claimed the section of I-70 through Glenwood Canyon, completed in 1992, was the last piece of the Interstate Highway प्रणाली, as originally planned, to open to traffic.
Photo of 1999 total eclipse
As seen इससे the Earth, a सौर eclipse occurs when the Moon passes between the Sun and Earth, and the Moon fully or partially blocks ( `` occults `` ) the Sun.
This can happen only at new moon, when the Sun and the Moon are in conjunction as seen from धरती in an alignment referred to as syzygy.
in a कुल eclipse, the disk of the Sun is fully obscured by the Moon.
In partial and annular eclipses only part of the Sun is obscured.
If the Moon were in a perfectly circular orbit, a little closer to the Earth, and in the same orbital plane, there would be total solar eclipses every single month.
However, the Moon 's कक्षा is inclined ( tilted ) at more than 5 degrees to Earth 's orbit around the Sun ( see ecliptic ) so its shadow at नई moon usually misses Earth.
Earth 's orbit is called the ecliptic plane as the Moon 's orbit must cross this plane in order लिये an eclipse ( both solar as well as lunar ) to occur.
In addition, the Moon 's actual orbit is elliptical, often taking it far enough away from Earth that its apparent size is not large enough to block the Sun totally.
The कक्षीय planes cross each year at a line of nodes resulting in at least two, and up to five, solar eclipses occurring each year ; no more than two of which can be total eclipses.
However, total सौर eclipses are rare at any particular location because totality exists only along a narrow path on Earth 's surface traced by the Moon 's shadow or umbra.
An eclipse is a natural phenomenon.
Nevertheless, in some ancient and modern cultures, solar eclipses have been attributed to supernatural causes or regarded as bad omens.
A कुल solar ग्रहण can be frightening to लोगों जो are unaware of its astronomical explanation, as the Sun seems to disappear during the day and the आसमान darkens in a matter of minutes.
Because it is dangerous to look directly at the Sun, observers should use special eye protection or indirect viewing techniques when viewing a partial eclipse, or the partial phases of a total eclipse.
It is सुरक्षित to view the total phase of a total solar eclipse with the unaided eye and without protection, however.
People referred to as eclipse chasers or umbraphiles will सफर to remote locations to observe or witness predicted central solar eclipses.
A political party ( from, Genitive partis, `` part '', `` portion '' ) is a political organization that typically seeks to influence, or entirely control, government policy, usually by nominating candidates with aligned political views and trying to seat them in राजनैतिक दफ्तर.
पार्टियों participate in electoral campaigns and educational outreach or विरोध actions.
Parties often espouse an विचारधारा or दृष्टि, expressed in a party program, bolstered by a written platform with विशिष्ट goals, forming a coalition among disparate interests.
The mango is a fleshy stone fruit belonging to the genus Mangifera, consisting of numerous tropical fruiting trees in the flowering plant family Anacardiaceae.
The mango is देशी to South एशिया, from where it has been distributed विश्वव्यापी to become एक of the most cultivated fruits in the tropics.
While other Mangifera species ( e.g. horse mango, M. foetida ) are also grown on a more localized basis, mangifera indica – the 'common आम ' or 'Indian आम ' – is the only mango tree commonly cultivated in many tropical और subtropical regions.
it is the national fruit of India, Pakistan and Philippines.
in several संस्कृतियों, its fruit and leaves are ritually used as floral decorations at विवाह, public celebrations and religious ceremonies.
Gill Arnette Byrd, < ref name > http : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/B/ByrdGi00.htm ( born February 20, 1961 in San Francisco, California ) is a former professional American football खिलाड़ी.

World मैप showing the Tropic of Cancer
The Tropic of Cancer, also referred to as the Northern tropic, is the circle of latitude on the Earth that marks the most northerly position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead at its zenith.
This इवेंट occurs once per year, at the time of the June solstice, when the Northern Hemisphere is tilted toward the Sun to its maximum extent.
it currently ( Year 2013 ) lies at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ north of the Equator.
इसके Southern Hemisphere counterpart, marking the most southerly position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead, is the Tropic of Capricorn.
These tropics are two of the five major degree measures or major circles of latitude that mark maps of the Earth, besides the Arctic and Antarctic Circles और the equator.
The positions of these circles of latitude ( other than the Equator ) are dictated by the tilt of the Earth 's axis of rotation relative to the plane of its orbit.
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to स्टोर डिजिटल video on DVD discs, और is currently the dominant उपभोक्ता video format in Asia, North America, Europe, and Australia.
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD ड्राइव and an h.262/mpeg-2 Part 2 डिकोडर ( e.g., a DVD player, or a computer DVD drive with a software dvd player ).
Commercial dvd movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video and audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described below ).
Typically, the data rate for DVD movies ranges from 3 mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, and the bit rate is usually adaptive.
It was first available लिये retail around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification was created by DVD Forum and can be प्राप्त from DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is not publicly available, क्युकी every subscriber जरूर sign a non-disclosure agreement.
Certain information in the DVD Book is proprietary and confidential.
In computing and specifically अंतरजाल, a जोंक is one who benefits, usually deliberately, from others ' information or effort but does not प्रस्ताव anything in return, or makes only token offerings in an attempt to avoid होने called a leech.
In economics, this type of behavior is called `` free riding '' and is संबद्ध साथ the free rider problem.
Depending on context, leeching does not necessarily refer to illegal use of computer संसाधन, but often instead to greedy use according to etiquette : to wit, using too much of what is freely given without contributing a reasonable amount back to the community that provides it.
The नाम derives from the leech, an animal that sucks blood and then tries to leave unnoticed.
Other terms are used, such as `` freeloader '', but leech is the most common.

the United States Postal Service ( USPS ), also known as the Post Office and u.S. Mail, is an independent agency of the United States संघीय government जिम्मेदार for providing postal service in the United राज्य.
It is one of the few government agencies explicitly authorized by the United States संविधान.
The USPS traces its roots to 1775 during the Second Continental Congress, where Benjamin Franklin was appointed the first postmaster general.
The cabinet-level Post Office Department was created in 1792 from फ्रैंकलिन 's operation and रूपांतरित into its current form in 1971 under the Postal Reorganization Act.
The USPS employs over 574,000 workers and operates over 260,000 vehicles.
The usps is the operator of the largest vehicle fleet in the world.
The USPS is legally obligated to serve all Americans, regardless of भूगोल, at uniform price and quality.
The USPS has exclusive access to letter boxes marked `` U.S. Mail '' and personal letterboxes in the United States, but still competes against private package delivery services, such as UPS and FedEx.
The USPS has नहीं directly received taxpayer-dollars since the early 1980s with the minor exception of subsidies for costs संबद्ध with the disabled and overseas voters.
Since the 2006 all-time peak mail volume, बाद which Congress passed the Postal Accountability and Enhancement Act ``, ( which mandated $ 5.5 billion per year to be paid into an account to pre-fund retiree health-care, 75 years into the भविष्य, a requirement unique among organizations and businesses in the U.S. ), revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail volume, prompting the postal service to look to other sources of आय while cutting लागत to reduce its budget deficit.
Washington, D.C. has been the capital of the United राज्य since 1800.
Eight other cities have served as the meeting place for Congress and are therefore considered to have once been the capital of the संयुक्त States.
In addition, each of the 50 U.S. states and the five principal territories of the United States maintains इसके own capital.
Princess cut diamond set in a ring
the Princess cut is the second most popular cut shape for diamonds, next to a गोलाकार brilliant.
The face-up आकार of the princess cut is square or rectangular and the profile or side-on shape is similar to that of an inverted pyramid with चार beveled पहलू.
The princess cut is a relatively new diamond cut, having महरूम निर्मित in the 1960s.
It has gained in लोकप्रियता in recent years as a more distinctive alternative to the more popular round brilliant cut, in which the top of diamond, called the crown, is काटें with a round face-up आकार and the bottom, called the pavilion, is तराशा similar to a cone.
a princess cut with the वही width as the diameter of a round brilliant will weigh अधिक as it has four corners which होता otherwise have been cut off and rounded to form a गोलाकार brilliant.
The princess cut is sometimes referred to as a वर्गाकार modified brilliant.
However, while displaying the same high degree of brilliance, its faceting style is unique and completely different from that of a round brilliant.
the राजकुमारी cut had its origins in the early `` French '' cut, having a step-modified `` Double-French '' or `` Cross '' cut crown and a series of unique, chevron-shaped facets in the pavilion which combine to give a पृथक cross-shaped reflection when the स्टोन is viewed सीधे through the table.
Effectively, the Princess cut combines the high degree of light return of a round brilliant cut with a distinctive square or rectangular shape.
The square princess cut diamond is प्रायः slightly cheaper than round शानदार cut diamonds of the same कैरेट weight because it retains about 80 % of the rough diamond, as opposed to the round brilliant which retains only about 50 % of the rough.
The ability to retain more crystal weight makes this shape popular amongst diamond cutters.
Accredited Gem Appraisers ( AGA ) and American Gem समाज Laboratory ( AGSL ) and European gem Laboratories-USA ( EGL-USA ) हैं currently the only labs that ग्रेड the Princess काटें for cut.
There is no universal definition of what measurements make an ideal राजकुमारी cut diamond and अनेक diamond manufacturers market ideal diamonds with differing facet patterns and angles as `` ideal cut ''.
In contrast to the AGSL, AGA, and EGL-USA the Gemological Institute of America ( GIA ) रै stated that there is not enough industry consensus or अनुभवजन्य data to specify cut grading standards for Princess cut diamonds and to do so is at the risk of consumers who may be deceived by diamonds accompanied by unqualified Ideal or Excellent cut grades.
The name `` Princess Cut '' was originally used in connection with another diamond cut, वरना known as the `` प्रोफ़ाइल '' cut, designed by Arpad Nagy, a London cutter, in 1961.
The same name was बाद used and made popular by Ygal Perlman, Betzalel Ambar, और Israel Itzkowitz in Israel in 1979.
A similar cut with only 49 facets, as opposed to the original 58 facets of the princess cut, थी later branded the `` Quadrillion '' and initially distributed by Ambar Diamonds in लॉस Angeles.
Three years of optical research yielded a square स्टोन with faceting similar to that of a round brilliant cut diamond.
A तुलना
the number of chevrons can affect the overall outlook of a princess cut डायमंड.
This can usually be संकल्पित by the wire diagram that is plotted in diamond grading reports.
By adding more chevrons on the pavilion side of the diamond, the individual facets of the डायमंड will अभी be broken down into smaller facets.
As a परिणाम, it can give a princess cut diamond a `` crushed ice '' look.
Vice versa, when a राजकुमारी cut diamond has lesser chevrons, it tends to give the diamond a chunky outlook due to broader facets.
The domestic dog ( Canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies of the gray wolf ( Canis lupus ), a member of the Canidae family of the mammalian अनुक्रम Carnivora.
The term `` domestic श्वान '' is generally used for दोनो domesticated and feral varieties.
The dog has महरूम the पहला animal to be domesticated and has been the most widely kept working, hunting, and pet एनिमल in human history.
The word `` dog '' may also mean the male of a canine species, as opposed to the word `` bitch '' for the female of the species.
MtDNA evidence shows an evolutionary विभाजित between the modern dog 's lineage और the modern wolf 's lineage around 100,000 years ago but,, the oldest fossil specimens genetically linked to the modern dog 's lineage date to approximately 33,000-36,000 years ago.
Dogs ' value to early human hunter-gatherers led to them quickly becoming ubiquitous across world संस्कृतियों.
Dogs perform many roles for people, such as शिकार, herding, pulling loads, protection, assisting police and military, companionship, and, more recently, aiding handicapped individuals.
This impact on human society has given them the nickname `` Man 's बेहतरीन Friend '' in the Western world.
In some cultures, dogs are also a source of meat.
In 2001, there were estimated to be 400 million dogs in the world.
Most breeds of dogs are at most a few hundred years old, having been artificially selected for particular morphologies and व्यवहार by लोगों for specific functional roles.
Through this selective प्रजनन, the dog has developed into hundreds of varied breeds, and shows more behavioral and morphological variation than any other land mammal.
For example, height measured to the withers ranges from in the Chihuahua to about in the Irish Wolfhound ; color varies from white through grays ( usually पुकारा `` blue '' ) to black, and browns from लाइट ( tan ) to dark ( `` red '' or `` chocolate '' ) in a wide variation of patterns ; coats can be short or long, coarse-haired to wool-like, straight, curly, or smooth.
It is common for most breeds to shed इस coat.
Diagram of a हस्तांतरण electron microscope
A 1973 Siemens electron microscope, Musée des Arts et Métiers, Paris
an electron microscope ( EM ) is a प्रकार of microscope that uses an electron beam to illuminate a specimen and produce a magnified image.
an EM has greater resolving power than a लाइट microscope और can reveal the structure of smaller objects because electrons have wavelengths परिचय 100,000 times shorter than visible light photons.
They can achieve better than 50 pm resolution and magnifications of up to about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary, non-confocal light microscopes are limited by diffraction to about 200 nm resolution and उपयोगी magnifications नीचे 2000x.
The electron microscope uses electrostatic and electromagnetic lenses to कंट्रोल the electron beam and focus it to रूप an image.
These electron optical lenses are analogous to the glass lenses of a light optical सूक्ष्मदर्शी.
Electron microscopes are used to investigate the ultrastructure of a wide range of biological और inorganic specimens including microorganisms, cells, large molecules, biopsy samples, metals, and crystals.
industrially, the electron microscope is often used for quality control and failure analysis.
Modern electron microscopes produce इलेक्ट्रॉन micrographs, using specialized digital cameras or frame grabbers to capture the image.
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a chain of fried chicken fast खाना restaurants founded in 1972 in New Orleans, Louisiana.
Often referred to as Popeyes and sometimes as Popeyes Chicken & Biscuits or Popeyes मुर्गा & Seafood, It was acquired by Sandy Springs, Georgia -आधारd AFC Enterprises, originally America 's Favorite Chicken Company, in 1993.
According to a company press release dated June 29, 2007, Popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service chicken restaurant group, measured by number of units '', with more than 1,800 restaurants in more than 40 states and the District of Columbia, and over 22 countries विश्वव्यापी including Turkey, Northern Cyprus, Bahrain, China, Hong Kong, Iraq, Indonesia, Jordan, Kuwait, United Arab Emirates, Japan, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, South Korea, Singapore, Canada, Jamaica, Guyana, Suriname, Mexico, Trinidad, Puerto Rico, Honduras, Vietnam, Panama, Peru, and Costa Rica.
About thirty locations are company-owned, the rest franchised.
The leg press is a weight training कसरत in जिससे the individual pushes a weight or resistance away from them using their legs.
The term leg press also refers to the apparatus used to perform this exercise.
The leg press can be used to evaluate an athlete 's overall lower body strength ( from knee joint to हिप ).
Using the diagonal sled-type leg press machine.
There are two main types of leg press:
The diagonal or vertical 'sled ' type leg press.
Weight disks ( plates ) are संलग्न directly to the sled, which is mounted on rails.
The user sits below the sled and pushes it upward साथ their फीट.
ये machines normally शामिल adjustable safety brackets that prevent the उपयोक्ता इससे being trapped under the weight.
The 'cable ' type leg press, or 'seated लेग press ', commonly found on multigyms.
The user sits upright and pushes forward with उनके feet onto a plate that is attached to the weight stack by means of a long steel cable.
Wendy Williams Hunter ( born Wendy Joan Williams ; July 18, 1964 ) is an American media personality, actress and author.
She hosts a syndicated टेलीविज़न talk show, The Wendy Williams Show.
Prior to television, Williams was a `` shock jockette `` on several radio shows.

She has written an आत्मकथा and several other books, and has created a product line called Adorn by Wendy Williams.
पैट्रिक Henry `` देशद्रोह '' speech before the हाउस of burgesses in an 1851 painting by Peter F. Rothermel
`` Give me liberty, or give me death ! '' is a quotation attributed to Patrick Henry from a speech he made to the Virginia Convention.
On that day, at St. John 's Church in Richmond, Virginia, and is credited with having swung the balance in convincing the Virginia House of Burgesses to pass a resolution delivering the Virginia troops to the Revolutionary War.
Among the delegates to the convention were भविष्य US Presidents Thomas जेफरसन and George Washington.
Newfoundland and Labrador (, locally ) is the easternmost province of Canada.
Situated in the देश 's Atlantic region, it incorporates the island of Newfoundland and mainland Labrador to the northwest, with a combined area of.
In 2011, the province 's जनसांख्यिकी was 514,536.
Approximately 92 percent of the province 's population lives on the Island of Newfoundland ( including its associated smaller islands ), of which more than half live on the Avalon Peninsula.
The province is Canada 's most linguistically homogenous, with 97.6 % of residents रिपोर्टिंग English ( Newfoundland English ) as their mother tongue in the 2006 census ;.
Historically, Newfoundland was also घर to unique varieties of French, and Irish, as well as the now-extinct Beothuk language.
In Labrador, local dialects of innu-aimun and Inuktitut are also spoken.
Newfoundland और Labrador 's capital and largest city, St. John 's, is Canada 's 20th-largest Census Metropolitan Area, and is home to almost 40 percent of the province 's population.
st. John 's is the seat of government, home to the House of Assembly of Newfoundland and Labrador and the highest court in the jurisdiction, the Newfoundland and Labrador Court of Appeal.
A former colony और dominion of the संयुक्त किंगडम, न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड and Labrador became the tenth प्रांत to enter the Canadian Confederation on March 31, 1949, as Newfoundland.
On December 6, 2001, an amendment थी made to the Constitution of Canada to change the province 's official name to Newfoundland and Labrador.
In day-to-day conversation, however, Canadians generally still refer to the province itself as Newfoundland and to the region on the Canadian mainland as Labrador.
Theodore `` T.R. ''
Roosevelt, Jr. ( ; October 27, 1858—january 6, 1919 ) was the 26th President of the United States ( 1901–1909 ).
He is विख्यात for his exuberant personality, range of interests and achievements, and his leadership of the Progressive Movement, as well as his `` काउंटी `` persona and robust masculinity.
He was a leader of the Republican पार्टी and संस्थापक of the first incarnation of the short-lived Progressive ( `` Bull Moose '' ) Party of 1912.
Before becoming President, he held offices at the city, state, and federal levels.
Roosevelt 's achievements as a naturalist, explorer, hunter, author, and soldier are as much a part of his fame as कोई दफ्तर he held as a politician.
Roosevelt was 42 years old when sworn in as President of the संयुक्त States in 1901, बनाना him the youngest president ever ; he ताल out the youngest elected president, जॉन F. Kennedy, by only one year.
Roosevelt थी also the first of only three बैठे राष्ट्रपतियों to have won the Nobel Peace Prize.
The Teddy bear is named after him, despite his contempt for being called `` Teddy ''.
Born into a wealthy परिवार in New York City, Roosevelt was a sickly child who suffered from दमा and stayed at home studying natural history.
To overcome his physical weakness, he embraced a strenuous life.
Home-schooled, he became an eager student of प्रकृति.
He attended Harvard University, where he studied biology, boxed and developed an interest in naval affairs.
In 1881, one year out of Harvard, he was elected to the New York State सभा, where he became a leader of the reform faction of his Republican Party ( the `` GOP '' ).
उसके The Naval War of 1812 ( 1882 ) established his professional reputation as a serious historian ; he wrote numerous books on hunting, the outdoors, and current political issues, as well as frontier इतिहास.
In 1884, his first बीवी and his mother died on the same day.
He temporarily left politics and went to the frontier, becoming a rancher in the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas.
Returning to New York City, he ran for mayor in 1886, finishing third with 60,000 votes.
He later gained fame by taking vigorous charge of the city police.
At the नेशनल level, he was a leader in civil service reform.
The Spanish–American War broke आउट in 1898 while रूज़वेल्ट was, effectively, running the Department of the Navy.
He promptly resigned and formed the Rough राइडर्स – a volunteer प्यादे regiment that fought in Cuba.
The war hero थी elected governor in 1898 and in 1900 was nominated for vice president.
He successfully energized the GOP आधार as a अत्यधिक visible campaigner to reelect President William McKinley on a platform of high tariffs, the gold standard, imperialism, prosperity at home and victory abroad.
In 1901, President William McKinley was assassinated and Roosevelt became President.
he attempted to move the Republican Party ( gop ) toward प्रगतिवाद, including trust busting and increased regulation of businesses.
Roosevelt became the first person elected to a term in his own right in 1904 after having ascended to the Presidency ( from the Vice-Presidency ) upon the death of his predecessor, winning the largest percentage of the popular vote since the uncontested election of 1820.
Roosevelt coined the phrase `` Square Deal `` to describe his domestic agenda, emphasizing that the average citizen would get a fair share under his नीतियों.
As an outdoorsman and naturalist, he promoted the conservation movement.
On the world stage, Roosevelt 's policies were characterized by his स्लोगन, `` Speak softly and carry a big stick ``.
A cousin is a relative with whom a person shares one or more common ancestor ( s ) ( other than a parent, child/descendant, sibling, child/descendant of a sibling, or सहोदर of a parent/ancestor ).
However in common parlance, `` cousin '' normally specifically means `` first cousin ''.
Systems of `` degrees '' and `` removals '' are used in the english-speaking world to describe the exact relationship between two cousins ( in the broad sense ) and the ancestor they have in common.
विभिन्न governmental entities have established systems for legal use that can more precisely specify kinships with common ancestors existing any number of generations in the past, though आम usage often eliminates the degrees and removals and refers to people with common ancestry as simply `` distant cousins '' or `` relatives ''.
Webster is an American situation comedy that aired on ABC from सितंबर 16, 1983 until May 8, 1987, and in first-run अनुप्रयोग from September 21, 1987 until March 10, 1989.
The series was created by Stu Silver.
The show stars Emmanuel Lewis in the शीर्षक role as a young boy who, after losing his parents, is adopted by his एनएफएल -pro godfather, portrayed by Alex Karras, and his new socialite wife, played by Susan Clark.
The focus was largely on कैसा this impulsively married couple had to adjust to their नई lives and sudden parenthood, but it थी the congenial Webster himself who drove much of the plot.
The series was produced by Georgian Bay Ltd., emmanuel Lewis Entertainment Enterprises, Inc. ( 1986-1989 ) and Paramount Television.
Like NBC 's earlier hit Diff'rent Strokes, Webster featured a यंग African-American boy adopted by a white family.
Three types of cell division
Cell division is the process by which a parent cell divides into two or अधिक daughter cells.
Cell division usually occurs as part of a larger cell cycle.
In eukaryotes, there are two distinct type of cell division : a vegetative division, whereby each daughter cell is genetically identical to the parent cell ( mitosis ), and a reductive cell division, whereby the number of chromosomes in the daughter cells is reduced by half, to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis ).
Both of these cell division cycles are required in sexually reproducing organisms at some point in उनके life cycle, and both are believed to be present in the last eukaryotic common ancestor Prokaryotes भी undergo a vegetative cell division known as binary fission, where their genetic material is segregated बराबर into two daughter cells.
All cell divisions, regardless of organism, are preceded by a single round of डीएनए replication.
For simple unicellular organisms such as the amoeba, one कोशिका प्रभाग is equivalent to reproduction – an entire new organism is created.
On a larger स्केल, mitotic cell division can create progeny from multicellular organisms, such as plants कि grow from cuttings.
Cell division also enables sexually reproducing जीवों to develop from the one-celled zygote, which itself was produced by cell division from gametes.
And after growth, कोशिका प्रभाग allows for continual construction and repair of the organism.
A human being 's body experiences about 10,000 trillion cell divisions in a lifetime.
Cell division has been modeled by finite subdivision rules.
The प्राथमिक concern of कोशिका division is the maintenance of the original cell 's genome.
Before प्रभाग can occur, the genomic information कि is stored in chromosomes must be replicated, and the duplicated genome must be separated cleanly between cells.
A great deal of सेल्यूलर infrastructure is involved in keeping genomic information consistent between `` generations ''.
