The seven gifts of the Holy Spirit is an enumeration of seven आध्यात्मिक gifts originating with patristic authors, later elaborated by five intellectual virtues and four other groups of ethical विशेषताएँ.
They are : wisdom, समझना, wonder and awe ( fear of the Lord ), counsel, knowledge, fortitude, and परहेज़गारी ( reverence ).
The Earth Day Flag, the latest proposal of John McConnell for a flag of धरती Day
Earth Day is an annual event, celebrated on अप्रैल 22, on which events are held worldwide to demonstrate support for environmental सुरक्षा.
It was first celebrated in 1970, and is अभी coordinated globally by the Earth Day Network, and मनाये in more than 192 countries each साल.
In 1969 at a UNESCO Conference in San Francisco, the date proposed was March 21, 1970, the first day of spring in the northern hemisphere.
This day of nature 's equipoise was later sanctioned in a Proclamation signed by Secretary General U Thant at the United राष्ट्र.
A month later a separate Earth Day was founded by United States Senator Gaylord Nelson as an environmental teach-in first held on April 22, 1970.
Nelson was later awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom Award in recognition of his work.
While this April 22 Earth Day was केन्द्रित on the United States, an organization launched by Denis Hayes, who was the original national coordinator in 1970, took it अंतरराष्ट्रीय in 1990 and organized events in 141 nations.
Numerous communities celebrate Earth Week, an entire week of activities focused on environmental issues.
Iodine is a रासायनिक element with symbol i and atomic number 53.
The नाम is from Greek ioeidēs, meaning violet or जामुनी, due to the color of elemental iodine vapor.
Iodine and its compounds are primarily used in nutrition, and industrially in the production of acetic acid and certain polymers.
Iodine 's relatively high atomic number, low toxicity, and ease of attachment to organic compounds have made it a part of many X-ray contrast materials in modern medicine.
Iodine has only एक stable isotope.
a number of आयोडीन radioisotopes are भी used in medical applications.
Iodine is found on Earth mainly as the अत्यधिक water-soluble iodide ion, I−, which concentrates it in oceans and brine pools.
Like the other halogens, free iodine occurs मुख्यतः as a diatomic molecule I2, and then only momentarily after being oxidized from आयोडाइड by an oxidant like free oxygen.
In the universe and on Earth, iodine 's high atomic number makes it a relatively rare element.
However, its presence in ocean water has given it a role in biology.
It is the heaviest essential element utilized widely by life in biological functions ( only tungsten, employed in enzymes by a few species of bacteria, is heavier ).
Iodine 's rarity in many soils, due to initial low प्रचुरता as a crust-element, and also leaching of soluble iodide by rainwater, has led to many deficiency problems in land animals and अंतर्देशीय human populations.
Iodine deficiency affects about two billion people and is the leading preventable कारण of intellectual disabilities.
Iodine is required by higher animals, which उपयोग it to synthesize thyroid hormones, which contain the element.
Because of this function, radioisotopes of iodine are concentrated in the thyroid gland along with nonradioactive iodine.
If inhaled, the radioisotope iodine-131, which has a high fission product yield, concentrates in the thyroid, but is easily remedied with potassium iodide treatment.
Lobbying ( also lobby ) is the act of attempting to influence decisions made by officials in the government, most often legislators or members of regulatory agencies.
Lobbying is done by many different types of people and organized groups, including individuals in the private sector, corporations, fellow legislators or government officials, or advocacy groups ( interest groups ).
Lobbyists may be among a legislator 's constituencies, meaning a voter or bloc of voters भीतर his or her electoral district, or not ; वे may engage in lobbying as a business, or not.
Professional lobbyists are people whose business is trying to influence legislation on behalf of a group or individual who hires them.
Individuals and nonprofit organizations can also lobby as an act of volunteering or as a small part of their normal job ( for उदाहरण, a सीईओ meeting with a representative परिचय a project important to his/her company, or an activist meeting with his/her legislator in an unpaid capacity ).
Governments often define and regulate organized group lobbying that has become influential.
The ethics and morality of lobbying are.
Lobbying is often spoken of with contempt, when the implication is that people with inordinate socioeconomic power are corrupting the law ( twisting it away from fairness ) in order to serve their own विरोध of ब्याज.
But another side of lobbying is making sure that others ' interests are duly defended against others ' corruption, or even simply making sure that minority interests are fairly defended against mere tyranny of the majority.
For example, a medical association, or a trade association of health insurance companies, may lobby a legislature in order to counteract the influence of tobacco companies, in which case the lobbying would be viewed by most people as justified ( duly defending against others ' corruption ).
The परेशानी in drawing objective लाइनों between which lobbyists are `` शुभ lobbyists '' and which ones are `` bad ones '' is compounded by the cleverness with जिससे lobbyists or their clients can argue that their own lobbying is of the `` good '' kind.
At दिल, the effort to influence legislation is a power struggle.
As in other forms of power संघर्ष, such as war or law enforcement, motives range from to self-defense to fighting for justice, and the dividing लकीर between predation and justice is विषय to rationalization.

Cream were a 1960s British rock supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist Jack Bruce, guitarist/vocalist Eric क्लैप्टन, and drummer Ginger Baker.
Their sound was characterised by a hybrid of blues चट्टान, hard चट्टान and psychedelic rock, combining the psychedelia-themed lyrics, Eric Clapton 's blues गिटार playing and vocals, Jack Bruce 's voice and prominent bass playing और Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming.
the group 's third album, Wheels of Fire, was the world 's first platinum-selling double album.
Cream are widely regarded as being the संसार 's first successful supergroup.
In their career, they sold over 15 million albums worldwide.
Cream 's म्यूज़िक included songs based on traditional blues such as `` Crossroads `` and `` Spoonful ``, and modern blues such as `` Born Under a Bad Sign ``, as well as more eccentric songs such as `` Strange Brew ``, `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and `` Toad ``.
Cream 's biggest hits were `` I Feel Free `` ( UK, number 11 ), `` Sunshine of Your Love `` ( US, number 5 ), `` White Room `` ( US, number 6 ), `` Crossroads '' ( US, number 28 ), and `` Badge `` ( UK, number 18 ).
Cream made a significant impact on the popular music of the time, and, along साथ Jimi Hendrix, and Terry Kath of Chicago, popularised the use of the wah-wah pedal.
They provided a heavy yet technically proficient musical theme that foreshadowed and influenced the emergence of British bands such as The Jeff Beck Group in the late 1960s.
The बैंड 's live performances influenced progressive rock acts such as फटाफट.
Cream were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1993.
They were included in both Rolling Stone and vh1 's lists of the `` 100 Greatest Artists of सब Time ''.
They were also ranked number 16 on VH1 's `` 100 Greatest Artists of Hard Rock ''.
Hairspray is a 1988 comedy film written and directed by John Waters, and starring Ricki Lake, Sonny Bono, Debbie Harry, Michael St. Gerard, Shawn Thompson, Colleen Fitzpatrick, Jerry Stiller, और in his last film role, Divine.
Hairspray was a dramatic departure from Waters ' earlier works, with a much broader intended audience.
In फैक्ट, Hairsprays PG is the mildest rating a Waters film has received ; most of his previous films were rated X by the MPAA.
Set in 1962 बाल्टीमोर, Maryland, the film revolves around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' teenager Tracy Turnblad as she pursues stardom as a dancer on a लोकल TV show and rallies against racial segregation.
Hairspray was only a moderate success upon its initial theatrical release, earning a modest gross of $ 8 million.
However, it managed to attract a larger दर्शक on home video in the early 1990s and became a cult classic.
Most आलोचकों praised the फिल्मी, although some were displeased साथ the overall campiness.
In 2002, the फिल्मी was adapted into a ब्रॉडवे musical of the same name, which won eight Tony Awards, including Best musical in 2003.
A दूसरी film version of Hairspray, an adaptation of the stage musical, was also released by New Line Cinema in 2007, which included many changes of scripted items from the original.
The film also ranks # 444 on Empire पत्रिका 's 2008 list of the 500 महानतम movies of all time.
A Christian denomination is an identifiable religious body under a आम name, structure, and doctrine within christianity.
Some groups included do not consider themselves a denomination ( e.g., the कैथोलिक Church considers itself the एक true church and the Apostolic See, and as pre-denominational ).
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist being called a denomination and do not have any formal denominational structure, authority, or record-keeping परे the local congregation ; several groups within Restoration Movement fall into this category.
Some groups are large ( e.g. Catholics, Lutherans, Anglicans or Baptists ), while others are just a few small churches, और in most cases the relative आकार is not evident in this list.
Modern movements such as Fundamentalist Christianity, Pietism, Evangelicalism, Pentecostalism और the Holiness movement sometimes cross denominational lines, or in some cases बनाएँ new denominations out of two or more continuing groups, ( as is the case लिये many United और uniting churches, for example ).
Such subtleties and complexities are not clearly depicted here.
Major divisions भीतर Christianity.
Note : This is not a complete list, लकिन aims to provide a comprehensible अवलोकन of the diversity among denominations of christianity.
As there are reported to be approximately 41,000 Christian denominations, many of which can not be verified to be significant, तभी those denominations with Wikipedia articles will be listed in order to ensure कि all entries on this list are notable and verifiable.
Between denominations, theologians, और comparative religionists वहीँ are considerable disagreements about which groups can be properly called Christian, disagreements arising primarily from doctrinal differences between groups.
For the purpose of simplicity, this list is intended to reflect the self-understanding of each denomination.
स्पष्टीकरण of different opinions concerning their status as Christian denominations can be found at their respective articles.
There is no official recognition in most parts of the world for religious लाशें, and there is no official clearinghouse which could determine the status or respectability of religious bodies.
Often there is considerable disagreement between various churches परिचय whether other चर्च should be labeled with pejorative शर्तें such as `` cult '', or about whether this or that group enjoys some measure of respectability.
Such considerations प्रायः vary from place to प्लेस, जहाँ one religious group may enjoy majority status in one region, but be widely regarded as a `` खतरनाक cult '' in another part of the world.
Inclusion on this list does not indicate any judgment about the size, importance, or character of a समूह or इसके members.
1804 map of `` Louisiana ``, edged on the वेस्ट by the Rocky Mountains.
The Louisiana खरीदें ( `` Sale of Louisiana '' ) was the अधिग्रहण by the United States of America in 1803 of of France 's claim to the territory of Louisiana.
The U.S. paid 50 million francs ( $ 11,250,000 ) plus cancellation of debts worth 18 million francs ( $ 3,750,000 ), for a total sum of 15 million dollars ( less than 3 cents per acre ) for the Louisiana territory ( $ million in dollars, less than 42 cents per acre ).
The louisiana territory encompassed all or part of 15 उपस्थित U.S. states and two कनाडाई provinces.
The land खरीदा contained all of present-day Arkansas, Missouri, Iowa, Oklahoma, Kansas, and Nebraska ; भाग of मिनेसोटा that were west of the Mississippi River ; most of उत्तर Dakota ; most of South Dakota ; northeastern New Mexico ; उत्तरी Texas ; the portions of Montana, Wyoming, and Colorado ईस्ट of the Continental Divide ; Louisiana वेस्ट of the Mississippi River, including the city of New Orleans ; and small portions of land कि would eventually become part of the Canadian provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan.
France controlled इस vast area from 1699 जबतक 1762, the year it gave the territory to its ally Spain.
Under Napoleon Bonaparte, France took back the territory in 1800 in the आशा of भवन an empire in North America.
A slave revolt in Haiti and an impending war with Britain, however, led France to abandon these plans and sell the entire territory to the United States, who had originally intended only to seek the purchase of New Orleans and इसके adjacent lands.
The purchase of the territory of louisiana took place during the presidency of Thomas Jefferson.
At the time, the purchase faced domestic opposition because it was thought to be unconstitutional.
Although he सहमत that the U.S. Constitution did not contain provisions for acquiring territory, Jefferson decided to go ahead with the purchase anyway in अनुक्रम to remove France 's उपस्थिति in the region and to protect both U.S. trade access to the port of नई Orleans and free passage on the Mississippi River.
Ceremony at Place d'Armes, New ऑरलियन्स marking transfer of Louisiana to the United States, 10 March 1804, as चित्रित by Thure de Thulstrup.
`` कूल Jerk '' is a popular song written by Donald Storball and originally performed by the Capitols.
Released in 1966, it पहुँचे No. 2 on the American R & B chart and No. 7 on the पॉप chart.
The backing track for this सोंग was actually recorded ( secretly ) by the Motown house band The Funk Brothers.
Per one of the दुर्गंध Brothers, the song was originally to be called `` Pimp Jerk. ''
This was लिया from watching neighborhood pimps, who would dance in the clubs, but were too `` cool '' to do the jerk like regular folks.
Their version was subsequently named `` the Pimp Jerk. ''
The producer was afraid that a सोंग with the word pimp in the शीर्षक would be banned or not receive much positive ध्यान, and had the title changed to its current form.
the Go-Go 's, Todd Rundgren, Big Trouble, Human Sexual Response, the La De Da 's, The Creation, and The coasters have covered the song.
Todd Rundgren किया his version in an odd time हस्ताक्षर ( 7/4 ), giving an obviously jerky feel to the song.
The Go-Go 's covered the song for their 1982 album Vacation and बाद re-recorded it for their 1990 album Greatest.
In the feature film Home Alone 2 : Lost in New York, Uncle Frank ( Gerry Bamman ) sings `` कूल Jerk '' in the shower.
a संस्करण of the song with different lyrics ( `` Do the Cool Whip '' ) is used in Cool Whip commercials.
A recording of `` Cool Jerk '' by रिकार्डो Ray is featured in the feature film Donnie Brasco ( 1997 ).
The song features in the film Standing in the Shadows of Motown, performed by the Funk Brothers with lead vocals by Bootsy कॉलिन्स.
The song is heard briefly in the animated feature, Madagascar 3 : Europe 's Most Wanted.
Despite this reason, it is listed in कुछ variations of the film 's soundtrack.
A league is a unit of length ( or, rarely, area ).
It was long common in Europe and Latin America, but it is no longer an official unit in any nation.
The league originally referred to the distance a person could walk in an hour.
Since the Middle Ages, many values have been specified in several countries.
In the context of nautical distances, the 3 mile ( 4.8 km ) distance corresponds to how far an निरीक्षक of average height ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can see when standing at समुद्र level.
यूँ, a ship traveling one `` league '' has reached what थी previously the farthest visible distance on the horizon.
The कमी of a ऐतिहासिक and global standard for the सटीक measure of a `` league '' can be accounted for by the variable उन्नयन of the observer ( i.e., sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ).
The Irish state came into being in 1922 as the Irish Free State, a dominion of the British Commonwealth, having seceded from the United Kingdom under the Anglo-Irish Treaty.
It comprises 26 of Ireland 's 32 counties.
Since 1949 it has existed as the गणतंत्र of Ireland.
From its foundation, the Irish Free State was embroiled in a सिविल war between nationalists supporting the Treaty and प्रतिद्वंद्वियों who supported a republic.
The pro-Treaty side, organised as Cumann na nGaedheal emerged victorious from the conflict and won subsequent elections.
They formed the government of the state until 1932, when they peacefully handed over power to the anti-Treaty faction in Fianna Fáil, who defeated them in an election.
The Irish state, despite its violent beginnings, has remained a liberal democracy throughout इसके अस्तित्व.
A new constitution in 1937 removed many of the links with Britain established अंतर्गत the Treaty and Ireland 's neutrality in the Second World War demonstrated its independence in foreign नीति matters from Britain.
In 1948 Ireland formally left the British Commonwealth and adopted the title of `` Republic ''.
In the आर्थिक sphere, the Irish state has had a mixed performance.
On स्वतंत्रता, it थी one of the wealthier countries in Europe per head of population.
However it भी inherited from अंग्रेजों rule the problems of unemployment, emigration, uneven geographical development and lack of a native industrial आधार.
For much of its history, the state struggled to rectify these समस्याएं.
Particular peaks of emigration were recorded during the लेट 1930s, 1950s and 1980s, when the आयरिश economy अंकित little growth.
In the 1930s, Fianna fáil governments attempted to create Irish domestic industries using subsidies और protective tarifs.
In the late 1950s, these policies यहूद dropped in favour of free trade with selected countries and encouraging of foreign investment with low कर.
इस was expanded when Ireland entered the European Economic Community in 1972.
In the 1990s and 2000s, Ireland experienced an economic boom ज्ञात as the Celtic Tiger, in which the country 's GDP surpassed अनेक of its यूरोपीय neighbours.
Immigration also surpassed करणों, bringing the state 's population up to over 4 million.
However, since 2008, Ireland has experienced a severe crisis in the banking sector and साथ sovereign debt.
The resultant economic slump has deepened the प्रभाव of the world recession on Ireland.
From 1937 to 1998, the Irish constitution included a claim on Northern Ireland as a part of the national territory.
However, the राज्य also opposed and used its सुरक्षा forces against those armed groups - principally the Provisional Irish Republican Army, who tried to unite Ireland by फ़ोर्स.
This occurred in the 1950s, throughout the 1970s and 1980s and has continued on a reduced scale.
Irish governments meanwhile tried to broker an agreement to the conflict known as The Troubles within Northern Ireland इससे 1968 to the late 1990s.
the अंग्रेजों government officially recognised the right of the Irish government to be a party to the Northern negotiations in the Anglo-Irish Agreement of 1985.
In 1998, as part of the Good Friday Agreement, the Irish constitution was altered by referendum to remove the territorial अर्जी to Northern Ireland और instead extend the सही of Irish citizenship to all the people of the island चाहिए they wish to have it.
John Quincy Adams ( July 11, 1767February 23, 1848 ) was the sixth President of the United States ( 1825–1829 ).
He served as अमरीकी diplomat, Senator, and Congressional representative.
He was a member of the Federalist, Democratic-Republican, नेशनल Republican, and later Anti-Masonic and Whig parties.
Adams थी the son of former President John एडम्स and Abigail Adams.
As a राजनयिक, Adams played an important role in negotiating many international treaties, most notably the Treaty of Ghent, which ended the War of 1812.
As Secretary of State, he negotiated with the United Kingdom over America 's उत्तरी border with Canada, negotiated with Spain the annexation of Florida, and authored the Monroe Doctrine.
Historians agree he was one of the greatest राजनयिकों and secretaries of state in अमरीकी history.
As president, he sought to modernize the American economy and promoted education.
Adams enacted a part of his agenda and paid off much of the national debt.
He was stymied by a Congress नियंत्रित by उसके enemies, and his lack of patronage networks helped politicians eager to undercut him.
He lost his 1828 bid for re-election to Andrew Jackson.
In doing so, he became the पहला president since his father to serve a single term.
Adams is best known as a diplomat who shaped America 's विदेशी policy in line with his ardently nationalist commitment to America 's republican values.
More recently Howe ( 2007 ) portrayed Adams as the exemplar and moral leader in an era of modernization.
During Adams ' lifetime, technological innovations and new means of communication spread messages of religious revival, social reform, and पार्टी politics.
Goods, money, and people traveled more rapidly and efficiently than ever before.
Adams was निर्वाचित a U.S. Representative इससे Massachusetts after leaving office, serving for the पिछला 17 years of his life with far greater acclamation than he had achieved as president.
he is, so far, the only president later elected to the United States House of Representatives ( though John Tyler was elected to the House of Representatives of the Confederate States just before his death in 1862 ).
Animated by his growing revulsion against slavery, Adams became a leading opponent of the Slave Power.
He predicted that if a civil war were to break out, the president could abolish slavery by using उसके war powers.
Adams also predicted the Union 's dissolution over the slavery समस्या, but said that if the South became independent there would be a series of खूनी slave revolts.
Windows Internet Explorer 9 ( ie9 ) is a version of the Internet एक्सप्लोरर वेब browser from Microsoft.
It was released to the public on March 14, 2011.
Microsoft रै released Internet Explorer 9 as a major out-of-band version that is not tied to the release schedule of any particular version of Windows, नापसंद previous संस्करण.
It is the first version since Internet Explorer 2 to not be bundled with a Windows operating system, although some OEMs have संस्थापित it with Windows 7 on their PCs, as well as new Windows 7 laptops.
The system आवश्यकताएँ for Internet Explorer 9 हैं Windows 7, खिड़कियाँ सर्वर 2008 R2, Windows Vista Service Pack 2 or Windows Server 2008 SP2 with the Platform Update.
खिड़कियाँ XP and earlier are not supported.
Internet Explorer 9 is the last version of Internet Explorer to be supported on खिड़कियाँ Vista.
Both ia-32 and x64 builds are available.
Internet एक्सप्लोरर 9 supports अनेक CSS 3 properties, embedded आईसीसी v2 or v4 color profiles support via Windows Color System, and has improved JavaScript प्रदर्शन.
It is the last of the five major web browsers to implement support for Scalable Vector Graphics ( SVG ).
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics rendering using Direct2D, hardware-accelerated text रेंडरिंग using directwrite, hardware-accelerated video rendering using Media Foundation, इमेजिंग support provided by Windows Imaging Component, and high fidelity printing powered by the XML Paper Specification ( XPS ) print pipeline.
Internet Explorer 9 also supports the html5 video and audio tags और the Web Open Font Format.
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid and pain reliever first marketed by the Dr. Miles Medicine Company.
It was developed by Maurice Treener, head chemist at मील, in Elkhart, Indiana.
Alka-Seltzer is marketed for relief of minor aches, pains, inflammation, fever, headache, heartburn, sour stomach, indigestion, and hangovers, while neutralizing excess stomach acid.
It थी launched in 1931.
A spin-off of Alka-Seltzer made to relieve colds and flu, Alka-Seltzer Plus, was later introduced.
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin variant, Alka-Mints, was introduced in 1994 and discontinued in 1997.
Alka-Seltzer is currently owned by Bayer Schering Pharma AG, Germany.
The name `` alka-seltzer '' रै been extended to incorporate an entire line of medications sold over the counter and taken by means of rapidly dissolving tablets that form a carbonated solution in water.

A stalactite (, ; from the यूनानी stalasso, ( σταλάσσω ), `` to drip '', and meaning `` कि which drips '' ) is a type of speleothem ( secondary mineral ) कि hangs from the ceiling of limestone caves.
It is a type of dripstone.
The corresponding formation on the floor of the cave is known as a stalagmite.
Degree abbreviations are प्रयुक्त as an alternative way to specify an अकादमिक degree instead of spelling out the title in full, such as in reference books like Who 's जो and on business cards.
Many degrees have more than one abbreviation.
in the UK, it is not generally the custom to punctuate abbreviations for degrees साथ full stops ( e.g. `` BSc '' rather than `` B.Sc. ``.
Race is a classification system used to categorize humans into large and distinct populations or समूह by anatomical, सांस्कृतिक, ethnic, genetic, geographical, historical, linguistic, religious, or social affiliation.
First used to denote national affiliations, the term began to be used to relate to physical traits in the 17th century.
In the जल्दी 20th century the term was often used, in a taxonomic sense, to denote genetically differentiated human populations defined by phenotype.
While biologists sometimes use the अवधारणा of race to make भेद among fuzzy sets of traits, others in the scientific community suggest that the idea of रेस often is used in a naive or simplistic way, i.e. that among humans, race has no taxonomic significance : सब living humans belong to the same species, Homo sapiens and subspecies, Homo sapiens sapiens.
Social conceptions and groupings of races vary over time, involving लोक taxonomies
that define of individuals based on perceived traits.
Scientists consider biological essentialism obsolete, and generally discourage racial स्पष्टीकरण for collective differentiation in दोनो physical and behavioral traits.
Since the second half of the 20th century the associations of race with the ideologies and theories that grew out of the work of 19th-century anthropologists and physiologists has led to the use of the word race itself becoming problematic.
Although still used in general contexts, it is now often replaced by other words which are less ambiguous and emotionally charged, such as populations, people ( s ), ethnic groups or समुदायों depending on context.
Lucy Stone ( August 13, 1818 – October 19, 1893 ) was a prominent American abolitionist and suffragist, and a गायन advocate and organizer promoting rights लिये women.
In 1847, स्टोन became the first woman from Massachusetts to earn a college degree.
She spoke out for women 's rights and against slavery at a time when women were discouraged and prevented from public speaking.
स्टोन was the first recorded American woman to retain उसके own last name after marriage.
Stone 's organizational activities for the cause of women 's rights yielded tangible gains in the difficult political पर्यावरण of the 19th सदी.
Stone helped initiate the first National महिलाओं 's Rights Convention और she supported and sustained it annually साथ with a number of अन्य local, state and regional activist conventions.
Stone spoke in front of a क्रमांक of legislative bodies to promote laws giving अधिक rights to women.
She assisted in establishing the Woman 's National Loyal League to help pass the Thirteenth amendment और thereby abolish slavery, after जिससे she helped रूप the largest group of like-minded women 's rights reformers, the politically moderate American Woman Suffrage Association, which worked for decades at the state level in favor of women 's right to vote.
Stone wrote extensively about a wide range of women 's rights, publishing and distributing speeches by herself and others, and convention proceedings.
In the long-running and influential Woman 's Journal, a weekly periodical that she established and प्रचारित, Stone aired दोनो her own and differing views परिचय women 's rights.
Called `` the orator '' and `` the morning star of the woman 's rights गति '', Stone delivered a speech which sparked सुसान B. Anthony to take up the cause of women 's suffrage.
Elizabeth Cady Stanton wrote that `` Lucy Stone was the first person by whom the heart of the American public was deeply stirred on the woman question. ''
Together, Anthony, Stanton, and Stone have महरूम पुकारा the 19th सदी `` triumvirate `` of महिलाओं 's suffrage and नारीवाद.
In finance, a बंध is an instrument of indebtedness of the bond issuer to the holders.
It is a debt security, under which the issuer owes the धारकों a debt and, depending on the terms of the bond, is obliged to pay उन्हें interest ( the coupon ) or to repay the principal at a later तिथि, termed the परिपक्वता.
Interest is usually payable at fixed intervals ( semiannual, annual, sometimes monthly ).
Very often the bond is negotiable, i.e. the ownership of the instrument can be transferred in the secondary market.
Thus a bond is a form of loan or IOU : the holder of the bond is the lender ( creditor ), the issuer of the bond is the borrower ( debtor ), and the coupon is the interest.
Bonds provide the borrower साथ external funds to finance long-term investments, or, in the case of सरकारी bonds, to finance current expenditure.
Certificates of deposit ( CDs ) or short term वाणिज्यिक paper हैं considered to be money मार्केट instruments and not bonds : the main difference is in the length of the term of the instrument.
bonds and stocks are both securities, but the major difference between the two is that ( capital ) stockholders have an equity stake in the company ( i.e. they हैं owners ), whereas bondholders have a creditor stake in the company ( i.e. they are lenders ).
Another difference is that bonds usually have a defined पद, or maturity, after which the bond is redeemed, whereas stocks may be outstanding indefinitely.
An exception is an irredeemable bond, such as Consols, which is a perpetuity, i.e. a bond with no maturity.

A scale model is a physical model, a representation or copy of an object that is larger or छोटी than the actual size of the object, which seeks to maintain the relative proportions ( the scale factor ) of the physical size of the original object.
Very often the scale model is used as a guide to making the object in full size.
Scale models are built or collected for many reasons.
The Zune hd थी a portable media player in the Zune product family released on September 15, 2009 by Microsoft.
It was a सीधा प्रतिस्पर्धी साथ the ठहराना iPod and iPhone series of mobile devices.
It was initially released in 16 and 32 GB capacities.
A 64 GB संस्करण was released on April 9, 2010.
It utilized a touchscreen interface for navigation and included Wi-Fi for synchronization, access to the Zune Marketplace and Web browsing.
The Zune HD utilized the Nvidia Tegra APX 2600 चिप, allowing it to खेल 720p वीडियो through the optional HDMI Zune dock on a high-definition टेलीविज़न.
Otherwise, content would be scaled down to 480x272 pixels on the player 's OLED टचस्क्रीन.
Old Sparky, the electric chair used at Sing Sing prison
Execution by electrocution, usually performed using an electric chair, is an execution method originating in the United States in which the condemned person is strapped to a विशेषकर built wooden chair and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the body.
This execution method was created by employees of थामस Edison during the War of Currents, and has been used only in the संयुक्त States and, for a period of several decades, in the Philippines ( its first use there in 1924 under American occupation, last in 1976 ).
Historically, once the condemned person थी attached to the chair, various cycles ( differing in voltage and duration ) of alternating वर्तमान would be passed through the individual 's body, in order to cause fatal damage to the internal organs ( including the brain ).
The पहला jolt of इलेक्ट्रिक current was designed to cause immediate unconsciousness and brain death ; the second one was designed to cause fatal damage to the vital organs.
Death was frequently caused by electrical overstimulation of the heart.
Although in the United States the electric chair has become a प्रतीक of the death penalty, its use is in decline due to the rise of lethal injection, which is widely believed to be a अधिक humane method of execution.
Although some states still maintain electrocution as a method of execution, today it is only maintained as a secondary method that may be chosen over lethal injection at the request of the कैदी.
As of 2010, electrocution is an optional form of execution in Alabama, Florida, South Carolina and Virginia.
They allow the prisoner to choose lethal injection as an वैकल्पिक method.
In the states of Kentucky and Tennessee, the इलेक्ट्रिक chair has been retired except for those whose capital crimes were committed prior to legislated dates in 1998 ( Kentucky : March 31, 1998 ; टेनेसी : December 31, 1998 ) and who chose electrocution.
In both states, inmates who do not choose electrocution or inmates who committed their crimes after the designated date हैं killed by lethal injection.
The electric कुर्सी is an alternate form of execution approved for potential use in Arkansas and Oklahoma if other forms of execution are found unconstitutional in the राज्य at the time of execution.
It is the एकमात्र method of execution in Vermont, where treason is the only capital crime.
On फ़रवरी 8, 2008, the Nebraska Supreme Court determined that execution by electric chair थी a `` cruel and unusual punishment '' under the state 's constitution.
This brought executions of this type to an end in Nebraska, the only बाकी state to retain electrocution as its sole विधि of execution for murder.
The Maryland House of Delegates is the lower house of the General Assembly, the state legislature of the अमरीकी State of Maryland, and is composed of 141 Delegates elected from 47 जिले.
The House of Delegates Chamber is located in the Maryland State House ( state कैपिटल ) on State Circle in Annapolis, which is the state capital.
The State House also houses the Maryland State Senate Chamber and the offices of the Governor and Lieutenant Governor of the State of Maryland.
Each Delegate has offices in Annapolis, in the nearby Casper R. Taylor, Jr. House दफ्तर Building.
The Liberation of Paris ( also known as the Battle for Paris ) took place during World War II from 19 August 1944 until the surrender of the occupying German garrison on 25 August.
The Liberation of Paris started with an uprising by the French Resistance against the German garrison.
On 24 August, the French Forces of the Interior ( Forces françaises de l'intérieur, FFI ) received reinforcements from the Free French Army of Liberation and from the U.S. Third Army under General patton.
The capital region of France had महरूम governed by Nazi Germany since the signing of the Second Compiègne Armistice in June 1940, when the German Army occupied northern and westernmost France, and when the puppet regime of Vichy France was established in the town of Vichy in central France.
This battle marked the liberation of Paris and the exile of the Vichy government to Sigmaringen in Germany.
However, there was still much heavy लड़ to be done before France was liberated, including the campaign in southern France during August-September ( in Provence and extending into the southwestern region of the Vosges kyu ), along the German-held seaports of western France ( such as at Brest and Dunkirk ), in alsace and Lorraine in eastern France, and in northeastern फ़्रांस, such as along the Rhine and moder Rivers.
The जर्मनी Army and SS fought doggedly in these areas for the remainder of 1944 and into 1945.
`` Feelin ' alright ? '' also known as `` Feeling Alright '' is a song लिखा by Dave Mason of the English rock band Traffic from their eponymous 1968 album, Traffic.
The song was also a hit single लिये several performers : Joe Cocker ( 1969, # 69, recharted in 1972, US # 33 ), mongo santamaría ( 1969, # 95 ) and Grand Funk Railroad ( 1971, US # 54 ).
It has also been recorded by Three Dog रात्रि ( 1969 ), The 5th Dimension ( 1970 ), Lou राल्स, Freddie King, Paul Weller, Lulu, Chairmen of the Board ( 1970 ), Rare Earth, The Electric Concept Orchestra, माँ 's Finest ( 1973 ), The ओहियो Players ( 1971 ), Diana Ross साथ the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ), Maceo Parker, Gladys Knight & the Pips, Widespread Panic and The Black crowes.
A Steel ढोल version by Trinidad Oil Company was reissued on the dancefloor jazz compilation Blue Juice 2.
it was also featured in the 2000 film Duets, sung by Huey Lewis.
Both the original और the Joe Cocker cover यहूद featured in the movie Flight, अभिनीत Denzel Washington.
देवों Werkheiser ( born March 8,1991 ) is an American actor, voice actor, singer, songwriter and musician, best known for his starring role as ned Bigby on the Nickelodeon sitcom Ned 's Declassified School अस्तित्व Guide and for his role in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules, as the lead character Nolan Byrd.
