Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य record based on images
Sample view of an electronic health record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a systematic collection of electronic health information about individual मरीजों or populations.
It is a record in digital format that is theoretically capable of being shared across different health परवाह settings.
In some cases इस sharing can occur by रास्ता of network-connected enterprise-wide information systems and other information networks or exchanges.
EHRs may include a दायरा of data, including demographics, medical history, medication and allergies, immunization status, laboratory test परिणाम, radiology images, vital signs, personal stats जैसे age and weight, and बिलिंग information.
ऋण origination is the process by जिससे a borrower applies for a नई loan, and a lender processes that application.
Origination generally शामिल all the steps from taking a loan application up to disbursal of funds ( or declining the application ).
Loan servicing covers everything बाद disbursing the funds until the loan is fully paid बंद.
Loan origination is a specialized version of नई account opening for financial services organizations.
निश्चित people and organizations specialize in loan origination.
Mortgage brokers and other mortgage originator companies serve as a prominent example.
There are many different types of loans.
For अधिक information on ऋण types, see the loan and consumer lending articles.
Steps involved in originating a loan vary by loan type, various kinds of loan risk, regulator, lender policy, and अन्य factors.
Top बाएँ : The Tennessee Valley Authority, part of the New Deal, being signed into law in 1933.
Top right : Franklin Delano Roosevelt, who was responsible for initiatives and programs collectively known as the New Deal.
Bottom : A public mural इससे one of the artists employed by the New Deal.
The New Deal was a series of economic programs enacted in the United States between 1933 and 1936.
They involved presidential executive orders or laws passed by Congress during the पहला पद of President Franklin D. Roosevelt.
The programs were in response to the Great Depression, और focused on what historians call the `` 3 Rs '' : Relief, Recovery, and Reform.
That is Relief for the unemployed and poor ; Recovery of the economy to normal levels ; and Reform of the financial प्रणाली to prevent a repeat depression.
The New Deal उत्पादित a political realignment, making the Democratic पार्टी the majority ( as well as the party that held the White House for seven out of nine Presidential terms from 1933 to 1969 ), with its base in liberal ideas, the white South, traditional Democrats, big city machines, and the newly empowered labor unions and ethnic minorities.
The Republicans were विभाजित, with conservatives opposing the entire New Deal as an enemy of business and growth, और liberals accepting कुछ of it and promising to make it more कुशल.
the realignment crystallized into the New Deal गठबन्धन that dominated most presidential elections into the 1960s, while the opposition Conservative Coalition largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963.
By 1936 the term `` liberal '' typically was used for supporters of the New Deal, and `` conservative `` for its opponents.
From 1934 to 1938, Roosevelt was assisted in his endeavours by a “pro-spender” majority in कॉंग्रेस ( drawn from two-party, competitive, non-machine, Progressive, and Left party districts ).
As noted by सिकंदर Hicks, “Roosevelt, backed by rare, non-Southern Democrat majorities — 270 non-Southern Democrat representatives and 71 non-Southern Democrat senators — spelled Second New Deal reform.”
Many historians फर्क between a `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) and a `` Second New Deal '' ( 1935–38 ), with the second one more liberal and more controversial.
The `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt with diverse groups, from banking और railroads to industry and farming, all of which demanded help for economic survival.
The Federal आपात Relief Administration, लिये instance, provided $ 500 million for relief operations by states and cities, while the short-lived CWA ( Civil works Administration ) gave localities money to operate make-work projects in 1933-34.
The `` Second New सौदे `` in 1935–38 included the Wagner Act to promote labor unions, the Works Progress प्रशासन ( WPA ) relief program ( which made the federal government by far the largest single employer in the nation ), the Social Security Act, and new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant मजदूर.
The final major items of New सौदे legislation were the creation of the United राज्य Housing Authority and Farm Security Administration, both in 1937, and the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938, which set maximum घंटों and minimum wages for most categories of workers.
The economic downturn of 1937–38, and the bitter split between the AFL and CIO labor संघ led to major Republican gains in Congress in 1938.
Conservative Republicans and Democrats in Congress joined in the informal Conservative Coalition.
By 1942–43 they shut down relief programs such as the WPA और CCC and blocked major liberal proposals.
रूज़वेल्ट himself turned his attention to the war effort, and won reelection in 1940 and 1944.
The Supreme Court declared the नेशनल Recovery Administration ( NRA ) and the first version of the Agricultural Adjustment अधिनियम ( aaa ) unconstitutional, however the AAA was rewritten and तब upheld.
As the first Republican president elected after FDR, Dwight D. Eisenhower ( 1953–61 ) left the New Deal largely intact, even expanding it in some areas.
In the 1960s, Lyndon B. Johnson 's Great Society used the नई Deal as प्रेरणा for a dramatic expansion of liberal programs, which Republican रिचर्ड M. Nixon generally retained.
After 1974, however, the call for deregulation of the economy gained bipartisan support.
The New सौदे regulation of banking ( Glass–Steagall Act ) was suspended in the 1990s.
Many New Deal programs remain active, with some still operating under the original names, सहित the Federal जमा Insurance Corporation ( FDIC ), the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation ( FCIC ), the Federal Housing Administration ( FHA ), and the Tennessee Valley Authority ( TVA ).
The largest कार्यक्रम स्टिल in existence today are the सोशल Security System and the Securities and Exchange Commission ( सेक ).
A स्त्री ( ), pl : women ( ) is a female human.
The term woman is usually सुरक्षित for an adult, with the पद girl being the usual term for a female child or adolescent.
However, the पद woman is also sometimes used to identify a female human, regardless of age, as in वाक्यांश such as `` Women 's rights ``.
Women are typically capable of giving birth, though older women who have gone through menopause and some intersex women can not.
`` I do n't Want to मिस a बात '' is a song performed by American rock band Aerosmith for the 1998 film Armageddon.
Written by Diane Warren, the song debuted at number one on the Billboard hot 100 ( the first # 1 for the बैंड after 28 years together ).
The song stayed at number one for four weeks from September 5 to September 26, 1998.
The song also ठहरे at क्रमांक 1 for several weeks in several other countries.
In the UK, the song peaked at number four, becoming Aerosmith 's highest charting song in the uk, where it was the 17th best-selling single of 1998, and has बेची over a million copies.
Although not used by the majority of the world 's countries, daylight saving time is common in the Western world.
daylight saving time ( DST ) —also summer time in British English — is the practice of advancing clocks during the lighter months so that evenings have more daylight and mornings have less.
Typically clocks हैं adjusted forward one hour निकट the प्रारंभ of spring and are adjusted backward in autumn.
The modern idea of daylight saving was first proposed in 1895 by George vernon Hudson and it was first implemented during the First World War.
Many countries have used it at various times since then.
Much of the United States used DST in the 1950s and 1960s, and dst use expanded following the 1970s energy crisis and has been widely used in North America and Europe since then.
The practice has been both praised and criticized.
Adding daylight to evenings benefits retailing, sports, and अन्य activities that exploit sunlight after working hours, but can cause problems for evening entertainment and other occupations tied to the sun.
Although an early goal of DST was to reduce evening उपयोग of incandescent lighting ( formerly a primary use of electricity ), आधुनिक heating and cooling usage patterns differ greatly, and research about how DST currently affects energy use is limited or contradictory.
DST clock shifts present other चुनौतियां.
They complicate timekeeping, and can disrupt meetings, travel, billing, रिकार्ड keeping, medical devices, heavy equipment, and sleep patterns.
Software can often समायोजन computer clocks automatically, but this can be limited and error-prone, particularly when DST dates are changed.
Floorplan of the Château de Montargis
Montargis is a commune in the Loiret department in north-central France on the Loing river.
The town is located about south of Paris and east of Orléans in the Gâtinais.
Montargis is the second largest city in the Loiret, after Orléans.
It is near a large forest, and contains light industry and खेती, including saffron.
Due to its numerous canals and bridges, montargis sometimes bills itself as the `` Venice of the Gâtinais. ''
Though काफी आधुनिक, it retains a medieval charm in its downtown area.
In computer storage, a logical unit क्रमांक, or LUN, is a number used to identify a logical ईकाई, which is a device addressed by the SCSI protocol or protocols which encapsulate SCSI, such as Fibre Channel or iSCSI.
A LUN may be used with any यंत्र which supports read/write operations, ऐसे as a tape drive, but is most often used to refer to a logical disk as created on a SAN.
Though not technically correct, the term `` LUN '' is often also used to refer to the logical disk itself.
The Gospel According to Mark (,, to euangelion kata Markon ), commonly shortened to the Gospel of Mark or simply Mark, is the second book of the New वसीयत.
This canonical account of the life of यीशु of Nazareth is one of the three synoptic gospels.
It was thought to be an epitome, which accounts for its place as the second gospel in the बाइबल.
However, most समकालीन scholars now regard it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ).
That Mark was used as a source for the other synoptic gospels Gospel of Matthew and Gospel of Luke is widely held by many, although not all, नई Testament scholars.
The Gospel of Mark narrates the Ministry of Jesus from his baptism by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट to his death and resurrection.
It focuses particularly on the last week of his life ( अध्याय 11–16 ) in Jerusalem.
Its swift narrative portrays Jesus as a heroic man of action, an exorcist, healer and miracle worker.
An important theme of Mark is the Messianic Secret.
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals, tries unsuccessfully to keep उसके messianic identity secret, and conceals उसके message with parables.
Meanwhile, the disciples fail to understand both the implication of the चमत्कार of Jesus and the meaning of the things he predicts about his arrest, death and resurrection.
Most scholars believe that the original टेक्स्ट of the gospel ends at Mark 16:8 with the discovery of Jesus ' खाली मकबरा and that the following account of his resurrection appearances is a later addition.
According to tradition और some early गिरिजाघर writers, the author is चिह्नित the Evangelist, the companion of the apostle Peter.
The gospel, however, appears to rely on several underlying sources, varying in रूप and in theology, which tells against the tradition that the gospel was based on Peter 's preaching.
The text is a compilation जिससे may include eye-witness accounts as well as known apostolic preachings, and pre-existing written records कि do not exist today but can be confirmed from 2nd-century commentators.
Some of the stories in the gospel may have been transmitted orally before being written down.
Various elements within the इन्जील suggest that the author wrote in Syria or Palestine for a non-Jewish Christian community.
The Lord of the Rings is an epic high fantasy novel written by English philologist and University of Oxford professor J. R. R. Tolkien.
the story began as a sequel to Tolkien 's 1937 children 's fantasy novel The Hobbit, but eventually developed into a much larger कार्य.
It was written in stages between 1937 and 1949, much of it during World War II.
It is the second best-selling novel ever written, with over 150 million copies sold.
The शीर्षक of the novel refers to the story 's main antagonist, the Dark Lord Sauron, who था in an earlier age created the One Ring to rule the other Rings of Power as the ultimate weapon in his campaign to conquer and नियम all of Middle-earth.
From quiet beginnings in the Shire, a Hobbit land not unlike the English countryside, the story ranges across north-west Middle-earth, following the course of the War of the Ring through the eyes of its characters, notably the hobbits frodo Baggins, Samwise `` Sam '' Gamgee, Meriadoc `` Merry '' brandybuck and Peregrin `` Pippin '' Took, लकिन also the hobbits ' chief allies and travelling companions : Aragorn, a इंसान Ranger ; Boromir, a man from Gondor ; Gimli, a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas, an Elven prince ; and gandalf, a Wizard.
the work was initially intended by Tolkien to be one volume of a two-volume set, with the other being The Silmarillion, but this idea was dismissed by his publisher.
It was decided लिये आर्थिक कारण to publish The Lord of the Rings as three volumes over the course of a साल from 29 July 1954 to 20 October 1955, thus creating the now familiar Lord of the Rings trilogy.
The three volumes were entitled The Fellowship of the Ring, The Two Towers, and The Return of the किंग.
structurally, the novel is divided internally into six books, two per volume, with several appendices of background material included at the end of the third volume.
The Lord of the Rings has since been reprinted numerous times and translated into many languages.
Tolkien 's work has been the subject of extensive analysis of its themes and origins.
Although a major work in itself, the story was only the पिछला गति of a larger epic Tolkien had worked on since 1917, in a process he described as mythopoeia.
Influences on this earlier work, and on the स्टोरी of The Lord of the Rings, शामिल philology, mythology, religion and the author 's distaste for the effects of industrialization, as well as earlier fantasy works और tolkien 's experiences in World War I.
The Lord of the Rings in its turn is considered to have था a great effect on modern fantasy ; the impact of Tolkien 's works is such that the use of the words `` Tolkienian '' and `` Tolkienesque '' have been अंकित in the Oxford English Dictionary.
The enduring popularity of The रब of the Rings has led to numerous references in popular culture, the founding of अनेक societies by fans of Tolkien 's works, and the publication of many books about Tolkien and his works.
The Lord of the Rings has inspired, and continues to inspire, artwork, music, films and television, video games, and subsequent literature.
Award-winning adaptations of The Lord of the Rings have been made for radio, theatre, and film.
The following is an episode list for the Nickelodeon sitcom Drake & Josh.
The series debuted on January 11, 2004.
A TV film Merry Christmas, Drake & Josh was made apart from the regular श्रेणी on December 5, 2008.
वहीँ are a total of 60 episodes were produced spanning four seasons.
Drake Bell, Josh Peck, और Miranda Cosgrove were the only actors to appear in all 60 episodes.
The San फ्रांसिस्को 49ers conduct प्रशिक्षण शिविर at the team 's headquarters and practice facility in Santa Clara, California in August 2010.
The offense is wearing red jerseys साथ the exception of quarterback Alex स्मिथ, who is in a black jersey ; the रक्षा in white.
in the National Football League, training camp refers to the time before the season commences.
During this time, teams होगा sometimes congregate at an outside location, usually a university, to conduct training camp for at least the first few weeks.
This is similar to baseball 's spring training.
Training शिविर is used in several अलग ways.
New players और coaches use it to acclimate themselves to नई teammates and systems.
For younger players, it serves as a period of evaluation ; for veterans, it is time to round back into form.
Training camp is विभाजित into अनेक different components.
the first is scrimmages.
These are pseudo-games where teams run nearly full खेल ' worth of plays.
Sometimes, two practice sessions are held on the same day.
This concept is referred to as two-a-days.
Other parts of training camp include drills, बैठक with coaches and अन्य players at one 's position, weight training, and pre-season games.
The latter half of training camp leads directly into the exhibition season.
With NFL training camps starting in late-july, the biggest चिंता has been dehydration.
in 2001, Minnesota Vikings player Korey Stringer died of a medical condition based इससे dehydration and heatstroke.
The death of Stringer prompted the NFL to change their training policies.
At each practice, every team must have the team doctor and प्रशिक्षकों on the field ; additionally, an ambulance जरूर be present दौरान practices.
With NFL training camps beginning in late July, severe weather can affect practice and exhibition games.
in 2002, a Cleveland Browns exhibition game ended due to बिजली near Cleveland Browns Stadium, and severe तूफ़ान have been known to disrupt training camps.
Fans are often able to visit their favorite team 's training camp to catch an early look at the players ; प्रवेश to practices is often free or substantially less महंगी than a game ticket, बनाना training camp trips a popular option for fans who can not attend many games due to financial or other reasons.
NFL teams प्रायः sell कलाकृतियां and concessions at camp sites along साथ offering क्रियाएँ and events to make training camp a more fan-friendly experience.
In computing, a file system ( or filesystem ) is a type of data store which can be used to store, retrieve and update a set of files.
The पद could refer to the abstract data structures used to define files, or to the actual software or firmware components कि implement the abstract ideas.
Some file प्रणालियों are used on local data storage devices ; अन्य provide file access via a network protocol ( e.g. NFS, SMB, or 9P clients ).
Some file प्रणालियों are `` virtual '', in that the `` files '' supplied हैं computed on request ( e.g. procfs ) or are merely a mapping into a different file system used as a backing store.
The file system manages access to both the सामग्री of files and the मेटाडेटा about those फाइलें.
It is responsible for arranging भंडार space ; reliability, efficiency, and tuning with regard to the physical storage medium are important design considerations.
William Howard Taft ( September 15, 1857 – March 8, 1930 ) was the 27th President of the United States ( 1909–1913 ) and बाद the दसवाँ Chief Justice of the United राज्य ( 1921–1930 ).
He is the only person to have served in both of these offices.
Before बनने अध्यक्ष, Taft, a Republican, was selected to serve on the Superior अदालत of Cincinnati in 1887.
in 1890, Taft was appointed Solicitor General of the संयुक्त States and in 1891 a judge on the संयुक्त States Court of Appeals for the छठे Circuit.
In 1900, President William McKinley appointed Taft governor-general of the Philippines.
In 1904, अध्यक्ष Theodore Roosevelt appointed Taft Secretary of War in an effort to दूल्हे Taft, then his close political ally, into his handpicked presidential successor.
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving, assuming on some occasions the role of acting Secretary of State, जबकि declining repeated offers from Roosevelt to serve on the Supreme Court.
Riding a wave of popular support for fellow Republican Roosevelt, Taft won an easy victory in his 1908 bid for the presidency.
In his only term, Taft 's domestic agenda emphasized trust-busting, civil service reform, strengthening the अंतरराज्यीय Commerce Commission, improving the performance of the postal service, और passage of the Sixteenth amendment.
Abroad, Taft sought to further the आर्थिक development of nations in Latin America and एशिया through `` Dollar कूटनीति ``, and showed decisiveness and restraint in response to क्रान्ति in Mexico.
The task-oriented Taft was बेख़बर to the political ramifications of his decisions, often alienated his own key constituencies, and was overwhelmingly defeated in his bid for a second term in the presidential election of 1912.
In surveys of presidential विद्वानों, Taft is usually ranked near the middle of lists of all American Presidents.
After leaving office, Taft spent his time in academia, arbitration, and the search for world peace through his self-founded League to Enforce Peace.
In 1921, after the First World War, President Warren G. Harding appointed Taft Chief Justice of the United States.
taft served in this capacity until shortly before his मौत in 1930.
The Ten Commandments is a 1956 epic film produced and directed by Cecil B. DeMille कि dramatized the biblical story of the Exodus, in जिससे the Hebrew-born Moses, an adopted Egyptian prince, becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew slaves.
It starred Charlton Heston in the lead role, Yul brynner as his adoptive brother, pharaoh Rameses II, Anne Baxter as nefretiri, एडवर्ड G. रॉबिन्सन as Dathan, Yvonne De Carlo as Sephora, Debra Paget as Lilia, and John Derek as Joshua.
The supporting cast includes Sir Cedric Hardwicke as Pharaoh Seti I, Nina Foch as Bithiah, Martha Scott as Yoshebel, जूडिथ Anderson as Memnet, Vincent Price as Baka, and John carradine as Aaron.
The film was released by Paramount Pictures in VistaVision on October 5, 1956.
The Ten आयतें, जिससे DeMille narrated, was the last film that he directed.
He was set to direct the 1958 remake of his 1938 film The Buccaneer, but उसके final illness forced him to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law, actor Anthony Quinn.
DeMille had also planned to film the जीवन of Lord baden Powell, the founder of the Scout movement, with David niven ; this project was never एहसास.
The Ten आयतें is a partial remake of DeMille 's 1923 silent film.
Some of the cast and क्रू of the 1956 version worked on the original.
It has since been remade as a television miniseries ब्रॉडकास्ट in April 2006.
The Ten Commandments is one of the most financially successful films ever made, grossing over $ 65 million at the U.S. box office.
Adjusting for inflation, this makes it the sixth highest-grossing film domestically, with an adjusted कुल of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012.
The box office website `` The Numbers '' lists the domestic gross at $ 80 million.
In 1999, The Ten Commandments was selected for preservation in the United States National Film Registry by the Library of Congress as होने `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
In June 2008, the American Film Institute नाज़िल its `` Ten Top Ten `` —the best ten films in ten American film genres—after polling over 1,500 people from the creative जातियाँ.
The Ten Commandments was listed as the tenth best film in the epic genre.
The film received सात Academy पुरस्कार nominations सहित Best Picture, and won the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects.
चार्ल्टन Heston was nominated for a Golden Globe Award for Best Motion Picture Actor in the drama category.
Yul Brynner जीती the National फलक of Review Award for बेहतरीन Actor for his role as Rameses, along with his other roles in The King and I and अनास्तासिया.
Louisville (, or ) is a प्रमुख city and the largest city in the U.S. state of Kentucky and the county seat of Jefferson County.
Since 2003, the city 's borders have been with those of the county because of a city-county merger.
The city 's total consolidated population at the 2010 census was 741,096 ( Louisville 's balance कुल, 602,011, excludes semi-autonomous towns and is the population listed in most sources and national rankings ).
As of 2010, the louisville metropolitan area ( MSA ) had a population of 1,307,647 ranking 42nd nationally.
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County and 12 surrounding counties, eight in Kentucky and four in Southern Indiana ( देखिए भूगोल below ).
the Louisville Combined Statistical Area, having a population of 1,451,564, includes the MSA, Hardin County and Larue County in Kentucky, and Scott County, इंडियाना.
An important internal shipping port in the 19th century, Louisville today is best known as the location of the Kentucky Derby, the first of तीन annual thoroughbred horse races making up the Triple Crown.
A typical experimental setup for an aldol प्रतिक्रिया.
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78 °C ) the temperature of which is being monitored by a thermocouple ( the तार on the left ).
A कूलिंग bath, in प्रयोगशाला chemistry ( often but not always organic chemistry ) practice, is a liquid mixture which is used to maintain low temperatures, typically between 13 °C and −196 °C.
ये low temperatures are used to collect liquids after distillation, to हटाएँ solvents using a rotary evaporator, or to perform a chemical reaction नीचे room temperature ( see : kinetic control ).
Cooling baths are generally एक of two types : ( a ) a cold fluid ( particularly liquid nitrogen, water, or even air ) — but most commonly the term refers to ( b ) a mixture of 3 components : ( 1 ) a cooling agent ( such as dry ice or water ice ) ; ( b ) a द्रव 'carrier ' ( such as liquid water, ethylene glycol, acetone, इत्यादि. ), which transfers heat between the bath and the vessel ; ; and ( c ) an additive to गुमसुम the melting-point of the solid/liquid system.
( A familiar example of this is the use of an ice/rock-salt mixture to freeze ice cream.
The phase-change of बर्फ into liquid water requires energy, 'pulling ' heat from the system.
Adding salt lowers the temp at which this happens, meaning more उर्जा has to be absorbed from the environment in order to melt the बर्फ.
This effectively makes the ice 'colder ' — it must 'pull ' more heat from its environment to become liquid. )
Eating disorders are conditions पारिभाषित by abnormal eating habits that may involve either insufficient or excessive food intake to the detriment of an individual 's physical and mental health.
Bulimia nervosa and anorexia nervosa are the most आम specific forms in the संयुक्त किंगडम.
Other प्रकार of खाने disorders include binge eating disorder and eating disorder not otherwise specified.
Bulimia nervosa is a disorder characterized by binge eating and purging.
Purging can include self-induce vomiting, over-exercising, and the usage of diuretics, enemas, and laxatives.
Anorexia nervosa is characterized by extreme food restriction to the point of self-starvation and excessive weight loss.
Though primarily thought of as affecting females ( an estimated 5–10 million being affected in the U.K. ), eating disorders affect males as खूब.
An estimated 10 – 15 % of people with eating disorders are males ( गोर्गान, 1999 ).
( an estimated 1 million U.K. males being affected ).
Although eating विकार are increasing all over the संसार among both men and women, there is evidence to suggest that it is women in the Western संसार who are at the highest risk of developing उन्हें and the degree of westernization increases the risk.
Nearly half of all अमेरिकी personally know someone with an eating disorder.
The skill to comprehend the central processes of appetite has increased tremendously since leptin was discovered, and the skill to observe the functions of the brain as well.
interactions between motivational, homeostatic and self-regulatory control processes are involved in eating behaviour, which is a key component in eating disorders.
the precise cause of eating disorders is not entirely समझा, but वहीँ is evidence that it may be linked to other medical शर्तें and situations.
Cultural idealization of thinness and youthfulness have contributed to eating disorders affecting diverse populations.
One study showed that girls with adhd have a greater chance of getting an eating disorder than those not affected by ADHD.
Another study suggested that women with PTSD, especially due to sexually related trauma, are more likely to develop anorexia nervosa.
एक study showed that foster girls are more संभावित to develop bulimia nervosa.
Some think that peer pressure and idealized body-types seen in the media are also a significant factor.
Some research show that for certain people there are genetic reasons why they may be prone to developing an eating disorder.
Recent studies have found evidence a correlation between patients with bulimia nervosa and substance use disorders.
In addition, anxiety disorders and personality विकार are आम occurrences with क्लाइंट of eating disorders.
While proper treatment can be highly effective for many suffering from specific प्रकार of eating disorders, the consequences of eating disorders can be severe, including मौत ( whether from direct medical effects of disturbed eating habits or from comorbid conditions such as suicidal thinking ).
Slavery in the United States existed from the early years of the colonial काल ; it was firmly established by the time the United States sought independence from Great Britain in 1776.
However, by 1804, all states north of the Mason and Dixon Line had either abolished slavery outright or passed laws for the gradual abolition of slavery.
In 1787 Congress prohibited slavery in the Northwest Territory.
But slavery gained new life in the South with the cotton industry after 1800, and expanded into the Southwest.
The nation was polarized into slave और free राज्य along the Mason-Dixon Line, which separated Pennsylvania and Maryland.
The United States and Great Britain both prohibited the international slave व्यापार in 1808, but the domestic trade, साथ sales to the Deep South, expanded dramatically, और many captives were shipped by the coastwise slave trade.
Before the 1840s, the South was vigorously defending slavery and its expansion into the territories.
In the North some abolitionists denounced it as sinful, and numerous anti-slavery forces अस्वीकृत it as detrimental to the rights of free men.
After failed compromises and Abraham Lincoln 's election, in 1861 eleven slave states broke away to form the Confederate States of America, अग्रणी to the American Civil War.
The federal government in 1862 made abolition of slavery a war लक्ष्य.
In January 1863 President Lincoln freed slaves in the Confederacy through the Emancipation Proclamation.
बाद the war, the Thirteenth Amendment, effective December 1865, abolished slavery throughout the entire United States, including the Border states and the Indian territories.
From the 16th to the 19th centuries, an अनुमानित 12 million Africans were shipped as slaves to the Americas.
See Slavery in the Americas.
The great majority went to the sugar plantations of the West Indies or Brazil, where mortality was ऊँची.
About 645,000 were brought to what is now the United States.
By the 1860 संयुक्त राज्य Census, the slave population in the American South था grown to four million.
Of all 1,515,605 families in the 15 slave states, nearly 400,000 held slaves ( roughly एक in चार ), amounting to 8 % of all American परिवारों.
While कुछ स्लेव worked as हाउस servants and urban artisans, the great majority worked on plantations or large farms, cultivating lucrative cash crops, such as राइस, tobacco, sugar and, after 1800, chiefly cotton.
By 1860 most slaves were held in the Deep South, where they served in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in cotton.
In small operations, they worked with their owners.
In large बागानों they were directed by white paid overseers.
Under the system that became chattel slavery ( ownership of a human being, and of his/her descendants ), a racial तत्व was fundamental : slaves were blacks of African descent and owned, almost universally, by whites of European descent.
In the 17th century, Virginia, followed by other southern colonies, enacted law that children of slave mothers were born into slavery.
Slaves could लाभ freedom only by running away ( which थी difficult and illegal to do ), or by manumission by owners, which थी regulated by states, and became increasingly difficult or prohibited.
In the earliest era of chattel slavery, the colonies also organized work by a system of bonded labor known as indentured servitude.
This typically lasted for several years लिये both poor Europeans and Africans alike, to pay off the costs of transport to the colonies.
They contracted for such arrangements because of poor economies in their home countries.
Between 1680 और 1700, as fewer Europeans migrated to the colonies, planters began to import more Africans as slaves.
Recognizing the महत्व of slavery, the House of Burgesses in Virginia enacted a new slave code in 1705 ; it combined a variety of legislation and added नई provisions enforcing white supremacy in the law.
Schematic cross section of part of leaf, xylem shown as red circles at figure 8.
Xylem is one of the two types of transport tissue in vascular plants ( phloem is the other ).
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ), meaning `` wood '' ; the best-known xylem tissue is wood, though it is found throughout the plant.
Its मौलिक function is to transport water, but it भी transports some nutrients through the plant.
This clock representation shows some of the major units of geological time and definitive events of Earth history.
The Hadean eon represents the time before fossil रिकार्ड of life on Earth ; its upper boundary is अभी regarded as 4.0 Ga ( billion years पहले ).
Other subdivisions प्रतिबिंबित the evolution of life ; the archean and Proterozoic are both eons, the Palaeozoic, Mesozoic and Cenozoic हैं eras of the Phanerozoic इओन.
The two million year Quaternary period, the time of recognizable humans, is too small to be visible at this scale.
the भूगर्भिक time scale is a system of chronological measurement कि relates stratigraphy to time, and is used by geologists, paleontologists, and other धरती scientists to describe the timing and relationships between events that have occurred throughout Earth 's history.
The table of geologic time spans presented here agrees with the dates and nomenclature set forth by the International Commission on Stratigraphy standard color codes of the International आयोग on स्तरिकी.
Evidence from radiometric dating indicates that the Earth is about 4.54 billion years old.
The geology or deep time of Earth 's past has been organized into various units according to events which took place in each period.
Different spans of time on the GTS are usually delimited by changes in the composition of strata which correspond to them, indicating major geological or paleontological events, ऐसे as mass extinctions.
For example, the boundary between the Cretaceous period and the Paleogene period is defined by the Cretaceous–Paleogene extinction event, which marked the demise of the dinosaurs और many other groups of जीवन.
Older time spans which predate the विश्वसनीय fossil रिकार्ड ( before the Proterozoic Eon ) हैं defined by absolute age.
The TI-82 is a graphing परिपथ made by Texas Instruments.
The TI-82 was designed in 1993 as a stripped down, more उपयोक्ता friendly version of the TI-85, and as a replacement for the TI-81.
It was the सीधा predecessor of the TI-83.
It shares with the TI-85 a 6 MHz Zilog Z80 microprocessor.
Like the TI-81, the TI-82 features a 96x64 pixel display, and the core feature set of the TI-81 with many new features.
The cast of characters of The King of Fighters XI.
The King of Fighters fighting खेल series, produced by SNK Playmore, includes a wide cast of characters, some of which are taken from other SNK games.
The story takes प्लेस in a fictional universe in जिससे an annual श्रेणी of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 fighting tournaments are held.
the first game in the श्रेणी introduces the initial main character of the series, Kyo kusanagi, a यंग Japanese fighter who is the heir to a powerful group of martial कलाकारों having pyrokinetic abilities.
Kyo fights against the Kusanagi clan 's enemies, his rival Iori Yagami, and the god Orochi and its human followers, among others.
The first चार games in the series revolve about ये fights, while The King of सेनानी '99 introduces a new स्टोरी arc, revolving around k ', a young man जो seeks to destroy the mysterious NESTS organization क्युकी they kidnapped him at an early age and stripped him of his past memories, so कि they could force him to be a सेनानी under their control.
In The King of Fighters 2003, a नई character named Ash Crimson enters the tournament, to चोरी the powers of the clans who sealed the Orochi in the past for an unknown कारण.
A new group of antagonists, known as Those From the Past, also appears in the series ; they want to obtain Orochi 's power for the purpose of giving it to their unknown master.
the plot and the characters आए from the Yamata no Orochi legend.
वहीँ हैं also several characters in the games that are parodies or homages to several popular anime, manga, and films.
Merchandise based on the characters has also been released, including action figures and keychains.
The characters have garnered praise from several video game publications for the विशेषता of their designs and movesets.
Comments focused on the lack of improvements in some of the characters, but added that the roster is greatly diverse.
Whale Wars is a weekly American documentary-style reality television series that premiered on नवम्बर 7, 2008 on the Animal Planet केबल channel.
the program follows Paul Watson, founder of the Sea Shepherd Conservation Society, as he and the crew aboard their various vessels harass Japanese whalers off the coast of Antarctica.
On January 5, 2013, Animal Planet renewed the श्रेणी लिये a sixth season.
The Harpy Eagle ( Harpia harpyja ) is a Neotropical species of eagle.
It is sometimes known as the American Harpy Eagle to distinguish it from the पापुआई Eagle जिससे is sometimes known as the New Guinea Harpy Eagle or Papuan Harpy Eagle.
It is the largest and most powerful raptor found in the Americas, and among the largest extant species of eagles in the world.
It usually inhabits tropical lowland rainforests in the upper ( emergent ) canopy layer.
Destruction of इसके natural habitat has seen it vanish from अनेक parts of इसके पूर्व range, and it is nearly extirpated in Central America.
Biological classification, or scientific classification in biology, is a method of scientific taxonomy used to group and categorize जीवों into groups such as genus or species.
ये groups are known as taxa ( singular : टैक्सोन ).
Modern biological classification has its root in the work of Carolus Linnaeus, who grouped species according to shared physical characteristics.
These groupings have since been revised to improve consistency with the Darwinian principle of common descent.
With the परिचय of the cladistic विधि in the late 20th century, phylogenetic taxonomy in which organisms are grouped based purely on inferred evolutionary relatedness, ignoring morphological similarity, has become common in some areas of biology.
Molecular phylogenetics, which uses DNA sequences as data, has also driven many हाल revisions and is likely to continue doing so.
Biological classification belongs to the science of biological systematics.
Lennon 's signature
John Winston Ono Lennon, ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 October 1940 – 8 December 1980 ) was an English musician, singer and songwriter who rose to worldwide fame as a founder member of the Beatles, one of the most commercially successful and critically acclaimed acts in the history of popular music.
With Paul McCartney, he formed one of the most celebrated songwriting partnerships of the 20th century.
Born and raised in Liverpool, as a teenager Lennon became involved in the skiffle craze ; his first band, the Quarrymen, विकसित into the Beatles in 1960.
As the group disintegrated towards the end of the decade, Lennon embarked on a सोलो career that produced the critically acclaimed albums John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band और Imagine, and iconic songs such as `` Give Peace a मौका `` और `` Imagine ``.
After his marriage to Yoko Ono in 1969, he changed his name to John Ono Lennon.
Lennon disengaged himself from the music business in 1975 to devote time to उठाने his infant son Sean, but re-emerged with Ono in 1980 with the new एल्बम दोगुना Fantasy.
He was murdered तीन weeks after its release.
Lennon revealed a rebellious nature and acerbic wit in his music, writing, drawings, on film and in interviews.
Controversial through his political और peace activism, he moved to New York City in 1971, where his criticism of the Vietnam War resulted in a lengthy attempt by Richard Nixon 's administration to deport him, जबकि some of his songs were adopted as anthems by the anti-war movement.
As of 2012, Lennon 's solo album बिक्री in the United States exceed 14 million units, and as writer, co-writer or performer, he is responsible for 25 number-one singles on the US Hot 100 चार्ट.
In 2002, a बीबीसी poll on the 100 महानतम britons voted him eighth, and in 2008, Rolling Stone ranked him the fifth-greatest singer of all समय.
he was posthumously inducted into the songwriters Hall of Fame in 1987 and into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1994.
Statue of Rip van Winkle in Irvington, New York, not far from `` Sunnyside ``, the home of Washington Irving
`` Rip Van Winkle '' is a short story by American author Washington Irving published in 1819, as खूब as the name of the story 's fictional protagonist.
Written while Irving was living in Birmingham, England, it was part of a collection हकदार The Sketch Book of Geoffrey Crayon.
Although the story is set in नई York 's Catskill Mountains, Irving later admitted, `` When I wrote the story, I had never been on the Catskills. ''

This पेज only includes the प्रतिस्पर्धी awards won by various artists.

Pee-wee herman is a comic fictional character created and portrayed by American comedian Paul Reubens.
He is best known for his two television series and film series during the 1980s.
The childlike Pee-wee Herman character developed as a stage act that quickly led to an HBO special in 1981.
As the stage performance gained further popularity, Reubens took the character to motion चित्र with pee-wee 's Big Adventure in 1985, toning down the वयस्क innuendo for the appeal of children.
इस paved the way for Pee-wee 's Playhouse, an Emmy Award winning children 's series that ran on CBS from 1986-1991.
Another film, Big Top Pee-wee, was released in 1988.
Due to negative media attention following a scandal in 1991, Reubens decided to shelve his alter ego during the 1990s, and then gradually resurrected it during the following decade.
It was at that time that reubens addressed योजनाएँ to लिखें a new Pee-wee film, Pee-wee 's Playhouse : The Movie.
In June 2007, Reubens appeared as Pee-wee Herman for the first समय since 1991 at Spike tv 's Guys ' चुनाव Awards.
That '70s दिखाएँ is an American television period sitcom that centers on the lives of a group of teenage friends living in the fictional suburban town of Point Place, Wisconsin, from May 17, 1976, to December 31, 1979.
It debuted on the Fox television संजाल, first airing on August 23, 1998, running for आठ consecutive सीज़न, and concluding with the 200th episode on May 18, 2006.

The main adult cast members were Debra Jo Rupp, Kurtwood Smith, Don Stark and, दौरान the first three seasons, Tanya Roberts.
Kansas ( ) is a U.S. state located in the Midwestern United States.
It is named बाद the Kansas River which flows through it, which in turn was named after the Kansa देशी American tribe, which inhabited the area.
the tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is often said to औसत `` people of the wind '' or `` people of the south wind, '' although this was probably नहीं the पद 's original meaning.
Residents of Kansas are called `` Kansans. ''
For thousands of years what is now Kansas was home to numerous and diverse Native American tribes.
Tribes in the Eastern part of the state generally lived in villages साथ the river valleys.
Tribes in the Western part of the state were semi- nomadic और hunted large herds of bison.
कान्सास was पहला settled by European Americans in the 1830s, but the pace of settlement accelerated in the 1850s, in the midst of political wars over the slavery समस्या.
When officially opened to settlement by the U.S. government in 1854, abolitionist Free-Staters from New England and pro-slavery settlers from neighboring Missouri rushed to the territory to determine if Kansas would become a free राज्य or a slave state.
Thus, the area was a hotbed of violence and chaos in its early days as these forces collided, and was known as Bleeding Kansas.
The abolitionists eventually prevailed and on January 29, 1861, Kansas डाला the Union as a free राज्य.
After the Civil War, the population of Kansas grew rapidly, when waves of immigrants turned the prairie into farmland.
Today, Kansas is one of the most productive agricultural राज्य, producing high yields of wheat, sorghum and sunflowers.
Kansas is the 15th most extensive and the 33rd most populous of the 50 United States.
मनोविज्ञान is an academic and applied discipline that involves the scientific study of mental functions and behaviors.
Psychology has the immediate goal of understanding individuals and groups by both establishing general principles and researching specific cases, and by many accounts it ultimately aims to लाभ society.
In this field, a professional or researcher is called a psychologist and can be classified as a सोशल, behavioral, or cognitive scientist.
Psychologists attempt to understand the role of mental functions in individual and सोशल behavior, while also exploring the physiological and neurobiological processes that underlie certain cognitive functions and behaviors.
Psychologists explore concepts such as perception, cognition, attention, emotion, phenomenology, motivation, brain कामकाज, personality, behavior, and interpersonal relationships.
Psychologists of diverse stripes also consider the unconscious mind.
Psychologists employ empirical methods to infer causal and correlational relationships between psychosocial variables.
In addition, or in opposition, to employing empirical and deductive methods, some—especially clinical and counseling psychologists—at times rely upon symbolic interpretation and अन्य inductive techniques.
Psychology has been described as a `` hub science '', with psychological findings linking to research and perspectives from the social sciences, natural sciences, medicine, and the humanities, such as philosophy.
While psychological knowledge is often applied to the assessment and treatment of mental health problems, it is also निर्देशित towards understanding और solving problems in अनेक different spheres of human activity.
The majority of psychologists are involved in some kind of therapeutic role, practicing in clinical, counseling, or school settings.
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to mental processes and behavior, and typically work in university psychology departments or teach in other academic settings ( e.g., medical schools, hospitals ).
Some are employed in industrial and organizational settings, or in अन्य areas such as इंसान development and aging, खेल, health, and the media, as well as in forensic investigation and other aspects of law.
Thomas Jefferson ( April 13, 1743 ( April 2, 1743 O.S. ) – July 4, 1826 ) was an American Founding Father, the principal author of the Declaration of Independence ( 1776 ) और the third अध्यक्ष of the United राज्य ( 1801–1809 ).
At the beginning of the American Revolution, he served in the Continental Congress, representing Virginia and then served as a wartime Governor of Virginia ( 1779–1781 ).
Just after the war ended, from mid-1784 Jefferson served as a diplomat, stationed in Paris.
In May 1785, he became the United States Minister to France.
Jefferson was the first संयुक्त States Secretary of State ( 1790–1793 ) serving under President George Washington.
With उसके close friend James Madison he organized the Democratic-Republican पार्टी, and subsequently resigned from Washington 's cabinet.
Elected Vice President in 1796, when he came in second to John एडम्स of the Federalists, Jefferson opposed Adams and with Madison secretly wrote the Kentucky and Virginia Resolutions, which attempted to nullify the Alien and Sedition Acts.
Elected president in what Jefferson called the Revolution of 1800, he oversaw the purchase of the vast louisiana Territory इससे France ( 1803 ), and भेजा the Lewis and Clark Expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the new west.
His second term was beset साथ troubles at home, ऐसे as the failed treason trial of his former Vice अध्यक्ष Aaron Burr.
With escalating trouble with Britain who was चुनौतीपूर्ण American neutrality and threatening shipping at sea, he आजमाया economic warfare with his embargo laws जिससे only damaged अमरीकी trade.
in 1803, President Jefferson initiated a process of भारतीय tribal हटाना and relocation to the Louisiana Territory west of the Mississippi River, in अनुक्रम to open lands for eventual American settlers.
A leader in the Enlightenment, Jefferson थी a polymath who spoke five languages fluently and was deeply interested in science, invention, architecture, religion and philosophy, interests that led him to the founding of the विश्वविद्यालयों of Virginia after his presidency.
He designed his own large mansion on a 5,000 acre plantation near Charlottesville, Virginia, which he नामित Monticello.
While not a notable orator, Jefferson was a skilled लेखक और corresponded with many influential people in America and यूरोपीय throughout his adult life.
Though Jefferson owned many slaves, he opposed the institution all his life and नतीजतन treated and took care of them very well and expected them to work no more than free farmers.
Since 1802 historians and others have been divided over the controversy of whether जेफरसन was the father of one or more children belonging to Sally Hemings, a slave at Monticello. ''
Historians are also in disagreement with how much Jefferson was committed to the anti-slavery cause.
In 1807, President Jefferson signed into law a bill that banned the importation of slaves into the United States.
बाद मार्था Jefferson, his wife of eleven सालो, died in 1782, जेफरसन remained a widower for the rest of his life ; their marriage produced six children, of whom two survived to adulthood.
Though जेफरसन has been criticized by many modern day scholars over the issue of slavery, he remains rated as one of the greatest U.S. presidents.
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest सोंग written by Steven Van Zandt, produced by Van Zandt and Arthur Baker और recorded by Artists United Against Apartheid to convey opposition to the South African policy of apartheid.
The primary means of that opposition is to declare कि all the artists involved would refuse any and all offers to perform at सूर्य City, a resort which was located in Bantustan of Bophuthatswana, one of a number of internationally unrecognized supposed `` independent '' states created by the South African government to forcibly relocate इसके black population.

Bill Russell won 11 championships with the Boston Celtics.
इस is a सूची of NBA players साथ most championships won as a player.
The National Basketball Association ( NBA ) is a प्रमुख professional basketball league in North America.
It was founded in 1946 as the Basketball Association of America ( BAA ).
The league adopted its वर्तमान name at the start of the when it merged with the National Basketball League ( NBL ).
the एनबीए Finals is the championship series for the NBA and the conclusion of the sport 's postseason.
The winning team of the series receives the Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy.
Players from the winning team usually receive championship बजती from the टोली honoring their contribution.
However, in some rare अवसर, the teams opted to gave other commemorative items, such as wrist watches, instead of rings.
the क्रमांक of championships won by NBA superstars is often used as a measurement of उनके greatness.
Boston Celtics center Bill Russell holds the record for the most NBA championships won with 11 titles during his 13-year playing career.
He won उसके first championship with the Boston Celtics in his rookie year.
Afterwards, he went on to win 10 championships in the next 12 years, including eight लगातार championships from 1959 to 1966.
He won the last two championships in 1968 and 1969 as player-coach.
Russell 's teammate, Sam Jones, won 10 championships from 1959 to 1969, the second most in NBA history.
Four सेल्टिक्स players, Tom Heinsohn, K. C. Jones, Satch Sanders and John Havlicek, won eight championships each.
Two other Celtics, Jim Loscutoff and Frank Ramsey, won seven championships each.
Four players, bob Cousy, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Michael Jordan and Scottie Pippen, won six championships each.
Jordan and Pippen are members of the Chicago bulls team who won three consecutive championships twice in the 1990s.
Robert Horry and John Salley are the तभी players to have won the championships with three different टीमों.
Horry won seven championships with the Houston Rockets, the Los Angeles Lakers and the San Antonio Spurs, while Salley won four championships साथ the Detroit Pistons, the Bulls and the Lakers.
Frank Saul और Steve Kerr are the only players to win दो championships with two different teams in consecutive seasons.
Saul won consecutive championships with the Rochester Royals and the Minneapolis Lakers in the 1950s, while Kerr won consecutive championships with the Bulls and the Spurs in the 1990s,
Accuracy indicates proximity of measurement results to the true value, precision to the repeatability, or reproducibility of the measurement
In the fields of science, engineering, industry, and statistics, the accuracy of a measurement प्रणाली is the degree of closeness of measurements of a quantity to कि quantity 's वास्तविक ( true ) value.
the precision of a measurement system, also called reproducibility or repeatability, is the degree to which repeated माप under unchanged conditions show the वही results.
हालांकि the two words reproducibility and repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial use, वे हैं deliberately contrasted in the context of the scientific method.
A measurement system can be accurate but not precise, precise but not accurate, neither, or both.
For उदाहरण, if an experiment contains a systematic error, then increasing the sample size generally increases precision but does not improve accuracy.
The result would be a consistent yet inaccurate string of results from the flawed experiment.
Eliminating the व्यवस्थित error improves accuracy but does not change precision.
A measurement system is designated valid if it is दोनो accurate and precise.
Related terms include bias ( non- random or निर्देशित effects caused by a factor or factors unrelated to the independent variable ) and error ( random variability ).
The terminology is also applied to indirect measurements—that is, values obtained by a computational procedure from observed data.
In addition to accuracy और precision, measurements may also have a measurement resolution, which is the smallest change in the underlying physical quantity that produces a जवाब in the measurement.
In the case of full reproducibility, such as when rounding a number to a representable floating point number, the word precision has a meaning not सम्बन्धित to reproducibility.
For example, in the IEEE 754-2008 standard it means the number of bits in the significand, so it is used as a माप for the relative accuracy with which an arbitrary number can be represented.
Fuck in its literal अर्थ refers to the act of sexual मैथुन.
it is an English शब्द that is प्रायः used as a profanity, either to denote disdain or as an intensifier.
The origin of the word is अस्पष्ट.
It is usually considered to be पहला attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably पुरानी.
In modern usage, fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the position of a संज्ञा, a verb, an क्रियाशील or an adverb.
There are many common phrases which make use of the word, as खूब as a number of compounds incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
Animated, color-coded मैप showing the various continents और regions.
Depending on the convention and model, some continents may be संचित or subdivided : for example, Eurasia is सबसे often subdivided into Europe and Asia ( red shades ), while उत्तर and South America are sometimes recognized as one American continent ( green shades ).
A continent is one of several very large landmasses on धरती.
They are generally identified by convention rather than any strict criteria, with up to seven regions commonly regarded as continents—they are ( from largest in size to smallest ) : Asia, अफ़्रीकी, North America, South America, Antarctica, Europe, and Australia.
In geology, continents are described by means of tectonic plates.
Plate tectonics is the process and पढ़ाई of the गति, collision and division of continents, earlier known as continental drift.

Community property is a marital property regime that originated in civil law jurisdictions and is now also मिला in some common law jurisdictions.
The states of the United राज्य कि recognize community property are primarily in the West ; it थी inherited from Mexico 's ganancial community system, which itself was inherited from Spanish law ( a Roman -derived civil law प्रणाली ) और ultimately from the Visigoths.
While under Spanish rule Louisiana अपनाया the ganancial community system of acquests and gains, which replaced the traditional French community of movables and acquests in its civil law system.
Map of the United States with community property states highlighted in red.
In addition to the highlighted states, Alaska is a separate property state कि permits couples to opt into a community property arrangement.
In a community property jurisdiction, most property acquired during the marriage ( except for gifts or inheritances ) —the community, or communio bonorum—is owned jointly by both spouses and is divided upon divorce, annulment or death.
Joint ownership is automatically presumed by law in the absence of specific evidence that would point to a contrary conclusion for a particular piece of property.
Division of community property may take place by item, by splitting all items or by value.
In some jurisdictions, such as California, a 50/50 division of community property is strictly mandated by statute, meaning that the focus then shifts to whether particular items are to be classified as community or पृथक property.
In अन्य jurisdictions, such as Texas, a divorce अदालत may decree an `` equitable distribution `` of community property, which may result in an unequal division of such.
In non-community property states property may be divided by निष्पक्ष distribution.
Generally speaking, the property that each partner brings into the marriage or receives by gift, bequest or devise during marriage is called separate property ( i.e., not community property ).
See प्रभाग of property.
Division of community debts may नहीं be the same as division of community प्रॉपर्टी.
For example, in California, community property is required to be divided `` equally '' while community debt is required to be divided `` equitably ''.
Property that is owned by one spouse before the marriage is the separate property of that spouse, unless the property is `` transmuted '' into community property.
The rules for this vary from jurisdiction to jurisdiction.
the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge waving to the भीड at The Mall shortly after the wedding.
The wedding of Prince William, Duke of Cambridge, and Catherine Middleton took place on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey in London.
The groom, प्रिंस William, Duke of Cambridge, is the eldest son of Charles, Prince of Wales, and is दूसरी in the लकीर of succession to the British Throne and the thrones of fifteen other Commonwealth realms.
The bride, Catherine `` Kate '' मिडलटन is the eldest of three children of Michael और Carole Middleton of Bucklebury, Berkshire.
The Dean of Westminster, John Hall, presided at the service ; the Archbishop of Canterbury, Rowan Williams, conducted the marriage ; Richard Chartres, the Bishop of London, preached the sermon ; and a पढना थी given by the bride 's brother, James.
William 's best man was his bhai, Prince Harry, while the bride 's sister, Pippa, was maid of इज्ज़त.
The रस्म was attended by the bride 's and groom 's families, as well as many foreign royals, diplomats, and the couple 's chosen personal guests.
After the ceremony, the couple made the traditional appearance on the balcony of Buckingham Palace.
As Prince William was not the heir apparent to the throne, the wedding was not a full state occasion and many details were left to the couple to decide, such as much of the guest list of परिचय 1,900.
Prince William and Kate Middleton met in 2001.
Their engagement on 20 October 2010 was घोषित on 16 November 2010.
The build-up to the wedding and the occasion itself attracted much media ध्यान, being compared in many ways with the 1981 marriage of William 's parents.
The occasion थी a public holiday in the United Kingdom and featured many ceremonial aspects, including use of the state carriages and roles for the Foot Guards and Household Cavalry.
Events were आयोजित around the Commonwealth to mark the विवाह ; organisations and hotels held events across Canada, over 5,000 street parties were held throughout the United Kingdom, और one million लोगों lined the route between Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace.
The ceremony was viewed live by tens of millions more around the world, including 72 million on the YouTube Royal Channel.
In the United Kingdom, television audiences peaked at 26.3 million viewers, with a कुल of 36.7 million watching part of the coverage.
