A telephone prefix is the first set of digits of a telephone number ; in the North American क्रमांकन Plan countries ( country code 1 ), it is the first three digits of a seven-digit phone क्रमांक.
In other countries both the prefix and the क्रमांक may have different lengths.
It shows which exchange the remaining numbers refer to.
A full telephone number is usually made up of country code ( required for international calls only ), area code ( required for calls between telephone areas ), prefix, and सदस्य number.
Some places restrict certain prefixes to fax numbers or कोशिका phones only ; in अन्य places such dedicated prefixes are not used.
As telephone technology advanced, the precise significance of the prefix became blurred in many places ; 485 in London, UK, was once the GULliver exchange, but now 44207485xxxx is just considered एक of अनेक number blocks परोसा by the clken Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another.
Metformin ( BP, pronounced, ; originally sold as Glucophage ) is an oral antidiabetic drug in the biguanide class.
It is the first-line drug of choice for the treatment of type 2 diabetes, in particular, in overweight and obese people and those with normal kidney function.
Its use in गर्भकालीन diabetes has been limited by safety concerns.
It is also used in the treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome, and has been investigated लिये other diseases where इंसुलिन resistance may be an important factor.
Metformin works by suppressing ग्लूकोज production by the liver.
Metformin is the तभी antidiabetic drug that has been conclusively shown to prevent the cardiovascular complications of diabetes.
It helps reduce LDL cholesterol and triglyceride levels, and is not associated with weight gain.
, metformin is एक of only two मौखिक antidiabetics in the World Health Organization मॉडल List of Essential दवाइयाँ ( the other होने glibenclamide ).
When prescribed appropriately, metformin causes few प्रतिकूल effects ( the most common is gastrointestinal upset ) and is संबद्ध with a low risk of hypoglycemia.
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can be a serious चिंता in overdose and when it is prescribed to people with contraindications, but otherwise, वहीँ is no significant risk.
First synthesized and found to reduce blood sugar in the 1920s, metformin was forgotten for the next two दशकों as research shifted to insulin और other antidiabetic drugs.
Interest in metformin was rekindled in the late 1940s after several reports that it could reduce blood sugar levels in people, और in 1957, French physician Jean sterne published the पहला clinical trial of metformin as a treatment for diabetes.
It was introduced to the United Kingdom in 1958, Canada in 1972, and the United States in 1995.
Metformin is now believed to be the most widely prescribed antidiabetic drug in the world ; in the United States अलोन, more than 48 million prescriptions were filled in 2010 for its generic formulations.
The Mount Rushmore National Memorial is a sculpture carved into the granite face of Mount rushmore near Keystone, South Dakota, in the United States.
Sculpted by Danish-American Gutzon Borglum and his son, Lincoln Borglum, माउंट Rushmore features sculptures of the heads of four United States presidents : George Washington, Thomas जेफरसन, Theodore Roosevelt और Abraham Lincoln.
The संपूर्ण memorial covers and is above sea level.
The tallest mountain in the region is Harney Peak ( ).
South Dakota इतिहासकार Doane Robinson is credited साथ conceiving the idea of carving the likenesses of famous लोगों into the Black Hills region of South Dakota in order to promote पर्यटन in the region.
Robinson 's initial idea was to sculpt the Needles ; however, Gutzon Borglum rejected the Needles site because of the poor quality of the granite and strong opposition from environmentalists and Native American groups.
They settled on the Mount Rushmore location, which also has the advantage of facing southeast for maximum sun exposure.
Robinson wanted it to feature western heroes like Lewis and Clark, Red Cloud and Buffalo Bill Cody but Borglum decided the sculpture should have a more national focus, and chose the four presidents whose likenesses would be carved into the mountain.
After securing federal funding, construction on the मेमोरियल began in 1927, and the presidents ' faces were completed between 1934 and 1939.
Upon Gutzon Borglum 's death in March 1941, his son Lincoln Borglum took over construction.
Although the initial concept पुकारा for each president to be depicted from head to waist, lack of funding forced construction to end in late October 1941.
The U.S. National Park Service took control of the memorial in 1933, जबकि it was still under construction, and has managed the memorial to the present day.
It attracts nearly three million लोगों annually.

A shirt, dress कमीज़, button-front, button-front shirt, or button-up shirt is a garment with a collar, a full-length opening at the front from the collar to the hem, and टाँक साथ cuffs.
Shirts are predominantly प्रयुक्त by men, since women usually wear blouses.
The front खोलने is fastened using buttons or studs, और the cuffs close with buttons or cuff कड़ी.
Shirts are normally made from woven cloth, and are often accompanied by a jacket और tie, for example with a suit or formalwear, but shirts are भी worn more casually.
In अंग्रेजों English, dress shirt means specifically the more formal evening garment worn with black- or white- tie, also discussed below.
Some of these formal shirts have stiff fronts and detachable collars attached with collar studs.
The term `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of shirt which has a collar fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes used in error to apply to all shirts ( with or without buttoned down collars ), being used as a synonym for `` button-up '' or `` button-front ''.
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin दिन ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in several countries to recognize the work of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support professionals.
In North America, it is celebrated on the Wednesday of the last full week of अप्रैल ( April 24 in 2013 ).
In France it is celebrated on the third Thursday in April ( April 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is celebrated on the first Friday in May

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 नवम्बर 1665 ) was the leading painter of the classical French Baroque style, although he spent सबसे of उसके working life in Rome.
His कार्य is characterized by clarity, logic, and order, and favors line over color.
Until the 20th century he remained a major inspiration for such classically oriented कलाकारों as Jacques-Louis David, Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres and Paul Cézanne.
He worked in Rome लिये a circle of leading collectors there and elsewhere, except for a short period when Cardinal Richelieu ordered him वापस to France to serve as First Painter to the King.
Most of his works are history paintings of religious or mythological subjects that very often have a large landscape element.
Jackie Keith Whitley ( July 1, 1954stambler, इरविन, and grelun Landon ( 2000 ). - Country Music : The Encyclopedia. - New York : St. मार्टिन 's Press. - p.533. - ISBN 978-0-312-26487-1.—Carlin, Richard ( 2003 ). - देश म्यूज़िक : A Biographical Dictionary. - New York : Routledge - p.427. - ISBN 978-0-415-93802-0.—Larkin, Colin ( 1995 ). - The गिनीज Encyclopedia of Popular Music. - New York : Stockton Press - P.4462. - ISBN 978-0-85112-662-3.—Stanton, Scott ( 2003 ). - The Tombstone Tourist : Musicians. - New York : Pocket Books. - p.395. - ISBN 978-0-7434-6330-0.—Hicks, Jack. - `` Singer Keith whitley 's Memory Alive Through Songs, Love in घर Town ''. - The Kentucky Post. - September 25, 1991.— '' Country Music Star Keith Whitley Dead at 33 ''. - Lexington Herald-Leader. - May 10, 1989.——Hurst, Jack. - `` whitley 's Last Days ''. - Chicago Tribune. - May 14, 1989.— '' Alcohol Kills Country Singer Keith Whitley ''. - United Press International. - ( c/o The San Francisco Chronicle ). - May 10, 1989. — May 9, 1989 ), ज्ञात professionally as Keith whitley, थी an American country music singer.
whitley 's brief करियर in मुख्यधारा country म्यूज़िक lasted इससे 1984 until his death in 1989, but he continues to influence an entire generation of singers and songwriters.
He charted 19 singles on the Billboard country charts, including five consecutive Number Ones : `` Do n't Close Your Eyes ``, `` When You Say Nothing at All ``, `` I 'm No अजनबी to the Rain ``, `` I Wonder Do You Think of Me `` and `` It Ai n't Nothin ' `` ( the last two posthumously ).
Statute of Grand Duchy of Lithuania, written in Polish
A statute is a औपचारिक written enactment of a legislative प्राधिकार that governs a state, city, or county.
Typically, statutes command or prohibit something, or घोषित नीति.
The word is प्रायः used to distinguish law made by legislative bodies from case law, decided by courts, and regulations issued by government agencies.
Statutes are sometimes referred to as legislation or `` ब्लैक letter law. ''
As a source of law, statutes are considered primary authority ( as opposed to secondary authority ).
Ideally all statutes must be in harmony with the fundamental law of the land ( constitutional ).
This word is used in contradistinction to the common law.
Statutes acquire their force from the time of their ड्योढ़ी, however unless otherwise provided.
Statutes are of several kinds ; namely, Public or private.
Declaratory or remedial.
Temporary or perpetual.
a temporary statute is one which is limited in its duration at the time of its enactment.
It continues in force until the time of its limitation has समाप्त, unless sooner repealed.
A perpetual statute is one for the continuance of which there is no limited time, although it may not be expressly declared to be so.
If, however, a statute which did नहीं itself contain any limitation is to be governed by another जिससे is अस्थाई only, the former होगा also be temporary and dependent upon the existence of the latter.
Before a statute becomes law in some countries, it must be agreed upon by the highest executive in the government, and finally published as भाग of a code.
In many countries, statutes हैं organized in topical arrangements ( or `` संहिताबद्ध '' ) within publications called codes, such as the United States Code.
in many राष्ट्र statutory law is distinguished from and subordinate to constitutional law.
The external iliac arteries are two major arteries which bifurcate off the common iliac धमनियों anterior to the sacroiliac joint of the pelvis.
They proceed anterior and inferior along the medial किनारा of the psoas major muscles.
They exit the pelvic girdle posterior and inferior to the inguinal ligament about एक third laterally from the insertion point of the inguinal ligament on the pubic tubercle at जिससे point they are referred to as the femoral arteries.
The external iliac artery is usually the धमनी used to attach the renal artery to the recipient of a kidney transplant.
Steam is a digital distribution, डिजिटल rights management, multiplayer and communications platform developed by Valve Corporation.
It is used to वितरित games and related media online, from small independent developers to larger software houses ; in October 2012, Valve expanded the service to include non-gaming software.
Steam provides the user with installation and automatic management of software आरपार multiple computers, जातियाँ features such as friends lists and groups, cloud saving, and in-game आवाज़ and chat functionality.
The software provides a freely available application programming इंटरफ़ेस, Steamworks, that developers can take advantage of to integrate many of Steam 's functions within their software उत्पाद, including copy protection, networking and matchmaking, in-game achievements and micro-transactions, and support for user-created content through Steam Workshop.
Though initially developed for use on Microsoft Windows, the client has विस्तारित to include OS X and Linux versions, and clients with limited functionality on the PlayStation 3 console and for दोनो iOS and Android mobile devices.
In addition to being a सेंट्रल hub for गेमिंग software, Valve has created a version of Steam with altered functionality to be used in स्कूलों for educational software, सहित a modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons.
, there are nearly 2000 games available through Steam, and 54 million active user accounts.
As of January 2013, Steam has seen over 6.6 million concurrent players.
Steam रै an अनुमानित 50–70 % share of the digital distribution market for video खेल.
The Steam logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank और लाठी from the Walschaerts valve gear of a steam locomotive.
जेरी Lewis ( born March 16, 1926 ) is an American comedian, actor, singer, film producer, screenwriter and film director.
He is known for his slapstick humor in film, television, stage and radio.
He was originally paired up with Dean Martin in 1946, forming the famed comedy team of Martin and Lewis.
in addition to the duo 's popular nightclub work, they स्ट्रक्चर in a successful series of कॉमेडी films for Paramount Pictures.
Lewis is also known for his charity fund-raising telethons and position as national chairman for the muscular Dystrophy Association ( MDA ).
Lewis has won several awards for lifetime achievements from The American Comedy Awards, Los Angeles Film Critics Association, और Venice Film Festival, and he has two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
In 2005, he received the Governors Award of the Academy of Television Arts & Sciences Board of Governors, which is the highest Emmy Award presented.
On February 22, 2009, the अकादमी of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences awarded Lewis the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award.
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a यूरोपीय river that runs from the Swiss canton of Grisons in the southeastern Swiss Alps through Germany and eventually flows into the North Sea coast in the नीदरलैंड्स और is the twelfth longest नदी in Europe, at about, with an औसत discharge of more than.
The Rhine and the Danube formed most of the northern inland frontier of the Roman Empire and, since those days, the Rhine has महरूम a vital and navigable waterway carrying trade and goods deep inland.
It has also served as a defensive feature and has been the basis for regional और international borders.
The many castles and prehistoric fortifications along the राइन testify to its महत्व as a waterway.
River traffic could be रोका at these locations, usually for the purpose of collecting tolls, by the state that controlled that portion of the river.
Sri ( सिंहली )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री, iast ; Śrī ), also transliterated as sree or Shri or Shree is a शब्द of Sanskrit origin, used in the Indian subcontinent as polite form of address समतुल्य to the English `` Mr. '' in written and spoken language, or as a title of veneration for deities ( usually translated as `` Holy '' ).

Civil engineering is a professional engineering discipline that deals with the design, construction, and maintenance of the physical and naturally built पर्यावरण, including works like roads, bridges, canals, dams, and buildings.
Civil अभियान्त्रिकी is the oldest engineering discipline after military engineering, and it was defined to distinguish non-military engineering from military engineering.
It is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines including environmental engineering, geotechnical engineering, geophysics, geodesy, कंट्रोल engineering, structural engineering, biomechanics, nanotechnology, transportation engineering, earth science, atmospheric sciences, forensic engineering, municipal or urban engineering, water resources engineering, materials engineering, coastal अभियान्त्रिकी, surveying, and construction engineering.
Civil अभियान्त्रिकी takes place on all levels : in the public sector इससे municipal through to national governments, and in the private sector from individual homeowners through to international companies.

Katherine Dunham ( June 22, 1909 – May 21, 2006 ) थी an American dancer, कोरियोग्राफर, author, educator, और social activist.
Dunham had one of the most successful dance careers in American and यूरोपीय theater of the 20th century, and directed her own dance company for many years.
She has been called the `` matriarch और महारानी mother of black dance ''.
During her heyday in the 1940s and 1950s, Dunham was renowned throughout Europe and Latin America and थी widely popular in the United States, where the Washington Post called her `` dancer Katherine the Great ''.
For almost thirty years she maintained the Katherine Dunham Dance Company, the only self-supported American black dance troupe at that time, and over her long career she choreographed more than ninety individual dances.
Dunham was an innovator in African-American modern dance as well as a leader in the field of dance anthropology, or ethnochoreology.
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 and 3500 species of mosses, commonly called peat moss due to its prevalence in wet habitats where it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires.
sphagnum accumulations can store water, since both living and dead plants can hold large quantities of water inside their cells ; plants may hold from 16-26 टाइम्स as much water as their dry weight depending on the species.
the empty cells help retain जल in drier conditions.
Hence, as sphagnum moss grows, it can slowly spread into drier conditions, forming larger peatlands, दोनो raised bogs and blanket bogs.
These peat accumulations तब provide habitat for a wide array of peatland plants, including sedges and ericaceous shrubs, as well as orchids and carnivorous plants.
Sphagnum and the peat formed from it do not decay readily because of the phenolic compounds embedded in the moss 's cell walls.
In addition, bogs, like all wetlands, develop anaerobic soil conditions, which produces slower anaerobic decay rather than aerobic microbial action.
Peat moss can also acidify its surroundings by taking up cations, such as कैल्सियम and magnesium, and releasing hydrogen ions.
Under the right conditions, peat can accumulate to a depth of many meters.
Different species of Sphagnum have different tolerance limits for flooding और ph, so any one peatland may have a number of अलग Sphagnum species.
Individual peat मॉस plants consist of a main stem, with tightly arranged clusters of branch fascicles usually consisting of two or three spreading branches and two to four hanging branches.
The top of the संयंत्र, or capitulum, has compact clusters of young शाखाओं.
Along the stem are scattered leaves of various shapes, नामित stem leaves ; the आकार varies according to species.
The leaves consist of two kinds of cells ; small, green, living cells ( chlorophyllose cells ), and large, clear, संरचनात्मक, मुर्दे cells ( hyaline cells ).
The latter have the large water-holding क्षमता.
the earliest version of the Network Card, issued manually rather than through an APTIS machine.
The first APTIS संस्करण of the Network Card.
This was used from the start of the APTIS era in 1986/1987 until खूब into the 1990s, as stocks had to be प्रयुक्त up despite the introduction of the new-look orange-banded version in 1991.
The introduction of the weekday minimum fare condition in 2002 resulted in a minor change : the red `` R '' shows that this is the `` Revised '' version of the railcard.
This version is still in use as of 2007.
The संजाल Railcard is a छूट card introduced in 1986 by British Rail, upon the creation of their Network SouthEast area around London, England.
The card is intended to प्रोत्साहित leisure travel by rail by offering discounts लिये adults and accompanying children on a wide range of off-peak fares.
The range of discounts available, and the price of the card, have varied since that time, but the card has always been valid for a year 's unlimited use.
It can be purchased by any person aged 16 or over from any staffed National Rail station or Rail Appointed Travel Agent, by completing an application form - no photographic identification or other दस्तावेज़ीकरण is needed to buy or use the card.
It is one of a number of concessionary fare schemes available on the British railway system.
The United Nations ( UN ; French : Organisation des राष्ट्र Unies, ONU ) is the world 's largest, foremost, and most prominent international organization.
The stated aims of the United Nations include promoting and facilitating cooperation in international law, international security, economic development, social progress, human rights, civil rights, सिविल लिबर्टीज, political freedoms, लोकतंत्र, and the achievement of lasting world peace.
The UN was founded in 1945 after World War II to replace the League of Nations, to stop wars between countries, and to provide a platform for संवाद.
it contains अनेक subsidiary organizations to carry out its missions.
At its founding, the UN had 51 member states ; as of 2011, there are 193.
From its offices around the world, the UN and its specialized agencies decide on substantive और administrative मुद्दे in regular meetings held throughout the year.
The organization has six principal organs : the General Assembly ( the main deliberative assembly ) ; the Security Council ( for deciding certain resolutions for सलाम and security ) ; the Economic and Social Council ( for assisting in promoting international आर्थिक और social cooperation और development ) ; the Secretariat ( for providing studies, information, and facilities needed by the UN ) ; the International अदालत of Justice ( the primary judicial organ ) ; and the United Nations Trusteeship Council ( which is currently inactive ).
Other prominent UN System agencies include the World Health Organization ( WHO ), the संसार Food कार्यक्रम ( WFP ) and United Nations Children 's Fund ( UNICEF ).
The UN 's most prominent position is that of the office of Secretary-General which has been held by Ban Ki-moon of South Korea since 2007.
The United राष्ट्र Headquarters resides in international territory in New York City, with further main कार्यालयों at Geneva, Nairobi, and Vienna.
The organization is financed from assessed and voluntary contributions from its member states, और has छह official languages : Arabic, Chinese, English, French, Russian, and Spanish.
South Beach, also nicknamed SoBe, is a neighborhood in the city of Miami Beach, Florida, United States, located due east of Miami city उचित between Biscayne Bay and the Atlantic समंदर.
The क्षेत्रफल encompasses all of the barrier islands of मियामी Beach south of Indian Creek.
This area was the first section of Miami Beach to be developed, starting in the 1910s, thanks to the development प्रयत्न of Carl G. फिशर, the Lummus Brothers, and जॉन S. Collins, the latter जिनकी निर्माण of the Collins Bridge provided the first vital land link between mainland Miami and the beaches.
The area has gone through numerous artificial and natural changes over the years, including a booming regional economy, increased tourism, and the 1926 hurricane, which destroyed much of the area.
As of 2010, about 39,186 residents live in South Beach.
The United States presidential election of 1960 थी the 44th quadrennial presidential election, held on Tuesday, November 8, 1960.
The Republican Party nominated incumbent Vice-President Richard Nixon, जबकि the Democratic Party nominated जॉन F. Kennedy, Senator from Massachusetts.
The incumbent President, Republican Dwight D. Eisenhower, was नहीं योग्य for re-election after serving the maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment.
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 votes, or 0.17 % of the popular vote, giving him a victory of 303 to 219 in the Electoral College, the closest since 1916.
This was the first election in which all fifty of the वर्तमान संयुक्त States participated.
A number of कारकों explain why the election was so बंद.
Kennedy gained since there was an economic recession which hurt the लाज़िम Republican, and he had the लाभ of 17 million more registered Democrats than Republicans.
Furthermore, the new votes that Kennedy gained among Catholics almost neutralized the new votes Nixon gained among Protestants.
Kennedy 's campaigning skills decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
in the end, Nixon 's emphasis on his experience carried छोटी weight, and he wasted energy by campaigning in all 50 states instead of concentrating on the swing states.
Kennedy used his large, well-funded campaign organization to win the nomination, secure समर्थन, and, with the aid of the last of the big-city bosses, to get out the vote in the big cities.
He relied on running mate Lyndon B. Johnson to hold the South and used television effectively.
This election is notable as being the first time in U.S. history that two sitting U.S. Senators ( Kennedy and जॉनसन ) were elected as president और vice-president, a phenomenon that has been repeated once, by Barack Obama and Joe Biden in 2008 ( in both cases, the president was the younger, more junior senator ).
A poster for a c. 1884 American production of Macbeth, starring Thomas W. Keene.
Depicted, counter clockwise from top-left, are : Macbeth और Banquo meet the witches ; just after the murder of Duncan ; banquo 's ghost ; Macbeth duels Macduff ; and Macbeth.
Macbeth is a play written by William Shakespeare.
It is considered one of his darkest and most powerful tragedies.
नियत in Scotland, the play dramatizes the corroding psychological and political effects produced when its protagonist, the Scottish रब Macbeth, chooses दुष्ट as the way to fulfill his ambition for power.
He commits regicide to become king और तब furthers उसके moral descent with a reign of murderous terror to stay in power, eventually plunging the country into civil war.
In the end, he loses everything that gives meaning और purpose to his life before losing his life itself.
The play is believed to have महरूम लिखा between 1603 and 1607, and is most commonly dated 1606.
The earliest account of a performance of what was probably Shakespeare 's play is April 1611, when Simon Forman recorded seeing such a play at the Globe Theatre.
It was first published in the Folio of 1623, possibly from a prompt book.
It was सबसे likely written during the reign of James I, who had been James VI of Scotland before he succeeded to the English throne in 1603.
James was a संरक्षक of shakespeare’s acting company, and of all the plays Shakespeare लिखा दौरान James’s reign, Macbeth most clearly reflects the playwright’s relationship साथ the sovereign.
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy, and tells the story of a brave Scottish general named Macbeth who receives a prophecy from a तिकड़ी of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland.
Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by उसके wife, Macbeth murders King Duncan and takes the throne for himself.
His reign is racked with guilt and paranoia, and he soon becomes a tyrannical ruler as he is forced to commit more and अधिक murders to protect himself from enmity and suspicion.
The bloodbath swiftly takes Macbeth and Lady Macbeth into realms of arrogance, madness, and death.
Shakespeare 's source for the tragedy is the account of King Macbeth of Scotland, Macduff, and Duncan in holinshed 's Chronicles ( 1587 ), a history of England, Scotland और Ireland familiar to Shakespeare and his contemporaries, although the events in the खेल differ extensively from the history of the real Macbeth.
In the backstage world of theatre, some believe कि the खेल is cursed, and will not mention its title aloud, referring to it instead as `` the Scottish play ``.
Over the course of many centuries, the play has attracted some of the most renowned actors to the भूमिकाएँ of Macbeth and महिला Macbeth.
it has been adapted to film, television, opera, novels, comic books, and other media.
The Milton Hershey School is a private philanthropic ( pre-K through 12 ) boarding स्कूल in Hershey, Pennsylvania.
Originally named the Hershey Industrial School, the institution was founded and वित्तपोषित by chocolate industrialist Milton snavely Hershey and his wife, कैथरीन Sweeney Hershey.
The school was originally established for impoverished, स्वस्थ, Caucasian, पुरूष orphans, while today it serves students of various backgrounds.
The Milton Hershey School Trust, जिससे funds the school, owns controlling interest in The Hershey Company and owns the Hershey Entertainment और Resorts Company ( HERCO ) which oversees अनेक of the area hotels along with a theme park called Hersheypark.
साथ over six billion dollars in एसेट, the Milton Hershey School is one of the wealthiest schools in the world.
The school is overseen by a Board of Managers.
The school currently serves 1,818 students, and plans to grow to 2,100 students by 2013.
A member of CORE : Coalition for Residential Education, it is the largest residential शिक्षा program in the US.

Electronic article, articles in scholarly journals or magazines that can be accessed via electronic transmission
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the United राज्य as Title II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which the manufacture, importation, possession, use and वितरण of certain substances is regulated.
The Act also served as the national implementing legislation for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ), with varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each.
Two संघीय agencies, the Drug प्रवर्तन प्रशासन and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing, and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation ऐसे as the hillory J. Farias और Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000, which लगाई gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I. वर्गीकरण decisions are जरूरी to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, और अंतरराष्ट्रीय treaties.
Second-language acquisition or second-language learning is the process by जिससे people learn a दूसरी language.
second-language acquisition ( often abbreviated to SLA ) also refers to the scientific discipline devoted to studying that process.
Second language refers to any language learned in addition to a person 's first language ; although the concept is named second-language acquisition, it can also incorporate the learning of third, fourth, or subsequent languages.
Second-language acquisition refers to what learners do ; it does नहीं refer to practices in language teaching.
The academic अनुशासन of second-language acquisition is a subdiscipline of लागू linguistics.
It is broad-based and relatively नई.
As well as the various branches of linguistics, second-language acquisition is also closely related to psychology, cognitive psychology, and शिक्षा.
To separate the academic discipline from the learning process itself, the terms second-language acquisition research, second-language studies, and second-language acquisition studies are also used.
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary field, and because of this it is difficult to identify a precise starting date.
However, it does appear to have developed a great deal since the mid-1960s.
the term acquisition was originally used to emphasize the subconscious nature of the learning process, but in recent years learning and acquisition have become largely synonymous.
Second-language acquisition can incorporate विरासत language learning, but it does not usually incorporate bilingualism.
Most SLA researchers see bilingualism as being the end result of learning a language, not the process itself, and see the पद as referring to native-like fluency.
Writers in fields such as education and psychology, however, often use bilingualism loosely to refer to all फ़ॉर्म of multilingualism.
Second-language acquisition is भी not to be contrasted with the acquisition of a foreign भाषा ; rather, the learning of second languages and the learning of foreign languages involve the same fundamental processes in different situations..
There has been much बहस about exactly कैसा language is सीखे, and many issues are स्टिल unresolved.
There are many theories of second-language acquisition, but none are accepted as a complete explanation by all SLA researchers.
Due to the interdisciplinary प्रकृति of the field of second-language acquisition, this is नहीं अपेक्षित to happen in the foreseeable future.
Forbes list of billionaires is an सालाना ranking of the world 's wealthiest people, compiled and published by Forbes, an American national business magazine.
The total net worth of each individual on the list is estimated, in United States dollars, आधारित on उनके assets और accounting for debt.
The list only represents each person 's valuation on a single day, due to daily fluctuations among exchange rates and stock valuations.
The United States Secret Service is a U.S. federal law enforcement agency that is part of the United States Department of Homeland Security.
The sworn members are divided among the Special Agents and the Uniformed Division.
Until March 1, 2003, the Service was भाग of the United States Department of the Treasury.
the U.S. Secret Service has two distinct areas of responsibility:
Financial Crimes, covering missions such as prevention and investigation of counterfeiting of U.S. currency और U.S. treasury securities, and investigation of major fraud.
Protection, which entails ensuring the safety of current and पूर्व national leaders and their families, such as the President, past presidents, vice presidents, presidential candidates, visiting heads of state, and foreign embassies ( per an agreement with the U.S. State विभाग 's Bureau of Diplomatic Security ( DS ) Office of Foreign Missions ( ofm ), etc. )
The Secret Service 's initial responsibility was to investigate counterfeiting of U.S. currency, which was rampant following the U.S. Civil War.
The agency then evolved into the संयुक्त States ' पहला domestic intelligence and counterintelligence agency.
Many of the agency 's missions were later taken over by subsequent agencies such as the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ), Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives ( ATF ), Immigration and Customs Enforcement ( ICE ), and आतंरिक Revenue Service ( IRS ).
`` Me and Bobby McGee '' is a सोंग लिखा by Kris Kristofferson and Fred Foster, originally performed by Roger Miller.
Others performed the song later, including Kristofferson himself, and Janis Joplin who topped the U.S. singles chart with the song in 1971 after her death, making the song the second posthumous number-one single in U.S. chart history after `` ( Sittin ' On ) The Dock of the Bay `` by Otis Redding.
Franklin delano Roosevelt ( or ; जनवरी 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), also known by his initials, FDR, थी the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century, leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war.
A प्रबल leader of the Democratic Party and the only अमरीकी president elected to अधिक than two terms, he built a New Deal Coalition कि realigned American politics after 1932, as उसके domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as his campaign theme, FDR defeated incumbent Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932, at the depth of the Great Depression.
Energized by his personal victory over polio, FDR 's unfailing optimism and activism contributed to a renewal of the नेशनल spirit.
He worked closely साथ अंग्रेजों Prime Minister Winston Churchill and Soviet General Secretary Joseph स्टालिन in अग्रणी the Allies against Germany और Japan in World War II, and restoring prosperity to the स्वदेश 's economy.
In उसके first hundred days in office, जिससे began March 4, 1933, Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce राहत ( government jobs for the बेरोजगार ), recovery ( economic growth ), and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street, banks and transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, but then relapsed into a deep recession.
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the परम् Court or passing any considerable legislation ; it abolished many of the relief programs when unemployment diminished during World War II.
Most of the regulations on business were ended about 1975–85, except for the regulation of Wall Street by the Securities and Exchange Commission, जिससे still exists.
Along with several smaller programs, प्रमुख surviving programs include the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, which was created in 1933, and Social सुरक्षा, which Congress passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, with the जापानी आक्रमण of China and the aggression of Nazi Germany, FDR gave strong diplomatic और financial support to China and Great Britain, while remaining officially neutral.
His goal was to make America the `` Arsenal of Democracy `` जिससे would supply munitions to the Allies.
in March 1941, Roosevelt, with Congressional स्वीकृति, provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain.
With very strong national support, he made war on Japan and Germany after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941, calling it a `` date which will live in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the अलाइड war effort.
As an active सैन्य leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts that ended in the defeat of the Axis Powers and the development of the world 's first atom bomb.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese American civilians.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new heights as millions of people स्थानांतरित to new jobs in war centers, and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service.
Roosevelt dominated the American political scene not only during the twelve years of his presidency, but also for decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of voters कि created the Fifth Party System.
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor unions, big city machines, white ethnics, African Americans and rural श्वेत Southerners.
He also influenced the later creation of the United Nations और bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the शीर्ष three U.S. Presidents, along with Abraham Lincoln and George वॉशिंगटन.
A liberal Democrat, Roosevelt defined his ideological position as `` a little left of center. ''
Mara Salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as MS, Mara, and MS-13 ) is a transnational criminal gang that originated in Los Angeles and has spread to other parts of the United States, कनाडा, Mexico, और Central America.
The majority of the gang is ethnically composed of Central Americans and active in urban and suburban areas.
In the U.S., the MS-13 has an especially heavy presence in Los एंजिल्स County and the San Francisco Bay Area in Northern California ; the Washington, d.C. metropolitan areas of Fairfax County, Virginia, Montgomery County, मेरीलैंड, and Prince George 's County, Maryland ; Long Island, नई York ; the Boston, मैसाचुसेट्स area ; शेर्लोट, North Carolina ; and Houston, Texas.
There is also a presence of MS-13 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.
Members of MS distinguish themselves by tattoos covering the body and भी often the face, as well as the उपयोग of their own sign language.
They are notorious for their use of violence and a subcultural moral code that predominantly consists of merciless revenge and बेदर्द retributions.
This cruelty of the विशिष्ट members of the `` Maras '' or `` Mareros '' earned them a path to be recruited by the Sinaloa Cartel battling विरूद्ध Los Zetas in an ongoing drug war south of the United States border.
Their wide-ranging activities have drawn the attention of the FBI and Immigration and Customs Enforcement, जो have initiated wide-scale raids against known and suspected gang members – netting hundreds of arrests across the country.
Bones is an American crime comedy-drama टेलीविज़न series that premiered on the Fox network in the United राज्य on September 13, 2005.
The show is based on forensic anthropology and forensic archaeology, with each episode focusing on an FBI case file concerning the mystery behind human remains brought by FBI Special Agent Seeley Booth ( David Boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance `` Bones '' Brennan ( Emily Deschanel ).
The बाकी of the main cast includes Michaela Conlin, T. J. Thyne, eric Millegan, Tamara Taylor, Jonathan Adams, and John Francis Daley.
Created by Hart Hanson, the series is very loosely based on the life and writings of novelist and forensic anthropologist Kathy Reichs, who also produces the show.
Its title character, Temperance Brennan, is named after the protagonist of Reichs ' crime novel श्रेणी.
Conversely, Dr. Brennan writes successful mystery novels आधारित around a fictional ( in the Bones universe ) forensic anthropologist named Kathy Reichs.
Bones is a joint production by Josephson Entertainment, Far फ़ील्ड Productions और 20th Century Fox Television.
The series has completed airing its eighth season and has been renewed for a ninth season.
Super Bowl XXV was an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल game between the American Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Buffalo Bills and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion New York Giants to decide the National Football लीग ( NFL ) champion for the 1990 season.
the Giants defeated the Bills by the score of 20–19, winning their second ever Super कटोरी.
it is the only Super Bowl decided by one point.
The game was held at Tampa स्टेडियम in Tampa, Florida, on January 27, 1991, during the height of the Gulf War.
It थी thus played under much patriotic fervor.
The proceedings included a rousing rendition of `` The Star-Spangled Banner `` by Whitney Houston during the pregame ceremonies.
The Bills and their explosive no-huddle offense यहूद making their first Super Bowl रूप after finishing the regular season with a 13-3 record, and leading the league in total points scored with 428.
In advancing to their second Super Bowl, the Giants also posted a 13-3 regular season record, but with a ball-control offense and a defense that allowed a league low 211 points.
The game is बेहतरीन remembered for Bills placekicker Scott Norwood 's last-second field goal attempt which went wide सही of the uprights, अग्रणी to a Giants victory, and starting a four-game losing streak in the Super Bowl for the Bills.
The Giants set a Super Bowl record holding कब्ज़ा of the ball for 40 minutes and 33 seconds.
New यॉर्क also overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit, and made a 75-yard touchdown drive that consumed a Super Bowl record 9:29 off the clock.
Giants running back Ottis Anderson, who carried the ball 21 times for 102 yards and one touchdown, थी named Super Bowl MVP.
He was the पहला awardee to receive the newly named `` Pete Rozelle Trophy '' ( named for the former commissioner ).
Anderson also recorded one reception for seven गज.
Malcolm x ( ; May 19, 1925February 21, 1965 ), born Malcolm Little and also known as El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ), थी an African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist.
To his admirers, he was a साहसी advocate for the rights of blacks, a man who indicted white America in the harshest terms लिये its crimes against black Americans.
Detractors अभियुक्त him of preaching racism, black supremacy, and violence.
He has been called one of the greatest and most influential African अमेरिकी in इतिहास.
Malcolm X 's पिता died—killed by white supremacists, it was rumored—when he was young, और at least one of his uncles was lynched.
When he was 13, his mother was लगाई in a mental hospital, and he was placed in a series of foster homes.
In 1946, at age 20, he went to prison for breaking and entering.
In prison, Malcolm X became a member of the Nation of Islam ; after his parole in 1952, he quickly rose to become one of its leaders.
For a dozen years, Malcolm X was the public face of the controversial group, लकिन disillusionment with Nation of Islam head इलियास Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a period of travel in अफ़्रीकी and the मध्य East, he returned to the United States, where he founded Muslim Mosque, Inc. और the Organization of Afro-American Unity.
In February 1965, less than a year after leaving the Nation of Islam, he was assassinated by three सदस्यों of the group.
Malcolm x 's expressed beliefs changed substantially over time.
As a spokesman लिये the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of ब्लैक and white Americans —in contrast to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration.
After breaking with the Nation of islam in 1964—saying of his association with it, `` I did many things as a [ Black ] Muslim that i 'm sorry for now.
I was a zombie then... pointed in a certain direction और told to march '' —and becoming a Sunni Muslim, he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to work with civil अधिकारों leaders, he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism, black self-determination, and self-defense.
The तीसरा season of 90210, an American television series, premiered on Monday September 13, 2010.
The CW officially renewed the show for a third season on February 16, 2010.
With the reveal of the networks पतन 2010 schedule, they announced their decision to move 90210 to Monday nights at 8:00 pm, as a lead-in to Gossip Girl.
It premiered on September 13, 2010 and was met with generally positive reviews from critics.
The season picks up at the end of summer and focuses on the students senior year of high school.
It follows Adrianna 's rise to fame, a new relationship between Silver और navid and a confused Teddy who decides to reveal to his family and friends he is gay.
It भी deals with the aftermath of Naomi क्लार्क 's assault.
Regular cast members for the season included Shenae Grimes, Tristan Wilds, AnnaLynne McCord, Ryan Eggold, Jessica Stroup, Michael Steger, Jessica lowndes, Matt Lanter, Gillian Zinser, Trevor डोनोवन and Lori Loughlin.
Rebecca sinclair continued her भूमिका as executive producer for the season.
The season premiered to 1.96 लाख viewers and a 0.9 rating in the adults 18–49 demographic.
Christmas-themed episode `` Holiday Madness '', hit season highs in all key demos with 2.1 in The CW 's निशाना demo of women 18–34, a 1.4 in adults 18–34 and a 1.1 in adults 18–49.
It was also the most watched episode in over a year with 2.2 million viewers tuning in.
The season finale aired on May 16, 2011.
the season averaged 1.75 million live viewers and a 0.9 वयस्कों 18–49 rating.
It was released on DVD in the United States on August 30, 2011.
Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth एलेक्जेंड्रा Mary ; born 21 अप्रैल 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign states, known as the Commonwealth realms, and their territories और dependencies, and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
She is Supreme Governor of the गिरिजाघर of England and, in some of her realms, carries the title of Defender of the Faith as part of her full title.
On her accession on 6 February 1952, Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven independent राष्ट्रमंडल countries : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, Pakistan और ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the number of her realms varied as territories gained independence and some realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the पहला four aforementioned countries, Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica, Barbados, the Bahamas, Grenada, Papua New गिनी, the Solomon Islands, Tuvalu, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and बारबूडा and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Her reign of years is currently the दूसरी longest for a British monarch ; तभी Queen Victoria has reigned longer at over 63 years.
Elizabeth was born in London and educated privately at home.
Her पिता acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his brother Edward VIII, from जिससे time she was the heir presumptive.
She began to undertake public duties दौरान the Second World War, in which she served in the Auxiliary Territorial Service.
In 1947, she married प्रिंस फिलिप, Duke of Edinburgh, with whom she has चार children : Charles, ऐनी, Andrew, and Edward.
Her coronation service took place in 1953 and was the first to be televised.
The Queen 's many historic visits and meetings include a state visit to the Republic of Ireland and reciprocal visits to and from the Pope.
The Queen has seen प्रमुख constitutional changes in her realms, such as devolution in the United Kingdom और the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of her children, the births of her grandchildren, the investiture of the Prince of Wales, and the celebration of माइलस्टोन such as her Silver, Golden, and Diamond Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, क्रमशः.
Major events in the Queen 's reign have शामिल the Troubles in Northern Ireland, the Falklands War, wars with Iraq and the War in अफगानिस्तान.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the मौत of her father at 56, the हत्या of Prince Philip 's uncle, Lord Mountbatten, the breakdown of her children 's marriages in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ), the मौत in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law, Diana, Princess of Wales, and the deaths of her माँ and sister in 2002.
the Queen has occasionally faced severe दबायें criticism of the royal family and republican sentiments, but support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high.
The 2010 United States सीनेट election in Florida took place on November 2, 2010 along with अन्य elections to the United States सीनेट in other states as खूब as all elections to the United राज्य House of Representatives and various state and local elections.
Republican Marco Rubio, former Speaker of the Florida हाउस of Representatives, defeated independent Charlie Crist and Democrat Kendrick Meek in a three-way race.
एक पद Senator Mel Martinez was elected in a very close race against Democrat Betty Castor in 2004 with 49 % of the vote.
Martinez घोषित on December 2, 2008 that he would not seek re-election to the Senate, and would resign prior to the end of his term.
In August 2009, राज्यपाल Charlie Crist announced that he would appoint his former Chief of स्टाफ, George LeMieux, a Republican, to the Senate seat being vacated by मार्टिनेज.
Governor Crist publicly announced he was running for the सीट in mid-2009.
At the time he प्राप्त many Republican endorsements, such as the National Republican Senatorial Committee, Martinez, and the 2008 Republican presidential nominee John McCain.
उसके support of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 hurt his लोकप्रियता among conservatives, and प्रत्याशी Marco Rubio surged.
In April 2010 Crist घोषित he would drop out of the Republican primary and run as an independent.
The National Republican Senatorial Committee withdrew its समर्थन of Crist and demanded a refund of its campaign funds that it provided for the Crist campaign.
Congressman Kendrick Meek was the first Democrat to घोषित his intention to run.
Alexander Snitker was the first सदस्य of the Libertarian Party on the ballot for senator in फ्लोरिडा 's history.
Satellite view of Doha
Doha (, ' or ', literally : `` the big पेड़ '' ) is the capital city of the state of Qatar.
Located on the coast of the Persian Gulf,
it had a जनसांख्यिकी of 998,651 in 2008, and is भी one of the municipalities of Qatar.
Doha is Qatar 's largest city, with over 60 % of the स्वदेश 's population residing in Doha or its surrounding suburbs, and is also the economic centre of the देश.
Doha also serves as the seat of government of Qatar, which is ruled by Sheikh Hamad bin खलीफा Al Thani.
Doha is home to the Education नगर, an area devoted to research और education.
Doha was the site of the first ministerial-level meeting of the Doha विकास Round of World Trade Organization negotiations.
The city of Doha held the 2006 Asian Games, which was the largest Asian Games ever आयोजित.
दोहा also hosted the 2011 Pan Arab Games and most of the games at the 2011 AFC Asian Cup.
Doha hosted the UNFCCC Climate Negotiations ( COP 18 ) December 2012 and will मेजबान a large number of the venues for the 2022 FIFA World Cup.
The World Petroleum Council held the 20th World Petroleum Conference in Doha in December 2011.
Paranasal sinuses are a group of चार paired air-filled spaces कि surround the nasal गुहा ( maxillary sinuses ), above the eyes ( frontal sinuses ), between the eyes ( ethmoid sinuses ), and behind the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ).
The sinuses are named for the facial bones in जिससे they are located.
Lean manufacturing, lean एंटरप्राइज़, or lean उत्पादन, often simply, `` Lean, '' is a production practice that considers the expenditure of resources for any goal other than the creation of value for the end customer to be wasteful, और thus a निशाना for विलोपन.
Working from the perspective of the customer who consumes a product or service, `` value '' is defined as any action or process that a customer would be willing to pay for.
Essentially, झुकना is केन्द्रित on preserving value with less work.
Lean manufacturing is a management philosophy derived mostly from the Toyota Production System ( TPS ) ( hence the पद toyotism is भी prevalent ) and पहचाना as `` झुकना '' only in the 1990s.
TPS is renowned for its focus on reduction of the असली Toyota seven wastes to improve overall customer value, but there are varying perspectives on how this is best हासिल.
The steady growth of Toyota, from a small company to the संसार 's largest automaker, has focused attention on कैसा it has achieved this success.
iCarly logo
iCarly is an अमरीकी sitcom that airs on Nickelodeon, which premiered on September 8, 2007.
निकलोडियन promoted many episodes so far such as `` iDo '', `` iHire an Idiot '', `` iPity the Nevel '', `` iDate Sam & Freddie '', etc. as specials, despite their being regular episodes.
Every episode title begins with a lower मामला i जिससे represents the internet, as in `` iCarly ''.
The show was मनोनीत लिये an Emmy award for Outstanding Children 's कार्यक्रम in 2009.
The series starring Miranda cosgrove as Carly Shay, a 13-year-old who becomes an Internet star.
The series ended on November 23, 2012 with the one-hour special episode `` iGoodbye ''.
A total of 7 seasons and 109 episodes यहूद broadcast.
The largest audience of the श्रेणी was 11.2 million viewers, with the special episode `` iSaved Your जीवन '' premiered in January 2010.
When Carly ( Miranda Cosgrove ) and her sassy best friend Sam ( Jennette McCurdy ) act funny at a school talent show audition, tech-savvy फ्रेडी ( Nathan Kress ) tapes it and posts it online without telling them.
After seeing the girls ' strong chemistry and banter, the online audience clamors लिये more and the icarly webcast is born.
While grappling with typical issues of adolescence, Carly, Sam, and Freddie find out that they have also become online celebrities as their show – which features talent contests, recipes, problem-solving, and random dancing – garners international accolades.
Carly lives in Seattle, Washington with her 26-year-old bhai and संरक्षक Spencer ( Jerry Trainor ) and produces the show in a makeshift third-floor studio loft in their अपार्टमेंट.
Their mother has never महरूम seen or उल्लेखित, but their father, Steven शे ( David Chisum ), is a u.S. Air Force officer temporarily stationed on a पनडुब्बी, and is often mentioned but is only seen in person during the series finale एपीसोड, `` iGoodbye ''.
Westlife were an Irish boy band which formed in 1998 and disbanded in 2012.
Originally signed by साइमन cowell और managed by Louis Walsh, the group 's final line-up consisted of Nicky Byrne, Kian Egan, Mark Feehily and Shane Filan.
Brian McFadden was a member from 1998 until his departure in 2004.
Westlife sold over 50 million रिकॉर्ड worldwide, a total that included studio एल्बम, singles, video रिलीज, and संकलन albums.
The group accumulated 14 number-one singles in the United Kingdom ( the third-highest in UK history ), tying with Cliff Richard and ranking just behind The Beatles and Elvis Presley.
They achieved a total of 26 top ten singles over their 14-year career.
By 2010, Westlife was listed in the Guinness World Records, as the UK 's top-selling album group of the 21st century.
They also won The रिकार्ड of the Year ( the only music award based on public votes in the UK ) a record-breaking four times and in 2012, the Official चार्ट Company सूचीबद्ध Westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles artists in British music history.
Despite their European and Asian success, westlife never managed to break into the U.S. मार्केट, achieving only one hit single in 2000 : `` Swear It Again ``.
In October 2011, Westlife announced their intention to split in 2012, following their Greatest Hits Tour and the release of their महानतम Hits album.
The boyband 's फाइनल concerts were held on 22 and 23 June 2012 at Croke पार्क Stadium in Dublin.
The first farewell concert, offering 85,000 tickets, sold out in a record-breaking 5 minutes and the latter screened live in cinemas worldwide.
विटामिन A is a group of nutritionally unsaturated hydrocarbons, which include retinol, retinal, retinoic acid and several provitamin A carotenoids among which beta-carotene is the सबसे important.
Vitamin A has multiple functions, it is important for growth and development, for the maintenance of the immune system and good vision.
Vitamin A is needed by the retina of the eye in the form of retinal, which combines with protein opsin to form rhodopsin the light-absorbing molecule, that is necessary for both low-light ( scotopic vision ) and रंग vision.
Vitamin A also functions in a very अलग role as an irreversibly oxidized form of retinol known as retinoic acid, which is an important hormone-like growth factor for epithelial and other cells.
In foods of animal origin, the प्रमुख form of vitamin A is an ester, primarily retinyl palmitate, which is converted to retinol ( chemically an alcohol ) in the small intestine.
The रेटिनॉल form functions as a storage form of the vitamin, and can be converted to and from its visually active सुव्युद form, retinal.
The associated acid ( retinoic acid ), a metabolite कि can be irreversibly synthesized from vitamin A, has only partial विटामिन A activity, and does not function in the retina for the visual cycle.
Retinoic acid is used for growth and cellular differentiation.
सब forms of vitamin A have a beta-ionone ring to which an isoprenoid कड़ी is attached, called a retinyl group.
Both संरचनात्मक features are essential for vitamin activity.
The orange pigment of carrots – beta-carotene – can be represented as two connected retinyl समूह, which are used in the body to contribute to vitamin a levels.
Alpha-carotene and gamma-carotene also have a single retinyl group, which give them some vitamin activity.
None of the other carotenes have vitamin activity.
The carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone group और has vitamin activity in humans.
Vitamin A can be found in two principal forms in foods :
Retinol, the form of vitamin A absorbed when eating animal food sources, is a yellow, fat-soluble substance.
Since the pure दारू form is unstable, the vitamin is found in tissues in a form of retinyl ester.
It is also commercially produced and administered as esters such as retinyl acetate or palmitate.
The carotenes alpha-carotene, beta-carotene, gamma-carotene ; and the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all of which contain beta-ionone rings ), but no other carotenoids, function as provitamin A in herbivores and omnivore animals, which possess the enzyme ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) which cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa and converts it retinol.
In general, carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids, and pure carnivores such as बिल्लियों and ferrets lack 15-15'-dioxygenase and can not convert any carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids being forms of vitamin A for these species ).
Selena Marie Gomez ( born July 22, 1992 ) is an अमरीकी singer and actress.
वो बना her debut as a चाइल्ड actress in Barney & Friends.
In 2007, Gomez came to prominence as a starring cast member in the television series Wizards of Waverly Place.
वो signed to Hollywood Records the following year, and became the founder and lead singer of the pop band Selena Gomez & the Scene.
Their स्टुडियो albums Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ), a Year Without बरसात ( 2010 ), and When the Sun Goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) and have spawned Platinum-certified singles `` Naturally ``, `` Who Says ``, and `` प्रेम You like a Love Song ``.
After the release of television films and their accompanying soundtracks, Gomez बना her theatrical film debut in Ramona और Beezus in 2010 and starred in Monte Carlo in 2011.
Upon the conclusion of Wizards of Waverly Place and the hiatus of Selena गोमेज़ & the Scene in 2012, वो focused on her film करियर, serving as a voice actress in Hotel Transylvania and अभिनीत in Spring Breakers the following year.
Her डेब्यू solo album is tentatively scheduled to be released in summer 2013, and is preceded by its lead single `` Come & Get It ``.
Outside of her work in the entertainment industry, Gomez is शामिल in philanthropic activities through charity work and various social and environmental causes.
Tracie Monique Spencer ( born July 12, 1976 ) is an American R & B and pop singer-songwriter, अभिनेत्री, and model.
Sacramento is the capital city of the u.S. state of कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the seat of government of Sacramento County.
It is located at the संगम of the Sacramento River और the American नदी in the northern portion of California 's expansive Central Valley.
With an estimated 2011 जनसांख्यिकी of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest city in California and the 35th largest नगर in the United States.
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic center of the Sacramento metropolitan area which includes seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California after the Greater Los Angeles Area, San Francisco Bay Area, और the San Diego metropolitan area, as well as the 25th largest in the United राज्य.
Sacramento was cited by Time पत्रिका as America 's most ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the Swiss immigrant जॉन Sutter, Sr., his बेटे जॉन Sutter, Jr., and James W. मार्शल.
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection of Sutter 's Fort, which was established by Sutter in 1839.
During the California Gold Rush, Sacramento was a major distribution point, a commercial and agricultural center, and a terminus for wagon trains, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony Express, and the पहला Transcontinental Railroad.
California State University, Sacramento, अधिक commonly known as Sacramento State or Sac State, is the largest local university.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California State University system.
Drexel University Sacramento is located in Downtown, Sacramento.
University of the Pacific 's McGeorge School of Law is located in the Oak पार्क neighborhood.
In addition, the University of California, Davis is located in nearby Davis, west of the capital.
The UC Davis Medical बीच, a world-renowned research हॉस्पिटल, is स्तिथ in the city of Sacramento.
Memorial Day is a संयुक्त States federal holiday which occurs every year on the final Monday of May.
Memorial Day is a day of remembering the मेन and women who died while serving in the United States Armed Forces.
Formerly known as Decoration Day, it originated after the American Civil War to commemorate the Union and Confederate सैनिको who died in the Civil War.
By the 20th century Memorial Day had been extended to honor all Americans who have died in all wars.
It typically marks the start of the गर्मियाँ vacation ऋतु, while Labor दिन marks its end.
Many people visit cemeteries और memorials, particularly to honor those who have died in military service.
Many volunteers प्लेस an American flag on each grave in national cemeteries.
By the early 20th century, Memorial Day was an occasion for more general expressions of memory, as लोगों visited the graves of their deceased relatives in church cemeteries, whether they had served in the military or not.
It also became a long weekend increasingly devoted to shopping, परिवार gatherings, fireworks, trips to the beach, and national मीडिया events.
Annual Decoration Days for particular cemeteries are held on a Sunday in late वसन्त or early summer in some rural areas of the American South, notably in the mountains.
In cases involving a family graveyard where remote ancestors as well as those who were deceased more recently are buried, this may take on the character of an extended family reunion to which कुछ people travel hundreds of miles.
People एकत्रित on the designated day and put flowers on graves and renew contacts with kinfolk and others.
There प्रायः is a religious सेवा and a `` dinner on the मैदान, '' the traditional term for a potluck meal in जिससे people used to spread the dishes out on चादरें or tablecloths on the grass.
It is believed that this practice began before the American Civil War and thus may reflect the रियल origin of the `` memorial day '' idea.
Memorial Day is not to be confused with Veterans Day ; Memorial Day is a day of remembering the men and women who died while serving, while दिग्गजों Day celebrates the service of all U.S. military veterans, living or dead.
