The Miss Florida USA competition is the pageant that selects the representative for the state Florida in the Miss USA pageant.
While Florida has been successful in terms of runners-up, finalists and semi-finalists, the state has never won the Miss USA pageant, although Cheryl Patton became Miss USA after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss Universe.
Florida 's best results were during the mid-1960s to mid-1970s.
Their most recent फाइनलिस्ट was Lissette Garcia who placed in the top 16 in 2011.
Two former Miss Florida Teen USA titleholders have won this competition, and three titleholders have also competed at Miss America.
The वर्तमान titleholder is Michelle Aguirre of Hialeah.
Anglo-Saxon England refers to the period of the history of the part of Britain that became known as England, स्थायी from the end of Roman occupation and establishment of Anglo-Saxon kingdoms in the 5th century until the Norman conquest of England in 1066 by William the Conqueror.
Anglo-Saxon is a general term referring to the Germanic peoples who came to ब्रिटेन during the 5th and 6th centuries, including Angles, Saxons, Frisii, और Jutes.
The पद also refers to the भाषा spoken at the time in England, which is now called Old अंग्रेज़ी, and to the संस्कृति of the era, which has long attracted लोकप्रिय and scholarly ध्यान.
Until the 9th century anglo-saxon England was वर्चस्व by the Heptarchy, the kingdoms of Northumbria, Mercia, ईस्ट Anglia, Essex, केंट, Sussex, and Wessex.
In terms of religion the kingdoms followed Anglo-Saxon paganism दौरान the early period, but converted to Christianity during the 7th सदी.
Paganism had a final stronghold in a period of mercian hegemony during the 640s, ending with the death of Penda of Mercia in 655.
Facing the threat of Viking invasions, the House of Wessex became प्रबल दौरान the 9th century, अंतर्गत the rule of Alfred the Great.
During the 10th century, the individual kingdoms unified under the rule of Wessex into the Kingdom of England, which stood opposed to the Danelaw, the Viking kingdoms established from the 9th century in the north and east of England.
The Kingdom of England fell in the Viking invasion from Denmark in 1013 and was शासित by the हाउस of Denmark until 1042, when the Anglo-Saxon House of Wessex was restored.
The last Anglo-Saxon king, हेरोल्ड Godwinson, was killed in 1066 at the Battle of Hastings.

Smoked salmon is a preparation of salmon, typically a fillet कि has been cured and hot or cold स्मोक्ड.
Due to its moderately high price, smoked salmon is considered a delicacy.
Although the term lox is sometimes applied to smoked salmon, they are अलग products.
View of defibrillator electrode position and placement.
Defibrillation is a common उपचार for life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic खुराक of electrical energy to the affected heart with a device called a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart muscle, terminates the dysrhythmia, and allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the देह 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
Defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the type of device used or needed.
Some external units, known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ), automate the diagnosis of treatable rhythms, meaning कि lay responders or bystanders are able to use them successfully साथ little, or in some cases no training at all.
Gabrielle `` Coco '' Bonheur Chanel ( अगस्त 19, 1883 – January 10, 1971 ) was a French fashion पंक्तियां and founder of the Chanel brand.
She was the only fashion पंक्तियां to appear on समय magazine 's list of the 100 most influential people of the 20th century.
Along with Paul Poiret, Chanel was credited with liberating women from the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' and popularizing the acceptance of a sportive, casual chic as the feminine मानक in the post- संसार War I era.
A सफल fashion निर्माता, Chanel 's influence extended beyond couture clothing.
उसके design aesthetic was realized in jewelry, हैंडबैग, and fragrance.
Her signature scent, Chanel No. 5, has become an iconic product.
Chanel was known for her lifelong determination, ambition and energy जिससे she applied to her professional and social life.
She achieved both कामयाबी as a businesswoman and social prominence धन्यवाद to the connections she made through her work.
These included many artists and craftspeople to whom she became a patron.
However, Chanel 's highly competitive, opportunistic व्यक्तित्व led her to make questionable जीवन choices which have generated controversy around उसके reputation, particularly her आचरण during the German occupation of France in World War II.

A gristmill ( also : grist mill, corn mill or आटा mill ) grinds अनाज into flour.
The पद can refer to both the grinding mechanism and the building कि holds it.
Romania ( ; dated spellings roumania and Rumania ; ) is a country स्तिथ at the intersection of Central and Southeastern Europe, bordering on the Black Sea.
Romania shares a border with हंगेरियाई and Serbia to the west, Ukraine और Moldova to the northeast and east, and Bulgaria to the south.
At, Romania is the eighth largest country of the European Union by area, and has the seventh largest population of the European Union with more than 19 million people.
इसके पूंजी and biggest नगर is Bucharest, the 11th largest city in the EU.
The United Principalities emerged when the territories of Moldavia और Wallachia were united under Prince Alexander ioan cuza in 1859.
In 1866 Prince Karl of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen was called to the throne as the Ruling Prince of the Romanian Principate and in 1881 he was finally crowned as King Carol I the first monarch of the किंगडम of Romania.
स्वतंत्रता from the Ottoman Empire was declared on 9 May 1877, and थी internationally recognized the following year.
At the end of संसार War I, Transylvania, Bukovina and Bessarabia united with the Kingdom of Romania.
संसार युद्ध II दिया cause to the rise of a military dictatorship in Romania under fascist General Ion Antonescu, who chose to fight on the side of the Axis powers from 1941 to 1944.
After his removal, Romania switched sides in 1944 and joined the Allies.
by the end of the war, some formerly Romanian northeastern territories were occupied by the सोवियत Union, साथ Red Army units stationed on Romanian soil.
In 1947 Romania forcibly became a People 's Republic ( 1947-1965 ) and a member of the Warsaw Pact.
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu became General Secretary of the Romanian Communist Party, and the harsh austerity measures, political repression, and cult of personality he implemented led to the Socialist Republic of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) becoming the most Stalinist police state in the Eastern bloc.
Eventually his authoritarian government was toppled in December 1989 during the Romanian Revolution of 1989.
With the fall of the Iron Curtain, Romania began its transition towards democracy and a capitalist market economy.
After a decade of post-revolution economic problems and living-standards decline, extensive reforms fostered economic recovery.
As of 2010, Romania is an upper-middle-income country with a high human development index.
Romania joined NATO on 29 March 2004, and the European Union on 1 January 2007.
It is also a member of the : Latin Union, Francophonie, OSCE, WTO, BSEC, United Nations, etc.
Today, Romania is a unitary semi-presidential republic, in which the executive branch consists of the President and the Government.
`` Ancient '' redirects here.
For other uses, see Antiquity ( disambiguation ).
The times before writing belong either to protohistory or to prehistory.
Khafre 's Pyramid ( 4th dynasty ) and Great Sphinx of गीज़ा ( c. 2500 BC or शायद पहले )
Ancient history is the study of the written past from the beginning of recorded human history to the Early Middle Ages.
The span of recorded history is roughly 5,000 years, with Cuneiform स्क्रिप्ट, the oldest discovered form of coherent writing, from the protoliterate period around the 30th century BC.
This is the beginning of history, as opposed to prehistory, according to the definition used by most historians.
The term classical antiquity is प्रायः used to refer to history in the Old World from the beginning of recorded Greek history in 776 bc ( First Olympiad ).
This roughly coincides with the परंपरागत date of the founding of Rome in 753 bc, the beginning of the history of ancient Rome, और the शुरूआत of the Archaic period in Ancient Greece.
Although the ending date of ancient history is disputed, some Western scholars use the fall of the Western Roman Empire in 476 AD, the closure of the Platonic Academy in 529 AD, the death of the emperor Justinian I, the coming of Islam or the rise of Charlemagne as the end of ancient and Classical European history.
In India, the period शामिल the early काल of the Middle Kingdoms, and, in China, the time up to the Qin Dynasty is included.
Methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a form of विटामिन B12.
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12, occurring as अंधेरा red crystals that freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water.
Vitamin B12, vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12, also called cobalamin, is a water-soluble vitamin with a कुंजी role in the सामान्य कामकाज of the brain and nervous system, and for the formation of blood.
It is one of the आठ B vitamins.
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human देह, especially affecting DNA संश्लेषण और regulation, but also fatty acid synthesis and energy production.
Neither fungi, plants, nor animals are capable of producing vitamin b12.
Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes required for its synthesis, although अनेक भोजन हैं a natural source of B12 क्युकी of bacterial symbiosis.
The vitamin is the largest and most structurally complicated vitamin and can be produced industrially तभी through bacterial fermentation-synthesis.
विटामिन B12 consists of a class of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ), all of which have vitamin activity.
It contains the biochemically rare element cobalt.
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by bacteria ( which usually produce hydroxocobalamin ), but conversion between different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the इंसान body.
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin, cyanocobalamin, does not occur in nature, but is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and then used in many pharmaceuticals and supplements, and as a food additive, because of its stability and lower production cost.
In the body it is converted to the इंसान physiological forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin, leaving behind the cyanide, albeit in minimal concentration.
More recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, and adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological products and food supplements.
The extra utility of ये is currently debated.
विटामिन B12 was discovered from its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia, which is an autoimmune disease in which parietal cells of the stomach responsible लिये secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed.
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the सामान्य absorption of B12, so a lack of intrinsic factor, as seen in pernicious anemia, causes a vitamin B12 deficiency.
Many other subtler kinds of vitamin B12 deficiency and their biochemical effects have since been elucidated.
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient Roman civilization, characterised by an autocratic form of सरकारी and large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe, Africa, and Asia.
The 500-year-old Roman Republic, which preceded it, था been destabilized through a series of civil wars.
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire, including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of Actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ).
The first two centuries of the साम्राज्य were a period of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ).
It पहुँचे its greatest expanse during the reign of त्राजान ( 98–117 AD ).
In the 3rd century, the Empire underwent a संकट that threatened its existence, but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian.
Christians rose to power in the 4th century, during जिससे time a system of dual rule was विकसित in the Latin West and Greek East.
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th century, the eastern half continued as कया would later be known as the Byzantine Empire.
Because of the Empire 's vast extent और long endurance, the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound and स्थायी influence on the development of भाषा, religion, architecture, philosophy, law, and फ़ॉर्म of government in the territory it governed, particularly यूरोपीय, and by अर्थात् of European expansionism throughout the आधुनिक world.
Total body surface area ( tbsa ) is an assessment measure of burns of the skin.
In adults, the `` rule of nines '' is used to determine the total percentage of area burned for प्रत्येक major section of the body.
In some cases, the burns may cover more than one body part, or may not fully cover such a part ; in these cases, burns are measured by using the casualty 's palm as a reference point for 1 % of the body.
For children और infants, the Lund-Browder chart is used to assess the burned body surface area.
Different percentages are प्रयुक्त क्युकी the अनुपात of the combined surface area of the head and neck to the surface area of the limbs is typically larger in children than that of an adult.
Typical values for common groups of इंसानो follow.
( Due to rounding, values may not add to 100 %. )

यूनुस Kirsten Sorrentino ( born June 26, 1975 ), बेहतर known by his स्टेज name KJ-52, is a Christian rapper from Tampa, Florida.
The `` KJ '' part of his नाम refers to his old rap alias, `` King J. मैक, '' a name which he later described in one of his podcasts as `` horribly cheesy. ''
`` 52 '', which is सुनाया `` five two '', not `` fifty-two '', is a reference to the Biblical स्टोरी of Jesus feeding the multitude with five loaves and two fish, which is also sung परिचय in उसके song `` Push Up '' from The Yearbook and in the `` KJ Five Two '' on It 's Pronounced 'Five Two.
He was awarded the Rap/Hip Hop Recorded Song of the Year for `` Never dekh Away '' and Rap/Hip Hop Album of the Year at the GMA Dove Awards of 2007.
On July 28, 2009, KJ-52 released `` End of My Rope '', which is the first single for his album Five-Two Television.
His song `` Dear Slim '' is based on Eminem 's song `` Stan `` and is a sort of personal message from KJ-52 to Eminem.
The degree symbol ( ° ) is a typographical symbol that is used, among other things, to represent degrees of arc ( e.g. in geographic निर्देशांक systems ), hours ( in the medical field ), or degrees of temperature.
The प्रतीक consists of a small raised circle, historically a zero glyph.
In Unicode it is encoded at.
This is a list of roots, suffixes, and prefixes used in medical terminology, their meanings, and their etymology.
There are a few rules when using medical roots.
Firstly, prefixes and suffixes, primarily in यूनानी, लकिन भी in Latin, have a droppable -o-.
As a general rule, this -o- almost always acts as a joint-stem to connect two consonantal roots, e.g. arthr- + -o- + logy = arthrology.
But generally, the -o- is dropped when connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g. arthr- + itis = arthritis, instead of arthr-o-itis.
Secondly, चिकित्सा roots generally go together according to language : Greek prefixes go with Greek suffixes and लैटिन prefixes with Latin suffixes.
Although international scientific vocabulary is not stringent about segregating combining फ़ॉर्म of different languages, it is advisable when coining new words not to mix different lingual roots.
पेट cancer, or gastric cancer, refers to cancer arising from any part of the पेट.
Stomach cancer causes about 800,000 deaths worldwide per साल.
Prognosis is poor ( 5-year survival < 5 to 15 % ) because most मरीजों present with उन्नत disease.
Sara Lynn Evans ( born February 5, 1971 ) is an American country singer and songwriter.
For her entire career, she has been हस्ताक्षरित to RCA Records Nashville.
Evans ' debut, Three मदारी और the Truth, did not produce a Top 40 hit on the Hot Country Songs charts.
She followed this up with No Place That Far ( 1998 ), Born to Fly ( 2000 ), Restless ( 2003 ) and Real Fine Place ( 2005 ).
No Place That Far received a gold certification from the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ), while the other three albums all were certified platinum.
ये discs include the क्रमांक 1 singles `` No Place That Far ``, `` Born to Fly ``, `` Suds in the Bucket `` and `` A Real Fine Place to Start ``, plus the top 10 हिट्स `` I could नहीं Ask for More `` ( a cover of the Edwin मैक्केन song ), `` i Keep Looking ``, `` Perfect `` and `` Cheatin ' ``.
Her 2007 महानतम Hits included the top 15 hits `` You 'll Always be My Baby `` and `` As If ``.
Stronger ( 2011 ) included her पांचवां number 1 hit, `` A Little Bit Stronger ``, which थी co-written by Hillary Scott of Lady Antebellum.
Evans has also won one award each from Billboard, the Academy of Country Music, Country Music Association, Broadcast Music Incorporated ( BMI ) and a Dove पुरस्कार.
The world 's प्रिंसिपल religions and आध्यात्मिक traditions may be classified into a small number of major groups, although this is by no means a uniform practice.
This theory began in the 18th century with the goal of recognizing the relative levels of civility in societies.
Berliners watching a c-54 land at Tempelhof Airport ( 1948 )
The बर्लिन blockade ( 24 जून 1948 – 12 May 1949 ) was one of the पहला major international crises of the Cold War.
During the multinational occupation of post–world युद्ध II Germany, the Soviet Union blocked the Western Allies ' railway, road, and canal access to the सेक्टर of Berlin under अलाइड control.
Their aim was to force the western powers to allow the Soviet मण्डल to start supplying Berlin with food and fuel, thereby giving the Soviets practical control over the entire city.
In response, the Western Allies व्यवस्थित the Berlin airlift to carry supplies to the people in West Berlin.
aircrews from the संयुक्त States Air Force, the British Royal Air Force, the royal Australian Air फ़ोर्स, the Royal Canadian Air Force, the Royal New जीलैंड Air Force, and the South African Air Force flew over 200,000 flights in one year, providing up to 4700 tons of daily necessities such as fuel and food to the Berliners.
By the spring of 1949, the effort थी clearly succeeding and, by April, the airlift was delivering अधिक cargo than had previously been transported into the city by rail.
The success of the Berlin Airlift brought embarrassment to the Soviets who had refused to believe it could make a अंतर.
The blockade was lifted in May 1949 and resulted in the creation of two पृथक German states.
The Federal Republic of Germany ( West Germany ) and the German Democratic Republic ( East Germany ) विभाजित up Berlin.
in स्मरण of the airlift, three airports in the former western zones of the city served as the primary gateways to Germany for another fifty years.
The euro sign ; logotype and handwritten.
The euro sign is the currency sign used for the euro, the official currency of the Eurozone in the European Union ( EU ).
The design was presented to the public by the European Commission on 12 दिसम्बर 1996.
The international three-letter code ( according to ISO standard ISO 4217 ) for the euro is EUR.
In Unicode it is encoded at.
In English, the sign precedes the value.
In some styleguides, but not others, the euro sign is unspaced.
mate (, ; sometimes also spelled maté ), also known as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ), is a traditional South American infused drink, particularly in Argentina, Uruguay, Paraguay and the दक्षिणी states of Brazil and to a lesser degree in south of Chile, the bolivian Chaco, Syria और Lebanon.
it is prepared from steeping dried leaves of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis, known in Portuguese as erva-mate ) in hot water.
Mate is served with a metal straw from a shared hollow calabash gourd.
The straw is called a bombilla in some Latin American countries, a bomba in Portuguese, और a bombija or, more generally, a masassa ( प्रकार of straw ) in Arabic.
The straw is traditionally made of silver.
Modern, commercially available straws are typically made of nickel silver, called Alpaca ; stainless steel, or hollow-stemmed cane.
The gourd is known as a mate or a guampa ; while in Brazil, it has the specific name of cuia, or भी cabaça ( the name for Indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in other regions of Brazil, still used for general food और drink in रिमोट regions ).
Even if the जल is supplied from a modern thermos, the infusion is traditionally drunk from mates or cuias.
As with other brewed herbs, yerba mate leaves हैं dried, chopped, and मैदान into a powdery mixture called yerba.
The bombilla acts as both a straw and a sieve.
The submerged end is flared, with small छेद or स्लॉट that allow the brewed liquid in, but block the chunky matter that makes up much of the mixture.
A modern bombilla design uses a straight tube with holes, or spring sleeve to act as a sieve.
`` Tea-bag '' type infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have been on the market in Argentina, Paraguay and Uruguay for अनेक years अंतर्गत such trade names as `` Taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina, `` Pajarito '' and `` Kurupí '' in Paraguay, and in Brazil under the name `` Mate leão ''.
This is considered a completely different drink.
It is never drunk from cuias or called chimarrão, nor is it associated with the gaucho/gaúcho संस्कृति.
The automotive industry is a term that covers a चौड़ी दायरा of companies and organisations involved in the design, विकास, manufacture, marketing, and selling of motor vehicles, towed vehicles, motorcycles and mopeds.
It is one of the world 's most important economic sectors by revenue.
The term automotive industry usually does not include industries dedicated to the maintenance of automobiles following delivery to the end-user, such as repair shops and motor fuel filling स्टेशन.
The term automotive was created from Greek autos ( self ), और Latin motivus ( of गति ) to represent कोई form of self-powered vehicle.
This term was proposed by SAE member Elmer Sperry.
David Michael `` Dave '' Bautista, Jr. ( born January 18, 1969 ), is an American mixed martial artist, bodybuilder, actor, and former professional wrestler best known for his time in World Wrestling Entertainment competing under the ring name Batista.
In WWE, he became a six-time world champion, winning the World Heavyweight Championship four times, and the WWE Championship two times.
He is the longest-reigning संसार Heavyweight Champion in WWE history.
In addition to these championships, Batista has won the संसार Tag Team Championship three times ( twice with Ric Flair and once with John सीना ) and the डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई Tag Team Championship एकबार ( with Rey Mysterio ).
बतिस्ता was also the winner of the 2005 Royal Rumble मैच and went on to headline WrestleMania 21, एक of the शीर्ष five highest-grossing pay-per-view events in pro wrestling history.
After trying out at World Championship Wrestling 's Power संयंत्र, Batista signed a contract with the WWF in 2000 and was sent to its developmental territory, Ohio Valley Wrestling ( OVW ), where he won the OVW Heavyweight Championship.
In August 2012, Bautista signed a contract with Classic Entertainment & खेल to fight in मिश्रित martial arts.
He won his MMA debut on October 6, 2012, defeating Vince Lucero via TKO in the first गोलाकार.
Henry T. Thomas Sampson, Jr. ( born in Jackson, Mississippi in 1934 ) is an African-American आविष्कारक.
He graduated from high school in 1951 from Lanier High School in Jackson, Mississippi.
He then attended Morehouse College for a couple of years before transferring to Purdue University where he became a member of the ओमेगा Psi Phi fraternity.
He received a Bachelor 's degree in science from Purdue University in 1956.
He graduated with an MS degree in engineering from the University of California, Los Angeles in 1961.
Sampson also received his MS in Nuclear Engineering from the University of इलिनोइस Urbana-Champaign in 1965, and his PhD in 1967.
he is the first African American to earn a Ph.D.in Nuclear Engineering in the United राज्य.
Some of his accomplishments include being a member of the United States Navy between the years 1962 and 1964 and earning an Atomic Energy Commission honor between 1964 and 1967.
Later he was awarded the Black Image Award from Aerospace Corporation in 1982.
He was awarded the Blacks in Engineering, Applied Science Award, और prize for education, by the Los Angeles Council of Black Professional Engineers in 1983.
In June 2007, Sampson was married to Laura Howzell Young in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.
Young-Sampson is a professor in the College of Education at California State University San bernardino.
रॉबर्ट Lane Gibbs ( born March 29, 1971 ) is a senior campaign adviser for US President Barack Obama.
Previously, he was the 28th White House Press Secretary.
Gibbs was the communications director for then- U.S. Senator Obama and his 2008 presidential campaign.
Gibbs, who has worked साथ Obama since 2004, was press secretary of John Kerry 's 2004 अध्यक्षीय campaign and has previously specialized in Senate campaigns, having served as communications निदेशक लिये the Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee और for four individual Senate campaigns, including those of Obama in 2004 and फ्रिट्ज़ Hollings in 1998.
Gibbs was also the press secretary of Representative Bob Etheridge.
On November 22, 2008, Gibbs was announced as the press secretary of the Obama administration.
He assumed the role of press secretary on January 20, 2009, and gave his first official briefing on जनवरी 22.
On January 5, 2011, Gibbs announced कि he होता leave the White House to become an outside adviser to the administration.
He left on February 11, 2011.
On February 12, 2013, it was announced that Gibbs had महरूम hired as a contributor for cable-news channel MSNBC.
His पहला appearance was on the same night prior to the 2013 State Of the संघ Address.
Armando Pérez ( born January 15, 1981 ), better known by his stage name Pitbull, is an अमरीकी rapper, songwriter, and record producer.
उसके first recorded performance was from the Lil Jon album Kings of Crunk in 2002.
In 2004, he released his debut album titled M.I.A.M.I. ( short for Money Is A Major Issue ) under TVT Records.
Since then, he has released three other albums under the label : El Mariel in 2006, The Boatlift in 2007, and Planet Pit in 2011.

The latter peaked at No. 30 on the Hot 100 and no. 11 on the Hot Rap Tracks charts while `` I Know You Want Me '' peaked at No. 2 on the Hot 100 and peaked within the शीर्ष ten spots of charts in the UK, Canada, Italy, and the Netherlands.
The song reached No. 1 in France और the European Hot 100 on the week ending अगस्त 29, 2009 according to Billboard magazine.
he later signed with पोलो Grounds Music through सोनी Music and created his own label Mr. 305 Inc.
Another single from Rebelution was `` Hotel Room Service ``, which peaked at No. 8 on the Hot 100.
Rebelution went on to sell over 7.5 million worldwide digital singles and albums संयुक्त.

pérez is also the host of his own Spanish-language program on the cable channel Mun2 titled La Esquina ( Spanish लिये The Corner ).
in 2005 Pérez and rapper Sean 'Diddy ' Combs co-founded Bad Boy Latino, a subsidiary of Combs ' Bad लड़के Records label.
It primarily focuses on लैटिन hip hop, Latin soul, Latin pop and अन्य Tropical music, and has offices in New York and Miami, Florida.
Along with co-founding it, Pérez currently heads the A & R division of the label.
Pérez has become a product endorser, representing alongside Drake, Rihanna, and Trey Songz the “So Kodak” campaign for the Kodak brand and embarking on a partnership with the soft drink giant Dr Pepper as part of the campaign “ Vida 23 ” for which he recorded the सोंग specifically featured on his एल्बम Armando.

Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ), भी ज्ञात as All hallows ' Eve, is a yearly celebration observed in a number of countries on October 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of hallowmas.
According to many scholars, All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally influenced by western European harvest festivals, and festivals of the dead साथ possible pagan roots, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently of Samhain and has solely Christian roots.
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ), attending costume parties, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted attractions, playing pranks, telling scary stories, and watching horror films.
स्वतंत्रता of speech is the political right to communicate one 's opinions and ideas using one 's body and property to anyone who is willing to receive them.
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously, but includes any act of seeking, receiving and imparting information or ideas, regardless of the medium used.
In अभ्यास, the right to freedom of speech is not absolute in any country and the right is commonly subject to limitations, as with libel, slander, obscenity, sedition ( सहित, for उदाहरण inciting ethnic hatred ), copyright violation, revelation of information that is classified or otherwise.
The right to freedom of expression is recognized as a human सही under Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and recognized in international human rights law in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय वचन on सिविल and राजनैतिक अधिकारों ( ICCPR ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this right shall शामिल freedom to seek, receive and impart information and ideas of all kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in print, in the form of art, or through any other media of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` therefore be विषय to certain restrictions '' when necessary `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public अनुक्रम ( order public ), or of public health or morals ''.
Freedom of वाक may be legally curtailed in कुछ religious legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is मिला to cause religious offense, such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006.
Sydney Harbour from the air, showing the Opera House, the CBD, Circular Quay, the Bridge, the Parramatta River, North Sydney and Kirribilli in the foreground
The Sydney Harbour Bridge is a steel through arch सेतु across Sydney Harbour that carries rail, vehicular, bicycle और pedestrian traffic between the Sydney central business ज़िला ( CBD ) and the उत्तर Shore.
The dramatic view of the सेतु, the harbour, and the nearby सिडनी Opera House is an iconic image of Sydney, New South Wales, and Australia.
The bridge is nicknamed `` the Coathanger '' because of its arch-based design.
Under the directions of Dr J.J.C. Bradfield of the NSW Department of Public Works, the bridge was designed and built by British firm Dorman long and Co Ltd of middlesbrough and opened in 1932.
The सेतु 's design was influenced by the Hell Gate Bridge in New यॉर्क.
it was the world 's widest long-span bridge, at 48.8 meters ( 160 feet ) wide, until construction of the नई Port Mann Bridge in Vancouver.
It is also the fifth longest spanning-arch bridge in the संसार, and it is the tallest steel arch bridge, measuring from top to water level.
Until 1967 the harbour Bridge was Sydney 's tallest structure.
The Hawaii hotspot is a volcanic हॉटस्पॉट located near the namesake Hawaiian Islands, in the northern Pacific Ocean.
One of the most well-known and heavily studied hotspots in the world, the Hawaii plume is responsible for the creation of the Hawaiian – Emperor seamount chain, an over 5,800 kilometres ( 3,600 mi ) long chain of volcanoes, four of which are active, two of which are dormant, और more than 123 of which are extinct, many having since been मैदान beneath the waves by erosion as seamounts and atolls.
The chain extends from south of the island of Hawaii to the edge of the Aleutian Trench, near the eastern edge of Russia.
While most volcanoes हैं created by geological activity at tectonic plate boundaries, the Hawaii hotspot is located far from nearby plate boundaries ; the classic hotspot theory, first proposed in 1963 by John tuzo Wilson, proposes that a single, fixed mantle plume builds volcanoes that then, cut बंद from their source by the movement of the Pacific Plate, become increasingly inactive and eventually erode below sea level over millions of years.
According to this theory, the nearly 60° bend separating the Emperor और Hawaiian segments of the chain was caused by a sudden shift in the movement of the Pacific Plate.
In 2003, fresh investigations of this irregularity led to the proposal of a mobile hotspot theory, suggesting that हॉटस्पॉट are mobile, not fixed, और that the 47 million year old bend was caused by a shift in the hotspot 's motion rather than the plate 's.
Ancient Hawaiians were the first to recognize the increasing age और weathered state of the volcanoes to the north as they progressed on fishing expeditions along the islands.
The volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes and their constant battle with the sea थी a major element in Hawaiian mythology, embodied in Pele, the deity of volcanoes.
After the arrival of europeans on the द्वीप, in 1880-1881 James Dwight Dana directed the पहला formal geological study of the hotspot 's volcanics, confirming the relationship long observed by the natives.
1912 marked the founding of the Hawaiian ज्वालामुखी Observatory by volcanologist Thomas Jaggar, initiating continuous scientific observation of the आइलैंड्स.
In the 1970s, a mapping project was initiated to gain more information about the complex geology of Hawaii 's seafloor.
The hotspot has since been tomographically imaged, showing it to be wide and up to deep, and olivine and garnet -based studies have shown its magma chamber is approximately.
in its at least 85 लाख सालो of activity the hotspot रै produced an estimated of rock.
the chain 's rate of drift रै slowly increased over time, causing the amount of time each individual volcano is active to decrease, from 18 million years for the 76 million year old Detroit Seamount, to बस under 900,000 for the एक million year-old Kohala ; on the अन्य हाथ, eruptive volume रै increased from per year to about.
Overall, this रै caused a trend towards more active लकिन quickly-silenced, closely spaced volcanoes—whereas volcanoes on the near side of the hotspot overlap each other ( forming such superstructures as Hawaii island and the प्राचीन Maui Nui ), the oldest of the सम्राट seamounts हैं spaced as far as apart.

Petitions are होने signed to bring the show for a fifth season.
The show airs on Treehouse TV Canada and Nick jr. ( formerly Noggin ).

Osteonecrosis of the jaw ( ONJ ) is a severe अस्थि disease that affects the maxilla and the mandible.
Various forms of ONJ have been described over the last 160 years, and a number of causes have been suggested in the literature.
Osteonecrosis of the jaws associated with bisphosphonate therapy, required by some cancer treatment regimens, रै been identified and defined as a pathological entity since 2003.
The possible risk from lower मौखिक doses of bisphosphonates, taken by patients to prevent or treat osteoporosis, remains uncertain.
विभिन्न treatment options have been explored, however severe मामले of ONJ still require surgical removal of the affected अस्थि.
A thorough history and assessement of pre-existing systemic problems and possible साइट of dental infection are required to help prevent the condition, especially if bisphosphonate therapy is considered.
The Boston Red Sox are a पेशेवर baseball team based in Boston, Massachusetts, and a सदस्य of प्रमुख League Baseball 's American लीग Eastern Division.
Founded in as one of the American लीग 's आठ charter franchises, the Red Sox 's home ballpark has been Fenway Park since.
the `` Red Sox '' name was chosen by the team owner, John I. Taylor, around, following previous Boston teams that had been ज्ञात as the `` Red Stockings ``.
They have played in 11 World Series, winning 7.
Boston was a dominant team in the new league, defeating the Pittsburgh Pirates in the पहला World Series in and winning चार more championships by.
However, they then went into one of the longest championship droughts in बेसबॉल history, called by some the `` Curse of the Bambino `` after its alleged beginning with the Red Sox 's sale of Babe Ruth to the rival Yankees two years after उनके world championship in 1918, an 86-year wait before the team 's sixth World Championship in.
However, the team 's history during that काल was hardly एक of futility, but was rather punctuated with some of the most memorable moments in World श्रेणी history, including Enos Slaughter 's `` mad डैश `` in, the `` नामुमकिन Dream `` of, Carlton Fisk 's home run in, and Bill Buckner 's error in.
Red Sox history has also been चिह्नित by the team 's intense rivalry with the New York यांकीज़, arguably the fiercest and सबसे historic in North American professional sports.
The Boston Red Sox are owned by Fenway Sports समूह, who भी own Liverpool Football क्लबों of the Premier League in England.
The Red Sox हैं consistently one of the top MLB teams in average road attendance, जबकि the small capacity of Fenway Park prevents them from leading in overall attendance.
From May 15, 2003 to April 10, 2013, the Red Sox बेची out every home game-a total of 820 games ( 794 regular season ) for a major professional sports record that lasted almost a decade.
Mince pie filled with mincemeat
Mincemeat is a mixture of chopped dried फल, distilled spirits and spices, and sometimes beef suet, beef, or venison.
Originally, mincemeat always contained meat.
Many modern recipes contain beef suet, though vegetable shortening is sometimes used in its place.
Variants of mincemeat are found in Australia, ब्रिटनी, Canada, northern Europe, Ireland, South Africa, the United Kingdom and the संयुक्त States.
in some countries the term mincemeat refers to minced or ground meat.
Diana, Princess of Wales ( Diana Frances ; née Spencer ; 1 July 1961 – 31 August 1997 ) was the first wife of Charles, Prince of Wales, the ज्येष्ठ son and heir apparent of Queen Elizabeth II.
She was well known for her fund-raising work for international धर्मार्थ and as an eminent celebrity of the late 20th century.
उसके wedding to the प्रिंस of Wales on 29 July 1981 थी held at St Paul 's Cathedral and seen by a वैश्विक television audience of over 750 million.
While married she bore the titles Princess of Wales, Duchess of Cornwall, Duchess of Rothesay, Countess of Chester and Baroness of Renfrew.
The marriage produced two sons, the princes William and Harry, who became second and third in line to the British throne.
Diana was born into an aristocratic English family with royal ancestry.
She was the fourth child of John Spencer, 8th Earl Spencer and his wife frances, daughter of मौरिस Roche, 4th Baron Fermoy.
She became a public फिगर with the announcement of her engagement.
She also received recognition for her charity work and for her support of the International Campaign to Ban Landmines.
From 1989, she was the president of the Great Ormond Street Hospital for children, in addition to dozens of other charities.
Diana remained the object of worldwide media scrutiny during and after her marriage, which ended in divorce on 28 August 1996.
Media attention and public mourning were considerable following her death in a car crash in Paris on 31 August 1997.
Argentina, officially the Argentine Republic ( ), is the second largest country in both South America and the Latin America region.
The country is a federation of 23 provinces and the autonomous city of Buenos Aires, its capital and largest city.
It is the eighth -largest country in the world by जमीन area and the largest among Spanish-speaking nations by geographical area of 2,780,400 km2 और is the fourth by population, with over 41 million people.
अर्जेंटीना is a founding member of the United Nations, Mercosur, the Union of South American Nations, the Organization of Ibero-American States, the World बैंको समूह and the World Trade Organization, and is one of the G-15 and G-20 major economies.
Argentina is located in दक्षिण America, bordered by Chile to the west and दक्षिण, Bolivia and Paraguay to the north and ब्राज़ील और Uruguay to the northeast.
Argentina claims sovereignty over part of Antarctica, the Falkland Islands ( ) and South Georgia and the South Sandwich आइलैंड्स.
Argentina is the successor state of the Viceroyalty of the Río de la प्लाटा, an overseas colony of the Spanish Empire.
Argentina घोषित independence during the Argentine War of Independence, which थी followed by the Argentine Civil Wars during सबसे of the 19th century.
The country faced several military coups और राजनैतिक instability during the 20th century, साथ with periodic economic crisis कि continue to इस day.
A recognized Southern Cone power, and middle power, अर्जेंटीना is लैटिन America 's third-largest economy, साथ a `` very high '' rating on the Human development index.
Within Latin America, अर्जेंटीना has the fifth highest nominal GDP per capita and the highest in purchasing power terms.
the Legatum Institute have argued that the country has a `` न्यास for future growth due to its market size, levels of foreign direct investment, and percentage of high-tech exports as share of total manufactured goods '', and it is classed by investors as middle emerging economy.
Argentina is the Latin American देश with the most Nobel Prizes, for a total of five, all obtained during the second half of the twentieth century.
the देश has three Nobel prizes in science and दो of peace.
The most important aspects of विज्ञान and technology in Argentina are concerned with medicine, नाभिकीय physics, biotechnology, nanotechnology, space and प्रक्षेपास्त्र technology and several fields related to the country 's Main Economic Activities.
The country also has the mega exhibition center of science, technology, industry and art that are Latin America 's largest.

The नगर 's 2010 estimated population is 40,010.
Hickory is the principal city in the Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton MSA, in which the population at the 2010 Census was 365,497.
Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written बहु ( ethylene terephthalate ) ), commonly abbreviated PET, PETE, or the obsolete PETP or PET-P, is a thermoplastic polymer resin of the polyester family and is प्रयुक्त in synthetic fibers ; पेय, food and other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; and engineering resins often in combination with glass fiber.
The term polyethylene terephthalate is a source of confusion because इस substance, PET, करता not contain polyethylene.
Thus, the alternate रूप, poly ( ethylene terephthalate ), is often used in scholarly journals for the sake of accuracy and clarity.
Depending on its processing and thermal history, polyethylene terephthalate may exist both as an amorphous ( पारदर्शी ) and as a semi-crystalline polymer.
The semicrystalline सामग्री might appear transparent ( particle size < 500 nm ) or अपारदर्शी and white ( particle size up to a few microns ) depending on its crystal structure and particle size.
Its monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification reaction between terephthalic acid and ethylene glycol with water as a byproduct, or by transesterification reaction between ethylene glycol and dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct.
Polymerization is through a polycondensation reaction of the monomers ( done immediately after esterification/transesterification ) with water as the byproduct.
The बहुमत of the world 's PET production is for synthetic fibers ( in excess of 60 % ), with bottle production accounting for around 30 % of global demand.
In the context of textile applications, PET is referred to by its common name, `` polyester, '' whereas the एक्रोनिम `` PET '' is generally used in relation to packaging.
Polyester makes up परिचय 18 % of world polymer production and is the third-most-produced polymer ; polyethylene ( PE ) and polypropylene ( PP ) are पहला and second, क्रमशः.
पालतु consists of polymerized इकाई of the monomer ethylene terephthalate, साथ repeating C10H8O4 units.
PET is commonly recycled, and has the number `` 1 '' as its recycling symbol.
Louisiana was admitted to the Union on April 30, 1812, and elects senators to वर्ग 2 and Class 3.
Its वर्तमान senators are Democrat Mary Landrieu and Republican David Vitter.
Black pudding, blood pudding or blood सॉसेज is a type of sausage made by cooking blood or dried blood with a filler जबतक it is thick enough to congeal when cooled.
The dish exists in various cultures from Asia to Europe and the Americas.
Pig, cattle, sheep, duck, and goat blood can be प्रयुक्त depending on different देशों.
in Europe and the Americas, typical fillers include meat, fat, suet, bread, cornmeal, मीठी potato, onion, chestnuts, barley, and oatmeal.
In Spain, Portugal and Asia, potato is often replaced by rice.
Stakeholder may refer to:
Stakeholder ( corporate ), a person, group, organization, member or system who affects or can be affected by an organization 's actions
Stakeholder, an एंटिटी that can be affected by the results of that in which they are said to be stakeholders, i.e., that in which they have a stake.
Project stakeholder, a व्यक्ति, group or organization with an interest in a project
Stakeholder theory, a सिद्धान्त that identifies and मॉडल the groups which are stakeholders of a corporation or project
Stakeholder analysis, the process of identifying those affected by a प्रोजेक्ट or event
Stakeholder ( law ), a तीसरा party जो temporarily holds money or प्रॉपर्टी जबकि its owner is still being determined
Jack Smight ( March 9, 1925 - सितंबर 1, 2003 ) was an American theatre and film director.
Smight was born in Minneapolis, Minnesota and went to school with भविष्य actor Peter Graves.
His film credits include The Traveling Executioner, Rabbit, Run, Loving Couples, Midway, Harper, Airport 1975, Damnation alley and the एमी Award -winning Eddie, as well as many episodes of television series such as the Twilight Zone and The अल्फ्रेड Hitchcock Hour.
He भी directed the 1960 Broadway play The 49th Cousin and composed the music for the film adaption of Roll of Thunder Hear My Cry.
Smight died from cancer in Los Angeles, California.
Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev ( ; 8 February 1834 – 2 February 1907 O.S. 27 January 1834 – 20 January 1907 ) was a रूसी chemist and inventor.
He formulated the Periodic Law, निर्मित his own version of the periodic table of elements, and used it to correct the properties of some already discovered elements and also to predict the properties of elements yet to be discovered !
Modesto ( Spanish for `` modest '' ), officially the नगर of Modesto, is the county seat और largest city of Stanislaus County, California, United States.
With a population of approximately 201,165 at the 2010 census, Modesto ranks as the 18th largest city in the राज्य of California.
The Modesto Census County प्रभाग, which includes the cities of Ceres and Riverbank, has a population of 312,842 as of 2010.
Modesto is located in the central valley area of Northern California, 90 मील उत्तर of Fresno, 92 miles east of San Francisco, 68 miles दक्षिण of the state capital of Sacramento, 66 miles west of Yosemite National पार्क, and 24 मील south of Stockton.
Modesto, a 29-time Tree City USA honoree, is surrounded by rich farmland, lending to a ranking for the county as 6th among all California counties in farm production.
led by milk, almonds, chickens, walnuts, and corn silage, the county grossed nearly $ 3.1 billion in agricultural production in 2011.
Modesto was immortalized in the 1973 George Lucas film American graffiti.
The award winning film captured the spirit of `` cruising '' and friendship on 10th and 11th Streets in 1962 and led to the revival of 1950 's nostalgia कि included the TV show Happy Days और the other spin-offs.
Ron Howard, Harrison Ford and Richard Dreyfuss starred in the film.
The साउंडट्रैक was a huge success.
Director George Lucas is a native of Modesto, graduating from Downey ऊँची स्कूल in 1962.
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being Index for 2011, which interviews 1,000 participants daily and asks individuals to assess their jobs, finances, physical health, emotional state of mind and communities, ranked Modesto 126 out of the 190 शहरों surveyed.
In December 2009, Forbes ranked Modesto 48th out of 100 among `` Best Bang-for-the-Buck Cities ''.
In इस ranking, Modesto ranked 8th in आवास affordability and सफर time but also ranked 86th in job forecast growth और 99th in foreclosures.
Independence Day, commonly known as the Fourth of July, is a federal अवकाश in the United राज्य commemorating the adoption of the Declaration of Independence on जुलाई 4, 1776, declaring independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain.
Independence Day is commonly associated साथ fireworks, parades, barbecues, carnivals, fairs, picnics, concerts, baseball games, family reunions, and political speeches and ceremonies, in addition to various अन्य public and निजी events celebrating the history, government, and परंपराओं of the संयुक्त States.
Independence Day is the national day of the United States.
A gender symbol denotes the sex of an organism or characterizes an agent by gender.
The two standard gender symbols denoting male ♂ और female ♀ are derived इससे astrological symbols, denoting the classical planets Mars and Venus, respectively.
These प्रतीकों have been in use since the Renaissance भी denoting elements in alchemy, specifically the धातुओं iron and copper.
They were first used to denote the effective gender of plants ( i.e. sex of individual in a given crossbreed, since most plants are hermaphroditic ) by Carolus Linnaeus in 1751.
A leasehold estate is an स्वामित्व of a temporary right to hold land or property in which a lessee or a tenant holds अधिकारों of real property by some form of title from a lessor or landlord.
Although a tenant does hold rights to रियल property, a leasehold estate is typically considered personal property.
Leasehold is a form of land tenure or property tenure where one party buys the सही to occupy land or a building for a given length of time.
As lease is a legal estate, leasehold estate can be खरीदा and sold on the open market.
A leasehold thus differs इससे a freehold or fee simple where the ownership of a प्रॉपर्टी is purchased outright and thereafter held for an indeterminate length of समय, and भी differs from a tenancy where a property is let ( rented ) on a periodic basis such as साप्ताहिक or monthly.
Until the end of the पट्टे period ( often measured in दशकों or सदियां ; a 99 year lease is quite common ) the leaseholder has the right to remain in occupation as an assured tenant paying an agreed rent to the owner.
Terms of the agreement are contained in a lease, which has elements of contract and property law intertwined.
The term estate for years may occasionally be used.
This refers to a leasehold estate for any specific period of time ( the word `` years '' is misleading ).
An estate for सालो is नहीं automatically renewed.
Colloquially, `` पट्टे '' and `` leasing `` are often a formalization of a longer, specific period as compared with a `` rental '' that created a tenancy at will, terminable or renewable at the end of a short period.
Olivia ( also known as स्वागत to the World of the Pig Olivia ) is a British-American children 's animated television श्रेणी produced by media company chorion and based on Ian Falconer 's books.
It is seen on Nick Jr. in the US, Milkshake !
, Nick Jr. in the UK and Ireland, and Disney जूनियर in Latin America and Brazil, Treehouse TV in Canada.
The show has won a silver Parents ' Choice Award for its positive story lines and characters.
Location of Panama between Pacific ( bottom ) and Caribbean ( top ), with canal at top center
The पनामा Canal ( ) is a ship canal in Panama that connects the अटलांटिक Ocean ( via the caribbean Sea ) to the Pacific Ocean.
The canal cuts across the Isthmus of पनामा and is a key conduit for international maritime trade.
There are locks at प्रत्येक end to lift ships up to Gatun Lake ( above sea-level ).
Gatun Lake was created to reduce the amount of work required for the canal.
The current locks are wide.
A third, wider lane of locks is being built.
France began work on the कनाल in 1881, but had to stop because of engineering problems and high mortality due to बीमारी.
The United States ( US ) later took over the project and took a decade to complete the canal in 1914, enabling जहाजों to avoid the lengthy Cape Horn route around the southernmost tip of South America ( via the Drake Passage ) or to navigate the जलसन्धि of Magellan.
एक of the largest and most difficult engineering projects ever undertaken, the Panama Canal shortcut made it possible for ships to travel between the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans in half the time previously required.
The shorter, faster, safer रूट to the US West Coast and to nations in and along the Pacific Ocean allowed those places to become more integrated साथ the world economy.
During this time, ownership of the territory that is now the Panama Canal was first Colombian, then French, and then American ; the United States completed the construction.
The canal was लिया over in 1999 by the Panamanian government, as long planned.
Annual traffic has risen इससे about 1,000 ships when the canal opened in 1914, to 14,702 vessels in 2008, the latter measuring a total of 309.6 लाख Panama Canal/Universal Measurement System ( PC/UMS ) tons.
by 2008, more than 815,000 vessels had passed through the canal, many of them much larger than the original planners could have envisioned ; the largest ships that can transit the canal today are called Panamax.
The American Society of सिविल Engineers has named the Panama Canal one of the seven wonders of the modern world.
Benjamin Franklin ( April 17, 1790 ) was one of the founding Fathers of the United States.
A noted polymath, Franklin थी a leading author, printer, political theorist, politician, postmaster, scientist, musician, inventor, satirist, civic activist, statesman, and diplomat.
As a scientist, he was a प्रमुख figure in the American Enlightenment and the history of physics for his discoveries and theories regarding विद्युत.
He invented the lightning rod, bifocals, the Franklin stove, a carriage odometer, and the glass 'armonica '.
He facilitated अनेक civic organizations, including a fire department and a university.
Franklin earned the title of `` The पहला American '' for his early and indefatigable campaigning for colonial unity ; as an author and spokesman in London लिये several colonies, then as the first United States Ambassador to France, he exemplified the उभरते American nation.
Franklin was foundational in defining the American ethos as a marriage of the practical values of thrift, hard work, education, community spirit, self-governing institutions, and विपक्ष to authoritarianism both political and religious, with the वैज्ञानिक and tolerant values of the Enlightenment.
In the words of historian Henry Steele Commager, `` In a Franklin could be merged the virtues of Puritanism बगैर its defects, the illumination of the Enlightenment without its heat. ''
To Walter Isaacson, this makes Franklin `` the सबसे accomplished American of his age और the सबसे influential in inventing the type of society अमेरिका would become. ''
फ्रैंकलिन, always गर्व of his working class roots, became a successful newspaper editor and printer in Philadelphia, the leading city in the colonies.
He was also partners with William Goddard and Joseph Galloway the three of whom published the Pennsylvania Chronicle, a newspaper that थी known for its revolutionary sentiments and criticisms of the British monarchy in the American colonies.
He became wealthy publishing Poor रिचर्ड 's Almanack and The Pennsylvania Gazette.
Franklin gained international renown as a scientist for उसके famous experiments in electricity and for his many आविष्कारों, especially the lightning rod.
He played a major भूमिका in establishing the University of Pennsylvania and was निर्वाचित the first president of the American Philosophical Society.
Franklin became a national नायिका in America when he spearheaded the effort to have Parliament repeal the unpopular Stamp Act.
An accomplished diplomat, he was widely admired among the French as American minister to Paris and was a प्रमुख figure in the development of positive Franco-American संबंध.
For many years he was the British postmaster for the colonies, which enabled him to set up the first national communications network.
He थी active in community affairs, colonial and state politics, as well as national and international अफेयर्स.
From 1785 to 1788, he served as governor of Pennsylvania.
Toward the end of his life, he freed his slaves and became one of the most prominent abolitionists.
His colorful life and legacy of scientific and राजनैतिक achievement, and status as one of America 's most influential Founding Fathers, have seen Franklin honored on coinage and money ; warships ; the names of many towns, counties, educational संस्थानों, namesakes, और companies ; and more than two centuries after his death, countless cultural references.
दण्ड Minds is an American police procedural television program that premiered September 22, 2005, on CBS.
The series follows a team of profilers from the FBI 's Behavioral Analysis Unit ( bau ) based in Quantico, Virginia.
The BAU is part of the FBI National Center for the Analysis of Violent Crime.
The show differs इससे many procedural dramas by focusing on profiling the दण्ड, rather than the अपराधों itself.
The show is produced by the Mark Gordon कम्पनी in association with CBS Television Studios ( originally सर्वोपरि Network Television then CBS Paramount Network Television ) and एबीसी Studios ( originally Touchstone Television ).
CBS announced in October 2009 that Legacy Interactive would develop a video game आधारित on the show.
The game would require players to examine crime scenes for clues to help solve murder mysteries.
The interactive पहेली खेल was released in 2012, लकिन did not feature any of the आवाज़ें of the show 's cast, nor was the cast involved with the project.
On March 14, 2012, CBS renewed Criminal Minds for an eighth season, which premiered on September 26, 2012.
`` Heart-Shaped Box '' is a song by the अमरीकी grunge band Nirvana, written by vocalist and guitarist Kurt Cobain.
The song was released as the first single from the group 's third and final studio album, in Utero, in 1993.
it थी एक of two songs from the album mixed by Scott Litt in order to augment the original production by producer Steve Albini.
While Nirvana 's label DGC Records did not release a physical single for sale in the संयुक्त States, `` Heart-Shaped Box '' received much American radio airplay, reaching number one on the Billboard Modern Rock Tracks chart.
the international रिलीज of the single reached number five on the UK singles चार्ट.
The song 's music video, directed by Anton Corbijn, garnered critical plaudits.
The orbital speed of a body, generally a ग्रह, a natural satellite, an artificial satellite, or a multiple star, is the speed at which it orbits around the barycenter of a system, usually around a more massive body.
It can be used to refer to either the mean कक्षीय speed, the average speed as it completes an orbit, or instantaneous orbital speed, the speed at a particular point in इसके orbit.
The orbital speed at कोई position in the orbit can be computed from the distance to the central body at that स्थिति, and the specific orbital energy, which is independent of position : the kinetic energy is the कुल energy minus the potential energy.
Brown Palace Interior and Atrium
Brown Palace Hotel is the second-oldest operating hotel in Denver, Colorado and is एक of the first atrium-style hotel ever built.
It is now operated by Quorum Hotels and Resorts.
It was built in 1892, एक year later than the Oxford Hotel.
It was named लिये its original owner, Henry C. Brown, and was designed with its odd triangular shape by वास्तु Frank edbrooke.
The hotel is located at 321 17th St, Denver, CO between 17th Street, Broadway and Tremont Street/Pl in downtown Denver behind the Republic Plaza.
The main entrance door is on Tremont Street.
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs, और is currently the dominant consumer video format in Asia, North America, Europe, and Australia.
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g., a DVD player, or a computer DVD drive with a तन्त्र DVD player ).
Commercial DVD movies हैं encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video और audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described नीचे ).
Typically, the data rate लिये DVD movies ranges from 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s, and the bit rate is usually adaptive.
It was first available for retail around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification was created by dvd Forum and can be obtained from DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation लिये a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is not publicly available, because every subscriber must sign a non-disclosure agreement.
निश्चित information in the DVD Book is proprietary और confidential.
The nautical mile ( symbol M, NM or nmi ) is a unit of length that is about एक minute of arc of अक्षांश measured along any meridian, or about one minute of arc of longitude at the equator.
By international agreement it has been set at 1,852 मीटर exactly ( about 6,076 feet ).
It is a non- SI unit ( although accepted for use in the International System of Units by the BIPM ) used especially by navigators in the shipping and aviation industries, and also in polar exploration.
It is commonly used in international law and treaties, especially regarding the limits of territorial waters.
It developed from the sea mile and the related भौगोलिक mile.
The nautical mile remains in use by sea and air navigators worldwide because of its convenience when working with charts.
Most nautical चार्ट use the Mercator projection whose स्केल varies by about a factor of six from the equator to 80° अक्षांश, so charts covering large areas can not use a सिंगल linear scale.
The nautical mile is nearly equal to a minute of latitude on a चार्ट, so a distance measured with a chart divider can be roughly converted to nautical miles using the chart 's latitude scale.
Shippensburg is a borough in Cumberland and Franklin counties in the U.S. state of Pennsylvania.
Settled in 1730, Shippensburg lies in the Cumberland घाटी, 41 miles ( 66 km ) west-southwest of Harrisburg, and is part of the Harrisburg– Carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area.
In 1900, 3,228 people lived वहीँ ; in 1910, 3,457 ; and in 1940, 5,244 people lived there.
The population was 5,492 at the 2010 census.
Shippensburg was incorporated as a borough on January 21, 1819.
In the past, वहीँ were furniture factories, इंजन and pump works, and other industrial works located within the town.
Shippensburg is also the home of the Beistle Company, the oldest and largest manufacturer of decorations and party goods, which sells its distinctive honeycomb पेपर decorations worldwide.
It is also the location of Pague and Fegan, the oldest continuously operated हार्डवेयर store in Pennsylvania.
in May 2012, Volvo Construction Equipment began a $ 100 million expansion project to bring its अमरीकी मुख्यालय to Shippensburg.
Shippensburg is also home to Shippensburg University of Pennsylvania, one of 14 universities of the Pennsylvania State System of Higher Education.
Yearly the last full week of July, the Shippensburg Community Fair is held.
Begun in 1958, the fair bills itself as पेन्सिलवेनिया 's largest bi-county fair.
The fair includes agricultural exhibits, a craft show, food vendors, and carnival यात्राएँ amongst अन्य things.
Every summer on the last Saturday of August, shippensburg holds the Corn Festival, an event that brings regional artisans और विक्रेता to operate stands downtown.
The downtown is closed to traffic for at least 5 blocks for most of the day.
Average attendance at the पर्व is estimated at 60,000 - 70,000 each year.
Black बालदार जीभ ( BHT, भी termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a condition of the tongue where the filiform papillae elongate with black or brown discoloration, giving a black and hairy appearance.
The appearance may be alarming, but it is a harmless condition.
Predisposing factors include smoking, xerostomia ( dry mouth ), soft diet, poor मौखिक hygiene and certain medications.
Management is by improving oral hygiene, especially scraping or brushing the tongue.
The IEEE 1394 interface is a serial bus interface standard for high-speed communications and isochronous real-time data transfer.
It थी developed in the late 1980s and early 1990s by Apple, who called it FireWire.
The 1394 interface is comparable to usb, and often those two technologies are considered together, though USB has more market share.
ठहराना first included FireWire in some of its 1999 models, and most Apple computers since the year 2000 have included FireWire ports, though, as of 2013, nothing beyond the 800 version ( IEEE-1394b ).
The interface is also known by the brand i.LINK ( Sony ), and Lynx ( Texas Instruments ).
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel SCSI in many applications, because of lower implementation costs and a simplified, more adaptable cabling system.
The 1394 मानक also defines a backplane interface, though this is not as widely used.
IEEE 1394 is the High-Definition Audio-Video संजाल Alliance ( HANA ) standard connection interface for A/V ( audio/visual ) component communication and control.
FireWire is also available in wireless, fiber optic, and coaxial versions using the isochronous protocols.
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( October 3, 1954 – August 27, 1990 ) was an अमरीकी guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record निर्माता.
Often referred to by his initials SRV, Vaughan is best ज्ञात as a founding member and leader of Double Trouble.
साथ with drummer Chris Layton and bassist Tommy Shannon, they ignited the blues revival of the 1980s.
With a करियर spanning seven years, Vaughan and Double Trouble consistently sold आउट concerts while उनके albums frequently went gold.
He was born and raised in Dallas, Texas, and for a short period of time lived in ग्राहम, टेक्सास.
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan, Vaughan started playing the guitar at age seven and formed अनेक bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped out of high school and moved to Austin to further pursue his musical career, joining groups such as Krackerjack, the nightcrawlers, and the Cobras.
In 1977, he formed Triple Threat Revue, a band that eventually evolved into Double Trouble and regularly performed around Austin.
in 1982, Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the montreux Jazz Festival in Switzerland, catching the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne.
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on his upcoming studio album Let 's Dance, while Browne offered the band free use of his निजी studio in Los एंजिल्स to रिकार्ड an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and दोगुना Trouble were signed to Epic Records by veteran रिकार्ड producer John Hammond Sr. and released their debut album, Texas Flood in June of that year.
After successful touring, the group released the albums, Could n't Stand the Weather ( 1984 ) and Soul to Soul ( 1985 ), the latter of which featured new keyboardist रीज़ Wynans.
Although his career had progressed successfully, Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation hospital in Atlanta, Georgia to give up a cocaine and alcohol habit and returned to touring with the band.
In जून 1989, In Step was released and earned them a Grammy Award for Best Contemporary Blues Performance.
On August 27, 1990, Vaughan was killed in a helicopter crash following a performance in East Troy, Wisconsin.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet intense स्टाइल was derived from a variety of musical genres.
He was influenced by blues musicians including Albert King, Freddie King, ओटिस Rush, and Muddy Waters, and rock guitarists such as Jimi हेंड्रिक्स और Lonnie Mack.
His गिटार playing reflected the classic ब्लूज़ and pentatonic scales.
He has received wide critical recognition for his guitar playing, ranking at # 6 on Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011.
He was posthumously inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame in 2000 and a memorial statue was erected in Austin 's ऑडिटोरियम Shores park.
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely माना to be एक of the greatest musicians to come from the state of टेक्सास.

For the camera protocol, see GigE vision.
In computer networking, gigabit Ethernet ( GbE or 1 GigE ) is a term describing विभिन्न technologies for transmitting ईथरनेट frames at a rate of a gigabit per second ( 1,000,000,000 bits per दूसरी ), as defined by the IEEE 802.3-2008 मानक.
It came into उपयोग beginning in 1999, gradually supplanting Fast Ethernet in wired लोकल संजाल, where it performed considerably तेज़.
The cables and equipment are very similar to previous standards and were बहुत common and economical by 2010.
Half-duplex gigabit कड़ी कनेक्ट through hubs are allowed by the specification, but full-duplex usage with switches is much more common.
