The main components of a stamp:
1. Image
2. Perforations
3. Denomination
4. Country नाम
A postage स्टैम्प is a छोटी piece of paper that is खरीदा and displayed on an item of मेल as evidence of payment of postage.
Typically, stamps are made from special paper, with a national designation and denomination ( price ) on the face, and a gum adhesive on the रिवर्स पक्ष.
Postage stamps are purchased from a postal administration or other authorized vendor and are used to pay for the costs involved in moving mail as खूब as other business necessities such as बीमे and registration.
The stamp’s shape is usually that of a small rectangle of varying proportions, though triangles or अन्य shapes हैं occasionally used.
The stamp is affixed to an envelope or other postal cover ( i.e., packet, box, mailing cylinder ) कि the ग्राहक wishes to send.
the item is then processed by the postal system, where a postmark, sometimes known as a cancellation mark, is usually लागू over the stamp and cover ; this procedure marks the stamp as used, which prevents its reuse.
The postmark indicates the date and पाइंट of origin of the mailing.
The mailed item is then delivered to the address that the customer has applied to the envelope or cover.
Postage stamps have facilitated the delivery of mail चूंकि the 1840s.
Before this time, ink and hand-stamps ( hence the word 'stamp ' ), usually made इससे wood or cork, were often used to frank the mail and confirm the payment of postage.
The first adhesive postage stamp, commonly referred to as the Penny Black, was issued in the United Kingdom in 1840.
the invention of the stamp was a part of the attempt to reform and improve the postal system in the United Kingdom of ग्रेट Britain and Ireland, which in the early 19th century थी in disarray and rife with corruption.
There are varying accounts of the inventor or inventors of the स्टैम्प.
Before the introduction of postage stamps, mail in the UK was paid for by the recipient, a system कि was associated with an irresolvable प्रॉब्लम : the costs of delivering mail were not recoverable by the postal service when recipients were unable or unwilling to pay for delivered items, and senders had no incentive to restrict the number, आकार, or weight of items sent, whether or not they would ultimately be paid for.
The postage stamp resolved this समस्या in a simple और elegant manner, with the additional benefit of room for an element of beauty to be introduced.
Later related inventions include postal stationery such as prepaid-postage envelopes, post cards, lettercards, aerogrammes and wrappers, postage meters, and, more recently, specialty boxes and envelopes provided free to the customer by the U.S. postal service for priority or express mailing.
the postage stamp afforded convenience for both the mailer and postal officials, more efficiently recovered costs for the postal service, and ultimately resulted in a better, faster postal system.
With the conveniences stamps offered, their use resulted in greatly increased mailings दौरान the 19th and 20th सदियां.
Postage stamps दौरान this era were the most popular way of paying for mail, but by the end of the 20th century were rapidly होने eclipsed by the use of metered postage and bulk mailing by businesses. )
The same result with respect to communications by private parties occurred over the last decade of the 20th century and the first दशक of the 21st due to declining cost of long distance telephone communications and the विकास and explosive spread of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the Internet ) and bill paying systems था.
As postage stamps with their engraved imagery began to appear on a widespread basis, historians and collectors began to take notice.
The पढ़ाई of postage stamps और their उपयोग is referred to as philately.
Stamp collecting can be both a शौक and a form of historical study and reference, as government-issued postage stamps and their mailing systems have always महरूम involved with the history of nations.
The University of अलबामा at Birmingham ( UAB ) is a public university in Birmingham in the U.S. state of Alabama.
Developing from an extension center established in 1936, the institution became an autonomous institution in 1969 and is today one of three institutions in the University of Alabama प्रणाली.
UAB offers over 140 programs of study in 12 academic विभाजन leading to bachelor 's, master 's, doctoral, and professional degrees in the social and behavioral sciences, the liberal arts, business, education, engineering, and health-related fields such as आयुर्विज्ञान, dentistry, optometry, nursing, and public health.
The school is highly renowned for its medical research and natural sciences programs.
The UAB Health System, one of the largest academic medical centers in the United States, is affiliated with the विश्वविद्यालयों.
UAB हॉस्पिटल sponsors residency programs in various medical specialties, including internal medicine, neurology, surgery, radiology, and anesthesiology.
UAB Hospital is the only ACS verified Level I trauma center in Alabama, as rated by the American College of Surgeons Trauma Program.
UAB is the राज्य 's largest employer, with more than 18,000 faculty and स्टाफ and over 53,000 jobs at the university and in the health प्रणाली.
An estimated 10 percent of the jobs in the Birmingham-Hoover Metropolitan Area and 1 in 33 jobs in the state of Alabama are directly or indirectly related to UAB.
The university 's overall सालाना economic impact was estimated to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010.
In the पतन of 2012, the University of Alabama at Birmingham enrolled 17,999 students from more than 110 countries, सहित 1,605 freshmen.
There are plans to commence with an `` aggressive '' growth in enrollment at UAB.
the current UAB President is Dr. Ray L. Watts.
Tofu, also called bean curd, is a food बना by coagulating soy रस and then pressing the resulting curds into soft white blocks.
It is a component in many East Asian and Southeast Asian व्यंजन.
There are many different varieties of tofu, including भैस tofu and tofu that has been processed in some way.
Tofu रै a subtle flavor and can be used in savory and sweet dishes.
it is often seasoned or marinated to suit the dish.
Tofu originated in ancient China some 2,000 years ago.
Chinese legend ascribes its invention to prince Liu An ( Chinese : 劉安 Liú ān, 179–122 BC ).
Tofu और its production technique were introduced into Korea and then Japan during the Nara काल.
It spread into other parts of East Asia as well.
This spread likely coincided with the spread of Buddhism because it is an important source of protein in the vegetarian diet of ईस्ट Asian Buddhism.
Li Shizhen in the Ming Dynasty described a method of making tofu in Bencao Gangmu.
टोफू has a low calorie count, relatively large amounts of protein, and little fat.
It is high in iron and depending on the coagulant used in manufacturing, may also be high in कैल्सियम and/or magnesium.
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a आम chimpanzee, known for being the one-time pet of American recording artist Michael Jackson, who bought the primate from a Texas research facility in the early 1980s.
The animal was a frequent travel companion to the singer, whose attachment to the animal led to media mockery and, among other factors, to a public perception of Jackson as an eccentric.
During the Bad World Tour, for example, Jackson brought Bubbles with him to Japan, where वे both drank tea with the mayor of Osaka.
Bubbles थी initially kept at the Jackson family 's home in Encino, Los Angeles, but was moved to Neverland Ranch in 1988.
वहीँ, he slept in a crib in Jackson 's बेडरूम, used the singer 's toilet, and ate candy in the Neverland फिल्म theater.
In 2003 the public learned that, like all captive chimpanzees, Bubbles had matured into a large and aggressive adult chimp unsuitable as a companion animal.
He was sent to a California animal trainer, where he थी reported to have attempted suicide.
When the trainer shut down his operation in 2004, Bubbles was moved to the Center for Great Apes, a sanctuary in wauchula, Florida, where he has lived since 2005.
Muse are an अंग्रेज़ी rock band from Teignmouth, Devon, जिससे formed in 1994.
The band consists of school friends Matthew Bellamy ( lead vocals, lead guitar, piano, keyboards, keytar ), Christopher Wolstenholme ( bass, vocals, keyboards, rhythm guitar, harmonica ) and Dominic Howard ( drums, percussion, synthesisers, sampling ).
Since the release of their 2006 album Black Holes and Revelations, keyboardist and percussionist Morgan Nicholls has performed live with the band.
Muse are known for their energetic and extravagant सजीव performances and उनके fusion of many music genres, including space rock, progressive rock, alternative rock, heavy metal, classical music and electronica.
Muse have released six studio albums : Showbiz ( 1999 ), Origin of Symmetry ( 2001 ), Absolution ( 2003 ), Black Holes and Revelations ( 2006 ), The Resistance ( 2009 ) and The 2nd विधि ( 2012 ).
They have also issued three live albums, Hullabaloo Soundtrack ( 2002 ), which is also a compilation of B-sides, Absolution Tour ( 2005 ), and HAARP ( 2008 ), जिससे documents the बैंड 's performances at Wembley Stadium in 2007.
Black Holes and खुलासे earned the band a Mercury Prize nomination and a third place finish in the NME Albums of the Year list for 2006.
Muse have also जीती a collection of music awards throughout their history, including five MTV Europe Music Awards, six Q Awards, eight NME Awards, two Brit Awards —winning `` Best British Live Act '' twice, an एमटीवी Video Music पुरस्कार, चार Kerrang !
Awards और an American Music Award.
They were also मनोनीत for five Grammy Awards, of which they won Best Rock Album, for their पांचवां studio album The Resistance ( 2009 ).
Muse have sold over 15 million albums worldwide.
Bloemfontein (, ; Dutch for `` fountain of flowers '' ) is the capital city of the Free State Province of South Africa ; and, as the judicial capital of the स्वदेश, one of South अफ़्रीकी 's three national capitals – the other two being Cape Town, the legislative capital, and Pretoria, the प्रशासनिक capital.
Bloemfontein is popularly and poetically known as `` the city of roses ``, owing to the abundance of these flowers and the annual rose festival held there.
The नगर 's Sesotho name is Mangaung, meaning `` place of cheetahs `` and it has been शामिल in the Mangaung Local Municipality चूंकि 2000.
Bloemfontein is situated on dry grassland at, at an ऊँचाई of above sea level.
the city is home to 369,568 residents, जबकि the Mangaung Local Municipality has a population of 645,455.

The meaning of life is a philosophical question concerning the significance of life or existence in general.
It can also be expressed in different forms, such as `` Why हैं we here ? ``, `` What is life all परिचय ? ``, and `` What is the purpose of existence ? ''
It रै been the subject of much philosophical, scientific, and theological speculation throughout history.
There have been a large number of proposed answers to these questions from many different cultural and ideological backgrounds.
The meaning of life is in the philosophical and religious conceptions of existence, social ties, consciousness, और happiness, and borders on many other issues, ऐसे as symbolic meaning, ontology, value, purpose, ethics, good and evil, free will, the existence of one or multiple Gods, conceptions of परमेश्वर, the soul, and the afterlife.
Scientific contributions focus primarily on describing related empirical facts about the universe, exploring the context and parameters concerning the 'how ' of जीवन.
Science भी studies and can provide recommendations for the pursuit of well-being और a सम्बन्धित conception of morality.
An alternative, humanistic approach मुद्राएँ the question `` What is the meaning of my life ? ''
The value of the सवाल pertaining to the purpose of life may coincide with the achievement of ultimate reality, or a feeling of oneness, or even a feeling of sacredness.
Family Guy creator Seth macfarlane also provides the voices of पीटर Griffin, stewie Griffin, Brian Griffin, and Glenn Quagmire.
परिवार guy is an American animated sitcom that features five main voice actors, and numerous regular डाल and recurring guest stars.
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis ( जो replaced Lacey Chabert after the पहला season ) and Mike Henry and now, the new actor Beau Osborne.
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton, Adam West, John G. Brennan, Nicole Sullivan and Jennifer Tilly, and repeat guest stars शामिल Phyllis Diller, Charles Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.
Many cast members provide voices for multiple characters.
The voice actors, in portraying the various अक्षर personalities on the show, draw प्रेरणा from celebrities and pop culture.
Family Guy characters have been played by more than one कर्ता, after सदस्यों of the show left the series or had conflicting obligations.
Kunis थी nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` and MacFarlane has also won an एमी Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and an Annie Award for Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production, हालांकि no other cast member has जीती an award for their work on the series.

`` The राजकुमारी and the मटर '' ( ; शाब्दिक translation : `` The Princess on the Pea '' ) is a literary परी tale by Hans Christian Andersen परिचय a young woman whose royal identity is established by a test of her physical sensitivity.
the tale was first published with three others by Andersen in an inexpensive booklet on 8 May 1835 in Copenhagen by C.A. Reitzel.
Andersen had heard the story as a चाइल्ड, and it likely has its source in folk material, possibly originating from स्वीडन as it is unknown in the Danish oral tradition.
Neither `` The Princess and the Pea '' nor Andersen 's other tales of 1835 were खूब received by Danish critics, who disliked their casual, chatty style, and their lack of morals.
In 1959 `` The Princess और the Pea '' was adapted to the musical stage in a production called Once Upon a Mattress starring Carol burnett.
German Americans ( ) हैं citizens of the United States who were either born in Germany or are of German ancestry.
They comprise about 50 million लोगों, making them the largest ancestry group ahead of Irish Americans, African Americans और English Americans.
They comprise about 1/3 of the German diaspora all over the world.
None of the German states had New World colonies.
Not until the 1670s did the first significant groups of German immigrants arrive in the British colonies, settling primarily in New York and Pennsylvania.
Immigration continued in very large numbers during the 19th century, with some eight million arrivals from Germany.
They were pulled by the attractions of land and धार्मिक freedom, and pushed out of Europe by shortages of land and religious or political oppression.
Many arrived seeking religious or political freedom, others for economic opportunities greater than those in Europe, and others simply for the chance to start fresh in the New World.
The arrivals before 1850 were mostly farmers who sought out the most productive land, where their intensive farming techniques would pay off.
After 1840, many came to शहरों, जहाँ `` Germania '' —German-speaking districts—soon emerged.
German Americans established the पहला kindergartens in the United राज्य, introduced the Christmas tree tradition, and originated popular American foods such as hot dogs and hamburgers.
German American celebrations are held throughout the country, one of the most well-known being the German-American Steuben Parade in New York City, held प्रत्येक third Saturday in सितंबर.
वहीँ हैं also major annual events in Chicago, Cincinnati, Milwaukee, Pittsburgh, St. Louis and other cities.
Like अनेक अन्य immigrants that आए to the United States, an overwhelming number of लोगों of German or partial German descent have essentially become Americanized.
The Preamble to the United राज्य Constitution is a brief introductory statement of the Constitution 's आधारभूत purposes and guiding principles.
It राज्य in general शर्तें, and न्यायालयों have referred to it as reliable evidence of, the Founding fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's अर्थ and what they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States.
As the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates from the लोगों of the United States and it sets into motion a question as it pertains to that विशाल population concerning the individual rights and equality among all people ; इस can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism और social democracy.
The history of the Internet began with the development of electronic computers in the 1950s.
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent over the ARPANet from computer विज्ञान प्राध्यापक Leonard kleinrock 's laboratory at University of California, Los एंजिल्स ( UCLA ), after the second piece of संजाल equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ).
पैकेट switched networks such as ARPANET, Mark i at npl in the UK, CYCLADES, मेरिट Network, Tymnet, and Telenet, were developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols.
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for internetworking, in which multiple separate networks could be joined together into a network of networks.
In 1982, the Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) was standardized, और नतीजतन, the concept of a world-wide network of interconnected TCP/IP networks, called the Internet, was introduced.
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National विज्ञान Foundation ( NSF ) developed the Computer Science Network ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations.
Commercial Internet service providers ( ISPs ) began to emerge in the late 1980s and early 1990s.
The ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990.
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET थी decommissioned, removing the last restrictions on the use of the Internet to carry commercial traffic.
Since the mid-1990s, the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce, including the rise of near-instant communication by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक mail, instant messaging, Voice over Internet Protocol ( VoIP ) `` phone calls '', two-way इंटरैक्टिव video calls, और the World Wide Web साथ its discussion forums, blogs, social networking, and online shopping sites.
The शोध and education community continues to develop and use advanced networks such as NSF 's very high speed Backbone Network Service ( vBNS ), Internet2, and National LambdaRail.
Increasing amounts of आंकड़ा are transmitted at higher and higher speeds over fiber optic networks operating at 1-Gbit/s, 10-Gbit/s, or more.
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical terms : it only communicated 1 % of the सूचना flowing through two-way telecommunications networks in the साल 1993, already 51 % by 2000, and more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
आज the Internet continues to grow, driven by ever greater amounts of online information, commerce, entertainment, and social networking.
Southwest Airlines co. ( ) is a major u.S. airline and the संसार 's largest low-cost carrier, headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
It was established in 1967 and adopted its current name in 1971.
The airline has अधिक than 46,000 employees and operates more than 3,400 flights per day.
As of June 5, 2011, it carries the most domestic passengers of any U.S. airline.
As of April 2013, Southwest Airlines has scheduled service to 84 destinations in 41 states and Puerto Rico.
दक्षिणपश्चिम Airlines has solely संचालित Boeing 737s, except for a few years in the 1970s and 1980s, जब it operated Boeing 727s.
As of August 2012, दक्षिणपश्चिम is the largest operator of the 737 worldwide with over 550 in service, each operating an average of six फ़्लाइट per day.
In May 2011, the airline acquired AirTran Airways, with integration of the वाहक expected to be complete by 2014.
On कूच 1, 2012, the company was issued a single operating certificate, technically becoming one airline.
Rolling Rock is a 4.6 % abv pale lager launched in 1939 by the Latrobe brewing Company.
Although founded as a local beer in Western Pennsylvania, it was marketed aggressively and eventually became a national product.
The brand was sold to Anheuser-Busch of St. Louis, मिसौरी, in mid 2006, which transferred brewing परिचालन to New Jersey.
Benedict XVI (,, ; born Joseph Aloisius Ratzinger on 16 April 1927 ) is Pope emeritus of the Catholic Church.
He served as Pope from 2005 to 2013.
In that position, he was both the leader of the Catholic Church और Sovereign of the Vatican City State.
Benedict was elected on 19 April 2005 in a papal conclave, celebrated his Papal Inauguration द्रव्यमान on 24 April 2005, and took possession of his cathedral, the Archbasilica of St. John Lateran, on 7 May 2005.
Ordained as a priest in 1951 in his native Bavaria, Ratzinger established खुद as a highly regarded university theologian by the late 1950s and was appointed a full professor in 1958.
After a long career as an academic, serving as a professor of theology at several German universities—the last being the University of Regensburg, where he served as Vice अध्यक्ष of the university in 1976 and 1977—he थी नियुक्त Archbishop of Munich and freising and कार्डिनल by Pope Paul VI in 1977, an unusual promotion for someone with little लुभावने experience.
In 1981, he settled in Rome when he became Prefect of the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith, one of the most important dicasteries of the Roman Curia.
From 2002 जबतक his election as pope, he was also Dean of the College of Cardinals, and as such, the primus inter pares among the cardinals.
Prior to becoming pope, he was `` a major figure on the वेटिकन stage for a quarter of a century '' as `` one of the most respected, influential और controversial members of the College of Cardinals '' ; he had an influence `` second to none when it came to setting church priorities and directions '' as one of Pope John Paul II 's closest confidants.
He was originally a liberal theologian, but adopted conservative views after 1968.
His prolific writings defend traditional Catholic doctrine and values.
During his papacy, Benedict XVI advocated a return to fundamental Christian values to counter the increased secularisation of many Western countries.
he views relativism 's denial of objective truth, and the denial of moral truths in particular, as the central problem of the 21st century.
He taught the महत्व of both the Catholic Church and an understanding of God 's redemptive प्रेम.
Pope Benedict also revived a number of traditions including elevating the Tridentine Mass to a more prominent स्थिति.
He renewed the relationship between the Catholic Church and art, viewing the use of सौंदर्य as a path to the sacred, प्रचारित the use of Latin, और reintroduced traditional papal garments, लिये which reason he was called `` the pope of aesthetics ''.
He has been described as `` the main intellectual force in the Church '' since the mid-1980s.
अनेक of Pope Benedict 's students from his academic career are also prominent churchmen today and confidantes of him, notably क्रिस्टोफ Schönborn.
On 11 February 2013, Pope Benedict announced his इस्तीफा in a speech in Latin before the cardinals, citing a `` lack of strength of mind and body '' due to his advanced age.
His resignation became effective on 28 February 2013.
He is the first pope to resign since Pope Gregory XII in 1415, और the first to do so on his own initiative since Pope Celestine V in 1294.
As पोप emeritus, Benedict retains the style of His Holiness, and the title of Pope, and will continue to dress in the papal रंग of white.
He was succeeded by Pope Francis on 13 March 2013, and he moved into the newly renovated Mater Ecclesiae monastery for his retirement on 2 May 2013..

stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3D imaging ) is a technique लिये बनाना or enhancing the illusion of depth in an image by means of stereopsis for binocular vision.
The word stereoscopy derives from the यूनानी `` στερεός '' ( stereos ), `` कड़, solid '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ), `` to dekh '', `` to see ''.
Most stereoscopic विधि present two offset images separately to the left and right eye of the viewer.
These two-dimensional images are तब combined in the brain to दे the perception of 3D depth.
This technique is distinguished from 3D displays that display an image in three full dimensions, allowing the observer to increase information about the 3-dimensional objects being displayed by सिर and eye movements.
John Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( O.S. October 19, 1735 ) – July 4, 1826 ) was the second president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ), having earlier served as the first vice president of the United States.
an American Founding Father, he was a statesman, diplomat, and a leading advocate of अमरीकी independence from Great Britain.
Well educated, he was an Enlightenment political theorist जो promoted republicanism and लिखा prolifically about his often seminal ideas, both in published works and in letters to his wife and कुंजी adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers.
Adams came to prominence in the जल्दी stages of the American Revolution.
A lawyer and public figure in Boston, as a delegate from Massachusetts to the Continental Congress, he played a leading role in persuading Congress to घोषित independence.
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of Independence in 1776, and was its primary advocate in the Congress.
Later, as a diplomat in Europe, he helped negotiate the eventual peace treaty with ग्रेट Britain, and was responsible for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers.
A political theorist और historian, Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780, which together with his earlier Thoughts on Government, influenced American political thought.
One of his greatest roles was as a न्यायधीश of character : in 1775, he nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief, and 25 years later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States.
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured him two terms as George Washington 's vice president और his own election in 1796 as the second president.
During his one पद, he encountered ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian republicans, as well as the dominant faction in his own Federalist Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton.
Adams signed the controversial Alien and राजद्रोह Acts, and built up the army and navy especially in the face of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France, 1798–1800.
The प्रमुख accomplishment of उसके presidency was his peaceful resolution of the conflict in the face of Hamilton 's opposition.
In 1800, Adams was defeated for re-election by Thomas Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts.
He later resumed his friendship with Jefferson.
He and his wife, Abigail Adams, founded an accomplished family line of politicians, राजनयिकों, और historians now referred to as the एडम्स political family.
Adams was the father of John क्विंसी Adams, the छठे President of the United States.
His achievements have received greater recognition in modern times, though his contributions were not initially as celebrated as those of अन्य Founders.
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside in the building कि eventually became known as the White House.
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of United States करेंसी.
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), Alexander Hamilton, is currently featured on the obverse of the bill, while the U.S. Treasury Building is प्रदर्शित on the रिवर्स.
( Hamilton is one of two non-presidents featured on currently issued U.S. bills.
The other is Benjamin Franklin, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is one of only four लोगों featured on U.S. पेपर currency ( 1861 to the present ) जो was not born in the continental United States, as he was from the West Indies.
The others are : Albert Gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade, Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 Treasury Note ) ; and Robert मॉरिस, England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 Legal Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ).
In addition, Kamehameha i, appears on the 2008 Hawaii राज्य quarter. )
All $ 10 bills issued today are Federal Reserve Notes.
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a $ 10 bill in परिसंचरण is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear.
Approximately 6 % of all US banknotes printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten dollar bills are वितरित by Federal Reserve Banks in yellow straps.
The source of the face on the $ 10 विधेयक is John trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of Hamilton that belongs to the portrait संग्रहण of New York City Hall.
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in परिसंचरण in which the portrait faces to the left ( the $ 100,000 bill featured a portrait of Woodrow Wilson facing to the left, but was प्रयुक्त तभी for intra-government transactions ).
A सवार on a Yamaha Waverunner XL performing a high-speed turn.
A jetboat is a boat propelled by a jet of water ejected from the back of the craft.
Unlike a powerboat or motorboat that uses a propeller in the water below or पीछे the boat, a jetboat draws the water इससे under the boat into a pump inside the boat, then expels it through a nozzle at the stern.
Jetboats were originally designed by Sir William हैमिल्टन ( जो developed a waterjet in 1954 ) for operation in the fast-flowing and उथले rivers of New Zealand, specifically to overcome the problem of propellers striking rocks in such waters.
Previous attempts at waterjet propulsion had very short lifetimes, generally due to the inefficient design of the units and the fact that they offered few advantages over conventional propellers.
Unlike these previous waterjet developments, such as Campini 's और the Hanley Hydrojet, Hamilton had a specific need for a propulsion system to operate in very-shallow water, and the waterjet proved to be the आदर्श solution.
From this, the popularity of the jet unit and jetboat increased rapidly.
Through further developments, it was found the waterjet offered several other advantages over propellers for a wide range of vessel types, and as such, waterjets are used widely today for many high-speed vessels, including यात्री ferries, rescue craft, patrol नौकाएँ and offshore supply vessels.
jetboats हैं highly maneuverable, and many can, from full speed, be reversed and brought to a stop within little more than their अपना length, in a maneuver known as a `` crash stop ''.
The खूब known Hamilton turn or `` jet spin '' is a high-speed maneuvre where the boat 's engine throttle is काटें, the परिचालन is turned sharply और the throttle opened again, causing the boat to spin जल्दी around with a large spray of water.
There is no अभियान्त्रिकी limit to the size of jetboats, though the validity of their use depends a lot on the type of application.
Classic prop-drives are generally more efficient and economical at low speeds, up to about, but as boat speed increases beyond this, the extra hull resistance generated by struts, rudders, shafts ( etc. ) means waterjets हैं more efficient in the 20-50 knot range ( up to ).
Also, in situations with very large propellers turning at slow speeds ( such as tug boats ), the equivalent size waterjet would be too big to be practical.
For these reasons, the विशाल बहुमत of waterjet units are installed in high-speed vessels and in particular situations where shallow draught, maneuverability, and load flexibility are main concerns.
The biggest jet-driven vessels are found in military use or the high-speed passenger/car ferry industry.
South Africa 's s ( approximately long ) are the biggest jet-propelled vessels so far.
Even these German-built vessels are capable of performing `` crash stops ''.
uveitis is broadly defined as सूजन of the uvea.
The uvea consists of the middle, pigmented, vascular structures of the eye and includes the iris, ciliary body, and choroid.
Uveitis requires an urgent referral and thorough examination by an ophthalmologist or optometrist along with urgent treatment to control the सूजन.

Murphy is a fictional character on the comedy-drama television series अनुगामी.
He is played by केविन Connolly.
The Shining is a 1980 psychological हॉरर film produced and directed by Stanley Kubrick, co-written with novelist Diane जॉनसन, and starring Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Scatman Crothers, and Danny Lloyd.
The film is based on the Stephen King novel the Shining.
A writer, Jack Torrance, takes a job as an off-season caretaker at an isolated hotel.
His young son possesses psychic abilities and is समर्थ to see things from the past and future, such as the ghosts who inhabit the hotel.
Soon after settling in, the परिवार is trapped in the होटल by a snowstorm, and Jack gradually becomes influenced by a supernatural presence ; he descends into madness and attempts to murder his wife and son.
Unlike previous kubrick films, which developed an audience gradually by building on word-of-mouth, The Shining थी released as a mass-market film, opening at पहला in just two cities on Memorial Day, then nationwide a month later.
Although initial जवाब to the film was mixed, later critical मूल्यांकन was more favorable and it is now viewed as a classic of the horror genre.
Film director Martin स्कोर्सेसे, writing in The Daily Beast, ranked it as one of the 11 scariest horror movies of all time.
Film critics, film students, and Kubrick 's producer, Jan Harlan, have remarked on the enormous influence the film has had on popular culture.
The initial European release of The Shining was 25 minutes shorter than the American संस्करण, achieved by removing सबसे of the scenes taking place outside the environs of the hotel.
आँगन Cola Bottle
Patio Diet Cola was a brand of आहार soda introduced by Pepsi in 1963.
it was created in response to आहार Rite Cola, जिससे थी the first diet cola on the market.
Fitness promoter Debbie Drake थी Patio Diet Cola 's प्रवक्ता.
In 1964, Patio released orange, grape, and root beer flavors.
This flavor line was not meant to compete with brands like Orange Crush, but rather भरण out the line.
आँगन sodas were available in the cold-bottle market : grocery and mom-and-pop stores.
विज्ञापन for Patio was comparatively scarce ; at the time, bottlers were regionally franchised, and सम्बन्धित advertising was necessarily local.
In 1964, Patio diet cola became Diet Pepsi.
The newly branded diet soda was advertised alongside Pepsi with the tagline `` Pepsi either way '', जिससे replaced the slogan `` Dances with flavor ''.
The short life span of Patio Diet कोला makes it a great addition लिये bottle collectors.
Most of the remaining Patio line of जायका were phased out by the early 1970s, while a few survived until the मिड 70s
अवसंरचना is basic physical and organizational structures needed for the operation of a society or enterprise, or the services and facilities necessary लिये an economy to फलन.
It can be generally defined as the set of interconnected structural तत्व that provide framework supporting an entire structure of विकास.
It is an महत्वपूर्ण term for judging a country or region 's development.
The term typically refers to the technical structures that support a society, such as सड़कें, bridges, water supply, sewers, electrical ग्रिड, दूरसंचार, and so forth, and can be defined as `` the physical components of interrelated systems providing commodities and services essential to enable, sustain, or enhance societal living conditions. ''
Viewed functionally, infrastructure facilitates the production of goods and services, and भी the distribution of finished products to markets, as well as basic social services such as schools and hospitals ; for example, roads enable the transport of कच्चा materials to a factory.
In military parlance, the term refers to the buildings and permanent संस्थापना necessary for the support, redeployment, and operation of military forces.
to make it simple, infrastructure is anything that is needed everyday, an everyday item.
A आलेखीय प्रतिनिधित्व of the ideal human karyotype
Mitochondrial DNA.
Human genetic variation is the genetic differences both within and among populations.
There may be multiple variants of कोई given gene in the human population ( genes ), leading to polymorphism.
Many genes are not polymorphic, meaning कि only a single allele is उपस्थित in the population : the gene is then said to be fixed.
No two humans are genetically identical.
Even monozygotic twins, who develop from one zygote, have infrequent genetic differences due to mutations occurring during विकास and gene copy number विभिन्नता.
Differences between individuals, even closely related individuals, are the key to techniques such as genetic fingerprinting.
Alleles occur at different frequencies in different human populations, with populations that are more geographically and ancestrally remote tending to differ more.
Causes of मतभेद between individuals include the exchange of genes during meiosis and various mutational events.
वहीँ are at least two reasons why genetic variation exists between populations.
Natural selection may confer an adaptive advantage to individuals in a specific environment if an allele provides a प्रतिस्पर्धी लाभ.
Alleles under selection are likely to occur only in those geographic regions where they confer an advantage.
The second main cause of genetic variation is due to the high degree of neutrality of most mutations.
Most mutations do not appear to have any selective effect one way or the other on the organism.
The main cause is genetic drift, this is the effect of यादृच्छिक changes in the gene pool.
In humans, founder effect and past small population size ( increasing the likelihood of genetic drift ) may have had an important influence in neutral differences between populations.
The theory that humans recently migrated out of Africa supports this.
The study of human genetic variation रै both evolutionary significance और medical applications.
It can help scientists understand ancient human population migrations as well as how different human groups are biologically related to one another.
For medicine, study of human genetic विभिन्नता may be important because some disease-causing alleles occur अधिक often in people from specific geographic regions.
New findings show that each human has on average 60 new mutations compared to their parents.
Apart from mutations, many genes that may have aided humans in ancient times plague humans today.
For example, it is suspected कि genes कि allow humans to more efficiently प्रक्रम food are those that make people susceptible to मोटापा and diabetes आज.
Tea Party protesters on the West Lawn of the U.S. Capitol and the National Mall at the Taxpayer कूच on वॉशिंगटन on September 12, 2009.
The Tea Party movement is an American political गति कि advocates strict adherence to the United States Constitution, reducing U.S. government spending and taxes, and reduction of the U.S. national debt and federal बजट deficit.
The movement रै been called partly conservative, partly libertarian, and partly populist.
The movement has sponsored विरोध और supported political candidates since 2009.
The name of the गति is derived इससे the Boston Tea Party of 1773, an iconic event in American history.
Anti-tax protesters in the United States have often referred to the original Boston Tea पार्टी for inspiration.
सन्दर्भ to the Boston Tea Party were part of Tax दिन protests held throughout the 1990s and पहले.
By 2001, a custom had developed among some रूढ़िवादी activists of mailing tea बैग to विधायक and other officials as a symbolic act.
The currencies of प्यूर्टो Rico closely follow the historic development of Puerto Rico.
As a colony of स्पेन and the United States, Puerto Rico was granted the use of both foreign and provincial currencies.
Following the Spanish colonization in 1502, Puerto रीको became an महत्वपूर्ण port, with its own supply of gold.
However, as the mineral reserves भागा empty within the century, the archipelago 's economy suffered.
The Spanish Crown जारी the Situado Mexicano, which meant that a semi-regular shipment of gold from the Viceroyalty of New Spain would be sent to the island, as a way to provide economic support.
Between 1636 and 1637, Philip IV of Spain imposed a tax which had to be paid using a revenue stamp.
Inspired by this, Puerto Rico began producing banknotes in 1766, बनने the first colony to print 8- real banknotes in the Spanish Empire and जिससे in the Spanish government 's स्वीकृति of subsequent issues.
The situado was discontinued दौरान the 19th century, creating an आर्थिक crisis, as a result of Mexico gaining its independence from Spain.
Salvador Meléndez Bruna, the colonial राज्यपाल in office, ordered the issue of provincial banknotes, creating the Puerto Rican peso.
However, printing of these banknotes ceased after 1815.
During the following decades, foreign coins became the widespread currency.
in the 1860s and 1870s, banknotes reemerged.
On February 1, 1890, the banco Español de प्यूर्टो Rico was inaugurated and began issuing banknotes.
The bank designed four series and placed three in circulation under Spanish rule.
In 1895, a Royal Decree ordered the production of provincial peso coins.
On August 13, 1898, the Spanish-American War ended with Spain ceding Puerto Rico to the United States.
The Banco Español de Puerto Rico थी renamed Bank of Porto Rico and issued bills equivalent to the संयुक्त States dollar, बनाना the Puerto Rican dollar.
In 1902, the First National Bank of Porto Rico issued banknotes in a parallel manner.
Two more series were issued until 1913.
After Puerto Rico 's economy and monetary system was fully integrated into the United States ' economic and monetary प्रणाली, the प्यूर्टो Rican dollars were redeemed for those issued by the United States राजकोष.
The peso and dollar have been followed by other contemporary issues, including commemorative banknotes, private currency, and a quarter coin designed with Fort San Felipe डेल Morro in the face.
Pepsi ( stylized in लोअरकेस as pepsi, formerly stylized in uppercase as PEPSI ) is a carbonated soft drink that is produced and manufactured by पेप्सिको.
Created and developed in 1893 and introduced as Brad 's Drink, it was renamed as Pepsi-Cola on August 28, 1898, then to Pepsi in 1961.
The Book of Ezekiel is the third of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible, following the books of Isaiah and Jeremiah and preceding the Book of the Twelve.
( The order is somewhat different in the Christian Old Testament ).
It गर्भाशयी its name from, and records the visions of, the 6th century BC priest and prophet Ezekiel.
According to the book, the prophet, exiled in Babylon, अनुभवी a series of seven visions during the 22 years from 593 to 571 BC, a period which spans the final destruction of जेरूसलम in 586.
The visions, and the book, हैं संरचित around three themes : ( 1 ) judgment on Israel ( chapters 1-24 ) ; ( 2 ) निर्णय on the nations ( chapters 25-32 ) ; and future blessings for Israel ( chapters 33-48 ).
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a major United States port and the largest city and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana.
the population of the city was 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
The New Orleans metropolitan क्षेत्रफल ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan सांख्यिकीय Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States.
The New orleans–metairie–bogalusa Combined सांख्यिकीय Area, a larger trading area, had a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
The city is named after Orléans, a city located on the Loire River in Centre, France, and is well known for its distinct French Creole architecture, as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage.
New Orleans is also famous for its cuisine, music ( particularly as the birthplace of जैज़ ), and its annual celebrations and त्यौहार, most notably Mardi Gras.
The city is often referred to as the `` most unique '' in America.
New Orleans is located in southeastern Louisiana, straddling the Mississippi River.
The city and Orleans मोहल्ला ( ) are.
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to the north, St. Bernard to the east, Plaquemines to the south and Jefferson to the south and west.
Lake Pontchartrain, part of जिससे is included in the city limits, झूठ to the north and झील Borgne lies to the ईस्ट.
The National Birth Control लीग was a birth कंट्रोल organization in the संयुक्त States.
It was founded in March 1915 by मरियम Dennett, Clara Gruening stillman and Jessie Ashley.
Its main purpose was to overturn the laws which banned contraceptives from the u.S. mails.
Campaigns were mounted in New York, but in 1919 the League was disbanded and reformed into the Voluntary parenthood League.
Cancer, known medically as a malignant neoplasm, is a broad group of various diseases, all involving unregulated cell growth.
in cancer, cells divide और grow uncontrollably, forming malignant tumors, and invade nearby parts of the body.
The cancer may also spread to more distant parts of the देह through the lymphatic system or bloodstream.
Not all tumors are cancerous.
Benign tumors do not grow uncontrollably, do not invade neighboring tissues, and do not spread throughout the body.
There are over 200 different known cancers that afflict humans.
determining what causes cancer is complex.
Many things हैं ज्ञात to increase the risk of cancer, सहित tobacco use, certain infections, radiation, lack of शारीरिक activity, मोटापा, और environmental pollutants.
These can directly damage genes or combine with existing genetic faults within cells to cause the disease.
Approximately five to ten percent of cancers are entirely hereditary.
Cancer can be detected in a number of ways, including the presence of निश्चित signs and symptoms, screening tests, or medical imaging.
Once a possible cancer is detected it is diagnosed by microscopic examination of a tissue sample.
Cancer is usually treated with chemotherapy, radiation therapy and surgery.
The chances of surviving the disease vary greatly by the प्रकार and location of the cancer and the extent of disease at the start of treatment.
While cancer can affect people of all ages, and a few types of cancer are more common in children, the risk of developing cancer generally increases with age.
In 2007, cancer caused about 13 % of all human deaths worldwide ( 7.9 million ).
दरों are rising as more people सजीव to an old आयु and as mass lifestyle changes occur in the developing world.

Skiing is a recreational activity and competitive sport in which the participant attaches long runners or skis to boots or shoes on the feet and uses them to सफर on top of snow.
Aside from recreation and competition, skiing has been used for military purposes और even travelling in areas that experience heavy snowfall.
Many types of competitive स्कीइंग events are recognized by the International Olympic Committee, and the International Ski Federation.
John Maynard Keynes, 1st Baron Keynes, CB, FBA ( ; 5 June 1883 – 21 April 1946 ) was a British economist जिनकी ideas have fundamentally affected the theory and practice of modern macroeconomics, and informed the economic नीतियों of governments.
He built on and greatly परिष्कृत earlier work on the causes of business cycles, and is widely considered to be एक of the founders of modern macroeconomics and the most influential economist of the 20th century.
His ideas are the basis for the school of thought known as Keynesian economics, as well as its various offshoots.
In many ways, subsequent developments in 20th century अर्थशास्त्र can be viewed as either building on keynes ' ideas or reacting against them.
In the 1930s, Keynes spearheaded a revolution in economic thinking, overturning the older ideas of neoclassical economics that held that free markets होता, in the short to medium term, automatically provide full employment, as long as मजदूर were flexible in their wage demands.
keynes instead argued that aggregate माँग determined the overall level of economic activity, and that inadequate aggregate demand could lead to prolonged periods of ऊँची unemployment.
He advocated the use of fiscal and monetary measures to mitigate the adverse effects of economic recessions और depressions.
Following the outbreak of the Second World War, Keynes 's ideas concerning economic policy were adopted by leading Western economies.
In 1942, Keynes was awarded a hereditary peerage as Baron Keynes of Tilton in the County of Sussex.
Keynes died in 1946, but during the 1950s and 1960s the success of Keynesian economics resulted in लगभग all capitalist governments adopting its policy recommendations.
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s, partly as a result of problems that began to afflict the Anglo-American economies from the start of the decade, and partly because of critiques from Milton Friedman and other economists who were pessimistic परिचय the ability of governments to regulate the business cycle with fiscal नीति.
However, the advent of the global वित्तीय crisis in 2007 caused a resurgence in Keynesian thought.
Keynesian economics provided the सैद्धांतिक underpinning लिये आर्थिक policies undertaken in response to the crisis by Presidents George W. Bush and बराक Obama of the संयुक्त States, Prime Minister गॉर्डन Brown of the United Kingdom, and other heads of governments.
In 1999, Time magazine included Keynes in their list of the 100 सबसे important and influential people of the 20th सदी, commenting that : `` His radical idea that governments should spend money they do n't have may have saved capitalism. ''
In addition to being an economist, keynes was also a civil servant, a director of the British Eugenics Society, a director of the बैंको of इंग्लैण्ड, a patron of the arts and an art collector, a part of the Bloomsbury Group of intellectuals, an advisor to several charitable trusts, a writer, a philosopher, a private investor, and a farmer.
This 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by Jekuthiel sofer emulated the 1675 टेन Commandments at the Amsterdam esnoga synagogue.
The Ten Commandments, also known as the Decalogue, are a set of biblical laws relating to ethics and worship, which play a fundamental role in Judaism, islam and christianity.
They include निर्देश to worship only God, to keep the sabbath holy and prohibitions against idolatry, blasphemy, murder, चोरी, deception and adultery.
Different groups follow slightly different परंपराओं for interpreting and numbering उन्हें.
the Ten Commandments appear twice in the Hebrew बाइबल, in the books of Exodus and Deuteronomy.
According to the story in Exodus, God inscribed them on two stone tablets, which he gave to Moses on माउंट Sinai.
Modern scholarship has found likely influences in Hittite and Mesopotamian laws और treaties, but is divided over exactly when the Ten Commandments were written and who wrote them.
The discography of the English alternative rock band The Smiths consists of four studio albums, one extended play ( EP ), one live album, ten संकलन albums, twenty singles, एक video एल्बम and fourteen music videos on the Rough व्यापार, Sire and WEA record labels.
The band was formed in 1982 in Manchester by vocalist Morrissey, guitarist Johnny Marr, bass player Andy Rourke और drummer Mike Joyce.
Despite being championed by BBC Radio 1 disc jockey John Peel, the band 's debut single, `` हाथ in Glove `` ( May 1983 ), failed to chart.
Its follow-up, `` This Charming Man `` ( October 1983 ), met with critical acclaim and पहुँचे number twenty-five on the uk Singles Chart.
The Smiths ' cult status was followed by mainstream success in 1984, as they reached number twelve in the UK with the `` कया Difference Does It Make ? `` single and reached number two on the UK एल्बम Chart with their debut album, The Smiths ( 1984 ).
Their next three singles all reached the top twenty of the charts in the UK, helping to consolidate their पिछला chart success.
The next studio album, Meat Is Murder ( 1985 ), reached the top of the British charts ; however, the only single to be released from the album, `` कि Joke Is n't मजेदार Anymore `` ( 1985 ), failed to break the UK Top 40.
Returning to form, The Smiths ' next six singles all reached the higher than number thirty in the UK and their third album, The Queen Is Dead ( 1986 ), reached क्रमांक two in the UK.
Despite the band 's chart success, Marr left the group in August 1987 due to a strained संबंध with Morrissey.
Failing to find a replacement, The Smiths disbanded by the time their final studio album, Strangeways, Here We Come, was released in September that year.
Strangeways, Here We Come reached क्रमांक two in the UK and became the band 's highest-charting release in the United राज्य when it reached number fifty-five on the Billboard 200.
In early 1992, WEA acquired the entire back catalogue of The Smiths and produced two compilations – बेहतरीन... I and... Best II – the first of which reached the top of the UK Albums Chart.
WEA released two further singles compilations in 1995 और 2001, with a further compilation, The Sound of The Smiths, released in November 2008.
Gone with the हवा is a अनोखा written by Margaret मिशेल, first published in 1936.
It is often placed in the literary sub-genre of the historical romance novel.
However, it has been argued the novel is a `` near miss '' and does not contain all of the elements of the romance विधा, making it simply a historical novel.
the story is set in Clayton County, Georgia, and Atlanta during the American Civil War and Reconstruction.
It depicts the experiences of Scarlett O'Hara, the spoiled बेटी of a well-to-do plantation मालिक, who must use every means at her disposal to come out of the poverty she finds herself in after Sherman 's `` March to the Sea ''.
Margaret Mitchell began लिखने Gone with the Wind in 1926 to pass the time while recovering इससे an auto-crash injury that refused to heal.
In April 1935, Harold Latham of macmillan, an editor who was looking for new fiction, read what she था written and saw that it could be a best-seller.
After Latham agreed to publish the book, Mitchell worked for another six months checking the historical references, and rewrote the opening chapter अनेक times.
मिशेल and her husband John Marsh, a copy editor by trade, edited the final version of the novel.
Mitchell wrote the book 's final moments first, and then wrote the events that led up to it.
as to what became of उसके lovers, Rhett और Scarlett, बाद the novel ended, Mitchell did not know, and said, `` For all I know, रहेट may have found someone else who was less difficult. ''
Mitchell received the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction for the book in 1937.
The book was adapted into a 1939 American film.
गए with the Wind is the only novel by Mitchell published during her lifetime.
Endodontics ( from the Greek endo `` inside '' ; and odons `` tooth '' ) is one of the dental specialties recognized by the अमरीकी Dental Association, Royal College of Dentists of Canada, and Royal Australasian College of Dental Surgeons, and deals with the tooth pulp and the tissues surrounding the root of a tooth.
Endodontists perform a variety of procedures सहित endodontic चिकित्सा ( commonly known as `` root canal therapy '' ), endodontic retreatment, सर्जरी, treating cracked teeth, and treating dental trauma.
Root canal therapy is one of the most common प्रक्रियाओं.
If the pulp ( containing nerves, arterioles, venules, lymphatic tissue, और fibrous tissue ) becomes diseased or injured, endodontic treatment is required to save the tooth.
Serial संलग्न SCSI ( SAS ) is a point-to-point serial protocol कि moves data to and from computer storage devices such as hard drives and टेप drives.
SAS replaces the older Parallel SCSI ( pronounced `` scuzzy '' ) bus technology that first appeared in the mid-1980s.
SAS, like इसके predecessor, uses the standard SCSI command set.
SAS offers पिछड़ा compatibility with second-generation SATA drives.
SATA 3 Gbit/s drives may be connected to sas backplanes, but SAS drives can not connect to SATA backplanes.
The T10 technical कमेटी of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Committee for सूचना Technology मानकों ( INCITS ) develops and maintains the SAS प्रोटोकॉल ; the SCSI Trade Association ( SCSITA ) promotes the technology.

Status as a natural-born citizen of the United States is one of the पात्रता requirements established in the United States संविधान for election to the office of President or Vice President.
This requirement was intended to protect the nation from foreign influence.
The Constitution does not define the phrase natural-born citizen, and various opinions have been offered over time regarding its precise meaning.
a 2011 Congressional Research सेवा report stated
The natural-born-citizen clause has been mentioned in passing in several निर्णय of the United States Supreme Court and lower courts dealing साथ the question of eligibility for citizenship by birth, but the Supreme Court has never directly addressed the question of a specific presidential or vice-presidential candidate 's eligibility as a natural-born citizen.
Kurtis Eugene `` Kurt '' Warner ( born June 22, 1971 ) is a former American football player.
He played quarterback for तीन National Football League ( NFL ) teams : the St. Louis Rams, the New York Giants, and the Arizona कार्डिनल्स.
He was originally signed by the Green Bay Packers as an undrafted free agent in 1994 after playing college football at Northern Iowa.
Warner would go on to be considered the best undrafted player of all time, following a 12-year career regarded as one of the greatest stories in NFL history.
warner first attained स्टारडम while playing for the St. Louis Rams इससे 1998 to 2003, जहाँ he won two NFL MVP awards in 1999 and 2001 as खूब as the Super Bowl MVP award in Super Bowl XXXIV.
He led the 2008 Arizona कार्डिनल्स to Super Bowl XLIII ( the franchise 's first Super Bowl berth ), और owns the three उच्चतम single-game passing yardage totals in Super Bowl history.
Warner फिलहाल holds the seventh-highest career passer rating of all-time ( 93.7 ), and the third-highest career completion percentage in NFL history with 65.5 %.
In 13 career playoff games, Warner ranks first all-time in completion percentage ( 66.5 % ), yards per attempt ( 8.55 ), and second in passer rating ( 102.8 ).
He also holds the highest completion प्रतिशत for a single खेल during the regular season, at 92.3 percent ( 24/26 ), on September 20, 2009, against the Jacksonville Jaguars.
He announced his retirement on January 29, 2010. < ref name='CNN 2010-01-29 ' >
Janet Kay Ruthven Hagan ( ; born May 26, 1953 ) is the जूनियर United States Senator इससे उत्तर Carolina, in office since January 2009.
previously she served in the North Carolina Senate from 1999 to 2009.
She is a सदस्य of the Democratic Party and is viewed as a moderate member of her party.
When Hagan defeated Republican incumbent Elizabeth dole in the 2008 United States Senate election, she became the पहला woman to defeat an incumbent woman in a Senate election.
The Heisman मेमोरियल Trophy Award ( usually ज्ञात colloquially as the Heisman Trophy or the Heisman ), is awarded annually to the player deemed the most outstanding player in collegiate football.
It was created in 1935 as the Downtown Athletic Club ट्रॉफी and renamed in 1936 following the death of the Club 's athletic director, John Heisman ( former Brown University and University of Pennsylvania player ; head football कोच at Oberlin College, Auburn University, Clemson University, Rice University, and the University of Pennsylvania ; and football, basketball, and baseball head coach और athletic director at Georgia Tech ).
The award is presented by the Heisman Trophy Trust in early December before the postseason bowl games.
It is the oldest of several overall awards in college football, including the Maxwell Award, Walter Camp Award, and the AP Player of the Year.
the Heisman और the ap Player of the Year are the only awards to honor the most outstanding player, जबकि the Maxwell Award and Walter Camp Award recognize the best player, and the Archie Griffin Award recognizes the most valuable player.
The United Nations Command ( UNC ) is the unified command structure लिये the multinational सैन्य forces supporting the गणतंत्र of Korea ( South Korea or ROK ) during and after the Korean War.
After troops of the Democratic People 's गणतंत्र of कोरियाई ( North Korea or DPRK ) invaded South Korea on June 25, 1950, the संयुक्त Nations Security Council adopted Resolution 82 calling on North कोरियाई to cease hostilities और withdraw to the 38th parallel.
On June 27, 1950, it adopted Resolution 83, recommending that members of the United Nations provide assistance to the Republic of Korea `` to repel the हथियारबंद attack and to restore international peace and security to the क्षेत्रफल ''.
Security Council Resolution 84, adopted on July 7, 1950, recommended that सदस्यों providing military forces और other assistance to South Korea `` make such forces and अन्य सहायता available to a unified command under the United States of America ''.
हालांकि the resolutions suggested the forces under the UNC यहूद `` United Nations forces '', and United Nations itself could be considered a belligerent, in practice the United Nations exercised no control over the combat forces, which were controlled by the United States.
Most observers concluded that the forces under the unc were not in law United Nations troops, and the acts of the UNC यहूद not the acts of the United राष्ट्र.
The UNC can be regarded as an alliance of national सेना, operating under the collective right of self-defense.
On August 29, 1950, the British Commonwealth 's 27th Infantry Brigade arrived at Busan to join the UNC, which until then included only ROK and U.S. forces.
The 27th Brigade moved into the Naktong River line west of Daegu.
Troop units from other countries of the UN followed in rapid succession ; Australia, belgian United Nations Command, Canada, Colombia, Ethiopia, France, यूनानियों, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, New Zealand, the Philippines, Thailand and Turkey.
The Union of South Africa provided air units which fought alongside the air forces of other member nations.
Denmark, India, Norway, and Sweden provided medical units.
Italy provided a hospital, even though it was नहीं a un member.
The United Nations Command and the Chinese-North Korean Command हस्ताक्षरित the Korean Armistice Agreement on 27 July 1953, ending the heavy fighting.
The armistice agreement established the Military Armistice Commission ( MAC ), consisting of representatives of the two signatories, to supervise the implementation of the armistice terms.
The North korean-chinese मैक has been replaced by Panmumjon प्रतिनिधि under exclusive North Korean management.
Regular meetings have been stopped, although duty officers of संयुक्त Security Area, commonly known as the Truce Village of Panmunjom, from each पक्ष meet regularly.
lincoln Heights is an American family drama television series about Eddie Sutton, a Mission Vista पुलिस officer who चालें his परिवार back to his बूढ़ा neighborhood, Lincoln Heights, to प्रारंभ a नई life और to help out his old neighborhood.
It is a dangerous प्लेस to उठाएँ a family, and through the अनेक ट्रायल the family goes through, वे soon सीख that settling in is not as easy as it seems.
While Officer सटन struggles to cope with प्रत्येक day जीवन as a गली cop in Los Angeles, उसके kids try to fit in at their new schools and with their new neighbors.
The show premiered January 8, 2007 on the ABC Family network with 13 एपीसोड ordered लिये the first season.
It was approved for a दूसरी season, which premiered September 4, 2007.
Vanessa Hudgens ' song, Say ok had been प्रयुक्त in a commercial to promote the second season.
To promote the third season, they दिखाया clips of cassie and Charles 's relationship to the song, Crush by the American Idol 's seventh ऋतु runner-up, David Archuleta.
To promote season 4, they 're using the song, Avalanche by Marie Digby.
The show 's theme song was written and performed by bassist Stanley Clarke and singer-songwriter Blaire Reinhard.
on January 29, 2010, ABC Family announced the cancellation of the series after four seasons.
A Christian denomination is an identifiable धार्मिक body अंतर्गत a common name, structure, and doctrine within Christianity.
in the Orthodox tradition, churches are divided often along ethnic and linguistic lines, into पृथक चर्च and traditions.
Technically, divisions between one group and another are defined by doctrine and church प्राधिकार.
Issues ऐसे as the nature of Jesus, the authority of apostolic succession, eschatology, and papal primacy पृथक one denomination from another.
The Roman Catholic Church is the largest denomination with over 1.1 billion members, over half of all ईसाइयों worldwide, making it the largest denomination for any religion worldwide ( although the church does not view itself as a denomination, but as the original pre-denominational church ).
Protestant denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of ईसाइयों worldwide, और together the Catholics, Protestants, Anglicans, and अन्य closely related denominations comprise Western Christianity.
the Eastern परंपरागत Church, Oriental Orthodox Churches and the Assyrian Church of the East are considered Eastern Christian denominations.
Western Christian denominations जीतना in Western Europe and its former colonies.
Eastern Christian denominations are represented mostly in Eastern Europe, the Middle East and उत्तर Africa.
Christians have various doctrines about the Church, the body of faithful that they believe was established by Jesus Christ, and how the divine church corresponds to Christian denominations.
Both the catholics and the Eastern Orthodox consider each of themselves solely to faithfully represent the One पावन Catholic and Apostolic Church to the exclusion of the other.
Protestants separated from the Catholic Church because of theologies and practices कि they considered to be in violation of their निर्वचन.
Generally, सदस्यों of the various denominations acknowledge प्रत्येक other as Christians, at least to the extent that they have mutually recognized baptisms and acknowledge historically orthodox views including the Divinity of Jesus and doctrines of sin and salvation, even though doctrinal and ecclesiological obstacles hinder पूरा communion between churches.
Since the reforms surrounding Vatican II, the Catholic Church रै referred to Protestant communities as `` denominations '', while reserving the पद `` church '' for apostolic churches, including the Eastern Orthodox ( see subsistit in and branch theory ).
There are however some non-denominational Christians who do not follow any particular branch.
The panda ( Ailuropoda melanoleuca, lit.
`` black and white cat-foot '' ), also known as the दानव पांडा to distinguish it from the unrelated red panda, is a bear native to central-western and south western China.
It is easily recognized by the large, distinctive black patches around its eyes, over the ears, और across its round body.
Though it belongs to the order Carnivora, the panda 's diet is 99 % bamboo.
Pandas in the wild will occasionally eat other grasses, wild tubers, or even meat in the form of birds, rodents or carrion.
In captivity, वे may receive honey, अंडे, fish, yams, shrub leaves, oranges, or bananas along with specially prepared food.
The giant panda lives in a few mountain सीमाएँ in central चीन, mainly in सिचुआन province, but also in the Shaanxi and गांसू provinces.
As a result of farming, deforestation and other development, the panda has been चलित out of the lowland areas जहाँ it once lived.
The panda is a संरक्षण reliant endangered species.
A 2007 report shows 239 pandas living in captivity inside China and another 27 outside the country.
Wild population estimates vary ; one estimate shows that there are about 1,590 individuals living in the wild, while a 2006 study via DNA विश्लेषण estimated कि this figure could be as high as 2,000 to 3,000.
Some reports also show कि the number of pandas in the wild is on the rise.
However, the IUCN does not believe there is enough certainty yet to reclassify the species from Endangered to Vulnerable.
While the dragon has often served as China 's national emblem, internationally the panda appears at least as commonly.
As ऐसे, it is becoming widely used within China in international contexts, for example the five Fuwa mascots of the Beijing ओलंपिक.
The Kite Runner is a 2007 American drama film directed by Marc forster आधारित on the novel of the same name by Khaled Hosseini.
It tells the स्टोरी of आमिर, a well-to-do boy from the Wazir akbar Khan district of Kabul, जो is tormented by the guilt of abandoning his dost Hassan, the son of his father 's Hazara servant.
The story is set against a backdrop of tumultuous events, from the fall of the monarchy in Afghanistan through the Soviet military intervention, the mass exodus of Afghan refugees to Pakistan और the United राज्य, and the Taliban regime.
Though most of the film is नियत in Afghanistan, these भाग were mostly shot in Kashgar, चीन, due to the dangers of फिल्मांकन in Afghanistan at the समय.
The majority of the फिल्मी 's dialogue is in Dari, with the remainder spoken in English.
The child actors are native speakers, but several adult actors had to learn Dari.
Filming wrapped up on December 21, 2006, and the film was expected to be released on November 2, 2007.
However, after concern for the safety of the young actors in the फिल्मी due to fears of violent reprisals to the sexual nature of some scenes in which they appear, its release date was pushed back six weeks to December 14, 2007.
The Kite Runner was released on DVD on March 25, 2008.
A HD dvd release was announced for the same date, but was canceled following the format 's निधन.

The legality of cannabis varies from country to देश.
Possession of cannabis is illegal in सबसे countries और has been since the beginning of widespread cannabis निषेध in the late 1930s.
however, many countries have decriminalized the possession of small quantities of cannabis, विशेषकर in North America, South America and Europe.
Furthermore, possession is विधिक or effectively legal in the Netherlands, North कोरियाई and would be in the u.S. states of कोलोराडो and Washington if it were not for संघीय विधि, which governs persons in all states.
The medicinal use of cannabis is legal in a number of countries, including Canada, the Czech Republic and Israel.
While federal law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis, enforcement varies widely at the state level और some states have established medicinal marijuana programs in that contradict federal law ; two states ( कोलोराडो and वॉशिंगटन ) have repealed their laws prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis and replaced them with a regulatory regime, also contrary to federal statute.
Some देशों have कानून कि हैं not as vigorously prosecuted as others लकिन, apart from the countries that offer access to medical marijuana, most countries have various penalties ranging from lenient to very severe.
Some infractions are taken more seriously in some countries than others in regard to the cultivation, use, कब्ज़ा or transfer of cannabis for recreational use.
A few jurisdictions have lessened penalties for possession of छोटी quantities of cannabis, making it punishable by confiscation and a fine, rather than imprisonment.
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use अनिवार्य treatment कार्यक्रम for यंग or frequent users, with freedom from narcotic drugs as the goal and a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use for medicinal purposes.
There are also changes in a अधिक restrictive direction as in Canada.
Drug tests to detect cannabis are increasingly आम in many countries और have resulted in jail sentences and people losing their jobs.
However, simple possession can carry long कारावास sentences in some countries, particularly in parts of East Asia and Southeast Asia where the sale of cannabis may lead to a sentence of life in prison or even execution.
Loxahatchee is a जातियाँ स्तिथ in Palm Beach County, Florida, संयुक्त States.
It is स्तिथ in the क्षेत्रों north of Wellington and वेस्ट and northwest of Royal Palm Beach, Florida and approximately west of वेस्ट Palm Beach.
Loxahatchee is also the name of the Post Office that serves this area, which is under the zip code of 33470.
The name Loxahatchee means `` turtle river. ''
Loxahatchee is located भीतर the Indian Trails Improvement ज़िला and the Loxahatchee Groves Water Control District.
Lion Country Safari, a drive-through safari park, is located in Loxahatchee.
In 2006, the state of Florida approved incorporation of part of Loxahatchee as the Town of loxahatchee Groves to become the 38th municipality in Palm Beach County.
The main reason for incorporating was to better protect the area from encroaching growth and to preserve the rural character of the पड़ोस.
Perhaps the most rural area within a close proximity to West ताड़ Beach, with लॉट sizes range from 1-20 acres.
Along with The Acreage, it is notable for loose land restrictions and the native and exotic animal presence is quite notable.
Seminole Ridge High School serves the area.
The Canadian Citizenship Test is a test, administered by नागरिकता and Immigration Canada ( CIC ), that is required for all applicants for Canadian citizenship who are aged between 18 और 54 and who meet the basic requirements for citizenship.
The test is available in both French and English, the official languages of Canada.

Epithelium is one of the four basic प्रकार of एनिमल tissue, along साथ connective tissue, muscle tissue and nervous tissue.
Epithelial tissues line the cavities and surfaces of structures throughout the body, and also form many glands.
Functions of epithelial कोशिकाएं शामिल secretion, selective अवशोषण, protection, transcellular transport and detection of sensation.
In Greek `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) means `` on '' or `` upon '', and `` θηλή '' ( `` thēlē '' ) means `` nipple ''.
Epithelial layers are avascular, so they must receive nourishment via diffusion of substances from the underlying connective tissue, through the basement membrane.
Epithelia can also be व्यवस्थित into clusters of cells that फलन as exocrine and अंतःस्रावी glands.
Kent E. Hovind ( born January 15, 1953 ) is an American young Earth creationist.
Hovind रै spoken on creation science and has aimed to मनाना listeners to reject theories of evolution, geophysics, and cosmology in favor of his interpretation of the Genesis creation narrative from the Bible.
hovind 's views are contradicted by scientific evidence and some of his ideas have also been criticized by young Earth creationist organizations such as Answers in Genesis.
hovind established the Creation Science Evangelism in 1991, and frequently spoke on यंग Earth creationism at seminars at private schools and churches, debates, and on radio and television प्रसारण.
Since जनवरी 2007, hovind has been serving a ten-year prison sentence after being convicted of 58 federal counts, including 12 कर offenses, one count of obstructing federal एजेंटों, and 45 counts of structuring cash transactions.
He is incarcerated at the संघीय Correctional Institution at Berlin, New Hampshire.
Bride with Bindi decorated forehead
A bindi (, from Sanskrit bindu, meaning `` a drop, small कण, dot '' ), or a pottu/bottu ( in Tamil, Telugu, and Malayalam ) is a forehead decoration worn in South Asia ( particularly India, बांग्लादेश, Nepal, Sri Lanka and Mauritius ) and Southeast Asia.
Traditionally it is a bright बिन्दु of red color applied in the center of the forehead close to the eyebrows, but it can भी consist of a sign or piece of jewelry worn at this location.

The Dragon Ball manga and anime series features an extensive cast of characters created by Akira Toriyama.
The श्रेणी takes place in a fictional universe, the same as Toriyama 's previous series Dr. Slump, और follows the adventures of martial artist Son Goku from childhood to adulthood as he खोज for the seven spheres known as the Dragon Balls, used to summon a wish-granting dragon.
During the course of the story, he encounters allies such as Bulma, Yamcha, Kuririn and Trunks, rivals such as Tenshinhan, Piccolo और Vegeta, and enemies such as Freeza and Cell.

The series also includes depictions of the afterlife, with several characters being gods that govern the universe.

The Comanche are a Plains Indian tribe whose historic territory, ज्ञात as Comancheria, consisted of उपस्थित दिन eastern New Mexico, southern Colorado, northeastern Arizona, southern Kansas, all of Oklahoma, and most of northwest Texas.
The Comanche people are enrolled in the federally recognized Comanche Nation, in Oklahoma.
Historically, the Comanches यहूद hunter-gatherers with a horse culture.
There may have been as many as 45,000 Comanches in the late 18th century.
Today, the comanche Nation Comanche tribal enrollment numbers 15,191 with लगभग 7,763 members residing in the Lawton – फोर्ट Sill and surrounding areas of दक्षिणपश्चिम ओक्लाहोमा.
The Comanche स्वदेश Homecoming Powwow is held annually in walters, Oklahoma in mid-July.
The Comanche spoke the comanche language, a Numic language of the Uto-Aztecan family, sometimes classified as a Shoshone dialect ; however, only about 1 % of Comanches speak it today.
