The Las Vegas Strip World of Coca-Cola museum in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores, restaurants, and vending machines in every country except Cuba and North Korea.
It is produced by The coca-cola Company of Atlanta, Georgia, and is often referred to simply as कोक ( a registered trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27, 1944 ).
originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by जॉन Pemberton, Coca-Cola was bought out by businessman Asa Griggs Candler, whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The company produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, who hold territorially exclusive अनुबंध with the company, उपज finished उत्पाद in cans and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers then sell, distribute and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail स्टोर्स and vending machines.
Such bottlers include coca-cola Enterprises, which is the largest single Coca-Cola bottler in North America and western Europe.
The Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate for soda fountains to major रेस्तरां and food service distributors.
The Coca-Cola Company has, on occasion, introduced other cola drinks under the Coke brand name.
The most common of these is Diet Coke, with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola, Diet Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola चेरी, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Vanilla, and special versions with lemon, lime or coffee.
आधारित on Interbrand 's best global brand 2011, Coca-Cola थी the world 's most valuable brand.
प्रकार of bar-lines
In musical notation, a bar ( or measure ) is a segment of समय defined by a given number of beats, each of which are assigned a particular note value.
Dividing music into bars provides regular सन्दर्भ points to pin point locations within a टुकड़ा of music.
It also makes written music easier to follow, since each bar of staff symbols can be read and played as a batch.
Typically, a piece consists of several bars of the same length, and in modern musical notation the number of beats in each bar is specified at the beginning of the score by the top number of a time signature ( such as 3/4 ), while the bottom number indicates the note मान of the beat ( the beat has a quarter note value in the 3/4 example ).
The word bar is more common in British English, and the word माप is more common in American English, although musicians generally understand both usages.
In American English, although the शब्द bar and measure are often used interchangeably the सही use of the word 'bar ' refers तभी to the vertical line itself, while the word 'measure ' refers to the बीट्स contained between bars.
In international usage, it is equally correct to speak of bar numbers and measure numbers, e.g. ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm. 9–16’.
Along the same lines, it is wise to reserve the abbreviated रूप ‘bb.
3–4’ etc. for बीट्स only ; bars चाहिए be referred to by name in पूरा.
The first metrically complete measure within a piece of music is called ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’.
When the piece begins with an anacrusis ( an incomplete measure at the head of a piece of music ), ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’ is the following measure.
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain features 15 hours of storage and can supply power 24 घंटों a day.
Solar energy, radiant light and heat from the sun, has been harnessed by humans since ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
सौर energy technologies include solar heating, solar photovoltaics, solar thermal electricity, solar architecture and artificial photosynthesis, which can make considerable contributions to solving कुछ of the most urgent energy problems the world now चेहरों.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar or active solar depending on the way they capture, convert and distribute सौर energy.
Active solar techniques शामिल the use of photovoltaic panels and सौर thermal collectors to harness the energy.
Passive solar techniques शामिल orienting a building to the सूर्य, selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or light dispersing properties, and designing spaces that naturally circulate air.
in 2011, the International Energy एजेंसी said that `` the development of affordable, inexhaustible and clean solar उर्जा technologies will have विशाल longer-term benefits.
It will increase countries’ उर्जा security through reliance on an indigenous, inexhaustible and mostly import-independent resource, enhance स्थिरता, reduce pollution, lower the costs of mitigating जलवायु change, and रखना fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise.
These advantages are global.
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment should be considered सीखना investments ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
Primary care may be provided in community health centres.
Primary परवाह is the health care given by a health परवाह provider.
Typically this provider acts as the principal point of consultation for patients within a health care system and coordinates other specialists that the patient may need.
Such a professional can be a primary care physician, ऐसे as a general practitioner or family physician, or depending on the locality, health system organization, and patient 's discretion, वे may see a pharmacist, a physician assistant, a nurse practitioner, a nurse ( such as in the United Kingdom ), a clinical officer ( such as in parts of Africa ), or an Ayurvedic or other traditional medicine professional ( such as in parts of Asia ).
Depending on the nature of the स्वास्थ्य condition, patients may then be referred लिये secondary or tertiary care.

It was released in February 2004 as the second single from Ocean Avenue and the third track.
It is ज्ञात for bringing them into the मुख्यधारा, as it received numerous spins on MTV and increasing radio airplay.

the name of Ocean Avenue in Jacksonville is actually Beach Boulevard.
They left their original base behind when they moved to Los Angeles.
The song was featured on the Much Music compilation album Big चमकदार धुनें 9.
A psychiatrist is a physician who specializes in psychiatry.
a psychiatrist specializes in the treatment of mental विकार.
Psychiatrists are authorized to prescribe medicine, conduct physical examinations, order and interpret laboratory tests, use psychotherapy and may order brain imaging studies ऐसे as computed tomography ( ct/cat Scan ), magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ), and positron emission tomography ( PET ) scanning.
Within the framework of the World Health Organization 's ( WHO ) definition of स्वास्थ्य as a state of पूरा physical, दिमागी and social well-being, and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity, reproductive health, or sexual health/hygiene, addresses the reproductive processes, functions and system at all stages of life.
Reproductive health, therefore, implies that people are able to have a responsible, satisfying and safer sex life and that they have the capability to reproduce and the freedom to decide if, when and how often to do so.
One निर्वचन of this implies that men and women ought to be informed of and to have access to safe, effective, affordable and acceptable methods of birth control ; also access to appropriate health care services of sexual, reproductive medicine और implementation of health शिक्षा programs to stress the importance of women to go safely through pregnancy and childbirth could provide couples साथ the best chance of having a healthy infant.
On the other hand individuals do फेस inequalities in reproductive health services.
Inequalities vary based on socioeconomic status, education स्तर, age, ethnicity, religion, and resources available in their environment.
it is possible for example, that low income individuals lack the resources for appropriate health सेवाएं and the knowledge to know what is appropriate for maintaining reproductive health.
According to the WHO, `` Reproductive and यौन ill-health accounts for 20 % of the global burden of ill-health for women, and 14 % लिये men. ''
Reproductive health is a part of यौन and reproductive स्वास्थ्य and rights.

Core 2 is a ब्रांड encompassing a range of Intel 's consumer 64-bit x86-64 single-, dual-, and quad-core microprocessors based on the Core microarchitecture.
The single- and dual-core models are single- die, whereas the quad-core models comprise दो dies, each containing two cores, packaged in a multi-chip module.
The introduction of Core 2 relegated the Pentium brand to the mid-range market, and reunified laptop and desktop CPU lines, which previously था been divided into the Pentium 4, pentium D, and Pentium M brands.
The Core 2 brand was introduced on 27 July 2006, comprising the Solo ( single-core ), Duo ( dual-core ), Quad ( quad-core ), and in 2007, the Extreme ( dual- or quad-core CPUs for enthusiasts ) subbrands.
Intel Core 2 processors with vPro technology ( designed for businesses ) include the dual-core and quad-core branches.
The Super Bowl is the annual championship game of the National Football League ( NFL ), the उच्चतम level of professional American football in the United States, culminating a season that begins in the late summer of the previous calendar year.
The Super Bowl uses Roman numerals to identify each game, rather than the साल in which it is held.
For उदाहरण, Super Bowl I was played on January 15, 1967, following the 1966 regular season, while Super Bowl XLVII was played on February 3, 2013, following the 2012 season.
the game was created as part of a merger agreement between the NFL and its then-rival league, the American Football League ( AFL ).
it was agreed that the दो leagues ' champion teams would play in an AFL–NFL World Championship Game until the merger was to officially begin in 1970.
After the merger, each league थी redesignated as a `` conference ``, and the game थी then played between the conference champions.
Currently, the National Football Conference ( NFC ) leads the series with 25 wins to 22 wins for the American Football Conference ( AFC ).
The दिन on which the Super Bowl is played, now considered by some a de facto American national holiday, is called `` Super Bowl Sunday ``.
It is the second-largest दिन for u.S. food consumption, after Thanksgiving दिन.
In addition, the Super Bowl has frequently been the सबसे watched American television broadcast of the year.
Super Bowl XLV, played in 2011, became the most-watched American television program in history, drawing an average audience of 111 million viewers and taking over the spot held by the पिछला year 's Super Bowl, which itself था taken over the # 1 spot held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of m*a*s*h.
The Super Bowl is also among the most watched sporting events in the world, almost all being North American audiences, and is second to association football ’s UEFA Champions लीग final as the most watched annual sporting event विश्वव्यापी.
Because of its high viewership, commercial airtime during the Super Bowl ब्रॉडकास्ट is the most expensive of the year.
Due to the high cost of investing in विज्ञापन on the Super Bowl, companies regularly develop उनके most expensive advertisements लिये this broadcast.
As a result, watching and discussing the broadcast 's commercials has become a significant पहलू of the event.
In addition, many popular singers and musicians have performed during the event 's pre-game and halftime ceremonies because of the एक्सपोज़र.
Fiona is a feminine given name.
The name Fiona was invented, and पहला used, by the Scottish poet James Macpherson ( 1736–96 ), author of the Ossian poems, which he claimed were translations from ancient गैलिक sources ( sources, when challenged, he never उत्पादित ).
The name was subsequently used as a pseudonym by William Sharp ( 1855–1905 ), who authored several romantic works under the नाम `` Fiona Macleod ''.
The name has since become popular in इंग्लैण्ड, Scotland और Ireland.
The name is considered to be a Latinised रूप of the Gaelic word fionn, अर्थ `` white '', `` fair ''.
The name Fiona is also sometimes used as an Anglicisation of the Irish-language name Fíona, हालांकि these names are otherwise unrelated ( as Fíona is derived from an element meaning `` vine '' ).
वहीँ is also a modern tendency to equate the authentic Scottish Gaelic feminine नाम Fionnghal with फिओना.
The name Fiona is rising in popularity particularly in German -speaking countries.
Fiona was the 49th most popular name लिये baby girls born in 2008 in Germany.
Fiona was tied for third place in the ranking of most popular names for baby girls born in the tiny principality of Liechtenstein in 2008.
The नाम was the 347th most popular name for girls born in the United States in 2008, where it has ranked among the top 1,000 most popular names for girls since 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999.
The name Fiona रै been particularly लोकप्रिय for girls of Asian or Pacific Islander descent in New यॉर्क City, where Fiona ranked as the ninth सबसे popular नाम for girls from those groups in 2007.
Many languages are used, or historically have been used in the United States.
The most commonly used language is English.
There are also many भाषाएं स्वदेशी to North America or to U.S. states or holdings in the Pacific region.
Languages brought to the देश by colonists or immigrants इससे यूरोपीय, Asia, or other parts of the world make up a large portion of the languages currently प्रयुक्त ; several languages, including creoles and sign भाषाएं, have also developed in the United States.
Approximately 337 languages are spoken or signed by the population, of which 176 are indigenous to the क्षेत्रफल.
Fifty-two भाषाएं formerly spoken in the country 's territory are now extinct.
The variety of English spoken in the United States is known as American अंग्रेज़ी.
English is the de facto नेशनल language of the संयुक्त States, with 80 % of the population claiming it as a mother tongue, और some 95 % claiming to speak it `` खूब '' or `` very well ''.
However, no official language exists at the federal level.
There have been several proposals to मेक English the नेशनल language in amendments to immigration reform bills, but none of these bills has become law with the amendment intact.
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial levels, with some states mirroring the federal policy of adopting no official language in a de jure capacity, others adopting English alone, others officially adopting English as well as local languages, और still others adopting a policy of de facto bilingualism.
Spanish is the second most common language in the country, and is spoken by over 12 % of the population.
The United States holds the world 's fifth largest Spanish-speaking population, outnumbered only by Mexico, Spain, Colombia, and Argentina.
Throughout the Southwestern United States, long-established Spanish-speaking communities coexist with large numbers of more recent Hispanophone immigrants.
हालांकि many new Latin American immigrants हैं less than धाराप्रवाह in English, nearly all second-generation Hispanic Americans speak English fluently, while only about half still speak स्पेनी.
According to the 2000 US census, people of German ancestry make up the largest single ethnic group in the United राज्य, and the जर्मनी language ranks fifth.
Italian, Polish, and French are still widely spoken among populations descending from immigrants from those countries in the early 20th century, but the use of these languages is dwindling as the older generations die.
Russian is also बोला by अप्रवासी populations.
Tagalog and Vietnamese have over one million speakers each in the संयुक्त States, almost entirely within recent immigrant populations.
Both languages, along with the varieties of the Chinese language, Japanese, and Korean, are now used in elections in Alaska, California, Hawaii, Illinois, नई York, Texas, and Washington.
Native अमरीकी languages are spoken in smaller pockets of the country, but these populations are decreasing, and the languages are almost never widely used outside of reservations.
Hawaiian, हालांकि having few देशी अध्यक्षों, is an official language along with English at the state level in Hawaii.
The state government of Louisiana offers services and documents in फ्रेंच, as करता New Mexico in Spanish.
Besides English, Spanish, French, German, Navajo and other Native American भाषाएं, सब other भाषाएं are usually learned from immigrant ancestors that came after the time of independence or learned through some form of education.
1990 's Pontiac Grand Am Sedan फेंडर and quarter फलक
On an automobile, a quarter panel ( or rear wing as it is known in British English ) is usually considered the body panel which goes between the rear door and the trunk and typically wraps around the wheel well ; however, the similar front section Fender ( गाडी ), between the door and the hood, is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter panel.
The quarter फलक is typically made of Sheet metal, but is sometimes made of fiberglass or fiber-reinforced plastic ; although, this varies with different makes and models.
A quarter panel is typically a welded on component of the uni-body structure or Monocoque.
Replacement of a sheet metal quarter panel typically requires it to be cut off the vehicle and a replacement part to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the Vehicle.
Due to इस high amount of specialized labor, a quarter फलक may often be repaired rather than replaced by hammering out the damage, और a body filler sometimes referred to as bondo to be applied to finalize the असली surface.
Shropshire ( or ; alternatively Salop ; abbreviated, in print only, Shrops ) is a county in the West Midlands region of England.
It borders Wales to the west, Cheshire to the north, Staffordshire to the east, Worcestershire to the south-east and Herefordshire to the south.
A unitary authority ( Shropshire परिषद ) was created on 1 April 2009, taking over from the previous county council and 5 district councils, and covers most of the county.
The borough of Telford and Wrekin has been a separate unitary authority since 1998 but continues to be included in the ceremonial county.
The county 's population and economy is centred on पाँच towns : the county town of Shrewsbury, which is culturally and historically important and is स्तिथ in the centre of the county ; Telford, a new कस्बा in the east which was constructed around a number of older towns, most notably Wellington, Dawley and Madeley, which is today the most populous ; and Oswestry in the north-west, Bridgnorth just to the south of Telford, and Ludlow in the south.
The county has many further market towns, सहित Whitchurch in the north, Newport just to the north-east of Telford, and Market Drayton in the north-east of the county.
The Ironbridge Gorge area is a UNESCO World Heritage Site, covering Ironbridge, Coalbrookdale and a part of Madeley.
There are, additionally, other notable historic industrial sites located around the county, such as at Shrewsbury, Broseley, Snailbeach and highley as well as the Shropshire Union Canal.
The Shropshire Hills Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty covers about a quarter of the county, mainly in the south.
Shropshire is one of England 's most rural and sparsely populated counties, with the population density of the Shropshire Council area being बस 91/km2 ( 337/sq mi ).
the Wrekin is one of the सबसे famous natural landmarks in the county, though the highest hills are the clee Hills, Stiperstones and the Long Mynd.
Wenlock Edge is another significant geographical and geological landmark.
In the low-lying northwest of the county ( and overlapping the border with वेल्स ) is the Fenn 's, Whixall और Bettisfield Mosses National Nature Reserve, one of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण and best preserved bogs in Britain.
The River Severn, Great Britain 's longest river, runs through the county, exiting into Worcestershire via the Severn Valley.
Shropshire is landlocked, and with an area of, is England 's largest inland county.
The county flower is the round-leaved sundew.
For Eurostat purposes, the county ( less the एकात्मक district of Telford and Wrekin ) is a nuts 3 region ( कोड UKG22 ).
The two Shropshire unitary areas ( covering all of the ceremonial county ), together with the authorities covering the ceremonial county of Staffordshire, comprise the `` Shropshire and Staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region.
The Big Bang Theory cast at Comic कॉन 2009, from left : Kunal Nayyar, साइमन Helberg, kaley Cuoco, Jim Parsons, and Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom The Big Bang Theory, created और executive produced by Chuck Lorre and विधेयक Prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter, two caltech physicists ; Penny, a waitress and aspiring actress who जीवनदान across the hall ; and Leonard और शेल्डन 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over time, several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ), a physicist colleague, and, at different times, a lover of both Leonard and Howard ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; ऋतु 4-present regular ), a microbiologist, Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife, and former part-time waitress alongside पैनी ; neuroscientist एमी Farrah fowler ( season 3 अतिथि ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), who joins the group after होने matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner, Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space.
The show also सुविधाएँ numerous supporting characters, each of whom plays a prominent role in a छोटी group of episodes.
the A-Team is an American action-adventure television श्रेणी, running from 1983 to 1987, about a fictional group of ex– United States Army खास Forces personnel who work as soldiers of fortune, while on the run from the Army after being branded as war criminals for a `` अपराधों they did n't commit ``.

She debuted in सनसनी Comics # 1 ( January 1942 ) and serves as the civilian and secret identity of the superhero Wonder Woman.
The character was created by Charles Moulton and Harry G. पीटर.
Wat Phra Kaew, बैंकॉक, Thailand
There is no official state religion in the Thai constitution, which guarantees religious freedom for all Thai citizens, though the king is required by law to be बौद्ध.
According to the last census ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of Thais हैं Buddhists of the Theravada tradition.
Muslims are the दूसरी largest religious group in Thailand at 4.6 %.
Thailand 's southernmost provinces - Pattani, Yala, Narathiwat and part of Songkhla chumphon have dominant Muslim populations, consisting of both ethnic Thai and Malay.
The दक्षिणी tip of Thailand is mostly ethnic Malays.
Christians, mainly Catholics, represent 0.7 % of the population.
A small but influential community of Sikhs in Thailand and कुछ Hindus also live in the country 's cities, and are heavily engaged in खुदरा commerce.
There is also a small Jewish community in Thailand, dating back to the 17th century.
Since 2001, Muslim activists, generally described by the थाई government as terrorists or separatists, have rallied against the central government because of alleged भ्रष्टाचार and ethnic bias on the part of officials.
Thailand 's Department of Religion, फिलहाल under the Ministry of Culture, is formally responsible for the registration of religious groups in Thailand URL_http जिससे hold properties through legally established foundations.
It रै oversight, along with the Immigration Police, over the work permits of missionaries who हैं `` expatriate religious workers '' of all religions.
A मान added tax ( vat ) is a form of consumption tax.
From the परिप्रेक्ष्य of the buyer, it is a tax on the purchase price.
From that of the seller, it is a tax only on the value added to a product, material, or service, from an accounting point of view, by this stage of its manufacture or distribution.
The manufacturer remits to the government the difference between these two amounts, and retains the rest for themselves to offset the taxes they had previously paid on the inputs.
The value added to a product by or with a business is the sale price charged to its customer, minus the cost of materials and other taxable inputs.
A VAT is like a sales tax in that ultimately only the end consumer is taxed.
It differs from the sales tax in that, with the latter, the tax is collected and remitted to the government only once, at the point of purchase by the end consumer.
With the VAT, collections, remittances to the government, and credits for taxes already सशुल्क occur each समय a business in the supply chain purchases उत्पाद.
A referee calling a high-sticking penaltyHigh
-sticking is the name of two infractions in the sport of ice hockey that may occur when a player intentionally or inadvertently plays with his or her stick above the height of the कन्धों or above the cross bar of a hockey goal.
This can result in a stoppage of play or in a penalty.
In the rules of the National Hockey League, high-sticking is defined as a penalty in Rule 60 and as a non-penalty foul in Rule 80.
A stoppage in play results if a ऊँची stick comes in contact with the puck and the टोली who touched it regains control of the puck.
However, play usually continues if a player touches the puck साथ a high stick and the opposing team gains control of the puck.
If the puck goes into the opposing net after coming into contact with a high stick, the goal is disallowed.
The स्तर at which a stick is considered too ऊँची for a लक्ष्य is the crossbar of the net.
However, if a player knocks the puck into his own net साथ a high stick, the goal is allowed.
A दंड is assessed if a player strikes another player साथ a high stick.
The player is given a minor penalty unless his high stick caused an चोट, in which case the रेफरी has the option to assess a double-minor, major or match penalty.
It is the referee 's discretion which penalty to assess : the rule calls for a double minor for an accidental injury, or a match penalty for a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the विपक्ष player was दरअसल घायल ).
Injury is usually decided by the high stick causing bleeding, लकिन the presence of blood does not automatically mean an extra दंड is awarded.
Some referees have been known to award an extra penalty without the presence of blood if the referee determines कि the injury sustained was sufficient to warrant a double-minor penalty.
Typical modern memory card reader, compatible with many common formats
A memory card reader is a device, typically having a USB इंटरफ़ेस, for accessing the data on a memory कार्ड such as a CompactFlash ( CF ), Secure Digital ( SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ).
Most card readers also offer write capability, and together with the card, this can function as a pen drive.
Some printers and personal computers have a built-in कार्ड reader.
A multi card reader is used for communication with more than one type of flash memory card.
Multi card readers do not have built-in memory capacity, लकिन are able to accept multiple types and styles of memory ताश.
The number of compatible memory cards varies इससे reader to reader and can include more than 20 different types.
The क्रमांक of different मेमोरी cards that a मल्टी card reader can accept is expressed as x-in-1, with x being a figure of merit indicating the number of memory cards accepted, such as 35-in-1.
There are three categories of card readers sorted by the type and quantity of the card slots : single card reader ( e.g. 1x SD-only ), multi card reader ( e.g. 9-in-1 ) and series card reader ( e.g. 4x SD only ).
Some kinds of memory cards with उनके own usb कृत्यों do not need the कार्ड reader, such as the बुद्धिमान Stick memory card, which can plug directly into a USB slot.
The USB device class used is 0x08.
Bullying is हानिकारक to students ' well-being and development.
Bullying is the use of force or coercion to abuse or intimidate others.
The बर्ताव can be habitual and involve an imbalance of social or physical power.
It can include verbal harassment or threat, physical assault or coercion and may be directed repeatedly towards particular victims, perhaps on grounds of race, religion, gender, sexuality, or ability.
If bullying is done by a group, it is called mobbing.
The victim of bullying is sometimes referred to as a `` निशाना ''.
धमकाना can be defined in many different तरीके.
The UK currently has no legal definition of bullying, while some U.S. states have laws against it.
Bullying consists of three मौलिक प्रकार of abuse – emotional, verbal, and physical.
It typically involves subtle methods of coercion such as intimidation.
धमकाना ranges from सरल one-on-one bullying to more complex bullying in which the bully may have one or more `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing to assist the primary bully in his or her bullying activities.
Bullying in school and the कार्यस्थल is also referred to as peer abuse.
Robert W. Fuller has analyzed धमकाना in the context of rankism.
A धमकाना culture can develop in any context in which human beings interact with each other.
This includes school, church, family, the workplace, home, and neighborhoods.

Laura Bush and Rae Leigh Bradbury ( formerly missing ) on April 4, 2007, in Austin, Texas, after the 8-year-old introduced Mrs. Bush during announcement of the future opening of the Texas Regional Office of the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children.
Rae Leigh was the first child in the U.S. to be recovered as a परिणाम of an एम्बर Alert when she was 8 सप्ताह old in November 1998.
An AMBER चेतावनी or a चाइल्ड Abduction Emergency ( SAME कोड : CAE ) is a child abduction alert system originating in 1996, now employed in 9 countries.
AMBER is officially a backronym for America 's Missing : Broadcasting आपात Response, named for Amber Hagerman, a 9-year-old abducted और murdered in Arlington, Texas in 1996.
Alternate regional alert names यहूद once used ; in Georgia, `` Levi 's कॉल '' ( named after Levi Frady ) ; in Hawaii, `` Maile Amber Alert '' ( after Maile Gilbert ) ; and Arkansas, `` Morgan Nick Amber Alert '' ( in memory of Morgan Chauntel उपनाम ).
AMBER Alerts are distributed via commercial radio stations, Internet radio, उपग्रह radio, television stations, and cable TV by the Emergency Alert System and NOAA Weather Radio ( where they are termed `` Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` Amber Alerts '' ).
The alerts are also issued via e-mail, electronic traffic-condition signs, the led billboards which are located outside of newer walgreens locations, along with the led/lcd लक्षण of billboard companies such as साफ Channel Outdoor, CBS बाहरी and Lamar, or through wireless device SMS text messages.
AMBER Alert has also teamed up with Google and Facebook to relay information regarding an AMBER Alert to an ever growing demographic.
Those interested in subscribing to receive AMBER Alerts in their area via SMS संदेश can visit Wireless Amber Alerts, which are offered by law as free messages.
In some states, the display scrollboards in front of lottery terminals are also used.
The decision to declare an AMBER चेतावनी is made by each police organization ( in अनेक मामले, the state police or highway patrol ) जिससे investigates each of the abductions.
Public information in an एम्बर Alert प्रायः consists of the name and description of the abductee, a description of the suspected abductor, and a description और license plate number of the abductor 's vehicle, if available.
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an American woman with whom United States अध्यक्ष Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996.
The affair और its repercussions ( which included Clinton 's impeachment ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal.
House of Night is a series of vampire -themed fantasy novels by American author P. C. Cast and her daughter Kristin डाल.
It follows the adventures of Zoey Redbird, a sixteen-year-old girl who has just become a `` fledgling vampyre '' and is जरूरी to attend the हाउस of Night boarding school in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
The series has been on the New York Times Best Seller list for 63 weeks and there are over सात million copies in print in North America alone.
The sixth novel, Tempted, which went on बिक्री on October 27, 2009 with a first printing of a million copies, entered the USA Today bestseller सूची that week at # 1.
In जनवरी, 2010, Gezeichnet, a German translation of Marked, reached the # 1 spot on the Der Spiegel bestseller list.
The श्रेणी has so far sold more than ten million books in 39 countries.
Burned was released on April 27, 2010, and like Tempted, it डाला the USA Today bestseller सूची that week at # 1.
Awakened, released in January, 2011, also entered the list at # 1.
The series, which is published by St Martin 's Press is planned to include twelve books.
In 2008, plans for a film adaptation यहूद भी announced.
The tenth किताब in the श्रेणी, Hidden, was released on अक्तूबर 16, 2012.
The दूसरी book in the novellas ( which give backgrounds on supporting characters ), Lenobia 's Vow, was released जनवरी 31, 2012.
Book eleven is currently called Revealed, and the Casts have announced कि two more novellas, Neferet’s Curse, नियोजित to be released February 19, 2013, and a prequel novel about Kalona, हैं to be released to coincide with the eleventh and twelfth books.
In Greek mythology, the Trojan War was waged विरूद्ध the city of Troy by the Achaeans ( Greeks ) after पेरिस of Troy took Helen from her husband Menelaus किंग of Sparta.
The war is one of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण events in Greek mythology and has been narrated through अनेक works of यूनानी literature, most notably through Homer 's Iliad and the Odyssey.
The Iliad relates a part of the last year of the siege of Troy ; the Odyssey describes Odysseus 's journey home.
Other parts of the war are contained in a cycle of epic poems, which have survived through fragments.
Episodes from the war provided material for Greek tragedy and other works of Greek literature, and for Roman poets including Virgil and Ovid.
The war originated from a quarrel between the goddesses Athena, Hera, और Aphrodite, after Eris, the goddess of strife and अनबन, दिया them a golden apple, sometimes known as the Apple of Discord, marked `` for the fairest ''.
Zeus sent the goddesses to Paris, who judged that Aphrodite, as the `` fairest '', चाहिए receive the apple.
In exchange, Aphrodite made Helen, the most beautiful of all women and wife of Menelaus, fall in प्रेम with Paris, who took her to Troy.
Agamemnon, king of Mycenae and the brother of Helen 's husband Menelaus, led an expedition of Achaean troops to Troy and besieged the city लिये ten years because of Paris ' insult.
After the deaths of many heroes, including the Achaeans Achilles and Ajax, and the Trojans Hector and Paris, the city fell to the ruse of the Trojan Horse.
The achaeans slaughtered the Trojans ( except for some of the women and children whom वे kept or sold as slaves ) and desecrated the temples, thus earning the gods ' wrath.
few of the Achaeans returned safely to their homes and many founded colonies in distant shores.
The Romans later traced their origin to Aeneas, one of the Trojans, who was said to have led the surviving Trojans to modern-day Italy.
The ancient Greeks thought that the Trojan War was a ऐतिहासिक event that had taken place in the 13th or 12th century BC, और believed that Troy was located in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles.
by modern times, both the war और the city were widely believed to be non-historical.
In 1868, however, the German archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann met Frank Calvert, who convinced Schliemann that Troy was at Hissarlik and Schliemann took over calvert 's excavations on property belonging to Calvert ; this claim is now accepted by most scholars.
Whether there is any historical reality behind the Trojan War is an open question.
Many scholars believe that there is a historical core to the tale, though this may simply mean that the Homeric stories are a fusion of various tales of sieges and रिझाने by Mycenaean Greeks during the Bronze Age.
Those who believe that the stories of the Trojan War are derived from a specific historical conflict usually date it to the 12th or 11th सदियां BC, often preferring the dates given by Eratosthenes, 1194–1184 BC, जिससे roughly corresponds with पुरातत्व evidence of a catastrophic burning of Troy VIIa.
anarchists have employed certain symbols for their cause, सहित most prominently the circle-A and the black ध्वज, हालांकि anarchists have historically largely अस्वीकृत the importance of symbols to political movement.
Since the revival of anarchism around the प्रारंभ of the 21st-century concurrent with the rise of the anti-globalization गति, anarchist cultural symbols are widely present.
The greater palatine canal ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the skull that transmits the greater palatine धमनी, vein, and nerve between the pterygopalatine fossa and the oral cavity.
Surface temperature of अंटार्कटिक in winter and summer इससे the European केन्द्र लिये Medium-Range Weather Forecasts
The climate of Antarctica is the coldest on the whole of Earth.
Antarctica has the न्यूनतम naturally occurring temperature ever अंकित on the मैदान on Earth : −89.2 °C ( −128.6 °F ) at Vostok Station.
It is also अत्यधिक dry ( technically a desert ), averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of precipitation per year.
Even so, on most parts of the continent the snow rarely melts and is eventually compressed to become the glacial ice that makes up the ice sheet.
Weather fronts rarely penetrate far into the continent.
Most of Antarctica रै an ice cap climate ( Köppen ef ) with very cold, generally extremely dry weather throughout the year और no month averaging above 0 °C ( 32 °F ).
Some fringe coastal areas have a tundra climate ( Köppen ET ) with a short summer averaging above freezing, and much higher precipitation.
Current head coach Mike Tomlin, during the 2007 season
The Pittsburgh Steelers franchise has था 16 head coaches throughout its history.
Founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates in, the name was changed to the Steelers prior to the season to celebrate the city 's heritage of producing steel.
Joe Bach served two separate terms as head coach and Walt kiesling परोसा three separate terms.
During the और seasons, due to the amount of players जो fought in World युद्ध II, the Steelers combined their team with Philadelphia and Chicago, respectively.
During these seasons, Steelers ' coach Walt Kiesling shared coaching duties with Greasy Neale and Phil हैंडलर, who have not been included within this list.
Struggling for much of the मताधिकार 's early years, the team 's first ऋतु with more wins than नुकसान थी coached by jock Sutherland in.
In, under Sutherland, the Steelers played their first playoff game against the Philadelphia Eagles.
Ten of the 16 head कोच spent their entire professional coaching careers with the franchise, including John McNally, Walt Kiesling and Chuck noll, who have also been voted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
One of only four men to coach the same team for 23 years, Chuck Noll retired in.
Noll is also the only coach in National Football League इतिहास to win four Super प्याले.
Bill Cowher, Noll 's replacement, coached the Steelers to their fifth Super Bowl victory, in 2005.
The Steelers sixth Super Bowl win came in Super Bowl XLIII, जबकि head coached by माइक Tomlin, the team 's current head coach.
In criminal law, fraud is intentional deception made लिये personal लाभ or to damage another individual ; the related adjective is fraudulent, and verb is defraud.
Fraud is a crime and a civil law violation, though the specific criminal law definition varies by विधिक jurisdiction.
Defrauding people or entities of money or valuables is a आम purpose of fraud.
A hoax also involves deception, but without the इरादे of लाभ or of damaging or depriving the victim.
Fraud is a defense in a civil action for उल्लंघन of contract or विशिष्ट performance of a contract.
Fraud is a आधार for equitable क्षेत्राधिकार.
Passover, or Pesach ( from : in Hebrew, Yiddish ), Tiberian :, Modern Hebrew : /ˈpesaχ/ Pesah, Pesakh, Yiddish : Peysekh, paysakh, Paysokh ) is an important Biblically -derived Jewish पर्व.
historically, together with Shavuot ( `` Pentecost '' ) and Sukkot ( `` Tabernacles '' ), Passover is one of the three pilgrimage festivals ( Shalosh Regalim ) during which the entire जनसांख्यिकी of the kingdom of Judah made a pilgrimage to the Temple in Jerusalem.
Samaritans still make this pilgrimage to Mount gerizim, but only men participate in public worship.
Passover commences on the 15th of the Hebrew month of Nisan and lasts for either seven days ( in Israel ) or eight days ( in the diaspora ).
In Judaism, a day commences at dusk और lasts until the following dusk, यूँ the first day of Passover only begins after dusk of the 14th of Nisan and ends at dusk of the 15th दिन of the month of Nisan.
The rituals unique to the Passover celebrations commence with the Passover seder when the 15th of Nisan रै begun.
in the उत्तरी Hemisphere Passover takes place in spring as the Torah prescribes it : `` in the month of [ the ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ).
It is one of the सबसे widely observed Jewish holidays.
The यहूदी people celebrate Passover as a commemoration of their liberation over 3,300 years ago by God from slavery in ancient Egypt that was ruled by the Pharaohs, and their birth as a nation under the नेतृत्व of Moses.
It commemorates the story of the Exodus as described in the यहूदी Bible especially in the Book of exodus, in जिससे the Israelites were freed इससे slavery in Egypt.
In the narrative of the Exodus, the Bible tells that God helped the Children of Israel escape from their slavery in Egypt by inflicting ten plagues upon the ancient Egyptians पहले the Pharaoh would release उसके Israelite slaves ; the दसवाँ and worst of the plagues थी the death of the Egyptian first-born.
The Israelites were instructed to चिह्नित the doorposts of their homes with the blood of a slaughtered spring lamb and, upon seeing this, the spirit of the Lord knew to pass over the first-born in these homes, hence the name of the अवकाश.
There is some debate over where the term is दरअसल derived from.
When the Pharaoh freed the Israelites, it is said that वे left in such a hurry कि they could not wait for bread dough to rise ( leaven ).
In commemoration, for the duration of Passover no leavened bread is eaten, for which reason it is called `` The Festival of the Unleavened Bread ''.
Thus Matzo ( flat unleavened bread ) is eaten during Passover and it is a symbol of the holiday.
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ), officially designated 1P/Halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from धरती every 75–76 सालो.
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the naked eye इससे धरती, and thus the only naked-eye धूमकेतु कि might appear twice in a human lifetime.
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter और more spectacular, but will appear only once in हज़ारों of years.
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System have been observed and recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese, Babylonian, and medieval European chroniclers, but were not recognized as reappearances of the same object at the time.
The comet 's periodicity थी first determined in 1705 by English astronomer Edmond Halley, after whom it is now नामित.
Halley 's धूमकेतु last appeared in the inner Solar System in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, हैली became the first धूमकेतु to be observed in detail by spacecraft, providing the first observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation.
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction, विशेषकर Fred Whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model, which correctly predicted that Halley होता be रचित of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water, carbon डाइऑक्साइड and ammonia – and dust.
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is now understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile materials, and कि only a small portion of it is icy.
Anti-communism is opposition to communism.
Organized anti-communism developed in reaction to the rise of communism, especially after the 1917 अक्तूबर Revolution in Russia and reaching global dimensions during the Cold War.
Most anti-communists reject the concept of historical materialism, which is a central idea in Marxism.
Anti-communists reject the Marxist belief that capitalism will be followed by socialism and communism, बस as feudalism was followed by capitalism.
Anti-communists question the validity of the Marxist claim that the socialist state will `` wither away '' जब it becomes unnecessary in a true communist society.
Anti-communists argue that the repression in the early years of Bolshevik rule, while not as extreme as that during Joseph स्टालिन 's rule, was still severe by reasonable standards, citing examples ऐसे as फेलिक्स dzerzhinsky 's रहस्य police, which eliminated numerous political opponents by extrajudicial executions, और the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov rebellion.
Some anti-communists refer to दोनो Communism and fascism as totalitarianism, seeing similarity between the actions of communist and fascist governments.
Historian Robert Conquest has argued that Communism was जिम्मेदार for tens of millions of deaths during the 20th century.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों argue that Communist पार्टियों that have आइये to power have tended to be rigidly intolerant of political opposition.
These opponents claim that most Communist countries have shown no signs of advancing from Marx 's socialist stage of अर्थव्यवस्था to an आदर्श communist स्टेज.
Rather, Communist governments have महरूम accused of creating a new ruling class ( a Nomenklatura ), with powers and privileges वृहद than those previously enjoyed by the upper classes in the non- communist regimes.
Gil Heron ( 9 April 1922 – 27 November 2008 ) was a Jamaican professional footballer.
He was the first ब्लैक player to play for Scottish club Celtic, and was the father of poet and musician gil Scott-Heron.
He died in Detroit of a दिल आक्रमण on 27 November 2008.
The soybean ( US ) or soya bean ( UK ) ( Glycine max ) is a प्रजाति of legume देशी to East Asia, widely grown for its खाद्य bean जिससे रै numerous uses.
The plant is classed as an oilseed rather than a pulse by the UN Food and Agricultural Organization ( FAO ).
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean meal is a significant and सस्ती source of protein for animal feeds and many prepackaged meals ; soy vegetable oil is another product of processing the सोयाबीन crop.
For example, soybean products such as textured vegetable protein ( TVP ) are ingredients in many meat and dairy analogues.
Soybeans produce significantly more protein per acre than most other uses of land.
Traditional nonfermented food uses of soybeans शामिल soy milk, and from the latter tofu and tofu skin.
Fermented foods include soy sauce, fermented bean paste, natto, and tempeh, among others.
The oil is प्रयुक्त in many industrial applications.
The main producers of soy are the United States ( 35 % ), Brazil ( 27 % ), Argentina ( 19 % ), China ( 6 % ) and India ( 4 % ).
the beans contain significant amounts of phytic acid, alpha-linolenic acid, and isoflavones.
Harrison Ford ( born जुलाई 13, 1942 ) is an American film actor and producer.
He is famous for his performances as Han Solo in the original Star Wars trilogy and the title character of the Indiana Jones film series.
Ford is also known for his भूमिकाएँ as Rick Deckard in Blade Runner, John Book in Witness and जोकर Ryan in Patriot Games and Clear and उपस्थित Danger.
His career has spanned six decades and includes roles in several Hollywood blockbusters, including presumed Innocent, The Fugitive, Air Force One, and What Lies Beneath.
At one point, four of the शीर्ष six box-office hits of all time included one of his roles.
Five of his films have been inducted into the National Film Registry.
In 1997, Ford was क्रमित No. 1 in Empire `` The Top 100 Movie Stars of All Time '' list.
, the United States domestic box office grosses of Ford 's films total over US $ 3.5 billion, with worldwide grosses surpassing $ 6 billion, making घाट the third highest grossing U.S. domestic box-office स्टार.
Ford is the husband of actress Calista Flockhart.
A tube of ChapStick
ChapStick is a ब्रांड name लिये lip balm manufactured by Pfizer Consumer Healthcare and used in many countries worldwide.
It is intended to help दावत and prevent chapped lips ; hence the name.
अनेक varieties also include sunscreen in अनुक्रम to prevent sunburn.
Due to its popularity, the term रै become a genericized trademark.
It popularly refers to any lip balm contained in a lipstick-style tube and applied in the same manner as lipstick.
However, the term is स्टिल a registered trademark, साथ rights exclusively owned by Pfizer.
in स्वीडन and in the United Kingdom, the उत्पाद 's main competitor is Lypsyl, made by Novartis Consumer Health, which is distributed in similar packaging to ChapStick.
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ), also known as Bishop Berkeley ( बिशप of Cloyne ), was an Anglo-Irish philosopher whose primary achievement was the उन्नति of a theory he पुकारा `` immaterialism '' ( later referred to as `` subjective आदर्शवाद `` by others ).
This theory denies the existence of material substance and instead contends that familiar objects like tables and chairs are only ideas in the minds of perceivers, and as a result can not exist without being perceived.
Thus, as Berkeley famously put it, for physical वस्तुएँ `` esse est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be perceived `` ).
Berkeley is also known for his critique of abstraction, an important premise in his argument for immaterialism.
In 1709, बर्कली published his first major कार्य,, in जिससे he discussed the सीमाएं of human vision and advanced the theory that the proper objects of sight are not material objects, but लाइट and colour.
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical work A Treatise Concerning the Principles of Human Knowledge in 1710 which, after its ग़रीब reception, he rewrote in dialogue form and published under the title Three संवाद between Hylas and philonous in 1713.
In this book, Berkeley 's views were represented by Philonous ( Greek : 'lover of mind ' ), जबकि Hylas ( Greek : 'मैटr ' ) embodies the आयरिश thinker’s प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, in particular John locke.
Berkeley argued against Sir Isaac Newton 's doctrine of absolute space, time and motion in de Motu ( on Motion ), published 1721.
His arguments were a precursor to the views of Mach and Einstein.
In 1732, he published Alciphron, a Christian apologetic against the free-thinkers, and in 1734, he published The Analyst, an empiricist critique of the foundations of infinitesimal कलन, which was influential in the development of गणित.
His last major philosophical work, Siris ( 1744 ), begins by advocating the medicinal use of tar water, और then continues to discuss a wide range of topics including science, philosophy, and theology.
ब्याज in Berkeley 's work increased after World War II, because he tackled many of the मुद्दे of paramount interest to philosophy in the 20th century such as the problems of perception, the difference between primary और secondary qualities, and the importance of language.
Qingdao ( ), historically ज्ञात as Tsingtao, is a major city in eastern Shandong province, Eastern China, with a population of over 8.715 million ( 2010 census ).
Its built up क्षेत्रफल, made of 6 urban districts and 4 county-level cities, is home to about 4,896,000 inhabitants in 2010.
It सीमायें Yantai to the northeast, Weifang to the west and rizhao to the southwest.
Qīng ( ) in Chinese means `` green '' or `` lush '', while dǎo ( ) अर्थात् `` island ''.
Qingdao is administered at the sub-provincial level.
Lying across the Shandong Peninsula while looking आउट to the Yellow Sea, Qingdao is a major seaport, naval base, and industrial centre.
It is also the site of the tsingtao Brewery.
The world 's longest समुद्र bridge, the चिंगदाओ Haiwan Bridge, links the main urban area of Qingdao with Huangdao district, straddling the Jiaozhou Bay sea areas.
Qingdao is named China 's most livable city.
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single identified species named acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( APMV ), or is a group of phylogenetically related large viruses ( designated usually MimiN ).
In colloquial speech, APMV is more commonly referred to as just `` mimivirus ''.
Until October 2011, when a larger virus Megavirus chilensis थी described, it had the largest capsid व्यास of all known viruses.
Mimivirus has a large और complex genome compared with most other viruses.
Mimivirus, short for `` mimicking microbe '', is so called to reflect its large आकार and apparent Gram-staining गुण.
The Mexican War of Independence ( 1810–1821 ) was an armed conflict between the people of Mexico and the Spanish colonial authorities which started on सितंबर 16, 1810.
The movement, which became known as the Mexican War of Independence, was led by Mexican-born Spaniards, Mestizos and Amerindians who sought स्वतंत्रता from Spain.
It started as an idealistic peasants ' rebellion against their colonial masters, लकिन ended as an असंभावित alliance between Mexican ex-royalists और Mexican guerrilla insurgents.
Crohn 's disease, also known as Crohn syndrome और क्षेत्रीय enteritis, is a type of inflammatory bowel disease that may affect any part of the जठरांत्र tract from mouth to anus, causing a wide variety of symptoms.
It primarily causes abdominal pain, diarrhea ( जिससे may be bloody if inflammation is at its worst ), उल्टी ( can be continuous ), or weight loss, लकिन may also cause जटिलताओं बाहर the gastrointestinal tract such as skin rashes, arthritis, सूजन of the eye, tiredness, and lack of concentration.
Crohn 's disease is caused by interactions between environmental, immunological and bacterial factors in genetically susceptible individuals.
This results in a chronic inflammatory disorder, in जिससे the body 's immune system attacks the gastrointestinal tract possibly directed at microbial antigens.
Crohn 's disease has wrongly been described as an autoimmune disease in the past ; recent investigators have described it as an immune deficiency state.
There is a genetic association with crohn 's disease, primarily with variations of the NOD2 gene and its protein, जिससे senses bacterial cell walls.
Siblings of प्रभावित individuals are at उच्चतर risk.
Males and females are equally affected.
Smokers are two times अधिक संभावित to develop crohn 's disease than nonsmokers.
Crohn 's disease affects between 400,000 and 600,000 people in North America.
व्यापकता estimates for Northern Europe have ranged from 27–48 per 100,000.
Crohn 's disease tends to present initially in the teens और twenties, with another peak incidence in the fifties to seventies, although the बीमारी can occur at any age.
There is no known pharmaceutical or surgical cure for Crohn 's disease.
Treatment options हैं restricted to controlling symptoms, maintaining remission, and preventing relapse.
The disease was नामित after gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard Crohn, who, in 1932, together with two other colleagues at Mount Sinai Hospital in New York, described a series of patients with inflammation of the terminal ileum, the area most commonly affected by the बीमारी.

The सूची directly includes the tallest buildings and structures for each country, and where appropriate, it also अंक to more detailed country-specific lists.

The population was 963 at the 2010 census.
YouTube is a video-sharing जालस्थल, created by three former PayPal employees in फ़रवरी 2005, on which users can अपलोड, view and share videos.
the company is based in San Bruno, California, and uses Adobe Flash Video and HTML5 technology to display a wide variety of user-generated video सामग्री, including movie क्लिप्स, tv क्लिप्स, और music videos, as well as amateur content such as video blogging, short original videos, and educational videos.
Most of the content on YouTube has महरूम uploaded by individuals, although media corporations including CBS, the BBC, Vevo, Hulu, and अन्य organizations offer some of their material via the site, as part of the YouTube partnership program.
Unregistered users can watch videos, while registered users can upload an unlimited number of videos.
Videos considered to contain potentially offensive content are उपलब्धियाँ only to registered users at least 18 years old.
In November 2006, YouTube, LLC was खरीदा by Google for us $ 1.65 billion, and operates as a subsidiary of google.

it is based on the hit 1992 film comedy of the same name.

Microsoft डाइरेक्टएक्स is a collection of application programming interfaces ( APIs ) for handling tasks सम्बन्धित to multimedia, especially game programming and video, on Microsoft platforms.
Originally, the names of these APIs all began with Direct, such as Direct3D, directdraw, DirectMusic, DirectPlay, directsound, and so forth.
The नाम DirectX was coined as आशुलिपि term for सब of these api ( the X standing in लिये the particular api names ) and soon became the name of the collection.
When Microsoft बाद set out to develop a gaming console, the X was used as the basis of the name Xbox to indicate that the console was based on DirectX technology.
The X initial has been carried forward in the naming of APIs designed for the Xbox ऐसे as XInput and the Cross-platform Audio Creation Tool ( XACT ), while the DirectX pattern has been continued लिये Windows APIs such as Direct2D और DirectWrite.
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics API within DirectX ) is widely used in the development of video games for Microsoft Windows, Microsoft Xbox, Microsoft Xbox 360 and some Sega Dreamcast games.
Direct3D is also used by other software applications for visualization and graphics tasks such as CAD/CAM engineering.
As Direct3D is the most widely publicized घटक of DirectX, it is common to see the names `` डाइरेक्टएक्स '' and `` Direct3D '' used interchangeably.
The डाइरेक्टएक्स software development kit ( sdk ) consists of runtime libraries in redistributable शब्दकोष रूप, along with accompanying documentation and headers for use in coding.
Originally, the runtimes were only installed by games or explicitly by the user.
Windows 95 किया not लॉन्च with DirectX, but DirectX थी included with Windows 95 OEM Service Release 2.
Windows 98 and खिड़कियाँ NT 4.0 both shipped with DirectX, as रै every version of खिड़कियाँ released since.
The SDK is उपलब्धियाँ as a free डाउनलोड.
While the runtimes are proprietary, closed-source software, source code is provided for most of the SDK samples.
Starting with the release of Windows 8 डेवलपर Preview, DirectX sdk has been एकीकृत into Windows SDK.
Direct3D 9Ex, Direct3D 10, and Direct3D 11 are only available for Windows Vista and newer because each of these new versions थी built to depend upon the new Windows Display Driver Model that was introduced for Windows Vista.
the new vista/wddm graphics architecture includes a new video memory manager supporting virtualization of graphics hardware for various applications and services like the Desktop Window Manager.
Quetzaltenango, also commonly ज्ञात by its indigenous name, Xelajú, or more commonly, Xela, is the second largest city of Guatemala.
it is दोनो the capital of Quetzaltenango Department and the municipal seat of quetzaltenango municipality.
It has an estimated population of 224,703.
the जनसांख्यिकी is परिचय 61 % स्वदेशी or amerindian, 34 % Mestizo or ladino and 5 % European.
Quetzaltenango is स्तिथ in a mountain valley at an उन्नयन of 2,330 meters ( 7,655 ft ) above sea level at its lowest part.
it may reach above 2,400 meters within the city.
the Municipality of Quetzaltenango consists of an क्षेत्रफल of.
Municipalities abutting the municipality of Quetzaltenango include : Salcajá, Cantel, Almolonga, Zunil, El Palmar, Concepción chiquirichapa, San Mateo, La Esperanza, Olintepeque, and San Andrés Xecul.
All these municipalities हैं part of the Department of Quetzaltenango, except San Andrés Xecul which is a part of the Department of Totonicapán.
The एपिक of Gilgamesh, an epic poem इससे Mesopotamia, is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature.
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins with five independent Sumerian poems about 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ), king of Uruk.
Four of these were used as source material for a combined epic in Akkadian.
This first combined epic, known as the `` Old Babylonian '' version, तिथियाँ to the 18th century BC और is titled after its incipit, Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ).
तभी a few fragments of it have survived.
The later `` मानक Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th centuries BC and bears the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ).
Fragments of approximately two thirds of this longer, twelve-tablet version have महरूम recovered.
Some of the best copies were discovered in the library ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king ashurbanipal.
The story centers on a friendship between Gilgamesh and Enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man created by the देवताओं as Gilgamesh 's equal to distract him from oppressing the people of Uruk.
Together, they journey to the Cedar Mountain to defeat Humbaba, its monstrous guardian.
Later they kill the सांड of Heaven, which the goddess Ishtar sends to punish Gilgamesh for spurning उसके advances.
as a punishment for these actions, the gods वाक्य enkidu to death.
The second half of the epic focuses on Gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's death, and his quest for immortality.
In order to learn the रहस्य of eternal जीवन, Gilgamesh undertakes a long and perilous journey.
He learns that `` The life that you are seeking you will never ढूँढें.
When the gods created man they allotted to him death, but जीवन they retained in their own keeping. ''
This quote थी originally attributed to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the epic, and तब attributed to the immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in the Akkadian संस्करण of the epic.
Nevertheless, Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after his death, because of उसके great building projects, and his account of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood.
The story has been translated into many different languages, and Gilgamesh has since become adapted in works of popular fiction.
There are numerous debates over who निर्मित the first video game, साथ the answer depending largely on how video games हैं defined.
The एवोल्यूशन of video games represents a tangled web of several different industries, including scientific, computer, arcade, and consumer electronics.
the `` वीडियो '' in `` video game `` traditionally refers to a raster display device.
With the popular catch phrase use of the term `` video game '', the term now implies all display types, formats, and platforms.
Historians have also sought to bypass the issue by instead using the more specific `` digital games '' वर्णनात्मक.
This term leaves out the earlier analog-based computer games.

Unless otherwise stated, संख्याएँ indicate विश्वव्यापी units sold, ordered alphabetically whenever two or more list the same amount.
The exception are the ones specifying shipments, which have lower precedence than others listing sales.
Franchise sales शामिल expansion पैक even हालांकि they are not considered full video games.
For best-selling individual video games, see List of best-selling वीडियो games.
the sales figures given below do not include arcade game sales, which can be found at सूची of highest-grossing arcade video games.

This does not necessarily apply लिये series that are not video game-based.
Dorothy Ann विलिस Richards ( September 1, 1933 – September 13, 2006 ) was an American politician और the 45th Governor of टेक्सास.
She first came to national attention as the state treasurer of Texas, when she delivered the keynote address at the 1988 Democratic National Convention.
Richards परोसा as the 45th Governor of टेक्सास from 1991 to 1995 and was defeated for re-election in 1994 by George W. Bush.
Ann Richards थी the second female governor of Texas.
Data Execution Prevention ( DEP ) is a security विशेषता included in modern operating systems.
It is ज्ञात to be available in Linux, Mac OS X, आईओएस, Microsoft Windows and Android operating प्रणालियों and is intended to prevent an application or service from executing code from a non-executable memory region.
This helps prevent certain exploits that store code via a buffer overflow, for example.
DEP runs in two modes : hardware-enforced DEP लिये CPUs that can mark memory pages as nonexecutable, and software-enforced DEP with सीमित protection for CPUs that do not have hardware support.
Software-enforced DEP does not protect against निष्पादन of code in data pages, लकिन instead counters SEH overwrite, another type of attack.
DEP was introduced on Linux in 2004 ( kernel 2.6.8 ), on Windows in 2004 with Windows XP Service Pack 2, while Apple introduced DEP when they moved to x86 in 2006.
Example illustration of two common futanari variants
, is the Japanese word for hermaphroditism, which is also used in a broader sense for androgyny.
परे Japan the term is used to describe a commonly pornographic genre of computer games, comics and animations, which includes characters that show both primary sexual characteristics.
But in today 's language it refers almost exclusively for characters who have an overall feminine appearance.
in that case the term is also often abbreviated as futa ( s ), which is occasionally also प्रयुक्त as term for the works itself.
Early CAPTCHAs such as these, generated by the EZ-Gimpy कार्यक्रम, यहूद used on Yahoo !
A modern CAPTCHA, rather than attempting to create a distorted background and high levels of warping on the text, might फ़ोकस on बनाना segmentation difficult by adding an angled line.
another way to make segmentation difficult is to crowd symbols together, as in Yahoo ! 's current CAPTCHA format.
Some CAPTCHAs try to utilize the ability of people to see three-dimensional objects.
On this image, symbols are drawn with lines of different मोटाई to make an effect of extrusion.
a captcha ( ) is a type of challenge-response test used in computing as an attempt to ensure कि the response is generated by a human being.
The process usually involves a computer asking a user to complete a सरल test which the computer is able to grade.
These tests are designed to be easy for a computer to generate but difficult for a computer to solve, but again easy for a human.
If a correct समाधान is received, it can be presumed to have been entered by a human.
A common type of CAPTCHA requires the user to type letters and/or digits from a distorted image that appears on the screen.
Such tests are commonly used to prevent unwanted internet bots from accessing websites, चूंकि a normal human can easily read a CAPTCHA, while the bot can not process the image letters and therefore, can not answer properly, or at all.
Although most CAPTCHAs are letter pictures randomly generated, many of them have become difficult भी for a human to read, so picture CAPTCHAs were created in जिससे a human is shown a simple test to show a picture of a certain animal ( given few एनिमल pictures ), जिससे is simple for a human being to process, and therefore आसान to pick, जबकि a bot can not process and solve the question because although it can analyze the picture, it can not easily guess the animal.
The term `` CAPTCHA '' was coined in 2000 by Luis von ahn, Manuel Blum, Nicholas J. Hopper, and John Langford ( all of Carnegie Mellon University ).
It is an acronym based on the word `` capture '' and standing for `` Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart ''.
Carnegie Mellon University attempted to trademark the term on 15 October 2004, but the trademark application was abandoned on 21 अप्रैल 2008.
a CAPTCHA is sometimes described as a reverse Turing test, because it is administered by a machine and targeted at a human, in contrast to the standard Turing परीक्षण कि is typically administered by a human and targeted at a machine.
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly ज्ञात in English as Jacques cousteau ; 11 June 1910 – 25 June 1997 ) was a French naval officer, explorer, conservationist, फिल्मकार, innovator, scientist, photographer, author and researcher who studied the sea and all फ़ॉर्म of life in water.
He co-developed the aqua-lung, pioneered marine conservation and was a member of the Académie française.
KFC ( केंटकी Fried Chicken ) is a fast food restaurant chain headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky, United States, जिससे specializes in fried chicken.
An `` American icon '', it is the world 's second largest restaurant chain overall ( as measured by sales ) after McDonald 's, with over 18,000 outlets in 120 देशों and territories.
The company is a subsidiary of Yum !
Brands, a restaurant company which also owns Pizza Hut and Taco Bell.
KFC was founded by Harland Sanders, who began selling fried chicken from his roadside restaurant in Corbin, Kentucky during the Great Depression.
सैंडर्स was one of the first people to see the potential of the restaurant franchising concept, with the first `` Kentucky Fried Chicken '' franchise opening in Utah in 1952.
The franchise popularized chicken in the fast खाना industry, thereby diversifying the market and challenging the dominance of the hamburger.
Marketing himself as `` Colonel सैंडर्स '', he became a legendary figure of American cultural history, and his image is still prominently used in KFC ब्रांडिंग.
The company 's rapid expansion saw it grow too large for Sanders to manage, and in 1964 he sold the company to a group of investors led by John Y. Brown, Jr. and Jack Massey.
KFC was one of the first तेज़ खाना chains to expand internationally, opening outlets in England, Mexico and Puerto Rico by the mid-1960s.
Throughout the 1970s and 1980s, KFC experienced mixed सौभाग्य domestically, as it went through a series of corporate owners who had little or no experience in the restaurant business.
In the early 1970s, KFC थी बेची to the spirits firm Heublein, who were taken over by the R.J. Reynolds food and tobacco conglomerate, who sold the chain to PepsiCo.
The chain continued to expand overseas however, and in 1987 KFC became the first Western restaurant chain to open in China.
The chain रै since expanded rapidly in China, and the देश is now the company 's most लाभप्रद market.
पेप्सिको spun off इसके रेस्तरां division as Tricon Global Restaurants, which later changed its नाम to Yum !
Brands.
KFC primarily sells fried मुर्गा pieces और variations such as chicken sandwiches and wraps, salads and side dishes such as फ्रेंच fries and coleslaw, desserts and soft drinks, often supplied by PepsiCo.
Its सबसे famous product is pressure fried chicken pieces, seasoned with Sanders ' `` Original Recipe '' of 11 herbs and spices.
The सटीक प्रकृति of these ingredients is अनजान, and represents a notable trade secret.
Larger portions of fried chicken are परोसा in a distinctive cardboard `` bucket '', which has become a signature of the chain since being introduced by वाल Pete Harman.
केएफसी is famous for the slogan `` finger lickin ' good '', जिससे रै since been replaced by `` Nobody does chicken like KFC '' and `` So good ''.
निडारिया ( with a silent c ) or Coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 प्रजाति of animals found exclusively in aquatic and mostly marine environments.
Their distinguishing विशेषता is cnidocytes, specialized cells that they use mainly for capturing prey.
Their bodies consist of mesoglea, a non-living jelly-like substance, sandwiched between two layers of epithelium that are ज़्यादातर एक cell thick.
They have two basic body forms : swimming medusae and sessile polyps, both of which हैं radially symmetrical with mouths surrounded by tentacles that bear cnidocytes.
Both forms have a single orifice and body गुहा that are used for digestion और respiration.
Many cnidarian species produce colonies that are single organisms composed of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids, or both.
Cnidarians ' activities हैं coordinated by a decentralized nerve net and simple receptors.
Several free-swimming cubozoa and Scyphozoa possess balance-sensing statocysts, and some have simple eyes.
Not all cnidarians reproduce sexually.
अनेक have complex lifecycles with asexual polyp stages and sexual medusae, but some omit either the polyp or the medusa stage.
Cnidarians were for a long time grouped with Ctenophores in the phylum Coelenterata, but increasing awareness of their differences caused them to be placed in separate phyla.
Cnidarians are classified into four main groups : the लगभग wholly sessile Anthozoa ( sea anemones, corals, sea pens ) ; swimming Scyphozoa ( जेलीफ़िश ) ; Cubozoa ( box jellies ) ; and Hydrozoa, a विविध group that शामिल all the freshwater cnidarians as well as many marine forms, और has both sessile members such as Hydra और औपनिवेशिक swimmers such as the Portuguese Man o ' War.
Staurozoa have recently been recognised as a class in their अपना right rather than a sub-group of scyphozoa, and there is बहस about whether Myxozoa and Polypodiozoa are cnidarians or closer to bilaterians ( अधिक complex animals ).
Most cnidarians prey on organisms ranging in size from plankton to animals several टाइम्स larger than themselves, but many obtain much of their nutrition from endosymbiotic algae, and a few are parasites.
Many are preyed upon by other animals including starfish, sea slugs, fish and turtles.
मूँगा reefs, whose polyps are rich in endosymbiotic algae, support कुछ of the world 's सबसे productive ecosystems, और protect vegetation in tidal zones and on shorelines from strong currents and tides.
While corals are लगभग entirely restricted to warm, shallow marine waters, other cnidarians live in the depths, in polar seas and in freshwater.
Fossil cnidarians have been found in rocks formed about, and other जीवाश्मों दिखाएँ that corals may have been present shortly before and diversified a few million years later.
Fossils of cnidarians that do not build mineralized structures are very rare.
Scientists currently सोचो that cnidarians, ctenophores and bilaterians हैं more closely related to calcareous sponges than these are to other sponges, and that anthozoans are the evolutionary `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of other cnidarians, and the most closely related to bilaterians.
Recent analyses have concluded that cnidarians, although considered more `` primitive '' than bilaterians, have a wider range of genes.
