it is based on the 2001 novel The Dark Fields by एलन Glynn with the screenplay by Leslie Dixon.
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United राज्य, situated in the northwest extremity of the North American continent, with the international boundary with Canada to the east, the Arctic Ocean to the north, and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south, with Russia further west across the बेरिंग Strait.
Alaska is the largest state in the United States by area, the 4th least populous and the least densely populated of the 50 United States.
Approximately half of अलास्का 's 731,449 residents live within the Anchorage metropolitan area.
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil, natural gas, and fishing उद्योग ; it has ये resources in abundance.
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30, 1867, लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ adjusted for inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The land went through several administrative changes पहले becoming an व्यवस्थित ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11, 1912, and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3, 1959.
The नाम `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period, when it was used only for the peninsula and is derived from the Aleut alaxsxaq, meaning `` the mainland '' or, more literally, `` the ऑब्जेक्ट towards जिससे the action of the sea is directed ''.
It is also known as Alyeska, the `` great land '', an Aleut word derived from the same रूट.
Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University ( NMMU ) is a South African tertiary education institution with its main administration in the coastal city of Port Elizabeth.
A merging of three संस्थानों founded nmmu in January 2005 but its history तिथियाँ back to 1882 with the foundation of Port Elizabeth Art School.
The University draws international students from all over the world.
There are over 3000 अंतरराष्ट्रीय students and include students from the संयुक्त States, France, China, Germany, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom and many other countries.
NMMU is a comprehensive university offering professional and vocational training.
The University रै six campuses - five in Port Elizabeth and one in George.
The main campus is the South Campus.
Students at nmmu can study towards diplomas and degrees up to and including doctoral level qualifications.
A number of courses include workplace experience as part of the curriculum.
CoverGirl is an अमरीकी cosmetics brand founded in Maryland, by the Noxzema रासायनिक Company ( later पुकारा Noxell ) and acquired by Procter & Gamble in 1989.
The noxell Company advertised this cosmetics लकीर by allowing `` cover girls '', fashion models who appear on the front cover of women 's magazines, to wear इसके products.
CoverGirl makes up for lack of direct individual customer service by providing a wide variety of cosmetics available at reasonable prices.
On the Origin of Species, published on 24 November 1859, is a work of scientific literature by Charles Darwin which is considered to be the न्यास of evolutionary biology.
Its full title was on the Origin of Species by Means of Natural Selection, or the Preservation of Favoured Races in the Struggle for Life.
For the sixth edition of 1872, the short title was changed to The Origin of Species.
Darwin 's book introduced the scientific theory that populations evolve over the course of generations through a process of natural selection.
It presented a body of प्रमाण that the diversity of life arose by common descent through a branching pattern of evolution.
Darwin included evidence that he had gathered on the beagle expedition in the 1830s and his subsequent findings from research, correspondence, and experimentation.
Various evolutionary ideas had already been प्रस्तावित to explain new findings in biology.
There was growing support for such ideas among dissident anatomists और the general पब्लिक, but during the first half of the 19th century the English scientific establishment was closely tied to the गिरिजाघर of England, while विज्ञान was भाग of प्राकृतिक theology.
Ideas about the transmutation of प्रजाति were controversial as they conflicted with the beliefs that species were unchanging parts of a designed hierarchy and that humans were unique, unrelated to other animals.
The political and theological implications were intensely debated, but transmutation was not accepted by the scientific mainstream.
The book was written for non-specialist readers and attracted widespread interest upon its प्रकाशन.
As Darwin was an eminent scientist, his findings were taken seriously and the evidence he presented generated scientific, philosophical, and religious discussion.
the बहस over the book contributed to the campaign by T.H. Huxley and his fellow members of the X Club to secularise science by promoting scientific naturalism.
Within two decades there was widespread scientific agreement that evolution, with a branching पैटर्न of common descent, had occurred, but scientists were slow to give natural selection the significance that Darwin thought appropriate.
During the `` eclipse of Darwinism `` from the 1880s to the 1930s, various other mechanisms of evolution were given more credit.
With the development of the modern evolutionary synthesis in the 1930s and 1940s, Darwin 's concept of evolutionary adaptation through natural selection became central to modern evolutionary theory, now the unifying concept of the life sciences.
Charles Dillon `` Casey '' Stengel ( ; July 30, 1890 – September 29, 1975 ), nicknamed `` The Old Perfessor '', was an American Major लीग Baseball outfielder and manager.
He was elected to the बेसबॉल Hall of Fame in.
स्टेंगल was born in Kansas City, Missouri, और originally nicknamed `` Dutch '', a common nickname at that time for Americans of German ancestry.
After his major league career began, he acquired the nickname `` Casey '', which originally came इससे the initials of his hometown ( `` K. C. '' ), which evolved into `` Casey '', influenced by the wide popularity of the poem Casey at the Bat.
In the 1950s, sportswriters dubbed him with yet another nickname, `` The Old Professor '' ( or `` Perfessor '' ), for his sharp wit and his ability to talk at length on anything baseball -related.
Although his baseball career spanned a number of teams और cities, he is primarily associated with clubs in New York City.
Between playing and managing, he is the only man to have worn four of New York 's प्रमुख league clubs ' uniforms.
He was the first of four men ( through the season ) to manage both the New York यांकीज़ and New York Mets ; Yogi Berra, Dallas Green, and Joe टोरेस are the अन्य.
Like Torre, he also managed the Braves and the Dodgers.
He ended his baseball career as the beloved manager for the then विस्तार New York Mets, which won over the hearts of New York partly due to the unique character of their दिग्गज leader.
June ( ) is the sixth month of the year in the Julian and Gregorian calendars और one of the चार months with a length of 30 days.
Ovid provides two etymologies for June 's name in his कविता concerning the months entitled the Fasti.
The first is that the month is named after the Roman goddess Juno, wife of Jupiter and equivalent to the Greek goddess Hera ; the second is that the name comes from the Latin word iuniores, meaning `` younger ones, '' as opposed to maiores ( `` elders '' ) for which the preceding माह May may be नामित ( Fasti vi.1–88 ).
देखिए : Months in various calendars also called the season of the June is the माह with the longest daylight hours of the year in the Northern Hemisphere and the shortest daylight hours of the year in the Southern Hemisphere.
June in the Northern Hemisphere is the seasonal equivalent to December in the Southern Hemisphere and vice versa.
in the Northern hemisphere, the beginning of the meteorological summer is 1 June.
In the Southern गोलार्ध, the beginning of the meteorological शीत is 1 June.
At the start of June, the sun rises in the constellation of Taurus ; at the end of June, the sun rises in the constellation of Gemini.
However, due to the precession of the equinoxes, June begins with the sun in the astrological sign of Gemini, and ends with the sun in the astrological sign of Cancer.
June is ज्ञात for the large number of marriages that occur over the course of the month.
according to one etymology, June is named after Juno ( Hera ).
Juno was the goddess of marriage and a married couple 's household, so some consider it good luck to be married in this month.
According to another etymology provided by the Roman कवि Ovid, June is named for the iuniores, latin for `` young people '' ( Fasti VI.88 ) and that the month of may is named for the maiores, Latin for `` elders ''.
In Iceland, folklore says that if you bathe naked in the morning dew on the morning of June 24, you are supposed to keep aging at bay for longer.
A constitution is a नियत of आधारभूत principles or established precedents according to which a state or other organization is governed.
These rules together मेक up, i.e. constitute, what the एंटिटी is.
When these principles are written down into a single document or set of legal documents, those documents may be said to embody a लिखा constitution ; if they are लिखा down in a single comprehensive दस्तावेज़, it is said to embody a codified constitution.
Constitutions concern different levels of organizations, इससे sovereign states to companies and unincorporated associations.
A treaty which establishes an international संगठन is also इसके constitution, in that it would define कैसा that organization is constituted.
Within states, whether sovereign or federated, a constitution defines the principles upon which the state is based, the procedure in which laws are made and by whom.
Some constitutions, विशेषकर codified constitutions, also act as limiters of राज्य power, by establishing lines which a state 's rulers can not cross, such as fundamental rights.
George Washington at Constitutional Convention of 1787, signing of U.S. Constitution.
The Constitution of India is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world, containing 448 articles, 12 schedules and 100 amendments, with 117,369 words in its English language version, while the United States Constitution is the shortest written constitution, at 7 आलेख and 27 amendments.
Ron Diftler ( left ), NASA Robonaut manager assisting in a Robonaut familiarization training session in the स्पेस Environment Simulation प्रयोगशाला at NASA 's Johnson Space Center.
Engineering management is a specialized form of management that is concerned with the application of engineering principles to business practice.
Engineering management is a career that brings together the technological problem-solving savvy of engineering and the organizational, administrative, and planning abilities of management in order to oversee complex enterprises from conception to पूर्णता.
Example क्षेत्रों of engineering are product development, निर्माण, construction, design engineering, industrial engineering, technology, production, or any other field that employs personnel who perform an engineering function.
कामयाब engineering managers typically require training and अनुभव in कारोबार and engineering.
Technically inept managers tend to be deprived of support by उनके technical team, and non-commercial managers tend to कमी commercial acumen to deliver in a market economy.
Largely, engineering managers manage engineers who are driven by non-entrepreneurial thinking, thus require the necessary people skills to coach, mentor and motivate technical professionals.
Engineering professionals joining manufacturing companies sometimes become engineering managers by default बाद a period of time.
वे are required to learn how to manage once they are on the job, though this is usually an ineffective way to develop managerial abilities.
In an insurance policy, the deductible is the amount of expenses that must be paid out of pocket before an insurer will pay any expenses.
In general usage, the term deductible may be used to describe one of several types of clauses ( see below ) that are used by insurance companies as a threshold for policy payments.
Deductibles are typically used to deter the large number of trivial claims that a consumer can be reasonably expected to bear the cost of.
By restricting its coverage to events that are significant enough to incur large costs, the insurance firm expects to pay out slightly smaller amounts much less अक्सर, रूष्ट much higher savings.
As a result, insurance premiums are typically cheaper when वे involve higher deductibles.
Deductibles are normally provided as clauses in an insurance policy that dictate how much of an insurance-covered expense is borne by the policyholder.
They are सामान्यतः quoted as a fixed quantity and is a part of most policies covering losses to the policy holder.
The insurer then becomes liable for claimable expenses कि exceed this amount ( subject to the maximum sum claimable indicated in the contract ).
Depending on the policy, the deductible may apply per covered incident, or per year.
For policies where incidences are not easy to delimit ( for example health insurance ), the deductible is typically applied per year.
Several deductibles can be set by the insurer based on the cause of the अर्जी.
For example, a single आवास insurance policy may contain multiple deductible amounts for loss or क्षति arising from theft, fire, natural calamities, evacuation etc.
There are also deductible reimbursement programs that reimburse a deductible in the event of an auto, home, boat/yacht or health insurance claim.
An चालान or bill is a commercial document issued by a विक्रेता to a buyer, indicating the उत्पाद, quantities, and agreed prices for products or services the seller has provided the buyer.
an invoice indicates the sale transaction only.
Payment terms are independent of the invoice and are negotiated by the buyer and the seller.
Payment terms are प्रायः included on the invoice.
The buyer could have already paid for the products or services listed on the invoice.
Buyer can also have a maximum number of days in which to pay for these goods and is sometimes offered a छूट if paid before the due date.
In the rental उद्योग, an invoice जरूर include a specific reference to the duration of the time होने billed, so in addition to quantity, price and discount the invoicing amount is also based on duration.
Generally each line of a rental invoice will refer to the actual घंटों, days, weeks, months, etc., being billed.
From the point of view of a seller, an invoice is a sales invoice.
From the point of view of a खरीदार, an invoice is a purchase invoice.
The document indicates the buyer and seller, but the term invoice indicates money is owed or owing.
In English, the context of the term चालान is usually used to clarify its meaning, such as `` We sent them an invoice '' ( they owe us money ) or `` We received an invoice from them '' ( we owe them money ).
the right main bronchus ( or right primary bronchus, or right principal bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory system.
It is wider, shorter, and अधिक vertical in direction than the left.
It is about 2.5 cm long, and enters the right lung nearly opposite the fifth thoracic vertebra.
The azygos रग arches over it from behind ; and the right pulmonary artery lies at first below and then in front of it.
About 2 cm from its commencement it gives off a branch to the upper lobe of the right lung.
This is termed the eparterial branch of the bronchus, क्युकी it arises above the right pulmonary artery.
the bronchus now passes नीचे the artery, and is known as the hyparterial branch ; it divides into two branches for the middle और lower lobes.
If a foreign body in the airway गुजरता through the trachea, it will most likely enter the right main bronchus instead of the left, due to the straighter alignment of the सही bronchus to the trachea.
Squash is a racquet sport played by two ( singles ) or चार players ( doubles ) in a four-walled court with a small, hollow rubber ball.
The players must alternate in striking the ball with their racquet and hit the ball onto the playable surfaces of the four दीवारें of the court.
The game थी formerly called squash racquets, a reference to the `` squashable '' soft ball used in the game ( compared with the fatter ball used in its parent game racquets or rackets ).
Squash is recognized by the ioc and supporters are lobbying for its incorporation in a future Olympic program.
In 2003, Forbes rated squash as the क्रमांक one healthiest sport to play.
Residual oil is oil found in low concentrations naturally or in exhausted oil fields.
Often mixed with water, it can not be recovered by conventional techniques.
However, it can be recovered using carbon dioxide-enhanced oil recovery ( CO2 eor ) which involves injecting carbon dioxide into the well reducing viscosity and enhancing flow of the oil.
The technique is not new but रै not been used extensively on residual oil zones, low-grade deposits of petroleum such as the 38 square miles in the Permian Basin of Texas leased by elliott Roosevelt Jr.
The technique is limited by availability of carbon dioxide.
It does not result in sequestration of the carbon dioxide लकिन the gas is recycled as much as possible.
United States reserves of residual oil are estimated to be 100 billion barrels.
Artist 's rendering of the fire, by जॉन R. Chapin, originally printed in Harper 's Weekly ; the दृश्य faces northeast across the randolph Street सेतु.
The Great Chicago Fire was a conflagration that burned इससे Sunday, October 8, to early मंगलवार, October 10, 1871, killing hundreds and destroying about in Chicago, इलिनोइस.
Though the fire was one of the largest U.S. disasters of the 19th century, the rebuilding that began helped develop Chicago as one of the सबसे populous and economically important American cities.
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28 January 1547 ) was king of England from 21 April 1509 until his death.
He was lord, and later king, of Ireland, as well as continuing the नाममात्र claim by the अंग्रेज़ी monarchs to the Kingdom of France.
Henry थी the second monarch of the Tudor dynasty, succeeding his father, Henry सात.
Besides his six marriages, हेनरी VIII is known for his role in the separation of the Church of England from the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the separation of the Church of England इससे papal authority, the Dissolution of the Monasteries, and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England.
Yet he remained a believer in core Catholic theological teachings, even after his excommunication इससे the रोमन Catholic Church.
Henry oversaw the विधिक union of England और Wales with the Laws in Wales Acts 1535 and 1542.
In 1513, the new king allied with the Holy Roman Emperor, Maximillian I, and invaded France in 1513 with a large, well-equipped army, but achieved little at a considerable financial cost.
Maximillian, for his part, used the English invasion to his own ends, and this prejudiced England 's ability to defeat the French.
This foray would prove the प्रारंभ of an obsession for Henry, who invaded again in 1544.
This समय, Henry 's forces captured the important city of Boulogne, but again the Holy रोमन Emperor, Charles V, supported Henry only as long as he needed to and इंग्लैण्ड, strained by the enormous cost of the war, ransomed the city back for peace.
His contemporaries माना Henry in his prime to be an attractive, educated and accomplished king, and he has been described as `` one of the most charismatic rulers to sit on the English throne ''.
Besides ruling with absolute power, he also engaged himself as an लेखक and composer.
His ख्वाहिश to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal वैनिटी and partly because he believed a बेटी would be unable to consolidate the Tudor dynasty and the fragile peace that existed following the Wars of the Roses – led to the दो things for which Henry is most remembered : his six marriages and the English Reformation.
Henry became morbidly obese and his health suffered, contributing to his मौत in 1547.
He is frequently characterised in his later जीवन as a lustful, egotistical, harsh, and insecure king.
la Reina del Sur ( the Queen of the South ) is a Spanish-language telenovela produced by the संयुक्त States television संजाल telemundo, in conjunction with the एंटेना 3 network and RTI Producciones.
Based on a novel of the same name by Spanish author Arturo Pérez-Reverte, the नाटक depicts the rise of Teresa Mendoza ( Kate del Castillo ), a young woman from मैक्सिको who becomes the most powerful drug trafficker in दक्षिणी Spain.
Patricio Wills, the president of Telemundo Television Studios, was the executive producer.
Though la Reina del Sur was मनोनीत for Novela of the Year, Favorite Lead Actress, and Best Bad Luck Video, it जीती no awards.
With a $ 10 लाख budget, la Reina del Sur was the सबसे expensive telenovela ever produced by Telemundo.
The program 's premiere on February 28, 2011, was the network 's highest रेटेड premiere for a telenovela to date.
The program frequently dominated its time slot, even over English language programming on other major U.S. networks.
La Reina del Sur completed its 63 episode run on Telemundo and its 13 episode run on Antena 3 simultaneously on May 30, 2011.
The final episode थी the highest rated broadcast in Telemundo 's 19-year history ( 4.2 million viewers ), and beat all of the English language U.S. television networks to earn the number one slot in the 18-49 adult demographic.
The कार्यक्रम 's success spurred Telemundo to launch its first campaign to लाभ the श्रेणी an Emmy Award nomination.
A one-night special featuring several cast members aired on May 31, 2011, and marked the Telemundo debut of noted Latina television personality Cristina Saralegui.
La Reina del Sur is ब्रॉडकास्ट in several other markets, including सर्बिया, Colombia, चिली, Cyprus, Nicaragua, Costa Rica, Mexico, Albania, Hungary, Slovenia, क्रोएशिया, Romania, ( among others ).
an example of rack mounted servers
A web hosting service is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals and संगठन to make उनके website accessible via the संसार चौड़ी वेब.
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased for use by clients, as खूब as providing Internet connectivity, typically in a data center.
Web hosts can also provide data center स्पेस and connectivity to the Internet for other servers located in their data center, called colocation, also ज्ञात as Housing in Latin America or France.
The पैमाना of web hosting services varies greatly.
The सबसे basic is web पेज and small-scale संचिका hosting, where files can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface.
The files are usually delivered to the वेब `` as is '' or with minimal processing.
Many Internet service providers ( ISPs ) offer this सेवा free to subscribers.
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web page hosting from alternative service providers.
निजी web site hosting is typically free, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site hosting often has a higher expense depending upon the size and type of the website.
Single पेज hosting is generally sufficient for personal web पृष्ठों.
A complex site काल्स for a more व्यापक package that provides database support and application development प्लेटफ़ॉर्म ( e.g. PHP, Java, Ruby on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
These facilities allow customers to write or install scripts for applications जैसे forums and content management.
Also, Secure Sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically used for e-commerce.
The host may also provide an interface or control फलक for managing the Web server and installing scripts, as खूब as other modules and service applications like e-mail.
Some hosts specialize in certain software or services ( e.g. e-commerce ), जिससे are commonly used by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure.
मैडेन एनएफएल ( known as John Madden Football before 1993 ) is an American football video game series developed by Electronic Arts Tiburon for EA Sports.
The game series is named after Pro Football Hall of Famer John Madden, a well-known former Super Bowl –winning coach of the Oakland Raiders and color commentator.
The series is the best selling EA Sports series.
The games have consistently been a बेहतरीन विक्रेता, and has even spawned TV shows where players compete.
Among the game 's realistic features include sophisticated playbooks and player statistics, and voice commentary कि allows players to hear the game as if it were a real TV broadcast.
The Madden एनएफएल series has been nicknamed the एनएफएल 's 33rd Franchise.
The series was originally conceived by Electronic Arts founder Trip Hawkins, who then approached Madden in 1984 for his समर्थन and expertise.
Due to Madden 's insistence that the game be as realistic as possible, the first version of John Madden Football was not released जबतक 1988.
The second version of the खेल was released in 1990, with annual versions चूंकि then.
The series ' name was changed to Madden NFL in 1993 after EA acquired the rights to use एनएफएल teams and players.
Despite Madden 's retirement as a broadcaster in 2009, he continues to lend his name and provide expertise for the game.
सिंडी Lee Miller Sheehan ( born July 10, 1957 ) is an American antiwar activist जिनकी son, U.S. Army Specialist Casey Sheehan, was killed by enemy action during the Iraq War.
She आकर्षित national और international media attention in August 2005 for her extended antiwar protest at a makeshift camp outside President जार्ज W. Bush 's Texas ranch —a stand that drew both passionate support और angry criticism.
Sheehan भागा unsuccessfully for Congress in 2008.
She is a vocal critic of President Barack Obama 's foreign policy.
Her memoir, Peace Mom : A Mother 's Journey Through heartache to Activism, was published in 2006.
Sheehan was the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of the Peace and स्वतंत्रता Party.

`` Before he announced on अगस्त 5 that he was running for President of Haiti, Wyclef Jean was still listing his age as only 37 years old.
But after declaring himself a presidential candidate, the Haitian-American-Irish hip-hop star also decided to come clean and confirm that he was वाकई 40. '' is a three-time Grammy Award -winning Haitian-American rapper, singer-songwriter, musician, record producer, and politician.
At age nine, Jean moved to the United States साथ उसके family and has spent much of his life in the country.
he first received fame as a member of the acclaimed New जर्सी hip हॉप group the Fugees.
On अगस्त 5, 2010, Jean filed for candidacy in the 2010 Haitian presidential election, although the Electoral आयोग subsequently ruled him अयोग्य to स्टैंड as he had not met the requirement to have been resident in Haiti for five years.
Wyclef Jean to appeal against Haiti चुनाव ruling – BBC News, Aug 22, 2010.

Jean 's efforts at earthquake relief, highly publicized in 2010 throughout Haiti and the United States, were channeled through his charitable organization, yéle Haiti.

In law, a set-off is a statutory defense to the whole or to a portion of a plaintiff 's अर्जी.
It had no existence under the English common law, being created by 2 Geo. II c. 22 लिये the relief of insolvent debtors, although set-off was recognized in इक्विटी.
Such a defense could be pleaded only in respect of mutual debts of a definite character, and did not apply to cases in which damages were claimed, nor to निष्पक्ष claims or demands.
By the rules of the Supreme Court ( O. XIX. r. 3 ) a defendant in an action may set off or set up any right or अर्जी by way of counterclaim against the claims of a plaintiff, and such set-off or counterclaim has the same प्रभाव as a statement of claim in a cross-action.
The legal defense of set-off ( above ) was originally introduced to prevent the unfair situation whereby a person ( `` Party A '' ) who owed money to another ( `` Party B '' ) could be sent to debtors prison, despite the fact that Party B also owed धन to Party A.
The विधि thus allows both parties to defer payment जबतक their respective claims have been सुना in अदालत.
Upon judgment, both claims are extinguished and replaced by a single net sum owing ( e.g. If Party A owes Party B 100 and Party B owes Party A 105, the two sums हैं set off and replaced with a single obligation of 5 from Party B to Party A ).
Set-off can भी be incorporated by contractual agreement so that, where a पार्टी defaults, the mutual amounts owing are automatically set off और बुझे.
In certain jurisdictions ( including the UK ), set-off takes place automatically upon the insolvency of a company.
This means that, लिये each party which is both a creditor and debtor of the insolvent company, mutual debts are set-off विरूद्ध each other, and then either the bankrupt 's creditor can अर्जी the balance in the दिवालियापन or the trustee in bankruptcy can ask for the balance remaining to be paid, depending on which side owed the most.
This has been criticized as an undeclared security interest that violates the principle of pari passu.
The वैकल्पिक, where a creditor has to अदा all its debts, but receive only a limited portion of the leftover moneys that अन्य unsecured लेनदारों get, poses the danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies.
The right to set off is particularly important when reporting a bank 's exposures to regulatory authorities.
The situation where a bank has to report that it has lent a large sum to a borrower ( and is therefore exposed, because there is a risk that the borrower might default thereby leading to the loss of the bank 's or its depositors ' money ) is thus replaced ( where the bank has taken security over shares or securities of the borrower ) with an exposure of the money lent minus the value of the security taken.
Jennifer Joanna Aniston ( born February 11, 1969 ) is an American अभिनेत्री, film director, and producer.
Aniston gained विश्वव्यापी मान्यता in the 1990s for portraying Rachel Green on the television sitcom Friends, a role which अर्जित her an Emmy Award, a Golden Globe Award, and a Screen Actors गिल्ड Award.
Aniston has also enjoyed a successful Hollywood film करियर.
She gained critical acclaim for her प्रदर्शन in the independent films वो 's the One ( 1996 ), Office Space ( 1999 ), The Good Girl ( 2002 ) and Friends with Money ( 2006 ).
She has had her greatest commercial successes with the films Bruce Almighty ( 2003 ), The break-up ( 2006 ), Marley & Me ( 2008 ), Just Go साथ It ( 2011 ) and Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ).
Aniston received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame on February 22, 2012.

The white tiger is a recessive mutant of the बंगाल tiger, which was reported in the wild from time to time in Assam, Bengal, Bihar and especially from the former State of Rewa.
Conventional पीसीआई ( PCI is an initialism formed इससे Peripheral Component Interconnect, part of the PCI Local Bus standard and often shortened to just PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware डिवाइस in a computer.
The PCI bus supports the functions found on a processor bus, but in a standardized स्वरूप that is independent of any particular processor.
Devices connected to the bus appear to the processor to be connected directly to the processor bus, and are assigned addresses in the processor 's address space.
Attached devices can take either the form of an integrated circuit fitted onto the motherboard itself, called a planar device in the PCI specification, or an विस्तार card कि fits into a slot.
The PCI लोकल Bus was first implemented in ibm PC compatibles, where it displaced the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration.
It रै subsequently been adopted लिये अन्य computer types.
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express, but, most motherboards are still made with one or more PCI slots, which are sufficient for many uses.
the PCI specification covers the physical size of the bus ( including the size and spacing of the circuit board edge electrical contacts ), electrical characteristics, bus timing, और protocols.
The specification can be purchased from the PCI Special Interest Group ( PCI-SIG ).
Typical PCI cards used in pcs शामिल : network cards, sound ताश, modems, extra ports such as USB or serial, TV tuner cards and disk controllers.
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards, until growing bandwidth requirements outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the preferred interface लिये वीडियो cards became AGP, and then PCI Express.
PCI video cards remain उपलब्धियाँ for use with old PCs without AGP or PCI Express slots.
अनेक devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now commonly integrated onto motherboards or available in सार्वभौमिक serial बस and PCI एक्स्प्रेस versions.
Caffeine is a bitter, white crystalline xanthine alkaloid that acts as a stimulant drug.
कैफीन is मिला in varying quantities in the seeds, leaves, and fruit of some plants, where it acts as a natural pesticide that paralyzes and kills certain insects feeding on the plants, as well as enhancing the reward मेमोरी of pollinators.
It is most commonly consumed by humans in infusions extracted from the seed of the coffee plant and the पत्ते of the tea bush, as well as from various foods and drinks containing उत्पाद derived from the kola nut.
Other sources include yerba maté, guarana berries, guayusa, and the yaupon holly.
In humans, caffeine acts as a central nervous system stimulant, temporarily warding off drowsiness and restoring alertness.
It is the world 's most widely consumed psychoactive drug, but unlike many other psychoactive substances, it is legal और unregulated in nearly all parts of the world.
पेय containing caffeine, such as coffee, tea, soft drinks, and energy drinks, enjoy great popularity.
In North America, 90 % of adults consume caffeine daily.
Part of the reason caffeine is classified by the Food and Drug Administration as GRAS ( generally recognized as safe ) is that विषाक्त doses ( over 10 grams ) are much higher than typically used doses ( less than 500 milligrams ).
Ordinary consumption can have low health risks, even when carried on for years – there may be a modest protective effect विरूद्ध कुछ diseases, including Parkinsons Disease, and निश्चित types of cancer.
Caffeine can have both positive and ऋणात्मक effects on anxiety disorders.
Some people experience sleep disruption if वे consume caffeine, विशेषकर during the evening hours, लकिन others show little disturbance and the effect of caffeine on sleep is highly variable.
प्रमाण of a risk to pregnancy is equivocal, but some authorities have concluded that prudent advice is for pregnant women to limit consumption to the समतुल्य of two cups of coffee per day or less.
The American Congress of Obstetricians and Gynecologists ( ACOG ) concluded in 2010 that caffeine consumption is safe up to 200 mg प्रति day in pregnant महिलाओं.
Caffeine has pressor और mild diuretic effects when administered to लोगों who are not used to it, but regular users develop a tolerance to this effect, and अध्ययन have generally failed to support the common notion that ordinary खपत contributes significantly to dehydration.
With heavy use, tolerance develops rapidly to autonomic effects such as elevated दिल rate और muscle twitching, लकिन not to the cognitive or arousal effects of caffeine.
The degree to which caffeine can produce clinically significant physical and mental dependence remains a subject of controversy in the medical literature.

( 2010 est. ).
The coast Ranges of California स्पैन from Humboldt काउंटी, California south to Santa बारबरा County.
The other three coastal California mountain सीमाएँ are the Transverse Ranges, Peninsular Ranges and the Klamath Mountains.
Physiographically, they are a section of the larger Pacific Border province, which in turn are part of the larger प्रशांत Mountain System physiographic division.
UNESCO has included the `` California Coast Ranges Biosphere Reserve `` in its Man and the Biosphere Programme of World Network of Biosphere Reserves since 1983.

An automobile, autocar, motor car or car is a wheeled motor vehicle used for transporting passengers, which भी carries its अपना engine or motor.
Most definitions of the term specify that automobiles are designed to run primarily on सड़कें, to have seating for one to eight people, to typically have four wheels, and to be constructed principally for the हस्तांतरण of people rather than goods.
The term motorcar has also been used in the context of electrified rail systems to denote a car which functions as a small locomotive but also provides space for passengers and baggage.
These locomotive cars यहूद often used on suburban routes by both interurban and intercity railroad systems.
It was estimated in 2010 that the number of automobiles had risen to over 1 billion vehicles, up from the 500 million of 1986.
The numbers are increasing rapidly, especially in China and India.
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), often referred to by his initials JFK, थी the 35th President of the United States, सेवारत from 1961 जबतक his death in 1963.
बाद military service as commander of the Motor Torpedo Boats pt-109 and PT-59 during World War II in the South Pacific, Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a डेमोक्रेट.
Thereafter, he served in the U.S. Senate from 1953 until 1960.
Kennedy defeated Vice President and Republican candidate Richard Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election.
At 43 years of age, he is the youngest to have been elected to the office, the second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( after Theodore Roosevelt ), and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president.
A Catholic, Kennedy is the तभी non- Protestant president, and is the only president to have won a Pulitzer Prize.
Events during his presidency included the Bay of Pigs Invasion, the Cuban Missile Crisis, the building of the Berlin Wall, the Space Race, the African-American Civil अधिकारों Movement, and जल्दी stages of the Vietnam War.
Therein, Kennedy increased the number of military advisers, special operation forces, and helicopters in an effort to कोर the spread of communism in दक्षिण ईस्ट Asia.
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the रणनीतिक Hamlet Program which was implemented by the South Vietnamese government.
It involved certain forced relocation, village internment, and segregation of rural दक्षिण वियतनामी from the northern and southern communist insurgents.
Kennedy थी assassinated on November 22, 1963 in Dallas, Texas.
Lee घनघोर Oswald was charged with the crime, but he was shot and killed by Jack Ruby two days बाद, before a trial could take place.
The FBI and the Warren Commission officially concluded that Oswald was the lone assassin.
however, the United States हाउस Select कमेटी on assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded that those investigations were flawed and कि Kennedy was संभवतः assassinated as the result of a conspiracy.
However, एबीसी News in their investigation, The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy, confirmed the findings of the Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted अलोन.
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter bomber program led to a Congressional investigation that lasted from 1963 to 1970.
Since the 1960s information concerning Kennedy 's private life has आइये to लाइट.
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in which he struggled have become better known, especially चूंकि the 1990s.
Although initially kept secret इससे the general public, reports of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press.
Kennedy ranks अत्यधिक in public opinion ratings of U.S. presidents.
A Siemens mxl fire alarm control panel ( शीर्ष ) and graphic annunciator ( bottom ) for Potomac Hall, at James Madison University.
A Vigilant VM-1 fire alarm control unit ( FACU ) / autonomous control unit ( ACU ) with integrated voice निकासी and fire fighter telephone system.
Manufactured by Edwards, A utc F & S Company
A Fire Alarm Control फलक ( FACP ), or आग Alarm Control Unit ( FACU ), is the controlling component of a Fire Alarm System.
The panel receives information from environmental sensors designed to detect changes associated with fire, monitors their operational integrity and provides for automatic control of equipment, and transmission of information necessary to prepare the सुविधा for fire based on a predetermined sequence.
The फलक may also सप्लाई electrical energy to operate any संबद्ध sensor, control, transmitter, or relay.
There are चार basic types of panels : coded panels, conventional panels, addressable panels, and multiplex systems.

Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( also known as Katunayake International Airport and Colombo International Airport ) is one of the two international airports serving the city of Colombo, the अन्य is Ratmalana International Airport.
Mattala Rajapaksa अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport located in southern city of Hambantota is the other international विमानक्षेत्र in Sri Lanka.
Bandaranaike International Airport is located in Katunayake, 22 miles ( 35 km ) north of Colombo.
It is administered by विमानक्षेत्र and Aviation Services ( Sri Lanka ) Ltd.
It is the hub of SriLankan Airlines, the national carrier of Sri लंका, and Mihin Lanka, the budget airline of Sri Lanka.
Black swan is a 2010 American psychological thriller and horror film directed by Darren Aronofsky and starring Natalie Portman, Vincent Cassel, and Mila Kunis.
The plot revolves around a production of Tchaikovsky 's Swan Lake ballet by a prestigious New York City company.
The production requires a ballerina to play the innocent and fragile श्वेत Swan, for which the committed dancer Nina ( पोर्टमैन ) is a पूर्ण fit, as well as the dark and sensual Black Swan, जिससे are qualities embodied by the new arrival Lily ( Kunis ).
Nina is overwhelmed by a feeling of immense दबाव when she finds herself competing for the part, causing her to lose her tenuous grip on reality और descend into a living nightmare.
Aronofsky conceived the premise by connecting his viewings of a उत्पादन of Swan Lake with an unrealized screenplay about understudies and the notion of being haunted by a double, similar to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers.
aronofsky cites Fyodor Dostoyevsky 's `` The दोगुना `` as another inspiration for the film.
The director also considered Black Swan a companion piece to his 2008 film the Wrestler, with both films involving demanding प्रदर्शन for different kinds of art.
he and Portman first discussed the project in 2000, and after a ब्रैड attachment to Universal Studios, Black Swan was produced in New York नगर in 2009 by Fox Searchlight Pictures.
पोर्टमैन and Kunis trained in ballet for several months prior to filming, and notable figures from the बैले world helped with फिल्मी production to shape the ballet presentation.
The film premiered as the opening film for the 67th Venice International Film Festival on September 1, 2010.
it had a limited release in the United States starting December 3, 2010 and opened nationwide on December 17.
ब्लैक swan received critical praise upon its release, particularly लिये पोर्टमैन 's performance और Aronofsky 's दिशा, and was a significant box office success, grossing $ 329 million worldwide.
The film received five Academy पुरस्कार nominations और Portman won the बेहतरीन Actress award for the film, as well as many other Best अभिनेत्री awards in several guilds and festivals, while Aronofsky was nominated for Best Director.
In addition, the film itself received a nomination for Best चित्र.
The world’s first ice-calorimeter, used in the winter of 1782-83, by एंटोनी Lavoisier and pierre-simon Laplace, to determine the heat involved in various chemical changes ; calculations which were based on Joseph Black ’s prior discovery of latent heat.
These experiments mark the foundation of thermochemistry.
A calorimeter ( इससे Latin calor, meaning heat ) is an object used for calorimetry, or the process of measuring the heat of chemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ or physical changes as well as heat capacity.
अवकल स्कैनिंग calorimeters, isothermal microcalorimeters, titration calorimeters and accelerated rate calorimeters are among the most common प्रकार.
A सरल calorimeter just consists of a thermometer attached to a metal container full of water suspended above a combustion chamber.
To find the enthalpy change per mole of a substance A in a प्रतिक्रिया between two substances A and B, the substances are added to a ऊष्मामापी and the initial and final temperatures ( before the प्रतिक्रिया started and after it has finished ) are noted.
Multiplying the temperature change by the mass and specific heat capacities of the substances gives a value for the energy given off or absorbed during the reaction.
Dividing the energy change by how many moles of A were present gives इसके enthalpy change of reaction.
This method is used primarily in academic teaching as it describes the theory of calorimetry.
It does not account for the heat घाटा through the container or the heat capacity of the thermometer and संग्राहक itself.
In addition, the object placed inside the calorimeter shows that the objects transferred their heat to the ऊष्मामापी and into the liquid, and the heat absorbed by the calorimeter और the liquid is equal to the heat given off by the metals.
A pair of green flip-flops
Flip-flops ( भी called zōri, thongs, jandals, or a variety of other names throughout the world ) are a type of open-toed sandal typically worn in casual situations, such as outside or at the बीच.
They consist of a flat sole held loosely on the foot by a Y-shaped strap that passes between the first and second toes and around either पक्ष of the foot.
They may also be आयोजित to the foot with a single strap over the front of the foot बल्कि than a thong.
the name `` flip-flop '' originated because of the sound that is made by slapping between the sole of the पैर and the floor जब walking.
This style of footwear has been worn by the people of many cultures throughout the world, originating as early as the ancient Egyptians in 4,000 B.C.
the modern flip-flop descends from the Japanese zōri, which became popular after World War II when soldiers returning to the United States brought them back.
They became popular in casual settings during the 1960s, 1990s, and 2000s, and some varieties have even found their way into more formal attire, despite आलोचना.
The उपयोग of flip-flops can result in many pains and injuries, including ankle sprains and broken bones.
Some individuals who walk for long periods report पीड़ा in the feet, ankles, and lower legs.
The lack of support provided by flip-flops often results in over-pronation injuries, caused by the foot slipping inwards further than normal.
This can lead to flat feet and tendonitis.
Other injuries that may result are due to the जूते 's open-toed nature, such as stubbed toes, cuts, and bruises.
Doctors recommend purchasing pricier sandals with thick-cushioned soles, as well as those that have a strap that is not canvas और that comes back almost to the ankle.
The owners of Hanjin Osaka, seen here transiting the Panama Canal in 2008, declared general average following an explosion in the ship 's engine room on.
The law of general average is a legal principle of maritime law according to which all parties in a sea venture proportionally share कोई losses resulting from a voluntary sacrifice of part of the ship or cargo to save the whole in an emergency.
In the exigencies of hazards faced at sea, crew members often have precious little समय in which to determine precisely whose cargo they are jettisoning.
Thus, to avoid quarrelling that could waste valuable time, there arose the equitable practice whereby all the merchants whose cargo landed safely would be called on to contribute a portion, based upon a share or percentage, to the merchant or merchants whose goods had been tossed overboard to avert imminent peril.
While general औसत traces its origins in ancient maritime law, still it remains part of the admiralty law of most countries.
The first codification of general average was the यॉर्क Antwerp Rules of 1890.
अमरीकी companies accepted it in 1949.
General average requires three elements which are clearly stated by Mr. Justice grier in Barnard v. Adams:
`` 1st.
A common danger : a danger in which vessel, cargo and क्रू all participate ; a danger imminent और apparently 'inevitable, ' except by voluntarily incurring the loss of a portion of the whole to save the remainder. ''
`` 2nd. There must be a voluntary jettison, jactus, or casting away, of some portion of the joint concern लिये the purpose of avoiding this imminent peril, periculi imminentis evitandi causa, or, in other words, a transfer of the peril from the whole to a particular portion of the whole. ''
`` 3rd.
This attempt to avoid the imminent आम peril must be successful ''.
Example Polish call for vaccination against Diphtheria and Tetanus.
A vaccination अनुसूची is a series of vaccinations, including the timing of all doses, which may be either recommended or अनिवार्य, depending on the country of residence.
a vaccine is an antigenic तैयारी used to produce active प्रतिरक्षण to a disease, in order to prevent or reduce the प्रभाव of infection by any प्राकृतिक or `` wild '' pathogen.
Many vaccines require multiple doses for maximum effectiveness, either to produce sufficient आरंभिक immune response or to boost response that fades over time.
For example, tetanus vaccine boosters are often recommended every 10 years.
Vaccine schedules are developed by governmental agencies or physicians groups to achieve maximum effectiveness using required and recommended vaccines for a locality while minimizing the number of health परवाह system interactions.
Over the past two दशकों, the recommended vaccination schedule has grown rapidly and become more complicated as many new vaccines have been developed.
Some vaccines are recommended only in certain areas ( countries, subnational areas, or at-risk populations ) where a disease is common.
For instance, पीला fever vaccination is on the routine vaccine schedule of French Guiana, is recommended in certain regions of Brazil but in the United राज्य is only given to travelers heading to countries with a history of the disease.
In developing countries, vaccine recommendations also take into खाता the level of health care access, the cost of vaccines and issues with vaccine availability and storage.
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed by the संसार Health Organization show a developed country using a schedule which extends over the first five years of a child 's life and uses vaccines which cost over $ 700 including administration costs while a developing country uses a schedule providing vaccines in the पहला 9 months of life and costing only $ 25.
This difference is due to the lower cost of स्वास्थ्य care, the lower cost of many vaccines provided to developing nations, and that more expensive vaccines, often for less common diseases, are not utilized.
in 1900, the smallpox vaccine was the only one administered to children.
By the early 1950s, children routinely received चार vaccines, for protection against ( diphtheria, pertussis, tetanus, polio, and smallpox ), और as अनेक as five shots by two years of आयु.
Since the mid-1980s, many vaccines have been added to the schedule.
, the US Centers for Disease कंट्रोल and Prevention ( CDC ) now recommends vaccination against at least fourteen diseases.
By two years of age, U.S. children receive as many as 24 vaccine injections, and might receive up to five shots दौरान one visit to the doctor.
The use of combination vaccine products means that,, the United किंगडम 's immunization program consists of 10 injections by the age of two, rather than 25 if vaccination for each disease was given as a separate injection.

The Trinidad and Tobago Carnival is an annual event held on the Monday and Tuesday before Ash बुधवार, and is खूब known for participant 's colorful costumes and exuberant celebrations.
Carnival in त्रिनिदाद and Tobago is the most significant event on the islands ' cultural and tourism calendar, with numerous cultural events running in the lead up to the street parade on Carnival Monday and Tuesday.
It is said that if the islanders are नहीं celebrating it, then they are preparing for it, while reminiscing about the past year 's festival.
The heart of the musical celebration has been calypso ; recently soca has replaced कैलिप्सो as the most celebrated type of music.
Costumes, stickfighting and limbo competitions are भी important components of the festival.
Carnival as it is celebrated in Trinidad and टोबैगो is also celebrated in cities worldwide.
These including Toronto 's Caribana, Miami 's Miami Carnival, Houston Carifest, London 's Notting Hill Carnival as खूब as New York City 's Labor Day Carnival to name a few.
कार्निवल was created when West African slaves mimicked their French owners who where known for their lavish costumes balls.
Forbidden to partake in these festivities and confined to their quarters, slaves combined elements from their own cultures to their master 's fete.
Hence the creation of characters such as Jab Jab or Jab Molassie ( Devils ), Midnight Robbers, Imps, Lagahroo, Soucouyant, La Diablesse and Demons.
साथ the abolition of slavery in 1838, freed africans took उनके version of Carnival to the streets through expression of drums, riddim sections like tamboo bamboo and as each new immigrant population डाला Trinidad, Carnival evolved into what we know today.
The city of Chicago, Illinois held a nonpartisan mayoral election on Tuesday, February 22, 2011.
Incumbent Mayor Richard M. Daley, a member of the Democratic Party who had been in दफ्तर since 1989, did not seek a seventh term as mayor.
उम्मीदवार needed to collect 12,500 petition signatures by November 22, 2010 to qualify for a place on the ballot.
April 5, 2011 थी scheduled to be a runoff election date if no candidate received an निरपेक्ष majority.
Rahm emanuel won the race for mayor with अधिक than 55 % of the vote.
He was inaugurated on May 16, 2011.
`` उत्तेजित Up Kicks '' is a song by American इंडी pop band Foster the People.
It was released as the group 's debut single in September 2010, and the following year was included on their EP Foster the People and their डेब्यू album Torches.
`` Pumped Up kicks '' became the group 's breakthrough hit and was one of the most popular songs of 2011.
The song थी written and recorded by frontman Mark Foster while he was working as a commercial jingle लेखक.
Contrasting with the upbeat musical composition, the गीत describe the homicidal thoughts of a troubled youth.
The track received considerable attention after it थी posted online in 2010 as a free download, and it helped the समूह garner a multi-album record deal with Columbia रिकॉर्ड imprint Startime International.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' proved to be a sleeper hit ; in 2011, after receiving significant airplay on modern rock stations, the song crossed-over onto contemporary hit radio stations.
The song spent आठ consecutive weeks at number three on the Billboard Hot 100 chart in the United States, making it the first Billboard Alternative Songs number-one single to crack the U.S. top 5 since Kings of Leon 's `` Use Somebody `` in 2009.
The song was widely praised by critics, और it has been licensed लिये use in a wide range of popular media since its रिलीज.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' received a Grammy Award nomination for Best Pop Duo/Group Performance.
The State Fair of West Virginia is an annual state fair for West Virginia.
It is held annually in mid-August on the State Fairgrounds in Fairlea, near Lewisburg, वेस्ट Virginia in the southeastern part of the state.
The State Fairgrounds consists of a large open field लिये carnivals and exhibitions, a horse track, grandstands, and several exhibition इमारतें.
Free parking is provided adjacent to the fairgrounds and, until 2006, free camping was also available in a large field with running-water toilets and showers, but no hookups.
Campers are now charged a small fee.
the White House, the president 's official residence और center of the administration
Under the United States Constitution, the President of the संयुक्त States is the head of राज्य and head of सरकारी of the United States.
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole, the presidency is the उच्चतम political office in the United States by influence and recognition.
The president is also the commander-in-chief of the United राज्य Armed Forces.
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the House of Representatives चाहिए the Electoral College fail to पुरस्कार an absolute majority of votes to any person ).
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution in 1951, no person may be elected President more than twice, and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once.
Upon the death, resignation, or removal from office of an incumbent President, the वाइस अध्यक्ष assumes the office.
The President must be at least 35 years of age and a `` natural born '' citizen of the United States.
This list शामिल तभी those persons who were sworn into office as president following the ratification of the United States Constitution, which took effect on कूच 4, 1789.
लिये American leaders before this ratification, see President of the Continental Congress.
The list does not include any Acting Presidents under the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution.
There have been 43 people sworn into दफ्तर, and 44 presidencies, as Grover Cleveland served two non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals elected as president, four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison, Zachary Taylor, Warren G. Harding, and Franklin D. Roosevelt ), four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln, James A. Garfield, William McKinley, and John F. Kennedy ) और one resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George Washington, the first president, was उदघाटन in 1789 after a unanimous vote of the चुनावी College.
William हेनरी Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841, and फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt spent the longest with over twelve सालो, but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945.
He is the only president to serve more than दो terms, and a constitutional amendment, affecting राष्ट्रपतियों after Harry Truman, was passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president.
Andrew Jackson, the seventh president, थी the first to be elected by men of all classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting यहूद repealed.
Warren Harding was the पहला elected after women gained voting rights in 1920.
History records four presidents – जॉन Q Adams, Rutherford B. Hayes, Benjamin Harrison और George W. Bush – who lost the popular vote लकिन assumed office.
John F. कैनेडी has been the only president of Roman Catholic faith, and the current president, Barack Obama, is the first president of African descent.
`` Lombardi Trophy '' redirects यहाँ.
For the award awarded annually to the best college football lineman or linebacker, see Lombardi पुरस्कार.
The Vince Lombardi Trophy is the trophy awarded each year to the winning team of the National Football League 's championship game, the Super Bowl.
