This is a list of tables of the verified oldest people in the world in ordinal rank, such as oldest person or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim has been validated by an international body that specifically deals in longevity research, such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records.
The longest unambiguously documented human lifespan is that of Jeanne Calment of France ( 1875–1997 ), who died at age 122 years, 164 days.
She met Vincent van Gogh when she was 12 or 13.
This led to news media attention in 1985, after Calment turned 110.
Subsequent investigation found documentation लिये Calment 's age, beyond any reasonable question, in the records of her देशी city, Arles, France.
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has महरूम produced than for any other supercentenarian ; her case serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the आयु of the world 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of jiroemon किमुरा, who currently lives in Japan and is age as of.
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United राज्य, on 17 December 2012, Kimura, born 19 April 1897, is the oldest living person in the world whose age can be documented.
he has also been the oldest living man since the death of 114-year old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011.
Since the death of 115-year old Koto okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013, the oldest living woman has been -year-old misao Okawa, also इससे Japan, born on 5 March 1898.
The People 's Court is an American arbitration-based reality court show, currently presided over by retired फ्लोरिडा State Circuit Court Judge Marilyn Milian, in which small claims disputes हैं handled.
The People 's Court is the first court show to use binding arbitration, introducing the format into the genre in 1981.
The system रै been duplicated by most of the दिखाएँ 's successors in the judicial genre.
Moreover, The People 's Court is the first popular, long-running reality in the judicial genre.
It was preceded only by a few short-lived हकीकत in the genre ; these short-lived पूर्ववर्तियों were only loosely related to judicial proceedings, except for one : Parole ( 1959 ) took footage from real-life courtrooms holding legal proceedings.
prior to The People 's Court, the vast majority of TV courtroom shows used actors, and recreated or fictional cases ( as किया radio before that ).
among examples of these types of court shows include Famous Jury Trials and अपना Witness.
The People 's Court has had two contrasting जीवनदान.
The दिखाएँ 's पहला life was presided over solely by former Los Angeles County Superior Court Judge Joseph Wapner.
His tenure lasted from the show 's debut on September 14, 1981, until May 21, 1993, when the show was cancelled due to low दरजा.
This left the show with a total of 2,484 1⁄2-hour एपीसोड and 12 seasons.
The show was taped in Los Angeles during its पहला life.
बाद being cancelled, reruns aired until September 9, 1994.
On सितंबर 8, 1997, after being out of production for four years, The People 's Court was revived for a second life in first-run syndication as a 60-minute program.
Former lawyer और Mayor of New York Ed Koch was chosen as arbiter, which he maintained for 2 seasons from the 1997–98 season through the 1998–99 season ( the present life 's 2nd season and overall show 's 14th ).
by the 1999–00 season, husband of Judith Sheindlin ( who presides over Judge Judy ) and former New York State Supreme Court Judge Jerry Sheindlin succeeded Koch.
Sheindlin lasted one and a half seasons as he was replaced towards the end of the 2000–01 ऋतु ( present life 's 4th season और overall show 's 17th ).
Beginning in spring 2001, Florida judge Marilyn Milian took over The People 's Court और has presided over the show ever since.
Once Milian completes the 2012–13 season, she will have served as longest arbiter over the series with 12 and a half seasons.
As of the present, however, her years on the कार्यक्रम tie Wapner at 12 seasons.
In the 2009-10 television season, The People 's Courts 2nd/present जीवन outlasted its first when it reached 13 सीज़न.
While the show taped in New York City for the first 15 seasons of its second life, it now tapes in Stamford, Connecticut as of the 2012-13 season.
On September 3, 2012, The लोगों 's Court 's 2nd/present life entered इसके 16th season ( 28th overall season ).
With 28 total seasons, The People 's Court ranks as the 2nd longest-running courtroom program पीछे the ongoing Divorce Court at 33 seasons ( from its 3 combined lives ).
Utah ( or ) ( Arapaho : Wo'tééneihí ' ) is a state in the Western United States.
It became the 45th state admitted to the Union on जनवरी 4, 1896.
Utah is the 13th-largest, the 34th-most populous, and the 10th-least-densely populated of the 50 United राज्य.
Approximately 80 % of Utah 's 2,817,222 people live along the Wasatch Front, centering on Salt Lake City, leaving vast expanses of the state nearly uninhabited and making the population the sixth most urbanized in the u.S. Utah is bordered by कोलोराडो on the east, Wyoming on the northeast, Idaho on the उत्तर, एरिज़ोना on the south, and Nevada on the west.
It भी touches a corner of New Mexico on the southeast.
Utah is the most religiously homogeneous state in the Union.
Approximately 63 % of Utahns are reported to be सदस्यों of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints or LDS ( Mormons ), which greatly influences यूटा culture and रोज़ life.
The world headquarters of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ) is located in Utah 's state capital.
The state is a center of transportation, education, information technology and research, government services, mining, and a प्रमुख पर्यटक destination for बाहरी recreation.
According to the U.S. Census Bureau 's population estimates, Utah is the fifth fastest-growing state in the United States as of 2012.
St. George, थी the fastest–growing metropolitan area in the United States इससे 2000 to 2005.
a 2012 Gallup national सर्वेक्षण found Utah overall to be the `` best राज्य to live in '' based on 13 forward-looking measurements including various economic, lifestyle, and health-related outlook metrics.
Coldwater is a छोटी town in Tate County, Mississippi.
It is in the Memphis Metropolitan Area.
The जनसांख्यिकी was 1,674 at the 2000 census.
The मुश्किल palate is a thin horizontal बोनी plate of the कपाल, located in the roof of the mouth.
It spans the arch formed by the upper teeth.
It is formed by the palatine process of the maxilla and horizontal plate of palatine bone.
It forms a partition between the nasal passages and the mouth.
Also on the anterior portion of the roof of the hard palate is the Rugae which हैं the irregular ridges in the mucous membrane that help facilitate the movement of food backwards towards the pharynx.
This partition is continued deeper into the mouth by a मांसल extension called the soft palate.
Complete set of scrolls, constituting the entire Tanakh.
The Tanakh (, or ; also Tenakh, Tenak, Tanach ) is a name used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible.
The Tanakh is also known as the Masoretic Text or the Miqra.
the name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew अक्षर of the Masoretic Text 's three traditional subdivisions : The Torah ( `` Teaching '', भी known as the Five Books of Moses ), Nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
the नाम `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ), meaning `` that which is read '', is an alternative Hebrew term लिये the Tanakh.
The books of the Tanakh were relayed साथ an accompanying oral tradition passed on by each generation, called the Oral Torah.
Sobriety नाका in Germany
Driving अंतर्गत the influence ( DUI ), driving while intoxicated ( DWI ), drunken driving, drunk ड्राइविंग, drink driving, operating under the influence, drinking and driving, or impaired driving is the crime of driving a motor vehicle with blood levels of alcohol in excess of a legal limit ( `` रक्त Alcohol Content '', or `` BAC '' ).
Similar regulations cover ड्राइविंग or operating certain types of machinery while affected by पीने alcohol or लेने other drugs, including, but not limited to prescription दवाएँ.
This is a criminal offense in most nations.
Convictions do not necessarily involve actual driving of the vehicle.
In most jurisdictions a measurement such as a blood alcohol content ( BAC ) in excess of a specific threshold level, such as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the offense, with no need to prove impairment or being under the influence of alcohol.
In some jurisdictions, there is an aggravated श्रेणी of the ठोकर at a higher स्तर e.g. 0.12 %.
In most countries, anyone who is convicted of injuring or killing someone while under the influence of alcohol or drugs can be heavily fined, as in France, in addition to being given a lengthy prison sentence.
Some jobs have उनके own rules and BAC limits, for उदाहरण commercial पायलट, and the Federal Railroad Administration in the United States has a 0.04 % limit लिये train क्रू.
Some jurisdictions have multiple levels of BAC ; for example, the state of California has a 0.08 % BAC limit, which is lowered to 0.04 % if the operator holds a commercial driver 's अनुज्ञा.
The California BAC limit is 0.01 % for those younger than 21 years of age और those on probation लिये a previous DUI conviction.
Some large corporations have their own नियम ; Union Pacific Railroad has their own BAC limit of 0.02 % that, if violated दौरान a random परीक्षण or a for-cause test — for example, after a traffic accident — can result in termination of employment with no chance of future re-hire.
Many states in the u.S. and provinces in Canada have adopted truth in sentencing laws that enforce strict guidelines on sentencing, differing from previous practice where थाना time थी reduced or suspended after sentencing had been issued.
Some jurisdictions have judicial guidelines requiring a mandatory minimum sentence.
Penalties for DUI charges range from expensive fees to forfetiruree of your license plates and in some serious circumstances, your vehicle.
A drunk driving simulator in Montréal, Canada
The विशिष्ट criminal ठोकर may be called, depending on the jurisdiction, driving under the influence [ of alcohol or other drugs ] ( DUI ), driving under intense influence ( DUII ), driving while intoxicated ( DWI ), operating under the influence ( OUI ) operating while intoxicated ( OWI ), operating a motor vehicle जबकि intoxicated ( OMVI ), ड्राइविंग under the combined influence of alcohol and/or other drugs, driving under the influence per se or drunk in charge [ of a vehicle ].
Many such laws apply also to motorcycling, boating, piloting वायुयान, use of motile farm equipment such as tractors and combines, riding horses or driving a horse-drawn vehicle, or bicycling, possibly with different bac level than driving.
In some jurisdictions there are separate charges depending on the गाडी used, such as BWI ( bicycling while intoxicated ), which may carry a lighter sentence.
in the United States, local law enforcement agencies made 1,467,300 arrests nationwide for ड्राइविंग under the influence of alcohol in 1996, compared to 1.9 million ऐसे arrests during the peak year in 1983.
In 1997 an estimated 513,200 DWI offenders were in prison or jail, down from 593,000 in 1990 and up from 270,100 in 1986.
Officers from US Customs and Border Protection boarding a ship
Law enforcement in the United राज्य is one of three major components of the criminal justice system of the United States, साथ with courts and corrections.
Although there exists an inherent interrelatedness between the different groups that make up the criminal justice system आधारित on their अपराधों deterrence purpose, each घटक operates independently from one another.
However, the judiciary is vested with the power to मेक legal determinations regarding the conduct of the other दो components.
Apart from maintaining order and service functions, the purpose of policing is the investigation of suspected दण्ड activity and the referral of the results of investigations and of suspected criminals to the courts.
Law enforcement, to varying degrees at different levels of government और in different agencies, is also commonly charged with the responsibilities of deterring criminal activity and of preventing the कामयाब commission of अपराधों in progress ; the service and enforcement of warrants, writs and other orders of the courts.
Law enforcement agencies are also involved in providing first response to emergencies and other threats to public safety ; the protection of निश्चित public facilities and infrastructure ; the maintenance of public order ; the protection of public officials ; and the operation of some correctional facilities ( usually at the local level ).
Elmer Figueroa Arce ( born June 28, 1968 ), best known under the stage name Chayanne, is a Puerto Rican Latin pop singer and actor.
As a solo कलाकार, Chayanne has released 21 solo albums and बेची over 15 million albums विश्वव्यापी.
`` World War हल्क '' is a comic book crossover कथानक that ran through a self titled limited series and various other शीर्षक published by Marvel Comics in 2007, featuring the हल्क.
The series consists of five main issues titled World War Hulk, with Greg Pak as writer and जॉन Romita, Jr. as penciller, and तीन other limited series : संसार War हल्क : Front Line, World War Hulk : Gamma Corps, and World युद्ध Hulk : x-men.
It also ran through several other Marvel comics series.
The plot is the culmination of a series of events that began with the Hulk being tricked into space by the Illuminati and a life model decoy of Nick Fury, the Hulk 's subsequent exile seen in Planet Hulk and his imminent return to Earth to seek revenge on the Illuminati.
Marion Mitchell Morrison ( born Marion Robert Morrison ; May 26, 1907 – जून 11, 1979 ), better known by उसके stage name John Wayne, was an American film कर्ता, director और producer.
An Academy पुरस्कार -winner, Wayne was among the top box office draws for three decades, and was named the all-time top money-making star.
An enduring American प्रतीक, he epitomized rugged masculinity and is famous for his demeanor, including his distinctive calm voice, walk, and ऊँचाई.
Wayne थी born in Winterset, Iowa but उसके family relocated to the greater Los Angeles area when he was four years old.
He मिला work at local film studios जब he lost his football scholarship to USC as a result of a bodysurfing accident.
initially working for the फॉक्स Film Corporation, he mostly appeared in small bit parts.
His first leading role came in the widescreen epic The Big Trail ( 1930 ), which led to leading roles in numerous films throughout the 1930s, many of them in the western genre.
His career rose to further heights in 1939, with John Ford 's Stagecoach making him an instant superstar.
Wayne would go on to star in 142 pictures, primarily typecast in Western films.
Among his best known बाद films are the Quiet Man ( 1952 ), जिससे follows him as an Irish-American boxer and his love affair with a fiery spinster played by Maureen O'Hara ; The Searchers ( 1956 ), in which he plays a Civil War veteran who seeks out his abducted niece ; Rio Bravo ( 1959 ), playing a Sheriff with Dean Martin ; True Grit ( 1969 ), playing a humorous U.S. Marshal who sets out to avenge a man 's death in the role that जीती Wayne an Academy Award ; and The Shootist ( 1976 ), उसके final screen performance in जिससे he plays an aging gunslinger battling कर्कट.
Wayne moved to Orange County, California in the 1960s, and was a prominent Republican in Hollywood, supporting anti-communist स्थितियाँ.
He died of stomach cancer in 1979.
In June 1999, the American Film Institute named Wayne 13th among the Greatest Male Screen Legends of All Time.
Galileo Galilei ( ; 15 February 1564 – 8 January 1642 ), was an इतालवी physicist, mathematician, astronomer, and philosopher who played a major role in the Scientific Revolution.
His achievements include सुधार to the telescope and consequent astronomical observations and support for Copernicanism.
Galileo has been called the `` पिता of modern observational खगोलशास्त्र ``, the `` father of modern physics ``, the `` father of science '', and `` the Father of Modern Science ''.
His contributions to observational astronomy शामिल the telescopic confirmation of the phases of Venus, the discovery of the four largest satellites of Jupiter ( named the Galilean moons in his honour ), and the observation and analysis of sunspots.
Galileo also worked in applied science and technology, inventing an improved military compass and other instruments.
Galileo 's championing of heliocentrism was controversial within his lifetime, when सबसे subscribed to either geocentrism or the Tychonic system.
he met with opposition from astronomers, who doubted heliocentrism due to the absence of an observed stellar parallax.
The matter was investigated by the Roman Inquisition in 1615, and they concluded that it could be supported as only a possibility, not an established fact.
Galileo later defended his views in Dialogue Concerning the Two Chief World Systems, which appeared to attack Pope Urban VIII and thus alienated him and the Jesuits, who had both समर्थित Galileo up until this point.
He was tried by the Inquisition, found `` vehemently suspect of heresy '', forced to recant, and spent the rest of his life under house गिरफ़्तार.
It was while Galileo was under house arrest that he wrote one of his finest works, दो New Sciences, in which he summarised the work he had done some forty years पहले, on the two sciences now called kinematics and strength of materials.
55 '' LG OLED TV showcased at ces 2012
Prototype OLED lighting panel developed by Lumiotec
Demonstration of a flexible oled device
An OLED ( सशुल्क light-emitting diode ) is a light-emitting diode ( LED ) in which the emissive electroluminescent layer is a film of organic compound जिससे emits light in response to an electric current.
This layer of organic semiconductor is situated between दो electrodes.
Generally, at least one of these electrodes is transparent.
OLEDs are used to create digital displays in devices such as television screens, computer monitors, पोर्टेबल systems such as mobile phones, handheld games consoles and PDAs.
A major area of research is the development of white OLED डिवाइस for use in solid-state lighting अनुप्रयोग.
There are two main families of OLEDs : those based on small molecules और those employing polymers.
Adding mobile ions to an OLED creates a light-emitting electrochemical cell or लैक, जिससे has a slightly different mode of operation.
OLED displays can use either passive-matrix ( PMOLED ) or active-matrix addressing schemes.
Active-matrix OLEDs ( AMOLED ) require a thin-film transistor backplane to switch each individual pixel on or off, but allow for उच्चतर resolution and larger display sizes.
An OLED display works without a backlight.
Thus, it can प्रदर्शक deep black levels and can be thinner and हल्का than a liquid crystal display ( LCD ).
In low ambient light शर्तें ऐसे as a dark room an oled screen can achieve a higher contrast ratio than an LCD, whether the LCD uses cold cathode fluorescent lamps or led backlight.
A carton and a glass of eggnog from Montreal, Canada, showing its French facade ( English reverse ) and the French पद lait de poule ( literally, `` hen 's milk '' )
Eggnog, or अंडा nog, is a sweetened dairy -based beverage traditionally made with milk and/or cream, sugar, and whipped eggs ( which gives it a frothy texture ).
Brandy, rum, व्हिस्की, bourbon, vodka, or a combination of liquors are often added.
The finished serving is often garnished with a sprinkling of ground cinnamon or nutmeg.
It was also known as the egg milk punch.
Eggnog is a popular drink throughout the United States and Canada, and is usually associated with Christmas.
Eggnog may be added as a flavoring to food or drinks such as coffee and tea.
eggnog as a custard can also be प्रयुक्त as an ice cream base.
A pasty (, ), ( sometimes known in ब्रिटेन as a Cornish pasty, और in the संयुक्त States as a pastie or British pasty ) is a baked पेस्ट्री, a traditional variety of which is विशेषकर associated with कॉर्नवॉल, the westernmost county in England.
It is made by placing uncooked filling typically of मांस and vegetables, without meat in vegetarian संस्करण, on a flat pastry circle and folding it to wrap the filling, crimping the edge to form a seal.
After baking, the result is a raised semicircular comestible.
The traditional Cornish pasty, which has सुरक्षित Geographical Indication ( PGI ) status in Europe, is filled with beef, sliced or diced potato, swede ( also ज्ञात as a yellow turnip or rutabaga – referred to in Cornwall as turnip ) and onion, seasoned with salt and pepper, and is baked.
Today, the pasty is the food most associated with कॉर्नवॉल, it is regarded as the national dish, और it accounts for 6 % of the Cornish खाना economy.
Pasties with many different fillings are made ; some shops specialise in selling all sorts of pasties.
The origins of the pasty are unclear, though there are many references to them throughout historical documents and fiction.
The pasty is now popular world-wide due to the spread of Cornish miners, and variations can be मिला in Australia, the United States, Mexico and elsewhere.
the ( ortho- ) sympathetic nervous system ( SNS ) is one of तीन प्रमुख parts of the autonomic nervous system : the others being the enteric and parasympathetic systems.
Its general action is to mobilize the body 's बेचैन प्रणाली fight-or-flight response.
It is, however, constantly active at a basic level to maintain homeostasis.
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile मेमोरी card format for use in portable devices, such as mobile phones, digital cameras, GPS navigation devices, and tablet computers.
The Secure Digital standard is maintained by the SD Card संघ ( SDA ).
SD technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands across dozens of product categories and more than 8,000 models.
The Secure Digital format includes four card families available in three different रूप factors.
The four families हैं the असली Standard-Capacity ( SDSC ), the High-Capacity ( SDHC ), the extended-capacity ( SDXC ), and the sdio, which combines input/output functions with data storage.
The three रूप कारकों हैं the असली size, the `` mini '' size, and the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ).
There are many combinations of form factors और device families.
Electrically passive adapters allow the use of a छोटी card in a host device built to hold a larger card.
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide backward compatibility and accept older SD cards, but this article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may offer greater capacity than the host device can handle.
A newer card may use a file system the मेजबान device can not navigate.
Use of an SDIO card requires the host device be designed लिये the input/output functions the card provides.
The संगठन of the card was changed starting साथ the SDHC family.
Some vendors produced SDSC cards above 1 GB पहले the SDA had मानकीकृत a method of doing so.
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce compliance with its specifications and assure users of compatibility.

Daniel Lawrence Whitney ( born February 17, 1963 ) best known by his stage name और character Larry the केबल Guy, is an American stand-up हास्य, actor, country music artist, voice actor, and former radio personality.
He was one of the members of the Blue Collar Comedy Tour, a comedy troupe which included Bill Engvall, Ron White, and Jeff Foxworthy ( with whom he has starred on Blue Collar TV ).
Whitney has released seven comedy albums, of जिससे three have been certified gold by the RIAA for शिपमेंट of 500,000 copies.
In addition, he has starred in three Blue Collar Comedy Tour-related movies, as well as in the films Larry the Cable Guy : Health Inspector, Delta Farce, and Witless Protection, as well as voicing Mater in the Cars franchise.
व्हिटनी 's catchphrase : `` Git-R-Done ! '' is also the title of his book.
On January 26, 2010, the TV channel History घोषित that it was ordering a series starring Whitney called Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy, in which he would explore the country and immerse himself in different lifestyles, jobs, and hobbies.
The first episode of the series aired on February 8, 2011.
Vitamin D is a समूह of fat-soluble secosteroids responsible for intestinal absorption of calcium और phosphate.
In humans, the most important related compounds of vitamin d are vitamin D2 और vitamin D3.
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) और ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 ) are unique as they constitute what we know as विटामिन D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements.
The body can also synthesize vitamin D ( from cholesterol ) when sun एक्सपोज़र is adequate ( hence its nickname, the `` sunshine विटामिन '' ).
हालांकि vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin, it is not actually an essential dietary vitamin in the strict sense, as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts by most mammals exposed to sunlight.
( Cats and कुत्तो can not synthesize vitamin D efficiently and must प्राप्त it in their diet. )
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is तभी scientifically called a vitamin जब it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and must be प्राप्त from their diet.
However, as साथ other compounds commonly called vitamins, vitamin D was discovered in an effort to find the dietary substance that was lacking in a disease, namely, rickets, the बाल्यकाल form of osteomalacia.
Additionally, like other compounds पुकारा vitamins, in the developed world vitamin D is added to स्टेपल भोजन, such as milk, to avoid disease due to कमियां.
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous संश्लेषण from exposure to sunlight as well as intake from the diet, और it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations.
The evidence indicates कि the synthesis of vitamin d from sun exposure works in a feedback लूप that prevents toxicity लकिन, because of uncertainty about the cancer risk from sunlight, no recommendations are issued by the Institute of Medicine, USA, for the amount of sun exposure required to मिलें vitamin d आवश्यकताएँ.
Accordingly, the Dietary सन्दर्भ Intakes लिये vitamin D assume कि no synthesis occurs और that all of a person 's vitamin D is from their diet, although that will rarely occur in practice.
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol, which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the specific vitamin D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a व्यक्ति 's vitamin D status.
Part of the calcidiol is परिवर्तित by the kidneys to calcitriol, the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol circulates as a hormone in the blood, regulating the concentration of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the स्वस्थ growth और remodeling of bone.
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other उद्देश्य, such as the proliferation, differentiation and apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation.
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the evidence for other health effects of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent.
The best evidence of benefit is for bone health and a decrease in mortality in elderly women.
Standard form of the periodic तालिका.
the colors represent different categories of elements explained नीचे.
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical elements, organized on the basis of their atomic numbers, electron configurations, और recurring chemical properties.
तत्व are presented in order of increasing atomic number ( number of protons ).
The standard form of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or main देह of elements, positioned above a smaller double row of elements.
The table can also be deconstructed into four rectangular blocks : the s-block to the left, the p-block to the सही, the d-block in the middle, and the f-block below that.
The rows of the table are called periods ; the कालम of the s-, d-, and p-blocks are पुकारा groups, with some of these having names such as the halogens or the noble gases.
Since, by definition, a periodic table incorporates recurring trends, any such table can be used to derive relationships between the गुण of the elements and predict the properties of new, yet to be discovered or synthesized, elements.
As a परिणाम, a periodic table—whether in the standard रूप or some other variant—provides a useful framework for analyzing chemical behavior, and such tables are widely used in chemistry and अन्य sciences.
Although precursors exist, Dmitri Mendeleev is generally credited with the publication, in 1869, of the first widely recognized periodic table.
He developed his table to illustrate periodic trends in the properties of the then-known elements.
Mendeleev also predicted some properties of then-unknown elements that would be expected to fill gaps in this table.
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the elements in question were subsequently discovered.
Mendeleev 's periodic table has चूंकि been expanded and refined with the discovery or संश्लेषण of further new elements and the development of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior.
All elements from atomic numbers 1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized.
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have महरूम found to exist naturally, although some हैं मिला only in ट्रेस amounts and were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories.
the elements after 98 have only been synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued, with the सवाल of how the periodic table may need to be modified to accommodate any such additions being a matter of ongoing debate.
numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring elements have also been produced in laboratories.
Minimum wage by U.S. state and U.S. territory ( American Samoa, Guam, प्यूर्टो Rico, Virgin Islands ), as of jan. 1, 2013.
In the United States, workers हैं generally entitled to be paid no less than the statutory minimum wage.
The federal government mandates a nationwide minimum wage level of $ 7.25 per hour, while some राज्य and municipalities have set minimum wage levels higher than the federal level, with the highest state minimum wage being $ 9.19 प्रति hour in Washington as of 2013.
Among those paid by the hour in 2012, 1.6 million were reported as कमाई exactly the प्रचलित federal minimum wage.
About 2.0 million were reported as earning wages below the minimum.
Together, these 3.6 million workers with wages at or below the minimum made up 4.7 percent of all hourly-paid workers.

Evan Williams bourbon whiskey
Bourbon whiskey is a type of American whiskey – a barrel-aged distilled spirit made primarily from corn.
The name of the स्पिरिट derives from its historical association with an area known as बूढ़ा Bourbon, around what is अभी Bourbon County, Kentucky ( which, in turn, was named after the French हाउस of Bourbon royal family ).
It has महरूम produced since the 18th century.
While it may be made anywhere in the United States, it is strongly संबद्ध with the American दक्षिण in general, and Kentucky in particular.
The Mona Lisa ( La Gioconda or La Joconde ) is a half-length portrait of a woman by the Italian artist Leonardo da Vinci, which has been acclaimed as `` the best known, the most visited, the most लिखा परिचय, the most sung about, the most parodied work of art in the world. ''
the painting, thought to be a portrait of लिसा Gherardini, the wife of Francesco del Giocondo, is in oil on a poplar panel, and is believed to have been painted between 1503 और 1506.
It was acquired by King फ्रांसिस I of France and is now the प्रॉपर्टी of the French Republic, on permanent display at the Musée du Louvre in Paris since 1797.
The ambiguity of the subject 's expression, which is frequently described as enigmatic, the monumentality of the composition, the subtle modeling of forms and the atmospheric illusionism were novel qualities that have contributed to the continuing fascination and पढ़ाई of the work.
Robert Allen Palmer ( 19 January 1949 – 26 September 2003 ), was an English singer-songwriter and musician.
He थी known for उसके distinctive voice and the eclectic mix of musical styles on his albums, combining soul, jazz, rock, पॉप, reggae and blues.
He found success both in his solo career and in the musical act The शक्ति Station, and had Top 10 songs in both the UK and the US.
उसके iconic music videos by Terence Donovan for the hits `` Addicted to Love `` and `` Simply Irresistible `` featured identically dressed dancing women with pale faces, dark eye makeup and bright red lipstick, which resembled the women in the आर्ट of Patrick Nagel, an artist popular in the 1980s.
Sharp-suited, his involvement in the music industry commenced in the 1960s, covered five decades and included a spell with Vinegar Joe.
Palmer प्राप्त a number of awards throughout his career, including two Grammy Awards for Best Male Rock गायन Performance, an MTV Video Music Award, and was twice nominated for the Brit Award लिये Best British Male.
Computed tomography angiography ( cta ) is a computed टोमोग्राफी तकनीक used to visualize arterial and venous vessels throughout the body.
This ranges from arteries serving the brain to those bringing रक्त to the फेफड़े, kidneys, arms and legs.
the Champs-Élysées decorated with flags for Bastille Day
Horseman of the French Republican Guard दौरान the 2007 military parade on the Champs-Élysées.
Prise de la Bastille by Jean-Pierre-Louis-Laurent Houel
Bastille Day is the name given in english-speaking countries to the French National Day, which is celebrated on the 14th of July each year.
In France, it is formally called La Fête nationale ( ; The National Celebration ) और commonly Le quatorze juillet ( ; the fourteenth of July ).
it commemorates the 1790 Fête de la Fédération, held on the पहला anniversary of the storming of the Bastille on 14 July 1789 ; the anniversary of the storming of the Bastille fortress-prison was seen as a symbol of the uprising of the modern nation, and of the reconciliation of all the फ्रेंच inside the constitutional monarchy which preceded the First Republic, during the French Revolution.
festivities and आधिकारिक ceremonies are held all over France.
The oldest and largest regular military parade in Europe is held on the morning of 14 July, on the Champs-Élysées avenue in Paris in सामने of the President of the Republic, French officials and foreign guests.
The United States of अमेरिका ( USA or U.S.A. ), commonly called the United States ( US or U.S. ) or America, is a federal republic consisting of fifty states and a federal district.
the lower forty-eight contiguous states and the federal district of Washington, D.C. are in central North America between Canada and Mexico.
the state of Alaska is west of Canada and east of Russia across the Bering Strait, और the state of Hawaii is in the mid-North प्रशांत.
The country also has पाँच आबादी and nine unpopulated territories in the Pacific and the Caribbean.
At 3.79 million square miles ( 9.83 million km2 ) and with around 315 million people, the United States is the third- or fourth-largest country by total area and the third-largest by दोनो land area and population.
it is one of the world 's most ethnically diverse and multicultural nations, the उत्पाद of large-scale immigration from many countries.
The भूगोल and climate of the U.S. is also extremely विविध, with deserts, plains, forests, और mountains कि are home to a wide variety of species.
Paleoindians migrated इससे Asia to what is now the United States mainland around 15,000 years ago.
बाद 1500, Old World diseases introduced by Europeans greatly reduced their populations.
European colonization began around 1600 and came mostly from England.
The United States emerged from thirteen British colonies located along the Atlantic seaboard.
Disputes between Great Britain and the अमरीकी colonies led to the American Revolution.
On July 4, 1776, delegates from the 13 colonies unanimously issued the Declaration of स्वतंत्रता, which स्थापित the United States of America.
The American Revolutionary War, which ended with the recognition of independence of the United States from the Kingdom of Great ब्रिटेन, was the first successful war of independence against a European colonial empire.
The current Constitution was adopted on September 17, 1787 ; twenty-seven Amendments have since been added to the Constitution.
The first टेन amendments, collectively named the Bill of Rights, were ratified in 1791 and guarantee many fundamental civil rights and freedoms.
Driven by the doctrine of manifest नियति, the United States embarked on a vigorous expansion across North America throughout the 19th century.
This involved displacing native tribes, acquiring new territories, and gradually admitting new राज्य.
The American Civil युद्ध ended legalized गुलामी in the United States.
By the समाप्त of the nineteenth century, the United States extended into the Pacific Ocean, and its economy was the world 's largest.
The Spanish–American War and confirmed the country 's status as a global military power.
The United States उभरा from as a global superpower, the first country with nuclear weapons, and a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
the end of the Cold War and the dissolution of the Soviet संघ बाएँ the United States as the sole superpower.
The United States is a विकसित country and has the world 's largest national economy, with an estimated 2012 GDP of $ 15.6 trillion 19 % of global GDP at purchasing-power parity, as of 2011.
the per capita GDP of the U.S. was the world 's sixth-highest as of 2010, although America 's wealth inequality was also ranked highest among OECD countries by the World Bank.
The अर्थव्यवस्था is fueled by an abundance of प्राकृतिक resources, a well-developed अवसंरचना, and high productivity ; and while its economy is considered post-industrial it continues to be one of the world 's largest manufacturers.
The country accounts लिये 39 % of global military spending, and is a leading economic, political, और cultural force in the world, as well as a leader in scientific research और technological innovation.
the NCAA Men 's Division I Basketball Championship is a single-elimination tournament played each spring in the United States, currently featuring 68 college basketball teams, to determine the national championship of the major college basketball teams.
The tournament, organized by the National Collegiate Athletic संघ ( NCAA ), was created during 1939 by the National Association of Basketball Coaches, and was the idea of Ohio State University coach Harold Olsen.
Played mostly during March, it is known informally as March Madness or the Big नृत्य, and has become one of the most famous annual sporting events in the United States.
The NCAA has credited Bob Walsh of the Seattle Organizing कमेटी for starting the March Madness celebration during 1984.
The tournament teams शामिल champions from 31 प्रभाग i conferences ( which प्राप्त automatic bids ), and 37 teams which are awarded at-large berths.
These `` at-large '' teams are chosen by an NCAA selection committee, as detailed below.
The 64 teams are divided into four regions और organized into a single elimination `` bracket '', which predetermines, when a टोली wins a game, which team it will face next.
Each team is `` seeded '', or ranked, within its region.
After an initial four games between eight lower-ranked teams, the tournament occurs during the course of three weekends, at pre-selected neutral sites around the United States.
Lower-ranked teams are placed in the bracket against higher ranked teams.
Each weekend eliminates three-fourths of the टीमों, from a round of 64, to a `` मीठी Sixteen '', and for the last weekend of the Tournament a Final Four ; the Final Four is usually निभाई during the first weekend of April.
These four teams, one from each region, then compete in one location for the national championship.
The tournament has been at least partially televised since 1969.
Presently, the खेल are reported by CBS, TBS, TNT, and truTV by the trade-name NCAA March Madness.
Since 2011, all games are available for देखने nationwide.
As television coverage has grown, so too has the tournament 's popularity.
Presently, millions of अमेरिकी `` fill आउट a bracket '', predicting विजेता of all 67 games.
With 11 national titles, UCLA has the record लिये the most NCAA Men 's Division i Basketball Championships ; John Wooden coached ucla to 10 of इसके 11 titles.
The University of Kentucky is second, with 8 national titles, while इंडियाना University और the University of North Carolina are tied for third with 5 national titles.
Duke University ranks fifth with 4 national शीर्षक.
a sample of synthetic motor oil
Synthetic oil is a स्नेहक consisting of chemical compounds that are artificially made ( synthesized ).
Synthetic lubricants can be manufactured using chemically modified petroleum components rather than whole crude oil, but can भी be synthesized from other raw materials.
Synthetic oil is used as a substitute for स्नेहक परिष्कृत from petroleum when operating in extremes of temperature, because, in general, it provides superior mechanical और chemical properties than those found in traditional mineral oils.
Aircraft jet engines, for example, require the use of synthetic oils, whereas aircraft पिस्टन engines do not.
Jackass is an American reality series, originally shown on MTV from 2000 to 2002, featuring people performing various dangerous, crude self-injuring stunts और pranks.
The show served as a launchpad for the television and acting careers of Bam Margera, Steve-O, and also Johnny knoxville, who previously था only a few नाबालिग acting roles.
Since 2002, three Jackass films have been produced and released by MTV corporate sibling Paramount Pictures, continuing the franchise after its run on टेलीविज़न.
the show sparked several spin-offs including Viva la Bam, Wildboyz, Homewrecker, Dr. steve-o and blastazoid.
the show placed # 68 on Entertainment Weekly `` New TV Classics '' list.
Roseanne Cherrie Barr ( born नवम्बर 3, 1952 ) is an American actress, comedienne, writer, television producer, director, and 2012 presidential nominee of the California -based Peace and Freedom Party.
Barr began उसके करियर in stand-up कॉमेडी at clubs before gaining कीर्ति for her role in the sitcom Roseanne.
The show was a hit and lasted nine seasons, from 1988 to 1997.
वो won both an Emmy और a सुनहरी Globe Award for Best अभिनेत्री for her work on the show.
Barr had crafted a `` fierce working-class domestic goddess '' persona in the eight years preceding her sitcom and wanted to do a realistic show about a strong mother who was not a victim of patriarchal consumerism.
The granddaughter of immigrants from Europe and Russia, Barr थी the oldest of four children in a working-class Jewish Salt Lake City family ; she was also active in the LDS Church.
In 1974, she married Bill Pentland, with जिसको she had three children, before divorcing in 1990 and marrying comedian Tom Arnold for four years.
Controversy arose when she sang `` The star-spangled Banner `` off-key at a 1990 nationally aired baseball game, followed by grabbing her crotch and spitting.
After her sitcom ended, she launched her own talk show, The Roseanne दिखाएँ, which aired from 1998 to 2000.
in 2005, she returned to stand-up comedy साथ a world tour.
In 2011, वो starred in an unscripted tv show, Roseanne 's Nuts, that lasted from जुलाई to सितंबर of that year, about her life on a Hawaiian farm.
in early 2012, Barr announced her candidacy for the Presidential nomination of the Green Party.
Barr lost the नामांकन to Jill Stein.
She तब sought the presidential nomination of the Peace and Freedom Party, which she won on August 4, 2012.
Barr प्राप्त 61,971 votes in the सामान्य election, placing sixth overall.
Francesco Albani 's 17th century Baptism of Christ is a typical depiction with the आसमान खोलने and the Holy Spirit descending as a dove.
The baptism of Jesus marks the beginning of his public ministry.
This event is recorded in the canonical gospels of Matthew, Mark and Luke.
John 's gospel does not describe Jesus ' baptism, but John the Baptist does testify of the other things in.
In the New Testament, John the Baptist preached the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ( ), and declared himself a forerunner of he कि would baptize `` साथ the पावन Ghost and with fire '' ( ).
In so doing he was तैयारी the way for यीशु.
Jesus came to the Jordan River where he थी baptized by John.
The baptismal scene includes the आकाश opening, a dove-like descent of the Holy Spirit, and a voice from heaven saying, `` This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased. ''
Most modern scholars view the fact that यीशु थी baptized by John as an historical event to which a high degree of certainty can be assigned.
साथ with the crucifixion of Jesus most scholars view it as एक of the two historically certain facts परिचय उसे, and प्रायः use it as the starting points for the study of the historical Jesus.
The baptism is एक of the five major milestones in the gospel narrative of the life of Jesus, the others being the Transfiguration, Crucifixion, Resurrection, and Ascension.
Most Christian denominations view the baptism of Jesus as an important इवेंट and a basis for the Christian rite of बपतिस्मा ( see also ).
In Eastern Christianity, Jesus ' baptism is commemorated on 6 January, the feast of epiphany.
In the Roman Catholic Church, the Anglican Communion, the Lutheran Churches and some other Western denominations, it is recalled on a day within the following week, the feast of the baptism of the Lord.
In Roman Catholicism, the baptism of Jesus is one of the चमकदार रहस्यों sometimes added to the Rosary.
It is a Trinitarian feast in the Eastern Orthodox Churches.
Methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a form of vitamin B12.
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12, occurring as dark red crystals that freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water.
Vitamin B12, vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12, also called cobalamin, is a water-soluble vitamin with a key role in the normal functioning of the brain and बेचैन system, और for the formation of blood.
It is एक of the eight B विटामिन.
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human body, especially affecting DNA synthesis और regulation, but also fatty acid संश्लेषण and energy production.
Neither fungi, पौधे, nor animals are capable of producing vitamin B12.
Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes required for its synthesis, although many foods हैं a natural source of b12 because of bacterial symbiosis.
The vitamin is the largest and most structurally complicated vitamin and can be produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin B12 consists of a class of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ), सब of which have vitamin activity.
It contains the biochemically rare element cobalt.
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is संपन्नता only by जीवाणु ( which usually produce hydroxocobalamin ), but conversion between different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body.
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin, cyanocobalamin, करता not occur in nature, लकिन is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and तब used in many pharmaceuticals and supplements, and as a food additive, because of its स्थिरता and lower production cost.
in the body it is converted to the human physiological forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin, leaving behind the cyanide, albeit in minimal विशेषज्ञता.
More recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, and adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological उत्पाद and food पूरक.
The extra utility of these is currently debated.
विटामिन B12 was discovered from its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia, which is an autoimmune disease in which parietal cells of the stomach responsible for secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed.
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the normal अवशोषण of B12, so a lack of intrinsic factor, as seen in pernicious anemia, causes a vitamin B12 deficiency.
Many other subtler kinds of vitamin B12 deficiency और their biochemical effects have since been elucidated.
Full Metal Jacket is a 1987 युद्ध film produced, directed and co-written by Stanley Kubrick.
It is an adaptation of Gustav Hasford 's 1979 novel The Short-Timers and stars Matthew Modine, Vincent D'Onofrio, R. Lee Ermey, Arliss Howard, and Adam Baldwin.
the film follows a platoon of U.S. Marines through their training and the experiences of two of the platoon 's Marines in the Tet Offensive during the Vietnam War.
the film 's title refers to the full metal jacket bullet used by infantry riflemen.
The film received critical acclaim.
It received an Academy Award नामांकन for Best Adapted पटकथा for Kubrick, Michael Herr and Gustav Hasford.
in 2001, the American Film Institute placed Full Metal Jacket at # 95 in their `` AFI 's 100 Years... 100 Thrills `` पोल.
TMZ is a celebrity news website that debuted on November 8, 2005.
it was a collaboration between AOL and telepictures Productions, a division of Warner Bros., until समय Warner divested AOL in 2009.
However, it remained affiliated with AOL News and रै the एओएल News लोगो affixed in the अपर right corner.
The name tmz stands लिये the historic `` studio zone `` or 30-mile zone radius from the intersection of West Beverly Boulevard and North La Cienega Boulevard in Los Angeles.
TMZ 's मैनेजिंग एडिटर is Harvey Levin, a lawyer-turned-journalist who was previously a legal expert for the Los Angeles television station kcbs-tv.
The site claims that it करता not pay for stories or interviews ; however, Levin has admitted that TMZ does `` sometimes pay स्त्रोत लिये लीड on कहानियां ''.
Levin has stated that `` everything is researched and vetted for accuracy. ''
A companion TV series, tmz on TV, debuted on September 10, 2007.
चीख 3 is a 2000 American slasher film created by Kevin Williamson, directed by वेस craven and written by Ehren Kruger, starring Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox Arquette and David Arquette.
It was released on February 4, 2000 as the third installment in the चीख film series.
The events of the story हैं set three years after those of Scream 2 and follows Sidney Prescott ( Campbell ) जो has gone into self-imposed isolation following the events of the previous two films but is drawn to Hollywood after a new Ghostface begins killing the cast of the film within a film `` Stab 3 ''.
Scream 3 combines the violence of the slasher genre with comedy and `` whodunit `` mystery while satirizing the cliché of film trilogies.
Unlike the previous चीख films, there थी an increased emphasis on comedic elements and the violence and horror was reduced in response to increased public scrutiny परिचय violence in media following the Columbine High School massacre.
The फिल्मी was the concluding अध्याय of the Scream series until it was revived with a sequel, Scream 4, in 2011.
Williamson provided a five-page outline for दो sequels to Scream when auctioning his original script, hoping to entice bidders with the potential of buying a franchise.
विलियमसन 's commitments to other projects meant he थी unable to develop a complete script for Scream 3 and writing duties were undertaken by ehren क्रूगर who discarded much of Williamson 's notes.
Craven and Marco Beltrami returned to सीधा and score the film respectively as they had with the previous two series entries.
Production was troubled with script rewrites, with पृष्ठों sometimes only ready on the day of फिल्मांकन, and scheduling difficulties साथ the main cast.
Scream 3 performed both financially and critically worse than इसके preceding films, कमाई over $ 161 million and साथ many critics claiming that the फिल्मी had become what Scream originally `` spoofed ``.
Despite negative criticism the film किया receive praise with reviewers calling it the perfect end to the Scream trilogy.
As of 2012, the film is currently the क्रमांक 3 highest-grossing slasher-film in North America, following Scream at number 1 and Scream 2 at number 2.
The film 's soundtrack was well-received, spending fourteen weeks on the Billboard 200 and reaching a ऊँची of # 32.
Shoulder impingement syndrome, also called painful arc syndrome, supraspinatus syndrome, swimmer 's shoulder, and thrower 's shoulder, is a clinical syndrome which occurs when the tendons of the rotator cuff muscles become irritated and inflamed as they pass through the subacromial space, the passage beneath the acromion.
This can result in pain, weakness and loss of movement at the shoulder.
JLA was a monthly comic book published by DC Comics from जनवरी 1997 to अप्रैल 2006 featuring the Justice League.
The औपनिवेशिक history of the United राज्य covers the history of European settlements from the start of colonization of America until their incorporation into the United States.
In the late 16th century, England, France, Spain and the Netherlands launched major colonization programs in eastern North America.
Small early attempts—such as the English Lost Colony of Roanoke —often disappeared ; everywhere the death rate of the first arrivals was very high.
Nevertheless successful colonies were established.
यूरोपीय settlers came from a variety of social and religious groups.
No aristocrats settled permanently, but a number of adventurers, soldiers, किसानो, and tradesmen arrived.
Diversity थी an American characteristic as the Dutch of New Netherland, the Swedes and Finns of New Sweden, the English Quakers of पेन्सिलवेनिया, the अंग्रेज़ी Puritans of New England, the English settlers of Jamestown, and the `` worthy poor '' of Georgia, came to the new continent and built colonies with distinctive social, religious, political और economic styles.
Occasionally one colony took control of another ( दौरान wars between their European parents ).
तभी in Nova Scotia ( अभी part of Canada ) did the conquerors expel the previous colonists.
Instead they all lived side by side in peace.
There were no major civil wars among the 13 colonies, and the two chief armed rebellions ( in Virginia in 1676 and in New York in 1689–91 ) were short-lived failures.
Wars between the French और the British—the French and Indian Wars and Father rale 's War —were recurrent, and involved French-support लिये Wabanaki Confederacy attacks on the frontiers.
By 1760 France was defeated and the British seized its colonies.
The four distinct regions were : New England, the Middle Colonies, the Chesapeake Bay Colonies ( Upper South ) and the Lower South.
कुछ historians add a fifth region, the Frontier, which was never separately organized.
By the time European settlers arrived around 1600–1650, the majority of the Native अमेरिकी living in the पूर्वी United States had been decimated by new diseases, introduced to उन्हें decades before by explorers and sailors.
See timeline of Colonial America for list of historical कार्यक्रम.
Gloria Laura वेंडरबिल्ट ( born February 20, 1924 ) is an American artist, author, actress, heiress, और socialite most विख्यात as an early developer of designer blue जीन्स.
She is a member of the prominent Vanderbilt family of New York and the माँ of CNN 's Anderson Cooper.
Greece ( Romanization of Greek| ), officially the Hellenic Republic ( ' ), is a country in southeast Europe.
According to the 2011 census, Greece 's population is around 11 million.
Athens is the nation 's capital and largest city, its urban area also including Piraeus.
Greece is strategically located at the crossroads of Europe, Asia, the Middle East, and Africa, and रै land सीमायें with Albania, the Republic of Macedonia and Bulgaria to the north, and Turkey to the northeast.
The Aegean Sea lies to the east of mainland Greece, the Ionian Sea to the west, and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
Greece has the 11th longest तटरेखा in the world at in length, featuring a vast number of islands ( approximately 1,400, of which 227 are inhabited ), सहित Crete, the Dodecanese, the Cyclades, and the Ionian Islands among others.
Eighty percent of Greece consists of mountains, of which Mount Olympus is the highest at.
आधुनिक Greece traces its roots to the civilization of Ancient Greece, generally considered the cradle of Western civilization.
As ऐसे, it is the जन्मस्थान of democracy, Western philosophy, the Olympic खेल, Western साहित्य and historiography, political science, major scientific and mathematical principles, and पश्चिमी drama, including both tragedy और comedy.
This legacy is partly reflected in the seventeen UNESCO World Heritage Sites located in Greece, ranking it 7th in यूरोपीय and 13th in the संसार.
The modern यूनानी state was established in 1830, following the यूनानी War of Independence.
Greece is a founding member of the United Nations, रै been a member of what is now the European Union चूंकि 1981 ( and the eurozone since 2001 ), and has been a member of NATO since 1952.
Greece is a developed country with an advanced, high-income अर्थव्यवस्था and very high standards of living, including the world 's 21st उच्चतम quality of life as of 2010.
Greece 's economy is also the largest in the Balkans, where Greece is an important regional investor.
A प्रधान meridian is a meridian, i.e. a line of देशांतर, at which longitude is defined to be 0°.
A prime meridian and its opposite in a 360°-system, the 180th मध्याह्न ( at 180° longitude ), form a ग्रेट वृत्त.
This great circle divides the गोला, e.g. the Earth, into two hemispheres.
If one uses directions of East and West from a defined prime meridian, then they can be called Eastern Hemisphere and Western Hemisphere.
gerardus Mercator in his Atlas Cosmographicae ( 1595 ) uses a prime meridian somewhere close to 25°w, passing just to the west of Santa Maria Island in the Atlantic.
उसके 180th meridian runs along the Strait of Anián ( Bering Strait )
A prime meridian is ultimately arbitrary, unlike an equator, which is संकल्पित by the axis of rotation—and various conventions have been used or advocated in different regions and throughout history.
Minka Dumont Kelly ( born Minka Dumont Dufay ; June 24, 1980 ) is an American actress.
She is शायद best ज्ञात for her roles in Charlie 's Angels, Friday Night Lights, and the रूममेट.
R.O.B. ( Robotic Operating Buddy ), released in Japan as the, is an accessory for the Nintendo Entertainment System ( एनईएस ).
It was released in July 1985 in Japan और later that year in North अमेरिका.
It had a short product lifespan, with support for only two games which comprised the `` Robot Series '' ; gyromite और stack-up.
R.O.B. was released with the intention of portraying the Nintendo Entertainment System as something novel in order to alleviate retail fears following the video game crash of 1983.
R.O.B. थी available in the Deluxe नियत, a configuration for the कंसोल that included, among other things, R.O.B. and Gyromite.
Stack-Up was purchased separately and included its own शारीरिक game pieces.
the चलना Liberty half dollar was a silver 50-cent piece or half dollar सिक्का issued by the संयुक्त States Mint इससे 1916 to 1947 ; it was designed by Adolph A. weinman.
In 1915, the new Mint Director, Robert W. Woolley, आए to believe that he was not only allowed but required by law to replace coin designs that had been in use for 25 years.
He therefore began the process of replacing the Barber coinage : dimes, quarters and half dollars, all bearing similar designs by long-time मिंट Engraver Charles E. Barber, and first struck in 1892.
Woolley had the Commission of Fine Arts conduct a competition, as a result of which Weinman was selected to design the dime and half dollar.
Weinman 's डिज़ाइन of Liberty striding towards the Sun for the हाफ dollar proved difficult to perfect, and Treasury Secretary William G. McAdoo, whose department included the Mint, माना having Barber create his own design.
Mint officials यहूद successful in getting Weinman 's design into production, although it never struck very well, जिससे may have been a factor in its replacement by the Franklin half dollar beginning in 1948.
Nevertheless, art historian Cornelius Vermeule considered the piece to be among the most beautiful US सिक्के.
Since 1986, a modification of Weinman 's obverse design has been used for the अमरीकी Silver Eagle.
The Toyota 4Runner is a mid-size खेल utility vehicle ( SUV ) उत्पादित by the Japanese निर्माता Toyota and sold throughout the world from 1984 to present.
In Japan it was known as the Toyota Hilux Surf.
The असली 4Runner was a compact SUV और little more than a Toyota pickup truck with a fiberglass shell over the bed, but the model has since undergone significant स्वतंत्र विकास into a cross between a compact and a mid-size SUV.
All 4Runners have महरूम built at Toyota 's Tahara plant in Tahara, Aichi, Japan, or at Hino Motors ' Hamura, Japan plant, and in Brazil.
Its mid-size crossover SUV counterpart is the टोयोटा highlander.
This article deals with medicine as practiced by trained professionals from ancient times to the present.
The प्राचीन Egyptians had a system of medicine that was बहुत advanced for its time and influenced बाद medical traditions.
The Egyptians and Babylonians both introduced the concepts of diagnosis, prognosis, and medical examination.
The Greeks went even further, and advanced as well medical ethics.
The Hippocratic Oath, still taken by doctors today, was written in Greece in the 5th century BCE.
In the medieval era, surgical practices inherited from the ancient masters were improved and then systematized in Rogerius 's The Practice of Surgery.
Universities began systematic training of physicians around the years 1220 in Italy.
During the Renaissance, understanding of anatomy improved, and the microscope was invented.
The germ theory of disease in the 19th century led to cures for many infectious diseases.
Military doctors advanced the methods of trauma treatment and surgery.
Public health measures were विकसित especially in the 19th century as the rapid growth of cities required systematic sanitary measures.
Advanced research centers opened in the early 20th century, often connected with major hospitals.
The mid-20th century was characterized by new biological treatments, such as antibiotics.
These advancements, along with developments in chemistry, genetics, and lab technology ( such as the x-ray ) led to modern medicine.
आयुर्विज्ञान was heavily professionalized in the 20th century, and new careers opened to women as nurses ( from the 1870s ) and as physicians ( especially बाद 1970 ).
The 21st century is characterized by very उन्नत research involving numerous fields of science.
the Hippocratic Corpus, is a संग्रहण of early medical works from ancient Greece strongly associated with the ancient Greek physician हिपोक्रेटिस and his teachings.
Potassium is a chemical element with symbol K ( from neo-latin kalium ) and परमाणु number 19.
elemental potassium is a soft silvery-white alkali metal that oxidizes rapidly in air and is very प्रतिक्रिया with water, generating sufficient heat to ignite the hydrogen emitted in the reaction and burning with a lilac flame.
Because potassium and sodium are chemically very similar, their salts were not at first differentiated.
The existence of multiple elements in their salts was suspected इससे 1702, and this was सिद्ध in 1807 when potassium and sodium were individually isolated from different salts by electrolysis.
Potassium in nature occurs only in ionic लवण.
As such, it is found dissolved in seawater ( which is 0.04 % potassium by weight ), and is part of many minerals.
Most industrial chemical applications of potassium employ the relatively ऊँची solubility in जल of पोटैशियम compounds, such as potassium soaps.
Potassium metal has only a few खास applications, being replaced in most chemical reactions with sodium metal.
Potassium ions हैं necessary for the फलन of all living cells.
Potassium ion diffusion is a key mechanism in nerve transmission, and पोटैशियम depletion in animals, including humans, results in various cardiac dysfunctions.
Potassium accumulates in plant cells, and thus fresh fruits and vegetables हैं a good dietary source of it.
Conversely, most पौधे except specialist halophytes are intolerant of salt, and sodium is present in them only in low concentration.
This resulted in potassium पहला being isolated from potash, the ashes of पौधे, giving the element its name.
For the same reason, heavy crop production rapidly depletes soils of पोटैशियम, और agricultural fertilizers consume 95 % of वैश्विक potassium chemical production.
The Singapore dollar or dollar ( चिह्न : $ ; code : SGD ) is the official currency of Singapore.
It is normally abbreviated with the dollar sign $, or alternatively S $ to distinguish it from other dollar -denominated currencies.
It is divided into 100 cents.
The Monetary Authority of Singapore and the ब्रुनेई Currency and Monetary Board still maintain the historic exchangeability of their two currencies, the Singaporean dollar and the Brunei dollar, respectively.
The dollar is accepted as `` प्रथागत tender '' in Brunei according to the Currency Interchangeability Agreement.
Likewise, the Brunei dollar is customarily accepted in Singapore
James Samuel Coleman ( May 12, 1926 – March 25, 1995 ) was an American sociologist, theorist and empirical researcher, based chiefly at the University of Chicago.
He was elected president of the अमरीकी Sociological Association.
Coleman studied the sociology of education, पब्लिक policy, और was one of the earliest users of the term `` social capital ``.
His Foundations of सोशल Theory influenced समाजशास्त्रीय theory.
His The Adolescent Society ( 1961 ) and `` Coleman Report '' ( Equality of Educational Opportunity, 1966 ) यहूद two of the most heavily cited books in educational sociology.
The landmark Coleman Report helped transform educational theory, reshape national शिक्षा policies, and influenced पब्लिक and scholarly opinion regarding the role of schooling in determining समता और productivity in the United States.
Superman ( from DC comics ) थी the first superhero created, art by Jim Lee.
A superhero ( sometimes rendered super-hero or super hero ) is a type of stock character possessing `` extraordinary or superhuman शक्तियां '' and dedicated to protecting the public.
Since the debut of the prototypical superhero सुपरमैन in 1938, stories of superheroes—ranging from brief episodic adventures to continuing years-long sagas—have dominated American comic books and crossed over into other media.
The word itself dates to at least 1917.
A female सुपरहीरो is sometimes पुकारा a superheroine ( also rendered super-heroine or सुपर heroine ).
`` SUPER HEROES '' is a trademark co-owned by DC Comics and Marvel Comics.
By most definitions, characters do not strictly require actual superhuman powers to be deemed superheroes, although terms such as costumed crime fighters or masked vigilantes are sometimes used to refer to those such as Batman and Green Arrow बगैर ऐसे powers जो share अन्य common superhero traits.
Such characters were generally referred to as `` mystery men '' in the so-called Golden Age of Comic Books to distinguish them from characters with super-powers.
Normally, superheroes use their powers to counter day-to-day crime while also combating threats against humanity by supervillains, their criminal counterparts.
Often, एक of these supervillains will be the superhero 's archenemy.
As well, some longrunning superheroes, such as Superman, Batman, Spider-Man and Iron Man each has a rogues gallery of enemies.
as well, superheroes sometimes will combat such irregular threats as aliens, magical/ fantasy entities, American war enemies such as nazism or communism, and godlike or demonic creatures.

The Shawshank मोचन is a 1994 American drama film written and directed by Frank Darabont and starring Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman.
Adapted from the Stephen King novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption, the film tells the story of Andy Dufresne, a banker who spends nearly two decades in shawshank State Prison for the murder of his wife and her lover despite उसके claims of innocence.
During his time at the prison, he befriends a fellow inmate, Ellis Boyd `` Red '' Redding, and finds himself protected by the guards after the warden begins using उसे in his money laundering operation.
despite a lukewarm box office reception that barely recouped its budget, the film received favorable reviews from critics, multiple award nominations, and has since enjoyed a remarkable life on केबल television, VHS, DVD, and Blu-ray.
It was included in the अमरीकी फिल्मी Institute 's 100 Years... 100 Movies 10th Anniversary Edition.
IT management is the discipline whereby all of the technology resources of a कड़ हैं managed in accordance with its needs and priorities.
These संसाधन may शामिल tangible investments like कंप्यूटर hardware, software, data, networks and data centre facilities, as well as the staffs जो are hired to maintain them.
Managing this responsibility within a company entails many of the basic management functions, like budgeting, staffing, and organizing and controlling, along with other aspects that हैं unique to technology, जैसे change management, software डिज़ाइन, network planning, tech support etc.
The Penitentiary of New Mexico Prison Riot, which took place on February 2 and 3, 1980, in the state 's maximum security prison south of Santa Fe, थी one of the most violent prison दंगे in the history of the American correctional system : 33 inmates died and more than 200 inmates were treated for injuries.
None of the 12 officers taken hostage were मारे, but seven were treated for injuries caused by beatings और rapes.
This was the third major riot at the NM State Penitentiary, the first occurring on 19 July 1922 और the second on 15 June 1953.
Author Roger Morris suggests the death toll may have been higher, as a number of bodies were incinerated or dismembered during the course of the mayhem.
